24a5(phal chen): go/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gzhon nu'i sa kun tu ston pa'i las te/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di ltar yi ge dang grangs dang brda dang rtsis kyi sbyor ba thams cad las rab tu 'das
24a6(phal chen): pa'i bya ba kun tu 'ang ston pa'i las dang / rta dang glang po dang / shing rta rgyug pa thams cad dang / 'phong kun las 'phags pa kun tu ston pa'i las dang / cho lo dang brda thabs dang / gar dang / rgyan dang rtsed mo dang /
24a7(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi dga' ba la phal las 'phags pa'i bya ba kun tu ston pa'i lus dang / ngag dang yid kyi las kha na ma tho ba med pa kun tu ston pa'i las dang / mya ngan las 'das pa sgo'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par 'jug
24a8(phal chen): pas/ 'jig rten gyi khams tshad med pa rgyas par gang ba kun tu ston pa'i las dang / mi thams cad dang / lha thams cad dang / klu dang gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang lto 'phye chen
24b1(phal chen): po dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten gyi mgon po thams cad las shin tu 'das par byang chub sems dpa'i mthu kun tu ston pa'i las dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten gyi mgon po'i gzugs
24b2(phal chen): dang kha dog dang gzi brjid las shin tu 'das par byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs dang / kha dog dang / gzi brjid kun tu ston pa'i las dang / 'dod pa dang / dga' ba dang / rtse bas mos pa'i sems can rnams la chos kyi
24b3(phal chen): dga' bas rab tu dga' ba yang dag par bskyed pa kun tu ston pa'i las dang / chos kyi rim gro bskyed pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa dang / rim gro bya bas 'dod pa'i khams thams cad rgyas par 'gengs pa kun tu ston pa'i
24b4(phal chen): las dang / chos la dga' ba'i snang bas de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi brlabs yang dag par blang ba kun tu ston pa'i las so/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gzhon nu'i sa kun tu ston
24b5(phal chen): pa'i las te/ de dag yongs su bstan nas de'i 'og tu byang chub sems dpa' rnams btsun mo'i 'khor gyis nang du 'dong bar 'gyur ba'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi btsun mo'i
24b6(phal chen): 'khor nye bar ston pa ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di ltar sngon lhan cig tu spyod spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su smin par bya ba'i don tu byang chub sems dpa' rnams btsun mo'i 'khor nye bar ston
24b7(phal chen): pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba brjod pa'i phyir btsun mo'i 'khor nye bar ston pa dang / longs spyod dang / skyid pa la chags pa'i lha dang mi rnams la longs spyod dang skyid pa'i che ba nyid
24b8(phal chen): yongs su bstan pa'i phyir btsun mo'i 'khor nye bar ston pa dang / rnyogs pa lnga'i zhing du sems can rnams kyi bsam pa'i rjes su 'brang ba'i phyir btsun mo'i 'khor nye bar ston pa dang / btsun mo'i 'khor gyi nang na ting nge 'dzin
25a1(phal chen): la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa'i mthu dang che ba nyid yongs su bstan pa'i phyir btsun mo'i 'khor nye bar ston pa dang / sngon gyi smon lam dang ldan pa'i sems can rnams kyi bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i
25a2(phal chen): phyir btsun mo'i 'khor nye bar ston pa dang / pha dang ma dang gnyen pa'i tshogs kyi bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir btsun mo'i 'khor nye bar ston pa dang / chos kyi dbyings chen po dang ldan pa'i rol mo brdung ba dang /
25a3(phal chen): dkrol ba'i sgras de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mchod cing bsnyen bkur ba yongs su grub par bya ba'i phyir btsun mo'i 'khor nye bar ston pa dang / btsun mo'i 'khor gyi nang nas byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin
25a4(phal chen): la gnas shing shin tu phra ba'i mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba nas yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa chen po'i bar du bstan pa'i phyir/ btsun mo'i 'khor nye bar ston pa dang / chos kyi skyabs dang ldan pa yang dag
25a5(phal chen): par bstan pa'i phyir btsun mo'i 'khor nye bar ston pa'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi btsun mo'i 'khor nye bar ston pa ste/ de dag ni srid pa tha ma'i byang chub sems dpa'i sa
25a6(phal chen): yongs su bstan nas de'i 'og tu mngon par 'byung bar 'gyur ba dag go/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mngon par 'byung ba ste/ bcu gang zhe na 'di ltar khyim gyi gnas smad
25a7(phal chen): pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' mngon par 'byung ba dang / gnas la dga' ba'i sems can gyen du bskyod pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' rnams mngon par 'byung ba dang / 'phags pa dang mthun pa'i lam gyi
25a8(phal chen): legs pa yongs su bstan pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams mngon par 'byung ba dang / rab tu byung ba'i yon tan dang / legs pa yang dag par bsngags pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' rnams
25b1(phal chen): mngon par 'byung ba dang / mtha' gnyis kyi lta ba dang bral ba yang dag par bstan pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams mngon par 'byung ba dang / 'dod pa'i bde ba dang phrad par brtson zhing bdag gi bde ba lhur len pa'i
25b2(phal chen): sems can skyo bar bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams mngon par 'byung ba dang / khams gsum pa thams cad las 'byung ba'i sngon gyi ltas yang dag par bstan pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' rnams
25b3(phal chen): mngon par 'byung ba dang / rang la rag las par spyod cing gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog pa la bsten pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' rnams mngon par 'byung ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang mi 'jigs pa thob
25b4(phal chen): pa dang / mthun par yang dag par bstan pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' rnams mngon par 'byung ba dang / kye rgyal ba'i sras chos nyid kyi kyang / byang chub sems dpa' srid pa tha ma pa ni gdon mi za
25b5(phal chen): bar mngon par 'byung ste/ kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams sems can 'dul ba'i dbang gis phyir mngon par 'byung ba yongs su ston pa dag go/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po
25b6(phal chen): 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dka' ba spyod pa'i sbyor ba ste/ bcu gang zhe na 'di ltar dma' ba la mos pa'i sems can gyi khams yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' rnams dka' ba spyod pa ston pa
25b7(phal chen): dang / lta ba'i rnam pa la gnas pa'i sems can rnams gyen du bskyod pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' rnams dka' ba spyod pa ston pa dang / las dang bya bas khyam par gyur pa'i sems can rnams la las kyi rnam par
25b8(phal chen): smin pa mngon sum du bstan pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' rnams dka' ba spyod pa ston pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas par chos nyid rjes su 'brang bar bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems
26a1(phal chen): dpa' rnams dka' ba spyod pa ston pa dang / bdag gi dub pa nye bar zhi zhing mthu dang ldan pa yongs su bstan pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' rnams dka' ba spyod pa ston pa dang / ma yin na chos la chags pa rnams kyi
26a2(phal chen): don du byang chub sems dpa' rnams dka' ba spyod pa ston pa dang / 'dod pa'i bde ba dang phrad par brtson zhing rang gi bde ba lhur len pa'i sems can rnams skyo bar bya ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' rnams dka' ba spyod pa
26a3(phal chen): ston pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa brtsams pa'i khyad par yongs su bstan pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams dka' ba spyod pa ston pa dang / skye bo phyi ma rnams brtson 'grus rtsom pa la yang dag par
26a4(phal chen): sbyar ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' rnams dka' ba spyod pa ston pa dang / ma yin na dbang po yongs su ma smin pa'i lha dang mi rnams yongs su smin par bya ba'i dus bsdad pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' rnams
26a5(phal chen): dka' ba spyod pa ston pa'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams sems can 'dul ba'i dbang gi phyir dka' ba spyod pa'i sbyor ba yongs su ston pa dag go/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras
26a6(phal chen): bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi snying po byang chub tu 'gro ba ste/ bcu gang zhe na 'di ltar 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad snang bar bya ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' rnams snying po byang chub tu
26a7(phal chen): 'dong ba dang / 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad rab tu bskyod pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams snying po byang chub tu 'dong ba dang / 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du bdag gis lus rnam par
26a8(phal chen): phye ba yongs su bstan pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams snying po byang chub tu 'dong ba dang / sngon lhan cig tu spyad pa spyod pa'i grogs kyi byang chub sems dpa' rnams bskul ba'i phyir byang chub
26b1(phal chen): sems dpa' rnams snying po byang chub tu 'dong ba dang / snying po byang chub kyi rgyan rnam par phye ba yongs su bstan pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' rnams snying po byang chub tu 'dong ba dang / sems can ji ltar mos
26b2(phal chen): pa rnams la lus dang spyod lam dang / byang chub sems kyi shing gi rgyan rnam par phye ba yongs su bstan pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams snying po byang chub tu 'dong ba dang / 'jig rten gyi khams
26b3(phal chen): thams cad na bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mngon du blta ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams snying po byang chub tu 'dong ba dang / gom pa dor ba dang / 'deg pa thams cad du ting nge 'dzin
26b4(phal chen): gyi sgo la snyoms par 'jug cing / skad cig skad cig du rnam par 'tshang rgya ba las mi 'da' ba'i phyir ro/ /byang chub sems dpa' rnams snying po byang chub tu 'dong ba dang / lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang dri za dang lha ma yin
26b5(phal chen): dang nam mkha' lding dang mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten gyi mgon po thams cad kyi mchod pa blang ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' rnams snying po byang chub tu 'dong ba dang /
26b6(phal chen): chags pa med pa'i ye shes chen pos rnam par phye ba'i byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa spyad pas 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad rnam par lta ba'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad yid la byed cing phyogs
26b7(phal chen): thams cad du rnam par phye ba'i mngon par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bstan pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' rnams snying po byang chub tu 'dong ba'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa'
26b8(phal chen): rnams kyi snying po byang chub tu 'gro ba sems can 'dul ba'i dbang gi phyir yongs su bstan pa dag go/ / //sangs rgyas rmad ga cad ces bya ba shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo/ bam po gsum pa/ /
27a1(phal chen): kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi snying po byang chub la 'dug pa ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di ltar 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad rab tu skyod cing / byang chub sems dpa'
27a2(phal chen): rnams snying po byang chub la 'khod do/ /'jig rten gyi khams thams cad snang bar byed cing / byang chub sems dpa' rnams snying po byang chub la 'khod do/ /ngan song thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed cing byang chub sems dpa'
27a3(phal chen): rnams snying po byang chub la 'khod do/ /'jig rten gyi khams thams cad rdo rje'i rang bzhin du byin gyis rlob cing / byang chub sems dpa' rnams snying po byang chub la 'khod do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i gdan seng ge'i khri
27a4(phal chen): la rnam par lta zhing / byang chub sems dpa' rnams snying po byang chub la 'khod do/ /yid nam mkha' dang mnyam pa la rnam par mi rtog cing byang chub sems dpa' rnams snying po byang chub la 'khod do/ /de ltar mthun pa'i
27a5(phal chen): lus dang spyod lam yongs su ston cing byang chub sems dpa' rnams snying po byang chub la 'khod do/ /rdo rje'i snying po'i ting nge 'dzin rjes su rtogs par byed cing / byang chub sems dpa' rnams snying po byang chub la 'khod do/ /
27a6(phal chen): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyi rlabs rnam par dag pa'i gnas yang dag par len cing / byang chub sems dpa' rnams snying po byang chub la 'khod do/ /bdag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i mthus 'gro ba thams cad
27a7(phal chen): byin gyis rlob cing / byang chub sems dpa' rnams snying po byang chub la 'khod do/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams snying po byang chub la 'dug go/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras byang chub sems dpa'
27a8(phal chen): rnams snying po byang chub mchog la 'khod nas kyang ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos bcu 'byung ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ kye rgyal ba'i sras de la snying po byang chub mchog la 'khod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams la 'jig rten
27b1(phal chen): gyi khams thams cad na bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis zhal mngon par bstan te/ phyag g.yas pa rkyang zhing / kye ded dpon chen po rgyal bar gyur cig /
27b2(phal chen): rgyal bar gyur cig ces gsung brjod de 'di ni ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos dang po'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras snying po byang chub mchog la 'khod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad
27b3(phal chen): dgongs pa dang / byin gyis rlobs pa yang dag par mdzad de 'di ni ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos gnyis pa'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras snying po byang chub mchog la 'khod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams la sngon lhan cig du spyod sbyod
27b4(phal chen): pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams 'ongs te/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag la kudan nas bskor cing mchod pa'i las rnam par phye ba rnam pa sna tshogs mngon par bsgrub ste/ 'di ni ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos
27b5(phal chen): gsum pa'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras snying po byang chub mchog la 'khod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams la 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rtswa dang gel ba dang / sdong po dang / nags tshal thams cad kyang
27b6(phal chen): bsam pa yod go lta ste/ snying po byang chub gang na ba der 'dud cing phyag 'tshal te/ de ni ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos bzhi pa'o/ /byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad las yang dag par 'da' ba'i tshe yang chos kyi
27b7(phal chen): dbyings rnam par 'byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin mngon du gyur te/ ting nge 'dzin de thob ma thag tu byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad las yang dag par 'da' bar 'gyur te/ 'di ni ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos lnga pa'o/ /
27b8(phal chen): kye rgyal ba'i sras rgya mtsho mchog gi dam pa dri ma med cing kun nas snang la 'od gsal ba'i sa'i snying po la 'khod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi sprin chen pos kun
28a1(phal chen): nas yog par 'gyur te/ 'di ni ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos drug pa'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras snying po byang chub kyi mchog la 'khod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mthus de bzhin gshegs pa
28a2(phal chen): la mchod pa dang / rim gror bya ba shin tu rgya chen po rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod pa'i las kyi phyir 'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas pa thams cad du 'byung ste/ 'di ni ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos bdun pa'o/ /
28a3(phal chen): kye rgyal ba'i sras snying po byang chub mchog la 'khod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams la ye shes mchog gis sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa dang / dbang po dang spyod pa mngon du 'gyur te/ 'di ni ngo
28a4(phal chen): mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos brgyad pa'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras snying po byang chub mchog la 'khod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams la blo shin tu rnam par dag pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin mngon du 'gyur te/
28a5(phal chen): ting nge 'dzin de thob ma thag tu nam mkha'i dbyings tshad med pa dang / dus gsum rgyas par 'gengs pa'i lus kun nas gnas par 'gyur te/ 'di ni ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos dgu pa'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras snying po byang chub
28a6(phal chen): mchog la 'khod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi lus kyi las dus thams cad la yang dag par gzhol zhing ye shes chen po chags pa med pa rdul dang bral ba'i snang ba dang ldan par 'gyur te/ 'di ni ngo mtshar rmad
28a7(phal chen): du byung ba'i chos bcu pa'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos rnams te/ byang chub sems dpa' snying po byang chub mchog la gnas pa rnams la
28a8(phal chen): 'byung bar 'gyur ba dag go/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras don rnam pa bcu po 'di dag gi dbang yang dag par mthong nas snying po byang chub mchog la 'dug pa'i byang chub sems dpa' bdud 'dul ba ston te/ bcu gang zhe na kun
28b1(phal chen): nas nyon mongs pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas pa na thab mo dang / g.yul la mos pa'i sems can rnams la byang chub sems dpa'i stobs kyi che ba nyid yang dag par bstan pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' bdud
28b2(phal chen): 'dul ba ston to/ /yid gnyis dang the tsom du gyur pa'i mi dang lha rnams kyi yid gnyis dang the tsom gcod pa'i phyir bdud 'dul ba ston to/ /bdud kyi sde yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir bdud 'dul ba ston to/ /'thab mo dang
28b3(phal chen): g.yul la mos pa'i lha dang mi rnams kun nas bsdu ba dang / kun nas 'dus pa'i lha dang mi rnams 'dul ba'i dbang gis phyir bdud 'dul ba ston to/ /byang chub sems dpa'i mthu la thub pa med pa yongs su bstan
28b4(phal chen): pa'i phyir bdud 'dul ba ston to/ /sems can gzhan mos shing spro bar bya ba'i phyir bdud 'dul ba ston to/ /phyi ma'i skye bo rnams la snying rje ba'i phyir bdud 'dul ba ston to/ /snying po byang chub la 'dug gi bar gyi
28b5(phal chen): bdud kyi las yongs su bstan pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' bdud kyi lam thams cad las 'das pa yongs su bstan pa'i phyir bdud 'dul ba ston to/ /nyon mongs pa'i stobs kyis nyamasmad cing stobs med
28b6(phal chen): par byas pa yongs su bstan pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba brjod pa dang / byams pa'i stobs yang dag par bstan pa'i phyir bdud 'dul ba ston to/ /kun nas nyon mongs pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'byam
28b7(phal chen): klas pa dag chos nyid rjes su 'brang ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' bdud 'dul ba ston te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras/ don bcu po de dag gi dbang mthong nas ni/ byang chub sems dpa' bdud
28b8(phal chen): 'dul ba ston to/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa ste/ bcu gang zhe na/
29a1(phal chen): kye rgyal ba'i sras de la byang chub sems dpa' rnams bdud dang las dang nyon mongs pa thams cad las 'das shing byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa yin/ byang chub
29a2(phal chen): sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo thams cad la rnam par brtse ba yin/ byang chub sems dpa'i bsam gtan 'byam klas pa thams cad dang ldan pa yin/ chos dkar po'i tshogs thams cad yang dag par bstsags pa
29a3(phal chen): yin/ chos snang ba rnam par dpyad par bya ba thams cad shin tu rnam par phye ba yin/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du khyab pa'i lus dang ldan pa yin/ sems can thams cad la snyoms pa'i sems dang
29a4(phal chen): dbyangs su ldan pa yin/ byin gyis rlabs thams cad kyis rab tu chog par byin gyis rlabs pa yin/ 'das pa dang ma byon pa dang da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rnam
29a5(phal chen): par mi rtog pa thob pa yin/ skad cig gcig gis dus gsum rnam par 'tshang rgya ba yin/ shin tu rnam par sangs rgyas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin kyang rab tu thob pa yin/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs
29a6(phal chen): dang ldan pa yin te/ 'di ltar gnas dang gnas ma yin pa'i stobs dang ldan pa yin/ zag pa zad pa shes pa'i bar gyi stobs dang ldan pa yin te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams
29a7(phal chen): kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa ste/ stobs bcu po de dag dang ldan pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ni de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya ba'i grangasu 'gro'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras
29a8(phal chen): de ltar mngon par sangs rgyas pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni chos kyi 'khor lo chen po rnam pa bcur bskor te/ rnam pa bcu gang zhe na 'di ltar myi 'jigs pa shin tu
29b1(phal chen): sbyangs pa'i ye shes dang ldan pa dang / so sor yang dag par rig pa bzhi sgra rjes su bsgrags pa dang / bden pa bzhi'i tshul gyis shin tu rtogs pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi rnam par thar pa sgrib pa myed pa'i rjes su song
29b2(phal chen): ba dang / sems can thams cad kyi sems dga' bar 'gyur ba dang / thogs pa myed cing blta bar dka' la g.yo ba myed cing sdug bsngal gyi gsal shing 'byin pa dang / sngon gyi snying rje chen po'i byin gyis rlabs pa dang /
29b3(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du grag pa dang / bskal pa grangs myed par chos ston pa rgyun mi 'chad pa dang / dbang po dang stobs dang byang chub kyi yan lag dang / bsam gtan dang rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang
29b4(phal chen): snyoms par 'jug pa dang / legs par spyod pas bskor ba'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras sgo rnam pa bcu po de dag la stsogs pa rnam pa tshad myed par de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi 'khor lo skor ro/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras
29b5(phal chen): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi chos kyi 'khor lo de ni sems can gzhan gyi rgyud la chos dkar po'i rnam pa bcus thogs pa myed pa dang / mngon par chags pa myed
29b6(phal chen): par 'byung bar 'gyur te/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di ltar smon lam thams cad kyi stobs kyi shugs dang / snying rje chen po'i byin gyi rlabs dang / sems can gyi khams thams cad myi gtong ba dang / ye shes kyi rnam par 'phrul
29b7(phal chen): pa bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du ston pa dang / dus la bab par thob par byed pa dang / rigs pa'i tshul bzhin du myi 'khrul pa dang / dus gsum shes par bya ba rab tu rtogs pa dang / lus kyi dbang zil gyis mi non
29b8(phal chen): pa dang / tshig gi dbang dmyigs par dka' ba dang / ye shes kyi dbang tshigs bzhin du khong du chud par byed pa ste/ kye rgyal ba'i sras chos dkar po rnam pa bcu po de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
30a1(phal chen): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi chos kyi 'khor lo sems can gzhan gyi sems kyi rgyud la thogs pa myed pa dang / mngon pa myed par 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras sangs rgyas kyi phrin
30a2(phal chen): las rdzogs par mdzad zin pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni don bcu'i dbang gzigs nas yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba chen po ston te/ bcu gang zhe na 'di ltar yang dag pa'i
30a3(phal chen): lta ba bzhin du 'du byed mi rtag pa yongs su ston pa dang / 'dus byas thams cad yid brtan du mi rung bar bstan pa dang / mya ngan las 'da' ba'i phyogs bde bar 'gro bas 'jigs pa dang bag tsha ba thams cad dang bral ba yang
30a4(phal chen): dag par bstan pa dang / gzugs kyi lus la zhen pa'i lha dang myi rnams la gzugs kyi lus myi rtag pa nyid du yang dag par bstan pa dang / chos kyi sku la yang dag par sbyar ba dang / rnam par 'gyur ba'i mthu phyir
30a5(phal chen): myi zlog par yongs su bstan pa dang / 'du byed thams cad 'dod dgur myi rung zhing dbang bsgyur du myed pa yongs su bstan pa dang / sa gsum gyi 'khor ba thams cad sgyu ma'i rnam pa lta bur yongs su bstan pa dang /
30a6(phal chen): mya ngan las 'das pa ni snying po dam pa ste/ myi 'jigs pa'i chos nyid du yang dag par bstan pa dang / kun 'byung zhing 'jig pas 'bral bar 'gyur ba yongasu bstan pa dang / kye rgyal ba'i sras sangs rgyas
30a7(phal chen): bcom ldan 'das kyi chos nyid kyis kyang de bzhin te/ sangs rgyas kyi phrin las thams cad rdzogs par mdzad de/ dgongs pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs shing chos kyi 'khor lo shin tu bskor te/ 'dul ba thams cad
30a8(phal chen): shin tu dul nas byang chub sems dpa' thams cad shin tu lung bstan par 'gyur te/ mnyam pa med pa'i go 'phang yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba chen por yongs su mya ngan las 'da'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras
30b1(phal chen): bcu po de dag yang dag par gzigs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mnyam pa myed pa'i go 'phang yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa chen po yongs su ston to/ /kye
30b2(phal chen): rgyal ba'i sras 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yongs su sbyongs ba zhes bya ba'i chos kyi sgo ste/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mang pos gsungs pa'o/ /don tshad myed pa khong du chud par 'gyur
30b3(phal chen): ba'o/ /mkhas pa'i skye bo dga' bar byed pa'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi spyod pa dang / smon lam chen po rgyun myi 'chad par byed pa'o/ /sems can gang gi 'di thos par gyur te/ thos nas
30b4(phal chen): kyang mos par byed pa dang / mos par gyur nas kyang nan tan gyis yang dag par bsgrub pa de dag thams cad myur du bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su mngon par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/ /
30b5(phal chen): kye rgyal ba'i sras de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub ni byang chub sems dpa' nan tan lhur byed pa rnams kyis 'grub pa'o/ /nan tan dang myi ldan pa rnams kyis ma yin no/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras de lta bas
30b6(phal chen): n a byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nan tan la gnas pas 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos kyi sgo'i le'u byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa dang yon tan gyi 'byung gnas don rnam par gdon mi za ba'i me tog chos
30b7(phal chen): gyi sgo thams cad la yang dag par gzhol ba/ ye shes kyi sgo la 'jug pa 'jig rten gyi lam thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi lam dang bral ba/ 'gro ba thams
30b8(phal chen): cad dang mthun mong ma yin pa/ chos thams cad kyi sgo snang bar byed pa 'gro ba thams cad kyi 'jig rten dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam par 'phel bar byed pa 'di rim gror byas te/ mnyan par
31a1(phal chen): bya'o/ /blang bar bya'o/ /yongs su gzung bar bya'o/ /yongs su gzung nas kyang nges par rtogs pa'i sgo yongs su sbyang ba dang / smon lam mngon par bsgrub pa la brtson par bya'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i
31a2(phal chen): sras de ltar brtson pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams la ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub dkon pa ma yin no/ /'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos kyi sgo'i le'u chos thams cad kyi sgor yang dag par
31a3(phal chen): g zhol ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bstan pa'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i chos nyid thob pas phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams tshad myed grangs myed pa rnams rab tu g.yos par gyur
31a4(phal chen): to/ /'jig rten gyi khams g.yos par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang snang ba chen pos rgyas shing gsal bar gyur to/ /phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyang dgyes par gyur to/ /byang chub sems
31a5(phal chen): dpa' kun tu bzang po la zhal bstan nas gsung brjod pa/ kye rgyal ba'i sras legs so legaso/ /ji ltar khyod kyi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos
31a6(phal chen): kyi sgo'i le'u byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa dang / yon tan gyi 'byung gnas don rnam par gdon myi za ba'i me tog nos kyi sgo thams cad la yang dag par gzhol ba ye shes kyi sgo la 'jug pa'i 'jig rten gyi lam
31a7(phal chen): thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa dang / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi lam dang bral ba 'gro ba thams cad dang thun mong ma yin pa chos thams cad kyi sgo snang bar byed pa/ 'gro ba thams cad kyi
31a8(phal chen): 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam par 'phel bar byed pa 'di bstan pa ni rgyal ba'i bu khyod chos 'di dag la legs par bslab pas shin tu byang ba ste/ rgyal ba'i bu khyod kyis chos kyi byin
31b1(phal chen): gyis rlabs dang mthus/ mos pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di legs par bshad de nged kyis kyang mngon par bsngagaso/ /de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis kyang mngon par bsngags so/ /kye rgyal
31b2(phal chen): ba'i bu khyod kyi chos kyi rnam grangs 'di da ltar dang ma 'ongs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis ma thos pa'i chos thos par bya ba'i phyir nged kyis byin gyis rlab pa mdzad do/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems
31b3(phal chen): dpa' chen po kun tu bzang pos sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis rlabs kyis phyogs bcur bltas te/ 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad la bltas nas/ chos kyi dbyings thams cad la bltas te/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa
31b4(phal chen): 'di dag smras so/ /gang rnams de dag bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig stong du brtul zhugs dka' spyad pa/ /gang rnams de dag sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig stong las byung ba'i chos kyi sras/ /gang rnams de dag sems
31b5(phal chen): can bye ba khrag khrig stong rnams byang chub rab 'god pa/ /dpe zla myed pa de dge rnams kyi spyod ngas bshad kyis rtse gcig mnyan par byos/ /gang dag sangs rgyas khrag khrig mtha' yas mchod kyang bdag ni sangs rgyas
31b6(phal chen): myi gnas pa/ /gang dag nyon mongs bcings pa'i 'gro ba thar byed sems can 'du shes mi gnas dang / /gang rnams de dag sangs rgyas yon tan rtag tu tshol yang yon tan myi gnas pa/ /de dag 'jig rten rab tu
31b7(phal chen): dga' bar byed pa'i spyod mchog mdzes pa brjod par byed/ /gang rnams de dag dug gsum las dang nyon mongs bdud kyi dbang song snang / /gang rnams de dag 'phags pa'i yon tan ldan zhing khyu mchog spyod pa ston
31b8(phal chen): pa po/ /gang rnams de dag gti mug nyon mongs nyes bral bsam pa zhi zhing rab zhi ba/ /'gro ba rnams la spyod pa'i rim pa ston pa de dag yon tan brjod par bya/ /gang rnams de dag bdud g.yo 'gro ba kun las
32a1(phal chen): rgal te thams cad dbang byed pa/ /'gro ba thams cad bdag la sprul pa sna tshogs tha dad mtha' yas rab tu ston/ /sems bskyed gyur ma thag tu gnas dang 'jig pa'i bya ba thams cad ston byed
32a2(phal chen): pa/ /de dag yon tan sna tshogs mdzes pa sems can dga' bar byed pa brjod par bya/ /srid pa'i rgyud na sems can sdug bsngal nyen cing skye dang rga bas gzir ba dang / /'chi dang mya ngan dag gis gtses shing gnod
32a3(phal chen): byas nyon mongs kun tu gzir mthong nas/ /de dag thar bar bya phyir snying rje rgya cher bskyed nas ye shes mchog dgod pa/ /de dag yon tan shin tu dge ba phyogs tsam bshad kyis rtse gcig mnyan par byos/ /
32a4(phal chen): sbyin dang tshul khrims bzod pa brtson 'grus dga' bar bsam gtan la'ang rnam par rtsen/ /shes rab thabs kyi pha rol phyin cing byams dang snying rje lhag pa'i bsam pa dang / /dga' ba'i chos la brtson zhing
32a5(phal chen): btang snyoms dga' bas bskal pa brgyar yang spyod spyad pa/ /de dag spyod ldan yon tan ldan pa rnams kyi yon tan bstan gyis de dag nyon/ /gang rnams de dag byang chub gnyer phyir bye ba khrag khrig stong gis
32a6(phal chen): lus skems pa/ /gang rnams byang chub zhi ba tshol phyir srog la lta ba myed par gyur pa dang / /gang rnams de dag sems can phan phyir rtag brtson bdag gi bde ba myi tshol ba/ /byams dang snying rje'i sems ldan
32a7(phal chen): thub pa de dag kun gyi spyod mchog brjod par bya/ /rgya mtsho'i chu thigs bgrangs bar ris thams cad zad par bya bar rung srid kyi/ /de dag yon tan bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig du ma stong du brjod byas kyang / /dpe tsam bya bar
32a8(phal chen): mi nus legs par brjod cing bstan par myi nus 'on kyang go/ /sems can phan pa'i don du sangs rgyas yul rnams bstan par bya ba mnyan par byos/ /gang dag 'gro ba rnams kyi don phyir dag pa kun 'dzin dkar po
32b1(phal chen): 'phel byed kyang / /mtho bar myi sems dma' bar sems myed myi dman chos tshol ngoms par yangs par gyur/ /'gro ba kun nas don gnyer chu klung ye shes mtsho chen shes rab shing sdong ste/ /ston pa'i mkhas pa
32b2(phal chen): de dag rnams ni sa ltar 'gro ba thams cad 'tsho ba yin/ /byams pas rlan zhing snying rje rtsa ba dag pa stong po brtan pa sdom pa ste/ /ze ba ye shes dri ni tshul khrims bzang po lo ma me tog yon tan can/ /sangs rgyas
32b3(phal chen): 'od kyis rab tu rgyas byas blo gros ldan pa sems can dga' byed pa/ /de dang de dag pad+mo lta bur 'dus byas ma gos 'gro ba rnams la snang / /sa bon mos pa sa gzhi bsam pa byams dang snying rje dag gi rtsa ba ste/ /
32b4(phal chen): sdong po shes rab thabs ni yal ga lcug ma dag ni pha rol phyin rab lnga/ /bsam gtan shes rab mngon shes me tog rgyas pa kun mkhyen ye shes 'bras bu ste/ /chos kyi shing mchog rdzu 'phrul bya ba 'khod de des
32b5(phal chen): ni 'jig rten gsum po khebs/ /rim kyis dkar yangs yongs su spel ba lus yin dben pa rnams ni rkang pa ste/ /dran pa mgrin pa spyod mchog shes rab mgo yin ral pa rnam par grol ba dge/ stong
32b6(phal chen): pa don dam sul dang phug yin byams dang snying rje dag ni myig gnyis ste/ /de dag seng ge lta bur bdag myed sgra 'byin bdud sde rab tu skrag par byed/ /'gro ba ma lus rnams ni 'khor ba'i 'brog dgon nyon mongs
32b7(phal chen): mi zad 'khyams 'gyur te/ /bdud kyi bya ma rta dang rkun por bcas pas zin gyis gti mug mdongs gyur pa/ /lam ni rab ston myi mkhas sems can mthong nas ded dpon mkhas pa de dag ni/ /lam gyi mthar
32b8(phal chen): khrid 'jigs pa myed pa'i grong khyer dam pa mchog la rab tu dgod/ /'gro ba dag ni 'dod chags zhe sdang mun pa nyon mongs sna tshogs nad btab cing / /yun ring nas ni 'dus byas sdug bsngal dag la gzhol zhing
33a1(phal chen): sdug bsngal rab 'bar ba/ /sems can mthong nas snying rje bskyed de nyon mongs pa yi nad pa kun gso zhing / /nad rnams zhi bar byed pa stong phrag brgyad bcu rtsa bzhi dam pa dag kyang ston/ /
33a2(phal chen): rgyal po lta bu de dang de dag 'khor rnams dga' byed 'gro la chos kyang ston/ /sdig pa spongs la dge la snyen cing sangs rgyas yon tan rnams kyang tshol cig ces/ /rkang gnyis dbang po'i chos kyi yul la kun mkhyen ye shes
33a3(phal chen): dbang po dbang bskur ba/ /rgya chen byang chub yan lag rin chen 'byung gnas de dag 'gro ba'i 'phags pa'i nor/ /tshul khrims lte ba ting 'dzin mu khyud brgyan pa'i ye shes 'od dang shes rab mtshon/ /ye shes rna
33a4(phal chen): ba'i gzhu can nyon mongs 'joms zhing bdud kyi sde rnams dkrug byed pa/ /chos kyi sgron ma che 'byin mchog rnams de dang de dag sangs rgyas bskor ba yin/ /'khor lo mchog rnams bskor zhing pha rol rgol ba dag dang mu
33a5(phal chen): stegs thams cad 'joms/ /ye shes chu ni zab cing myi zad shin tu rgya chen chos kyi ro dang ldan/ /byang chub yan lag de bzhin bsam gtan rin chen gang ba 'gro kun shes par dka'/ /thams cad mkhyen
33a6(phal chen): pa'i gnas kyi mtha' rlabs mtha' yas yul rnams dag cing lhag bsam dge/ de dang de dag ye shes rgya mtsho mtshungs myed bstan pa zad par myi 'gyur ro/ /'jig rten rab 'phags rtag tu yul gyis myi
33a7(phal chen): gos 'gro ba rnams kyi gnas gyur pa/ /bsam gtan mngon shes rab 'phel ye shes rtse mo lhag pa'i bsam pa myi sgul ba/ /gang dag de dang nyer phrad shes rab ye shes mchog gis rab tu 'dra bar 'gyur/ /
33a8(phal chen): de dang de dag yon tan ri rab shes rab rab brtan 'gro ba kun gyi bltas/ /lhag pa'i bsam pa mchog gi rdo rje mtshungs shing 'dra ste brtul zhugs thams cad brtan/ /sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun thams cad
33b1(phal chen): mkhyen pa'i spyod yas bsam pa mi phyed de/ /bdud dang sems can nyon mongs 'jig rten rlung dag gis ni myi skyod rab brtan pa/ /de dang de dag 'jig rten dam pa nyon mongs 'bar ba dag las bzlog par byed/ /
33b2(phal chen): byams pa'i sprin rnams kun 'dus snying rje stug po rig pa'i glog chen rgyu ldog pa/ /thub pa rnams ni rdzu 'phrul gnas bzhi dbyangs kyi 'brug sgra 'byin cing rab tu sgrog /so so yang dag rig dang tshul khrims
33b3(phal chen): yan lag brgyad ldan chu'i char 'bebs pa/ /de dang de dag sprin chen nyon mongs zhi byed sems can don phyir mngon par 'phags/ /shes rab dga' dang khrel ba dag ni 'obs te chos kyi rgyal mtshan bsgreng / /
33b4(phal chen): ye shes shing thags yin te thar pa'i sgo phye dran pa de dag sgo ba yin/ /bden pa rnams ni lam chen bzhi ste shin tu dge ba'i rdzu 'phrul rab brgyan pa/ /srid pa gsum na bdud sde dag gis myi thul grong khyer chos nyid
33b5(phal chen): dag tu ston/ /thams cad mkhyen gyi sems mchog shing la rab 'dug rdzu 'phrul rkang pa'i brtan/ /gshog pa thabs kyi stobs te pha rol non mthu byams dang snying rje myig gnyis yin/ /ston pa de dag 'gro
33b6(phal chen): kun thub med mkha' lding dbang po'i drag shul 'dra/ /srid pa'i mtsho nas 'don cing lha mi rnams kyang mya ngan 'da' ba'i mchog la 'god/ /tshul khrims dkyil 'khor rdzu 'phrul rkang pa'i shug ldan ye shes 'od zer phreng ba
33b7(phal chen): mdzes/ /'od snang kun 'char nyon mongs 'joms zhing srid pa'i rgya mtsho rab tu skem par byed/ /stobs dang dbang po dge ba'i sman 'phel sems can bde mo yongs su rgyas byed pa/ /de dang de dag snang byed chos kyi nyi
33b8(phal chen): ma'i khyu mchog 'gro ba kun tu 'byung / /chos dbyings rnam par dag pa dkyil 'khor 'gro ba kun gyis blta na mdzes pa ste/ /nyan thos rang rgyal rnams kyi tshogs mang skar ma 'dra ba dag ni zil gyis mnan/ /
34a1(phal chen): sems kyi rgyud rnams mthong nas srid pa gsum du 'phel dang 'grib pa rnam par ston/ /de dang de dag ye shes zla ba 'gro la 'char zhing mkhas pa nam mkha'i mtha'/ /chos kyi dbang po 'gro ba kun
34a2(phal chen): la dbang byed gzugs dang yon tan dag gis brgyan/ /ye shes rdo rje mnga' ba thabs ni myig ste chos la dbang chen bsgyur gnas pa/ /lus dang mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po sna tshogs kun gyi blta ba'i dbang po ste/ /
34a3(phal chen): chos kyi 'gro ba kun las rgyal ba de dang de dag chos kyi dbang po yin/ /srid pa gsum na 'dod pa'i 'dam dang nyon mongs las las rab 'das kun dbang po/ /byams pa snang dang thugs rje bsam gtan dga'
34a4(phal chen): dang btang snyoms rnams la mos/ /srid pa gsum po kun tu tha dad lus ston chos kyi sgras kyang go byed pa/ /de dang de dag tshangs pa lta bur rnam dag mos shing lta ba'i rnam pa sel/ /'khor las rab tu
34a5(phal chen): 'das shing rnam dag yul dang ldan pa bdag po chos kyi dbang / /phyir ldog myi 'gyur blo gros che 'chang gang rnams theg pa dma' dang tha dad la/ /chos kyi dbang por dbang bskur 'jig rten dam pa ye shes
34a6(phal chen): phyir ldog myi 'gyur ba/ /thams cad mkhyen pa'i yon tan dbang phyug grags chen de dang de dag 'jig rten dbang / /nam mkha'i mkha' dbyings lta bur dngos dang rnam bral dmyigs pa thams cad rnam
34a7(phal chen): bstsal ba/ /'gro ba kun tu bya ba nyams len khyu mchog ci la'ang gnas pa myed pa ste/ /'gro ba kun tu spyod pa dkar zhugs mkhas pa de dag rab tu myi gnas pa/ /de dang de dag ye shes dge zhing dag pas shes
34a8(phal chen): rab nam mkha'i dbyings dang 'dra/ /de dang de dag shin tu rgya chen thabs ldan sa ltar 'gro ba kun gyis gsol/ /chu 'dra de dang de dag byams dang snying rjes nyon mongs rnams ni rab tu sel/ /de dang de dag ye shes
34b1(phal chen): myes ni nyon mongs sreg cing bag chags bcas pa bstsal/ /ston pa de dag myi gnas rlung dang 'dra bar srid pa gsum na rab tu rgyu/ /de dang de dag rin chen 'dra ste shin tu dkon zhing 'gro ba dbul yang sel/ /de dang
34b2(phal chen): de dag rdo rje lta bur srid pa gsum na lta ba kun tu 'joms/ /de dang de dag yon tan kun gyi 'phral ba sna tshogs 'jig rten gsum mdzes byed/ /ston pa de dag nor bu rin chen mtshungs 'dra spyod pa kun gyi gtsug tu
34b3(phal chen): phyin/ /de dang de dag me tog lta bur yon tan rab rgyas byang chub yan lag rtse/ /phreng ba lta bur de dang de dag smon lam bcings shing 'jig rten mgon la gnas/ /de dang de dag tshul khrims ma nyams skyon
34b4(phal chen): med rnam dag dri ni dri rab zhim/ /de dang de dag 'jig rten gsum na chos dang ye shes kyi ni bag chags dag /gdugs 'dra de dang de dag stobs kyi bla res nyon mongs rdul las skyob par byed/ /ye shes rgyal
34b5(phal chen): mtshan bsgreng ba'i thugs mnga' de dang de dag nga rgyal rgyal mtshan snyol/ /de dang de dag spyod pa'i ba dan sna tshogs yid 'ong ye shes kun tu 'phags/ /gos 'dra de dang de dag rdzu 'phrul yon tan 'gro ba kun
34b6(phal chen): la khebs par byed/ /theg pa 'dra ba khyu mchog mtha' yas de dang de dag 'jig rten gsum las 'byin/ /de dang de dag rab dul glang po lta bur yid kyis rtag tu dul la gnas/ /de dang de dag rdzu 'phrul rtas ni
34b7(phal chen): khal chen khyer zhing 'jig rten gsum las 'da'/ /klu yi dbang po lta bu de dang de dag sems kyi yul la chos char 'bebs/ /de dag 'gro ba kun la me tog u dum ba ra mtshungs 'dra shin tu dkon/ /dpa'o
34b8(phal chen): lta bu de dang de dag nyon mongs 'joms zhing bdud kyi sde rnams 'khrug / myi ldog 'khor lo lta bu de dang de dag 'dren pa rnams kyis rab tu btsud/ /de dang de dag sgron ma lta bur mun pa sel cing sems can lam yang
35a1(phal chen): ston/ /de dang de dag chu klung lta bur yon tan ded cing lam rgyun rjes su 'gro/ /de dang de dag zam pa lta bur ngal ba myed par rtag tu 'gro ba sgrol/ /gru dang gru chen lta bur smon lam rtag btab ye
35a2(phal chen): shes gangs chen mtsho thob byed/ /de dang de dag mnyan pa lta bur 'gro ba ye shes thang chen mchog la 'god/ /de dag bskyed mos tshal gyi dga' la rtse zhing 'gro la yang dag spyod pa ston/ /de dag chos kyi rnam thar mngon
35a3(phal chen): shes me tog ye shes gzhal myed khang dag pa/ /mkhas pa de dang de dag sman ltar nad zhi byed cing nyon mongs rab tu sel/ /sman gyis rgyas pa'i gangs ri lta bur de dang de dag ye shes 'byung gnas so/ /de dag sangs rgyas lta
35a4(phal chen): bur ye shes kyis ni 'gro ba gnyid log mun pa sel/ /yang dag sangs rgyas lta bur gzhan myin yid kyis 'gro ba yang dag rtog par byed/ /de dang de dag rgyal ba ci 'dra de ltar 'ongs te mkhas pa de nyid gnas/ /de dang de dag
35a5(phal chen): thams cad mkhyen pa lta bur ye shes 'byung gnas kun nas sgor yang zhugs/ /zhi ba skyed pa de dang de dag ston pas rab bsngags 'gro ba kun la ston/ /de dang de dag rang gi ye shes yul dang thams cad mkhyen pa'i spyod yul
35a6(phal chen): shes/ /de dang de dag tshad myed dpung dang 'dra bar 'gro ba kun na thub pa myed/ /de dag ye shes myi 'jigs blo gros 'chang ba thams cad mkhyen pa'i chos kyang shes/ /gang na gang dag 'gro ba kun gyi gzugs dang myi rnams
35a7(phal chen): ji snyed snang yod pa/ /kun tu gzugs snyoms gzugs kyi rjes su song zhing mying dbyangs rjesu song ba yin/ /gzugs rnams kun las 'das shing mying dang rnam par bral yang bya ba thams cad ston/ /de dag mthu ni 'gro ba
35a8(phal chen): rnams kyis rnam pa kun tu brjod par myi nus so/ /gang dag 'di 'dra'i yon tan thob cing dngos bral dngos po myed pa'i chos gnas shing / /yod dang med pa'i mdud pa thams cad bral ba mkhas pa ye shes mngon sum can/ /
35b1(phal chen): thams cad shes kyang ye shes rten pa ma yin ye shes de la gnas pa min/ /de dag spyod la 'jug pa yid 'ong 'jig rten dga' bar byed pa bshad par bya/ /chos kyi tshul ni sgyu ma'i rang bzhin dngos po dben pa lta bur rab rtogs
35b2(phal chen): nas/ /mkhas pa sangs rgyas byin gyis rlabs kyis smon lam thabs dang snying rje dag kyang byed/ /sprul pa'i ye shes sgo dang ldan pas khyu mchog bya ba sna tshogs rab bsten pa'i/ /byang chub sems dpa' ma nor yid can
35b3(phal chen): rtse gcig mnyam pa myed pa legs par grags/ /lus cig la ni mtha' yas lus dang rgya chen lus rnams tha dad rab tu ston/ /sems myed yid myed sems kyi yul myed 'on kyang 'gro ba kun tu de dag ston/ /khyu mchog
35b4(phal chen): brjod pa'i pha rol phyin pa de dag dbyangs gcig rnam par brjod byed kyang / /'gro ba dag gi sgra skad ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad rab tu brjod/ /nyon mongs rgyud byung lus dang bral yang sems can rnam kyi lus la dbang bsgyur te/ /
35b5(phal chen): brjod du myed pa'i tshul gyis zhi ba rtogs shing sgra rnams thams cad rab tu ston/ /de dag sems kyi rang bzhin zhi zhing 'od gsal nam mkha' mtshungs par yang dag shes/ /'gro ba kun la bya ba rnam pa sna tshogs sgo nas 'jig
35b6(phal chen): rten sna tshogs ston/ /de dag lus rnams gang la'ang gnas pa myed de lus kyang de dang de dag ston pa byed/ /'gro ba thams cad kyi ni skye ba dag dang rgyu mthun gnas pa ji snyed pas/ /thams cad kun tu skye ba'i lus dang
35b7(phal chen): ldan yang skye ba dag la gnas pa myed/ /rang gi lus la mkha' 'dra dngos bral sems can sems la sna tshogs rnam pa ste/ /mkhas pa kun la dbang bsgyur de dag lus ni mtha' yas kun tu ston byed cing / /me tog dri dang
35b8(phal chen): byug pa phye ma sil snyan gdugs dang ba dan dang / rgyal mtshan rnams dang thams cad mkhyen la mchod pas rkang gnyis gtso bo 'jig rten mchog la mchod byed cing / /mkhas pa bsam pa thag pas lus
36a1(phal chen): kyi 'du byed mchod pa dam pa kun tu ston/ /mkhas pa de dag rgyal ba'i zhabs kyi drung 'khod rgyal ba thams cad kyi/ /'khor rnams kun na snang zhing mtshungs med de dag zhu ba kun kyang zhu ba byed/ /chos kyi
36a2(phal chen): dam pa thos nas ting 'dzin re re mtha' yas sgo ldan thob gyur cing / /blo gros ldan pa de snyed rnam par ldan pa ston pa byed kyang zad pa myed/ /'gro ba sgyu ma lta bur rtogs nas shes rab ye shes thabs kyi pha rol
36a3(phal chen): phyin/ /sgyu ma lta bu'i chos dang gzugs spobs mtha' yas dang ba 'gro ba kun la ston/ /sna tshogs gzugs dang sgra rnams mtha' yas shin tu rgya che sems kyang rab tu ston/ /'gro ba thams cad la ni 'du
36a4(phal chen): shes dra ba 'jug pa ston kyang gnas pa myed/ /'gro don rjes 'gro de dag la lar thog ma'i sems su 'gro la ston/ /la lar 'gro ba kun la byang chub spyod pa mtha' yas rgya chen dag kyang ston/ /la lar sbyin dang
36a5(phal chen): tshul khrims bzod pa brtson 'grus brtan dang shes rab rnams/ /la lar tshangs pa'i lam sdud kha cig tu ni spyod pa mchog kyang rab tu ston/ /mkhas pa rtog myed de dag la lar spyod pa rdzogs shing bzod pa thob pa
36a6(phal chen): ston/ /la lar skye ba gcig gis thogs par nges shing la las rgyal bas dbang bskur ba/ /la lar nyan thos gzugs su gyur cing la la dag du rang rgyal gzugs su 'gyur/ /bye ba khrag khrig mang po'i zhing du mya ngan
36a7(phal chen): 'da' yang spyod las ldog pa myed/ /de dag la lar lha dbang brgya byin lha dang bcas pa la lar tshangs par 'gyur/ /de dag la lar lha'i bu mo brgyas bskor la lar gcig pu spyod par ston/ /la lar dge slong
36a8(phal chen): rab tu zhi zhing yid zhi la lar rgyal po dbang phyug 'gyur/ /la lar chos kyi dra bar 'jug pa'i ye shes khyu mchog gzugs kyang rab tu ston/ /la lar bud myed sgyu rtsal pha rol rab phyin la la dka' thub can du gyur/ /
36b1(phal chen): la lar 'dod pa'i longs spyod rgya chen ston cing la lar bsam gtan thub pa myed/ /la lar mya ngan 'da' dang tshe'i sa dang la lar rgan dang byis par ston/ /de dag spyod pa bsams na skye bo mos par 'gyur te yid
36b2(phal chen): gnyis rnyed par 'gyur/ /la lar lha dang 'grogs shing la lar shi 'pho la lar mngal 'gro gnas par ston/ /la lar mngal zhugs la lar rnam par sangs rgyas la lar 'khor lo rab tu bskor/ /la lar skye ba
36b3(phal chen): la lar mya ngan 'das pa la lar bzo yang rab tu slob/ /la lar bud myed tshogs kyi dbus gnas la lar ting 'dzin la lar mngon par 'byung / /la lar khyu mchog byang chub dam par sangs rgyas byang chub shing dbang drung
36b4(phal chen): na bzhugs/ /la lar 'khor lo rab tu bskor zhing la lar sna tshogs chos rnams yongs su tshol/ /la lar sangs rgyas gyur cing zhing rnams bye ba brgyar khyab 'gro bar ston byed kyang / /byang chub don du spyod pa de
36b5(phal chen): dag tshogs rnams las kyang phyir ldog ma yin no/ /bskal pa'i grangs la 'jug pa'i pha rol phyin pas bskal pa bye ba phrag brgya dag /khyu mchog sems gcig nang ston sems gcig bskal pa brgyar yang de
36b6(phal chen): bzhin ston pa byed/ /'gro ba thams cad la'ang rtog dang myi rtog pa yi yul rnams thams cad ston/ /stsogs pa myed cing phyogs la gnas med spyod pa de dag kun kyang rab tu ston/ /gang phyir rgyal ba nye rgyal
36b7(phal chen): de dag nyi tse'i phyogs myed kun na bzhugs pas na/ /'gro ba kun gyi rgyal ba ji snyed pa dag thams cad rdul cig steng du mthong / /sangs rgyas zhing rnams bsgrub dang sems can yul dang chos kyi rgyu tshul rnams kyang
36b8(phal chen): mthong / /de ltar brtson pas bskal pa khrag khrig brtson byed 'on kyang cha shas zad mi 'gyur/ /de ltar 'gro ba kun gyi sems can tshul rnams mtha' yas rgya che rab tu shes/ /sems can gcig la mtha'
37a1(phal chen): yas lus dang rgyu dang bye ba khrag khrig yod pa rnams/ /de dag 'gro ba gcig dang ma lus thams cad dag la rnam pa kun tu ston pa byed/ /bslab pa 'di yi phyogs la pha rol phyin te ma bslabs rnams ni
37a2(phal chen): ston pa byed/ /dbang po rnon po 'bring dang gang dag dbang po rtul ba'ang rab shes nas/ /'gro bar skal ba yod dang skal ba med pa'i dbang po'i 'khor lo skor bar byed/ /dbang po re re la yang dbang po thams cad rnam par
37a3(phal chen): phan tshun gnas pa dang / /dbang po'i dngos po phra ba'i tshul dang gang dag dbang po brtan pa 'ang rab tu shes/ /de ltar khams dang mos dang bsam pa spyod dang nyon mongs bag chags rnams kyang shes/ /sngon gyi mtha'
37a4(phal chen): dang phyi ma'i mtha' yi sems spyod da ltar byung ba'ang de bzhin te/ /sems can kun gyi spyod pa'i pha rol phyin kyang 'ong dang 'gro ba yod ma yin/ /ma nor spyod pa shes nas 'gro la chos kyi dam pa ston pa byed/ /
37a5(phal chen): de ltar sems kyi sems spyod sna tshogs kun nas nyon mongs med pa dag /sems gcig la ni khong du chud nas byang chub mchog tu kun mkhyen rnam sangs rgyas/ /sems kyi skad cig gcig gis 'gro ba rnams phye rang
37a6(phal chen): gi shes pas rtogs gyur nas/ /sems kyi tshul shes sems med rab tu gzhol bas ye shes mchog la kun kyang 'god/ /rdzu 'phrul mchog thob ye shes khyu mchog mngon par shes pa kun gyis rab tu 'phags/ /
37a7(phal chen): sems bskyed gcig gis khrag khrig mtha' yas zhing dang phyogs rnams thams cad du yang 'gro/ /de ltar ye shes dbang bsgyur 'gro zhing bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig zad byed kyang / /sgra rgyud shin tu phra ba gcig la
37a8(phal chen): zhugs par gnas las gar yang 'pho ba med/ /'tsho ba'i don du sgyu mkhan gzugs rnams sna tshogs 'gro ba kun la bstan byed kyang / /sgyu ma kun brtsal gzugasu myi dmyigs gzugs yod ma yin par
37b1(phal chen): yang dmyigs pa myed/ /de ltar mkhas pa ye shes thabs dang shes rab rgya chen sgyu mar zhugs pa rnams/ /sprul pa phun sum tshogs pas 'jig rten phal chen khyab par byas shes rab tu ston/ /nyi ma zla ba rgyu
37b2(phal chen): zhing mdzes la shin tu 'phags pa rnams/ /ma rnyogs chu rnams ji snyed dag tu snang yang de ni chu dang 'dres ma yin/ /de ltar chos nyid dag pa'i dkyil 'khor mchog la shes pas shin tu 'phags pa rnams/ /'gro ba
37b3(phal chen): dag pa'i sems kyi yul la snang yang 'gro ba dag dang mdzes ma yin/ /la la gnyid log rmyi lam dag na bya ba rnam pa sna tshogs tha dad byed/ /lo ni bye ba khrag khrig mang po zad par rmis kyang mtshan mo de ma zad/ /de ltar
37b4(phal chen): chos nyid rang bzhin mtshungs par rjes rtogs bya ba sna tshogs kun ston cing / /skad cig gcig la bskal pa bye ba zad byed de dag ye shes zad myi 'gyur/ /ri yi dbang po'i ri sul gnas pa 'jig rten dag dang mnyam du
37b5(phal chen): thos pa'i sgra/ /kun las sgra brnyan de dang 'dra bar brjod kyang rtog cing g.yo ba med/ /de bzhin chos kyi rang bzhin shes pa'i khyu mchog byang chub sems dpa' mkhas pa dag /rtog pa myed par sems can sgra
37b6(phal chen): rnams ji snyed par ni chos dang spyod pa ston/ /dpyid zla dag gi smyig rgyu g.yos la ji ltar sems can chur ni 'du shes nas/ /de nas chu rnyed myi 'gyur btung du myed cing je bas je skom rnam par 'phel/ /de ltar
37b7(phal chen): mkhas pa thar la zhugs pa sems can dag gi nyon mongs g.yo ba rnams/ /shes pas rtogs nas sems can 'du shes bya myed phyir zhing bya ba rnam par 'phel/ /gzugs ni dbu ba lta bur khyu mchog ston te tshor ba
37b8(phal chen): chu'i chu bur 'dra/ /'du shes thams cad smyig rgyu lta bur rag las 'du shes chu skyes shing dang 'dra/ /sems ni sgyu 'dra bsgrub bya bskyed byed de bzhin bya ba sna tshogs rab tu ston/ /phung po dgod pa bstan kyang dbang bsgyur
38a1(phal chen): dag ni de la gnas pa myed/ /skye mched stong ba'i rang bzhin dbang myed 'khrul 'khor bya ba kun tu 'byin byed dang / /khams ni chos kyi dbyings mtshungs dngos po dag dang bral bar 'gro ba rnams la ston/ /
38a2(phal chen): dam pa'i don tshul zhi ba las ni bden pa sna tshogs rnams kyang rab tu ston/ /de ltar de dag chos tshul rnam par 'god pa ston pa byed kyang gnas pa med/ /'ong ba med cing phyogs su 'gro ba myed la rgyud du gnas myed pa'i/ /
38a3(phal chen): nyon mongs rgyu las byung ba'i las dang las la sdug bsngal de ltar lam gsum 'du/ /rkyen la rag las 'byung ba rnams dang yod dang myed las rab tu 'das pa yi/ /yang dag don dam dbu ma'i lam ni dngos po med la
38a4(phal chen): gnas pa rab tu ston/ /skad cig gcig la dus gsum khong du chud kyang skad cig sna tshogs rnams kyang bstan/ /'dod dang gzugs myed khams kyi yul dang bya ba sna tshogs ston pa byed/ /sdom pa gsum gyi spyod
38a5(phal chen): dang rab tu ldan zhing thar pa gsum yang rab tu ston/ /thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gcig la theg pa gsum du rnam par dgod pa de bzhin ston/ /gnas dang gnas ma yin pa rab tu dbye ba'i chos dang dbang po pha rol phyin/ /
38a6(phal chen): khams dang mos pa dag dang nyon mongs rnam 'byed kun tu 'gro ba thob gyur pa/ /myig gi yul gyur sngon gyi gnas pa dran zhing nyon mongs zhi bar mkhas pa dag /sangs rgyas stobs bcu dag gis ye shes shin tu
38a7(phal chen): 'das kyang stobs la dmyigs pa med/ /sangs rgyas thams cad rjes su dpog stong 'gro ba kun tu mngon sum chos bzhed de/ /nyon mongs zag pa lhan cig skyes pa myi mnga' byang ba'ang brnyes par 'gyur ba med/ /
38a8(phal chen): 'byung ba thugasu chud pa'i ye shes rgya chen des ni 'gro ba 'don pa mdzad/ /'di yi gnas la rgyal sras 'jigs pa myed cing 'on kyang zhi bar spyod pa myed/ /'khrul pa myi mnga' lam las g.yo ba'ang mi mnga' dgongs
38b1(phal chen): pa nyams pa'ang mi mnga' ste/ /mos dang brtson 'grus ting 'dzin shes rab rnam par 'byed pa ye shes gang du nyams pa med/ /thams cad mkhyen mdzad sdom pa gsum mdzad dus gsum kun la mngon sum mkhyen
38b2(phal chen): mnga' ba/ /'gro ba kun gyis ma thob byams pa'i chos nyid mi 'phrogs chags pa myed brnyes pa/ /chos sgo gang dag gis ni spyod pa 'di dag rab tu thob pa smra ba'i mchog /de dag yon tan mang po don gyis brgyan pa'i phyogs tsam
38b3(phal chen): bdag gis brjod par bya/ /de dag spyod pa bskal pa khrag khrig dag tu brjod kyang zad par mi nus te/ /'on kyang ci ltar sa yi rdul 'dra ye shes spyod pa phyogs tsam brjod par bya/ /sangs rgyas ye shes rten ldan bsam pa
38b4(phal chen): thob pas ngo mtshar 'du shes gnas pa rnams/ /spyod pa mchog dang ldan zhing byams pa'i rjes song brtson 'grus brtan pas rnam gnon cing / /tshul khrims mi g.yo dbugs phyin de dag 'gro ba thams cad yongasu smin
38b5(phal chen): par byed/ /lung bstan rab tu thob nas rgyal sras rnams kyi spyod pa tshul bzhin thob par byed/ /sangs rgyas yon tan dag la zhugs kyang sems can sems dang zhing la sems pa byed/ /bskal pa'i dus la 'jug pa'i ye
38b6(phal chen): shes ldan zhing mkhas pa skyo ba'i 'du shes med/ /gzungs kyi tshul dang yang dag tha dad stobs rnams thob cing yang dag don gyis brgal/ /bstan pa mtshungs med sems kyis mkhas pa byang chub zhi ba rnam par 'tshang yang rgya/ /
38b7(phal chen): sems kyi spyod pa thams cad bzang po'i yon tan spyod pa'i mchog tu smon pa byed/ /snying rje'i rkyen dang byams pa mchog sten byang chub dam pa spyod par byed dang ldan/ /brtson pas pha rol phyin rtogs rab tu mkhas shing skyo ba'i
38b8(phal chen): pha rol phyin gyur pas/ /khyu mchog mos dang rab tu rtogs pa'i stobs thob byang chub dam pa mngon 'tshang rgya/ /mnyam pa nyid kyi mnyam pa thob cing ye shes tshul gyis chos mchog ston byed pa/ /yon tan thob byed spobs dang ldan pa
39a1(phal chen): de dag chos kyi dbang phyug mchog tu 'gyur/ /dbang la gnas kyang gnas pa med pas mnyam pa myed pa'i sems kyi 'brug sgra sgrog /ye shes mchog dang de bzhin sprul pa bsgrub cing byang chub nye bar 'gro/ /mkhas
39a2(phal chen): pa de dag bskal pa 'byam klas byin rlabs shes pas dbugs phyin rab tu 'thob/ /zab la gnas pas brten par 'gro na gnas shing nem nur bstsal bas mkhas pa rnams/ /ye shes bsam gyis mi khyab chos kyi dgongs
39a3(phal chen): pa mkhas shing rnam phye pha rol phyin/ /snyom par 'jug pa'i ye shes yul la zhugs nas thams cad mkhyen par 'tshang yang rgya/ /ye shes rnam thar kun gyi pha rol phyin cing mngon par shes pas rnam par brtsen/ /rig
39a4(phal chen): pa'i snang ldan rnam grol nyon mongs bral bas 'gro la skyed mos tshal dang 'dra/ /gang la dkar ba'i spyod pa'i gzhal med khang mdzes sna tshogs spyod pa ston pa po/ /'gro ba kun la rgyan rnams du ma rab tu ston kyang sems las
39a5(phal chen): g.yo ba med/ /bsam pa shin tu shes pas brtan pa rab tu mkhas shing pha rol phyin gyur pas/ /mkhas pa dag ni dag cing sbyangs pa'i byang chub phyag rgya snang ba'i ye shes kyi/ /'gro ba dag dang mi mtshungs zhum med khyu mchog lhag
39a6(phal chen): pa'i bsam pa ri bo 'dra/ /ye shes rgya mtsho 'dra dang yon tan myi zad don du spyod pa chen po spyod/ /de dag rin chen 'dra ba'i gnas la rdo rje lta bu'i go cha bgos pas gnas/ /shin tu rgya chen rtsom la rab tu mkhas shing 'gro ba kun
39a7(phal chen): na thob med pa/ /byang chub mchog tu lung bstan skyon med khong du chud pa'i rgya chen sems la gnas/ /sangs rgyas gter mchog mi zad thob nas thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'tshang rgya'o/ /rtag tu kun rdzob shes pas dbang
39a8(phal chen): 'gyur rnam par 'phrul pa rnams la mkhas pas na/ /zhing rnams kun dang chos kyi yul la rnam par 'phrul ba'i ye shes rgyud la gnas/ /gnas dang smon lam spyod yul ye shes rnam par 'phrul pa'ang de
39b1(phal chen): bzhin te/ /'gro ba dag la rnam par rtse ba bye ba khrag khrig du ma mang po ston/ /mngon par shes pa'i rdzu 'phrul stobs kyi rnam par 'phrul zhing nges par rnam par rtse/ /khyu mchog de dag sangs rgyas yul la stobs thob 'gro ba kun
39b2(phal chen): gyi thub pa myed/ /mkhas pa 'jigs pa med dang bag tsha med dang ma 'dres rnams kyis shin tu brgyan/ /sangs rgyas sras dag las rnams thams cad byed cing shin tu mdzes pa'i lus dang ldan/ /de dag lus kyi las kyi dngos
39b3(phal chen): po shin tu rgya che dag kyang dag cing dge/ de 'ang 'byin pa'i tshe na rgyal bas byin gyis rlabs shing las ni mchog kyang byed/ /dam pa de dag sems bskyed gcig la sems rgyas byed pa'i sems kyang rab tu ston/ /rgyal ba'i sras
39b4(phal chen): po thob pas rtag tu dbang po'i ting 'dzin dbang la rab tu gnas/ /bsam pa dag cing g.yo sgyu rnams dang bral te lhag pa'i bsam pa mngon sum gyur/ /mos pa'i 'jug pa rnam pa sna tshogs tha dad 'gro ba dag la rab tu ston/ /
39b5(phal chen): bag chags thams cad spangs nas spyod pa dam pa rab tu 'dzin/ /nan tan bya ba 'grub pa'i ye shes mkhas pas thams cad mkhyen pa 'tshang yang rgya/ /bsam pa rnam par spangs nas de dag skyon med gnas pa zhi ba'i
39b6(phal chen): mchog kyang thob/ /mkhas pa 'di lam shin tu bslabs pa de dag ming ni yon tan sgo nas grags/ /mtha' yas sems kyi yul ldan gnas pa med par lam rnams yang du sgom pa byed/ /ye shes tshul la gnas shing 'gro ba
39b7(phal chen): rnams la lam gyi rgyan rnams shin tu ston/ /spyod pa lag pa lta bu dga' dang ldan pa khrag khrig shin tu phra ba'i rdul byas lag gis brdus khyer zhing / /zhing rnams khrag khrig bye ma snyed du 'dor byed gcig tu gnyis
39b8(phal chen): kyang gzhog par byed/ /zhing rnams de dag rdul du byas te de bzhin gzhan dang rnam par 'jig byed de/ /de 'dra'i rjes su dpag pa zad par gyur kyang 'jug pa de dag mi zad do/ /'jig rten kun gyi nyi ma zla ba skar ma gang dag stong
40a1(phal chen): rnams ji snyed dang / /gang yang nor bu'i 'od dang me yi 'od dang gang na gang rnams lha dbang 'od/ /mang po de dag rab tu 'das pa'i 'od zer khrag khrig spu gcig khung nas 'gyed/ /'jig rten kun gyi ngan song
40a2(phal chen): sdug bsngal zhi bar byed cing chos kyi dam pa ston/ /'gro ba ma lus sgra yi rnam pa sna tshogs skad rnams thams cad ji snyed pa/ /khyu mchog de dag tshig gcig rab tu brjod pas sgra rnams thams cad tshang bar brjod/ /srog chags bye ba
40a3(phal chen): rnams kyis yid du 'ong ba'i sgra thos dga' zhing mgu bar 'gyur/ /rgyal bas bstan pa'i chos kyi rnam pa ji snyed thams cad de las thos par 'gyur/ /gang yang ji snyed 'das pa'i skal pa yod pa de dag ma 'ongs bskal
40a4(phal chen): par ston/ gang yang ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar byung ba ji snyed de dag 'das par ston/ /khyu mchog dag ni zhing rnams 'tshig dang gnas pa rnam pa tha dad ston par byed/ /'gro ba ji snyed thams cad mkhas pa de dag skra rtse gcig
40a5(phal chen): la rab tu dgod/ /'das dang ma byon pa dang phyogs bcu kun na bzhugs pa'i rgyal ba ji snyed pa/ /de dag thams cad rang gi lus las ma nor dbang bsgyur rnam par 'phrul pa ston/ /sprul pa'i byin gyis rlabs la
40a6(phal chen): shes pa'i mkhas pa de dag 'gro ba ji snyed sems/ /de snyed lus rnams rdul dang bral ba ston kyang lus la gnas pa gang yang med/ /lam rgyud drug po gang rnams ji snyed yod pa'i 'gro ba kun gyi lus bsdus shing / /
40a7(phal chen): brgya byin 'tshangs pa'i 'jig rten mgon po rnams dang de bzhin lha dang myi yi rnams/ /gang yang nyan thos rang rgyal rnams la dad cing sangs rgyas sku la mos pa la/ /sangs rgyas byang chub 'grub pa'i spyod
40a8(phal chen): pa dag dang thams cad mkhyen pa'i spyod pa ston/ /'gro ba kun gyi 'du shes dra ba rab dang 'bring dang tha mar 'jug pa rnams/ /thams cad shes shing byin rlob byang chub 'tshang rgya zhing rnams kun kyang rab tu ston/ /'du shes
40b1(phal chen): dra ba rnams sgoms blo ldan 'jig rten 'du shes rnams la dbang bsgyur ba/ /bya ba dang ni sbyor ba ji snyed pa dang dkon mchog byang chub spyod pa ston/ /de dag de dang rnam par 'phrul pa shin tu rgya chen dam pa gzhan yang ston/ /
40b2(phal chen): de dag gang la 'jig rten sa myin pa dang yul myin de dag bya ba ston/ /ston kyang lta ba lhur len ma yin gzhan yang phyir zhing gong du ston pa byed/ /de dag sems can rnams kyi bsam pa ji bzhin spyod pa ji bzhin yang dag
40b3(phal chen): 'jug / lus ni nam mkha' lta bu dag dang yid la chags myed 'jig rten gsum gyi gtso/ /tshul khrims spos kyi byug pa rab tu zhi ba gos yin yon tan sna tshogs brgyan/ /chos kyi go 'phang skyon med thob cing
40b4(phal chen): thams cad mkhyen pa yid bzhin nor bu ste/ /bde gshegs kun gyi ye shes dbang skur thams cad mkhyen pa'i rgyal po'i thabs la gnas/ /pha rol phyin pa rtag 'byung 'khor lo yin te glang po mngon par shes pa mchog /
40b5(phal chen): ye shes rdzu 'phrul rta ste chags pa myed 'gro shes rab nor bu dam pa yin/ /spyod pa btsun mo bzang mo bsdu ba rnam pa bzhi po khyim bdag dam pa'o/ /thabs la shin tu mkhas pa blon po yin te mkhas pa de dag 'khor los
40b6(phal chen): bsgyur/ /stong pa lto yin snying po ye shes mchog /snying ni rdo rje lta bu snying rje'i go bogs ye shes gdab pa'i mtshon cha yin/ /shes rab mgo ste chos rtogs mig yin byang chub spyod pa yang ni rna ba yin/ /tshul khrims
40b7(phal chen): dag cing nyon mongs med la gtsang ste mun pa zhi byed sna yin te/ /spobs pa lce yin lus ni rig pa yin te sems ni ye shes dam pa yin/ /spyod pa rgyu ba yin te byang chub shing gnas seng ge'i khri ni 'dug pa yin/ /tshangs pa'i
40b8(phal chen): lam rnams dag ni lam yin stong pa chags med dam pa spyod yul lo/ /gang gi de dag snang bar 'gyur ba'i snang ba bde bar gshegs kyi ye shes yul/ /sems can spyod la rnam par lta ba ye shes mchog ste rnam pa sna
41a1(phal chen): tshogs bsgyings/ /sems can dben zhing chags dang bral ba'i sbyin pa bsnyems pa med pa'i tshul khrims dang / /bzod pa mi 'khrug brtson 'grus myi ldog dbang bsgyur ba ni bsam gtan dam pa yin/ /rgyu ba
41a2(phal chen): myed cing nam mkha' 'dra ba shes rab byams pa sems can rnam par 'dren/ /skyon myed snying rje rnam dag chos ni dga' ba nyon mongs gnas las btang yang snyoms/ /don ni zhi ba chos kyi yul la nye bar 'gro ba bsod nams
41a3(phal chen): 'gro la bsngos/ /ye shes tshogs ni ral gri rnon po lta bu snang ba chen po rig pa ste/ /'gro ba rnams la thos pa ston pas myi ngoms bskal par 'dren kyang 'jigs pa myed/ /nan tan byed la gnas te bdud rnams btul
41a4(phal chen): nas bdud kyi lam yang rab tu bcad/ /rgyal ba rnams kyi 'phrin las gang yin ye shes spyod dang lhag pa'i bsam pas 'dzin/ /nga rgyal las rnams rnam par spong te rtag tu ye shes kyi'ang bya ba byed/ /bdud rnams byin
41a5(phal chen): gyis rlabs bcom mkhas pa de dag sangs rgyas byin gyis rlabs kyis 'phags/ /chos kyi byin gyis rlabs thob blo gros chen po 'chang ba lha yi gnas su 'dong / /lha rnams byas te 'chi 'phos bsod nas mchog gi
41a6(phal chen): mngal ni shin tu phra bar 'gro/ /skye ba mchog ni nye bar bstan nas mchog gi gom pa bdun ni 'dor ba byed/ /mkhas pa de dag sems can kun la bzo dang spyod dang btsun mo'i 'khor kyang ston/ /chags pa med par mngon par
41a7(phal chen): byung nas byang chub shing drung chos kyi rgyan kyang byed/ /stong pa'i bstan las 'od zer dra ba yangs pa bkye zhing yang dag bskul ba byed/ /bdud rnams btul te byang chub go 'phang sangs rgyas chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu skor/ /sangs
41a8(phal chen): rgyas sa yang rab tu bstan nas 'dren pa de dag mtshungs pa med par bzhud/ /gang gis mkhas pa bskal pa bye bar rnam par rtse zhing yang dag byung gyur nas/ /sems can bye ba khrag khrig stong phrag du ma sangs rgyas yon tan
41b1(phal chen): rab 'god kyang / /rnam pa kun tu sems can myi gnas chos la ma yin spyod lam ma yin pa/ /de dag gi ni spyod pa 'di 'dra mtha' yas shin tu rgya chen mdor bstan to/ /de 'dra'i spyod dang ldan pa'i ye shes khyu mchog rdzu
41b2(phal chen): 'phrul dag gis rnam par rtse/ /zhing rnams bye ba stong yang skra rtse gcig la bskal pa khrag khrig brgyar 'dzin te/ /lag tu khyer te zhing rnams bye bar 'gro yang lus la ngal dub gang yang myed/ /mkhas pas khyer nas ji lta'i
41b3(phal chen): gnas su bkod kyang 'gro ba dag la gnod pa myed/ /'jig rten mkhyen pa'i zhing gi rgyan rnams ji snyed rnam pa tha dad bstan pa dag /kun kyang ba spu gcig gi bu gar khyu mchog de dag yang dag rab tu ston/ /mkhas pa
41b4(phal chen): ba spu'i bu gar rgya mtsho'i chu rnams ma lus khong chud rab ston kyang / /'phel zhing 'grib myed 'gro ba dag la gnod par 'gyur myed bya ba de yang ston/ /khor yug khyim ste ting 'dzin grong khyer mchog yin byams dang
41b5(phal chen): snying rje go ca'o/ /shes rab ral gri yin te dran pa gzhu mdzes dbang po rno ba mda' yang yin/ /'jig rten mkhyen pa rnams kyi byin gyis rlabs ni gdugs te ye shes rgyal mtshan bsgreng / /de dang de dag bzod pa'i
41b6(phal chen): stobs kyis bdud kyi dpung dang sde rnams 'dus pa 'joms/ /gzungs ni sa ste byang chub spyod pa chu klung ye shes lu ma shes rab shing / /me tog byang chub yan lag ting nge 'dzin ni rta ste rdzu 'phrul rgyal mtshan brgyan/ /
41b7(phal chen): stong pa rnam thar brgyad pa rdzing bu yin te rnam par dpyod pa bzang mo btsun mo yin/ /thar pa bdud rtsi bza' ba yin te chos ni btung ba theg pa gsum gyis rtse/ /de dag spyod pa de 'dra yid 'ong khyad par 'phags te de bas gong
41b8(phal chen): du mang / /gang gis bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig stong du skyo ba yongasu mi skye bar/ /ston pa mchod cing rnam dag zhing la brtson pas 'gro ba ye shes mchog la 'god/ /kha na ma tho kun med ye shes rab gnas thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rgyas
42a1(phal chen): byed/ /zhing rnams rdul gyi 'brur blags re re nas kyang bgrang zhing brtsi bar nus gyur la/ /bar snang mkha' chen 'di yang skra yis gzhal te zad par bya bar nus srid te/ /skad cig gcig la 'gro ba rnams kyis
42a2(phal chen): sems ni bgrang tshul shes par nus srid kyi/ /sangs rgyas sras rnams spyod pa dag ni bskal pa brgyar brjod zad par myi nus so/ /gang zhig yon tan rnam dag 'di dag thob par 'dod cing gong du gzhan 'dod dang / /gang zhig sdug
42a3(phal chen): bsngal rnams las 'gro ba thar byas bde la 'god pa dang / /gang zhig bde bar gshegs pa'i sku gsung thugs dang mnyam du 'gyur bar 'dod pa dag /des ni rdo rje lta bur brtan pa'i sems su byas te yon tan bslab par
42a4(phal chen): byos/ /shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo sangs rgyas phal po che zhes bya ba las/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'i le'u ste/ bzhi bcu rtsa bzhi pa'o// // sangs rgyas rmad ga cad ces bya ba shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i
42a5(phal chen): mdo/ bam po bzhi pa/ bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod pa'i dze ta'i tshal skyabs myed pa zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na pho brang brtsegs pa rgyan chen po can na/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po dang
42a6(phal chen): 'jam dpal la stsogs pa 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes pa dam pa'i ye shes dang / brtan pa dam pa'i ye shes dang / chags med dam pa'i ye shes dang / me tog dam pa'i ye shes
42a7(phal chen): dang / nyi ma dam pa'i ye shes dang / zla ba dam pa'i ye shes dang / dri myed dam pa'i ye shes dang / rdo rje dam pa'i ye shes dang / rdul med dam pa'i ye shes dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnam par snang ba dam pa'i ye shes dang /
42a8(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' skar ma'i rgyal mtshan dang / ri rab rgyal mtshan dang / rin chen rgyal mtshan dang / chags med rgyal mtshan dang / me tog rgyal mtshan dang / dri myed rgyal mtshan dang / nyi ma'i rgyal
42b1(phal chen): mtshan dang mdzes pa'i rgyal mtshan dang / rdul med rgyal mtshan dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnam par snang ba'i rgyal mtshan dang / byang chub sems dpa' rin chen gzi brjid dang / blo gros chen po'i gzi brjid
42b2(phal chen): dang / ye shes rdo rje'i gzi brjid dang / dri ma myed pa'i gzi brjid dang / chos kyi nyi ma'i gzi brjid dang / bsod nams ri bo'i gzi brjid dang / ye shes snang ba'i gzi brjid dang / kun nas dpal gyi gzi brjid dang /
42b3(phal chen): kun nas 'od dpal gzi brjid dang / byang chub sems dpa' phyogs bcu snang bas rgyas par 'gengs pa'i gzi brjid dang / byang chub sems dpa' sa'i snying po dang / nam mkha'i snying po dang / pad+ma'i snying po dang /
42b4(phal chen): rin po che'i snying po dang / nyi ma'i snying po dang / yon tan rnam dag snying po dang / chos rgya mtsho'i snying po dang / rnam par snang ba'i snying po dang / gtsug gi snying po dang / byang chub sems dpa' pad+mo dpal gyi snying po dang /
42b5(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' bzang po'i myig dang / rnam par dag pa'i myig dang / dri ma myed pa'i myig dang / chags pa myed pa'i myig dang / kun nas lta ba'i myig dang / shin tu rnam par dag pa'i myig dang / ud pa la'i
42b6(phal chen): myig dang / rdo rje'i myig dang / rin po che'i myig dang / byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'i myig dang / byang chub sems dpa' lha'i cod pan dang / chos kyi dbyings snang ba'i blo gros cod pan dang / byang chub dam pa'i cod
42b7(phal chen): pan dang / phyogs rnam par snang ba'i cod pan dang / sangs rgyas thams cad yang dag par 'byung ba'i snying po'i cod pan dang / 'jig rten thams cad las mngon par 'phags pa'i cod pan dang / kun nas rnam par
42b8(phal chen): snang ba'i cod pan dang / zil gyis non pa myed pa'i cod pan dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi seng+ge'i khri 'dzin pa'i cod pan dang / byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi dbyings nam mkha' kun nas snang ba'i cod
43a1(phal chen): pan dang / byang chub sems dpa' tshangs pa'i dbang po'i gtsug phud dang / klu'i dbang po'i gtsug phud dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sprul pa snang ba'i gtsug phud dang / byang chub dam pa'i gtsug phud
43a2(phal chen): dang / smon lam rgya mtsho thams cad rab tu sgrog pa'i rin chen rgyal po'i gtsug phud dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'od kyi dkyil 'khor rab tu 'gyed pa'i nor bu rin che 'brug sgra'i gtsug phud dang /
43a3(phal chen): nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad tha myi dad par rnam par dmyigs pa'i rin chen rgyal pos brgyan pa'i gtsug phud dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rnam par 'phrul pa snang ba'i rgyal mtshan dang / rin po che'i dra
43a4(phal chen): bas kun nas yog pa'i rgyal po'i gtsug phud dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khor lo sgrog pa'i gtsug phud dang / byang chub sems dpa' dus gsum gyi myings thams cad rab tu sgrog pa'i gtsug
43a5(phal chen): phud dang / byang chub sems dpa' rgya chen po'i 'od dang / gzi brjid dri ma myed pa'i 'od dang / rin po che'i 'od dang / rdul dang bral ba'i 'od dang / skar ma'i 'od dang / chos kyi 'od dang zhi ba'i 'od dang / nyi ma'i 'od dang rnam
43a6(phal chen): par 'phrul pa'i 'od dang / byang chub sems dpa' lha'i 'od dang / byang chub sems dpa' bsod nams dpal dang / ye shes dpal dang / chos dpal dang / mngon par shes pa'i dpal dang / 'od kyi dpal dang / me tog
43a7(phal chen): dpal dang / rin po che'i dpal dang / byang chub gyi dpal dang / tshangs pa'i dpal dang / byang chub sems dpa' kun nas snang ba'i dpal dang / byang chub sems dpa' tshangs pa'i dbyangs dang / rgya mtsho'i dbyangs dang sa sgra'i
43a8(phal chen): dbyangs dang / 'jig rten dbang po'i dbyangs dang / ri dbang rgyal po'i 'thab pa'i dbyangs dang / chos kyi dbyings kun tu rgyas pa'i dbyangs dang / chos rgya mtsho thams cad rab tu sgrog pa'i dbyangs dang / bdud kyi dkyil 'khor
43b1(phal chen): thams cad rab tu 'dul ba'i dbyangs dang / snying rje chen po'i tshul gyi sprin rab tu sgrog pa'i dbyangs dang / byang chub sems dpa' 'gro ba thams cad sdug bsngal rab tu zhi bar byed pa dbugs 'byin pa'i dbyangs dang /
43b2(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi 'phags pa dang / khyad par gyis 'phags pa dang / ye shes kyi 'phags pa dang / bsod nams ri bos 'phags pa dang / yon tan gyi tshogs kyis 'phags pa dang / grags pas
43b3(phal chen): 'phags pa dang / kun tu snang bas 'phags pa dang / byams pa chen pos 'phags pa dang / ye shes rgya mtshos 'phags pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa'i rgyud kyi gdung gis 'phags pa
43b4(phal chen): dang / byang chub sems dpa' 'od kyi dpal dang / mchog gi dpal dang / kun tu 'phags pa'i dpal dang / rnam par snang ba'i dpal dang / chos kyi dpal dang / zla ba'i dpal dang / nam mkha'i dpal dang /
43b5(phal chen): rin po che dpal dang / dpal gyi dpal dang / byang chub sems dpa' ye shes kyi dpal dang / byang chub sems dpa' ri'i dbang po'i rgyal po dang / chos kyi dbang po'i rgyal po dang / 'gro ba'i dbang po'i rgyal po dang /
43b6(phal chen): tshangs pa'i dbang po'i rgyal po dang / tshogs kyi dbang po'i rgyal po dang / lha'i dbang po'i rgyal po dang / zhi ba'i dbang po'i rgyal po dang / mi g.yo ba'i dbang po'i rgyal po dang / khyu mchog gi dbang po'i rgyal po dang / byang
43b7(phal chen): chub sems dpa' mchog gi dbang po'i rgyal po dang / byang chub sems dpa' rab tu zhi ba'i sgra dang / chags pa med pa'i sgra dang / sa'i dbyangs kyi sgra dang / rgya mtsho'i 'brug gi sgra dang / sprin gyi dbyangs kyi sgra dang /
43b8(phal chen): chos snang ba'i rgyal po'i sgra dang / nam mkha'i dbyangs kyi sgra dang / sems can kun gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba rab tu sgrog pa'i sgra dang / sngon gyi smon lam yongs su bskul pa'i sgra dang / byang chub sems dpa' bdud kyi dkyil
44a1(phal chen): 'khor bcom pa myed pa'i sgra dang / byang chub sems dpa' rin po che'i blo dang / ye shes ri bo'i blo dang / nam mkha'i blo dang / dri ma myed pa'i blo dang / chags pa myed pa'i blo dang / rnam par sangs rgyas pa'i blo
44a2(phal chen): dang / dus gsum snang ba'i blo dang / yangs pa'i blo dang / kun tu snang ba'i blo dang / byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi dbyings su snang ba'i blo dang / de dag la stsogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' lnga stong tsam ste/ kun
44a3(phal chen): kyang byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa dang / smon lam gyis byung ba sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad rgyas par 'gengs pa/ chags pa myed pa'i spyod yul can de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshogs su 'gyur/
44a4(phal chen): drung du 'dong bas lus mtha' yas pa'i byin gyis rlabs dang ldan pa/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rnam par 'phrul pa yongs su bstan pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa yongs su bstan par dmyigs par bya ba la sgrib pa
44a5(phal chen): myed pa'i myig gis dkyil 'khor rnam par dag pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mngon par 'tshang rgya ba'i tshe/ nye bar 'dong ba rgyun myi gcod pas/ tshad myed par phyin pa/ chos rgya mtsho'i tshul thams
44a6(phal chen): cad la ye shes snang ba/ rab tu thob pas snang ba mtha' yas pa dang ldan pa/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnam par dag pas bskal pa mtha' yas par shin tu ston pa myi zad pa 'gro ba'i bsam pa ci lta ba bzhin du
44a7(phal chen): gzugs kyi lus yongs su ston pas nam mkha'i dbyings kyi klas pa'i ye shes kyi spyod yul rnam par dag cing mi gnas pa/ sems can gyi khams sems can myed pa dang / srog med pa yongs su shes pas
44a8(phal chen): rab rib myed pa/ chos kyi dbyings thams cad du 'od zer gyi dra bas rgyas par 'gengs pas nam mkha' dang mnyam pa sha stag dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs so/ /nyan thos rdzu 'phrul chen po dang ldan pa lnga brgya ste/
44b1(phal chen): thams cad kyang bden pa'i tshul gyi rang bzhin mngon par khong du chud pa/ yang dag pa'i mtha' mngon sum du gyur pa/ chos kyi rang bzhin la zhugs pa/ srid pa'i rgya mtsho las gyen du 'phags pa/ de bzhin
44b2(phal chen): gshegs pa'i tshogs su 'gyur ba'i spyod yul can kun nas sbyor ba dang / bag la nyal ba dang bcings pa rnam par bzlog pa/ chags pa myed pa'i gnas la brtan pa/ nam mkha' ltar zhi ba la rnam par sbyong ba/
44b3(phal chen): sangs rgyas la the tsom dang nem nur dang / yid gnyis yongs su chad pa/ sangs rgyas kyi ye shes rgya mtsho la mos pa'i lam du zhugs pa sha stag dang / 'jig rten gyi dbang po sngon gyi rgyal ba la bya ba byas pa/
44b4(phal chen): 'gro ba thams cad la phan pa dang / bde ba'i don du zhugs pa/ gsol ba ma btab par dge ba'i bshes gnyen du gyur pa/ sems can gzhan bsrung ba la zhugs pa/ 'jig rten thams cad las 'phags pa'i khyad
44b5(phal chen): par dang ldan pa'i ye shes kyi sgo la zhugs pa/ sems can thams cad yongs su mi gtong ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bstan pa'i spyod yul la byung ba de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa yongs
44b6(phal chen): su bsrung ba la zhugs pa/ sangs rgyas kyi rigs yang dag par bzung ba'i smon lam gyis yang dag par skyes pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i gdung gi rgyud tu byung ba/ mngon du gyur pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la
44b7(phal chen): mngon par mos pa sha stag dang yang thabs gcig go/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'khor dang bcas pa de dag dang / nyan thos rdzu 'phrul chen po dang ldan pa/ de dag dang 'jig rten gyi dbang po 'khor dang bcas pa de dag
44b8(phal chen): 'di snyam du gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul dang de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyi yul dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyis rlabs dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i myi
45a1(phal chen): bsnyengs pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par spyod pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i mnga' dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes la ni de bzhin
45a2(phal chen): gshegs pa'i byin gyis rlabs dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthu dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sngon gyi smon lam dang / sngon legs pa spyod pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba
45a3(phal chen): dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi skyabs dang / dad pa'i myigs yongs su dag pa dang / rgya chen po la mos pa'i snang ba rab tu thob pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i lhag pa'i bsam pa rnam par dag pa dang / bsam pa thag
45a4(phal chen): pa'i thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su smon cing yang dag par zhugs pa ma gtogs par lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis 'jug pa'am/ khong du chud pa 'am yid ches pa'am/ yongs su shes pa'am/
45a5(phal chen): rnam par rtog pa'am/ bzung ba'am rnam par spyod pa'am/ rnam par bsgom pa'am/ rnam par dbye ba'am/ rnam par dgrol ba'am/ rab tu brjod pa'am/ sems can pha rol gyi rgyud du phyin par bya bar
45a6(phal chen): ni myi nus na/ bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis bdag cag byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsam pa'i tshul ji lta ba dang / sems can bsam pa rnam pa tha dad pa dang / mos pa sna tshogs dang / shes pa sna tshogs kyi tshig
45a7(phal chen): dang / brda sna tshogs su gyur pa/ dbang bsgyur ba'i sa gzhan dang / gzhan la gnas pa dbang po sna tshogs su rnam par dag pa/ bsam pa dang sbyor ba rnam pa gzhan dang gzhan can/ sems dang bsam pa'i yul
45a8(phal chen): gzhan dang gzhan can de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan gzhan dang gzhan la gnas pa/ chos bstan pa gzhan dang gzhan la mos pa dag la sngon thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du zhugs pa lta yang yang dag par bstan
45b1(phal chen): grang / sngon byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam mngon par bsgrubs pa lta'ang yang dag par bstan grang / sngon gyi byang chub sems dpa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i dkyil 'khor yongs su dag pa lta'ang yang dag par bstan
45b2(phal chen): grang / sngon gyi byang chub sems dpa'i sa yongs su dag pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa lta'ang yang dag par bstan grang / sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i dkyil 'khor mngon par bsgrubs pa yongs su rdzogs par
45b3(phal chen): mdzad pa lta'ang yang dag par bstan grang / sngon gyi byang chub sems dpa'i tshul mngon par bsgrub pa rnam par phye ba'i snang ba lta'ang yang dag par bstan grang / sngon byang chub sems dpa'i lam gyi rgyan yongs su
45b4(phal chen): dag par mdzad pa lta'ang yang dag par bstan grang / sngon byang chub sems dpa'i 'byung ba'i tshul rgya mtsho mngon par bsgrub pa lta'ang yang dag par bstan grang / sngon gyi byang chub sems dpa'i yang dag par bsgrub
45b5(phal chen): pa dang / rnam par 'phrul pa'i rgyan phun sum tshogs pa lta'ang yang dag par bstan grang / byang chub sems dpa'i sngon gyi sbyor ba rgya mtsho lta'ang yang dag par bstan grang / mngon par rdzogs pa'i byang chub gyi sgos
45b6(phal chen): rnam par 'phrul pa lta'ang yang dag par bstan grang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor ba'i rnam par 'phrul pa dang / khyu mchog gi mthu lta'ang yang dag par bstan grang / de bzhin gshegs
45b7(phal chen): pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par/ rnam par 'phrul pa lta'ang yang dag par bstan grang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sems can gyi khams 'dul ba'i thabs kyi sgo lta'ang yang dag par bstan grang / de bzhin
45b8(phal chen): gshegs pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid chos kyi grong khyer la mnga' mdzad pa lta'ang yang dag par bstan grang / de bzhin gshegs pa sems can thams cad kyi lam snang bar mdzad pa lta'ang yang dag par bstan grang /
46a1(phal chen): de bzhin gshegs pa sems can thams cad kyi gnas su gshegs shing rnam par 'phrul pa mdzad pa lta'ang yang dag par bstan grang / de bzhin gshegs pa sems can thams cad kyi yon bzhes pa mdzad
