46a2(phal chen): pa lta'ang yang dag par bstan grang / de bzhin gshegs pa sems can thams cad kyi bsod nams dang yon tan ston pa'i cho 'phrul mdzad pa lta'ang yang dag par bstan grang / de bzhin gshegs pa sems can
46a3(phal chen): thams cad kyi sems kyi tshul la sangs rgyas kyi gzugs brnyan dmyigs pa mdzad pa lta'ang yang dag par bstan grang / de bzhin gshegs pa sems can thams cad la/ rnam par 'phrul pa'i cho 'phrul mdzad pa
46a4(phal chen): lta'ang yang dag par bstan grang / de bzhin gshegs pa sems can thams cad la yongs su bstan grang / rjes su bstan pa'i cho 'phrul mdzad pa lta'ang yang dag par bstan grang / de bzhin gshegs pa sems
46a5(phal chen): can thams cad la sangs rgyas kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi spyod yul bsam gyis myi khyab pas rnam par 'phrul pa mdzad pa lta'ang yang dag par bstan grang snyam pa dang / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi byang chub sems dpa'
46a6(phal chen): de dag gis sems kyi yongs su rtog pa thugs kyis mkhyen nas/ seng ge rnam par bsgyings pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin nam mkha' dang mnyam pas dpe med pa 'gro ba thams cad du rnam par snang ba'i rgyan dang ldan pa/
46a7(phal chen): thugs rje chen po'i sgo'i rang bzhin can/ thugs rje chen po'i sgo dang ldan pa/ thugs rje chen po sngon du 'gro ba/ thugs rje chen po'i chos can la mnyam par gzhag go/ /bcom ldan 'das kyi de ltar mnyam
46a8(phal chen): par bzhag ma thag tu pho brang brtsegs pa rgyan chen po can yang mtha' dang dbus myed par yangs shing rdo rje thub pa med pa'i rgyal mtshan gyis sa'i gzhi rab tu bkod pa dang / nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po thams cad kyi dra ba
46b1(phal chen): kun tu bkram pa/ rin po che du ma'i me tog sil mas chal bar gang ba/ nor bu rin po che dam pa mdzes par bkram pa dang / bai DUr+ya'i ka bas mdzes par byas pa/ rin po che'i rgyal po 'gro ba rnam par snang bas rgyan shin
46b2(phal chen): tu rnam par phye ba/ rin po che bzang po mang po dang ldan pa'i nor bu rin po che 'dzam bu'i chu klung gi phung pos shin tu brgyan pa dang / rin po che thams cad las sgo gang dang / rta babs dang / pu shu dang / skar khung byas
46b3(phal chen): shing khri 'phang grangs myed pa rnam par dag pas brgyan pa dang / 'jig rten gyi dbang po thams cad dang 'dra ba'i nor bu rin po che rgyan dang ldan pa dang / 'gro ba rgya mtsho dang nor bu rin po che rnam par phye ba dang / nor bu rin po
46b4(phal chen): che thams cad kyi dra bas kun nas yog pa'i gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan rab tu bsgreng ba dang / sgo dang rta babs thams cad las 'od zer chos kyi dbyings su rgyas par 'gengs pa rab tu 'byung bas rnam par mdzes
46b5(phal chen): par byas pa dang / phyi rol gyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor gyi sa'i gzhi stegs bu brjod du myed pas brgyan pa dang / phyogs kun nas them skas kyi phreng ba nor bu rin po ches brtsegs shing shin tu rnam par phye bas
46b6(phal chen): rab tu mdzes par kun nas gnas par gyur to/ /dze ta'i tshal thams cad kyang chu zheng gab par shin tu yangs shing rgya che bar kun nas gnas par gyur te/ sangs rgyas kyi mthus sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du
46b7(phal chen): myed pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams kyang chu zheng kun tu rgya che zhing yangs pa dang / rin po che thams cad kyi rgyan sna tshogs dang ldan zhing / sa'i gzhi nor bu rin po che sna tshogs brjod du med
46b8(phal chen): pas kun nas grub pa dang / nor bu rin po che grangs med pa'i ra bas kun nas bskor ba dang / rin po che sna tshogs kyi shing ta la'i phreng bas mdzes par brgyan par kun nas gnas par gyur to/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing
47a1(phal chen): de dag na spos kyi chu klung tshad myed pa klong mtha' yas pas 'khyil pa'i spos kyi chus yongs su gang ba/ rin po che sna tshogs kyi me tog mang po dang 'dres par gyur la g.yas phyogs su 'khyil cing
47a2(phal chen): 'bab pa/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad dbyangasu sgrogs pas rab tu brgyan pa dag kyang kun nas gnas par gyur to/ /rin po che'i me tog pun da ri ka'i phreng ba dang / rin po che'i shing gam yo'i rin po che
47a3(phal chen): thams cad kyi pad+mo rab tu rgyas shing / shin tu 'phags pas mdzes par brgyan pa dang / rin po che sna tshogs kyi khang pa brtsegs pa'i phreng ba bsam gyis myi khyab pa nor bu rin po che thams cad kyi dra bas kun
47a4(phal chen): nas yog pa nor bu rin po che grangs med pa'i dra bas kun nas snang bas brgyan cing mdzes pa dang / nor bu rin po che'i gzhal myed khang nor bu rin po che thams cad kyis brgyan pa'i grangs med pa spos thams cad
47a5(phal chen): kyi ngad kun nas 'byung ba spos kyi sprin gyi rgyan dang ldan pa dag kyang kun nas gnas par gyur to/ /rin po che'i rgyal mtshan grangs myed pa dang / gos kyi rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan gyi rgyal mtshan dang / rin po che
47a6(phal chen): snam bu'i rgyal mtshan dang / me tog gi rgyal mtshan dang / rgyan gyis rgyal mtshan dang / phreng ba'i rgyal mtshan dang / rin po che sna tshogs kyi dril bu'i rgyal mtshan dang / rin po che'i rgyal ba'i gdugs kyi
47a7(phal chen): rgyal mtshan dang / nor bu rin po che snang bas kun tu rgyas par 'gengs pa'i rgyal mtshan dang / nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mtshan gyi 'khor lo'i dbyangs rab tu sgrog pa'i rgyal mtshan dang /
47a8(phal chen): nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po seng ge yid du 'ong ba'i rgyal mtshan dang / nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sngon gyi sbyor ba rab tu sgrogs pa'i rgyal mtshan dang / nor bu rin po che'i rgyal
47b1(phal chen): po chos kyi dbyings thams cad rab tu snang ba'i rgyal mtshan dang / rgyal mtshan gyi rgyan rnam par phye ba thams cad phyogs kun nas rgyan tu gyur pa dag kyang kun nas gnas par gyur to/ /dze ta'i 'tshal gyi nam
47b2(phal chen): mkha'i dbyings thams cad kyang lha'i gzhal myed khang gi sprin bsam gyis mi khyab pas brgyan par kun nas gnas par gyur to/ /dze ta'i tshal nyid kyang spos sna tshogs kyi shing grangs med pa'i sprin gyis kun
47b3(phal chen): nas yog cing brgyan pa dang / brjod du med pa'i rgyan sna tshogs dang ldan pa'i ri rab kyi kun nas 'khor cing rgyan dang ldan pa dang / rol mo brdung ba dang / dkrol ba brjod du myed pa'i sprin las de bzhin gshegs
47b4(phal chen): pa thams cad la bstod pa'i dbyangs nga ro snyan pa 'byung bas kun nas brgyan pa dang / rin po che'i pad+mo brjod du myed pa'i sprin gyis kun nas yog cing brgyan pa dang / rin po che'i seng ge'i khri brjod du med pa'i steng
47b5(phal chen): lha rdzas kyi rin po che'i stan bting ba la/ byang chub sems dpa' 'khod cing de bzhin gshegs pa la bstod pa'i sgra dbyangs snyan pa 'byin pa'i sprin gyi kun nas brgyan pa dang / lha'i dbang po brjod du med pa'i gzugs
47b6(phal chen): brnyan mngon par 'byung ba'i nor bu rin po che'i 'bru'i sprin gyis kun nas brgyan pa dang / mu tig dkar po'i dra ba'i sprin brjod du med pas kun nas brgyan pa dang / mu tig dmar po'i khang pa brtsegs pa'i sprin brjod du med pas kun nas yog cing brgyan pa dang / rdo rje lta bu
47b7(phal chen): sra ba'i mu tig gi sprin brjod du med pa'i char mngon par 'bab pas rab tu brgyan par kun nas gnas par gyur to/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i phyir ro/ /
47b8(phal chen): de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos dkar po'i tshogs bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i phyir ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i khyu mchog gi mthu dang / byin gyis rlabs pas bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i phyir ro/ /de bzhin
48a1(phal chen): gshegs pa'i sku gcig gis 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du rgyas par 'gengs pa rnam par 'phrul pa bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i phyir ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gcig tu
48a2(phal chen): zhugs pas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnam par phye ba thams cad la yang dag par gzhol ba'i byin gyis rlabs yongs su ston pa bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i phyir ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa rnams rdul shin tu phra ba gcig
48a3(phal chen): la chos kyi dbyings thams cad kyi gzugs brnyan rnam par dmyigs par yongs su ston par mdzad pa bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i phyir ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ba spu'i bu ga gcig tu sngon gyi mtha'i de bzhin
48a4(phal chen): gshegs pa gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa yongs su ston par mdzad pa bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i phyir ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi 'od zer gyi sgo nas 'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas pa snang bar
48a5(phal chen): 'gyur ba bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i phyir ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ba spu'i rtse mo gcig las sprul pa'i sprin 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams
48a6(phal chen): cad rgyas par 'gengs pa bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i phyir ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ba spu'i sgo gcig nas 'jig rten gyi khams 'du ba dang / 'jig pa'i bskal pa yongs su ston pa bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i
48a7(phal chen): phyir ro/ /ji ltar dze ta'i tshal de lta bu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pas yongs su dag par kun nas gnas par gyur pa de bzhin du phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ nam mkha'i
48a8(phal chen): mthas gtugs pa thams cad kyang yongs su dag par kun nas gnas shing rab tu brgyan pa dang / shin tu spyad pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku yongs su rgyas pa dang / dze ta'i tshal du yang dag par gzhol ba dang /
48b1(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' yongs su rgyas pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho shin tu rnam par gnas pa dag rgyan thams cad kyi brgyan gyi char mngon par 'bab pa dang / rin po che thams cad kyi 'od
48b2(phal chen): kyis rab tu snang ba dang / rin po che sna tshogs thams cad kyi sprin gyi char mngon par bab pas brgyan pa dang / zhing thams cad kyi rgyan gyi sprin gyis kun nas yog par brgyan pa dang / lha rdzas kyi lus thams cad sprin
48b3(phal chen): gyi char rab tu 'bab pas brgyan pa dang / me tog sna tshogs thams cad kyi sprin shin tu rgyas pa'i lhun gyis kun tu rgyas shing brgyan pa dang / gos thams cad kyi shing gi sprin gyi mdzod nas gos kha dog sna
48b4(phal chen): tshogs su mdzes pa'i char rab tu 'bab pas brgyan pa dang / phreng ba dang lda ldi dang se mo do'i rgyan thams cad kyi sprin gyi char rgyun mi chad par mngon par 'bab pas brgyan pa dang / spos sna tshogs kyi bdug spos
48b5(phal chen): phyogs kun nas 'thul ba'i sprin dang na bun gyi char thams cad kyi dbyibs ltar mngon par 'bab pas brgyan pa dang / rin po che thams cad kyi me tog gi dra ba'i sprin las rin po che'i rgyal po'i phye ma zhib bu'i char
48b6(phal chen): rgyun mi chad par rab tu 'bab pa dang / rin po che thams cad kyi rgyal mtshan dang ba dan gyi sprin lha'i bu mo'i lag na khyer ba nam mkha'i dbyings kun tu rgyu zhing 'khor bas brgyan pa dang / rin po che thams cad kyi pad+mo
48b7(phal chen): rin po che sna tshogs kyi 'dab ma'i dkyil 'khor can chu ba mthon po dang ldan pa'i ze ba'i rol mo bkod pa kun nas sgra 'byin cing dbyangs snyan par sgrog pas brgyan pa dang / rin po che'i 'bru sna tshogs kyi dra ba
48b8(phal chen): dang / rin po che seng+ge'i dra ba sna tshogs rnam pa tha dad pa'i phreng ba dang / se mo dos brgyan par kun nas gnas shing snang bar gyur to/ /de ltar bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin chen po seng+ge
49a1(phal chen): rnam par bsgyings pa de la mnyam par bzhag ma thag du/ de'i tshe shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi pha rol gyi 'jig
49a2(phal chen): r ten gyi khams gser gyi sprin sgron ma'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad dpal gyi gzi brjid rgyal po sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas byang chub sems dpa' rnam par snang ba'i smon
49a3(phal chen): l am gyi gtsug gi 'od zer snang ba zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das des gnang nas 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya
49a4(phal chen): mtsho de dag 'phags te/ nam mkha'i dbyings rgyan sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa dang / lha rdzas kyi me tog gi sprin gyi char mngon par 'phags pa dang lha rdzas kyi spos kyi sprin gyi char rab tu dgyed pa dang / lha rdzas kyi
49a5(phal chen): rin po che'i pad+mo'i sprin gyi char mngon par bab pa dang / lha rdzas kyi phreng ba'i sprin gyi char rab tu btang ba dang / lha rdzas kyi rin po che'i sprin gyi char mngon par 'bab pa dang / lha rdzas kyi rgyan gyi sprin gyi char
49a6(phal chen): mngon par 'gyed pa dang / lha rdzas kyi rin po che'i gdugs kyi sprin gyi char mngon par bsgrub pa dang / kha dog sna tshogs rnam pa tha dad cing shin tu phra ba'i lha rdzas kyi gos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par 'bab pa dang /
49a7(phal chen): lha rdzas kyi rin po che'i rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan gyi sprin nam mkha'i dbyings las byin gyis rlabs pa dang / rin po che sna tshogs kyi sprin gyi rgyan yid du 'ong bas nam mkha'i dbyings rgyas par 'gengs par
49a8(phal chen): byed cing / mi 'jed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang na ba der lhags nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste/ 'khor dang bcas pas bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas shar phyogs su brten te/
49b1(phal chen): khang pa brtsegs pa rgyan kun dang ldan zhing nor bu rin po che'i dra bas kun nas khyab pa dang / seng ge'i khri nor bu rin po che phyogs rab tu snang ba'i pad+mo'i snying po can dag mngon par sprul nas nor bu rin po che
49b2(phal chen): yid bzhin gyi rgyal po'i dra ba'i rgyan gyi kun nas brgyan pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i lus su byin gyis rlabs nas skyil mo dkrung bcas te 'khod do/ /lho phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho sangs
49b3(phal chen): r gyas kyi zhing brjod du myed pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi pha rol gyi 'jig rten gyi khams rdo rje rgyal mtshan gyi snying po zhes bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa dpal gyi snying po kun nas snang ba'i rgyal po'i sangs rgyas
49b4(phal chen): k yi zhing nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi shugs thub par dka' ba'i rgyal po zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba
49b5(phal chen): snyed dang lhan gcig tu bcom ldan 'das des gnas nas 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho de nas 'phags te/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho thams cad spos kyi lda ldi dang dra bas kun tu 'brel bar
49b6(phal chen): byin gyis rlab pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'byam klas pa thams cad rin po che sna tshogs kyi lda ldi dang dra ba chen pos kun tu 'brel bar byin gyis rlab pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rgyud thams
49b7(phal chen): cad me tog thams cad kyi lda ldi dang / phreng ba'i dra bas kun tu 'brel bar byin gyis brlab pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi 'khor thams cad phreng ba dang lda ldi dang / se mo do'i dra bas kun nas 'brel bar
49b8(phal chen): byin gyis brlab pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi dkyil 'khor thams cad 'og gi 'jig rten rdo rje thams cad kyi phreng bas yongs su gzung bar byin gyis brlab pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi tshul
50a1(phal chen): thams cad nor bu rin po che sna tshogs kyi dra bas kun nas 'brel bar byin gyis brlab pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad gos sna tshogs kyi lda ldis kun nas yongs su blangs shing
50a2(phal chen): bzung bar byin gyis brlab pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad rin po che sna tshogs kyi lus kyi phreng ba dang lda ldi mang po'i dra bas kun nas 'brel bar mngon par bsgrub pa dang / zhing thams cad nor bu rin po
50a3(phal chen): che dpal gyi 'od zer gyi lda ldi dang / phreng ba'i dra bas kun nas 'brel bar byin gyis brlab pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad rin po che rnam par snang ba'i lda ldi dang / dra bas kun tu 'brel bar byin gyis
50a4(phal chen): brlab pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi gzhi nor bu rin po che seng+ge yid du 'ong ba'i phreng ba dang / lda ldi'i dra bas yongs su bzung bar byin gyis brlab pa byed cing / myi mjed kyi 'jig rten
50a5(phal chen): gyi khams gang na ba der lhags nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste/ 'khor dang bcas pas bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas/ lho phyogs su brten te/ nor bu rin po che 'gro ba la rnam par snang
50a6(phal chen): ba'i khang pa brtsegs pa dang / seng+ge'i khri nor bu rin po che phyogs kun tu rnam par snang ba'i pad+mo'i snying po can dag mngon par sprul te/ rin po che thams cad kyi me tog gi dra ba'i rgyan gyis kun nas brgyan
50a7(phal chen): pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i lus su byin gyis brlabs nas bskyil mo dkrung bcas te 'khod do/ /nub phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed
50a8(phal chen): k yi pha rol gyi 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che'i ri rab rnam par snang ba'i rgyal mtshan mar mye zhes bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes sgron ma'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas byang chub sems
50b1(phal chen): d pa' dpal kun nas 'phags pa'i gzi brjid ces bya ba byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das des gnang nas 'khor gyi dkyil
50b2(phal chen): 'khor rgya mtsho de nas 'phags te/ chos kyi dbyings thams cad bdug spos kha dog sna tshogs dang / dri sna tshogs su ldan pa'i ri rab kyi sprin sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis
50b3(phal chen): rgyas par gang ba dang / chos kyi dbyings thams cad spos kha dog sna tshogs dang ldan pa'i ri rab kyi sprin sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du myed pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis rgyas par gang ba dang / chos kyi dbyings
50b4(phal chen): thams cad bdug spos kha dog dang dri du ma dang ldan pa'i ri rab kyi sprin sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis rgyas par gang ba dang / chos kyi dbyings thams cad spos kha dog sna tshogs dang
50b5(phal chen): ldan pa'i ri rab kyi sprin sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis rgyas par gang ba dang / chos kyi dbyings thams cad nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po mdangs 'byung bas thams cad kyi rdul gyi
50b6(phal chen): kha dog dang 'dra ba'i ri rab kyi sprin sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis rgyas par gang ba dang / chos kyi dbyings thams cad nor bu rin po che skar ma'i rgyal mtshan 'od kyi dkyil 'khor sna
50b7(phal chen): tshogs kyi rgyan dang ldan pa'i ri rab kyi sprin sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis rgyas par gang ba dang / chos kyi dbyings thams cad rin po che'i rgyal po rdo rje'i snying po kha dog sna tshogs
50b8(phal chen): can/ rgyan rnam pa tha dad pa'i yul dang ldan pa'i ri rab kyi sprin sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis rgyas par gang ba dang / chos kyi dbyings thams cad nor bu rin po che 'dzam
51a1(phal chen): bu'i chu klung 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du snang ba'i yul dang ldan pa'i ri rab kyi sprin sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis rgyas par gang ba dang / n
51a2(phal chen): am mkha'i dbyings thams cad nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po chos kyi dbyings thams cad rab tu snang ba'i ri rab kyi sprin sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi kun nas khyab par byin gyis brlab
51a3(phal chen): pa dang / sems can gyi khams kyi yul thams cad nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mtshan rab tu snang ba'i ri rab kyi sprin sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed
51a4(phal chen): kyis rgyas par gang ba dang / chos kyi dbyings thams cad kyi nam mkha' rin po che'i rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sngon gyi sbyor ba rab tu snang bar yongs su ston cing / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i
51a5(phal chen): sgra 'byin pa'i ri rab kyi sprin gyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis rgyas par gang ba dang / phyogs bcu thams cad rin po che'i rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po byang chub pa'i 'od
51a6(phal chen): dang ldan pa'i ri rab kyi sprin sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi rgyas par 'gengs pa byed cing / myi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang na ba der lhags nas bcom ldan 'das gang na
51a7(phal chen): ba der dong ste/ 'khor dang bcas pas bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas/ nub phyogs su brten te/ khang pa brtsegs pa spos kyi rgyal po thams cad kyi lhun dang ldan pa mu tig gi dra bas kun nas
51a8(phal chen): khyab pa dang / seng ge'i khri nor bu rin po che lha'i dbang po rab tu snang ba'i rgyal mtshan gyi pad+mo'i snying po can dag mngon par sprul nas/ rin po che gser gyi dra bas kun nas brgyan pa dang / yid bzhin gyi
51b1(phal chen): nor bu rin po che cod pan bcings pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i lus su byin gyis brlab nas skyil mo krung bcas te 'khod do/ /byang phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i
51b2(phal chen): r dul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi pha rol gyi 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che'i gos yongs su snang ba zhes bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi dbyings nam mkha'i dpal rnam par snang ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas byang
51b3(phal chen): c hub sems dpa' chags pa myed pa'i dpal gyi rgyal po zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das des gnang
51b4(phal chen): nas 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho de nas 'phags te/ nam mkha'i dbyings rin po che'i snam bu'i sprin gyi rgyan gyi brgyan par byin gyis brlab pa dang / nam mkha'i dbyings rin po che'i gos kha
51b5(phal chen): dog ser po dang / mdog ser po'i sprin gyi rgyan gyis brgyan par byin gyis brlab pa dang / nam mkha'i dbyings rin po che'i gos spos sna tshogs kyis dri zhim por byas pa'i sprin gyi char rab tu 'bab pa rgyan gyis
51b6(phal chen): brgyan par byin gyis brlab pa dang / nam mkha'i dbyings rin po che'i rgyal po nyi ma'i rgyal mtshan gyi sprin gyi rgyan gyis brgyan par byin gyis brlab pa dang / nam mkha'i dbyings nor bu rin po che gser gyi mdog
51b7(phal chen): shin tu 'bar ba'i sprin gyi rgyan gyis brgyan par byin gyis brlab pa dang / nam mkha'i dbyings nor bu'i rgyal po rin po che 'bar ba'i gos kyi sprin gyi rgyan gyis brgyan par byin gyis brlab pa
51b8(phal chen): dang / nam mkha'i dbyings nor bu rin po che skar ma thams cad kyi gzugs brnyan gyi sna tshogs su gyur pa'i gos kyi sprin gyi rgyan gyis brgyan par byin gyis brlab pa dang / nam mkha'i dbyings phyogs
52a1(phal chen): bcu kun nas nor bu rin po che'i snam bu khra bo'i rdo rje ltar snang ba'i sprin gyis yongs su rgyas par byin gyis brlab pa dang / nam mkha'i dbyings phyogs bcu kun nas rin po che'i rgyal po rnam
52a2(phal chen): par snang ba'i dpal rab tu 'bar ba'i 'od dang ldan pa'i gos kyi sprin gyis yongs su rgyas par byin gyis brlab pa dang / nam mkha'i dbyings phyogs bcu kun nas nor bu'i rgyal po snang ba shin tu gsal bas
52a3(phal chen): phyogs kyi dbyings rnam par snang ba'i gos kyi sprin gyis yongs su rgyas par byin gyis brlab pa dang / nam mkha'i dbyings rin po che'i rgyal po rgya mtsho'i rgyan gyi gos kyi sprin gyis kun nas yog par byin
52a4(phal chen): gyis brlab pa byed cing / mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang na ba der lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste/ 'khor dang bcas pas bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas/ byang
52a5(phal chen): phyogs su brten te/ rin po che'i rgyal po rgya mtsho yongs su 'byung ba'i khang pa brtsegs pa dang / seng ge'i khri bai DUr+ya'i pad+mo'i snying po can dag mngon par sprul nas/ nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po seng ge mdzes
52a6(phal chen): pa'i dra bas yongs su brgyan pa dang / rin po che skar ma'i rgyal mtshan mgo la thogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i lus su byin gyis brlabs nas bskyil mo dkrung bcas te 'khod do/ /byang dang shar gyi phyogs
52a7(phal chen): ' tshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi pha rol gyi 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che thams cad du mdzes pa'i rin po che 'od zer gyi dra ba rab tu
52a8(phal chen): ' gyed pa zhes bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa myi dmyigs pa'i sprin gyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi dbyings su shin tu 'phrul ba'i smon lam zla ba zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa'
52b1(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das des gnang nas 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho de nas 'phags te/ 'jig rten gyi khams 'byam
52b2(phal chen): klas pa thams cad rin po che'i khang pa brtsegs pa'i sprin gyi kun nas khebs par byin gyis brlab pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas pa thams cad spos kyi khang pa brtsegs pa'i sprin gyis kun nas khebs
52b3(phal chen): par byin gyis brlab pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas pa thams cad bdug spos kyi khang pa brtsegs pa'i sprin gyis kun nas khebs par byin gyis brlab pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas
52b4(phal chen): pa thams cad tsan dan gyi khang pa brtsegs pa'i sprin gyis kun nas khebs par byin gyis brlab pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas pa thams cad me tog gi khang pa brtsegs pa'i sprin gyis kun nas
52b5(phal chen): khebs par byin gyis brlabs pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas pa thams cad rin po che'i khang pa brtsegs pa'i sprin gyi kun nas khebs par byin gyis brlab pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams
52b6(phal chen): 'byam klas pa thams cad rdo rje'i khang pa brtsegs pa'i sprin gyis kun nas khebs par byin gyis brlabs pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas pa thams cad gser gyi khang pa brtsegs pa'i sprin
52b7(phal chen): gyis kun nas khebs par byin gyis brlab pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas pa thams cad gos kyi khang pa brtsegs pa'i sprin gyis kun nas khebs par byin gyis brlabs pa dang / 'jig rten gyi
52b8(phal chen): khams 'byam klas pa thams cad pad mo brtsegs pa'i sprin gyis kun nas khebs par byin gyis brlab pa byed cing / mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang na ba der lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba
53a1(phal chen): der dong ste/ 'khor dang bcas pas bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas byang dang shar gyi phyogs 'tshamasu brten te/ nor bu rin po che'i khang pa brtsegs pa sgo chos kyi dbyings thams cad la mngon
53a2(phal chen): par blta ba dang / seng+ge'i khri rin po che'i rgyal po spos mtshungs pa myed pa'i pad+mo'i snying po can dag mngon par sprul nas rin po che'i khang pa'i me tog gi dra bas yongs su brgyan pa dang / rin po che'i rgyal po
53a3(phal chen): mdzod sna tshogs kyi dra ba'i cod pan bcings pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i lus su byin gyis brlabs nas skyil mo dkrung bcas te 'khod do/ /shar dang lho'i phyogs 'tshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya
53a4(phal chen): m tsho sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du myed pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi pha rol gyi 'jig rten gyi khams spos kyi sprin gyis brgyan pa'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa klu dbang gi rgyal po'i sangs
53a5(phal chen): r gyas kyi zhing nas byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi 'od 'phro ba dang ldan pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang lhan gcig
53a6(phal chen): tu bcom ldan 'das des gnang nas 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho de nas 'phags te/ nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gser gyi kha dog lta bu'i sprin gyis kun tu khyab
53a7(phal chen): par bya ba dang / nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad rin po che mtha' yas pa'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sprin gyis kun tu khyab par bya ba dang / nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad de bzhin gshegs
53a8(phal chen): pa'i mdzod spu'i kha dog gi 'od kyi dkyil 'khor sprin gyis kun tu khyab par bya ba dang / nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad ni rin po che sna tshogs kyi kha dog lta bu'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi
53b1(phal chen): sprin gyis kun tu khyab par bya ba dang / nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad pad+mo'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sprin gyis kun tu khyab par bya ba dang / nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad nor bu'i rgyal po rin po
53b2(phal chen): che'i shing gi yal ga'i dkyil 'khor lta bu'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sprin gyis kun nas khyab par bya ba dang / nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i gtsug tor lta bu'i 'od kyi
53b3(phal chen): dkyil 'khor gyis kun tu khyab par bya ba dang / nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad 'dzam bu'i chu klung gi gser gyi kha dog lta bu'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sprin gyis kun tu khyab par bya ba dang / nam mkha'i
53b4(phal chen): dbyings thams cad nyi ma'i kha dog lta bu'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sprin gyis kun tu khyab par bya ba dang / nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad zla ba dang / skar ma'i tshogs kyi kha dog lta bu'i 'od kyi dkyil
53b5(phal chen): 'khor gyi sprin gyis kun tu khyab par byed cing / mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang na ba der lhags nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste/ 'khor dang bcas pas bcom ldan 'das la
53b6(phal chen): phyag 'tshal nas/ shar dang lho'i phyogs 'tshams su brten te/ rin po che rdul dang bral zhing rnam par snang ba phun sum tshogs pa'i me tog gi khang pa brtsegs pa dang / seng ge'i khri rin po che'i
53b7(phal chen): s eng ge'i rdo rje'i pad+mo'i snying po can dag mngon par sprul nas nor bu'i rgyal po rin po che'i 'od zer rab tu 'bar ba'i dra bas yongs su brgyan pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i lus su byin gyis brlabs nas skyil
53b8(phal chen): mo dkrung bcas te 'khod do/ /lho dang nub kyi phyogs 'tshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi pha rol gyi 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che nyi
54a1(phal chen): m a rab tu snang ba'i snying po zhes bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi 'khor lo'i ye shes kun tu snang ba'i rgyal po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas byang chub sems dpa' bdud kyi dkyil 'khor thams
54a2(phal chen): cad rnam par 'thor ba'i ye shes rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho brjod du med pa rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das des gnang nas/ 'khor
54a3(phal chen): gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho de nas 'phags te/ ba spu'i bu ga thams cad nas me tog 'od 'phro ba'i sprin nam mkha'i dbyings ltar yangs pa rab tu dkye ba dang / ba spu'i bu ga thams cad nas rol mo'i 'od 'phro
54a4(phal chen): ba'i sprin nam mkha' ltar yangs pa rab tu dkye ba dang / ba spu'i bu ga thams cad nas nor bu rin po che'i 'od 'phro ba'i sprin nam mkha'i dbyings ltar yangs pa rab tu dkye ba dang / ba spu'i bu ga thams cad nas
54a5(phal chen): rin po che'i gos 'od 'phro ba'i spos dang / bdug spos sna tshogs kyi rnam par bdug pa'i sprin nam mkha'i dbyings ltar yangs pa rab tu dkye ba dang / ba spu'i bu ga thams cad nas klus rnam par sprul pa'i
54a6(phal chen): glog gi 'od 'phro ba'i sprin nam mkha'i dbyings ltar yangs pa rab tu dkye ba dang / ba spu'i bu ga thams cad nas nor bu rin po che rnam par snang ba'i 'od zer dkye ba'i sprin nam mkha'i dbyings ltar yangs pa rab tu
54a7(phal chen): dkye ba dang / ba spu'i bu ga thams cad nas nor bu rin po che gser rab tu 'bar ba 'od 'phro ba'i sprin nam mkha'i dbyings ltar yangs pa rab tu dkye ba dang / ba spu'i bu ga thams cad nas rin po che'i rgyal po
54a8(phal chen): dpal gyi snying po 'bar ba 'od 'phro ba'i dbyings ltar yangs pa rab tu dkye ba dang / ba spu'i bu ga thams cad nas nor rin po che de bzhin gshegs pa'i dgongs pa rgya mtsho ltar dus gsum gyi rgyud rab tu snang ba'i
54b1(phal chen): tshul dang ldan pa'i 'od 'phro ba'i sprin nam mkha'i dbyings ltar yangs pa rab tu dkye ba byed cing / mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang na ba der lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste/
54b2(phal chen): 'khor dang bcas pas bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas/ lho dang nub kyi phyogs 'tshams su brten te/ nor bu rin po che chen po 'od zer gyi dra ba phyogs kun nas mngon par gzhol ba'i thig les
54b3(phal chen): chos kyi dbyings thams cad du rab tu snang ba'i khang pa brtsegs pa dang / seng ge'i khri nor bu rin po che spos kyi sgron ma 'od 'phro ba'i pad+mo'i snying po can dag mngon par sprul nas/ rin po che'i rgyal po dri ma
54b4(phal chen): med pa'i snying po'i dra bas yongs su brgyan pa dang / rin po che'i rgyal po sems can thams cad rab tu 'dzud pa'i dbyangs dang ldan pa'i cod pan bcings pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i lus su byin gyis brlab
54b5(phal chen): nas skyil mo dkrung bcas te 'khod do/ /nub dang byang gi phyogs 'tshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi pha rol gyi 'jig rten gyi khams
54b6(phal chen): r nam par snang mdzad kyi snying po zhes bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa dpal gyi ri bo kun nas rnam par snang ba'i rgyal po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas byang chub sems dpa' rnam par snang ba'i smon lam ye shes dpal
54b7(phal chen): z hes bya ba byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das des gnang nas 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho de nas 'phags
54b8(phal chen): te/ mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po thams cad dang / ba spu'i sgo thams cad dang / lus thams cad nas dus gsum du de bzhin gshegs pa de thams cad kyi sku'i gzugs rnyan gyi sprin du dkye ba dang /
55a1(phal chen): mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po thams cad dang ba spu'i sgo thams cad dang / las thams cad nas dus gsum du gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku'i gzugs rnyan gyi sprin kun tu bkye ba dang / mtshan
55a2(phal chen): dang dpe byad bzang po thams cad dang / ba spu'i sgo thams cad dang / lus thams cad nas dus gsum du byung bas byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi las kyi gzugs rnyan gyi sprin kun tu bkye ba dang / mtshan
55a3(phal chen): dang dpe byad bzang po thams cad dang / ba spu'i sgo thams cad dang / lus thams cad nas dus gsum du gshegs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi
55a4(phal chen): lus kyi gzugs rnyan gyi sprin kun tu bkye ba dang / mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po thams cad dang / ba spu'i sgo thams cad dang / lus thams cad nas dus gsum du gshegs pa'i sangs
55a5(phal chen): rgyas thams cad kyi sprul pa'i tshogs kyi gzugs rnyan mang po'i sprin kun tu bkye ba dang / mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po thams cad dang / ba spu'i sgo thams cad dang / lus thams cad nas
55a6(phal chen): dus gsum du gshegs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad sngon gyi spyod pa'i gzugs rnyen mang po'i sprin kun tu bkye ba dang / mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po thams cad dang / ba spu'i
55a7(phal chen): sgo thams cad dang / lus thams cad nas dus gsum du byung ba'i nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi lus kyi gzugs rnyan rab tu bkye ba dang / mtshan dang dpe byad bzang
55a8(phal chen): po thams cad dang / ba spu'i sgo thams cad dang / lus thams cad nas dus gsum du gshegs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po byang chub dang / byang chub kyi shing gi
55b1(phal chen): gzugs kyi gzugs brnyan gyi sprin kun tu bkye ba dang / mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po thams cad dang / ba spu'i sgo thams cad dang / lus thams cad nas dus gsum du gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas
55b2(phal chen): thams cad kyi rnam par 'phrul pa'i gzugs rnyan mang po'i sprin kun tu bkye ba dang / mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po thams cad dang / ba spu'i sgo thams cad dang / lus thams cad nas dus gsum du 'byung
55b3(phal chen): ba'i 'jig rten gyi dbang po thams cad kyi lus kyi gzugs rnyan gyi sprin kun tu bkye ba dang / mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po thams cad dang / ba spu'i sgo thams cad dang / lus thams cad nas dus
55b4(phal chen): gsum du byung ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa thams cad kyi gzugs rnyan gyi sprin kun tu bkye ba dang / skad cig skad cig tu nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad rgyas par 'gengs shing mi
55b5(phal chen): mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang na ba der lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste/ 'khor dang bcas pas bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas/ nub dang byang gi phyogs
55b6(phal chen): 'tshams su brten te/ rin po che'i rgyal po phyogs kun nas rnam par snang ba'i snying po seng ge'i khri rin po che 'gro ba rnam par snang ba'i pad+mo'i snying po can dag mngon par sprul nas me tog 'od thub pa
55b7(phal chen): med pa'i 'od dra bas yongs su brgyan pa dang / rin po che 'od kun tu snang ba'i cod pan bcings pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i lus su byin gyis brlabs nas bskyil mo dkrung bcas te 'khod do/ /'og
55b8(phal chen): g i phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi pha rol gyi 'jig rten gyi khams de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'od kyi dkyil 'khor rnam par
56a1(phal chen): s nang ba zhes bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes nam mkha' lta bur chags pa myed pa'i dpal rgyal mtshan rgyal po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par
56a2(phal chen): ' thor ba'i ye shes kyi rnam par rol pa zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho brjod du myed pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das des gnang nas 'khor gyi
56a3(phal chen): dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho de nas 'phags te/ ba spu'i bu ga thams cad nas 'gro ba thams cad kyi skad dang sgra dang dbyangs dang nges pa'i tshig mngon par bsgrub pa rgya mtsho rab tu brjod pa dang / dus gsum
56a4(phal chen): gyi byang chub sems dpa' thams cad 'byung ba'i tshul rgya mtsho'i sprin gyi 'brug sgra rab tu bsgrag pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi smon lam mngon par bsgrub pa'i tshul rgya mtsho'i dbyangs
56a5(phal chen): rab tu bsgrag pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i tshul rgya mtsho'i sprin gyi sgra rab tu bsgrag pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi spyod pa'i
56a6(phal chen): dkyil 'khor zhing thams cad du rgyas par 'gengs pa'i tshul rgya mtsho'i dbyangs rab tu bsgrag pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi yang dag par bsgrub pa dang / rnam par 'phrul pa'i tshul
56a7(phal chen): rgya mtsho'i dbyangs rab tu bsgrag pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad snying po byang chub tu gshegs pa bdud kyi dkrugs ma rnam par 'thor ba dang / snying po byang chub tu rnam par 'tshang rgya ba dang /
56a8(phal chen): rnam par 'phrul pa mdzad pa'i dbyangs rgya mtsho rab tu bsgrag pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang / mdo sde'i tshul dang ming rgya mtsho'i dbyangs kyi sprin gyi 'brug
56b1(phal chen): sgra bsgrag pa dang / 'gro ba 'dug pa thams cad dus la bab pa'i 'khor los 'dul ba'i chos kyi tshul dang thabs kyi sgra rab tu bsgrag pa dang / ye shes thams cad khong du chud par bya ba'i phyir smon
56b2(phal chen): lam ji ltar btab pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba'i khyad par dang dus dang thabs dang / chos kyi tshul rgya mtsho'i dbyangs rab tu bsgrag par byed cing / myi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang na ba der lhags nas/ bcom
56b3(phal chen): ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste/ 'khor dang bcas pas bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas/ 'og gi phyogs su brten te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gzhal myed khang gzugs brnyan
56b4(phal chen): rab tu snang ba rin po che sna tshogs thams cad kyi mdzod khang pa brtsegs pa dang / seng ge'i khri rin po che thams cad kyi gzugs kyi pad mo'i snying po yongs su gzungs ba dag mngon par sprul nas/
56b5(phal chen): rin po che'i snying po byang chub thams cad kyi gzugs brnyan rab tu snang ba'i rgyal mtshan gyi gcod pan mgo la bcings pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i lus su byin gyis brlab nas/ skyil mo dkrung
56b6(phal chen): bcas te 'khod do/ /steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du myed pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi pha rol gyi 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi rigs mi zad
56b7(phal chen): p a shin tu ston pa zhes bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor kun tu snang ba'i dbyangs kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi dbyings kyi smon lam gyi gzhi rab tu
56b8(phal chen): rtogs pa zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho brjod du myed pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang / lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das des gnang
57a1(phal chen): nas/ 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho de nas 'phags te/ mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po thams cad dang / ba spu'i sgo thams cad dang / lus thams cad dang / yan lag dang nying lag thams cad dang /
57a2(phal chen): tshig gi lam thams cad dang / gos dang smad yog thams cad nas byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor thams cad dang / bdag dang bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad dang / sngon gyi mtha'i mur thug pa'i
57a3(phal chen): de bzhin gshegs pa 'das pa thams cad dang / phyi ma'i mtha'i mur thug pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa lung bstan pa dang / lung ma bstan pa ma byon pa thams cad dang / da ltar byung ba phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas
57a4(phal chen): kyi zhing 'byam klas pa thams cad na bzhugs pa rnams kyi sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mdzad pa dang ldan pa'i sngon gyi sbyor ba rgya mtsho dang / len pa dang sbyin pa'i dngos po thams cad kyi gzugs brnyan dang mtshan
57a5(phal chen): dang dpe byad bzang po dang / ba spu'i sgo dang lus thams cad dang / yan lag dang nying lag dang tshig gi lam dang gos dang smad yogs thams cad la rab tu snang bar rnam par bstan pa dang / tshul khrims kyi
57a6(phal chen): pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad dang ldan pa'i sngon gyi sbyor ba rgya mtsho dag kyang rab tu snang bar yongs su bstan pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i yan lag dang nying lag thams cad
57a7(phal chen): thub pa rab tu bstan pa dang ldan pa'i sngon gyi sbyor ba rgya mtsho rab tu snang bar gyur pa yongs su bstan pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi brtson 'grus dang drag shul dang / rnam par gnon
57a8(phal chen): pa dang ldan pa'i sngon gyi sbyor ba rgya mtsho rab tu snang bar gyur pa yongs su bstan pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bsam gtan rgya mtsho yongs su tshol zhing rab tu bsgrub pa dang ldan pa'i
57b1(phal chen): sngon gyi sbyor ba rgya mtsho rab tu snang bar gyur pa yongs su bstan pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i tshul yongs su bsgrub cing / chos yongs su tshol ba dang ldan pa dang /
57b2(phal chen): bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtong zhing shin tu zhe non pa'i lus dang po'i gzugs brnyan rnam par dmigs par bya bas sngon gyi sbyor ba rgya mtsho rab tu snang bar gyur pa yongs su bstan pa
57b3(phal chen): dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mthong zhing dga' ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi lam la 'gro ba thams cad mngon par mos par byed pa dang ldan pa'i sngon gyi sbyor ba rgya mtsho rab tu snang bar
57b4(phal chen): gyur pa yongs su bstan pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi smon lam rgya mtsho mngon par bsgrub pa'i sgo yongs su dag pa'i rgyan dang ldan pa'i sngon gyi sbyor ba rgya mtsho rab tu snang bar gyur pa yongs su
57b5(phal chen): bstan pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi stobs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rab tu grub pa dang / rnam par dman pa dang / rnam par dag par byas pa dang ldan pa'i sngon gyi sbyor ba rgya mtsho rab tu snang bar
57b6(phal chen): gyur pa yongs su bstan pa dang / chos kyi dbyings rgya chen po rnam par 'phrul pa thams cad kyi sprin gyis rgyas par bkang ste/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor dang ldan
57b7(phal chen): pa'i sngon gyi sbyor ba rgya mtsho rab tu snang bar gyur pa yongs su bstan pa byed cing / myi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang na ba der lhag nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga na ba der dong ste/ 'khor dang
57b8(phal chen): bcas pas bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas/ steng gi phyogs su brten te/ rdo rje'i dbang po sna tshogs thams cad kyis rgyan gyi snying po can gyi khang pa brtsegs pa dang / seng+ge'i khri rdo rje dang /
58a1(phal chen): in dra nI la'i pad+mo'i snying po can dag mngon par sprul nas nor bu'i rgyal po rin po che thams cad rab tu 'bar ba'i dra bas kun nas brgyan pa dang / rin po che'i rgyal po dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i
58a2(phal chen): mtshan dbyangs su sgrog pa'i phreng ba rab tu 'phyang ba dang / mgo la rin po che'i cod pan thogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i lus su byin gyis rlabs nas skyil mo krung bcas te 'khod do// //
58a3(phal chen): sangs rgyas rmad ga cad ces bya ba shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo/ bam po lnga pa/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang 'khor dang bcas par byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa dang smon lam
58a4(phal chen): gyis byung ba de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi zhabs kyi drung nas zhal du lta ba/ ye shes yongs su dag pa'i myig dang ldan pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khor lo dang / mdo sde'i tshul gyis
58a5(phal chen): gsung rgya mtsho la rna ba yongs su gzhol ba/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi dbang rab tu thob par bya ba la dam pa'i pha rol tu bgrod par phyin pa'i mchog thob pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
58a6(phal chen): kyi drung du 'dong ba/ skad cig skad cig tu yongs su bstan par rnam par 'phrul pas byung ba/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad lus gcig gis rgyas par dgang ba'i lus dang ldan pa/ de bzhin gshegs
58a7(phal chen): pa thams cad kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du lus mngon par 'byung zhing rnam par snang ba/ rdul shin tu phra ba gcig la 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad khams gcig tu snang zhing khongasu chud par yang dag par
58a8(phal chen): ston pa'i lus dang ldan pa 'gro ba thams cad yongs su smyin par bya ba dang / 'dul ba'i dus la sdod par gzhol ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khor lo'i sprin gyi 'brug sgra ba spu'i
58b1(phal chen): bu ga thams cad nas rab tu sgrog pa'i yul dang ldan pa/ sems can gyi khams thams cad sgyu ma lta bur yongs su shes pa rab tu thob pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mig yor lta bur khong du chud
58b2(phal chen): pa/ srid pa'i rgyud du skye ba thams cad rmi lam lta bu shes par byung ba las dang rnam par smyin pa thams cad gzugs rnyan lta bur shes pas rnam par dag pa/ ye shes mngon par grub pa thams cad smig rgyu
58b3(phal chen): lta bur mngon par shes pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas pa thams cad sprul pa lta bur khong du chud pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang ye shes kyi snang ba rab tu thob pa/ mi 'jigs pa'i
58b4(phal chen): khyu mchog dang / seng ge'i nga ros rnam par gnon pa/ so so yang dag par rig pa myi zad pa'i rgya mtshor zhugs pa/ 'gro ba thams cad kyi skad rgya mtshor zhugs pa/ chos kyi nges pa'i tshig gi ye
58b5(phal chen): shes rab tu thob pa/ chos kyi dbyings nam mkha' ltar chags pa med pa'i ye shes kyi spyod yul dang ldan pa/ chos thams cad la sgrib pa med pa'i ye shes rab tu thob pa/ byang chub sems dpa'
58b6(phal chen): thams cad kyi mngon par shes pa la ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor rnam par dag pa bdud kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad rnam par dkrug pa'i brtson 'grus dang ldan pa/ dus gsum thams cad shes pa'i stobs
58b7(phal chen): la rab tu gnas pa/ chos thams cad la ye shes sgrib pa med pa rab tu thob pa/ gnas myed pas nam mkha'i spyod yul dang ldan pa/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i sa len pa myed pa/ nam mkha'
58b8(phal chen): lta bu'i brtson 'grus dang ldan pa/ srid pa thams cad myi dmyigs pa'i ye shes kyi spyod yul can/ chos kyi dbyings thams cad kyi tshul rgya mtsho la zhugs pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad
59a1(phal chen): tha myi dad pa'i ye shes kyi sgor zhugs pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad gcig nas gcig tu gzung ba'i rnam par 'phrul pas byung ba dang 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud thams cad du skyes pa'i lus
59a2(phal chen): yongs su ston pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi dbyibs phra ba dang / rgya che ba dang yangs pa dang / dog pa sna tshogs rab tu rtogs pa shin tu phra zhing rgya chen po yang dag par gzud pa'i ye shes khong du chud pa/
59a3(phal chen): dmyigs pa rgya chen po shin tu phra bar shes pa dang ldan pa/ sangs rgyas thams cad dang sems kyi skad cig la 'grogs pa rab tu thob pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyis rlabs kyi ye shes
59a4(phal chen): kyi lus dang ldan pa/ phyogs rgya mtsho thams cad du mgo rmongs pa myed pa'i ye shes rab tu thob pa sems kyi skad cig gis phyogs rgya mtsho thams cad du rnam par 'phrul pas rgyas par 'gengs pa sha stag
59a5(phal chen): ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyis rlabs kyis de lta bu'i yon tan tshad myed pa dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sha stag gis dze ta'i tshal thams cad yongs su rgyas par gyur kyang / nyan
59a6(phal chen): thos chen po shA ri'i bu dang / mo'u gal gyi bu dang 'od srungs chen po dang / nam 'gru dang rab 'byor dang / 'gag med dang / mos pa dang / ka ta'i bu dang / byams gang gi bu la stsogs pas dze ta'i tshal
59a7(phal chen): na 'khod bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa de dag ma mthong ngo / /sangs rgyas kyi bkod pa de dag dang / sangs rgyas kyi khyu mchog gi mthu dang / sangs rgyas kyi rnam par rol pa dang /
59a8(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyi cho 'phrul dang / sangs rgyas kyi mnga' chen po dang / sangs rgyas sbyong ba'i rnam par 'phrul pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang / sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis rlabs dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su
59b1(phal chen): dag pa yang ma mthong ngo / /byang chub sems dpa'i yul bsam gyis mi khyab pa de dag dang / byang chub sems dpa' kun nas 'ongs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' kun nas 'dus pa dang / byang chub sems
59b2(phal chen): dpa' kun nas tshogs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' nye bar 'ongs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par 'phrul pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i cho 'phrul dang / byang chub sems dpa'i
59b3(phal chen): 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dang / byang chub sems dpa'i phyogs su 'khod pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i seng ge'i khri bkod pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i khang pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par
59b4(phal chen): spyod pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis rnam par brtse ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par lta ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par bsgyings pa dang byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par gnon pa
59b5(phal chen): dang byang chub sems dpa'i de bzhin gshegs pa mchod pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i lung bstan pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i yongs su smin par gyur pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sngon du 'dor ba dang /
59b6(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa'i chos kyi lus rnam par dag pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes kyi lus yongs su rdzogs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam gyi lus rnam par dmigs pa dang / byang chub
59b7(phal chen): sems dpa'i gzugs kyi lus yongasu grub pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i mtshan phun sum tshogs pa yongasu dag pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor kha dog mtha' yas pa'i bkod pa dang /
59b8(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa'i 'od zer gyi dra ba rab tu 'gyed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sprul pa'i sprin kun tu 'gyed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i phyogs kyi dra ba rgyas par 'gengs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'
60a1(phal chen): spyod pa'i dkyil 'khor rnam par sprul pa yang ma mthong ngo / /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dge ba'i rtsa ba mi mtshungs pa'i phyir te/ de dag gis ni sngon sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa mthong ba'i rgyur 'gyur ba'i
60a2(phal chen): dge ba'i rtsa ba ma bstsagaso/ /de dag la ni sngon sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams su gtogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi yon tan dang / bkod pa
60a3(phal chen): yongs su dag pa yang dag par bstan pa ma mdzad do/ /de dag la ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa yang dag par brjod pa ma mdzad do/ /de dag gi ni sngon 'khor ba na
60a4(phal chen): 'khor ba'i tshe sems can rnams/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par bskul ba ma byas so/ /de dag gis ni gzhan gyi sems kyi rgyud la byang chub tu sems bskyed pa rab tu bzhag
60a5(phal chen): pa ma byas so/ /de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i gdung rgyun myi gcad pa'i phyir zhugs pa ma yin no/ /de dag ni sems can thams cad yongs su bsdu ba'i phyir brtson pa ma yin no/ /de dag gis ni byang chub sems
60a6(phal chen): dpa' rnams pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par bskul ba ma byas so/ /de dag gis ni sngon 'khor ba na 'khor ba'i tshe/ 'gro ba thams cad las khyad par du 'phags pa'i ye shes kyi sa la dmigs par ma
60a7(phal chen): byas so/ /de dag gis ni thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'gyur ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba nye bar bstsags pa ma byas so/ /de dag gis ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba yongasu ma
60a8(phal chen): bsgrubs so/ /de dag gis ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa thams cad du rnam par 'phrul pa'i mngon par shes pa khong du ma chud do/ /de dag gis ni byang chub sems dpa'i mig gi lam gyi rnam par dmigs
60b1(phal chen): par bya ba 'jig rten las 'das pa thun mong ma yin pa'i byang chub tu dmigs pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam chen po las byung ba khong du ma chud do/ /nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kun gyis ni
60b2(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa'i 'du shes sna tshogs yongs su 'dzin lags kyis/ rnam par dmigs pa thun mong ma yin pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyis rlab las byung ba'i sgyu ma'i rnam pa'i chos nyid kyi grub pa/
60b3(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' 'du shes sna tshogs yongasu 'dzin pa byin gyis rlob pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i dge ba'i shugs chen po rnam par 'phel bar byed pa khong du ma chud do/ /de bas na nyan thos chen po mchog gi
60b4(phal chen): gzung dang / bzang po'i gzung la sogs pa de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa de mi mthong mi thos so/ /mi shes so/ /khong du mi chud do/ /mi rtogaso/ /mi rig go/ /yid mi ches so/ /mi sems so/ /
60b5(phal chen): rnam par myi lta'o/ /rtogs par mi lta'o/ /nges par mi sems so/ /nye bar mi sems so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni sangs rgyas kyi spyod yul te nyan thos kyi spyod yul ma yin no/ /de bas na nyan thos chen po de dag
60b6(phal chen): dze ta'i tshal de nyid na 'khod kyang / sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa de dag mi mthong ngo / de dag la de dang 'thun pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba med do/ /de dag gis sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa de dag mthong du
60b7(phal chen): de lta bu'i ye shes kyi myig rnam par ma dag go/ /dmyigs pa chung ngu la rgya chen po'i byin gyis rlabs kyis 'jug tu ting nge 'dzin de lta bu med do/ /de dag shes pa dang / khong du chud par bya ba 'am/ rtogs par
60b8(phal chen): bya ba 'am/ rgyas par dgang par bya ba 'am/ 'jug par bya ba 'am/ rnam par lta ba 'am/ nyams su myong bar bya ba 'am/ gnan pa 'am/ rnam par gnan pa 'am/ gzhan gyis thos par bya ba 'am/
61a1(phal chen): bstan par bya ba 'am/ smos par bya ba 'am/ yang dag par bstan par bya ba 'am/ bstabs par bya ba 'am/ sbyin par bya ba 'am/ de la sems can rnams yongs su bskul bar bya ba 'am/ sbyar bar
61a2(phal chen): bya ba 'am/ rab tu 'god par bya ba 'am/ sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa'i chos nyid la sems can dgod par bya bar yang de dag la de lta bu'i rnam par thar pa myed do/ /de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul med do/ /de lta bu'i khyu
61a3(phal chen): mchog gi mthu med do/ /de lta bu'i stobs med do/ /de lta bu'i gnas med do/ /de lta bu'i 'du shes med do/ /de lta bu'i myig gi mthu med do/ /de lta bu'i ye shes med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de dag ni de ltar nyan thos kyi theg
61a4(phal chen): pa las byung ba nyan thos kyi lam gyis yongs su grub pa/ nyan thos kyi spyod pa'i dkyil 'khor yongs su rdzogs pa/ nyan thos kyi 'bras bu la gnas pa/ bden pa snang ba shes pas nges par rtog pa/ yang dag pa'i
61a5(phal chen): mtha' la gnas pa/ shin tu zhi ba'i mthar thug pa/ snying rje chen po'i bsam pa med pa/ 'jig rten thams cad la myi lta mi sdod pa/ rang gi don grub pa dag ste/ de dag ni dze ta'i tshal de nyid du kun nas 'dus te
61a6(phal chen): 'khod la/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga dang g.yas g.yon dang / snam na bcom ldan 'das la mngon du lta bar gnas kyang / dze ta'i tshal der sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa de dag mthong bar ma gyur to/ /
61a7(phal chen): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ thams cad mkhyen pa yang dag par ma bsgrub pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes yang dag par ma bsdus pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la yang dag par ma zhugs pa dang /
61a8(phal chen): thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la smon lam yang dag par ma btab pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes mngon par ma bsgrub pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes yongasu ma bsgoms pa dang /
61b1(phal chen): thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes ma sbyangs pa de dag gis ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rnam par 'phrul pa de la 'jug cing rtogs par bya ba 'am/ blta zhing khong du chud par bya bar mi nus so/ /
61b2(phal chen): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' rigs dang ldan pa rnams kyi mig gi lam gyis blta ba yin gyis/ nyan thos kyi myig gi blta ba ma yin no/ /de bas na nyan thos chen po de dag dze ta'i tshal
61b3(phal chen): de nyid na 'khod kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongasu dag pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' kun nas 'dus pa yang mthong bar ma
61b4(phal chen): gyur to/ /de 'ang 'di lta ste dper na/ gang ga'i chu klung chen po'i ngogs pha rol tshur rol du yi dags bkres pa dang / skom pas rab tu mnan pa gcer bu/ gos myed pa/ lus kyi mdog dang kha dog tshig cing mtshungs
61b5(phal chen): pa rlung dang nyi mas bskams pa/ bya rog mang pos gtses ba/ spyang ku dang / was tho btsam pa/ brgya stong mang po kun nas 'dus kyang / gang ga'i chu klung chen po myi mthong ste/ sgrib pa'i las gyi sgrib pa'i
61b6(phal chen): phyir la las ni bskams te chu med par mthong ngo / /la las ni thal bas yongs su gang bar mthong ngo / /de bzhin du nyan thos chen po gnas brtan de dag dze ta'i tshal de nyid na 'khod kyang thams cad
61b7(phal chen): mkhyen pa nyid dang mi 'thun pa'i phyogs ma rig pa'i ling thog gis myig kun nas khebs pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sa yis dge ba'i rtsa ba'i mthus yongasu ma bzung ba'i phyir/ de bzhin
61b8(phal chen): gshegs pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa de dag ma mthong ma shes so/ /'di lta ste dper na 'dun ma chen po 'dus pa'i skye bo mang po'i dbus su myi la la zhig gnyid kyi myos te/ log par gyur nas de gnyid kyis
62a1(phal chen): log pa'i rmyi lam du gnas te de nyid na lha'i grong brdal brgya byin gyi gnas blta na mdzes pa dang / ri rab kyi steng shing dang bcas pa/ bza' shing gi ra ba'i 'khor dang bcas pa/ lha'i bu mo bye ba khrag khrig
62a2(phal chen): brgya stong gis gang ba/ lha'i bu khrag khrig brgya phrag stong snyed gnas pa na lha'i me tog sna tshogs kyis yongs su gang ba dang / yid bzhin gyi shing lha rdzas kyi gos dang mu tig gi phreng ba dang / rin po che'i rgyan dang /
62a3(phal chen): se mo do sna tshogs mang po 'byin pa dang / lha rdzas kyi sil snyan rnam pa sna tshogs rlung gis yongs su bskyod cing sgra dbyangs yid du 'ong la snyan pa 'byin pa'i sil snyan gyi shing mang po dang / dga' ba'i rtse mo
62a4(phal chen): bkod pa rnam pa sna tshogs mthong bar gyur la/ lha'i bu mo mang pos glu blangs pa dang / lha rdzas kyi rol mo byas pa'i sgra yid du 'ong zhing snyan pa thos par gyur to/ /bdag nyid kyang de na 'dug pa snyam byed la/
62a5(phal chen): lha rdzas kyi bkod pas klubs pa'i gnas de dag thams cad mthong bar gyur kyang / skye bo'i tshogs mang po de dag gis gnas de nyid na 'khod bzhin du mi mthong / ye shes khong du mi chud do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/
62a6(phal chen): de ni skyes bu gnyid kyi log pa de nyid kyi rmi lam gyis blta ba yin gyi/ gnas de nyid na 'khod kyang skye bo mang po de dag gis blta ba ma yin no/ /de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang / 'jig rten gyi
62a7(phal chen): dbang po byang chub la mngon par mos pa de dag sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs rgya chen po dang / rang gi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i stobs ma nor bar shin tu bstsags pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du smon lam shin tu mngon
62a8(phal chen): par bsgrub pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan thams cad la shin tu zhugs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i lam bkod pa chen po dang ldan pa la shin tu gnas pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi chos
62b1(phal chen): nyid dang / yan lag rnam pa thams cad du shin tu rdzogs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa'i khyad par dang / smon lam yongs su rdzogs par bya ba rnam par dag pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i
62b2(phal chen): sa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor yongs su gnon pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis rnam par spyod pa thams cad la rnam par rtse ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes kyi spyod yul thams
62b3(phal chen): cad la chags pa myed par rnam par spyod pas bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i sangs rgyas kyi khyu mchog gi mthu phyung ba de dag dang / sangs rgyas kyi rnam par rol pa de dag mthong zhing khong du chud la nyamasu myong bar gyur kyang /
62b4(phal chen): nyan thos chen po mchog gi zung dang / bzang po'i zung la stsogs pa de dag la byang chub sems dpa'i myig myed pas mthong bar ma gyur shes par ma gyur to/ /'di lta ste dper na/ ri'i rgyal po kha ba can sman
62b5(phal chen): gyi 'byung gnas kyis gang ba la sngags dang / rig sngags dang / sman gyi tshul dang / blang ba'i rgyus shes shing rig sngags grub pa'i skyes bu gnas pa/ sman gyi cho ga thams cad shes pa sman blang ba'i las
62b6(phal chen): byed kyang / ri bo'i dbang po de nyid la gnas pa'i phyugs dang / ba lang dang ra lug 'tsho ba dang / rngon pa dang de ma yin pa'i myi sman gyi tshul myi shes pa gzhan dag gis/ sman de dag gi cho ga dang / sman gyi ro dang mthu
62b7(phal chen): dang yon tan dang byin dang / thabs dang 'phrod pa mi shes so/ /de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyi yul la zhugs pa byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par 'phrul pa'i yul gyi
62b8(phal chen): byung ba/ de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rnam par 'phrul pa'i yul de dag mthong yang nyan thos chen po mchog gi zung dang / bzang po'i zung la stsogs pa rang gi dgos pas tshim par
63a1(phal chen): gyur pa/ gzhan gyi dgos pa yal bar gzhog pa/ btang snyoms can de dag dze ta'i tshal de nyid na gnas kyang / tshe 'di la bde bar spyod pas bde zhing dga' bar gnas pa/ las phar de bzhin gshegs
63a2(phal chen): pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rnam par 'phrul pa'i yul de dag khong du mi chud do/ /'di lta ste dper na/ sa chen po rin po che thams cad kyi 'byung gnas phun sum tshogs pa/ gter brgya stong du mas gang ba rin po che
63a3(phal chen): sna tshogs rnam pa tha dad pas yongs su gang ba 'di la'ang rin po che'i 'byung gnas dang / gter gyi rgyus la mkhas shing byang ba'i myi rin po che brtag pa'i gtsug lag gis blo shin tu byang ba gter gyi gtsug
63a4(phal chen): lag dang rgyus dang / dan rtags gya nom par lob pa/ bsod nams rgya chen po'i stobs kyis brten pa de dag de las rin po che ci 'dod par blangs shing / bdag kyang yongasu tshim par byed pa dang / pha dang ma la'ang legs
63a5(phal chen): par rim gror byed/ bu pho smos kyang legs par gso bar byed cing / de ma yin pa'i sems can rgan pa dang / na ba dang / dbul ba dang / nyam nyes pa dang / kha zas dang / gos kyis myi 'byor pa rnams la
63a6(phal chen): sdud cing khyab par bgo bsha' byed la/ nor gyi dga' ba sna tshogs nyams su myong bar byed kyang / sems can rin po che'i 'byung gnas dang / gter gyi rgyus myi shes pa bsod nams ma byas pa/
63a7(phal chen): rin po che la shes pa'i myig yongs su ma dag pa/ de dag de nyid ni 'khod kyang / rin po che'i 'byung gnas dang / rin po che'i gter de dag khong du myi chud myi shes pas rin po che'ang blang du med do/ /rin po
63a8(phal chen): che'i don kyang byar med do/ /de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul bsam gyis myi khyab pa la ye shes kyi myig shin tu rnam par dag pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i
63b1(phal chen): ye shes kyi yul bsam gyis mi khyab pa la zhugs pa/ de dag dze ta'i tshal na 'khod cing sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa de dag mthong la chos kyi tshul rgya mtsho la 'jug cing ting nge 'dzin gyi phyag rgya
63b2(phal chen): yongasu bsgrub ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod pa dang / rim gro la brtson zhing dam pa'i chos yongasu bzung ba la mngon par brtson te/ bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhis sems can de dag yongasu sdud kyang / nyan thos chen po
63b3(phal chen): de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa de dag dang / byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs chen po kun nas 'dus pa de lta bu'ang ma mthong ma shes so/ /'di lta ste dper na/ skyes bu la la zhig
63b4(phal chen): myig gnyis gos kyis bkab ste/ rin po che'i gling du phyin par gyur na/ des rin po che'i gling der phan tshun 'gro ba dang / 'greng ba dang 'dug pa dang nyal ba byas kyang rin po che'i 'byung gnas de mi mthong ngo / /
63b5(phal chen): rin po che'i shing dang gos kyi rin po che dang / spos rin po che dang / rin po che thams cad kyang mi mthong la/ rin po che de dag gi spyod yul lam/ rin thang ngam/ yongs su spyod pa'i rgyus kyang mi shes pas/ de ni rin po
63b6(phal chen): che de dag len kyang mi len la/ rin po che'i don kyang nyams su myong bar myi byed do/ /gang gi mig la sgrib pa med pa de dag gis ni de dag thams cad mthong zhing shes so/ /de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' chos rin
63b7(phal chen): po che'i gling chen por phyin pa de dag gis bla na med pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rgyan tu gyur pa mngon du gyur te/ dze ta'i tshal na bzhugs shing sangs rgyas kyi rnam par
63b8(phal chen): 'phrul pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa yongs su ston pa mthong yang nyan thos chen po de dag / de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs kyi drung de nyid na gnas shing spyod kyang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin
64a1(phal chen): gyi yul rnam par 'phrul pa'i cho 'phrul de dag ma mthong ngo / /byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs mang po de lta bu'i rin po che'i 'byung gnas chen po yang mthong bar ma gyur to/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/
64a2(phal chen): de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi khyu mchog gi mthu phyung ba dang / cho 'phrul bsam gyis mi khyab pa de dag ltar thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi mi 'thun pa'i phyogs kyi ma rig pa'i gos kyis
64a3(phal chen): ye shes kyi myig bkab pa de dag la byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes kyi mig yongs su dag pa de lta bu med do/ /de dag gis chos kyi dbyings gcig nas gcig tu rgyud pa la 'jug pa de lta bu khong du mi chud do/ /
64a4(phal chen): 'di lta ste dper na/ mig yongs su dag pa rdul dang bral bas rab tu snang ba dang ldan pa zhes bya ba rab rib dang / mun pa thams cad dang mi 'grogs pa yod de/ de myi la la zhig gis thob par gyur na/ de rdul dang
64a5(phal chen): bral bas rab tu snang ba dang ldan pa'i mig yongs su dag pa dang ldan pas mtshan mo mun pa'i mun nag shin tu gnag par gyur pa'i nang na sems can bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong kun nas 'dus pa dang / cho ga
64a6(phal chen): dang spyod lam rnam pa sna tshogs dang ldan zhing mun pa'i rab rib kyis mig yongs su 'khrug par gyur pa myi'i khrod na 'dug cing rnam par rgyu la phan tshun 'gro ba dang / 'greng ba dang spyod lam rnam pa sna tshogs
64a7(phal chen): kyis spyod kyang mi de dag gis skyes bu spyod lam sna tshogs kyi spyod pa de mi mthong mi shes so/ /skyes bu des ni 'gro ba'i tshogs chen po spyod lam dang tshogs sna tshogs kyis rnam par spyod pa/ phyogs
64a8(phal chen): tha dad du mngon par bltas pa/ dbyibs kyi rnam pa tha dad pa kha dog gi rnam pa tha dad pa dmigs pa'i tshul tha dad pa thams cad kyang mi mthong ba myed do/ /de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub sems
64b1(phal chen): dpa'i tshogs kyi 'khor mnga' ba/ rnam par dag cing chags pa mi mnga' ba'i spyan dang ldan pas 'jig rten thams cad mkhyen cing gzigs te/ sangs rgyas kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi rnam par 'phrul pa dang cho 'phrul
64b2(phal chen): chen po bstan pa mdzad kyang / nyan thos chen po de dag gi de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes dang ting nge 'dzin gyis rnam par sprul pa'i cho 'phrul chen po de dag mthong bar ma gyur to/ /byang chub sems dpa'
64b3(phal chen): sems dpa' chen po'i tshogs chen po de lta bu yang mthong bar ma gyur to/ /'di lta ste dper na/ dge slong la la zhig skye bo mang po'i tshogs kyi dbus su sas khyab pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pa 'am/
64b4(phal chen): chus khyab pa 'am/ mes khyab pa 'am/ rlung gis khyab pa 'am/ sngon pos khyab pa 'am/ ser pos khyab pa 'am/ dmar pos khyab pa dang / dkar pos khyab pa 'am/ lhas khyab pa 'am/ sems can sna tshogs kyi
64b5(phal chen): lus kyis khyab pa 'am/ sgra dbyangs kun gyi khyab pa 'am/ dmigs pa thams cad kyi khyab pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs na 'gro ba mang po'i tshogs de dag gi chu'i phung po de mi mthong ngo / /me'i
64b6(phal chen): snang ba de yang mi snang ngo / /sems can sna tshogs kyi lus kyis khyab pa dang / dmyigs pa thams cad kyi khyab pa'i bar du yang mi mthong ste/ ting nge 'dzin de la snyoms par zhugs shing rnam par spyod
64b7(phal chen): pa rnams ni ma gtogaso/ /de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas sangs rgyas kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi yul gyi rnam par sprul pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa de dag yongasu bstan pa mdzad na nyan thos chen po
64b8(phal chen): de dag gi mthong zhing shes par ma gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa'i lam la zhugs pa de dag gis ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul de dag mthong ngo / /khong du chud do 'di lta ste dper na/
65a1(phal chen): sku 'grub pa'i myi ni mig gnyis bskus ma thag tu/ skye bo mang po thams cad kyi lus mi mthong ngo / /des ni 'gro 'am 'dug gam/ 'greng yang rung ste/ 'gro ba mang po thams cad mthong ngo / /de bzhin du
65a2(phal chen): de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten las 'das par 'gro ba thams cad kyi yul las yongasu 'das pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi yul du zhugs pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes kyi mig gi
65a3(phal chen): shes par bya ba des 'gro ba thams cad gzigs kyang nyan thos chen po de dag gi de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa de dag ma mthong ngo / /'di lta ste dper na/ myi'i tsher 'grogs pa'i lha rtag tu rjesu
65a4(phal chen): 'brang ba ni/ des myi de mthong yang myis lha de mi mthong ngo / /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi yul la zhugs pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kun nas 'dus pa chen po'i dbusu
65a5(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa chen po yongasu bstan pa mdzad kyang / nyan thos chen po de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa dang / cho 'phrul chen po dang byang chub sems dpa'i dkyil
65a6(phal chen): 'khor gyi rnam par 'phrul pa de dag kyang ma mthong ngo / /ma shes so/ /'di lta ste dper na/ dge slong sems can thams cad la dbang dam pa'i pha rol tu bgrod par phyin pa'i 'du shes dang tshor ba 'gog
65a7(phal chen): pa la snyoms par zhugs pa ni shes pa med la tshor ba med pas dbang po drug gi kyang bya ba gang yang nyams su mi myong ste/ mya ngan las 'das pa'ang ma yin la 'jig rten gyi tha snyad thams cad gnas de
65a8(phal chen): yod kyang snyoms par zhugs pa de nyid kyi byin gyis rlabs pa dang mthus des mi shes myi mthong ngo / /de bzhin du nyan thos chen po de dag dze ta'i tshal de na'ang rnam par spyod la de dag la dbang po drug kyang yod de/ de bzhin
65b1(phal chen): gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rnam par 'phrul pa dang khyu mchog gi mthu phyung ba dang / cho 'phrul de dag mthong bar ma gyur/ khong du chud par ma gyur shes par ma gyur to/ /byang chub sems dpa'i
65b2(phal chen): cho 'phrul chen po de dag dang / byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par 'phrul pa de dag kyang khong du ma chud ma mthong ma shes so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sangs rgyas kyi yul ni zab cing yangs la tshad med de/ blta bar
65b3(phal chen): dka' zhing rtogs par dka' ste/ khong du chud par dka' la 'jig rten thams cad las yongasu 'das pa'o/ /sangs rgyas kyi yul ni bsam gyis mi khyab ste/ nyan thos dang / sangs rgyas thams cad
65b4(phal chen): kyi myi 'dus pa'o/ /de bas na nyan thos chen po de dag dze ta'i tshal de nyid na 'khod cing / bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs kyi drung na spyod kyang sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa de dag dang byang chub sems dpa'i
65b5(phal chen): tshogs chen po de dag kyang ma mthong ngo / /dze ta'i tshal 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa rnam par dag pa'i yon tan dang / rgyan yongasu 'dus pa de 'ang ma mthong ma shes so/ /
65b6(phal chen): de ni snod du ma gyur pa'i phyir ro/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' rnam par snang mdzad kyis smon lam gyi gtsug gi 'od zer rab tu snang bas sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis rlabs kyis de'i tshe tshigasu bcad pa
65b7(phal chen): 'di dag smras so/ /ltos shig sems can dam pa yi/ /sangs rgyas byang chub bsam mi khyab/ /rgyal bas sangs rgyas rnam 'phrul pa/ dze ta'i tshal chen 'dir bstan to/ /rang byung rnams kyi byin
65b8(phal chen): gyis rlabs/ /bgrang du med par 'byung ba la/ /sangs rgyas chos tshul mi shes pa'i/ /'jig rten kun kyang mgo rmongs so/ /chos kyi rgyal po'i cho 'phrul dag /tshad med bsam gyis mi
66a1(phal chen): khyab cing / /shin tu zab pa 'byung ba ni/ /de la 'jig rten 'bab mi nus/ /rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kha dog mdog /mtshan gyis shin tu rnam par klubs/ /yang dag sangs rgyas bskyed pa
66a2(phal chen): yis/ /chos rab de dag mtshan nyid myed/ /rnam 'phrul mtha' dang dbus myed pa/ /tshig gi lam gyis rjod dka' ba'i/ /rnam 'phrul shin tu zab pa dag /rgyal bas dze ta'i tshal du bstan/ /
66a3(phal chen): rgyal sras bdag nyid che ba'i rnams/ /zhing rnams bsam yas bye ba nas/ /rgyal ba'i zhal ltar mos dga' ste/ /kun nas 'dus pa'i tshogs la ltos/ /smon lam yongasu phun sum tshogs/ /
66a4(phal chen): smon lam spyod pa chags myed pa/ /de dag bsam pa shes par ni/ /'jig rten kun gyis mi nus so/ /de dag sems dang spyod yul dang / /spyod pa dag kyang nyan thos dang / /rang rgyal thams
66a5(phal chen): cad yongs kyis kyang / /rnam pa kun tu shes mi nus/ /rgyal sras shes rab chen po rnams/ /gzhan gyis thub dka' pham byed la/ /dpa' ba'i rgyal mtshan ma 'dres shing / /ye shes sa la
66a6(phal chen): gzhol gyur pa/ /ting 'dzin dpag tu tshad myed la/ /grangs chen mnyam par bzhag pa rnams/ /chos dbyings thams cad rgyas bkang zhing / /rnam par 'phrul pa kun kyang ston/ /de nas byang chub
66a7(phal chen): sems dpa' thub par dka' ba'i brtson 'grus kyi shugs kyi rgyal pos sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis rlabs kyis/ phyogs bcur rnam par bltas nas/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ /
66a8(phal chen): bsod nams snying po shes rab che/ /byang chub spyod pa'i tshul rtogs shing / /'jig rten kun la bde byed pa'i/ /bde gshegs sku las skyes pa ltos/ /yid gzhungs blo gros mtha' yas shing / /
66b1(phal chen): shin tu mnyam bzhag sems ldan pa/ /mtha' dang dbus med zab pa yi/ /ye shes rgya chen spyod yul can/ /rgyan rab mang pos mdzes byas pa'i/ /dze ta'i nags tshal rgya che ba/ /byang chub sems
66b2(phal chen): dpas kun rgyas shing / /bde gshegs bzhugs pa'i gnas gyur pa/ /gnas med mi gnas gyur pa rnams/ /phyogs rnams bcu nas kun 'dus te/ /pad+mo'i stan la 'khod pa dag /rgya mtsho mang la
66b3(phal chen): blta ba gyis/ /gnas myed len pa med pa rnams/ /spros pa med cing myi rten la/ /rdul bral chags pa'i sems med pa/ /chos kyi dbyings la gzhol ba dang / /ye shes rgyal chen rab dpa' ba/ /
66b4(phal chen): rdo rje'i sems ni mi g.yo zhing / /grub pa med pa'i chos rnams la/ /mya ngan 'da' bar gang ston pa/ /phyogs bcu'i zhing mang bye ba rnams/ /grangs kyi myi chod kun nas 'dus/ /yang dag sangs rgyas
66b5(phal chen): drung du lhags/ /gnyis kyi 'du shes rnam par spangs/ /rang 'byung shAkya seng ge yis/ /rnam par 'phrul pa 'di dag mthong / /de yi byin rlabs dam pa yi/ /byang chub sems dpa' 'di dag lhags/ /
66b6(phal chen): sangs rgyas chos la byed pa myed/ /chos dbyings gzhi la'ang de bzhin te/ /tha snyed tsam du yongs 'byed pa'i/ /pha rol phyin pa rgyal ba'i sras/ /chos kyi dbyings la dbyer med pa'i/ /
66b7(phal chen): mtha' la thug pa de dag gnas/ /tshig rnams yongs su zad med pas/ /chos la dbye ba'ang rab tu 'byed/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun nas 'phags pa'i gzi brjid rgyal pos/
66b8(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis rlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ /ltos shig sems can dam pa yi/ /ye shes dkyil 'khor shin tu yangs/ /
67a1(phal chen): dus dang dus myin mkhyen mdzad cing / /sems can rnams la chos kyang ston/ /mu stegs ldan pa tshogs 'dus pa'i/ /rgol ba thams cad rab tu 'joms/ /sems can bsam pa ji
67a2(phal chen): bzhin du/ /rnam par 'phrul pa yongs su ston/ /phyogs na mi bzhugs bde gshegs rnams/ /sangs rgyas yul gyi rjes su bzhud/ /tshad myed pa dang tshad yod pas/ /thub pa chen po 'das pa myin/ /
67a3(phal chen): nyi ma mkha' las 'gro ba ni/ /nyin par bgrang bar mos pa byed/ /de bzhin mkhyen pas mkhas ston pa/ /dus gsum chags pa med pas brjod/ /zla ba nya ba'i mtshan mo la/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor
67a4(phal chen): 'phags par snang / /de bzhin chos dkar yongs rdzogs pa'i/ /mgon po rnams kyang mthong ba yi/ /bar snang namakha'i dbyings 'di las/ /nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor rgyu ba na/ /gar yang thogs pa med par
67a5(phal chen): 'gro/ /sangs rgyas rnam 'phrul de bzhin no/ /ji ltar nam mkha'i phyogs rnams kyi/ /zhing rnams kun la mi gnas pa/ /de bzhin 'jig rten sgron ma yi/ /sangs rgyas rnam 'phrul shes par bya/ /
67a6(phal chen): ji ltar sa ni 'jig rten na/ /lus can kun gyi gnas yin pa/ /'jig rten sgron ma'i 'jig rten na/ /chos kyi 'khor lo de ltar gnas/ /ji ltar rlung ni chags med par/ /mkha' las mgyogs
67a7(phal chen): par rab rgyu ba/ /de bzhin sangs rgyas chos nyid kyang / /'jig rten khams su rab tu rgyu/ /ji ltar chu yi phung po la/ /zhing rnams bgrangs pa kun gnas pa/ /de bzhin dus gsum sangs rgyas kyang / /
67a8(phal chen): ye shes tshogs la rab tu gnas/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' dpal gyi snying po chags pa med pa'i rgyal pos/ sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis rlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te/ de'i tshe
67b1(phal chen): tshigasu bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ /ji ltar rdo rje ri dang brag /zang yag shin tu mtho yangs pa/ /ji ltar 'jig rten kun skyob pa'i/ /sangs rgyas mngon par 'phags pas mtho/ /ji ltar rgya mtsho'i chu chen
67b2(phal chen): dag / tshad med rnyog pa med pa ltar/ /sangs rgyas mthong ba'ang de bzhin te/ /'jig rten kun gyi skom pa gcod/ /rgya mtsho chu las 'phags pa yi/ /ri bo ri rab ci 'dra ba/ /de bzhin 'jig rten sgron ma
67b3(phal chen): yang / /chos kyi mtsho las mngon par 'phags/ /rin chen kun gyi 'byung gnas kyis/ /rgya mtsho rgyas pa ji bzhin du/ /rang byung ye shes de bzhin te/ /mi zad skad cig rab mkhyen pa/ /mgon po'i ye
67b4(phal chen): shes shin tu zab/ /tshad med de bzhin bgrang du myed/ /de bas sangs rgyas rnam 'phrul pa/ /bsam gyis mi khyab tshad med ston/ /sgyu ma'i mtshan nyid ston pa yi/ /sgyu mkhan mkhas pa ji lta ba/ /
67b5(phal chen): da ltar sangs rgyas mkhyen dbang yang / /rnam par 'phrul pa rab tu ston/ /yid bzhin nor bu rnam dag pa/ /bsam don rdzogs byed ji lta ba/ /de bzhin bsam pa dag pa la/ /rgyal ba smon lam
67b6(phal chen): rdzogs pa mdzad/ /'od snang gsal ba byed pa yi/ /rin chen rnam snang ji lta ba/ /de ltar thams cad mkhyen dag pa/ /'gro ba'i bsam pa gsal bar mdzad/ /ji ltar phyogs la mngon blta'o/ /
67b7(phal chen): rin chen zur brgyad rab gnas pa/ /de bzhin chags med sgron ma yang / /chos dbyings rab tu snang ba mdzad/ /chu dang rin chen 'od gsal ba/ /ji ltar dri med chu 'dang byed/ /de bzhin sangs rgyas
67b8(phal chen): mthong bas kyang / /'gro ba'i dbang po dag par 'gyur/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi dbyings su smon lam rab tu 'phrul ba'i zla ba'i rgyal pos/ sangs rgyas kyis
68a1(phal chen): byin gyis rlabs kyi phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ /phyogs 'di in dra nI la yi/ /kha dog mdog gcig byas pa ltar/ /sangs rgyas mthong
68a2(phal chen): bas skye dgu rnams/ /de bzhin byang chub mdog tu 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas rdul phran re re la/ /rnam par 'phrul pa sna tshogs rnams/ /tshad myed gzhal du med pa ston/ /byang chub sems dpa' rnam
68a3(phal chen): dag mdzad/ /de ni rmad byung shin tu zab/ /mtha' yas bsgrub par dka' ba ste/ /blo ldan ye shes yul de la/ /'jig rten rnams ni 'bab mi nus/ /byang chub sems dpa' bsgrubs don du/ /
68a4(phal chen): bkod pa phun sum tshogs pa dang / /sangs rgyas tshul gyis rnam sbyangs pa'i/ /chos kyi dbyings la 'jug pa ston/ /sangs rgyas zhing rnams mtha' yas pa/ /blo ldan bskor ba'i
68a5(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyis/ /kun nas gang bar gyur pa yang / /rgyal ba de la ston pa mdzad/ /chos kun mnga' sgyur ston pa ste/ /shAkya'i khyu mchog skyes par gyur/ /de yi cho 'phrul tshad med pas/ /
68a6(phal chen): 'di dag rab tu byung ba yin/ /brtan pa'i spyod pa sna tshogs rnams/ /tshad med rnam par gzigs kun nas/ /rnam par 'phrul pa mtha' yas pa/ /tshad med gzi can ston pa mdzad/ /
68a7(phal chen): 'jig rten mgon po rgyal sras rnams/ /chos kyi dbyings la slob pa mdzad/ /chos rnams thams cad yongs la yang / /chags med ye shes spyod yul 'gyur/ /skyes bu dbang po'i byin rlabs
68a8(phal chen): kyis/ /cho 'phrul brgya dang rab ldan zhing / /'jig rten thams cad rnam sbyong ba'i/ /chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor/ /sems can gtso bo'i yul la yang / /ye shes dkyil 'khor yongs sbyongs shing /
68b1(phal chen): shes rab chen po'i klu chen rnams/ /'jig rten thams cad 'grel bar 'gyur/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi don gyi blo gros gzi brjid rgyal pos/ /bcom ldan 'das kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis/ /
68b2(phal chen): phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te/ de'i tshe tshigasu bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ /drang srong dam pa'i mchog rnams kyi/ /dus gsum nyan thos gang byung ba/ /de dag kun gyis bde gshegs kyis/ /gshegs
68b3(phal chen): thabs 'jog 'deg mi shes so/ /dus gsum ma lus thams cad kyi/ /ma nor rang rgyal gang byung ba/ /de dag gis kyang mgon po yi/ /gshegs thabs 'jog 'deg mi rig go/ /ma rig mun pas
