68b4(phal chen): bsgribs pa rnams/ /khyi ltar ltung la rgyus pa yi/ /sems can de 'dra kun gyis ni/ /mgon po myi shes smos mi dgos/ /rgyal ba tshad mas gzhal ba myin/ /de ni shes par mi nus te/ /sangs rgyas
68b5(phal chen): chags myed ye shes can/ /tshig gi lam las shin tu 'das/ /zla ba nya rgyas 'od mnga' ba/ /brtan pa mtshan gyis rnam par bris/ /de ni bskal pa dpag yas par/ /rnam 'phrul thogs med
68b6(phal chen): spyod pa mdzad/ /tshul sgo re res sangs rgyas la/ /shin tu mnyam bzhag bsam byas kyang / /bskal pa bye ba bsam yas pa/ /brjod du med pa zad gyur gyi/ /rang byung rnams kyi yon tan ni/ /
68b7(phal chen): phyogs gcig cha yis mthar myi phyin/ /sangs rgyas de yi zhal bltas kyang / /sangs rgyas chos ni bsam myi khyab/ /gang zhig de la smon byed cing / /gang zhig yid kyis dga' mos pa/ /de dag
68b8(phal chen): kun gyi de 'dra ba'i/ /spyod yul blta dka' 'thob par 'gyur/ /bsod nams ye shes mtha' yas dang / /tshogs can yangs pas rnam gnon la/ /dri med blo ldan sems gnas pa/ /de dag 'di yi tshul
69a1(phal chen): la 'jug / de dag smon lam rgya che bas/ /sems dang sdom pa rgya che ste/ /rgyal ba'i spyod yul thob gyur cig /byang chub rgya chen gnon par 'gyur/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' bdud kyi
69a2(phal chen): dkyil 'khor rnam par 'thor ba'i ye shes rgyal mtshan gyi rgyal pos/ sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis rlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te/ /de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ /chags med ye shes
69a3(phal chen): sku mnga' bas/ /rang byung rnams ni sku med de/ /bsam yas ye shes yul mnga' bas/ /de dag bsam par mi nus so/ /phrin las dkar po bsam yas pas/ /sangs rgyas sku rab bsgrub pa'i phyir/ /de la
69a4(phal chen): 'jig rten gsum gyi mgon/ /mtshan dang dpe byad bzang pos mdzes/ /chos kyi dbyings kyis rnam sbyangs pas/ /'jig rten kun tu snang ba mdzad/ /sangs rgyas byang chub sgo yin te/ /ye shes kun gyis
69a5(phal chen): gnas chen no/ /chags pa thams cad rnam spangs pas/ /rdul med spros pa mi mnga'o/ /ye shes 'od zer rab 'gyed pas/ /'jig rten kun tu nyi ma 'dra/ /khams gsum thams cad rnam sbyongs pas/ /
69a6(phal chen): srid pa'i 'jigs pa rnam par gcod/ /byang chub sems dpa' bsgrub pa mdzad/ /byang chub 'byung gnas de bzhin no/ /kha dog mtha' yas ston mdzad kyang / /kha dog kun la gnas pa med/ /
69a7(phal chen): sems can kun gyis bsam yas pa'i/ /kha dog tshad med yongs su ston/ /skad cig gcig la sangs rgyas kyi/ /byang chub bsam yas sbyangs pas na/ de yis ye shes mthar phyin par/ /rtag par
69a8(phal chen): sus kyang mi nus so/ /ye shes bstan pa zad myi shes/ /rang bzhin rnam par 'gyur ba med/ /de la dus gsum rgyal ba kun/ /skad cig gcig gis rab tu brjod/ /rtag par las gzhan yongs btang ste/ /
69b1(phal chen): shes ldan byang chub don gnyer bas/ /sems la sems shes bya ba yang / /de la sems skye myed par bsam/ /gang gi sangs rgyas bskyed pa yi/ /sangs rgyas chos rnams bsam mi khyab/ /de dag brjod
69b2(phal chen): pa'i yul ma yin/ /shin tu zab pas tshig lam spangs/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' rnam par snang mdzad kyi smon lam dpal gyi rgyal mtshan gyis/ /sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis rlabs kyi phyogs
69b3(phal chen): bcur rnam par bltas te/ /de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ /dran pa rmongs myed dag pa rnams/ /chos 'dzin shin tu nges rtogs shing / /blo gros bsam gyis mi khyab la/ /byang chub rgya
69b4(phal chen): mtsho myi zad pa/ /de dag yid ni 'di la nges/ /de dag spyod pa'i spyod yul yin/ /de dag shes pa 'dir myi g.yo/ /de dag 'di la the tsom chad/ /de dag skyo bar myi 'gyur te/ /de dag yid kyang zhum mi
69b5(phal chen): 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas chos la rab gzhol bar/ /de dag sems kyang rab tu 'byung / de dag dad pa rting tshugs shing / /yang dag 'phags pa rab tu bskyed/ /dmigs med gnas pa med pa yi/ /ye shes
69b6(phal chen): 'di la de dag dga'/ /bskal pa bye bar bstsags pa yi/ /yongasu rdzogs pa'i dge ba'i chos/ /ye shes 'di 'dod mtshungs pa med/ /de dag thams cad yongs su bsngo/ /'khor ba'i nang na rgyu ba yang / /
69b7(phal chen): 'khor ba dag la gnas pa myin/ /sangs rgyas chos rnams rab rtogs pas/ /sangs rgyas yul la rab tu brtse/ /sems can khams ni ji snyed du/ /'jig rten phun sum tshogs rgyu ba/ /de dag thams cad
69b8(phal chen): brtan pas spangs/ /sangs rgyas phun sum tshogs la gnas/ /sangs rgyas rtag tu 'byung gyur kyang / /'jig rten don myed rab tu gnas/ /chags med spyod pa de dag ni/ /rtag tu sems can don la gnas/ /
70a1(phal chen): de dag spyod pa mtshungs med de/ /lus can kun gyis bsam mi khyab/ /'jig rten bde ba kun sems pas/ /de dag sdug bsngal rnam par bzlog /'jig rten kun la snying brtse zhing / /byang chub ye shes
70a2(phal chen): rnam dag pas/ /de dag 'jig rten snang bar 'gyur/ /'jig rtan thams cad rab tu 'grol/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par grol ba'i rgyal pos/ sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs
70a3(phal chen): kyis phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ /bskal pa bye ba phrag brgyar yang / /sangs rgyas sgra ni rab bkod na/ /the tsom thams cad gcod pa yi/ /dam pa'i
70a4(phal chen): mthong ba ci zhig smos/ /chos kun thugasu chud rtogs pa/ /'jig rten gsum po'i bsod nams stegs/ /sems can thams cad rnam sbyong ba'i/ /'jig rten sgron ma mthong gi dga'/ /sems can gtso bo
70a5(phal chen): ma smad pa'o/ /gzugs kyi sku ni mthong gyur na/ /bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig tu/ /ngoms shing tshim pa skyer mi btub/ /myi'i dbang po'i sku gzugs la/ /rgyal ba'i sras rnams lta lta zhing / /rang gi dge
70a6(phal chen): ba'i chags myed pa/ /gzhan don brtson pa byang chub bsngo/ /thub pa chen po'i gzugs kyi sku/ /de las so so yang dag rig /chags myed ye shes 'byung gyur bas/ /de ni sangs rgyas byang chub bsngo/ /
70a7(phal chen): sems can bsam yas tshad myed pa/ /snang bar mdzad de theg chen la/ /btsud nas thub pa med pa'i mchog /byang chub dam par lung yang bstan/ /bsod nams chen po'i rang bzhin zhing / /ye shes dkyil
70a8(phal chen): 'khor shar cing byung / /'jig rten tshad myed kun tu snang / /bsod nams phung po rnam 'phel mdzad/ /sdug bsngal dra ba rab tu gcad/ /ye shes phung po rnam par spyod/ /gang gis rgyal ba bsnyen bkur ba/ /
70b1(phal chen): de dag ngan song 'jigs pa med/ /rkang gnyis dam pa mthong gyur na/ /shin tu yangs pa'i sems skye ste/ /'di snang gsal ba'i shes rab mthu/ /grangs med de bzhin skye bar 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas skyes
70b2(phal chen): bu'i mchog mthong zhing / /byang chub dam par nges par 'gyur/ /de bzhin gshegs par 'gyur bya zhes/ /de dag kun kyang nges par sems/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi dbyings kyi smon lam gyi
70b3(phal chen): gzhi rab tu rtog pas/ sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlab kyi de'i tshe tshigasu bcad pa 'di dag smraso/ /yon tan mtha' yas phun ldan pa/ /shAkya'i khyu mchog thub mthong nas/ /yongasu bsngo ba byed pa'i sems/ /
70b4(phal chen): theg pa che la rnam par dag /sems can kun gyi don gyi phyir/ /thugs rje che mnga'i brten pa rnams/ /chos kyi 'khor lo bskor mdzad pa/ /de bzhin gshegs pa 'byung bar 'gyur/ /bskal pa
70b5(phal chen): khrag khrig phrag brgyar yang / /sems can don la brtson mdzad pa'i/ /sangs rgyas rnams la lus can rnams/ /kun gyis lan glan cis kyang nus/ /ngan song gsum po mi zad par/ /bskal pa bye bar
70b6(phal chen): bcos bla yi/ /chags pa thams cad bzlog mdzad pa'i/ /ston pa mi mthong ma yin no/ /sems can kun gyi rgyud rnams na/ /sdug bsngal phung po ji yod pa/ /ma lus nyams su bzod nus kyi/ /
70b7(phal chen): sangs rgyas mi mthong ma yin no/ /'jig rten 'di dag thams cad na/ /tha dad ngan song rgyud yod pa/ /de dag yun ring gnas bla yi/ /sangs rgyas mi mthong ma yin no/ /sems can dmyal ba re re
70b8(phal chen): yang / /bskal pa tshad med gnas bla yi/ /mtha' yas rgyal bas brnyes pa yis/ /byang chub mchog las ring gnas myin/ /ci zhig phyir ni ngan song du/ /yun ring gnas par 'dod chen na/ /rgyal ba'i
71a1(phal chen): dbang po mthong ba ni/ /ye shes 'phel ba'i rgyur 'gyur phyir/ /rgyal ba 'jig rten mchog mthong na/ /sdug bsngal thams cad 'chad par 'gyur/ /rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas spyod yul gyi/ /
71a2(phal chen): ye shes khong du chud par 'byung / /sangs rgyas myi yi mchog mthong zhing / /sgrib pa thams cad zad par 'gyur/ /byang chub gang gis 'thob pa yi/ /bsod nams tshad med 'phel bar 'gyur/ /
71a3(phal chen): sangs rgyas mthong bas sems can rnams/ /the tsom yid gnyis chad par 'gyur/ /'jig rten 'das dang 'jig rten gyi/ /bsam pa'ang yongasu rdzogs par 'gyur/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa'
71a4(phal chen): sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang pos byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs thams cad la rnam par bltas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin seng+ge rnam par bsgyings pa 'di nyid de bas kyang rnam par dbye
71a5(phal chen): ba dang rgya cher brjod pa dang / gsal bar bya ba dang rab tu brjod pa dang / yang dag par bstan pa dang / shin tu snang bar bya ba dang / rab tu gsal bar bya ba dang man ngag bstan pa'i phyir/ chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul
71a6(phal chen): nam mkha'i dbyings dang mnyam pas/ dus gsum mnyam pa nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings mnyam pa nyid dang sems can gyi khams mnyam pa nyid dang / 'jig rten thams cad mnyam pa nyid dang las kyi rgyud thams
71a7(phal chen): cad mnyam pa nyid dang sems can gyi bsam pa mnyam pa nyid dang / sems can gyi mos pa mnyam pa nyid dang chos kyi snang ba mnyam pa nyid dang / sems can yongasu smin par bya ba'i dus mnyam pa nyid dang /
71a8(phal chen): 'gro ba thams cad kyi dbang po mnyam pa nyid kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin seng ge rnam par bsgyings pa/ 'di nyid byang chub sems dpa' de dag la bstan pa'i tshul bcus yang dag par
71b1(phal chen): rab tu ston te/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di ltar chos kyi dbyings thams cad du gtogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba rnams la/ sangs rgyas gcig nas gcig tu rgyud pa bstan pa dang /
71b2(phal chen): 'di lta ste/ nam mkha'i dbyings kyis klas pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du/ phyi ma'i mtha'i mur thug pa'i skal par de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan rjes su brjod pa bstan pa dang / 'di lta ste/
71b3(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su skye ba dang / mtha' dang dbus myed pa'i mngon par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi sgo rgya mtsho yongs su brjod cing bstan pa dang / 'di lta ste nam mkha'i
71b4(phal chen): dbyings kyi klas pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor gyi byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun snying po byang chub la mngon du gyur pa'i gnas dang / 'di lta ste dus gsum
71b5(phal chen): gyi sangs rgyas kyi sku dang 'od zer sprul pa ba spu'i sgo thams cad nas/ sems skad cig la rab tu bkye zhing chos kyi dbyings rgyas par dgang ba bstan pa dang / 'di lta ste phyogs rgya mtsho thams cad du sangs
71b6(phal chen): rgyas kyi zhing rgya mtsho gzhi mnyam par byin gyis rlabs cing lus gcig gi rgyas par dgang ba bstan pa dang / 'di lta ste dmigs pa'i gzhi thams cad la sangs rgyas kyi rnam par sprul pa dus gsum
71b7(phal chen): thams cad yang dag par gzhol bar 'gyur ba'i byin gyi rlabs yang dag par bstan pa dang / 'di lta ste zhing thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra ba rnams la/ dus gsum gyi zhing gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa'i sangs rgyas
71b8(phal chen): kyi rnam par 'phrul pa dang / bskal pa rgya mtsho yongs su bshad cing bstan pa dang / 'di lta ste dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas kyi smon lam rgya mtsho thams cad ba spu'i sgo thams cad nas rab tu brjod pa
72a1(phal chen): phyi ma'i mthar byin gyis rlabs pas/ byang chub sems dpa' yang dag par 'byung ba bstan pa dang / 'di lta ste chos kyi dbyings dang mnyam pa'i seng ge'i khri dang / byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor
72a2(phal chen): gyi dkyil 'khor dang / snying po byang chub kyi rgyan tha myi dad pa dang / chos kyi 'khor lo rnam pa tha myi dad pa rab tu bskor ba/ phyi ma'i mthar byin gyis rlabs pa bstan pa'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras de ltar seng+ge
72a3(phal chen): rnam par bsgyings pa/ ting nge 'dzin 'di la bstan pa bcu po de dag la stsogs pa shin tu bstan pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed yod de/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de ni
72a4(phal chen): de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyi spyod yul lo/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin chen po seng+ge rnam par bsgyings pa'i 'di nyid kyi don gyi phyogs
72a5(phal chen): bstan pa'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis rlabs kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhal du lta zhing 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho thams cad la rnam par bltas nas/ sangs rgyas kyi yul bsam gyis mi
72a6(phal chen): khyab pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rnam par 'phrul pa mtha' dang dbus med pa la rnam par bltas te/ 'jig rten gyi khams bsam gyis mi khyab par gzhol ba la rnam par ltas
72a7(phal chen): nas ye shes bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i sgyu ma'i chos nyid la rnam par bltas te/ dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas mnyam pa nyid bsam gyis mi khyab pa la rnam par bltas nas/ mtha' dang dbus med pa'i
72a8(phal chen): ngag gi lam dang nges pa'i tshig dang / chos kyi tshul thams cad la rnam par bltas te/ de'i tshe tshigasu bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ /ba spu gcig la rgya mtsho rgal ba'i zhing / /zhing kun shin tu phra ba'i rdul dang mnyam/ /
72b1(phal chen): de nas sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor/ /kun gyis yongs bskor sangs rgyas gdan la bzhugs/ /spu gcig rtse la zhing mang rgya mtsho rnams/ /snying po byang chub pad+mo'i gdan gnas pas/ /
72b2(phal chen): chos dbyings rgya chen yongs su rgyas bkang zhing / /shing drung dam pa kun na mgon po snang / /zhing rnams kun gyi rdul phran rab mang rnyed/ /rgyal ba spu rtse gcig la yongs zhugs pa/ /byang chub sems dpa'i
72b3(phal chen): 'khor los yongasu bskor/ /kun kyang bzang po'i spyod pa ston pa mdzad/ /zhing mchog gcig na rgyal ba bzhugs gyur kyang / /byang chub sems dpa'i sprin mang mi zad pa/ /de dag phyogs bcu ma lus
72b4(phal chen): thams cad nas/ /'byam klas zhing kun bkang zhing kun kyang 'ong / /zhing rnams bye ba'i rdul phran mnyam pa yi/ /byang chub sems dpa' yon tan rgya mtsho'i 'od/ /phyogs bcu'i chos dbyings rgyas pa
72b5(phal chen): kun bkang zhing / /ston pa de la kun kyang 'khor nas ldang / /zhing rnams kun tu gzugs rnyan rab tu ston/ /chos kyi rgyal po rgyal ba'i ye shes mtsho/ /de dag kun kyang bzang po'i spyod la gnas/ /
72b6(phal chen): sangs rgyas kun gyi 'khor du nye bar 'dong / /'byam klas zhing rnams kun na 'khod spyod cing / /byang chub sems dpa'i dga' ba rab gnas te/ /chos kyi sprin mnyan dpa' bo de dag ni/ /
72b7(phal chen): zhing gcig du yang bskal pa bye bar spyod/ /byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod par byed/ /chos kyi gangs chen mtsho spyod rnam par snang / /smon lam rgya mtsho kun la rab tu 'jug /de dag
72b8(phal chen): sangs rgyas sa yi spyod yul gnas/ /rgyal ba'i chos rnams gzhan dang gzhan 'byung ba'i/ /de dag kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa shes/ /sangs rgyas yon tan legs pa rgya mtsho dang / /rnam par
73a1(phal chen): 'phrul pa rgya chen yangs la 'jug / bde gshegs chos dbyings kun tu rgyas bkang zhing / /zhing rnams kun gyi rdul phran ji snyed pa'i/ /sku yi sprin rnams rtag tu 'gyed mdzad cing / /
73a2(phal chen): chos kyi char gyis byang chub rab la 'khod// //sangs rgyas rmad ga cad ces bya ba shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo/ bam po drug pa/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub
73a3(phal chen): sems dpa' de dag sangs rgyas kyi ting nge 'dzin seng ge rnam par bsgyings pa 'di nyid la de bas kyang bstan te/ 'god pa mdzad pa'i don du smyin mtshams kyi mdzod spu'i nang na chos kyi dbyings sgo
73a4(phal chen): kun nas rnam par dmigs pas dus gsum snang ba zhes bya ba'i 'od zer chen po 'od zer gyi dkyil 'khor sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du myed pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang ldan pa bkye ste/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho thams cad kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'byam klas pa thams cad snang bar mdzad do/
73a5(phal chen): /de nas byang chub sems dpa' dze ta'i tshal du tshogs pa de dag gi
73a6(phal chen): chos kyi dbyings thams cad du gtogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mtha' klas pa thams cad dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra ba'i khong du chud pa'i/
73a7(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra ba dag la/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi mying du bya ba kha dog sna tshogs dang / rnam pa sna tshogs su rnam par dag pa dang / zhing sna tshogs dang /
73a8(phal chen): dbyibs sna tshogs dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing dag na/ byang chub sems dpa' snying po byang chub tu phyin te/ seng ge'i khri la 'dug pa 'jig rten gyi dbang po thams cad kyis shin tu
73b1(phal chen): mchod pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyis kun nas bskor ba/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya bar mthong ste/ la la ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du
73b2(phal chen): myed pa tsam du shin tu yangs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor na/ chos kyi dbyings rgyas par khyab pa'i dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor gyis chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba mthong ngo / /la la na ni lha'i gnas na 'dug /
73b3(phal chen): la la na ni klu'i gnas na 'dug /la la na ni gnod sbyin gyi gnas na 'dug /la la na ni lha ma yin gyi gnas na 'dug /la la na ni nam mkha' lding gi gnas na 'dug /la la na ni mi'am ci'i
73b4(phal chen): gnas na 'dug / la la na ni lto 'phye chen po'i gnas na 'dug /la la na ni mi'i dbang po'i nang na 'dug /la la na ni mi'i 'jig rten gyi grong dang / grong khyer dang / grong brdal dang ljongs dang /
73b5(phal chen): khams dang / rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor dag na rnam par 'phrul pa sna tshogs dang / spyod lam sna tshogs dang / lus sna tshogs dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo rnam par dmyigs pa sna tshogs dang /
73b6(phal chen): ting nge 'dzin gyi mngon par shes pa sna tshogs dang / rigs dang rgyud sna tshogs su byung ba dang / kha dog rnam par dmyigs pa sna tshogs dang / 'od kyi dkyil 'khor sna tshogs dang / 'od zer
73b7(phal chen): gyi dra ba dkye ba sna tshogs dang / dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor sna tshogs dang / gtam gyi skyes bu'i gzhi sna tshogs dang / bstan pa'i gzhi sna tshogs dang / tshig dang yi ge dang nges pa'i
73b8(phal chen): tshig sna tshogs kyis 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor sna tshogs na chos ston pa mthong bar gyur to/ /byang chub sems dpa' ji snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/
74a1(phal chen): nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa phyogs bcu na rnam par gnas pa/ phyogs kyi rgyud mtha' yas par 'dus pa/ phyogs rgya mtsho thams cad du gtogs pa/ chos sna tshogs
74a2(phal chen): kyi sgo dang ldan pa/ phyogs kyi mying du bya ba sna tshogs su gtogs pa/ phyogs sna tshogs kun tu gzhol ba/ phyogs cha rnam pa tha dad par gtogs pa/ phyogs sna tshogs kyi rjes
74a3(phal chen): su song ba/ phyogs rgya mtsho sna tshogs su gtogs pa 'di lta ste/ shar phyogs dang / lho phyogs dang / nub phyogs dang / byang phyogs dang / byang dang shar gyi phyogs mtshams dang /
74a4(phal chen): shar dang lho'i phyogs mtshams dang / lho dang nub kyi phyogs mtshams dang / nub dang byang gi phyogs mtshams dang / 'og dang steng gi phyogs kyi zhing gi lhun gyi phyogs dang / sems can
74a5(phal chen): gyi lus kyi phyogs dang / sems can gyi mying du bya ba'i phyogs dang / sngon gyi mtha'i mur thugs pa'i phyogs dang / phyogs bcu'i da ltar byung ba'i phyogs dang / nam mkha'i khongs thams
74a6(phal chen): cad du skra'i rtse mo shin tu phra ba dgod pas dmigs pa'i phyogs dang / zhing thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra ba gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa'i phyogs la 'jug pa khong du chud par bya ba'i phyogs
74a7(phal chen): dang / las kyi 'du byed sna tshogs kyis yongs su grub pa'i phyogs dang / skra'i rtse mo gcig la mtha' dang dbus med pa'i nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mying du bya bar gtogs pa'i phyogs kyi
74a8(phal chen): khongasu chud pa'i dus gsum gyi dbyings mnyam pa nyid du gzhol bas/ kun tu gtogs pa'i 'gro ba thams cad tha mi dad pas/ sems can thams cad kyi 'du shes kyi rnam pa la mnyam
74b1(phal chen): pa'i sgra dbyangs su gyur pa'i 'gro ba thams cad kyi sems la gzugs brnyan rab tu snang bar gyur pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi ting nge 'dzin rnam par 'phrul ba/ sems can thams cad
74b2(phal chen): kyi lus la mngon par lta ba/ dmyigs par bya bas 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad du 'gro ba'i tshul dang ldan pa/ bskal pa thams cad la ye shes tha myi dad pa zhing thams cad la kun tu snyoms
74b3(phal chen): pas sems can gyi bsam pa ji lta ba de bzhin du gzugs mngon sum du bstan pa rnam par dmigs pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yang
74b4(phal chen): dag par stan pas/ sems can thams cad 'dul ba rgyun mi 'chad pa mthong bar gyur pa de dag thams cad ni sngon/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis dge ba'i spyod pa bskal ba mnyam pa dang /
74b5(phal chen): bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhis yongs su bsdus pa mthong ba dang mnyam pa dang / rjes su dran pa bsnyen bkur bas yongasu smyin par byas pa dag go/ /sngon bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
74b6(phal chen): byang chub tu sems bskyed pa la btsud pa dag go/ /de bzhin gshegs pa de dang de dag gi drung du gshegs pa'i tshe dge ba'i rtsa bas yongasu bsdus pa dag ste/ de ltar dge ba'i rtsa ba bskal pa
74b7(phal chen): mnyam pas/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su smyin par 'gyur ba'i thabs kyis shin tu bzung ba'i phyir/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi rnam par 'phrul pa
74b8(phal chen): chos kyi dbyings ltar yangs shing nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mthas gtugs par gyur pa dag kyang mthong zhing khong du chud par gyur pa yin te/ la la ni chos kyi sku la 'jug go/ /la la ni
75a1(phal chen): gzugs kyi sku la 'jug go/ /la la ni sngon gyi byang chub sems dpa'i yongs su bsgrub pa la 'jug go/ /la la ni pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs pa la 'jug go/ /la la ni spyod pa'i
75a2(phal chen): dkyil 'khor yongs su dag pa'i rgyan la 'jug go/ /la la ni byang chub sems dpa'i sa yi rnam par 'phrul pa la 'jug go/ /la la ni mngon par byang chub pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa la 'jug go/ /
75a3(phal chen): la la ni sangs rgyas rnam par spyod pa'i ting nge 'dzin tha myi dad pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa la 'jug go/ /la la ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang myi bsnyengs pa la 'jug go/ /la la ni sangs rgyas kyi
75a4(phal chen): so so yang dag par rig pa rgya mtsho la 'jug go/ /de dag la stsogs pa sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa rgya mtsho sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i phrag bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed la 'jug ste mos pa sna
75a5(phal chen): tshogs dang lam sna tshogs dang / sgo sna tshogs dang 'jug pa sna tshogs dang / 'bab pa sna tshogs dang rnam pa sna tshogs dang / rjes su 'brang ba sna tshogs dang phyogs sna tshogs dang snod sna tshogs dang yul
75a6(phal chen): sna tshogs dang / 'jig rten sna tshogs dang khong du chud pa sna tshogs dang / tshogs sna tshogs dang rnam 'phrul sna tshogs dang / thabs sna tshogs dang ting nge 'dzin sna tshogs kyis sangs rgyas kyi rnam par
75a7(phal chen): 'phrul pa rgya mtsho de dag la 'jug go/ /ting nge 'dzin sna tshogs kyis 'jug pa 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin chos kyi dbyings kun nas brgyan pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting
75a8(phal chen): nge 'dzin dus gsum thams cad la thogs pa med par yul snang bar byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin chos kyi dbyings kyi gzhi tha myi dad pa'i ye shes snang ba dang / byang chub
75b1(phal chen): sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul gyi dbyings la 'jug pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin nam mkha'i dbyings su snang ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin de bzhin
75b2(phal chen): gshegs pa'i stobs bcu 'thob pas rnam par 'byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin sangs rgyas kyi snyengs pa mi mnga' ba'i rgyan gyis rnam par gnon cing rnam par bsgyings pa dang /
75b3(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul thams cad kyi klong gi snying po dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin chos kyi dbyings thams cad du thogs pa med par sgra sgrog pas rgyas par
75b4(phal chen): 'gengs pa'i zla ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin chos kyi dbyings mnyam pa nyid kyi brgyan pa'i 'od kyi byang chub sems dpa' de dag bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi sangs rgyas kyi rnam par
75b5(phal chen): 'phrul pa rgya mtsho de dag la rab tu 'jug go/ /byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin chos kyi rgyal po'i thabs chags pa myed pa'i rgyal mtshan dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin dmyigs pa
75b6(phal chen): thams cad la sangs rgyas rgya mtsho rnam par lta ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyud thams cad du tha myi dad pa'i lus snang ba'i rgyal mtshan dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin de bzhin gshegs
75b7(phal chen): pa'i sku tha dad pa'i yul la 'jug pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin 'jig rten thams cad kyi rgyud kyi rjes su 'jug pa snying rje chen po'i snying po can dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin chos
75b8(phal chen): thams cad kyi gnas la brten pa'i byin gyis rlabs dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin shin tu zhi la rab tu zhi bas kun tu snang ba'i dkyil 'khor dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin
76a1(phal chen): sprul pa bzang po dmigs su med pas/ kun tu 'phrul pa'i gzugs brnyan dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin zhing thams cad yongs su 'du ba'i byin gyis rlabs dang / byang chub sems
76a2(phal chen): dpa'i ting nge 'dzin zhing thams cad du mngon par 'tshang rgya ba'i rnam par bsgrub pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin 'gro ba thams cad du dbang po'i kha dog gis rnam par spyod pa dang / byang chub
76a3(phal chen): sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin 'gro ba thams cad du khyad du 'phags pa'i dkyil 'khor chags pa med pa'i rnam par spyod pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
76a4(phal chen): bskyed pa las byung ba'i byin gyis rlabs dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin yon tan rgya mtsho thams cad la nan tan gyi 'jug pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin dmyigs pa ma lus
76a5(phal chen): pa thams cad du rnam par 'phrul pa mngon par bsgrub pas/ phyi ma'i mthar byin gyis rlob pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sngon gyi sbyor ba rgya mtsho
76a6(phal chen): la 'jug pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin phyi ma'i mthar de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs yang dag par 'dzin pa'i byin gyis rlabs dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin
76a7(phal chen): phyogs bcu'i zhing rgya mtsho da ltar byung ba thams cad yongs su dag par mos pa'i byin gyis rlabs dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin sems kyi skad cig gcig la sangs rgyas thams cad dang
76a8(phal chen): rnam par spyod cing 'grogs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin dmyigs pa thams cad la chags pa med pa'i mthar 'jug pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin 'jig rten gyi khams
76b1(phal chen): thams cad sangs rgyas kyi zhing gcig tu byin gyis rlobs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin sangs rgyas thams cad kyi skur 'phrul pa mngon par sgrub pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin dbang po
76b2(phal chen): rgya mtsho rdo rje'i dbang po lta bu thams cad khong du chud pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad sku gcig pa'i snying po'i byin gyis rlabs dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin
76b3(phal chen): sems kyi skad cig gcig gi cha la chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul thams cad khong du chud pas khom par gnas pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin chos kyi dbyings thams cad du zhing 'byam klas pa sgrub pa
76b4(phal chen): yongs su ston pa'i byin gyis rlabs dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin spyi'u tshugasu gzhi la rnam par spyod pa'i byin gyis rlabs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams
76b5(phal chen): cad kyi sems can gyi lus tha mi dad par byin gyis rlob pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin ye shes kyi klong thams cad la mngon sum du yang dag par gzhol ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge
76b6(phal chen): 'dzin chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin mtshan nyid yongs su shes pas rab tu 'byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin dus gsum sems kyi skad gcig la tha myi dad pa'i dkyil 'khor dang byang chub
76b7(phal chen): sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin sems kyi skad cig thams cad chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul gyi rang bzhin dam pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi rjes su 'brang ba'i
76b8(phal chen): ye shes kyi rnam par gnon pa'i seng ge dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin dmyigs pa thams cad chos kyi dbyings su shes pa'i mig gi dkyil 'khor dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin stobs
77a1(phal chen): bcu'i rtsal gyis rnam par gnon pas yang dag par rtsom pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi dmigs pa thams cad kun nas mthong ba'i mig gi dkyil 'khor dang byang chub sems
77a2(phal chen): dpa'i ting nge 'dzin kha dog thams cad dkyil 'khor gyis 'gro bar shin tu mdzes pa mngon par bsgrub pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin glong mi g.yo ba'i snying po dang / byang chub sems dpa'i
77a3(phal chen): ting nge 'dzin chos gcig la chos thams cad yongs su 'du bar ston pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin chos gcig gi tshig gi lam la nges pa'i ngag gi rab tu 'byed pas/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag
77a4(phal chen): bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi sangs rgyas kyi rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par 'phrul gyis rnam par 'phrul ba rgya mtsho de dag la rab tu 'jug go/ /byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin sangs rgyas thams cad kyi
77a5(phal chen): rgyal mtshan byin gyi rlabs kyi chos ston pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin dus gsum gyi mu la mthar thug pa med pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin bskal pa thams cad khong du chud
77a6(phal chen): pas tha myi dad pa'i ye shes dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin tshul shin tu phra bas stobs bcu khong du chud pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin mi 'phrog pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa
77a7(phal chen): bskal pa thams cad du mngon par bsgrub pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin phyogs thams cad kun tu shugs kyis mngon du thar pa'i sprin dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin mngon par 'tshang
77a8(phal chen): rgya ba'i rnam par 'phrul pa rnam par bsgrub pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin tshor ba thams cad kyis reg pa med pas bde ba'i rgyal mtshan dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin rgyan thams cad du
77b1(phal chen): nam mkha'i rgyan mngon par bsgrub pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin skad cig skad cig tu 'gro ba snyed kyi sprul pa'i gzugs rnyan gyi sprin mngon par sgrub pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin
77b2(phal chen): de bzhin gshegs pa'i zla ba'i 'od nam mkha' ltar rdul dang bral ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad nam mkha' ltar byin gyis rlob pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin
77b3(phal chen): chos thams cad la dbang po'i rgyan rab tu snang ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin chos thams cad kyi don rnam par 'byed pa'i sgron ma dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin stobs bcu'i dkyil
77b4(phal chen): 'khor snang ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas dpal gyi rgyal mtshan dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin sangs rgyas thams cad gcig tu 'dres pa'i snying
77b5(phal chen): po dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin skad cig skad cig la brtsams pa thams cad mthar phyin par byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin bsod nams mi zad pa'i snying po dang /
77b6(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin sangs rgyas mtha' yas pa mthong ba'i yul rab tu snang ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin chos thams cad la rdo rje'i seng ge ltar rab tu gnas pa dang /
77b7(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sprul pa yongs su bstan pas rdul phra rabs kyi dmigs pa mngon par bsgrub pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin de bzhin gshegs
77b8(phal chen): pa thams cad kyi mnyan pa'i nyi ma gnon pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin dus gsum gcig tu spyod pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin chos thams cad rang bzhin gyi rab tu zhi bar
78a1(phal chen): sgra dbyangs kun tu sgrogs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin sangs rgyas thams cad mthong ba'i sa mtshams 'dzin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa
78a2(phal chen): thams cad kyi gnas kyi pad mo'i tshal rab tu rgyas pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin gnas myed pa'i chos kyi dbyings nam mkha' la rnam par lta ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin phyogs gcig
78a3(phal chen): tu phyogs bcu rgya mtsho yongs su sdud pa'i klong dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin chos kyi dbyings kyi gzhi thams cad kyi sgor 'jug pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin chos rgya mtsho thams
78a4(phal chen): cad dang ldan pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin sems can thams cad la 'od rab tu 'gyed pas/ rab tu zhi ba'i lus su 'gyur ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin sems kyi skad gcig
78a5(phal chen): gcig la mngon par shes pa dang / smon lam thams cad mngon par bsgrub pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin rtag par thams cad kun tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'i byin gyis rlabs
78a6(phal chen): dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin chos kyi dbyings thams cad rgyan cig tu khong du chud par 'jug pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin sangs rgyas thams cad dran pa'i rang bzhin gyi rab tu
78a7(phal chen): snang ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin 'gro ba thams cad du khyad par chen po dang ldan pa'i ye shes mngon par shes pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin sems kyi skad cig gcig
78a8(phal chen): gis chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul mtha' yas pa rang gi lus kyis rgyas par 'gengs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin chos kyi dbyings tshul gcig gis chos thams cad tshul gcig par
78b1(phal chen): rnam par dgod pa'i 'od dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo gzi brjid kyi byin rlabs dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin sems can gyi khams mig
78b2(phal chen): 'phrul lta bu yongs su bsdu ba'i smon lam dang / spyod pa byin gyis rlob pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin chos kyi dbyings kyi gzhi thams cad tha myi dad pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin pad+mo'i byin
78b3(phal chen): rnam par 'phrul pas kun tu rnam par gnon pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin sems can thams cad kyi lus kyi rgyud khong du chud pas mngon par shes pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin lus
78b4(phal chen): sems can thams cad la mngon par byin gyis rlob pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin sems can thams cad kyi dbyangs kyi yan lag rgya mtshor 'gro ba thams cad kyi skad yongs su 'byed pa'i tshul
78b5(phal chen): mngon par shes pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin 'gro ba'i gzhi tha dad pa thams cad khong du chud pas mngon par shes pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin snying rje chen po'i mdzod tha dad pa'i
78b6(phal chen): snying po dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin sangs rgyas thams cad de bzhin nyid du rtogs pa'i mtha' la 'jug pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rnam
78b7(phal chen): par thar pa'i pho brang la rnam par lta bas seng ge rnam par bsgyings pa dang / de dag la stsogs pa byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi lam la 'jug pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i
78b8(phal chen): rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad kyi sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa rgya mtsho de dag la rab tu 'jug go/ /sems kyi skad cig
79a1(phal chen): re re la chos kyi dbyings thams cad du rgyas par 'gengs par 'jug pa'i tshul gyis sngon bskal pa mnyam par spyad pa yang rjes su dran no/ /de ltar byang chub sems dpa' de dag dze ta'i tshal
79a2(phal chen): du phyin cing / bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga na 'khod pa/ seng ge'i khri rin po che sna tshogs kyi pad mo'i snying po can 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba dang mnyam par
79a3(phal chen): yangs pa la 'khod pa/ ye shes dang mngon par shes pa chen po'i rnam par 'phrul pas byung ba/ ye shes dang mngon par shes pa rno ba dang ldan pas rjes su thob pa/ ye shes kyi kun tu
79a4(phal chen): rnam par dpyod pa/ shes rab kyi 'byung gnas kyi rigs su byung ba/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la mngon du gyur pa/ ye shes kyi mig rab rib med pa dang ldan pa/ sems can gyi kha lo bsgyur
79a5(phal chen): ba'i rang bzhin thob pa/ sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam pa nyid kyi rjes su song ba/ rtag tu rnam par rtogs pa med par chos la spyod pa/ chos kyi dmigs pa thams cad rab tu rtogs pa/
79a6(phal chen): chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis zhi bar dmigs pa 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad shin tu zhi bas/ gnas tha dad pa med pa la rab tu gzhol ba/ 'jig rten tha dad pa thams cad du rab tu zhugs pa/
79a7(phal chen): gnas med par zhing thams cad du 'dong ba/ chos kyi gnas thams cad la brten pa med par chos thams cad bla gab med pa'i gzhal med khang du phyin pa/ 'gro ba thams cad yongasu smyin par bya ba dang /
79a8(phal chen): gdul ba la zhugs pa sems can thams cad la bde ba'i lam ston pa/ ye shes dang rnam par thar pa shin tu 'phags pa'i gnas kyi spyod yul can/ 'dod chags dang bral ba'i mthar phyin pa'i
79b1(phal chen): ye shes kyi lus dang ldan pa/ srid pa'i rgya mtsho thams cad las gyen du 'phags pa/ 'gro ba thams cad la yang dag pa'i mtha' rnam par ston pa/ chos rgya mtsho shes rab snang ba'i dkyil 'khor
79b2(phal chen): can/ ting nge 'dzin gangs chen mtsho dang ldan pa'i dkyil shin tu mnyam par bzhag cing / snying rje chen po rab tu sems pa/ chos kyi tshul sgyu ma'i rnam pa 'di lta bu rab tu rtogs pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams
79b3(phal chen): thams cad la myig lam lta bur zhugs pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba thams cad myig yor lta bur khong du chud pa/ sgra skad dang dbyangs thams cad sgra snyan lta bur rnam par rig pa/ chos thams
79b4(phal chen): cad mngon par bsgrub pa'i ye shes sprul pa lta bur rab tu rtogs pa/ khyad par du 'phags pa'i smon lam shin tu bstsags pa/ ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor kun nas rnam par dag pa'i mkhas pa
79b5(phal chen): dang ldan pa/ sems shin tu zhi zhing rab tu zhi ba dang ldan pa gzungs kyi rgyud thams cad kyi yul dang ldan pa/ ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs kyis dogs pa myed par kun nas rab tu gnon pa
79b6(phal chen): chos kyi dbyings kyi gnas kyi mthar phyin pa'i myig dang ldan pa/ chos thams cad la dmyigs pa med par rnam par spyod pa rab tu thob pa/ shes rab rgya mtsho mtha' yas pa la rnam par spyod
79b7(phal chen): pa/ ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i pha rol tu song ba/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i stobs dang / shugs thob pa/ rdzu 'phrul gyi pha rol tu phyin pas 'gro ba thams cad kyi pha rol tu
79b8(phal chen): phyin pa ting nge 'dzin gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dbang du gyur pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi don mkhas pa la phyin ci log myed pa'i ye shes dang ldan pa/ chos kyi
80a1(phal chen): mdzod dbye ba'i cho ga la mkhas pa/ nges pa'i tshig shes pa la mngon par mkhas pa ma spobs pa'i stobs dang / chos kyi sprin zad myi shes pa dang ldan pa/ mi 'jigs pas khyu mchog dang seng ge'i nga ro 'byin pa/
80a2(phal chen): gnas med pa'i chos kyi dga' ba la dga' bas mos pa/ chos thams cad la rab rib myed pa'i myig gis lta ba/ 'jig rten thams cad kyi 'byung ba dang / 'jig pa shes pa'i zla bar gyur pa/ shes
80a3(phal chen): rab kyi dkyil 'khor gyis bden pa'i tshul thams cad la rnam par spyod pa'i 'od zer can/ ye shes kyi rdo rje bsod nams kyi khor yug du gyur pa/ dper bya ba thams cad las shin tu 'das pa/
80a4(phal chen): chos thams cad la dbang po dang ye shes kyi myu gu rab tu skyes pa/ dpa' ba'i rgyal mtshan dang ldan pa/ bdud thams cad kyi rgyal mtshan rab tu snyol ba la dpa' ba ye shes mtha' yas pa'i
80a5(phal chen): dkyil 'khor gyi gzi brjid can/ 'gro ba thams cad las mngon par 'phags pa'i lus dang ldan pa/ chos thams cad la shes rab sgrib pa myed par zad pa dang / myi zad pa'i mtha'i ye shes
80a6(phal chen): kyis rnam par sangs rgyas pa/ yang dag pa'i mtha'i kun gyi mthar phyin pa la gnas pa/ mtshan ma myed pa la rnam par lta ba'i ye shes kyi myig mngon sum can/ byang chub sems dpa'i
80a7(phal chen): spyod pa thams cad mngon par bsgrub pa'i rgyu la mkhas pa/ myi gnyis pa'i ye shes kyi spyod yul dang ldan pa 'jig rten gyi rgyud thams cad la rnam par blta ba/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rgyud
80a8(phal chen): gnas myed pa la thams cad du gzugs brnyan snang bar gyur pa/ chos thams cad la mun pa dang rnam par bral ba ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor mun pa myed pa la rab tu zhugs pa/ phyogs kun tu
80b1(phal chen): chos gyi snang ba rab tu bkye ba/ 'gro ba thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi zhing mchog tu gyur pa/ thos pa dang mthong ba dang / smon lam don yod pa'i zla ba/ bsod nams kyi ri rab 'jig rten thams
80b2(phal chen): cad las mngon par 'phags pa/ phas kyi rgol ba'i tshogs thams cad tshar gcod pa la shin tu dpa' ba/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du sgra skad dang dbyangs kyi nga ro 'byin pa/ sangs rgyas thams
80b3(phal chen): cad kyi sku mthong bas myi ngoms pa/ sangs rgyas kyi sku'i gzugs brnyan gyi dbang sgyur ba dang ldan pa/ 'gro ba gdul ba dang 'thun pa'i lus su byin gyis rlob pa/ zhing 'byam klas pa thams
80b4(phal chen): cad du lus gcig gis rgyas par 'gengs pa/ mngon par 'du bya ba myed pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi dkyil 'khor yongs su dag pa/ thogs pa myed par 'gro ba'i ye shes chen po'i theg pa'i gru dang ldan pa/ ye shes
80b5(phal chen): kyi dkyil 'khor gyis chos kyi dbyings thams cad du lus rab tu snang ba/ ye shes kyi nyi ma 'gro ba thams cad du shar ba/ 'gro ba thams cad bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du dga' ba'i kha dog dang ldan pa/
80b6(phal chen): 'gro ba thams cad kyi bsam pa dang / dbang po rab tu rtogs pa'i ye shes can/ chos thams cad sgrib pa myed pa'i yul khong du chud pa/ chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin skye ba myed pa rnam par rig pa
80b7(phal chen): phra ba dang yangs pa phan tshun du yongs su bsdu ba la dbang sgyur ba/ sangs rgyas kyi zab mo'i tshul nges par rtogs pa/ don zab mo'i tshig dang / yi ge'i tha snyad la mkhas pa/ tshig dang yi ge dang /
80b8(phal chen): don myi zad pa rab tu brjod pa/ mdo sde rgya mtsho thams cad tshig gcig du chud par rab tu ston pa/ gzugs dang ye shes kyi lus rgya chen po byin gyis rlob pa/ bskal pa mtha' yas par yongs su
81a1(phal chen): 'dzin pa'i gzungs dang ldan pa'i byin gyi rlabs can/ sems kyi skad cig gcig gis bskal pa brjod du myed par gnas pa/ rab tu rtogs pa'i ye shes can/ sems kyi skad cig gcig
81a2(phal chen): gis dus gsum shes pas/ 'jig rten thams cad mngon par shes pas/ chos kyi gzugs kyis sangs rgyas kyi chos rgya mtsho mtha' yas pa dran zhing spobs pa 'gro ba thams cad kyis shes
81a3(phal chen): par 'gyur ba'i thabs kyis chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba las phyir myi ldog pa/ sangs rgyas kyi yul la ye shes snang ba rab tu thob pa/ gya nom par snang ba'i ting nge 'dzin la rtag tu mnyam par bzhag pa
81a4(phal chen): chags pa myed pa'i mtha'i chos thams cad rab tu dbye ba'i ye shes la mngon par mkhas pa/ chos thams cad las khyad par du 'phags pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa'i yul la ye shes kyis rnam par rtse ba/
81a5(phal chen): dmyigs pa thams cad rgyan bzang por byin gyis rlob pa/ chos kyi dbyings phyogs myed pa la phyogs kyi rjes su 'brang bas rab tu zhugs pa phyogs thams cad rnam par dbye bas chos kyi dbyings la yang dag
81a6(phal chen): par gzhol ba shin tu phra ba ste/ yangs pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba la byang chub tu rnam par 'tshang rgya ba/ rang bzhin kha dog myed pa las kha dog thams cad yongs su ston pa/ phyogs gcig la yang dag par
81a7(phal chen): gzhol ba de lta bu'i yon tan dang ye shes mtha' yas pas yang dag par bskyed de/ bsod nams dang ye shes kyi snying po dang ldan par gyur pa/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyis bstod pa bsngags pa
81a8(phal chen): bskur ba tshig dang yi ge mi zad pas yon tan dang legs pa brjod du myed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' dze ta'i tshal du 'dus te/ 'khod pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan rgya mtsho la 'jug pa/
81b1(phal chen): de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od zer gyis rab tu snang bar gyur pa/ de dag gi lus thams cad dang / khang pa brtsegs pa de dag dang / byang chub sems dpa'i longs spyod de dag dang / byang chub sems
81b2(phal chen): dpa'i stan de dag dang / dze ta'i tshal thams cad nas kyang / dga' ba chen po'i shugs rab tu thob pa'i chos nyid dang / byang chub sems dpa'i chos snang ba bsam gyis myi khyab pa rab tu
81b3(phal chen): thob pas dga' ba'i shugs las byung ba'i rnam par 'phrul pa chen po'i rgyan mngon par 'thon nas/ chos kyi dbyings thams cad rgyas pa khyab par gyur to/ /'di lta ste sems kyi skad cig
81b4(phal chen): re re la 'od zer gyi dra ba'i sprin shin tu yangs pa/ 'gro ba thams cad yongs su tshim par byed pa mngon par 'thon te/ phyogs bcu rgyas pa khyab par gyur to/ /rin po che sna tshogs kyi dril
81b5(phal chen): bu'i sprin mngon par 'thon te/ dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad yon tan dang legs pa rab tu brjod pa'i sprin gyi nga ro rjes su bsgrags pas phyogs bcu rgyas par khyab par gyur to/ /dmyigs pa
81b6(phal chen): thams cad las 'gro ba thams cad rol mo'i sprin mngon par 'thon te/ sems can thams cad kyi las dang rnam par smin pa rol mo'i sgra snyan par blangs bas rjes su sgrog cing phyogs bcu rgyas pa khyab par
81b7(phal chen): gyur to/ /byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi smon lam dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa sna tshogs yang dag par ston pa'i tshul gyi sprin mang po mngon par 'thon nas/ byang chub sems dpa'
81b8(phal chen): thams cad kyi smon lam gyi sgra dbyangs rab tu sgrog pas phyogs bcu rgyas par khyab par gyur to/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sprul pa dang / rnam par 'phrul ba'i sprin mang po mngon par 'thon
82a1(phal chen): nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsung gi dbyangs rjes su brjod cing / phyogs bcu rgyas par khyab par gyur to/ /byang chub sems dpa'i lus dang / mtshan dang dpe byad bzang pos
82a2(phal chen): rnam par brgyan pa'i sprin mang po mngon par 'thon nas/ zhing thams cad du 'byung ba'i sangs rgyas skye ba gcig nas/ gcig tu brgyud pa rab tu brjod cing phyogs bcu rgyas par khyab par gyur to/ /
82a3(phal chen): dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang mnyam pa'i snying po byang chub kyi sprin mang po mngon par 'thon nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mngon par byang chub pa'i rgyan byung ba yongs su
82a4(phal chen): ston cing / phyogs bcu rgyas par khyab par gyur to/ /dmyigs pa thams cad las klu'i dbang po'i las kyi sprin mang po mngon par 'thon nas/ spos sna tshogs kyi char rab tu 'bebs
82a5(phal chen): shing phyogs bcu rgyas par khyab par gyur to/ /'gro ba thams cad kyi dbang po lus dang 'dra ba'i sprin mang po mngon par 'thon nas/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa yongasu brjod pa byed cing /
82a6(phal chen): phyogs bcu rgyas par khyab par gyur to/ /zhing yongs su dag pa rin po che thams cad kyi rang bzhin yongs kyi gzugs brnyan gyi sprin mang po mngon par 'thon nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
82a7(phal chen): kyi chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba mngon par ston cing / phyogs bcu rgyas par khyab par gyur to/ /de dag la stsogs pa byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis byin gyi brlabs dang / chos kyi snang ba rgya mtsho bsam gyis
82a8(phal chen): myi khyab pa rab tu thob pa'i chos nyid kyis rgyan chen po rnam par sprul pa'i sprin sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du myed pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed byung bar gyur to/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal
82b1(phal chen): gyis sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis rnam par 'phrul pa de dag yongs su ston pa byed cing phyogs bcur rnam par bltas nas/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ /dze ta'i tshal du sangs
82b2(phal chen): rgyas byin gyis rlabs/ /mtha' yas rgya chen yongs su byung la ltos/ /dmigs pa kun las lus kyi sprin chen rnams/ /mngon par 'thon zhing phyogs rnams kun tu khyab/ /bde gshegs sras po rnams
82b3(phal chen): kyi sna tshogs brgyan/ /kha dog mtha' yas rgya chen rnam dag pa/ /stan dang dmyigs pa yongs su bcas pa la/ /de dag thams cad gzugs brnyan 'byung ba snang / /rgyan rnams sna tshogs rin chen 'od
82b4(phal chen): 'phro'i sprin/ /bde gshegs sras po rnams kyi spu rtse las/ /sangs rgyas gsung rnams rab tu sgrog byed cing / /zhing rnams kun gyi dbyings su khyab par 'phro/ /tshangs pa'i dbang po'i gzugs 'dra lus
82b5(phal chen): rnams dang / /spyod lam rab tu zhi ba dag pa'i gzugs/ /zhing gi me tog kun las mngon 'thon te/ /bsam gtan yan lag brjod cing kun tu 'dong / /kun tu bzang po 'dra ba'i rgyal ba'i sras/ /
82b6(phal chen): mtshan rab dpe byad bzang pos brgyan pa'i lus/ /grangs myed bsam yas bde gshegs ba spu las/ /sprul pa de 'dra thogs pa myed par 'byung / /bde gshegs sras po dus gsum byung ba rnams/ /yon tan rgya
82b7(phal chen): mtsho'i legs pa brjod pa dag / rgya mtsho che mnyam rgyan sprin de dag kun/ /dze ta'i tshal na gnas shing rab tu brjod/ /phyogs rnams kun gyi sems can yongs kyi las/ /rgya mtsho chen po sna tshogs ma lus
82b8(phal chen): par/ /dze ta'i tshal gyi shing gi gzugs rnams kyi/ /gseb nas byung bar gyur pa kun tu grag /dus gsum byung ba'i rgyal ba thams cad kyi/ /zhing rnams kun gyi ma lus rnam 'phrul ba/ /zhing rnams
83a1(phal chen): rgya mtsho'i rdul snyed de dag kyang / /so so'i dmyigs kyis dmyigs par 'gyur ba snang / /sangs rgyas phyogs kyi zhing rnams rgya mtsho'i sprin/ /spu rtse re rer sna tshogs rnam phye ba'i/ /sangs
83a2(phal chen): rgyas gnas rnams skad cig re rer yang / /de dag la yang sangs rgyas sprin mang bzhugs/ /'gro dang mnyam par phyogs rnams kun bkang zhing / /sems can thabs kyis yongs su smyin par byed/ /de dag 'od
83a3(phal chen): las spos kyi 'od 'phro dang / /me tog phal chen rgya mtsho'i sprin kyang 'byung / /mkha' ltar tshad myed rin chen gzhal myed khang / /ma lus rgyan rab kun gyis rnam mdzes pa/ /de dag thams cad phyogs rnams
83a4(phal chen): kun khyab byed/ /zhing dang snying po byang chub de bzhin no/ /dus gsum byung ba'i rgyal ba'i sras rnams kyis/ /kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa'i rnam tshul du/ /zhing rnams rgya mtsho rnam par dag byas pa'i/ /rgyan
83a5(phal chen): rab sna tshogs 'gro ltar tshad myed pa/ /phyogs rnams dus gsum kun tu gang byung rnams/ /bskal pa rgya mtsho chen por rnam sbyangs pa/ /de dag kun kyang dze ta'i nags tshal gyi/ /bar snang mkha' la
83a6(phal chen): gzugs brnyan tshul du snang / /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi ting nge 'dzin gyis/ rgyud shin tu snang bar byas pa de dag las/ byang chub sems dpa' re res kyang / snying rje chen po'i sgo sangs
83a7(phal chen): rgyas kyi zhing brjod du myed pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed du zhugs par gyur nas/ de dag de bas kyang 'gro ba thams cad la phan pa dang / yongs su bsdu ba'i don du zhugs par gyur te/ de ltar mnyam par bzhag pa de dag gi
83a8(phal chen): ba spu'i sgo re re nas kyang / 'od zer sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed mngon par 'thon par gyur te/ 'od zer de dag gi sgo re re nas kyang / byang chub sems dpa' 'phrul ba'i sprin 'jig rten gyi
83b1(phal chen): dbang po thams cad dang 'dra ba'i lus dang / 'gro ba thams cad la mngon par lta ba'i lus dang / sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba dang / 'phrod pa'i lus dang ldan pa mngon par 'thon te/ mngon
83b2(phal chen): par 'thon nas kyang / phyogs thams cad kyi chos kyi dbyings rgyas par bkang nas/ sems can thams cad yang dag par skul zhing yongs su smyin par bya ba dang / gdul bar byed do/ /lha'i gnas na shi
83b3(phal chen): 'pho ba yongs su bstan pa'i sgo dang / 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du skye ba yongs su bstan pa'i sgo dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i dkyil 'khor yongs su bstan pa'i sgo dang / rmi lam
83b4(phal chen): yongs su bstan pa'i sgo sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du myed pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis sems can yongs su bskul ba byed do/ /byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi smon lam gyis 'byung
83b5(phal chen): ba'i sgo dang / 'jig rten gyi khams yongs su bskyod pa'i sgo dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa yongs su bstan pa'i sgo dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yon tan bya ba dang /
83b6(phal chen): rab tu bsgrub pa'i sgo dang / yan lag dang nying lag gcod pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su bstan pa'i sgo dang / byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par 'phrul pa chen pos brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin
83b7(phal chen): pa yongs su bstan pa'i sgo dang / byang chub sems dpa'i bsam gtan dang rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang snyoms par 'jug pa thams cad dang / sangs rgyas kyi ye shes kyi lam gyi dkyil 'khor
83b8(phal chen): snang ba rab tu brjod pa'i sgo dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su btsal ba'i phyir/ chos kyi tshig dang yi ge re re'i phyir/ lus grangs myed pa yongs su bstan pa'i sgo dang / de bzhin gshegs pa
84a1(phal chen): thams cad kyi drung du 'gro zhing chos thams cad yongs su dri nga ba'i sgo dang / dus la ji ltar 'bab pa dang / bsam pa ji ltar 'bab bzhin du 'gro ba'i drung du 'gro zhing thams
84a2(phal chen): cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su smyin par 'gyur ba thob par bya ba'i tshul rgya mtsho snang ba'i rnam par dmyigs par bya ba'i sgo dang / byang chub sems dpa'i bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs thams cad bdud dang /
84a3(phal chen): phas kyis rgol bas myi tshugs pa'i stobs kyi rgyal mtshan yongs su bstan pa'i sgo dang / bzo thams cad shes shing mkhas pa dang ldan pa'i shes pa'i sa bon yongs su bstan pa'i sgo dang / 'gro ba thams
84a4(phal chen): cad las khyad par du 'phags par shes shing mkhas pa dang ldan pa'i ye shes kyis yongs su bstan pa'i sgo dang / sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa'i khyad par shes shing mkhas pa dang ldan pa'i
84a5(phal chen): ye shes kyis yongs su bstan pa'i sgo dang / sems can thams cad kyi dbang po la 'jug pa'i dbang po nyon mongs pa dang / bag chags sna tshogs yang dag par gzhom pa la shes shing mkhas pa dang ldan pa'i
84a6(phal chen): ye shes kyis yongs su bstan pa'i sgo dang / de dag la stsogs pa sems can thams cad yongs su smyin par bya ba dang / gdul ba'i thabs dang bsdu ba'i sgo/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du myed pa'i rdul shin
84a7(phal chen): tu phra ba snyed kyis byang chub sems dpa' de dag sems can thams cad kyi gnas su phyin par snang ste/ la la ni lha'i gnas su phyin par snang ngo / /la la ni klu'i gnas su phyin par snang ngo / /la la ni
84a8(phal chen): gnod sbyin gyi gnas su phyin par snang ngo / /la la ni dri za'i gnas su phyin par snang ngo / /la la ni lha ma yin gyi gnas su phyin par snang ngo / /la la ni nam mkha' lding gi gnas su phyin par snang ngo / /
84b1(phal chen): la la ni mi 'am ci'i gnas su phyin par snang ngo / /la la ni lto 'phye chen po'i gnas su phyin par snang ngo / /la la ni tshangs pa'i dbang po'i gnas su phyin par snang ngo / /la la ni mi'i gnas su phyin par
84b2(phal chen): snang ngo / /la la ni gshin rje'i gnas su phyin par snang ngo / /la la ni yi dags kyi gnas su phyin par snang ngo / /la la ni sems can dmyal ba'i 'jig rten thams cad du phyin par snang ngo / /la la ni yi
84b3(phal chen): dgas kyi skye gnas kyi rgyud thams cad du phyin par snang ngo / mthong bas 'dul ba'i sems can dang / thos pas 'dul ba dang rjes su dran pas 'dul ba dang / dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor gyis 'dul
84b4(phal chen): ba dang / mying gi chu klung gi sgras 'dul ba dang / 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyis 'dul ba dang / 'od zer gyi dra ba rab tu 'gyed pas 'dul ba dang / sems can rnams kyi bsam pa'i tshul ji lta ba bzhin
84b5(phal chen): du yongs su smyin par bya ba dang / gdul ba'i phyir snying rje chen po tha myi dad pa dang / smon lam tha myi dad pa dang / ye shes tha myi dad pa dang / sems can yongs su bsdu ba tha myi dad pa'i tshul du byang chub
84b6(phal chen): sems dpa' de dag 'dze ta'i tshal nas rnam par 'phrul pa'i rgyan rnam pa sna tshogs kyis 'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas pa thams cad dang / sems can gyi khams 'byam klas pa thams cad du rgyas
84b7(phal chen): par 'gengs par byed par snang yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs kyi drung nas myi g.yo ste/ la la ni rang gi gnas dang khang pa brtsegs pa dang / stan dang 'khor dang bcas pas/ phyogs bcu
84b8(phal chen): rgyas par byed par snang yang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs kyi drung nas myi g.yo'o/ /la la ni sprul pa'i sprin rab tu 'gyed par snang ngo / /la la ni sems can yongs su smyin par bya ba'i don du
85a1(phal chen): gcig pa gnyis su myed par 'gro bar snang yang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor nas myi g.yo'o/ /la la ni dge sbyong gi gzugs/ la la ni tshangs pa'i gzugs/
85a2(phal chen): la la ni rtul zhugs can thams cad kyi cha byad dang / cho ga dang chu zheng gi gzugs/ la la ni sman pa'i gzugs/ la la ni tshong pa'i gzugs/ la la ni nyan pas 'tsho ba'i gzugs/ la la ni gar
85a3(phal chen): mkhan gyi gzugs/ la la ni lha khyer ba'i gzugs/ la la ni bzo thams cad dang ldan pa'i gzugs su grong dang grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang / ljongs dang / khams dang / rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor
85a4(phal chen): du phyin par snang ste/ dus kyi dbang gis dus kyi rjes su 'brang zhing mying dang gzugs dang lus mngon par bsgrub pa tha dad pa dang / lus kyi kha dog dang dbyibs tshul dang 'dra ba dang dbyangs rnam pa tha dad pa
85a5(phal chen): dang / skad rnam pa tha dad pa dang / spyod pa rnam pa tha dad pa dang / gnas rnam pa tha dad pas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa dang / 'gro ba thams cad myig 'phrul lta bur shes pa dang / bzo'i 'khor
85a6(phal chen): thams cad rab tu brjod pa dang / 'gro ba thams cad kyi shes pa brjod pas snang ba'i sgron ma dang / bde ba thams cad kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis brgyan pa dang / las thams cad snang bar byed pa'i 'od dang ldan
85a7(phal chen): pa dang / phyogs thams cad theg pa la gnas pas rab tu sbyong ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa chos thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor rab tu snang ba la spyod cing / sems can yongs su smyin par bya ba
85a8(phal chen): dang / gdul ba'i don du grong dang grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang ljongs dang / khams dang / rgyal po'i gnas dag du phyin par snang ngo / /de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa gnas pa myed pa'i khang pa
85b1(phal chen): brtsegs pa na 'dug 'dug pa las bskal pa 'thun pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang / rtag tu phyi bzhin 'brang ba'i lag na rdo rje dag dang / 'jig rten thams cad kyi nyams blta ba la brtson zhing sangs
85b2(phal chen): rgyas thams cad bsnyen bkur bar smon pa'i sems dang ldan pa'i lus kyi ris su gtogs pa'i lha dag dang / sngon gyi smon lam gyis rjes su 'brang ba'i rkang gis 'gro ba'i ris su gtogs pa'i lha
85b3(phal chen): dag dang / chos mnyan pa la mngon par mos pa'i sa'i lha dag dang / snying rje chen po la brtson pa'i lus dang / mtsho dang mtshe'u dang / rdzing bu dang khron pa dang / chu klung gi lha dag dang / shes rab kyi
85b4(phal chen): 'od snang bas rab tu gsal ba'i me'i lha dag dang / rin po che'i gcod pan thogs pa'i rlung gi lha dag dang / chos kyi phyogs snang bar khong du chud pa'i phyogs kyi lha dag dang / ma rig pa'i mun pa gsal
85b5(phal chen): ba la brtson pa'i mtshan mo'i lha dag dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyi ma mngon par bsgrub pa la brtson pa'i nyi ma'i lha dag dang / chos kyi dbyings thams cad kyi nam mkha' brgyan pa la brtson pa'i nam
85b6(phal chen): mkha'i lha dag dang / 'gro ba thams cad srid pa'i rgya mtsho las bsgral bar brtson pa'i gangs chen mtsho'i lha dag dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du tshogs yang dag par bstsags pa la brtson zhing /
85b7(phal chen): dge ba'i rtsa ba'i spo mngon par 'phags pa'i sems dang ldan pa'i ri'i lha dang / 'gro ba thams cad kyi lus brgyan par brtson zhing sangs rgyas thams cad kyi kha dog dang byin gyis rlabs la smon cing
85b8(phal chen): brtson pa'i chu klung gi lha dag dang / 'gro ba thams cad kyi sems kyi grong rdal yongs su bskyang bar brtson pa'i grong gi lha dag dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i chos kyi grong khyer du smon cing mos
86a1(phal chen): pa'i klu'i dbang po dag dang / sems can thams cad yongs su bsrung ba la zhugs pa'i gnod sbyin gyi dbang po dag dang / sems can thams cad kyi dga' ba'i shugs rnam par
86a2(phal chen): 'phel bar bya ba la brtson pa'i dri za'i dbang po dag dang / yi dags kyi rgyud thams cad rnam par bzlog pa la brtson pa'i grul bum gyi dbang po dag dang / sems can thams cad srid pa'i rgya mtsho nas gdon pa'i
86a3(phal chen): smon lam gyis zhugs pa'i nam mkha' lding gi dbang po dag dang / 'jig rten thams cad las 'phags pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku dang / stobs yongs su bsgrub par smon lam yongs
86a4(phal chen): su bskyed pa'i lha ma yin gyi dbang po dag dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthong bas dga' bar gyur cing / lus rab tu 'dud pa'i lto 'phye chen po'i dbang po dag dang / 'khor ba las skyo ba'i yid
86a5(phal chen): dang ldan zhing ngor blta ba'i lha'i dbang po dag dang / rim gro chen po rab tu byed cing lus rab tu 'dud pa'i tshangs pa'i dbang po dag dang / lhan cig tu de dag gis rim gro chen pos mngon par bstod de
86a6(phal chen): mchod cing / de lta bu'i byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par gnon pa'i rgyan phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan par rang gi gnas nas byung ste/ bcom ldan 'das la g.yas phyogs su bskor ba lan brgya phrag
86a7(phal chen): du ma zhig tu byas nas/ mchod pa rnam pa du mas mchod de/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas phyir byung nas/ lho phyogs logs su yul rgyu zhing song ngo // //sangs rgyas rmad ga cad
86a8(phal chen): ces bya ba shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo/ bam po bdun pa/ de nas sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bus 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa/
86b1(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par 'phrul pa'i rgyan phun sum tshogs pa de 'dra bas/ dze ta'i tshal nas byung ste/ lho phyogs logs su 'gro ba mthong nas/ de 'di snyam du gyur te/ bdag kyang 'jam
86b2(phal chen): dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang lhan cig du yul rgyu zhing 'gro snyam nas/ de dge slong drug bcu tsam gyis bskor cing mdun du byas te/ rang gi gnas nas byung nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste/
86b3(phal chen): bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal nas/ bcom ldan 'das la zhus te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang ba dang / bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum du bskor ba byas
86b4(phal chen): nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas phyir byung ste/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa gang na ba der dge slong lhan cig tu spyod pa rab tu byung nas ring po ma lon par gsar du zhugs pa
86b5(phal chen): sha stag ste/ 'di ltar dge slong rgya mtsho'i blo dang / legs par byin pa chen po dang / bsod nams kyi 'od dang / bu chen po dang kun khyab sbyin pa dang / rnam dag spyod pa dang /
86b6(phal chen): lha'i dpal dbang po'i blo gros dang / tshangs pa'i dam pa dang / dge slong zhi ba'i blo gros dang / de dag la stsogs pa'i dge slong drug bcu rtsam kun kyang / sngon gyi rgyal ba la bya ba byas pa/ dge ba'i
86b7(phal chen): rtsa ba bskyed pa/ mos pa zab mor gyur pa/ dad pa'i myig yongs su dag pa/ sems rgya chen pos yongs su spyod pa/ sangs rgyas kyi phyogs kyi rnam par blta ba la mthu yod pa/ chos
86b8(phal chen): kyi ngo bo nyid dang / rang bzhin nges par rtogs pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ gzhan la phan par gyur pa'i blo can/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan la mngon par mos pa/ 'jam dpal
87a1(phal chen): gzhon nur gyur pas chos bstan pas 'dul ba sha stag dang 'grogs shing mdun du byas te sngon du bdar nas/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa gang na ba der dong ngo / /de nas tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bus de ltar lam
87a2(phal chen): du zhugs te/ 'dong ba'i tshe dge slong de dag kun la bltas nas/ dge slong rgya mtsho'i blo la smras pa/ rgya mtsho'i blo byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gyi lus mtshan dang dpe byad bzang pos rnam par brgyan cing /
87a3(phal chen): yongs su dag pa/ lha dang mir bcas pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / 'od kyi dkyil 'khor yongs su dag cing sems can tshad med pa'i dga' ba yongs su bskyed pa dang / 'od zer gyi dra ba'i rgyan sems
87a4(phal chen): can dpag tu med pa'i sdug bsngal rab tu zhi bar byed pa dang / 'khor phun sum tshogs pa sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa bas yongs su bzung ba dang / lam gyi rgyan 'gro na lam myigs mangs ris su gnas pa dang lam
87a5(phal chen): rnam par gnon pa'i rgyan phyogs kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad la mngon par lta bas gnas pa dang / bsod nams phun sum tshogs pa'i rgyan g.yas g.yon nas gter chen por mngon par 'thon pa dang sngon
87a6(phal chen): gyi sangs rgyas la rim gro byas pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dang rgyu mthun pas/ shing gi gseb thams cad nas rgyan mang po 'byung ba dang / 'jig rten gyi dbang po thams cad la mchod pa'i sprin gyi char mngon par 'bebs
87a7(phal chen): shing btud de phyag 'tshal ba dang / phyogs bcu nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis 'od zer gyi dra ba'i dkyil 'khor mang po bkye ba/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad rab tu sgrog cing spyi bor 'char ba
87a8(phal chen): la ltos shig ces/ de dag la sogs pa tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bus/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa lam du zhugs pa'i yon tan gyi rgyan tshad med pa dag /dge slong de dag la yongs su bstan to/ /brjod do bshad
87b1(phal chen): do/ /smos so/ /bkrol lo/ /rab tu brjod do/ /rnam par phye'o/ /gsal bar byas so/ /de ltar gnas brten sha ri'i bus 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i yon tan ci tsam du brjod pa de tsam du dge slong de dag gi sems rnam
87b2(phal chen): par dag par gyur to/ /rab tu dang bar gyur to/ /dga' ba'i shugs rnam par 'phel bar gyur to/ /mos pa skyes par gyur to/ /de dag gis sems rgyud las su rung bar gyur to/ /dbang po rab tu dang bar gyur to/ /yid
87b3(phal chen): bde ba rnam par 'phel bar gyur to/ /yid mi bde ba rab tu byung bar gyur to/ /sems kyi skyon dang bral bar gyur to/ /sgrib pa thams cad phyir ldog par gyur to/ /sangs rgyas blta ba la mngon par mos par gyur to/ /
87b4(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyi chos la sems rab tu gzhol bar gyur to/ /byang chub sems dpa'i dbang po yongs su dag par gyur to/ /byang chub sems dpa'i dad pa'i shugs skye bar gyur to/ /snying rje chen po 'byung bar gyur to/ /
87b5(phal chen): pha rol tu phyin pa'i dkyil 'khor gnon par gyur to/ /snying rje chen po yongs su skye bar 'gyur ro/ /phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas rgya mtsho yongs su snang bar gyur to/ /de ltar de dag thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du mos
87b6(phal chen): pa'i shugs thob par gyur nas 'di skad 'dzer to/ /mkhan po bdag cag kyang skyes bu dam pa de'i drung du phyin par mdzad du gsol zhes nas/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu dge slong de dag dang 'grogs te/
87b7(phal chen): 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa gang na ba der song nas 'di skad ces smras so/ /'jam dpal dge slong 'di dag ni khyod la blta bar 'dod pa dag go/ /de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas dge slong de dag dang /
87b8(phal chen): 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor gyi sa'i phyogs de tsam dang bcas par glang po'i lta stangs kyi gzi dang ldan par khyab par bltas pa dang / de yi rjes la dge slong de dag gis 'jam dpal gzhon nur
88a1(phal chen): gyur pa'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal nas/ thal mo sbyar te 'di skad ces smras so/ /skyes bu dam pa khyod mthong ba dang / khyod la phyag 'tshal ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba 'di dang bdag cag gi dge
88a2(phal chen): ba'i rtsa ba gzhan khyod kyis mkhyen pa dang / mkhan pos thugs su chud pa dang / gang yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas mngon du gzigs pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba des/ khyod ci 'dra ba de 'dra
88a3(phal chen): bar gyur te/ rnam pa 'di 'dra ba'i lus thob par shog shig /rnam pa 'di 'dra ba'i dbyangs dang / rnam pa 'di 'dra ba'i mtshan dang / 'di lta bu'i rnam par 'phrul pa dag kyang khyod ji lta ba bzhin du thob par shog
88a4(phal chen): shig ces dge slong de dag gis de skad du smras pa dang / 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas dge slong de dag la 'di skad ces smras so/ /dge slong dag yongs su mi skyo ba'i sems bskyed pa bcu dang ldan pa'i rigs
88a5(phal chen): kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo theg pa chen po la zhugs pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i lta smos kyang ci dgos kyi/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sa yang gnon par 'gyur ro/ /bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ de bzhin
88a6(phal chen): gshegs pa thams cad blta ba dang / bsnyen bkur ba dang / mchod pa dang rim gro bya ba la yongs su mi skyo ba'i sems bskyed pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad bstsags pa las phyir mi ldog cing yongs su mi
88a7(phal chen): skyo ba'i sems bskyed pa dang / chos thams cad btsal ba la yongs su mi skyo ba'i sems bskyed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad sbyor ba la yongasu mi skyo ba'i sems bskyed pa dang /
88a8(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin thams cad yongs su bsgrub pa la yongasu mi skyo ba'i sems bskyed pa dang / dus gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa thams cad du 'jug pa la yongs su mi skyo ba'i
88b1(phal chen): sems bskyed pa dang / phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing rgya mtsho rgyas par dgang zhing yongs su dag par bya ba la/ yongs su mi skyo ba'i sems bskyed pa dang / sems can gyi khams thams
88b2(phal chen): cad yongs su smin par bya ba dang / gdul ba la yongs su mi skyo ba'i sems bskyed pa dang / zhing dang bskal pa thams cad du byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa mngon par bsgrub pa la yongs su mi skyo ba'i
88b3(phal chen): sems bskyed pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sbyar bas sems can gcig yongs su smin par bya ba'i tshul du sems can thams cad yongs su smin
88b4(phal chen): par bya bas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs gcig yongs su bsgrub pa la yongs su mi skyo ba'i sems bskyed pa'o/ /dge slong dag yongs su mi skyo ba'i sems bskyed pa bcu po 'di dag dang ldan pa'i rigs
88b5(phal chen): kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo dad pa dang ldan pa ni dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad la yongs su 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /'khor ba'i rgyud thams cad las phyir ldog par 'gyur ro/ /'jig rten gyi khams rgyud
88b6(phal chen): thams cad las gyen du 'phags par 'gyur ro/ /nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sa thams cad las phyir yongs su 'da' bar 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs dang rgyud du 'byung
88b7(phal chen): bar 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi smon lam la yang dag par 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yon tan gyi nan tan la rnam par dag par 'gyur ro/ /byang
88b8(phal chen): chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad la yongs su dag par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi stobs la yang dag par 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /bdud dang phas kyi rgol ba thams cad rab tu
89a1(phal chen): 'dul bar 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems dpa'i sa yongs su gnon par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sa dang shin tu nye bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas dge slong de dag gis chos kyi tshul 'di thos nas/
89a2(phal chen): sangs rgyas thams cad rnam par mthong ba la chags pa med pa'i mig gi yul zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob par gyur to/ /de'i mthus phyogs bcu mtha' yas mu med pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams na bzhugs pa/
89a3(phal chen): de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor mthong bar gyur to/ /'jig rten gyi khams de dag gi 'gro ba'i rgyud du skyes pa'i sems can de dag kyang ma lus pa mthong bar gyur to/ /'jig rten gyi khams de dag gi
89a4(phal chen): sems can rnams kyang ma lus par mthong bar gyur to/ /'jig rten gyi khams de dag kyang rnam par phye ba sna tshogs su mthong bar gyur to/ /'jig rten gyi khams de dag na rdul shin tu phra ba ji snyed yod pa de dag
89a5(phal chen): kyang bgrangs ba'i tshul gyis rab tu shes par gyur to/ /sems can de dag gi rin po che'i gnas dang / longs spyod de dag kyang mthong bar gyur to/ /de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi dbyangs kyi yan lag rgya mtsho
89a6(phal chen): yang thos par gyur to/ /chos bstan pa de dag kyang tshig dang yi ge dang nges pa'i tshigs dang skad dang ming dang brdas yongs su shes par gyur to/ /sems can de dag gi sems dang dbang po dang bsam pa la
89a7(phal chen): yang mi dmigs par lta bar gyur to/ /sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha'i tshe rabs bcu yang rjes su dran par gyur to/ /de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi chos kyi 'khor lo bcu'i nges pa'i tshig mngon
89a8(phal chen): par bsgrub pa la yang rab tu zhugs par gyur to/ /rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam par 'phrul pa mngon par bsgrub pa bcu la yang rab tu zhugs par gyur to/ /bstan pa'i tshul mngon par bsgrub pa bcu la yang dag
89b1(phal chen): par rab tu zhugs par gyur to/ /rjes su bstan pa'i tshig mngon par bsgrub pa bcu la yang rab tu zhugs par gyur to/ /de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi so so yang dag par rig pa'i tshul mngon par bsgrub
89b2(phal chen): pa bcu la yang rab tu zhugs par gyur to/ /ting nge 'dzin de thob ma thag tu/ byang chub kyi sems kyi yan lag stong phrag bcu yang yongasu rdzogs par gyur to/ /ting nge 'dzin stong phrag bcu yang yongasu non par gyur to/ /
89b3(phal chen): pha rol tu phyin pa'i yan lag stong phrag bcu yang rnam par dag par 'gyur te/ snang ba chen po rab tu thob cing shes rab chen po'i dkyil 'khor gyi snang bar gyur pa de dag gis byang chub sems dpa'i mngon par shes pa
89b4(phal chen): bcu rab tu thob par gyur to/ /de ltar mngon par shes pa'i myu gu gzhon zhing shin tu phra ba thob ste/ byang chub tu sems bskyed pa brtan pa la gnas pa de dag 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas/ byang chub sems dpa'
89b5(phal chen): kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa la yang dag par bskul nas rab tu bkod do/ /de ltar byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa la rab tu gnas pa de dag smon lam chen po'i rgya mtsho la zhugs shing mngon par
89b6(phal chen): sgrub par gyur to/ /de ltar smon lam chen po rgya mtshos mngon par bsgrub pa'i sems rnam par dag pas lus yongasu dag pa rab tu thob par gyur to/ /lus rnam par dag pas lus yang ba rab tu thob par
89b7(phal chen): gyur to/ /de ltar lus rnam par dag pa dang lus yang bas mngon par shes pa'i sgo de dag shin tu yangs par byed pas/ mi nyams shing rjes su 'brang ba'i mngon par shes pa rab tu thob par gyur to/ /mngon par
89b8(phal chen): shes pa de thob pas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i rkang pa'i drung nas kyang mi g.yo la/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su sgrub pa'i phyir phyogs bcur yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku'i 'phrin
90a1(phal chen): las kyi sprin mngon par bsgrub par gyur to/ /de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas/ dge slong de dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod nas mthar gyi yul rgyu zhing lho phyogs
90a2(phal chen): logasu skyid pa'i 'byung gnas zhes bya ba'i grong rdal chen po gang na ba der logasu song ste/ phyin nas grong rdal chen po skyid pa'i 'byung gnas kyi shar phyogs logs na nags tshal chen po stsal sna tshogs kyis
90a3(phal chen): rgyal mtshan gyi rgyan ces bya ba sngon gyi sangs rgyas bzhugs bzhugs pa'i mchod rten sems can smin par byed pa'i don du/ de bzhin gshegs pas byin gyis brlabs zhing mtha' yas par ming gi sgra rjesu
90a4(phal chen): grag pa dang / sngon cad bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa mdzad pa'i tshe/ yongasu btang bar dka' ba du ma yongasu btang ba ste/ sa'i phyogs de na lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang dri za dang lha ma
90a5(phal chen): yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa rnams rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par mchod pa la brtson pa'i gnas yod pa der 'khor dang bcas te phyin nas der
90a6(phal chen): 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas/ mdo sde chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul rab tu snang bar bya ba zhes bya ba mdo sde bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag bcu 'byung bar bstan to/ /de bstan pa'i tshe rgya mtsho chen po nas klung bye
90a7(phal chen): ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma nye bar lhags te/ de dag gi chos kyi tshul de thos nas/ klu'i rgyud la rnam par smod cing / de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan la mos par gyur nas klu'i rgyud rnam par zlog ste/
90a8(phal chen): lha dang mir skye ba yongs su 'dzin par gyur nas/ der klu stong phrag bcu bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par gyur to/ /chos bstan pa'i tshe sems can gyi khams mtha' yas
90b1(phal chen): pa dang dbus med pa theg pa gsum gyis dus gzhan dang gzhan du rnam par 'dul bar gyur to/ /de nas skyid pa'i 'byung gnas kyi mi rnams kyis/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa skyid pa'i 'byung gnas kyi grong rdal du phyin te/
90b2(phal chen): sa la sna tshogs kyi rgyan sna tshogs kyi mchod rten gyi gzhi 'di nyid na rnam par spyod do zhes thos nas/ dge bsnyen tshong dpon shes rab chen po la sogs pa dge bsnyen pha dang / dge bsnyen ma dang / khye'u dang bu mo
90b3(phal chen): mang po dag so so nas 'khor lnga brgya dang bcas te/ skyid pa'i 'byung gnas kyi grong rdal nas byung nas/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa gang na ba der dong ngo / /de la dge bsnyen shes rab chen po ni dge bsnyen
90b4(phal chen): bzang pos byin dang / lhas byin dang bsod nams 'od dang / grags pa'i lha dang grags pas byin dang / zla ba'i dpal dang zla ba dga' ba dang / blo gros bzang po dang / blo gros chen po dang / sgra gcan bzang po dang dge
90b5(phal chen): bsnyen bzang po'i dpal dang / de dag la sogs pa dge bsnyen lnga brgyas bskor cing mdun du byas te/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa gang na ba der dong nas/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos
90b6(phal chen): phyag 'tshal te/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la lan gsum du bskor ba byas nas/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /de la dge bsnyen ma shes rab chen mo ni/ dge bsnyen ma 'od bzang mo dang / lus bzang mo
90b7(phal chen): dang / dge ba yod pa dang / dge ba'i dpal dang / zla ba'i dpal dang / zla ba'i 'od dang / dpal gyi 'od dang / dpal bzang mo dang / dge bsnyen ma mig bzang mo dang / de dag la sogs pa dge bsnyen
90b8(phal chen): ma lnga brgyas bskor cing mdun du byas te/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa gang na ba der dong nas/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ 'jam dpal gzhon
91a1(phal chen): nur gyur pa la lan gsum du bskor ba byas nas/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /de la tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang ni/ tshong dpon gyi bu brtul zhugs bzang po dang / tshul khrims bzang po dang / ngang tshul
91a2(phal chen): bzang po dang / rnam par gnon pa bzang po dang / bsam pa bzang po dang / blo gros bzang po dang / blo bzang po dang / mig bzang po dang / lag pa bzang po dang / tshong dpon gyi bu 'od bzang po dang / de dag la
91a3(phal chen): sogs pa tshong dpon gyi bu lnga brgyas bskor cing mdun du byas te/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa gang na ba der dong nas/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ 'jam dpal
91a4(phal chen): gzhon nur gyur pa la lan gsum bskor ba byas te/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /de la khyim bdag shes rab chen po'i bu mo dge ba bzang mo ni bu mo bzang mo dang / yid du 'ong ba'i bzhin dang / brten pa'i blo gros
91a5(phal chen): dang / dpal bzang mo dang / tshangs pas byin dang / dpal gyi 'od dang / bu mo 'od bzang mo la sogs pa bu mo lnga brgyas bskor cing mdun du byas te/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa gang na ba der dong nas/ 'jam dpal
91a6(phal chen): gzhon nur gyur pa'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la lan gsum du bskor ba byas nas/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur
91a7(phal chen): gyur pas skyid pa'i 'byung gnas kyi grong rdal nas skyes pa dang / bud med dang khye'u dang bu mo de dag 'dus te/ 'khod par shes nas bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du bstan pa'i byin gyis zil gyis mnan te byams
91a8(phal chen): pa chen po'i byin gyis tshim par byas nas/ snying rje chen po'i byin gyis chos bstan pa mngon par bsgrubs te/ ye shes kyi byin gyis sems dang bsam pa rnam par phye nas/ so so yang dag par rig pa chen
91b1(phal chen): pos chos bstan par dga' ste/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs la bltas so/ /tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs shes bya ba ci'i phyir nor bzang shes bya zhe na/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs zhes bya ba de thog ma ma'i
91b2(phal chen): mngal du zhugs ma thag tu khyim de'i 'khor kun nas rnam par phye ba'i rin po che sna bdun gyi sdong po mthon par gyur to/ /rin po che'i sdong po de dag gi 'og na rin po che'i gter bdun yod de/ gser dang dngul dang
91b3(phal chen): bai DUr+ya dang / shel dang mu tig dmar po dang / a sma gar ba dang / mu sa ra gal pa dang / rin po che sna bdun gyi rin po che'i sdong po de dag kyang gter de dag nas skyes te/ sa'i gzhi brtol nas mngon par mthon par
91b4(phal chen): gyur to/ /de yan lag dang nying lag thams cad yongasu rdzogs te/ zla ba bcu lon nas btsas pa dang / de'i tshe gter chen po bdun po de dag kyang chu zheng dang rngams su khru bdun tsam du sa'i steng nas mngon par
91b5(phal chen): 'phags te/ snang bar gyur nas rnam par snang zhing mdzes par gyur to/ /khyim der rin po che sna tshogs kyi snod lnga brgya yang byung bar gyur te/ 'di ltar mar gyi snod dang / til mar gyi snod dang sbrang rtsi'i snod dang mar
91b6(phal chen): sar gyi snod dang / gzhan dag kyang so so nas yo byad sna tshogs thams cad gyi yongasu gang ba dag ste/ 'di ltar rdo rje'i snod spos sna tshogs kyi yongasu gang ba dang / spos kyi snod gos sna tshogs kyis yongasu gang ba dang /
