91b7(phal chen): man shel gyi snod kha zas dang / spyan gzigs sna tshogs ro mchog du zhim pas yongs su gang ba dang / nor bu'i snod rin po che sna tshogs kyis yongs su gang ba dang / gser gyi snod dngul sil mas yongs
91b8(phal chen): su gang ba dang / dngul gyi snod gser phyes gang ba dang / phra men gyi snod nor bu rin po che bai DUR+Yas yongs su gang ba dang / shel gyi snod mu sa ra gal pas yongs su gang ba dang / mu sa ra gal pa'i
92a1(phal chen): snod rin po che shel gyi yongs su gang ba dang / a sma gar ba'i snod mu tig dmar pos yongs su gang ba dang / mu tig dmar po'i snod a sma gar bas yongs su gang ba dang / nor bu rin po che skar
92a2(phal chen): ma'i rgyal mtshan gyi snod rin po che chu dang gi yongs su gang ba dang / nor bu rin po che chu 'dang gi snod nor bu rin po che skar ma'i rgyal mtshan gyi yongs su gang ba dang / de dag la sogs pa rin po che'i snod lnga
92a3(phal chen): brgya 'thon par gyur to/ /tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs de btsas ma thag tu khyim dang bang ba dang mdzod thams cad du nor dang 'bru dang dbyig dang / gser dang rin po che sna tshogs kyi char mngon par bab par gyur to/ /
92a4(phal chen): de la bram ze'i ltas pa dang / pha dang ma dang gnyen gyi tshogs kyis 'di btsas ma thag tu nor mang po phun sum tshogs pa 'byung bar gyur pas na/ nor bzang nor bzangs shes de ltar ming du btags te/
92a5(phal chen): tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs de ni sngon gyi rgyal ba la bya ba byas so/ /dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa'o/ /mos pa rgya chen po dang ldan pa'o/ /dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi rjes su 'brang ba'i bsam pa
92a6(phal chen): can no/ /lus dang ngag dang yid kyi spyod pa kha na ma tho ba med pa'o/ /byang chub sems dpa'i lam yongs su sbyangs pa la rab tu brtson pa'o/ /thams cad mkhyen pa la mngon par mos pa'o/ /
92a7(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi snod du gyur pa'o/ /bsam pa'i nam mkha' yongs su dag pa'o/ /byang chub kyi sems chags pa med pa yongasu rdzogs pa'o/ /de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas
92a8(phal chen): tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang la bltas te/ dga' ba'i gtam byas nas de la 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad las kyang brtsams/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yang dag par bsdu zhing /
92b1(phal chen): mthon par bya ba las kyang brtsams/ sangs rgyas thams cad gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa las kyang brtsams/ sangs rgyas thams cad gcig nas gcig tu rgyud pa'i thams cad shes par bya ba las kyang
92b2(phal chen): brtsams/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rnam par dag pa las kyang brtsams/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khor lo dang sprul pa'i rgyun las kyang brtsams/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyis
92b3(phal chen): gzugs kyi sku'i mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po rnam par dag pa las kyang brtsams/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos kyi sku'i yongasu grub pa las kyang brtsams/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gsung rnam
92b4(phal chen): par phye ba las kyang brtsams/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyis rgyan rnam par dag pa las kyang brtsams/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid las kyang brtsams te/ chos kyang bstan
92b5(phal chen): par gyur to/ /de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs dang / skye bo'i tshogs chen po de dag chos dang mthun pa'i gtam gyi bstan te/ yang dag par bskul nas spro ba bskyed
92b6(phal chen): de/ dga' bar byas nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed du btsud de/ sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su dran par byas nas/ skyid pa'i 'byung gnas kyi grong rdal de'i
92b7(phal chen): sems can rnams kyi bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du chos bstan pas/ byin gyis brlabs ste bde bar byas de de nas song ngo / /de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa las
92b8(phal chen): rnam pa de lta bu'i sangs rgyas kyi yon tan dang / che ba nyid thos nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mos shing brtson pas phyi bzhin du 'brang ste/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la/
93a1(phal chen): tshigasu bcad de mngon par bstod do/ /blo gros chen po mtha' yas spyod yul can/ /khyod kyi mthus ni sems can sman slad du/ /bdag kyang byang chub mchog tu zhugs par gyur/ /de la nges pa gang mchis bdag las gson/ /
93a2(phal chen): dga' ba'i chu bkang 'obs kyis kun nas bskor/ /nga rgyal dregs pa'i ra ba mtho bar brtsegs/ /sems can lam rgyud sgo rnams btsud cing gdungs/ /de 'dra'i khyim ni srid gsum ming ldan che/ /de ni gti mug ma rig
93a3(phal chen): gzings pas khebs/ /'dod chags zhe sdang me lces rab tu gdungs/ /rtag par bdud kyi dbang po'i dbang gyur pas/ /de la byis pa ma rig rten kyang 'cha'/ /sred pa'i sgrog dang zhags pa shin tu glags/ /g.yo dang sgyu yi skyon
93a4(phal chen): gyi mtho brtsams shing / /the rtsom yid gnyis dag gis mig mdongs pa/ /log pa phyin phyogs lam la rab tu zhugs/ /phrag dog ser sna'i thag pas btags shing bcings/ /yi dags byol song sems dmyal
93a5(phal chen): mi khom rgyu/ /rga shi na dang skye bas rab tu mnar/ /mgo rmongs lam rgyud 'khor lo kun tu 'khor/ /de la khyod kyi thug rje rnam dag pa'i/ /dkyil 'khor ye shes 'od zer snang ba mdzad/ /nyon mongs rgya mtsho skom
93a6(phal chen): par shar te 'phags/ /nyi ma 'dra bas bdag la snang ba mdzod/ /byams pa bsgoms pas dkyil 'khor rdzogs shing nya/ /bsod nams zla 'od bde ba'i zer 'gyed pa/ /sems can kun gyi gnas su shar gyur kyi/ /
93a7(phal chen): zla ba nya ba lta bus bdag snang mdzod/ /dkar mthu thams cad yongs bstsags dkor mnga' zhing / /chos dbyings mkha' la chags pa med mnga' ba/ /chos kyi 'khor lo rin chen sngon 'dres pas/ /rgyal por gyur
93a8(phal chen): pas bdag la bstan du gsol/ /byang chub theg pa'i smon lam mthu' mnga' ste/ /bsod nams ye shes shin tu yang bstsags shing / /sems can kun la phan pa'i don zhugs pa'i/ /ded dpon chen
93b1(phal chen): pos bdag kyang bskyang du gsol/ /bzod pa brtan zhing sra ba'i go mnabs te/ /ye shes spyan mnga' thugs rje'i phyag ring bas/ /bdud kyi dmag dpung tshogs rnams mngon 'gyur bar/ /dpa' ba chen pos bdag gis
93b2(phal chen): bsil yang mdzod/ /chos kyi ri rab spo la brtan zhugs shing / /ting 'dzin mchog gi lha mos kun nas bskor/ /nyon mongs sgra can lha min 'dul mdzad pa/ /brgya byin gyur pas bdag kyang gzigs su gsol/ /byis
93b3(phal chen): pa'i gnas gyur khams gsum khang pa na/ /nyon mongs las rnams rnam par bsal ba mkhyen/ /rgyu yi sa dang lam rgyud 'khor rmongs par/ /me mar 'dra bas bdag kyang shul bstan gsol/ /ngan 'gro'i lam rnams
93b4(phal chen): rnam par bzlog mdzad cing / /bde bar 'gro ba'i lam rnams rnam sbyong ba/ /'jig rten kun gyi lam gyi rgyud las 'das/ /bdag la'ang thar pa'i sgo ni bstan du gsol/ /rtag dang bdag dang bde bar 'du shes ldan/ /log
93b5(phal chen): 'dzin sgo re'i skyabs kyis skyabs gyur kyis/ /bden pa'i ye shes spyan rno mchog mnga' bas/ /thar sgo bdag la'ang myur du dbye bar gsol/ /yang dag log pa'i lam la mkhas gyur cing / /lam gyi rgyus dang tshul
93b6(phal chen): la bsnyengs mi mnga'/ /lam rnams kun gyis 'dul ba thugs su chud/ /bdag la byang chub shul ni bstan du gsol/ /yang dag lta ba sa yi thang la zhugs/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi yon tan chab
93b7(phal chen): kyis bkrun/ /sangs rgyas chos legs me tog char 'bebs pa/ /byang chub shul ni bdag la bstan du gsol/ /rgyal ba gang 'das ma byon gang rnams dang / /da ltar byung ba'i rgyal ba snang
93b8(phal chen): mdzad pa/ /sems can gtso bo legs par gshegs pa'i phyogs/ /de yang lam sgron mdzad pas bdag bstan gsol/ /las kyi 'khrul 'khor tshul la mi bsnyengs pa/ /chos theg shing rta'i 'khrul 'khor
94a1(phal chen): mkhyen gyur cing / /ye shes theg pa'i tshul la rnam nges pa/ /byang chub theg pa bdag la bshad du gsol/ /mos shing smon pa'i 'khor lo mu khyud can/ /bzod pa rdo rje snying rje srog shing brtan/ /dad pa'i gnya'
94a2(phal chen): shing rin chen legs spras pa'i/ /byang chub theg la bdag kyang skyon du gsol/ /gzungs rnams kun gyi rnam dag dkyil 'khor can/ /byams pa brtsegs pa dga' bas rab brgyan pa/ /so so yang dag
94a3(phal chen): rig pa'i dril 'phring can/ /theg mchog bzang po bdag la bstan du gsol/ /tshangs pa'i spyod pa'i lam gyis mngon par brgyan/ /ting 'dzin bud med khrag khrig kun nas rgyu/ /chos kyi rnga yi dbyangs
94a4(phal chen): chen char bsgrags pa/ /theg pa'i dam pa bdag la bstan tu gsol/ /bsdu ba bzhi yi mi zad mdzod ldan pa/ /ye shes rin chen yon tan phreng gi brgyan/ /khrel yod dul ba'i 'phreng bas mchog bsdams pa'i/ /
94a5(phal chen): theg pa dam pa bdag la bstan tu gsol/ /sbyin pa'i 'od zer dkyil 'khor bzang po can/ /tshul khrims tsan dan snying rje'i byug ldan zhing / /bzod pa'i zer gyi mtshan rnams dam sbyar ba'i/ /theg pa'i
94a6(phal chen): mchog la myur du bdag bzhag gsol/ /sems can thams cad 'dul las mi ldog pa/ /bsam gtan ting 'dzin grong khyer mthor sgron cing / /shes rab thabs gnyis 'byor 'thun 'gro rgyu ba'i/ /
94a7(phal chen): chos kyi thegs pa'i mchog la bdag bzhag gsol/ /smon lam 'khor los lam gyi 'khor sbyong ba/ /chos kyi gzungs dam mthu brtan che ldan zhing / /ye shes 'khrul 'khor legs sbyangs legs
94a8(phal chen): byas pa'i/ /chos kyi theg pa de la bdag skyon gsol/ /kun tu bzang po'i spyod pas rab sbyangs shing / /sems can lta bas rgyu la thogs med pa/ /kun tu bzang po'i spyod pas gnon gyur pa'i/ /ye shes thegs pas
94b1(phal chen): bdag la btud du gsol/ /de nas brtan pas rdo rje bzhin gnas pa/ /ye shes sgyu mas legs sbyangs legs byas shing / /sgrib dang chags pa thams cad gcod pa yis/ /bzang po'i theg la bdag kyang
94b2(phal chen): skyon bar gsol/ /'gro mnyam dri med shin tu yangs gyur pas/ /sems can thams cad skyobs pas bde bsgrub cing / /chos dbyings shin tu rgya chen rnam snang ba'i/ /byang chub theg la bdag kyang bskyon du gsol/ /
94b3(phal chen): sdug bsngal phung po rab 'byung gcod byed pa/ /nyon mongs las kyi dul mang sbyong sel cing / /bdud dang phas kyi rgol ba kun 'joms pa'i/ /chos kyi theg la bdag kyang bskyon du gsol/ /phyogs rnams kun tu ye
94b4(phal chen): shes rab snang ba/ /chos dbyings nam mkha' rnam par klubs byed cing / /sems can kun gyi bsam pa rdzogs pa yi/ /chos kyi theg la bdag kyang bskyon du gsol/ /rnam dag mkha' ltar tshad med mi zad pa/ /
94b5(phal chen): sred dang ma rig lta ba'i skyon med cing / /sems can kun la phan par rab gnas pa'i/ /chos kyi theg la bdag kyang skyon du gsol/ /rlung chen langs pa'i shugs kyi shugs ldan pas/ /smon lam mthu' yis
94b6(phal chen): 'jig rten kun 'dzin cing / /zhi ba'i gnas rab kun sar skyel byed pa'i/ /chos kyi theg la bdag kyang bskyon du gsol/ /sa chen bzhi yi stobs rnams dang ldan pa/ /snying rje'i mthu dang shugs kyis khur khyer zhing / /ye
94b7(phal chen): shes lo thog 'gro ba nyer 'tsho ba'i/ /theg pa'i mchog la bdag kyang skyon du gsol/ /nyi ma lta bur 'gro ba nyer 'tsho zhing / /bsdu ba rab yangs 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor can/ /gzungs kyi stobs mchog dag pa'i 'od
94b8(phal chen): bzang ba'i/ /ye shes nyi ma bdag la bstan du gsol/ /bskal pa mang po du mar rab rlabs pas/ /rgyu yi tshul dang sa kun mkhas gyur pa/ /gang gis 'dus byas grong khyer gzhom 'gyur ba'i/ /
95a1(phal chen): shes brtan rdo rje 'phags pas bdag la bstsal du gsol/ /sangs rgyas legs kun bslab pa phun sum gyis/ /ye shes rgya mtsho yangs pa gang zhig la/ /tshad med rgya mtsho'i blo mang brlab gyur pas/ /de
95a2(phal chen): legs ci 'dra 'phags pas bka' bstsal gsol/ /gang na yang dag spyan mnga' khyod bzhugs shing / /ye shes rgyal po'i cod pan legs brgyan te/ /chos kyi dbu thod dam pas dbu bcings pas/ /chos kyi
95a3(phal chen): rgyal po'i pho brang bdag kyang ston/ de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas glang po'i lta stangs kyi bltas te/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs la 'di skad ces smras so/ /rigs kyi bu de ltar khyod kyis bla na med pa
95a4(phal chen): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed de/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi rjes su 'brang zhing byang chub sems dpa'i lam yongasu rdzogs par bya bar 'dod de/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yongasu dri
95a5(phal chen): bar bsam pa legs so/ /rigs gyi bu 'di lta ste/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams la bsnyen cing bsten pa dang / rim gror bya ba 'di ni thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongasu grub par 'gyur ba'i gzhi yin te 'di ni 'thun
95a6(phal chen): pa'i rgyu yin gyis/ rigs kyi bu de bas na khyod kyi dge ba'i bshes gnyen bsnyen bkur bas yongasu ma skyo bar gyis shig /nor bzangs kyis smras pa/ 'phags pa ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i
95a7(phal chen): spyod pa la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar nan tan du bgyi/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa brtsam par bgyi/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa spyad par bgyi/ ji
95a8(phal chen): ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yongs su rdzogs par bgyi/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yongs su sbyang bar bgyi/ ji ltar byang chub
95b1(phal chen): sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la 'jug par bgyi/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa mngon par bsgrub par bgyi/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i rjes su 'brang
95b2(phal chen): bar bgyi/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la lhag par dmigs par bgyi/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rgyas par bgyi/ ji ltar byang chub sems
95b3(phal chen): dpas kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa'i dkyil 'khor yongasu rdzogs par 'gyur ba rgya cher bstan du gsol/ de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs la tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ /
95b4(phal chen): dge ba'i bsod nams gang chen mtsho/ /de ltar khyod ni nga yi drung du nyer phyin te/ /snying rje snying rtse rgya chen gyi yid ldan byang chub dam pa tshol ba legs/ /'gro ba thams cad dgrol don du spyod pa/ /mtshungs med don du smon
95b5(phal chen): lam rab 'debs shing / /'gro ba kun gyi skyabs 'gyur ba/ /byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa tshul 'di yin/ /byang chub sems dpa'i brtan pa rnams/ /'khor ba'i nang na skyo med yid kyis spyod byed pa/ /de dag kun tu
95b6(phal chen): bzang po yi/ /spyod pa thub med chags med 'thob par 'gyur/ /bsod nams 'od can bsod nams dpal/ /de ltar khyod ni kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa la/ /'gro la phan phyir smon byed pa/ /bsod nams rgya mtsho dge
95b7(phal chen): zhing dag pa'i mtshan/ /mtha' dang dbus med tshad med pa'i/ /phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten sangs rgyas kun kyang mthong bar 'gyur/ /dran pa'i mthu dang stobs kyi kyang / /de dag chos kyi sprin kyang yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur/ /
95b8(phal chen): de ltar khyod kyis phyogs bcu yi/ /sangs rgyas zhing rnams kun tu rgyal ba mthong nas kyang / /byang chub spyod pa'i don gyi phyir/ /de dag kun la smon lam rgya mtsho dag byed 'gyur/ /'jig rten gtso la
96a1(phal chen): slob byed cing / /gang rnams sangs rgyas sa la gnas ni btsal byas shing / /'di tshul rgya mtshor zhugs gyur pa/ /de dag kun kyang thams cad gzigs par 'gyur/ /khyod ni 'byam klas zhing kun tu/ /
96a2(phal chen): bskal mang zhing rdul snyed du kun tu bzang po yis/ /spyod pa'i dam pa spyod byas shing / /byang chub dam pa zhi ba 'thob par 'gyur/ /zhing rnams mtha' dang dbus med pa'i/ /ma lus kun tu bskal pa rgya mtshor spyad par
96a3(phal chen): gyis/ /kun tu bzang po'i spyod mchog phyir/ /smon lam rgya chen yongasu rdzogs par byos/ /khyod ni smon lam thos gyur nas/ /sems can khrag khrig dga' ba yongasu skyes gyur cing / /kun tu bzangs po'i ye shes
96a4(phal chen): kyis/ /byang chub mchog tu smon pa byed la ltos/ /de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas tshigasu bcad pa de dag smras nas/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang la 'di skad ces bsgo'o/ /rigs kyi bu de ltar khyod bla na med pa
96a5(phal chen): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed cing / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yongasu btsal bar sems dpa' legaso legs so/ /rigs kyi bu 'di ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
96a6(phal chen): tu sems bskyed pa de lta bu'i sems can yang rab tu dkon te/ de bas kyang gang gis kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed nas/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yongasu
96a7(phal chen): tshol ba de lta bu'i sems can ni ches dkon no/ /rigs kyi bu de bas na byang chub sems dpas thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes thob par bya ba'i phyir/ yang dag pa'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen las gdon mi za bar rtogs
96a8(phal chen): pa thob par gyis shig / dge ba'i bshes gnyen yongs su btsal ba la yongs su skyo ba'i yid med par gyis shig /dge ba'i bshes gnyen blta ba la ngoms pa med par gyis shig /dge ba'i bshes
96b1(phal chen): gnyen gyis bstan pa la 'thun par 'dzin par gyis shig / dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi thabs mkhas pa'i spyod pa la khong khro ba med par gyis shig /rigs kyi bu lho phyogs kyi rgyud 'di nyid na/ yul mi mo gya nom
96b2(phal chen): mchog ces bya ba yod de/ de na mgul legs pa zhes bya ba'i ri zhig yod pa de la/ dge slong sprin gyi dpal zhes bya ba 'dug gis de'i gan du song la/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i
96b3(phal chen): spyod pa la bslab par bya ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bya ba dang / ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa brtsam par bya ba dang / ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la spyod par
96b4(phal chen): bya ba dang / ji ltar byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang / ji ltar yongasu dag par bya ba dang / ji ltar 'dug par bya ba dang / ji ltar mngon par bsgrub par bya ba dang / ji ltar rjesu 'brang bar bya ba
96b5(phal chen): dang / ji ltar dmigs par bya ba dang / ji ltar rgyas par bya ba dang / ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa'i dkyil 'khor yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba dris shig dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen
96b6(phal chen): des khyod la kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa'i dkyil 'khor ston to/ /de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs dga' rang ste/ mgu zhing nyams bde la tshims zhing yid bde ba skyes nas/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i rkang
96b7(phal chen): pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogasu bskor ba byas te/ lan brgya stong du mar phyir bltas te/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen yid du 'ong ba'i sems
96b8(phal chen): dang ldan pas/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen mi mthong mi bzod de/ gdong mchi mas gang bar ngu zhing 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i drung nas song ngo / /de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang
97a1(phal chen): mthar gyis yul mi mo gya nom mchog ces bya ba der song ste phyin nas/ yul mi mo gya nom mchog nas rnam par brgyus te/ sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa bas byung zhing las rgya chen pos byin gyis rlabs pa'i longs
97a2(phal chen): spyod yid du 'ong ba la yongs su spyod cing ri mgul legs pa gang na ba der phyin nas/ mgul legs pa'i ri la 'dzegs te/ dge slong sprin gyi dpal tshol tshol zhing / shar phyogs logs su byung ngo / /
97a3(phal chen): de bzhin du lho dang nub dang byang dang shar gyi phyogs mtshams dang / shar lho'i phyogs mtshams dang / lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams dang / nub byang gi phyogs mtshamasu yang byung ste/ bla 'og tu zha zhing dge slong sprin gyi dpal tshol
97a4(phal chen): tshol ba las des zhag bdun lon pa dang / dge slong sprin gyi dpal ri rtse cig gi sman ljongs na 'chag cing 'dug pa mthong nas/ de dge slong sprin gyi dpal gang na ba der song ste/ dge slong sprin gyi dpal
97a5(phal chen): gyi rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal nas/ dge slong sprin gyi dpal la g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas te/ mdun du 'dug nas thal mo sbyar te 'di skad ces smras so/ /'phags pas
97a6(phal chen): thugs su chud par mdzad du gsol/ bdag gi bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed na/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang / ji
97a7(phal chen): ltar nan tan du bgyi ba dang / ji ltar byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa brtsam pa dang / ji ltar byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la spyad par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yongs su rdzogs par bgyi ba
97a8(phal chen): dang / ji ltar yongs su dag par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar 'jug par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar rjes su 'brang bar bgyid pa dang / ji ltar mngon par bsgrub par bgyid pa dang / ji ltar lhag par dmigs par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar
97b1(phal chen): rgyas par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa'i dkyil 'khor yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba ma 'tshal te/ 'phags pa khyod ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams la gdam ngag
97b2(phal chen): dang / rjes su ston pa mdzad ces thos nas/ 'phags pa ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu 'byung bar 'gyur ba bdag la bstan du gsol/ de skad ces smras pa dang /
97b3(phal chen): dge slong sprin gyi dpal gyis tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs la 'di skad ces smras so/ /rigs kyi bu de ltar khyod kyi bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed cing / byang chub sems dpa'i
97b4(phal chen): spyod pa yongs su 'dri ba leg go legaso/ /rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yongs su btsal ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod yul yongs su btsal ba dang / byang
97b5(phal chen): chub sems dpa'i 'byung ba rnam par dag pa yongasu btsal ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i lam rnam par dag pa yongs su btsal ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rgya chen po'i rnam par dag pa yongs su btsal ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i mngon par shes pa bsgrub pa
97b6(phal chen): rnam par dag pa yongs su btsal ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa yongs su bstan pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i snang ba'i snying rje'i rgyud yongs su bstan pa dang / byang chub sems
97b7(phal chen): dpa'i 'gro ba'i bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du rjes su 'brang ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' 'khor ba dang / mya ngan las 'das pa'i sgo yongs su bstan pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi 'dus byas dang /
97b8(phal chen): 'dus ma byas kyi skyon dang / 'jigs pas mi gos pa'i rgyud yongs su btsal ba 'di ni dka'o/ /shin tu dka'o/ /rigs kyi bu kho bo ni mos pa'i stobs kyi dbang gis mig gi blo gros dang /
98a1(phal chen): dad pa'i mig rnam par dag pas kun tu mngon par lta ba'i ye shes kyi 'od snang ba/ phyin phyogs med pa dang / yul kun la thog pa med cing bsgrub pa med pa thams cad dang bral ba'i lhag mthong
98a2(phal chen): la mkhas pa dang / mig gi yul kun nas yongs su dag pa'i lus rnam par dag pa dang / phyogs kyi rgyud 'byam klas pa thams cad du mngon par 'dud pa'i lus kyis 'dud pa la mkhas pa dang /
98a3(phal chen): sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos kyi sprin yongs su 'dzin pa'i gzungs kyi stobs kyis phyogs kyi rgyud thams cad nas mngon du gzigs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams mthong ste/ 'di ltar shar phyogs
98a4(phal chen): kyi de bzhin gshegs pa gcig kyang mthong ngo / /sangs rgyas gnyis dang bcu dang / sangs rgyas brgya dang / sangs rgyas stong dang / sangs rgyas brgya phrag stong dang / sangs rgyas bye ba dang / sangs rgyas bye ba brgya
98a5(phal chen): dang / sangs rgyas bye ba stong dang / sangs rgyas bye ba brgya phrag stong dang / sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya phrag stong nas de bzhin gshegs pa tshad med pa dang / dpag tu med pa dang / grangs med pa/ bsam gyis myi khyab
98a6(phal chen): pa mtshungs pa med pa/ kun tu mtha' yas pas mtshams med pa/ gzhal du med pa/ brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du myed pa dag kyang mthong ngo / /de bzhin gshegs pa 'dzam bu'i gling gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyang
98a7(phal chen): mthong ngo / /de bzhin gshegs pa gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang / stong dang / stong gnyis pa dang / stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi
98a8(phal chen): rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyang mthong / de bzhin gshegs pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyang mthong ngo / /de bzhin gshegs pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing brgya'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed
98b1(phal chen): dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing brgya phrag stong gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye
98b2(phal chen): ba phrag brgya'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba stong gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba brgya phrag stong gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag
98b3(phal chen): khrig brgya phrag stong gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dag kyang mthong ste/ shar phyogs logasu ji lta ba bzhin du lho phyogs
98b4(phal chen): dang nub phyogs dang / byang phyogs dang / byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams dang / shar lho'i phyogs mtshams dang / lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams dang / nub byang gi phyogs mtshams dang / 'og dang bla'i phyogs
98b5(phal chen): kyi de bzhin gshegs pa gcig kyang mthong ba nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dag kyang mthong ba'i bar du ste/ phyogs re rer
98b6(phal chen): rnam par bltas kyang / de bzhin gshegs pa kha dog sna tshogs mnga' ba dang / dbyibs sna tshogs mnga' ba dang / rnam par 'phrul pa sna tshogs mnga' ba dang / khyu mchog gi mthu dang / rnam par rol pa
98b7(phal chen): sna tshogs mnga' ba dang / 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor gyi rgyan rnam pa sna tshogs mnga' ba dang / 'od zer gyi dra ba snang ba kha dog du ma can dang / kha dog mtha' yas pa rab tu 'gyed pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing
98b8(phal chen): rnam par dag pa dang / pho brang dang rgyan sna tshogs mnga' ba dang / sku tshe'i tshad rnam par dag pa rnam pa sna tshogs mnga' ba dang / 'gro ba'i bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du rnam par dmigs par mdzad pa dang /
99a1(phal chen): mngon par 'tshang rgya ba rnam par dag pa'i sgos rnam par 'phrul pa rnam pa sna tshogs mnga' ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi khyu mchog dang seng ge'i nga ro rnam par sgrog pa mang po mthong ngo / /de ltar rigs
99a2(phal chen): kyi bu kho bos ni sgo kun nas dmigs pa thams cad rnam par rig pa la yang dag par gzhol ba'i sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa 'di thob par zad na/ byang chub sems dpa' ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor rnam
99a3(phal chen): par dag pa gang gis/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing pho brang rnam par dag pa'i rgyan mngon par mthong bas/ sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'i sgo kun
99a4(phal chen): nas snang ba'i dkyil 'khor rab tu thob pa dang / bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du rnam par dmigs par de bzhin gshegs pa mthong bas rnam par dag pas/ sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'i sgo 'gro ba thams
99a5(phal chen): cad du sgro btag pa rab tu thob pa dang / gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu tshad med pa'i rjes su 'brang bas sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'i sgo/ stobs kyis sgro btags pa rab tu 'thob pa
99a6(phal chen): dang / gang gis chos mnyan pa'i rnam pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku'i 'phrin las blta bas/ sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'i sgo chos kyi sgro btags pa rab tu 'thob pa dang gang
99a7(phal chen): gis phyogs rgya mtsho thams cad kyi sangs rgyas rgya mtsho tha mi dad pa la 'dug pas/ sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'i sgo phyogs rnam par snang ba'i snying po rab tu thob pa dang / gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i
99a8(phal chen): rnam par 'phrul pa dang / khyu mchog gi mthu phyung ba rab tu phra bar dmigs shing 'jugs pas/ sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'i sgo phyogs thams cad du 'jug pa rab tu thob pa dang / bskal pa thams
99b1(phal chen): cad du de bzhin gshegs pa mthong zhing rnam par dmigs pa dang mi bral bas/ sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'i sgo bskal par btags pa rab tu thob pa dang / gang gis dus thams cad du de bzhin gshegs pa
99b2(phal chen): mthong zhing 'grogs pa dang mi 'bral bas/ sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'i sgo dus su sgro btags pa rab tu thob pa dang / gang gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad nas mngon par 'phags shing zil gyi
99b3(phal chen): mi non pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sku yongs su mthong zhing rnam par rig pa'i sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'i sgo zhing du sgro btags pa rab tu thob pa dang / gang gis dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i dkyil 'khor
99b4(phal chen): rang gi sems dang bsam par yang dag par gzhol bas/ sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'i sgo dus gsum du sgro btags pa rab tu thob pa dang / gang gis dmigs pa thams cad la de bzhin gshegs pa
99b5(phal chen): gcig tu rgyud pa yang dag par tshogs pa mthong zhing dmigs pas sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'i sgo dmigs par sgro btags pa rab tu thob pa dang / gang gis skad gcig cig la 'jig rten gyi
99b6(phal chen): khams thams cad du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba rnam par dmigs pas/ sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'i sgo zhi bas sgro btags pa rab tu thob pa dang / gang gis
99b7(phal chen): nyin gcig tu gnas thams cad du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad gshegs par rnam par dmigs pas/ sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'i sgo 'brel bas sgro btags pa rab tu thob pa dang / gang gis
99b8(phal chen): de bzhin gshegs pa re re skyil mo dkrung du bzhugs pas kyang / chos kyi dbyings thams cad du rgyas par khyab pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sku rnam par 'jug pas/ sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'i sgo shin tu
100a1(phal chen): yangs pas sgro btags pa rab tu thob pa dang / gang gis skra'i rtse mo gcig la sangs rgyas brjod du med pa byung ba mnyes par bya ba la 'jug pas/ sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'i sgo shin tu phra bas sgro
100a2(phal chen): btags pa rab tu thob pa dang / skad gcig cig la 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du mngon par 'tshang rgya zhing / rnam par 'phrul pa ston pa rnam par dmigs pas/ gang gis sangs rgyas rjes su
100a3(phal chen): dran pa'i sgo kun tu sgro btags pa rab tu thob pa dang / sangs rgyas byung ba thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khor lo dang / rnam par 'phrul pa dang / ye shes snang ba rab tu thob pas gang gis sangs rgyas rjes su dran
100a4(phal chen): pa'i sgo bgos par sgro btags pa rab tu thob pa dang / rang gis sems dang bsam pa la bltas nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad snang ba rab tu thob pas na/ sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'i sgo
100a5(phal chen): sems kyis sgro btags pa rab tu thob pa dang / 'gro ba thams cad kyis las rnam pa ji lta bur bstsags pa'i gzugs brnyan yongs su ston pas/ gang gis sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'i sgo las kyi
100a6(phal chen): sgro btags pa rab tu thob pa dang / chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa thams cad pad mo'i tshal gyis rgyas par sangs rgyas rnam par 'phrul pa rgya chen po ston pa/ phyogs kun tu mngon sum du dmigs
100a7(phal chen): pas/ gang gis sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'i sgo rnam par 'phrul pas sgro btags pa rab tu thob pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs brnyan gyi sprin dbyangs sgrogs pas chos kyi dbyings
100a8(phal chen): dang nam mkha' kun nas snang ba/ gang gis sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'i sgo nam mkha'i sgro btags pa rab tu thob pa de dag gi spyod pa shes pa'am/ yon tan brjod par nus re skan song /
100b1(phal chen): rigs kyi bu lho phyogs kyi rgyud 'di nyid na phyogs kyi ljongs rgya mtsho'i sgo zhes bya ba yod pa de na/ dge slong rgya mtsho'i sprin ces bya ba 'dug gi/ de'i gan du song la ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i
100b2(phal chen): spyod pa la bslab par bya ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bya ba dris shig dang / rigs kyi bu dge ba'i bshes gnyen des khyod la dge ba'i rtsa ba'i tshogs dang / rgyu yongs su ston par 'gyur ro/ /tshogs kyis rgya chen po
100b3(phal chen): yang khong du chud par byed do/ /dge ba'i rtsa ba'i stobs dang / shugs rgya chen po yang yongs su bskyed par byed do/ /byang chub kyi sems kyi tshogs dang rgyu rgya chen po yang yongs su brjod par 'gyur ro/ /theg pa
100b4(phal chen): chen po rab tu thob pa dang / snang bar 'gyur ba rgya chen po yang bskyed par byed do/ /pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshogs kyi stobs rgya chen po yang rab tu ston par byed do/ /spyod pa rgya mtsho la 'jug pa'i tshul rgya chen po yang
100b5(phal chen): rab tu ston par 'gyur ro/ /smon lam gyi dkyil 'khor rgya chen po yang yongs su sbyongs bar 'gyur ro/ /sgo kun nas 'byung ba'i rgyan rgya chen po yang rnam par sbyong bar 'gyur ro/ /snying rje chen po'i stobs rgya
100b6(phal chen): chen po yang yongs su 'phel bar byed do/ /de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyi dge slong sprin gyi dpal gyi rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal nas/ dge slong sprin gyi dpal la lan brgya stong du mar
100b7(phal chen): g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas te/ lan brgya stong du mar phyir bltas nas/ dge slong sprin gyi dpal gyi drung du song ngo // //
100b8(phal chen): sangs rgyas rmad ga gcad ces bya ba shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo/ bam po brgyad pa'o/ /de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi gdams ngag de bzhin rjesu
101a1(phal chen): bsam pa dang / ye shes snang ba de rjes su dran par bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa de rnam par dpyad pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi tshul de rjesu sbyang ba dang byang chub
101a2(phal chen): sems dpa' rgya mtsho'i tshul de lta ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi dkyil 'khor de la mngon par mos pa dang / sangs rgyas blta ba'i phyogs de la mngon par spro bar bya ba dang / sangs rgyas rgya mtsho de la rjes su
101a3(phal chen): bsam pa dang / sangs rgyas gcig nas gcig tu rgyud pa de rjes su dran par bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi tshul rtogs par bya ba de khong du chud par bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi nam mkha' de la rjes su blta bar byed
101a4(phal chen): cing / mthar gyis phyogs kyi ljongs rgya mtsho'i sgo gang na ba dang / dge slong rgya mtsho'i sprin gang na ba der phyin nas/ dge slong rgya mtsho'i sprin gyi rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ dge slong rgya mtsho'i
101a5(phal chen): sprin la lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas/ dge slong rgya mtsho'i sprin gyi mdun du 'dug te thal mo sbyar nas 'di skad ces smras so/ /'phags pa bdag ni bla na med pa yang
101a6(phal chen): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par zhugs te/ bla na med pa'i ye shes rgya mtsho la 'jug par 'tshal na/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' rnams 'jig rten gyi rgyud las phyir ldog cing de bzhin
101a7(phal chen): gshegs pa'i rigasu 'grub par 'gyur ba dang / 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho las rgal zhing thams cad mkhyen pa'i rgya mtshor 'jug par 'gyur ba dang / byis pa so so'i skye bo'i sa las gyen du 'phags
101a8(phal chen): par 'gyur zhing / de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs su 'grub par 'gyur ba dang / 'khor ba'i rgyud las ldog par 'gyur zhing / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i rgyud du 'jug par 'gyur ba dang /
101b1(phal chen): 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho rgyud kyi 'khor lo las phyir ldog cing byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa dang / smon lam gyi 'khor lor 'jug par 'gyur ba dang / bdud kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad rab tu 'joms zhing sangs rgyas
101b2(phal chen): kyi dkyil 'khor 'byung ba thams cad rab tu ston pa dang / srid pa'i rgya mtsho yongasu skems shing snying rje chen po'i mtsho rnam par 'phel bar byed pa dang / mi khom pa dang ngan song dang / ngan 'gro dang log par
101b3(phal chen): ltung ba thams cad kyi sgo gcod cing / mtho ris dang mya ngan las 'das pa'i sgo 'byed pa dang / khams gsum gyi grong khyer gyi sgo rnam par gcod cing thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi pho brang gi sgo rnam par 'byed pa dang /
101b4(phal chen): yo byad thams cad kyi sred pa rnam par spong zhing 'gro ba thams cad bsdu ba'i smon lam yongs su skyed par 'gyur ba ma 'tshal lo/ /de skad ces smras pa dang / dge slong rgya mtsho'i sprin gyis tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs
101b5(phal chen): la 'di skad ces smras so/ /rigs kyi bu khyod kyis de ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa legaso legaso/ /rigs kyi bu dge ba'i rtsa ba ma bskyed pa'i sems can rnams ni byang
101b6(phal chen): chub tu sems bskyed kyang mi skye ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba sgo kun tu snang ba rab tu thob pa dang / thabs kyi snying po dang ldan pa'i lam gyi ting nge 'dzin gyi ye shes snang bas rab tu snang bar 'gyur ba dang / bsod
101b7(phal chen): nams kyi rgya mtsho'i tshogs rgya chen po bstsags pa dang / dkar po'i tshogs thams cad kyi rgyun mi 'chad pa dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen thams cad bkur bas yongasu skyo ba med pa
101b8(phal chen): dang / lus dang srog la 'phangs pa mi brtsi ba dang / dngos por 'dzin pa thams cad dang bral ba dang / mtho dman med pa'i sa ltar sems mnyam pa dang / rang bzhin gyi snying rje che zhing byams
102a1(phal chen): par sems pa dang ldan pa dang / srid pa'i lam gyi rgyud thams cad du gnas par 'dug pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul la mngon par mos pa'i sems can rnams byang chub tu sems skye
102a2(phal chen): ste/ 'di lta bu sems can thams cad yongs su bskyob pa'i phyir snying rje chen po'i sems dang 'gro ba thams cad la snyoms par nan tan du bya ba'i phyir byams pa'i sems dang / 'gro ba thams cad kyi sdug
102a3(phal chen): bsngal gyi phung po zhi bar bya ba'i phyir bde ba'i sems dang / mi dge ba'i chos thams cad las rnam par bzlog pa'i phyir phan pa'i sems dang / 'jigs pa thams cad las yongasu bsrungs ba'i phyir snying brtse ba'i
102a4(phal chen): sems dang / sgrib pa thams cad rnam par bzlog pa'i phyir chags pa med pa'i sems dang / chos kyi dbyings thams cad rgyas par dgang ba'i phyir/ rgya chen po'i sems dang nam mkha'i dbyings kun tu
102a5(phal chen): gzhol zhing kun tu 'gro bar bya ba'i phyir mtha' yas pa'i sems dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mthong zhing rnam par dmigs par bya ba'i phyir dri ma med pa'i sems dang / dus gsum gyi dmigs pa
102a6(phal chen): ma lus par ye shes kyis rgyas par dgang ba'i phyir rnam par dag pa'i sems dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes rgya mtsho la 'jug par bya ba'i phyir ye shes kyi sems kyang skye bar 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu
102a7(phal chen): kho bos ni phyogs kyi ljongs rgya mtsho'i sgo 'dir lo bcu gnyis su rgya mtsho chen po 'di la dmigs te/ mngon du byas nas 'di ltar rgya mtsho rgya che zhing tshad med pa la rjes su bsam pa dang / dri ma med cing dang
102a8(phal chen): ba dang / zab cing gting dpag dka' ba dang / bags kyi gzhol zhing legs par gnas pa dang / rin po che'i 'byung gnas du mas rnam par brgyan pa dang / chu'i phung po tshad med pa dang / kha dog
102b1(phal chen): rnam pa tha dad pa mang zhing bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / 'byung ba mtha' yas pa'i gnas su gyur pa dang srog chags mang po sna tshogs kyi rten du gyur pa dang / sprin chen po'i char yongs su 'dzin pa dang /
102b2(phal chen): gang zhig 'bri bar 'gyur ba med pa la rjes su sems par byed cing gnas te/ rigs kyi bu de la kho bos 'di snyam du bsam mo/ /'jig rten gyi khams 'di na rgya mtsho chen po 'di bas kyang 'phags par rgya che la 'di bas
102b3(phal chen): kyang yangs shing 'di bas kyang tshad med pa la/ 'di bas kyang ngo mtshar dang ldan pa la la zhig yod dam snyam ste/ de ltar kho bo tshul bzhin du bsam pa yid la byed pa la brtson par gnas pa ste/ rgya mtsho
102b4(phal chen): chen po'i 'od kyi gzhi las pad mo chen po nor bu rin po che in+d+ra nI la thub pa med cing rdo rje lta bur sra ba'i chu ba can/ nor bu rin po che bai DUR+Ya dran pa'i rgyan dang ldan pa/ 'dzam bu chu klung gis gser ltar dri
102b5(phal chen): ma med pa'i lo ma rgya chen po can/ dus dang mthun pa'i tsan dan gyi snying po'i rgyan gyi brgyan pa/ rin po che a sma gar ba'i ze ba can/ rgya mtsho tsam du yangs shing rgya che ba lha ma yin gyi dbang po brgya stong phrag bcus
102b6(phal chen): sdong po'i lhun nas bzung ba/ rin po che sna tshogs brgya phrag stong gi dra bas kun nas g.yog pa/ klu yi dbang po brgya stong phrag bcus spos kyi chu'i char mngon par phab pa/ nam mkha' lding gi dbang po brgya
102b7(phal chen): stong phrag bcus dar dang rin po che'i lda ldi dang se mo do mang po bcus bzung zhing rab tu sbyangs pa mi 'am ci'i dbang po brgya stong phrag bcus phan pa'i sems kyis kun nas blta ba/ lto 'phye chen po'i
102b8(phal chen): dbang po brgya stong phrag bcus 'khor nas mngon par 'dud pa/ srin po'i dbang po brgya stong phrag bcus lus 'dud cing mngon par mchod pa/ dri za'i dbang po brgya stong phrag bcus rol mo dang glu sna tshogs snyan
103a1(phal chen): pas bstod cing mchod pa/ lha'i dbang po brgya stong phrag bcus lha rdzas kyi me tog dang / spos dang phreng ba dang / bdug spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / gos dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang /
103a2(phal chen): lha'i dbang pos sprin gyi char mngon par phab pa/ tshangs pa'i dbang po brgya stong phrag bcus spyi bos nas gtugs te/ phyag 'tshal zhing mchod pa/ gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha brgya stong phrag bcus thal mo sbyar cing phyag bya
103a3(phal chen): ba/ mi'i dbang po 'khor lo bsgyur ba brgya stong phrag bcus rin po che bdun gyis bsu zhing mngon par mchod pa/ rgya mtsho'i lha brgya stong phrag bcus mngon par mthon cing phyag bya ba/ nor bu rin po che skar ma'i ngang
103a4(phal chen): tshul brgya stong phrag bcus 'od zer gyi rgyan gyis rab tu snang bar byas pa/ nor bu rin po che bsod nams kyis dag pa brgya stong phrag bcus mkhos su phebs par 'brel bas rab tu brgyan pa/ nor bu rin
103a5(phal chen): po che rnam par snang ba brgya stong phrag bcus snying po rab tu gsal bar byas pa/ nor bu rin po che dpal gyi snying po brgya stong phrag bcus dpal chen po shin tu 'bar bar byas pa/ nor bu rin po che'i
103a6(phal chen): mdzod snang ba brgya stong phrag bcus mtha' yas par snang bar byas nas/ nor bu rin po che 'dzam bu'i chu klung brgya stong phrag bcus yongs su ston par gnas pas rab tu brgyan pa/ nor bu rin po che rdo rje
103a7(phal chen): seng ge brgya stong phrag bcus thub pa med par brgyan pa/ nor bu rin po che nyi ma'i snying po brgya stong phrag bcus rgya cher gsal bar bsgrub pa/ nor bu rin po che 'bar ba brgya stong phrag bcus kha dog
103a8(phal chen): sna tshogs su brgyan pa/ nor bu rin po che yid bzhin gyi rgyal po brgya stong phrag bcus mi zad pa'i rgyan dang 'od 'bar bar byas pa byung ste/ pad+ma chen po de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'jig rten las
103b1(phal chen): 'das pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba las byung ba/ /byang chub sems dpa'i bsam pas yongs su brten pa'o/ /phyogs thams cad du mngon par dmigs su yod pa'o/ /sgyu ma'i rnam pa chos kyi byung ba'o/ /rjen
103b2(phal chen): pa'i dri ma med pa las byung ba'o/ /nyon mongs pa med pa'i chos kyi tshul gyi brgyan pa'o/ /rmi lam lta bu'i chos nyid kyis yongs su byung ba'o/ /mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i chos kyi tshul gyis rgyas btab pa'o/ /
103b3(phal chen): chags pa med pa'i chos kyi tshul dang ldan pa'o/ /phyogs kyi khams kun tu chos kyi dbyings rgyas par 'gengs pa'o/ /sangs rgyas kyi yul brjod pa dang 'thun pa ste/ de'i rnam pa dang yon
103b4(phal chen): tan dang dbyibs dang / kha dog dang rgyan gyis mthar phyin pa ni bskal pa brgya stong grangs med par yang khong du chud par mi nus te/ pad mo chen po de yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku skyil krung du bzhugs
103b5(phal chen): pas khyab cing yongs su rgyas par mthong ngo / /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku de yang 'di nas bzung ba nas/ srid pa'i rtse mo'i bar gyis mtha' klas par mthong ngo / /de bzhin gshegs pa de'i gdan
103b6(phal chen): gyi rgyan bsam gyis mi khyab pa yang mthong / /'khor gyi dkyil 'khor gyi rgyan bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi rgyan bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / mtshan phun sum tshogs
103b7(phal chen): pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / dpe byad bzang po sna tshogs bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi khyu mchog gi mthu' dang / sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang /
103b8(phal chen): de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku yi mdog rnam par dag pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / spyi gtsug ltar mi mthong ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / ljags yangs pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa yang mthong ngo / /
104a1(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyi gsung gi rgyan bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor bsam gyis mi khyab pa thos so/ /stobs tshad med pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang mi bsnyengs pa'i rgyan rnam par dag pa
104a2(phal chen): bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa'i stobs mngon par bsgrub pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa yang rjes su sheso/ /sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yang dag par bsgrub pa bsam gyis mi khyab
104a3(phal chen): pa yang rjes su dran no/ /mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa yang mthong ngo / /chos kyi sprin gyi 'brug sgra mngon par bsgrags pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa yang
104a4(phal chen): yongs su bstan pa rnam par dmigs pa'i gnas dang / rgyan bsam gyis mi khyab pa'ang thos so/ /g.yas g.yon kyi sku'i rnam pa tshad med pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / sems can gyi don dang
104a5(phal chen): dgos pa bsam gyi mi khyab pa yongs su grub par 'gyur ba'ang mthong ngo / /de bzhin gshegs pa des kyang phyag g.yas pa brkyang zhing kho bo'i mgo la byug nas/ chos kyi rnam grangs kun nas myig
104a6(phal chen): ces bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yul byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rab tu brjod pa chos kyi dbyings kyi gzhi dang / rnam pa tha dad pa thams cad rab tu snang ba chos thams cad kyi dkyil
104a7(phal chen): 'khor la yang dag par gzhol zhing snang bar byed pa/ zhing gi dkyil 'khor dang rnam par dag pas yongs su snang ba/ phas kyi rgol ba'i dkyil 'khor thams cad rnam par 'thor ba bdud gyi dkrugs ma'i
104a8(phal chen): dkyil 'khor thams cad rab tu 'joms pa/ sems can gyi khams thams cad shin tu tshim par byed pa/ sems can thams cad kyi thibs po rab tu snang bar byed pa/ sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa ji
104b1(phal chen): lta ba bzhin du rnam par dmigs pa/ sems can thams cad kyi dbang po'i 'khor lo'i rgyud dang / mthu snang bar byed pa yang dag par bstan te/ kho bos yang kun nas mig gi chos kyi rnam grangs de blangaso/ /bzung ngo spel to
104b2(phal chen): bsams so/ /de ltar bzung ba de la'ang bri na ni snag tsha rgya mtsho chen po'i phung po tsam dang / smyi gu'i phung po ri rab ri'i rgyal po tsam zad par gyur kyang chos kyi rnam grangs de las le'u re re dang sgo re re dang chos kyi tshul
104b3(phal chen): re re dang chos kyi tshig rnam par phye ba re re las kyang zad pa'am/ 'grib pa'am/ 'byam pa'am/ mthar thug pa'am/ mtha' zad par 'gyur ba dmigs par mi rung ngo / /rigs kyi bu de ltar bdag gi
104b4(phal chen): lo bcu gnyis tshang bar chos kyi rnam grangs kun nas mig ces bya ba 'di la nyi ma gcig gcig yang thos pa 'dzin pa'i gzungs kyi 'od snang bas le'u grangs med pa zhig khong du chud do/ /zhi ba'i sgo'i gzungs
104b5(phal chen): kyi 'od snang bas le'u grangs ba zhig la zhugaso/ /glong mtha' yas pa'i gzungs kyi 'od snang bas le'u grangs med pa zhig la yang dag par 'jug go/ /sa la rnam par spyod cing rjes su rtog par byed pa'i gzungs
104b6(phal chen): kyi 'od snang bas le'u grangs med pa zhig rnam par bsgoms te rnam par dbye ba byas so/ /gzi brjid dang ldan pa'i gzungs kyi 'od snang bas le'u grangs med pa zhig yongs su blangaso/ /pad mo'i rgyan gyis
104b7(phal chen): gzungs kyi 'od snang bas le'u grangs med pa zhig mngon par bsgrubaso/ /dbyangs kyi tshul gyi gzungs kyi 'od snang bas le'u grangs med pa zhig yang dag par bshad do/ /nam mkha'i snying po'i gzungs kyi 'od snang bas le'u
104b8(phal chen): grangs med pa zhig rab tu phye ba'o/ /skar ma brtsegs pa'i gzungs kyi 'od snang bas le'u grangs med pa zhig shin tu rgyas par byas so/ /rgya mtsho snying po'i gzungs kyi 'od snang bas le'u grangs med pa zhig yongs
105a1(phal chen): su bkod do/ /kho bo'i drung du shar phyogs log nas lha dang mi'i dbang po'am/ klu dang klu'i dbang po'am/ gnod sbyin dang gnod sbyin gyi dbang po'am/ dri za dang dri za'i dbang po dang / lha ma yin dang lha ma yin gyi
105a2(phal chen): dbang po'am/ nam mkha' lding dang nam mkha' lding gi dbang po'am/ mi'am ci dang mi'am ci'i dbang po'am/ lto 'phye chen po'am lto 'phye chen po'i dbang po'am/ mi dang mi'i dbang po'am/ tshangs pa dang tshangs
105a3(phal chen): pa'i dbang po'am/ sems can gang su 'ongs kyang rung ste/ de dag thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa snang ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs kun nas mig ces bya ba 'di nyid la rab tu
105a4(phal chen): bkod cing btsud de/ de dag kun kyang kun nas mig gi chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nyid la mos par byaso/ /rtog tu btsud do/ /yongasu bstan to/ /yang dag par brjod do/ /yongs su gsal bar byas so/ /rnam par phye'o rgyas par byaso/ /
105a5(phal chen): mngon par bstan to/ /rnam par bkrol lo rab tu phye'o/ /shin tu snang bar byas so/ /de ltar shar phyogs la ji lta ba de bzhin du lho phyogs dang / nub phyogs dang / byang phyogs dang / byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams dang /
105a6(phal chen): shar lho'i phyogs mtshams dang / lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams dang / nub byang gi phyogs mtshams dang / 'og dang bla'i phyogs nas sems can gang su 'ongs kyang rung ste/ kun la yang snga ma bzhin no/ /rigs
105a7(phal chen): kyi bu de ltar kho bos ni chos kyi rnam grangs gcig cig shes par zad na/ byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam yongs su dag pa dang ldan pas/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rgya mtsho thams cad la zhugs pa dang /
105a8(phal chen): bskal pa thams cad du gnas pa rgyun mi 'chad pa'i phyir smon lam rgya mtsho thams cad la zhugs pa dang / stobs bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du rjes su 'brang bar bya ba'i phyir sems can rgya mtsho thams cad
105b1(phal chen): la zhugs pa dang / stobs bcu'i ye shes chags pa med pa'i snang ba yongs su bskyed pa'i phyir 'gro ba thams cad kyi sems rgya mtsho la zhugs pa dang / yongs su smin par bya ba dang / gdul
105b2(phal chen): ba'i dus la mi 'da' bar bya ba'i phyir sems can thams cad kyi dbang po rgya mtsho la zhugs pa dang / zhing thams cad rnam par dag par bya ba'i smon lam mngon par bsgrubaso/ zhing rgya mtsho thams
105b3(phal chen): cad la zhugs pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod cing rim gro byed pa'i stobs kyi sangs rgyas rgya mtsho thams cad la zhugs pa dang / ye shes rnam par rig pas chos rgya mtsho thams
105b4(phal chen): cad la zhugs pa dang / nan tan dang ldan pas yon tan rgya mtsho thams cad la zhugs pa dang / brjod pa thams cad du chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba mngon par bsgrub pa'i phyir/ 'gro ba'i skad rgya
105b5(phal chen): mtsho thams cad la zhugs pa rnams kyi spyod pa shes pa'am/ yon tan brjod par nus re skan song / rigs kyi bu 'di nas dpag tshad drug bcu 'das pa'i lho phyogs kyi gnas 'di nyid na/ lang ka'i
105b6(phal chen): gnas rgya mtsho'i ngogs shes bya ba yod de/ de na dge slong shin tu brtan pa zhes bya ba 'dug gis de'i gan du song la/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yongasu sbyang bar bya ba dris shig de nas tshong
105b7(phal chen): dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis dge slong rgya mtsho'i sprin gyi rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ dge slong rgya mtsho'i sprin la lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogasu bskor ba byas nas yang dang yang bltas te/
105b8(phal chen): dge slong rgya mtsho'i sprin gyi drung nas song ngo / /de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi gdam ngag de dang / kun nas mig gi chos kyi rnam grangs de yang rjesu dran par byed cing de bzhin gshegs
106a1(phal chen): pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa de yang rjes su bsam pa dang / chos kyi tshigs dang yi ge'i sprin de dag kyang yongasu bzung ba dang / chos kyi sgo rgya mtsho'i tshul de dag la'ang 'jug par bya ba dang chos kyi tshul de dag
106a2(phal chen): la'ang rnam par blta ba dang / chos kyi le'u dang glong gi tshul de dag la 'jug par bya ba dang / chos kyi nam mkha' de la yang dag par gzhol bar bya ba dang / chos kyi dkyil 'khor de yang rjesu sbyang bar bya ba dang /
106a3(phal chen): chos rin po che'i gling de yang rjesu sems shing mthar gyis lang ka'i gnas rgya mtsho'i ngogs shes bya ba gang na ba der phyin nas/ dge slong shin tu brtan pa mthong bar dga' zhing shar phyogs su bltas so/ /
106a4(phal chen): de bzhin du lho phyogs dang / nub phyogs dang byang phyogs dang / byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams dang / shar lho'i phyogs mtshams dang / lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams dang / nub byang gi phyogs mtshams dang bla dang
106a5(phal chen): 'og tu dge slong shin tu brtan pa mthong bar dga' ste/ kun tu bltas pa dang / des dge slong shin tu brtan pa nam mkha'i dbyings la lha brgya stong grangs med pas yongasu bskor cing phan tshun du 'chags pa
106a6(phal chen): mthong ngo / /nam mkha'i dbyings de yang lha'i dbang po rnams kyi dge slong shin tu brtan pa la mchod pa'i las su bya ba'i phyir/ lha rdzas kyi me tog sil ma'i sprin gyis yog pa dang / lha rdzas kyi rol mo'i sprin gyi sgra dang /
106a7(phal chen): dar gyi ba dan grangs med pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan par mthong ngo / /klu'i dbang po rnams kyi nam mkha' de la a ga ru nag po'i spos mngon par 'thul ba'i sprin shin tu mtho ba las 'brug sgra bsam gyis mi
106a8(phal chen): khyab pa 'byung bar byas pa mthong ngo / /mi'am ci'i dbang po rnams kyis nam mkha' la lha rdzas kyi ngag snyan pa'i rgyud kyi bstod pa'i rol mo brdung ba dang / dkrol ba dang glur blang ba'i dbyangs thams cad
106b1(phal chen): sbyar cing blangs pa thos par gyur to/ /lto 'phye chen po'i dbang po rnams kyi nam mkha' de la gos shin tu phra zhing mdog bzang ba'i sprin bsam gyis mi khyab pa dag yid dga' bas bkye ba de dge slong shin tu brtan pa
106b2(phal chen): la dad cing mos pa'i gzugs su phyung ba mthong ngo / /lha ma yin gyi dbang po rnams kyis kyang nam mkha' de la nor bu rin po che'i sprin bsam gyis mi khyab pa byin gyis rlabs te/ yon tan bsam gyis mi khyab
106b3(phal chen): pa'i rgyan snang ba dang ldan par snang bar byas so/ /mthong ngo / /nam mkha' lding gi dbang po mang po yang myi yi gzugs dang mdog dang dbyibasu 'khod cing nam mkha' lding gi dbang po'i bu mos kun nas bskor te/
106b4(phal chen): brtsod pa med pa la dga' zhing thal mo sbyar te gnas pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa mthong ngo / /gnod sbyin gyi dbang po brgya stong 'khor dang bcas pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dag kyang nam mkha' de la shin tu
106b5(phal chen): mi sdug pa'i gzugs su dge slong shin tu brtan pa la byams pa'i mthu dang ldan par 'khod pa mthong ngo / /srin po'i dbang po brgya stong 'khor dang bcas pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dag kyang nam
106b6(phal chen): mkha' de la dge slong shin tu brtan pa yongasu bsrung ba byed cing kun tu rgyu ba mthong ngo / /tshangs pa'i dbang po brgya stong bsam gyis mi khyab pa dag kyang nam mkha' de la thal mo sbyar cing dga' ba yid
106b7(phal chen): du 'ong ba'i tshig gi rgyud kyi bstod pa rab tu brjod pa mthong ngo / /gnas gtsang ma'i lha brgya stong bsam gyis mi khyab pa dag kyang nam mkha' de la dge slong shin tu brtan pa la mchod pa'i las su bya
106b8(phal chen): ba'i phyir thal mo sbyar cing gzhal med khang na gnas pa mthong ngo / /de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyi dge slong shin tu brtan pa la de ltar nam mkha'i dbyings la 'chags cing 'dug pa mthong nas
107a1(phal chen): dga' rangs te mgu zhing nyams bde la tshim zhing yid bde ba skyes nas/ dge slong shin tu brtan pa la thal mo sbyar te phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces smras so/ /'phags pa bdag gis bla na med pa
107a2(phal chen): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed nas/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos btsal bar bgyid pa dang / ji ltar byang chub sems dpas sangs rgyas kyi chos yongasu bsgrub
107a3(phal chen): par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar byang chub sems dpas sangs rgyas kyi chos yongasu bsdu bar bgyi ba dang / ji ltar byang chub sems dpas sangs rgyas kyi chos yongasu bstan par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar byang chub sems
107a4(phal chen): dpas sangs rgyas kyi chos bsgom par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar byang chub sems dpas sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi rjesu 'brang bar bgyi ba dang / ji ltar byang chub sems dpas sangs rgyas kyi chos yongasu brtul
107a5(phal chen): bar bgyi ba dang / ji ltar byang chub sems dpas sangs rgyas kyi chos yongasu bsgom par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar byang chub sems dpas sangs rgyas kyi chos rnam par dag par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar
107a6(phal chen): byang chub sems dpas sangs rgyas kyi chos yongasu sbyang bar bgyi ba dang / ji ltar byang chub sems dpas sangs rgyas kyi chos khong du chud par bgyi ba ma 'tshal te/ 'phags pa ni byang chub sems
107a7(phal chen): dpa' rnams la gdam ngag dang rjesu bstan pa mdzad do/ /zhes bdag gi thos na/ 'phags pa ji ltar byang chub sems dpas sangs rgyas kyi chos la nan tan du bgyi ba/ ji ltar nan tan bgyis na yang dag pa
107a8(phal chen): ji lta ba bzhin dang / skol bar mi 'gyur ba'i slad du sangs rgyas mthong ba dang mi 'bral ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba dang / tshul gcig tu 'gyur ba'i slad du byang chub sems
107b1(phal chen): dpa' mthong ba dang mi 'bral ba dang / ye shes rtogs par 'gyur ba'i slad du sangs rgyas kyi chos dang mi 'bral ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi don yongs su thob par bgyi ba'i slad du byang
107b2(phal chen): chub sems dpa'i smon lam thams cad dang mi 'bral ba dang / bskal pa thams cad du gnas pas yongasu mi skyo bar bgyi ba'i slad du byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa dang mi 'bral ba dang 'jig rten
107b3(phal chen): gyi khams thams cad yongasu dag par bgyi ba'i slad du sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad rgyas par dgang ba dang mi 'bral ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rnam par 'phrul pa thams cad rnam
107b4(phal chen): par dmigs par bgyi ba'i slad du sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa mthong ba dang mi 'bral ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa sprul pa lta bus srid pa'i rgyud thams cad du skye shing shi 'pho ba'i skye
107b5(phal chen): mched rang gi lus kyis nyams su myong bar bgyi ba'i slad du 'dus byas kyi gnas dang mi 'bral ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi sprin yongasu gzungs ba'i slad du chos mnyan pa dang mi 'bral ba
107b6(phal chen): dang dus gsum gyi ye shes khong du chud cing rjesu 'brang bar bgyi ba'i slad du/ ye shes snang ba dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur ba de bdag la bstan du gsol/ de skad ces smras pa dang / dge slong shin tu brtan pas tshong
107b7(phal chen): dpon gyi bu nor bzang la 'di skad ces smras so/ /de ltar khyod kyi bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed de/ sangs rgyas kyi chos dang thams cad mkhyen pa'i chos dang rang byung gi chos 'dri ba legaso/ /
107b8(phal chen): legaso/ /rigs kyi bu kho bo ni byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa thog pa med pa'i sgo thob pa ste/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa thogs pa med pa'i sgo de kho bos blangs te/
108a1(phal chen): yongasu bzung nas rjesu 'brang zhing rnam par dbye ba dang / rnam par dpyad pa dang rnam par brtag pa dang snang bar bya ba dang / rab tu snang bar byas pas thog pa med pa'i mtha' zhes bya ba'i ye shes snang ba thob
108a2(phal chen): bo/ /de thob pas kho bo ni sems can thams cad kyi sems dang spyod pa khong du chud par bya ba la thogs pa med do/ /sems can thams cad kyi skye ba dang 'chi 'pho yongasu shes par bya ba la thogs pa med do/ /
108a3(phal chen): sngon gyi gnas rjesu dran par bya ba'i sgor 'jug pa la thogs pa med do/ /phyi ma'i mtha'i bskal par 'gro ba thams cad dang 'grog par bya ba la thogs pa med do/ /da ltar byung ba'i dus kyi 'gro ba thams cad rnam
108a4(phal chen): par rig par bya ba la thogs pa med do/ /sems can thams cad kyi sgra skad dang / kun rdzob yongasu shes par bya ba la thogs pa med do/ /sems can thams cad kyi the tsom gcad par bya ba la thogs pa med do/ /
108a5(phal chen): sems can thams cad kyi dbang po tha dad pa khong du chud par bya ba la thogs pa med do/ /sems can thams cad yongasu smin par bya ba dang / gdul ba'i dus su 'gro bar bya ba la thogs pa med do/ /nyin mtshan dang
108a6(phal chen): skad gcig dang yud tsam dang thang gcig dang / dus kyi ming du bya ba khong du chud par bya ba la thogs pa med do/ /dus gsum rgya mtsho'i rgyud du 'jug par bya ba la thogs pa med do/ /phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing
108a7(phal chen): rang gi lus kyi rgyas par gang bar bya ba la thog pa med do/ /de ni de ltar dngos po med pa la gnas shing mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i rdzu 'phrul thob pa'i phyir te/ rigs kyi bu dngos po med pa la gnas shing mngon par 'du
108a8(phal chen): bya ba med pa'i rdzu 'phrul de'i byin gyis kho bo nam mkha'i dbyings 'di las phan tshun du 'gro zhing 'dug pa dang / sems pa dang spyod lam sna tshogs su spyod do/ /mi snang bar byed do/ /snang bar byung ngo / /
108b1(phal chen): du ba thul bar byed do/ /me lce 'bar bar byed do/ /gcig tu gnas shing mang por bsgyur ro/ /mang por byas shing gcig tu bsgyur ro/ /snang ba dang mi snang ba'ang nyamasu myong bar byed do/ /rtsig pa la'ang thag thog med pa dang rab
108b2(phal chen): la'ang thag thogs med par 'gro ste/ dper na nam mkha' la bya bzhin no/ /nam mkha' la skyil mo dkrung gis 'gro ste/ dper na 'dab chags bya bzhin no/ /sa la yang bye'u zul dang steng du 'byung bar byed do/ /
108b3(phal chen): dper na chu la bya ba bzhin no/ /chu la yang bying ba med par 'gro ste/ dper na sa la bya ba bzhin no/ /du ba 'thul ba dang / me lce 'bar ba byed de/ dper na me'i phung po chen po bzhin no/ /sa yang yongasu g.yo
108b4(phal chen): bar byed do/ /nyi ma dang zla ba 'di gnyis de ltar rdzu 'phrul che zhing de ltar mthu che la/ de ltar gzi brjid che ba yang lag pas kun nas yongs su nyug go/ /tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi bar dag tu yang lus kyi
108b5(phal chen): dbang bsgyur ro/ /'jig rten spos kyi dud pa na bun du chags pa'i sprin gyi dkyil 'khor kun nas khebs par byas shing rab tu 'bar bar byed do/ /rin po che thams cad kyi 'od zer gyi sprin gyi dra bas 'jig rten kun
108b6(phal chen): nas khebs par byas shing / 'gro ba thams cad dang 'dra ba'i sprul pa'i sprin rab tu 'gyed do/ /kha dog mtha' yas pa'i 'od kyi dra ba'i sprin rab tu bkye zhing phyogs kun tu 'ang 'gro ste/ 'di ltar shar phyogs su 'gro'o/ /
108b7(phal chen): lho phyogs dang nub phyogs dang byang phyogs dang / byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams dang / shar lho'i phyogs mtshams dang / lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams dang / nub byang gi phyogs mtshams dang / 'og dang bla'i
108b8(phal chen): phyogs su yang 'gro'o/ /sems kyi skad cig re re zhing yang shar phyogs logs su 'jig rten gyi khams gcig kyang 'da'o/ /'jig rten gyi khams gnyis dang bcu yang 'da'o/ /'jig rten gyi khams brgya dang /
109a1(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi khams stong dang / 'jig rten gyi khams brgya phrag stong dang / 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba dang / 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba phrag brgya dang 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba phrag stong dang / 'jig rten gyi khams
109a2(phal chen): bye ba brgya phrag stong dang / 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba khrag khrig rgya phrag stong dang 'jig rten gyi khams tshad med pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu med pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa dang 'jig rten gyis
109a3(phal chen): khams bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams mtshungs pa med pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams gzhal du med pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams kun tu mtha' yas pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams mu med pa
109a4(phal chen): dang 'jig rten gyi khams mtshungs pa med pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa dag kyang 'da' bar byed de/ 'jig rten gyi khams de dag ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ji snyed cig bzhugs
109a5(phal chen): shing 'tsho bzhes la 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho de dang de dag dang / 'jig rten gyi khams 'jams klas pa de dang de dag dang / 'jig rten gyi khams kyi phyogs de dang de dag dang / 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud de dang de
109a6(phal chen): dag dang 'jig rten gyi khams yongasu 'du ba de dang de dag dang / 'jig rten gyi khams 'byung ba de dang de dag dang / 'jig rten gyi khamasu bya ba de dang de dag dang / 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sgo de dang de dag dang / 'jig rten gyi
109a7(phal chen): khams gyi bskal par bya ba de dang de dag dang / 'jig rten gyi khams su 'jug pa de dang de dag dang / 'jig rten gyi khams kyi snying po byang chub rnam par bkod pa de dang de dag dang / 'jig rten gyi khams gyi
109a8(phal chen): 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor de dang de dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ji snyed cig chos ston pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa de dag las de bzhin gshegs pa re re zhing yang sangs rgyas kyi zhing mtha' yas pa rdul shin tu
109b1(phal chen): phra ba snyed kyi lus sna tshogs dang / lus re re zhing yang sangs rgyas kyi zhing mtha' yas pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi mchod pa'i sprin gyi char 'bebs shing spyan sngar 'gro'o/ /de dag tu phyin nas kyang me tog
109b2(phal chen): thams cad dang spos thams cad dang / phreng ba thams cad dang phye ma thams cad dang / byug pa thams cad dang na bza' thams cad dang / rgyal mtshan thams cad dang lha'i ba dan thams cad dang bla re thams cad dang / dra ba thams
109b3(phal chen): cad dang gzugs thams cad kyis mchod pa rgyun ma chad par byed do/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis gang ji snyed du gsungs pa dang / bstan pa dang / brjod pa dang / yang dag par bshad pa dang / yang dag par smos pa
109b4(phal chen): dang yongs su brjod pa dang / man ngag du gsungs pa dang / shin tu bstan pa dang rab tu brjod pa de dag thams cad kyang shes shing 'dzin to/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongasu dag pa ji snyed
109b5(phal chen): pa de dag thams cad kyang rjes su dran no/ /shar phyogs su ji lta ba de bzhin du lho phyogs dang / nub phyogs dang / byang phyogs dang / byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams dang / shar lho'i phyogs mtshams dang / lho nub kyi
109b6(phal chen): phyogs mtshams dang / nub byang gi phyogs mtshams dang / 'og dang steng gi phyogs su yang 'jig rten gyi khams gcig kyang 'da'o/ /'jig rten gyi khams gnyis dang bcu yang 'da'o/ /'jig rten gyi khams brgya nas 'jig
109b7(phal chen): rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyang 'da'o/ /'jig rten gyi khams de dag na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho bzhes la/
109b8(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho de dang de dag dang / 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par dag pa de dang de dag nas/ 'jig rten gyi khams kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor de dang de dag na chos ston pa de dag kun kyang mthong ngo / /de bzhin
110a1(phal chen): gshegs pa de dag la'ang me tog thams cad nas gzugs thams cad kyi bar gyi mchod pa byed do/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis gang ji snyed du gsungs pa nas/ rab tu brjod pa'i bar de dag
110a2(phal chen): thams cad kyang yongs su shes shing 'dzin to/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongasu dag pa gang ji snyed pa de dag thams cad kyang rjes su dran no/ /sems can gang gis kho bo
110a3(phal chen): mthong bar 'gyur pa dang / gang dang 'grogs par gyur pa de dag kun kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par 'gyur ro/ /sems can phra mo 'am rags pa'am ngan pa'am bzang ba'am
110a4(phal chen): bde ba'am mi bde ba gang ji snyed cig kho bos mthong bar gyur pa de dag kun la yang yongasu smin par bya ba dang / 'dul ba'i dus las mi 'da' bar bya ba'i phyir/ khong du de dag gi lus kyi tshad dang mnyam par
110a5(phal chen): lus byin gyis brlobs bo/ /sems can ji snyed cig kho bo'i drung du 'ong ba de dag thams cad kyang / byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa kun tu 'gro ba 'di dang / byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa rnam par
110a6(phal chen): gnon pa don yod pa la rab tu gzhog go/ /rigs kyi bu kho bos ni byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa thogs pa med pa'i sgo kun tu 'gro ba de bzhin gshegs pa mchod pa dang / rim gro rab tu sbyor ba
110a7(phal chen): sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba dang / 'thun pa 'di shes par zad na/ kho bos byang chub sems dpa' snying rje chen po'i ngang tshul can/ theg pa chen po'i ngang tshul can/ byang chub sems dpa'i
110a8(phal chen): lam dang mi 'bral ba'i ngang tshul can/ thogs pa med pa'i ngang tshul can/ byang chub sems dpa'i bsam pa'i snying po chud mi gson pa'i ngang tshul can/ byang chub kyi sems yongs su mi gtong ba'i ngang tshul can/
110b1(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyi chos la lhag par dmigs pa'i ngang tshul can/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yid la bya ba dang mi 'bral ba'i ngang tshul can/ nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i ngang tshul can/ 'jig rten thams cad la
110b2(phal chen): mi gnas pa'i ngang tshul can/ chud mi gson pa'i ngang tshul can/ mnyam pa'i ngang tshul can/ ma god pa'i ngang tshul can/ glag med pa'i ngang tshul can/ ma 'dres pa'i ngang tshul can/ rnyogs pa med pa'i
110b3(phal chen): ngang tshul can/ 'gyod pa med pa'i ngang tshul can/ rnam par dag pa'i ngang tshul can/ byang chub sems dpa' rdul dang bral ba de dag gi spyod pa shes pa'am/ yon tan brjod pa nus re skan/ /song rigs kyi bu lho
110b4(phal chen): phyogs kyi rgyud 'di nyid na/ dra byi la'i grong rdal rdo rje'i grong khyer can bya ba yod de/ de na dra byi la'i sprin ces bya ba 'dug gis de'i gan du song la ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa
110b5(phal chen): la bslab par bya ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bya ba dris shig /de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyi dge slong rab tu brtan pa'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal nas/ lan brgya stong du mar g.yas
110b6(phal chen): phyogs su bskor ba byas te/ yang dag par bltas nas dge slong shin tu brtan pa'i drung nas song ngo / /de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs chos kyi dad pa'i shugs dang / byin gyis gnon pa/ sangs rgyas
110b7(phal chen): yid la bya ba'i 'du shes dang ldan pa/ dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung mi 'chad pa la rab tu brtson pa/ dus gsum snang bas sems snang bar gyur pa smon lam chen po yid la byed pa dang ldan pa sems can gyi
110b8(phal chen): khams thams cad yongasu bskyab pa'i thabs la zhugs pa/ 'dus byas kyi dge ba thams cad la mi gnas pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin nges par rtogs par bya ba la
111a1(phal chen): brtson pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad yongs su sbyang ba'i smon lam las mi g.yo ba/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor na gnas pa med par gnas pa chos kyi snang ba de rjes su dran
111a2(phal chen): par bya ba dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen rjes su dran par bya ba dang / 'dod chags dang bral ba'i rigs yongs su brjod pa byed cing / mthar gyi dra byi la'i grong rdal rdo rje'i grong khyer du phyin nas/ dra byi la'i sprin yongs
111a3(phal chen): su tshol tshol ba las/ grong khyer gyi khyams shig na chos bstan pa'i don du seng ge'i khri la 'dug cing / srog chags stong phrag bcu tsam zhig la chos kyi rnam grangs yi ge'i 'khor lo'i rgyud kyi rgyan ces bya ba yongasu
111a4(phal chen): ston cing 'dug pa mthong ngo / /de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyi dra byi la'i sprin gyi rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ dra byi la'i sprin la lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas
111a5(phal chen): nas mdun du 'dug ste/ thal mo sbyar nas 'di skad ces smras so/ /'phags pa bdag gi bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed na/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub
111a6(phal chen): sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar nan tan tu bgyi ba dang / ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub kyi sems srid pa'i lam rgyud thams cad che ba mi 'tshal ba dang / ji ltar yongasu skyo
111a7(phal chen): ba ma mchis shing / bsam pa gtan par 'gyur ba dang / ji ltar thub pa ma mchis shing lhag pa'i bsam pa yongasu skyo ba ma mchis shing snying rje chen po'i stobs yang dag pa skye bar 'gyur ba dang ji ltar sgo kun nas rnam
111a8(phal chen): par dag cing gzungs kyi stobs gnon par 'gyur ba dang / ji ltar ma rig pa'i rab rib dang sgrib pa rnam par 'thor zhing / shes rab kyi 'od chos thams cad la rab rib ma mchis pa'i snang ba skye bar 'gyur ba dang / ji ltar
111b1(phal chen): don dang chos dang nges pa'i tshig dang spobs pa la mkhas pa la dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor yongs su rdzogs shing / so so yang dag par rig pa'i stobs gnon par 'gyur ba dang / ji ltar sangs rgyas thams cad kyi 'khor lo
111b2(phal chen): tha mi dad pa yang dag par 'dzin cing dran pa'i stobs yongs su gnon par 'gyur ba dang / ji ltar chos thams cad kyi phyogs rigs pa'i snang ba rjes su rtog cing / rig pa'i stobs rnam par dag par 'gyur ba dang / ji ltar byang
111b3(phal chen): chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs chos thams cad kyi don rnam par gdon mi za bar rab tu dbye ba la brtson pas 'grub par 'gyur ba ma 'tshal to/ /de nas dra byi la'i sprin gyis byang chub sems dpa' la rim gro bya ba'i phyir
111b4(phal chen): seng ge'i khri de la langs te babs nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs la lus thams cad kyis phyag byas nas/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs la gser gyi me tog gi phung pos mngon par gtor to/ /nor bu rin po che rin
111b5(phal chen): thang med pa mang po dang / tsan dan gyi phye ma dam pas kyang mngon par gtor to/ /gos tshon sna tshogs rnam pa tha dad pas kha dog bsgyur ba brgya stong phrag du mas kyang mngon par bkab bo/ /spos kyi me tog kha dog rnam pa
111b6(phal chen): tha dad cing yid du 'ong la blta na sdug pa mang pos kyang mngon par gtor nas mchod pa'i rnam pa sna tshogs gzhan dag gi kyang / mchod pa dang rim gro dang / bkur stir dang sti stang cher byas te/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor
111b7(phal chen): bzangs la 'di skad ces smras so/ /rigs kyi bu khyod kyis de ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa legaso legaso/ /rigs kyi bu gang gi bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
111b8(phal chen): byang chub tu sems bskyed pa de ni/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gdung mi gcod pa'i phyir zhugs pa yin no/ /'dod chags dang bral ba'i rigs yang dag pa ci lta ba bzhin du rnam par rig par bya ba la brtson
112a1(phal chen): pa yin zhing rgyud thams cad yongs su dag par bya ba la zhugs pa yin/ sems can gyi rigs thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba dang / 'dul ba la sta gon du gnas pa yin/ chos kyi rigs
112a2(phal chen): thams cad yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin brtag pa la brtson pa yin/ las kyi rigs thams cad dang mi 'gal bar gnas pa yin/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i rigs thams cad yongasu rdzogs par bya ba
112a3(phal chen): la rab tu brtson pa yin smon lam thams cad rgyun mi 'chad pa'i phyir yangs dag par zhugs pa yin/ dus gsum gyi rgyud thams cad ye shes kyi khong du chud par bya ba la zhugs pa yin mos pa'i rig shin tu
112a4(phal chen): brtan par bya ba'i phyir brtson pa yin te/ de ni de bzhin gshegs pa mang po thams cad kyi byin gyis brlabs pa yin/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yang dag par dgongs pa yin/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad
112a5(phal chen): dang mnyam pa nyid du gyur pa yin/ 'phags pa thams cad kyi rjesu dgyes par bya ba yin/ tshangs pa'i dbang po thams cad kyis mngon par dga' bar byas pa yin/ lha'i dbang po thams cad kyis yang dag par
112a6(phal chen): mchod pa yin/ gnod sbyin gyi dbang po thams cad kyi yongasu bsrung ba yin/ srin po'i dbang po thams cad kyi rim gror byas pa yin/ klu'i dbang po thams cad kyi bsu ba yin/ mi 'am ci'i dbang po thams cad
112a7(phal chen): kyis mngon par bstod pa yin/ 'jig rten gyi dbang po thams cad kyi yang dag par bsngags pa yin/ des ni sems can gyi khams thams cad kyang ngan song gi lam rgyud gsum po yongs su gcad pa dang mi khom
112a8(phal chen): pa dang / ngan 'gro'i lam thams cad bzlog pa dang / dbul ba'i lam thams cad las yang dag par bzla ba dang / lha dang mi'i phun sum tshogs pa thob par bya ba dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen mthong ba dang mi 'bral
112b1(phal chen): ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rgya chen po nyan pa dang / 'bral bar mi 'gyur ba dang / byang chub kyi sems kyi yan lag yongs su dag par bya ba dang / byang chub kyi sems 'byung ba'i rgyud yongs su bsgrub pa
112b2(phal chen): dang / byang chub sems dpa'i lam snang ba thob par bya ba dang byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes khong du chud par bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sa la gnas par bya bas dbugs phyin par byas pa yin/ rigs
112b3(phal chen): kyi bu de la bdag 'di snyam du sems te/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni dka' ba byed pa ste/ 'byung bar dka' zhing mthong bar dka' ba'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni sems can rnams la bag dro bar
112b4(phal chen): byed pas pha dang ma lta bu'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi rgyan tu gyur to/ /byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni sdug bsngal gyis mnar ba rnams la skyabs su gyur
112b5(phal chen): pa'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni 'gro ba thams cad yongs su bsrung ba'i phyir gnas su gyur pa'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni 'jigs pa sna tshogs kyis gtses pa rnams la dpung gnyen
112b6(phal chen): du gyur pa'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni 'gro ba thams cad ngan song gsum du ltung ba las yongs su rton pa'i phyir rlung gi dkyil 'khor lta bu'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni sems can
112b7(phal chen): thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam par 'phel bar byed pas sa lta bu'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni bsod nams rin po che'i mdzod mi zad pa'i gter dang ldan pas rgya mtsho lta bu'o/ /byang chub
112b8(phal chen): dpa' rnams ni ye shes kyi 'od kyi snang bar byed pa'i phyir nyi ma lta bu'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni dge ba'i rtsa bas shin tu mtho bas ri rab lta bu'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni
113a1(phal chen): snying po byang chub tu ye shes kyi zla ba 'char bar 'gyur ba'i phyir zla ba lta bu'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni bdud kyi sde thams cad rab tu 'joms pas dpa' bor gyur pa'o/ /byang chub sems dpa'
113a2(phal chen): rnams ni rang byung gi chos kyi grong khyer du phyin par byed pas rtul phod pa lta bu'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni sems can thams cad kyi bdag la byams pa'i rlan yongasu skem pas me lta bu'o/ /byang
113a3(phal chen): chub sems dpa' rnams ni chos kyi sprin rgya chen po'i char mngon par 'bebs pas sprin lta bu'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni sems can gyi dbang po dad pa la stsogs pa'i myu gu rnam par 'phel bar
113a4(phal chen): byed pas char pa lta bu'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni chos kyi rgya mtsho'i 'gram yongasu ston pas mnyan pa lta bu'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni sems can thams cad 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho las yang dag
113a5(phal chen): par sgrol ba'i phyir zam pa lta bu'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni sems can thams cad kyi mngon par bgrod par bya ba'i phyir mu stegs lta bu'o/ /de ltar dra byi la'i sprin gyis tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs
113a6(phal chen): kyi mdun du 'dug ste/ tshig gi rgyud de dag gi byang chub sems dpa' rnams la yongs su bsngags pa byas nas/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs la legaso zhes bsngags so/ /de ltar de nas byang chub sems
113a7(phal chen): dpa' yang dag par dga' bar bya ba'i phyir tshig brjod pa'i tshe/ kha'i sgo nas 'od 'phro ba'i phung po rnam pa 'di lta bu byung ste/ 'od 'phro ba'i phung po des stong gsum gyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgyas par
113a8(phal chen): gang bar gyur nas/ lha dang lha rdzu 'phrul chen po'am/ klu dang klu rdzu 'phrul chen po'am/ gnod sbyin dang gnod sbyin rdzu 'phrul chen po'am/ dri za dang dri za rdzu 'phrul chen po'am/ lha ma yin dang lha ma yin rdzu
113b1(phal chen): 'phrul chen po 'am/ nam mkha' lding dang nam mkha' lding rdzu 'phrul chen po 'am/ mi'am ci dang mi 'am ci rdzu 'phrul chen po 'am/ lto 'phye chen po dang lto 'phye chen po rdzu 'phrul chen po 'am/ mi dang mi rdzu 'phrul chen po 'am/ /mi ma yin pa dang mi ma yin pa rdzu 'phrul chen po 'am/ tshangs
113b2(phal chen): pa dang tshangs pa rdzu 'phrul chen po 'am/ sems can gang sus mthong yang rung ste/ snang ba des yongs su snang bar byas pa de dag dra byi la sprin gyi drung du 'ongs so/ /de nas de ltar dra byi la sprin gyi
113b3(phal chen): bsam pa byin gyis rlabs shing thal mo sbyar te/ gnas pa lus dang sems sim par gyur pa/ dga' ba rgya chen po skyes pa sri zhu chen po la gnas pa/ nga rgyal gyi rgyal mtshan bcom pa/ g.yo rgyu dang
113b4(phal chen): bral ba/ dbang po rnam par dang bar gyur pa de dag la dra byi la'i sprin gyis chos kyi rnam grangs yi ge'i 'khor lo'i rgyud kyi rgyan ces bya ba de nyid rgya cher yang dag par bstan te/ khong du chud pa dang rtogs pa dang shes
113b5(phal chen): pa dang rig par byas so/ /de thos nas kyang de dag thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par gyur to/ /de nas de'i phyir chos gyi stan la 'dug nas/ tshong dpon gyi
113b6(phal chen): bu nor bzangs la 'di skad ces smras so/ /rigs kyi bu kho bo ni dbyangs dang ldan pa'i gzungs thob pa ste/ de'i mthu kho bos stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di lha rnams kyi lha'i
113b7(phal chen): skad kyang shes so/ /de bzhin du klu dang gnod sbyin dang dri za dang / lha ma yin dang nam mkha' lding dang mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa dang / tshangs pa rnams kyi tshangs pa'i skad sna
113b8(phal chen): tshogs kyang shes so/ /lha rnams kyi lha'i skad sna tshogs kyang shes so/ /de bzhin du klu dang gnod sbyin dang dri za dang / lha ma yin dang nam mkha' lding dang mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang mi dang mi ma
114a1(phal chen): yin pa dang / tshangs pa rnams kyis tshangs pa'i skad sna tshogs kyang shes so/ /lha rnams kyi lha'i skad gcig pa yang shes so/ /de bzhin du klu dang gnod sbyin dang dri za dang / lha ma yin dang nam mkha' lding
114a2(phal chen): dang mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa dang / tshangs pa rnams kyis tshangs pa'i skad gcig pa yang shes so/ /lha rnams kyi lha'i skad tha dad pa yang shes so/ /de bzhin du klu dang gnod
114a3(phal chen): sbyin dang dri za dang lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang mi dang mi ma yin pa dang / tshangs pa rnams kyi tshangs pa'i skad tha dad pa yang shes so/ /byol song gi skye gnas su skyes pa'i sems
