114a4(phal chen): can rnams kyi brda dang skad dang ming tha dad pa kyang shes so/ /sems can dmyal ba pa'i sems can rnams kyi skad dang / ming rnams kyang shes so/ /gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi sems can rnams kyi skad
114a5(phal chen): dang ming rnams kyang shes so/ /'phags pa'i skad dang ming rnams kyang shes so/ /'phags pa ma yin pa'i skad dang ming rnams kyang shes so/ /byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi tshig dang brda'
114a6(phal chen): nges pa'i ngag sems can gyi bsam pa bzhin du 'byung ba yang shes so/ /sems can gyi skad re re la yang dus gsum du gshegs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi dbyangs kyi yan lag dang gsung
114a7(phal chen): rgya mtsho sems can thams cad kyi ming dang gtam gyi sgra dang / tshig du ldan pa yang rtogs shing khong du chud do/ /ji ltar stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'i sems can rnams kyi brda
114a8(phal chen): dang nges pa'i tshig dang skad dang ming rgya mtsho la 'jug cing shes pa/ de bzhin du shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong tshad med grangs med/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa mtshungs pa med
114b1(phal chen): pa kun tu mtha' yas pa mu med pa/ sa mtshams med pa gzhal du med pa/ brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa dang / de bzhin du lho phyogs dang / nub phyogs dang byang phyogs dang / byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams
114b2(phal chen): dang shar lho'i phyogs mtshams dang / lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams dang / nub byang gi phyogs mtshams dang / 'og dang steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong tshad med pa dang brjod du
114b3(phal chen): med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i bar gyi sems can rnams kyi brda dang / nges pa'i tshigs dang skad dang ming rgya mtsho thams cad la 'jug cing shes te/ 'di ltar lha rnams kyi lha'i skad kyang sheso tshangs pa rnaMs
114b4(phal chen): kyis tshangs pa'i skad kyi bar du'ang shes so/ /rigs kyi bu kho bos ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gzugs snang ba dbyangs dang ldan pa 'di shes par zad na/ kho bos byang chub sems dpa' 'gro ba sna tshogs kyi
114b5(phal chen): brda'i rnam pa rgya mtsho la zhugs pa de dag dang / 'gro ba sna tshogs kyi skad dang / ming rgya mtsho la zhugs pa de dag dang / 'gro ba sna tshogs kyi ming shin tu bstan pa rgya mtsho la zhugs pa de dag dang 'gro ba sna
114b6(phal chen): tshogs kyi brjod pa rab tu bkod pa dang / rnam par spyod pa rgya mtsho la zhugs pa de dag dang / tshig thams cad kyi mtshams sbyor ba thams cad rgya mtsho la zhugs pa de dag dang / tshig lhur blangs te bstan pa rgya
114b7(phal chen): mtsho la zhug pa de dag dang / dus gsum gyi dmyigs pa thams cad dmigs pa gcig tu rnam par spyod pa rgya mtsho gangs chen mtsho la zhugs pa de dag dang / tshig gi brtsegs te bstan pa rgya mtsho la zhugs pa de dag dang / tshig
114b8(phal chen): gnyis nas brtsegs te bstan pa rgya mtsho la zhugs pa de dag dang / tshig rab tu phye ste bstan pa rgya mtsho la zhugs pa de dag dang / chos thams cad rab tu dbye bas 'dul ba'i tshul bstan pa rgya
115a1(phal chen): mtsho la zhugs pa de dag dang / 'gro ba thams cad kyi skad rgya mtsho la zhugs de dag dang / dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor rnam par dag pa'i rgyan thams cad la zhugs pa de dag dang / yi ge'i 'khor lo'i
115a2(phal chen): mthar phyin par bya bas rab tu dbye ba las byung ba de dag gi spyod pa shes pa'am/ yon tan brjod par nus re skan song rigs kyi bu lho phyogs kyi rgyud 'di nyid na yul nags tshal na gnas pa zhes bya ba yod de/
115a3(phal chen): de na tshong dpon gtang brjod ces bya ba 'dug gi de'i gan du song la ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i phyogs la brtson par bya ba dang / ji ltar 'brang bar bya ba dang / ji ltar sems nges par bzhag
115a4(phal chen): par bya ba dris shig / de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis/ dra byi la sprin gyi rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ chos kyi rim gro byas nas/ dad pa'i mtshan nyid rtsa ba tshugs pa la rab tu
115a5(phal chen): rtogs pa dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen las 'ongs pa'i thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la yang dag par lta zhing gdong mchi mas gang bar ngus te/ dra byi la sprin la lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas
115a6(phal chen): nas/ yang dang yang bltas te phyag 'tshal zhing dra byi la sprin gyi drung nas song ngo // //sangs rgyas rmad ga cad ces bya ba shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo/ bam po dgu pa/ de nas tshong dpon
115a7(phal chen): gyi bu nor bzangs byang chub sems dpa'i gzungs snang ba dbyangs dang ldan pa'i rgyan de nyid la rjes su bsam pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i skad kyi tshul rgya mtsho de nyid la 'jug par bya ba dang / byang chub
115a8(phal chen): sems dpa'i tshul phra mo la 'jug pa de nyid rjes su dran par bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sems rnam par byung bas/ rnam par dag pa de nyid kyi rjes su 'brang bar bya ba dang / byang chub sems
115b1(phal chen): dpa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba'i bag chags bsdu zhing bsgrub pa mngon par bsgrub pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i yongasu smin par bya ba'i sgo de nyid rnam par byang ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis
115b2(phal chen): sems can bsdu ba'i ye shes de nyid shin tu byang bar bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i bsam pa'i stobs rnam par bya ba de nyid brtan par bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i lhag pa'i bsam pa'i
115b3(phal chen): stobs de nyid nye bar brtan par bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i mos pa'i rgyud de nyid yongs su sbyangs par bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sems de nyid gdon mi za bar dge bar bsam pa dang byang
115b4(phal chen): chub sems dpa'i yid dam chen po de nyid mthar phyin par byed cing / tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs yid dam la brtan zhing smon lam gyi sems kyis yongs su skyo ba med pa'i rgyud kyi rgyan dang ldan pa/ phyir mi ldog
115b5(phal chen): pas rnam par gnon pa'i brtson 'grus can/ yid kyis brtul ba las mi bzlogs pa/ dad pa mi 'phrogs pa'i stobs dang ldan pa/ rdo rje mthu bo che mi phyed pa'i sems dang ldan pa dge ba'i bshes
115b6(phal chen): gnyen thams cad kyi gdam ngag 'thun par len pa/ shes rab kha ma bab pa'i yul dang ldan pa/ sgo kun nas rnam par dag pa la mngon du gyur pa/ ye shes rnam par dag pa'i spyod yul thog pa kun nas
115b7(phal chen): lta ba'i ye shes kyi tshul snang ba dang ldan pa/ sa'i gzugs kun nas snang ba rab tu thob pa/ chos kyi dbyings kyi gzhi'i bye brag la mngon sum du gyur pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ gzhi kun la brtan pa'i
115b8(phal chen): rgyan rnam par dag pa'i rang bzhin rnam par dmigs pa gnas med pa dang / bdag gi med pa gnyis su med pa'i spyod yul la rab tu brtson pa/ 'du shes thams cad las 'da' bar byed pa'i ye shes kyi sgo
116a1(phal chen): rnam par dag pa/ chos kyi phyogs dang gzhi tha dad pa'i phyogs la so sor rtogs pa med pa 'jig rten gyi gzhi dang phyogs kyi bye brag las phyir mi ldog pa/ chos kyi gzhi dang phyogs kyi bye brag las phyir mi ldog pa
116a2(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyi phyogs dang gzhi tha dad pa mthong ba dang / rnam par rig par bya ba la gzhol ba'i dus kyi phyogs dang gzhi'i bye brag khong du chud pa'i ye shes can/ chos kyi 'khor lo yid du 'ong bas yang dag par
116a3(phal chen): bsgrub pa'i blo dang ldan pa/ ye shes kun nas snang ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rnam par snang bas sems gsal bar byas pa/ yid kyi yul lus kun dang ldan pa'i sa la zhugs pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye
116a4(phal chen): shes snang bas rgyud shin tu snang bar byas pa/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du dad pa'i dba' rlabs kyi shugs kyis rab tu rlob pa/ sangs rgyas kyi chos la mos pa'i shugs dang 'bral ba med pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i
116a5(phal chen): byin gyis brlabs kyi byin du rlab pa/ sangs rgyas thams cad rang gi sems kyi rgyud khong du chud pa'i 'od kyi snang bar gyur pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams kyi dra ba thams cad rang gi lus kyi rgyas par gang ba'i smon lam dang chos kyi
116a6(phal chen): dbyings thams cad rang gi lus su yang dag par bsdu ba dang / mngon par bsgrub pa la brtson pa/ de mthar gyi song song ste/ lo bcu gnyis kyis yul nags tshal na gnas par phyin nas/ de nas tshong dpon btang brjod de
116a7(phal chen): btsal te mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang lus thams cad kyis phab ste/ phyag 'tshal nas mdun du 'dug ste/ thal mo sbyar nas 'di skad ces smras so/ /'phags pa bdag de ring dge ba'i bshes gnyen
116a8(phal chen): dang mjal bar gyur pa ni bdag gis 'thob par bgyi ba legs par thob bo/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams ni mthong bar dka' ba'o/ /'byung bar dka' ba'o/ /mjal bar dka' ba'o/ /
116b1(phal chen): bgrod par dka' ba'o/ /bsnyen bkur bgyi bar dka' ba'o/ /mnyes par bgyi bar dka' ba'o/ /'grogs par dka' ba'o/ /rim gro bgyi bar dka' ba'o/ /dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams ni rjesu 'brang bar dka' ba lags
116b2(phal chen): na/ de lta bu'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang 'grogs pa de ring bdag gis thob par gyur to/ /'phags pa bdag gi 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas thams cad bsnyen bkur ba dang / sangs rgyas thams cad la rim gro bgyi ba
116b3(phal chen): dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi zhal blta ba dang / sangs rgyas thams cad rnam par dmigs par bgyi ba dang / sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam pa nyid thob par bgyi ba dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi smon
116b4(phal chen): lam khong du chud par bgyi ba dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi smon lam yongs su rdzogs par bgyi ba dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yang dag par bsgrub pa'i ye shes snang bar bgyi ba dang / sangs rgyas
116b5(phal chen): thams cad rang gi lus su mngon par bsgrub pa dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yang dag par bsgrub pa rang gi spyod pa mngon par bsgrub par bgyi ba dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rnam par 'phrul pa mngon
116b6(phal chen): sum du rtogs par bgyi ba dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi stobs dang mi bsnyengs pa yongasu dag par bgyi ba dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos bston pa mnyan pas mi ngoms par bgyi ba dang / sangs rgyas
116b7(phal chen): thams cad kyi chos bstan pa mnyan cing blang bar bgyi ba dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos bstan pa yang dag par gzungs bar bgyi ba dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos bstan pa rnam par dbye bar bgyi
116b8(phal chen): ba dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos bstan pa yongs su gzung ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang / tshul gcig tu 'gyur bar bgyi ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang bskal bar
117a1(phal chen): mnyam par bgyi ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi spyod pa yongs su dag par bgyi ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bgyi ba dang / byang chub
117a2(phal chen): sems dpa' thams cad kyi smon lam mngon par bsgrub pa rnam par dag pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs kyi mdzod rab tu thob par bgyi ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams
117a3(phal chen): cad kyi chos kyi gter dang mdzod mi zad pa'i ye shes snang ba thob par bgyi ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi gter dang mdzod khong du chud par bgyi ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi mdzod
117a4(phal chen): tshad med pa mngon par bsgrub pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi snying rje chen po'i gter dang mdzod sems can 'dul ba'i mthar phyin par bgyi ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi rnam par
117a5(phal chen): 'phrul ba'i gter dang / mdzod rnam par dmyigs par bgyi ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi dbang gis gter dang / mdzod rang gi sems kyis dbang du bgyi ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'
117a6(phal chen): thams cad kyi rnam par dag pa'i gter dang / mdzod rnam pa thams cad du brgyan par bgyi ba'i slad du bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed nas/ 'phags pa de lta bu'i sems kyis bdag
117a7(phal chen): 'dir mchis so/ /bsam pa de lta bu dang yid la smon pa de lta bu dang / mngon par dga' ba de lta bu dang / sems pa de lta bu dang gdon mi 'tshal bar bsgrub par bsam pa de lta bu dang / spyod yul mngon du bgyi ba de lta bu dang / tshul khong
117a8(phal chen): du chud par bgyi ba la mos pa de lta bu dang / rnam par dag pa la gzhol ba de lta bu dang / rnam par dpyad pa'i bsam pa de lta bu dang / rab tu gzhol ba'i sems de lta bu dang / dge ba'i sbyor ba de lta bu dang / mngon du
117b1(phal chen): 'gyur ba'i dbang po de lta bus bdag 'dir mchis te/ 'phags pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams la gdam ngag dang / rjesu ston pa mdzad cing tshul ni nye bar ston pa mdzad/ rtogs par bgyi ba ni snang bar mdzad lam ni
117b2(phal chen): bston par mdzad/ mu stegs la ni 'joms par mdzad/ chos kyi sgo ni rnam par 'byed pa mdzad/ the tsom ni yongs su gcod par mdzad/ nir nur ni sel bar mdzad/ yid gnyis kyi zug rngu ni 'byin par mdzad/
117b3(phal chen): dogs pa'i dri ma ni sbyong bar mdzad/ sems kyi thibs po ni snang bar mdzad/ sems kyi dri ma ni yongs su sel bar mdzad/ sems kyi rgyud ni rab tu dang bar mdzad/ sems kyi g.yo sgyu ni yongasu
117b4(phal chen): sel bar mdzad/ sems kyi gdung ba ni yongasu sim par mdzad/ 'khor ba las ni sems rnam par bzlog par mdzad/ mi dge ba'i las ni phyir bzlog par mdzad/ sems can dmyal ba
117b5(phal chen): las ni ldog par mdzad/ gnas dang ni bral bar mdzad/ mngon par zhen pa las ni gyen du bskyod pa mdzad/ chags pa thams cad las ni yongs su 'grol bar mdzad/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du
117b6(phal chen): ni bsgrub pa mdzad/ chos kyi grong rdal du 'jug par bgyi ba'i slad du ni mngon du gyur par mdzad/ snying rje chen po la ni rab tu bsgrub pa mdzad/ byams pa chen po la ni rab tu gzhog pa mdzad/ byang chub
117b7(phal chen): sems dpa'i spyod pa la ni rab tu sbyor ba mdzad/ ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo bsgom pa la ni mdzud pa mdzad/ rtogs par 'gyur ba'i sgo la ni gnas par mdzad/ rang bzhin nges par rtogs pa la ni gzhog
117b8(phal chen): par mdzad/ stobs dang ldan pas ni khyab par mdzad/ 'gro ba thams cad mnyam pa nyid du ni sems rnam par dbye ba mdzad do/ /zhes thos na/ 'phags pa ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang
118a1(phal chen): chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la brtson par bgyi/ ji ltar sbyar bar bgyi/ ji ltar brtson par bgyis na/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i dkyil 'khor rnam par 'gyur ba bdag la bstan du gsol/ de nas
118a2(phal chen): tshong dpon btang brjod kyi de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad yang dag par 'du ba zhes bya ba gzungs kyi sgo klong mtha' yas pa sngon du 'gro ba la/ sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i shugs dang /
118a3(phal chen): de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyis brlabs dang / 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas yang dag par bsams shing ye shes snang ba nye bar bsgrubs pas snyoms par
118a4(phal chen): zhugs so/ /tshong dpon btang brjod de ltar snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu gzugs kyi lus yongs su dag pa 'di lta bur gnas par 'gyur te/ lus yongs su dag pa de'i mthus phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas
118a5(phal chen): bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang bcas/ 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dang bcas/ 'od rnam par dag pa dang bcas/ sngon gyi
118a6(phal chen): spyod pa la zhugs pa dang bcas/ sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa dang bcas/ smon lam gyi tshogs dang bcas/ spyod pa dang 'byung ba'i rgyan rnam par dag pa dang bcas/ mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya
118a7(phal chen): ba yongs su ston pa dang bcas/ chos kyi 'khor lo shin tu ston pa dang bcas/ sems can yongs su smin par mdzad pa dang bcas/ chos kyi mu'i mthar thugs pa dang bcas par kun kyang lus kyi khongasu chud cing
118a8(phal chen): 'dus par snang ste/ de dag phan tshun ma 'dres pa dang / phan tshun mchod pa dang / phan tshun shin tu rnam par phye ba dang / phan tshun shin tu rnam par gnas pa dang / tshul sna tshogs su zhugs pa dang yang dag pa
118b1(phal chen): ji lta ba bzhin du rnam par dmigs pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing rgyan sna tshogs can mnga' ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor sna tshogs kyi rgyan dang ldan pa dang sangs rgyas kyi rnam par
118b2(phal chen): 'phrul pa sna tshogs yongasu ston par snang ngo / /theg pa sna tshogs rnam par dgod pa mdzad pa dang / smon lam gyi sgo sna tshogs yongs su brjod pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams la la na ni dga' ldan gyi pho brang du
118b3(phal chen): skyes shing sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las thams cad mdzad par snang ngo / /la la na ni dga' ldan gyi pho brang nas 'pho ba dang / la la na ni yum gyi sku na bzhugs shing rnam par 'phrul pa sna tshogs yongasu ston pa dang / la la
118b4(phal chen): na ni skye ba dang / la la na ni byis pa'i rtsed mo ston pa mdzad pa dang / la la na ni btsun mo'i 'khor gyi nang na bzhugs pa dang / la la na ni mngon par 'byung ba dang / la la na ni snying po byang chub tu gshegs te/
118b5(phal chen): rnam par 'phrul pa'i rgyan chen pos bdud kyi sde pham par mdzad pa dang / la la na ni lha dang klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri zas yongs su bskor cing tshangs pa'i dbang pos chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar gsol ba gdab
118b6(phal chen): pa dang / la la na ni chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba mdzad pa dang / la la na ni sems can thams cad kyi gnas na bzhugs pa dang / la la na ni yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar snang ngo / /'jig rten gyi khams
118b7(phal chen): la la na ni de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan las 'das pa rnams kyi ring bsrel rnam par dgod par snang ngo / /sangs rgyas kyi zhing la la na ni lha dang mi rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten la rgyan gyi klubs
118b8(phal chen): pa byed par snang ste/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis sems can gyi ris rnam pa tha dad pa dang / sems can gyi 'jig rten gyi rnam pa tha dad pa dang / sems can gyi lam rnam pa tha dad pa dang / sems can
119a1(phal chen): gyi skye gnas rnam pa tha dad pa dang / sems can gyi tshogs rnam pa tha dad pa dang / sems can gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i rgyud rnam pa tha dad pa dang / sems can gyi bsam pa'i rgyud rnam pa tha dad pa dang sems can
119a2(phal chen): ci la mos pa'i rgyud rnam pa tha dad pa dang / sems can gyi dbang po'i rgyud rnam pa tha dad pa dang / dus kyi rgyud rnam pa tha dad pa dang / sems can gyi las kyi bye brag rnam pa tha dad pa dang / sems can gyi las mi mthun pa rnam
119a3(phal chen): pa tha dad pa dang / sems can gyi 'jig rten rnam par dbye ba rnam pa tha dad pa dang / sems can gyi tshul lam dang spyod pa rnam pa tha dad pa la spyod pa dang / sems can rgya mtsho bsam pa dang sbyor ba'i rnam pa tha dad pa dang dbang po
119a4(phal chen): mi 'thun pa sna tshogs rnam pa tha dad pa dang / nyon mongs pa dang / bag chags sna tshogs bag la nyal bar gyur pa'i sems can 'byam klas pa rnams la sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa rnam pa sna tshogs yongasu bstan pa
119a5(phal chen): dang / yul sna tshogs kyi nges pa'i tshig dang / dbyangs kyi yan lag dang gsung rnam pa sna tshogs su bsgrags pa dang / mdo sde sna tshogs kyi tshul rab tu brjod pa dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnam pa tha dad pa'i rgyud dang so so yang
119a6(phal chen): dag par rig pa'i tshul gyi gzhung sna tshogs dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa'i ming rgya mtsho'i rgyud rnam pa sna tshogs dang / sangs rgyas kyi khyu mchog dang seng+ge'i nga ro rab tu bsgrag pa dang / sems can gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba sna
119a7(phal chen): tshogs bstan pa'i cho 'phrul yongasu bstan pa dang / dran pa'i sgo sna tshogs can shin tu bstan pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' lung bstan pa'i seng+ge'i nga ro sna tshogs dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos
119a8(phal chen): kyi 'khor lo'i mthu phyung ba rnam pa sna tshogs kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor mtha' dang dbus med pa mtha' yas par rnam pa tha dad pa phan tshun mchod pa dang / rnam par dag pa'i dkyil 'khor sna tshogs yang pa dang / 'khor gyi dkyil
119b1(phal chen): 'khor shin tu phra bar 'dus pa dang / dpag tshad cig gi tshad tsam dang / dpag tshad bcu'i tshad tsam dang / dpag tshad brgya'i tshad tsam nas/ 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang
119b2(phal chen): brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi tshad tsam du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung dbyangs kyi yan lag dang / sgra skad thams cad kyi rjes su 'gro bas chos ji snyed du
119b3(phal chen): bstan pa de dag thams cad kyang / tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyi thoso blangaso/ /yang dag par gzung ngo bsamaso/ /sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa de dag kyang mthong ngo / /byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi khyu mchog
119b4(phal chen): gi mthu phyung ba de dag kyang mthong ngo / /de nas tshong dpon btang brjod dran zhing shes bzhin du ting nge 'dzin de las langs nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs la 'di skad ces smras so/ /rigs kyi bu kho bo ni de bzhin gshegs
119b5(phal chen): pa'i rnam par thar pa thogs pa med pa'i rgyan ces bya ba yongasu blangs shing 'dzin pa ste/ rigs kyi bu de ltar kho bo de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par thar pa thogs pa med pa'i rgyan de la rtog cing dpyod
119b6(phal chen): pa'i tshe/ shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'dzam bu chu klung gi mdog dang ldan pa na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas skar ma'i dbang phyug rgyal po zhes bya ba byang chub sems
119b7(phal chen): dpa' rnam par snang ba'i snying po la sogs pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs pa'ang mig lam du snang ngo / /lho phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams stobs thams cad kyi shugs dang ldan pa na/
119b8(phal chen): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas spos kun tu rnam par yangs pa zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa' bsam pa'i rgyal po la stsogs pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams
120a1(phal chen): cad dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs pa'ang mig lam du snang ngo / /nub phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams spos thams cad kyi 'od dang ldan pa na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ri rab
120a2(phal chen): mar me'i rgyal po zhes bya ba/ byang chub sems dpa' chags pa med pa'i sems la stsogs pa byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad dang / thabs gcig tu bzhugs pa yang mig lam du snang ngo / /
120a3(phal chen): byang phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyis khams ngur smrig gi rgyal mtshan na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rdo rje rab tu 'dul ba zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje'i gom pas
120a4(phal chen): rnam par gnon pa la sogs pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs pa yang mig lam na snang ngo / /byang shar gyi phyogs 'tshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams
120a5(phal chen): rin po che thams cad rab tu 'bar ba na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi dmyigs pa'i spyan rnam par dmigs pa zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa' dmigs pa med par shin tu
120a6(phal chen): sprul pa la stsogs pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs pa yang mig lam du snang ngo / /shar lho'i phyogs 'tshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams spos kyi
120a7(phal chen): 'od zer rab tu snang ba na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas spos kyi mar me zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi dbyings kyi gzhi tha dad pa'i dpal gyi rgyal po la
120a8(phal chen): stsogs pa byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs pa'ang mig lam du snang ngo / /lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams nyi ma'i 'od zer ltar snang ba na
120b1(phal chen): d e bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sgo kun nas ye shes rnam par snang ba'i dbyangs zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa' me tog gis 'od kun nas 'phro bar gtsug phud rab tu 'phyang
120b2(phal chen): ba la sogs pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs pa'ang mig lam du snang ngo / /nub byang gi phyogs 'tshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams spos kyi rgyan yid du
120b3(phal chen): 'ong ba'i dge ba'i snying po na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yon tan rgya mtsho tshad med pa'i 'od ces bya ba/ byang chub sems dpa' lus kyi 'od zer thogs pa med pa'i
120b4(phal chen): gzi brjid rgyal po blo gros la stsogs pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs pa'ang mig lam du snang ngo / /'og gis phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rin po
120b5(phal chen): che'i seng+ge snang zhing 'bar ba na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od zer chos kyi dbyings su snang ba zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi dbyings 'od 'phro zhing rnam
120b6(phal chen): par snang bar byung ba'i blo gros la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs pa'ang mig lam du snang ngo / /steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyis khams
120b7(phal chen): mtshan gyi 'od rnam par snang ba na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yon tan grags pa thogs pa med pa'i rnam par thar pa'i 'od kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba byang chub sems
120b8(phal chen): dpa' stobs dang / brtson 'grus thogs pa med pa'i brtson 'grus la sogs pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs pa'ang mig lam du snang ngo / /
121a1(phal chen): rigs kyi bu de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa 'di dag la sogs pa/ phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed
121a2(phal chen): mthong yang de bzhin gshegs pa de dag kyang 'dir mi byon/ kho bo yang der 'gro ba med de nam 'dod pa de na bde ba yod pa'i 'jig rten gyis khams na/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'od snang ba mtha' yas pa bzhugs pa'ang
121a3(phal chen): mthong ngo / /tsan dan yod pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams na de bzhin gshegs pa 'od snang ba rdo rje bzhugs pa'ang mthong ngo / /spos dri yod pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams na de bzhin gshegs pa 'od snang rin chen bzhugs
121a4(phal chen): pa yang mthong ngo / /pad mo yod pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'od snang ba rin chen pad mo bzhugs pa'ang mthong ngo / /gser yod pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams na de bzhin
121a5(phal chen): gshegs pa 'od snang zhi ba bzhugs pa'ang mthong ngo / /mngon par dga' ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams na de bzhin gshegs pa mi bsgul ba bzhugs pa'ang mthong ngo / /shin tu brten pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams na de bzhin gshegs
121a6(phal chen): pa seng ge bzhugs pa'ang mthong ngo / /me long gi dkyil 'khor ltar snang ba'i 'jig rten gyis khams na de bzhin gshegs pa blo gros zla ba bzhugs pa yang mthong ngo / /rin chen dpal gyi dad pas
121a7(phal chen): brgyan pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams na de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad bzhugs pa yang mthong ngo / /rigs kyi bu de ltar kho bos ni phyogs gang dang gang na 'jig rten gyi khams gang dang gang gi de bzhin
121a8(phal chen): gshegs pa gang dang gang mthong bar 'dod pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa de dang de dag kyang mthong ngo / /dus gang dang gang du dmigs pa gang dang gang la sngon gyi spyod pa gang dang gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa mthong bar 'dod pa dang /
121b1(phal chen): rnam par 'phrul pa gang dang gang gi don dang / sems can 'dul ba gang dang gang gis don du de bzhin gshegs pa gang dang gang mthong bar 'dod pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa de dang de dag kyang mthong ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa de
121b2(phal chen): dag kyang 'dir gshegs pa ma yin/ bdag kyang der phyin pa ma yin no/ /rigs kyi bu de ltar kho bos de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ga las kyang byon pa med par shes la rang gis lus las kyang gar yang 'gro ba med
121b3(phal chen): par shes pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams rnam par dmigs pa yang rmi lam lta bur shes la/ rang gis sems rnam par dmigs pa yang rmi lam dang 'dra bar rgyu bar shes pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams rnam
121b4(phal chen): par dmigs pa yang gzugs brnyen lta bur shes la rang gi sems rnam par dmyigs pa yang chu'i snod gsal ba lta bur shes pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams rnam par dmigs pa yang sgyu mas byas
121b5(phal chen): pa'i gzugs lta bur shes la rang gis sems rnam par dmyigs pa yang sgyu ma lta bur shes pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung yang sgra brnyan ri'i brag cha lta bur brjod par shes la rang gi sems
121b6(phal chen): rnam par dmigs pa yang sgra brnyen lta bur shes pas byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad ni rang gi sems kyi byin gyis brlabs las 'byung ngo / /zhes bya bar rjesu rtog shing khong du chud do/ /
121b7(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongasu dag pa thams cad kyang rang gis sems kyi byin gyis brlabs so/ /byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yang rang gi sems kyi byin gyi brlabaso/ /sems can thams cad yongasu smin
121b8(phal chen): par bya ba dang / gdul ba yang rang gis sems kyi byin gyis brlabs so/ /byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam mngon par bsgrub pa yang rang gi sems kyi byin gyis brlabs so/ /thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
122a1(phal chen): kyi grong khyer du phyin par bya ba yang rang gis sems kyi byin gyis rlabaso/ /rnam par thar pa bsam gyi mi khyab pas rnam par brtse ba yang rang gi sems kyi byin gyis brlabaso/ /sangs rgyas kyi byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par
122a2(phal chen): 'tshang rgya ba yang rang gi sems kyi byin gyi brlabaso/ /chos kyi dbyings kun nas 'dus par khyu mchog gi mthu dbyung zhing rnam par 'phrul pa yang rang gi sems kyi byin gyis brlabaso/ /bskal pa thams cad
122a3(phal chen): shin tu phra bar bsdu ba'i ye shes kyang rang gis sems kyi byin gyis brlabaso zhes bya bar khong du chud cing rjesu rtogaso/ /rigs kyi bu de la kho bo 'di snyam du sems te/ dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyis ni rang
122a4(phal chen): gis sems nyid nye bar brten par bya'o/ /bzod pas rang gi sems nyid yongs su brlab par bya'o/ /sgribs pa'i chos rnams las ni rang gi sems nyid yongasu sbyang bar bya'o/ /brtson 'grus kyis ni rang gi sems
122a5(phal chen): nyid yongs su brtan par bya'o/ /bzod pas ni rang gis sems nyid mnyam par bya'o/ /ye shes khong du chud par byas pas ni rang gi sems nyid gzhol bar bya'o/ /shes rab kyi ni rang gi sems nyid
122a6(phal chen): yongasu sbyang bar bya'o/ /dbang rnams la ni rang gi sems nyid mngon par bsgrub par bya'o/ /sangs rgyas dang nyan thos mnyam pa nyid la ni rang gis sems nyid rgyas par bya'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i
122a7(phal chen): stobs bcus ni rang gis sems nyid snang bar bya'o snyam mo/ /rigs kyi bu kho bo ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par thar pa thogs pa med pa'i rgyan 'di shes te/ blangs shing yongasu
122a8(phal chen): 'dzin par mdzad na/ kho bos byang chub sems dpa' chags pa med pa'i sems dang ldan pa chags pa med par rnam pa'i spyod yul dang ldan pa/ da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas thams cad mngon sum du
122b1(phal chen): zhugs pa'i ting nge 'dzin rab tu thob pa/ mya ngan las 'da' ba myed pa'i mtha' la gnas pa'i rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi sgo'i ting nge 'dzin rab tu thob pa/ dus gsum mnyam pa nyid du gyur pa/ gzhi kun nas phyed pa'i ting nge 'dzin
122b2(phal chen): gyi spyod yul gyi tshul shes pa/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du lus rnam par bkram pa/ sangs rgyas kyi yul tha myi dad pa la rnam par spyod pa/ phyogs thams cad du mngon par phyogs pa'i spyod yul dang ldan pa/
122b3(phal chen): phyir phyogs myed pa'i ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor gyis rnam par lta ba de dag gi lus la 'jig rten gyi khams thaMd 'jig cing 'du bar snang yang de dag la bdag dang 'jig rten gyi khamasu gnyis kyi 'du shes myed pa de dag gi
122b4(phal chen): spyod pa shes pa 'am/ yon tan brjod par nus re skan/ /song rigs kyi bu lho phyogs kyi rgyud 'di nyid kyi 'dzam bu gling gi mgo 'gebs pas rgyas par 'gengs pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na dge slong rgya mtsho'i rgyal
122b5(phal chen): mtshan ces bya ba 'dug gis/ de'i gan du song la ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bya ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bya ba dris shig /de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis
122b6(phal chen): tshong dpon btang brjod kyi rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ tshong dpon btang brjod la lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas/ yang yang bltas te/ tshong dpon btang brjod kyi yon
122b7(phal chen): tan grangs myed pa la snyan par brjod de/ brtag pa dang / mos par bya ba dang / mi btang bar bya ba sems shing ngus te smre sngags bton nas/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen sdug par sems shing dge ba'i bshes
122b8(phal chen): gnyen gyi rjes su 'brang ba dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen la bsnyen bkur bar mos pa dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis bsgo ba dang / myi 'gal bar byed pa dang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dge ba'i bshes
123a1(phal chen): gnyen la rag lus par rjes su blta ba dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen la rjes su bsam pa dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen la g.yo sgyu med par spyod pa dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi sems kyi
123a2(phal chen): dbang du 'gro bar bya ba dang ldan pas dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams gdon pa thams cad yongs su spong bar byed pas ma tsam du sems/ dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su bskyed pas pha tsam du sems shing tshong dpon btang
123a3(phal chen): brjod kyi drung du song ngo / /de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs tshong dpon btang brjod kyis bstan pa de la rjes su sems shing / tshong dpon btang brjod kyi gdams ngag la nan tan du bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i
123a4(phal chen): rnam par thar pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rjes su 'brang bar bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes snang ba bsam gyis myi khyab pa rjesu dran par bya ba dang / chos kyi dbyings la 'jug cing 'bab pa bsam gyis mi
123a5(phal chen): khyab pa khong du chud par bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi yongs su 'du bar bya ba'i tshul bsam gyis myi khyab pa la 'jug par bya ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa bsam gyis myi khyab
123a6(phal chen): pa'i rjesu blta bar bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su bsdu ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa la mos par bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis rlabs kyi rgyan rjes su sbyang ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin
123a7(phal chen): dang / rnam par thar pa'i rnam par dgod pa dang / khyu mchog gis mthu phyung ba bsam gyi myi khyab pa la yongs su brtag pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams tha dad pa la sgrib pa myed pa bsam gyis myi khyab pa la
123a8(phal chen): 'jug pa la/ byang chub sems dpa'i las la bsam pa shin tu brtan pa de la nan du bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i las dang / smon lam gyi brgyud bsam gyis myi khyab pa de'i rjes su spyod cing mthar gyis 'dzam
123b1(phal chen): bu'i gling gi mgo 'gebs pas rgyas par 'gengs pa zhes bya ba gang na ba der phyin nas/ dge slong rgya mtsho'i rgyal mtshan tshol tshol ba las/ 'chag sa'i gnas shig gi 'chag pa'i mthar thug ste/
123b2(phal chen): ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par bzhag nas dbugs phyi nang du rgyu ba myed cing myi g.yol byed pa myed cing lus drang por bsrang ste/ dran pa mngon du byas nas ting nge 'dzin gyi rnam par 'phrul pa bsam gyis myi khyab
123b3(phal chen): par rnam par 'phrul zhing g.yas g.yon dang / steng logs su lus mtha' yas la tshad myed cing bsam gyis myi khyab pa spyi gtsug bltar mi mthong ba/ kha dog du ma'i lus dang ldan pa sems kyi skad cig
123b4(phal chen): re re la kha dog rnam pa tha dad pa tshad myed pa yongasu ston pa de/ de de ltar mnyam par bzhag cing zab la zhi ste/ g.yo ba myed cing dmyigs pa myed la dga' bas lus mtho bar gyur pa de'i ba spu'i sgo thams cad
123b5(phal chen): nas/ byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pas rnam par 'phrul pa bsam gyis myi khyab pa rab tu 'gyed par byed cing 'dug pa mthong ngo / /rnam par thar pas rnam par 'phrul pa de'i mthus sems kyi skad
123b6(phal chen): cig re re la sems can thams cad yongs su smyin par bya ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchod pa sbyar ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad yongs su dag par bya ba dang / sems can thams cad kyi
123b7(phal chen): sdug bsngal gyi phung po rnam par bzlog pa dang / ngan song gi lam thams cad yongs su gcad pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi bde ba'i lam gyi sgo 'byed ba dang / sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs
123b8(phal chen): pa'i gdung ba rab tu zhi bar bya ba dang / sems can thams cad kyi myi shes pa'i sgrib pa rnam par gtor ba dang sems can thams cad thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la dgod pa'i phyir rnam par 'phrul pa'i bye brag rnam pa sna tshogs
124a1(phal chen): mtha' yas pas chos kyi dbyings thams cad rgyas par 'gengs shing de'i rkang pa'i mthil gnyis nas/ tshongs dpon gyi tshogs bkur sti dang / rim gro sna tshogs byed pa 'jig rten gyi khams
124a2(phal chen): thams cad du gtogs pa'i tshong dpon dang 'dra ba'i gzugs dang ldan pa lhag pa'i yul la spyod pa/ rgyan sna tshogs kyis lus shin tu klubs pa/ thor tshugs dang gtsug gi rin po che dang gcod pan sna tshogs
124a3(phal chen): thogs pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs myed pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed byis pa bye ba 'phyes pa'i 'khor dang ldan pa byung ba mthong ngo / /bram ze dang khyim bdag mang po bza' btung rnam pa mang po dang / ro'i yan lag
124a4(phal chen): sna tshogs su sbyar ba thams cad dang / rgyan thams cad dang / gos thams cad dang / me tog thams cad dang / phreng ba thams cad dang / spos thams cad dang / byug pa thams cad dang / 'dod pa'i yo byad
124a5(phal chen): thams cad dang / rin po che thams cad dang / gnas thams cad dang / snod rnam pa sna tshogs thams cad dang / yo byad rnam pa sna tshogs thams cad kyis sems can dbul po rnams yongasu bsdud
124a6(phal chen): cing / 'gro ba sdug bsngal ba rnams dbugs dbyung ba dang / sems can gyis sems tshim par bya ba dang / sems can gyis bsam pa rnam par dag par bya ba dang / sems can rnams byang chub tu yongasu
124a7(phal chen): smyin par byed cing phyogs bcu bkang ste/ 'dong ba mthong ngo / /pus mo'i lha nga gnyis nas rgyal rigs mkhas pa'i gzugs dang / bram ze mkhas pa'i gzugs dang 'jig rten na mkhas pa'i gzugs
124a8(phal chen): dang / bzo sna tshogs la mkhas pa'i gzugs dang / mi'i 'gro ba'i rgyud na mkhas pa'i gzugs dang / 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i las kyis tshul dang / rgyus la gsal zhing
124b1(phal chen): mkhas pa'i gzugs dang / 'jig rten gyi slob dpon du bya bar mkhas pa'i gzugs cha byad rnam pa du ma dang ldan pa/ dbyibs dang rgyan rnam pa du ma dang ldan pa/ yid du 'ong ba'i tshig mang po brjod pas/
124b2(phal chen): yid mi bde ba'i sems can rab tu dga' bar byed cing chos kyi nor gyis dbul ba'i sems can rnams la phan gdags pa dang / sdug bsngal ba'i sems can rnams bde bar bya ba dang / log par ltung ba'i
124b3(phal chen): sems can rnams mngon par gdon pa dang / theg pa'i gru la nyam nyes su gyur pa'i sems can rnams dbugs dbyung ba dang / 'jigs pa'i sems can rnams yongs su bskyab pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba'i
124b4(phal chen): sgra kun grags par bya ba dang / sdig pa las bzlog pa'i sgra yongs su bsgrag pa dang / dge ba'i chos yang dag par blang ba la sems can gzung ba dang / don spyod pa la sems can dgod pa dang / dga' ba'i
124b5(phal chen): shugs yongs su bskyed pa dang / snyan par smra ba'i bsdu ba'i dngos po yongs su brjod pa dang / 'jig rten la don 'thun par bsgrub pa ston par byed cing phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste 'dong ba mthong ngo / /lte
124b6(phal chen): ba'i dkyil 'khor nas drang srong mang po 'gro ba thams cad kyi lus kyi dbyibs su 'khod pa/ pags pa dang shun pa'i gos gyon pa ril ba thogs pa/ gzugs dang cha byad dang dbyibs sna tshogs can spyod
124b7(phal chen): lam rab tu zhi ba dag kyang byung nas/ steng gi bar snang las sangs rgyas kyi yon tan brjod pa byed cing / chos kyi sgra yongs su bsgrags pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi sgra brjod pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i dge
124b8(phal chen): 'dun yongs su bstan pa dang / tshangs pa'i spyod pa yongs su brjod pa dang / dbang po dben pa la sems can dgod pa dang / rang bzhin myed pa'i don rab tu brtag pa dang / ye shes kyi don la 'jig rten rab tu dgod
125a1(phal chen): pa dang / 'jig rten gyi gtsug lag gi rnam pa yongs su brjod pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes kyis 'byung ba'i lam gyis tshul rab tu bstan pa dang / mthar gyis bya ba'i las
125a2(phal chen): la sems can rab tu dgod pa byed cing / phyogs bcu bkang ste 'dong ba mthong ngo / /rtsib logs gnyis nas/ klu'i bu mo 'jig rten rgyu ba thams cad kyis grangs dang mnyam pa/ lus kyis dbyibs
125a3(phal chen): bsam gyis myi khyab pa du ma dang ldan pa byung ste/ klu'i rnam par 'phrul pa bsam gyi mi khyab pa yongs su bstan pa dang / spos kyi sprin gyi rgyan bsam gyis myi khyab pa nam mkha'i dbyings la byin
125a4(phal chen): gyis brlabs pa dang / me tog gi sprin gyi brgyan bsam gyis mi khyab pas nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad brgyan pa dang / phreng ba'i sprin bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rgyan gyis nam mkha'i dbyings thams
125a5(phal chen): cad rnam par klub pa dang / rin po che'i gdugs kyi sprin bsam gyi mi khyab pa'i rgyan gyis/ chos kyi dbyings thams cad yongs su khebs par bya ba dang / rin po che'i rgyal mtshan gyi sprin bsam gyis
125a6(phal chen): mi khyab pa'i rgyan dang / rin po che'i lha'i ba dan gyi sprin bsam gyi mi khyab pa'i rgyan dang / rin po che'i phyang 'phrul sna tshogs kyi sprin dang / cher bsam gyi mi khyab pa'i rgyan dang / nor bu rin po che
125a7(phal chen): dam pa'i sprin gyi char 'bab pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rgyan dang / rin po che'i se mo do sna tshogs dang / me tog gi sprin gyi char bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i brgyan dang / rin po che'i khri la bskyil mo
125a8(phal chen): dkrung du 'khod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi sprin gyi char bsam gyi khyab pa 'bebs pa'i rgyan dang / lha rdzas kyi rin po che'i rgyan sna tshogs dang ldan pa'i bu mo mang po chos kyi glu snyan
125b1(phal chen): pa'i sgra dbyangs kyi sprin gyi char 'bebs pa bsam gyis myi khyab pa dang / rin po che'i pad mo ze ba mtho ba mu tig gis dra bas brgyan pa/ rin po che'i rgyal po thams cad kyi 'bru'i sprin gyi char rnam par 'thor
125b2(phal chen): ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rgyan dang / rin po che'i cod pan gyi sprin nor bu rin po che thams cad kyis rab tu brgyan pa/ 'od zer gyi sprin mtha' yas pa'i char 'bebs pa bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i rgyan dang /
125b3(phal chen): lha'i lus kyi sprin gyi me tog dang / phreng ba dang / bdug pa dang / rgyan dang / lha'i ba dan bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rgyan dang / lha'i bu mo mang po'i lus kyi sprin thal mo sbyar te/ gser gyi me tog snyim pas
125b4(phal chen): 'thor pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa la yon tan dang / legs pa thams cad du bstod pa'i sprin gyi 'brug sgra 'byin cing char 'bebs pa/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rgyan nam mkha'i dbyings la byin gyis
125b5(phal chen): rlob cing / spos kyi phung po'i sprin rin po che thams cad kyi kha dog du 'dug pa/ bdug spos kyi na bun dang sprin shin tu rgya che bas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor mngon par khebs par bya ba
125b6(phal chen): dang / 'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas pa thams cad rab tu rgyan pa dang / sems can thams cad rab tu dga' bar bya ba dang / sangs rgyas thams cad mchod pas skad cig skad cig tu chos kyi dbyings thams
125b7(phal chen): cad rgyas par 'gengs pa tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis mthong ngo / /mthong ka'i dpal gyis be'u nas lha ma yin gyi dbang po sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs myed pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed byung ste/ lha ma
125b8(phal chen): yin gyi sgyus rnam par 'phrul pa bsam gyi myi khyab pa rab tu ston cing chu 'dzin chen po yongs su bskyab pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams brgya stong rab tu bskyod pa dang / ri'i rgyal po chen po thams cad 'bab
126a1(phal chen): par bya ba dang / lha'i gnas thams cad yongs su spyod pa dang / bdud kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad zil gyis gnan pa dang / bdud kyi sde thams cad rab tu gdul ba dang / nga rgyal dang rlom pa dang dregs
126a2(phal chen): pa thams cad rab tu gzhom pa dang / gnod par sems pa'i sems bzlog cing dga' bar bya ba dang / the tsom pa'i sems phyir bzlog par bya ba dang / sems can rnams kyi myi dge ba'i chos rab tu zhi bar bya ba
126a3(phal chen): dang / nyon mongs pa'i ri rnam par gtor ba dang / nyon mongs pa'i thab mo shin tu zhi bar bya ba dang / lha ma yin gyi sgyus rnam par 'phrul pa dang / rnam par rtse ba sna tshogs kyis sems can rnams skyo bar bya
126a4(phal chen): ba dang / sdig pa las gyen du bskyod pa dang / 'khor bas 'jigs par bya ba dang / srid pa'i lam gyi rgyud thams cad nas gyen du bskyod de gnas myed pa la rab tu gnas par bya ba dang / byang chub kyi sems la
126a5(phal chen): sems can rnams rab tu dgod pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rnam par dag par bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams pha rol tu phyin pa la rab tu dgod par
126a6(phal chen): bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sa la rab tu bzung ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi tshul snang ba yongs su bskyed pa dang / chos kyi tshul rnam par dgod pa sna tshogs kyi
126a7(phal chen): sems kyi skad cig re re zhing chos kyi dbyings rgyas par 'gengs par byed pa/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis mthong ngo / /rgyab kyi gzhung nas nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas mang po sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med
126a8(phal chen): pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed byung nas/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyis 'dul ba'i sems can bdag tu mngon par zhen pa rnams la bdag myed pa dang / sems can myed pa yongs su brjod pa byed cing /
126b1(phal chen): rtag par mngon par zhen pa rnams la 'du byed thams cad myi rtag par yongs su bstan pa dang / 'dod chags kyi spyod pa can rnams la myi sdug pa dang / zhe sdang gi spyod pa can rnams la byams pa dang / gti
126b2(phal chen): mug gi spyod pa can rnams la rkyen las byung ba'i rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba brjod pa dang / cha mnyam pa'i spyod pa can rnams la ye shes kyi yul dang ldan pa'i chos kyi mngon par bstan pa dang / yul
126b3(phal chen): la mngon par dga' ba rnams la gnas med pa rab tu brjod pa dang / zhi ba la gnas su sems pa rnams la smon lam gyi khyad par gyis spro ba bskyed pa dang / phyogs kyi rgyud dang sgo thams cad du chos
126b4(phal chen): kyi tshul rgya mtsho'i rgyud dang / sgo thams cad sems can thams cad kyi don du brjod par byed cing chos kyis dbyings rgyas par 'gengs pa tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis mthong ngo / /phrag pa'i lhun
126b5(phal chen): gnyis las gnod sbyin dang / srin po'i dbang po dbyibs sna tshogs dang ldan zhing lus mi sdug pa kha dog dang chu zhing sna tshogs can spyod lam gyi rnam pa sna tshogs dang ldan pa/ gzhon pa sna tshogs la
126b6(phal chen): zhon pa/ 'khor sna tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/ sems can gyi khams yongs su bskyang ba la brtson pa/ 'od sna tshogs kyis snang bar bya ba la brtson pa/ dbyangs sna tshogs rab tu sgrog
126b7(phal chen): pa/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed byung nas thabs mngon par bsgrub pa sna tshogs ma 'dres pas phyogs dang phyogs mtshams kun gyi nam mkha' rgyas par 'gengs shing dge ba'i spyod pa
126b8(phal chen): thams cad yongs su bsrung ba dang / 'phags pa'i dkyil 'khor thams cad yongs su bsrung ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad yongs su gzung ba dang / lag na rdo rje'i las kyis yang dag par
127a1(phal chen): song ba dang / yang dag par zhugs pa thams cad yongs su bsrung ba dang / sangs rgyas thams cad la rim gror bya ba dang / sems can log par ltung ba rnams kyi ngan song gi lam gyi rgyud
127a2(phal chen): thams cad rnam par bzlog pa dang / 'jig rten thams cad dang / gnod pa dang 'jigs pa thams cad zhi bar byed pa'i don du brtson pa/ sems can gyi don bya bas 'jig rten yongasu bskyang ba la brtson
127a3(phal chen): pa rnams bsod nams dang / ye shes kyi 'khor lo yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang / chos kyi 'khor lo'i rjes su 'brang bar bya ba dang / phas kyi rgol ba'i 'khor tshar gcod par byed cing / chos kyi dbyings thams
127a4(phal chen): cad rgyas par 'gengs par byed pa/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis mthong ngo / /mdun gyi lto nas myi 'am ci'i dbang po sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed mi 'am ci'i dbang po'i
127a5(phal chen): bu mo'i 'khor brgya stong grangs med pa can dang / dri za'i dbang po sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed/ dri za'i dbang po'i bu mo'i 'khor brgya stong grangs myed pa can dag byung nas/ lha'i
127a6(phal chen): rol mo brgya stong grangs myed pa'i sgra snyan pa dang / glu'i dbyangs kyis chos kyi rang bzhin dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas kyi bstod pa brjod cing / byang chub kyi sems yongs su bsngags pa dang / byang chub sems
127a7(phal chen): dpa'i spyod pa yongs su brjod pa dang / mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang brgya ba'i sgo thams cad la mngon par bstod pa dang / chos kyi 'khor lo'i sgo thams cad du 'jug pa dang / rnam par 'phrul pa'i sgo
127a8(phal chen): thams cad la mngon par spro bar bya ba dang / yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i sgo thams cad yongs su brjod pa dang / sangs rgyas kyis bstan pa'i sgo thams cad yongasu gzung ba dang / sems can gyi
127b1(phal chen): sgo thams cad rab tu dga' bar bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyis zhing gi sgo thams cad yongs su dag par bya ba dang / chos kyi sgo thams cad mngon par bstan par bya ba dang / sgrib pa'i sgo thams cad rnam par bzlog par
127b2(phal chen): bya ba dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba'i sgo thams cad yongs su bskyed pa byed cing / chos kyis dbyings rgyas par 'gengs pa tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis mthong ngo / /kha'i sgo nas 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po rin
127b3(phal chen): po che bdun dang ldan zhing stobs kyi yan lag bzhi'i tshogs kyis 'khor dang ldan pa byung ba nas/ sbyin pa chen po'i 'od zer gyi rgyan rab tu 'gyed cing rin po che'i 'byung gnas thams cad yongs su btang ba dang / nor
127b4(phal chen): bu rin po che'i tshogs thams cad sbyin pa dang / dbul po rnams nor dang ldan par bya ba dang / srog gcod pa las 'jig rten rnam par bzlog pa dang / byams pa'i sems la sems can rab tu dgod pa dang / ma byin par
127b5(phal chen): len pa dang / rab tu dbral ba dang / rgyan gyis shin tu brgyan pa'i bu mo bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong yongs su btang ba dang / 'dod pas log par g.yem pa las rnam par bzlog pa dang / tshangs pa'i spyod pa la rab tu dgod
127b6(phal chen): pa dang / brdzun du smra ba las rnam par bzlog pa dang / bslu ba myed pa la gzhol bar rab tu dgod pa dang / phra ma'i tshig las rnam par bzlog pa dang / gzhan 'dum par brtson pa'i tshig rab tu brjod pa dang / zhe
127b7(phal chen): gcod pa'i tshig gi las 'jig rten rnam par bzlog pa dang / 'jam zhing yid du 'ong ba'i tshig rab tu brjod pa dang / gnod pa'i chos dang ldan pa'i byung rgyal du smra ba las sems can rnam par zlog pa dang / don
127b8(phal chen): zab mo'i tshig rab tu dbye ba gdon mi za ba la yang dag par dgod pa dang / ngag gi nyes pa thams cad las 'jig rten rnam par bzlog pa dang / snying rje dang ldan pa'i tshig rab tu brjod par bya ba dang / 'jig rten gyi snying gi dri
128a1(phal chen): ma yongs su sel cing 'dod pa chung ba dang / mchog shes pa la brtson par sems can rab tu dgod pa dang / chags sems las 'jig rten rnam par bzlog pa dang / gzhan gyi sems kyi rgyud dga'
128a2(phal chen): bar byed pa la rab tu dgod pa dang / lta ba'i dra ba thams cad las 'jig rten rab tu gdon pa dang / yid gnyis kyis ra ba thams cad rnam par gtor ba dang / the tsom gyi spros pa thams cad rab tu gzhom pa dang / nem
128a3(phal chen): nur dang som nyi'i rab rib yongs su gsal ba dang / chos rnam par dbye ba'i 'jig rten du rab tu dbye ba dang / rkyen las byung ba rab tu brjod pa dang / rang bzhin gyi dben pa'i tshul la sems can rab tu dgod pa dang / sgrib
128a4(phal chen): pa thams cad rnam par bzlog pa dang / sgrib pa med pa'i tshul la gzung ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi don gyi tshul sna tshogs brjod pa byed cing / phyogs bcu'i chos kyi dbyings rgyas par 'gengs pa tshong dpon gyi bu nor
128a5(phal chen): bzangs kyis mthong ngo / /myig gnyis nas nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor brgya stong sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed byung ste/ sems can dmyal ba chen po thams cad yongasu snang bar byed cing 'jig rten
128a6(phal chen): gyi mun pa chen po sel ba dang / sems can rnams kyis gti mug gi rab rib sel ba dang / grang ba'i sems can dmyal ba na 'khod pa'i sems can rnams kyi grang ba'i sdug bsngal rab tu zhi bar byed pa dang /
128a7(phal chen): sa'i rang bzhin gyi zhing rnams su 'od kha dog dkar po can rab tu 'gyed pa dang / gser gyi rang bzhin gyi zhing rnamasu 'od bai DUr+ya'i kha dog rab tu 'gyed pa dang / bai DUr+ya'i rang bzhin gyi zhing rnamasu 'od gser gyi kha dog
128a8(phal chen): can rab tu 'gyed pa dang / gser gyi rang bzhin gyi zhing rnams su 'od shel gyi kha dog rab tu 'gyed pa dang / gser gyi rang bzhin gyi zhing rnams su 'od mu tig dmar po'i kha dog can rab tu 'gyed pa dang / a sma garba'i
128b1(phal chen): rang bzhin gyi zhing rnams su 'od gser gyi dra ba can rab tu 'gyed pa dang / gser gyi rang bzhin gyi zhing rnams su 'od a sma garba'i kha dog can rab tu 'gyed pa dang / in dra nI la'i rang bzhin gyi zhing rnams su 'od
128b2(phal chen): rin po che'i rgyal po nyi ma'i snying po'i kha dog can rab tu 'gyed pa dang / rin po che'i rgyal po nyi ma'i snying po'i rang bzhin gyi zhing rnams su 'od rin po che'i rgyal po in dra nI la'i kha dog can rab tu 'gyed pa dang / mu tig
128b3(phal chen): dmar po'i rang bzhin gyi zhing rnams su 'od rin po che'i rgyal po zla ba'i 'od gzer gyi dra ba dang / dkyil 'khor gyi snying po'i kha dog can rab tu 'gyed pa dang / rin po che'i rgyal po zla ba'i 'od zer gyi dra ba dang / dkyil
128b4(phal chen): 'khor gyi snying po'i rang bzhin gyi zhing rnams su 'od mu tig dmar po'i kha dog can rab tu 'gyed pa dang / rin po che gcig gi rang bzhin gyi zhing rnams su 'od rin po che sna tshogs kyi kha dog can rab tu 'gyed
128b5(phal chen): pa dang / rin po che sna tshogs kyi rang bzhin gyi zhing rnams su 'od rin po che gcig gi kha dog can rab tu 'gyed pa dang / de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad du sems can
128b6(phal chen): gyi don tshad med pa la brtson zhing chos kyi dbyings rgyas par 'gengs pa tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis mthong ngo / /smin 'tshams kyi mdzod spu nas zla ba mang po sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs myed pa'i rdul shin tu phra
128b7(phal chen): ba snyed byung nas/ lha'i dbang po thams cad zil gyis gnon cing / 'jig rten thams cad kyi 'dod pa'i dga' ba rnam par bzlog pa dang / sangs rgyas blta bar dga' ba la rjes su bsngags pa byed cing / sems
128b8(phal chen): can tshad myed pa gdul ba la brtson par phyogs bcu'i chos kyi dbyings rgyas par 'gengs par mthong ngo / /'phral ba nas tshangs pa chen po spyod lam rab tu zhi ba sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs myed pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed
129a1(phal chen): byung ba nas/ tshangs pa'i dbyangs su brjod de/ sangs rgyas thams cad la gsol ba gdab pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad rab tu dga' bar byed cing sems can gyi don tshad myed pa la brtson par phyogs
129a2(phal chen): bcu'i chos kyi dbyings rgyas par 'gengs pa tshong dpon nor bzangs kyis mthong ngo / /mgo nas byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed byung nas/ kha dog dang dbyibs sna tshogs kyis
129a3(phal chen): brgyan pa'i lus yongasu ston cing / dpe byad bzang pos rnam par bris pa'i lus rab tu ston pa dang / 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sprin mtha' dang dbus med pa rab tu 'gyed ba dang / ba spu'i bu ga thams cad nas sangs rgyas thams
129a4(phal chen): cad kyi sngon gyi byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa nas bzung ste/ gtong ba dang len pa dang / dngos po yongs su gtong ba'i sprin mang po rab tu dgye ba dang / pha rol tu phyin pa sna tshogs dang ldan pa'i sngon gyi sbyor ba rgya mtsho yongasu bstan
129a5(phal chen): pa dang / sbyin pa'i spyod pa 'jig rten du yongasu brjod pa dang / ser sna'i dri ma rnam par bzlog pa dang / chags pa thams cad spang ba la sems can rab tu dgod pa dang / 'jig rten rin po che sna tshogs thams cad kyi rgyan gyi brgyan pa
129a6(phal chen): par byin gyi brlab pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la sems can rab tu dgod pa dang / mtshan thams cad kyi yon tan yang dag par brjod pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi mtshan 'byung ba'i rgyu ston par byed pa mthong ngo / /yang byang chub sems dpa'
129a7(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs myed pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed byung nas tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongasu brjod cing / ba spu'i bu ga thams cad nas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i sngon gyi sbyor
129a8(phal chen): ba rgya mtsho yongasu bstan pa dang / sems can thams cad lam gyi rgyud dang yul las phyir phyogs par byas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul la mngon du phyogs par bya ba dang / 'jig rten gyi 'dod pa la rnam par smad pa dang /
129b1(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi phyin ci log gis ling thog rnam par bsal ba dang / log pa'i rnam par rtog pa rab tu zhi bar byas nas byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims la yang dag par dgod pa dang / snying rje chen po'i tshul khrims
129b2(phal chen): yongs su brjod cing de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshul khrims rab tu thob par bya ba'i phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi lam nan tan du bya ba'i tshul khrims la sems can rab tu dgod pa dang / srid pa'i lam gyi rgyud rmyi lam lta
129b3(phal chen): bur sems can rnams la rab tu brjod cing / rmi lam gyi tshul dang mnyam par yongs su gzhol bar bya ba'i phyir yul yongs su 'dzin pa dang nyon mongs pa la dbang bsgyur bar sems can rnams rab tu
129b4(phal chen): dgod pa byed pa mthong ngo / /yang byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs myed pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed byung nas/ 'jig rten rnams la mdog gser gyi kha dog lta bu mngon par ston cing / khro ba
129b5(phal chen): med pa dang / 'khrug pa myed pa dang / sha gnyer ba myed pa dang / zhe sdang ba med pa dang / chud gastson pa med pa dang / khong khro ba myed pa'i sems la sems can rab tu dgod pa dang / byol song gi skye gnas kyi
129b6(phal chen): lam gyi rgyud thams cad yongs su gcod pa'i phyir/ ba spu'i sgo thams cad nas bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i sngon gyi sbyor ba'i sprin rab tu 'gyed cing bzod pa'i stobs
129b7(phal chen): la sems can rab tu dgod pa dang / chos la dbang bsgyur ba la sems can rab tu snang bar byed pa mthong ngo / /yang byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs myed pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed byung ste/ byang chub
129b8(phal chen): sems dpa'i brtson 'grus kyi stobs mtha' yas pa shin tu ston cing / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du bsam pa las phyir myi ldog pa'i stobs kyis thos pa rgya mtsho yongs su
130a1(phal chen): btsal bas mi skyo bar bya ba yongs su brjod pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mchod cing rim gro bya ba la sems can rab tu gzud pa dang / sdug bsngal gyi phung po thams cad rnam par bzlog pa'i
130a2(phal chen): brtson 'grus chen po la sems can rab tu dgod pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i sngon gyi sbyor ba mang po'i sprin lus thams cad las rab tu 'gyed cing byang chub sems dpa'i brtson
130a3(phal chen): 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa yongs su bstan pa dang / sems can rnams kyi le lo'i ri rnam par gtor ba dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sems can rab tu dgod pa dang las la dbang
130a4(phal chen): bsgyur ba'i 'jig rten rab tu gzud pa dang / rgyun mi chad par brtson par byed pa mthong ngo / /yang byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed byung nas/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams
130a5(phal chen): kyi rjes su dran pa'i lam la sems can thams cad rab tu dgod cing sgrib pa dang / bar du gcod pa dang / rab rib thams cad rnam par sel ba dang / rlom pa dang bag myed pa thams cad las sems can rnam par
130a6(phal chen): zlog pa dang / bag yod pa'i chos la rab tu dgod pa dang / khengs pa bgyid pa dang / nga rgyal gyi rgyal mtshan rab tu snyol ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi bsam gtan gyi yan lag rgya mtsho brjod pa dang /
130a7(phal chen): 'jig rten rnams la bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su bsngags pa dang / ba spu'i bu ga thams cad nas bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i sngon gyi tshul mang po'i sprin
130a8(phal chen): rab tu 'gyed pa dang / sems la dbang bsgyur ba la sems can dgod pa byed cing skad cig re re la chos kyi dbyings rgyas par 'gengs pa mthong ngo / /yang byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing
130b1(phal chen): grangs med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed byung ste/ ba spu'i bu ga thams cad nas sangs rgyas kyi chos yongs su tshol ba dang ldan pa'i sngon gyi sbyin pa rab tu dgye ba dang / dbyangs kyi yan lag rgya mtsho'i skad
130b2(phal chen): thams cad kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sprin gyi 'brug sgra sgrog pa dang / yang dag par blta ba'i klog rab tu 'gyed pa dang / chos kyi rang bzhin gyi sgra dbyangs rab tu bsgrag pa dang / sems can rnams kyi bdag
130b3(phal chen): tu lta ba'i ri'i lhun rab tu bzhig pa dang / lta ba thams cad kyi zug rngu dbyung ba dang / the tsom dang yid gnyis dang nem nur gyi rab rib bsal ba dang / ye shes kyi dbang yang dag par bsngags pa byed cing /
130b4(phal chen): sems kyi skad cig re re la chos kyi dbyings rgyas par 'gengs pa mthong ngo / /yang byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed byung nas/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi
130b5(phal chen): thabs mkhas pa'i tshul gyi dkyil 'khor rab tu brjod pa byed cing ba spu'i bu ga thams cad nas thabs mkhas pa dang ldan pa'i sngon gyi sbyor ba mang po'i sprin rab tu dgye ba dang / 'jig rten rnams la
130b6(phal chen): thabs mkhas pa'i spyod pa rab tu brjod pa dang / theg pa chen po'i 'byung ba mngon par bstan pa dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor yang dag par bsngags pa dang / 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das
130b7(phal chen): pa tha myi dad pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yongasu bstan pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi thabs mkhas pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la sems can rab tu dgod pa dang / 'jig rten rnams la byang
130b8(phal chen): chub sems dpa'i dbang gi dkyil 'khor rab tu bstan pa byed cing / sems bskyed pa re re la chos kyi dbyings rgyas par 'gengs pa mthong ngo / /yang byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med
131a1(phal chen): pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed byung ste/ ba spu'i bu ga thams cad nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mtshan rgya mtsho'i sprin gyi 'brug sgra sgrog cing / ba spu'i bu ga thams cad nas byang chub sems dpa'
131a2(phal chen): sems can thams cad kyi smon lam gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa dang ldan pa'i sngon gyi sbyor ba mang po'i sprin rab tu bkye ba dang / smon lam gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang dag par bsngags pa dang /
131a3(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa'i dbang thams cad la sems can rab tu dgod pa dang / smon lam chen po'i shing rta'i 'khor lo phyi ma'i mtha' mur thug par 'dril ba/ chos thams cad kyi rjesu 'brang ba nyon mongs pa thams cad
131a4(phal chen): rnam par zlog pa mi shes pa'i rigs rnam par 'thor ba/ 'jig rten du rab tu brjod pa byed cing / smon lam sna tshogs kyi rnam par 'phrul pas/ sems kyi skad cig re re la chos kyi dbyings rgyas par 'gengs
131a5(phal chen): pa mthong ngo / / //sangs rgyas rmad ga cad ces bya ba shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo/ bam po bcu pa'o/ /yang byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs myed pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba byung ste/ byang chub
131a6(phal chen): sems dpa'i stobs rab tu snang bar bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i stobs yongs su bsgrub pa'i sgra rab tu dbyung ba dang / ba spu'i bu ga thams cad stobs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgrub cing 'byin pa'i sngon
131a7(phal chen): gyi sbyor ba mang po'i sprin rab tu bkye ba dang / bdud dang phas kyi rgol ba thams cad kyis mi thub pa'i stobs yongs su bstan pa dang / khor yug dang rdo rje'i ri thams cad lus kyi steng du rdzis kyang mi
131a8(phal chen): nyams pa'i stobs rab tu brjod pa dang / bskal pas tshig pa thams cad kyi me rgya mtsho'i nang na gnas kyang lus la gnod pa med pa'i stobs yongs su bstan pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams 'byam
131b1(phal chen): klas pa thams cad lag pa'i mthil gyis nam mkha'i dbyings su ston pa'i stobs yongs su ston pa byed cing / sems gyi skad cig re re la chos kyi dbyings su 'gengs pas rgyun mi gcod pa mthong ngo / /yang
131b2(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed byung nas/ sems can rnams la ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor ston cing / ba spu'i bu ga thams cad nas ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin
131b3(phal chen): pa yongs su dag pa dang ldan pa'i sngon gyi sbyor ba mang po'i sprin rab tu 'gyed pa dang / 'jig rten rnams la sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yon tan dang / ye shes mngon par shes pa dang ldan pa'i ye shes kyis
131b4(phal chen): rab tu brjod pa dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mtshan mngon par shes pa dang ldan pa'i ye shes kyis mngon par bstan pa dang / smon lam thams cad mngon par bsgrub pa'i ye shes mngon par shes pa dang
131b5(phal chen): ldan pa'i ye shes kyis yongs su brjod pa dang / sems can thams cad yongs su bsdu ba'i smon lam mngon par bsgrub pa'i ye shes mngon par shes pa dang ldan pa'i ye shes kyis shin tu yangs par bya ba dang /
131b6(phal chen): sems can thams cad bdag myed pa'i rang bzhin la gzung ba mngon par shes pa dang ldan pa'i ye shes kyis rnam par bstan pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi sems rgya mtsho rnam par blta ba mngon par
131b7(phal chen): shes pa dang ldan pa'i ye shes kyis rab tu brjod pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi dbang po rnam par dbye ba'i ye shes mngon par shes pa dang ldan pa'i ye shes kyis rab tu dbye ba dang / sems can thams cad
131b8(phal chen): kyi bsam pa dang mos pa rnam par blta ba'i ye shes mngon par shes pa dang ldan pa'i ye shes kyis yang dag par brjod pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi las rgya mtsho la 'jug pa'i ye shes mngon par
132a1(phal chen): shes pa dang ldan pa'i ye shes kyis rnam par grol ba dang / sems can thams cad kyi smon lam rgya mtsho la 'jug pa'i ye shes mngon par shes pa dang ldan pa'i ye shes kyis yongs su bstan pa
132a2(phal chen): byed cing / sems kyi skad cig re re la chos kyi dbyings rgyas par 'gengs pa tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis mthong ngo / /spyi bo'i gtsug tor gyi gseb nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku sangs rgyas kyi zhing
132a3(phal chen): grangs med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed mtshan dam pa dang / dpe byad bzang po rnam par dag pas brgyan pa/ 'dzam bu chu glung gi gser gyi ri bo shin tu 'bar ba ltar snang ba 'od kyi dkyil 'khor phyogs bcur
132a4(phal chen): spro zhing tshad med par 'bar ba dang / chos kyi dbyings tshul gyis rgyas par 'gengs pa'i dbyangs mnga' ba/ sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa mtha' dang dbus med pa yongs su ston pa 'gro ba thams
132a5(phal chen): cad la tha mi dad par chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par 'bebs pa ste/ 'di ltar snying po byang chub mchog tu phyin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams la chos kyi dbyings gzhi'i bye brag mngon sum du
132a6(phal chen): shes pa'i sprin ces bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' dbang bskur ba thob pa rnams la gzhi kun tu rten pa'i sprin ces bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon
132a7(phal chen): par dbab pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' chos chen po'i rgyal tshab tu dbang bskur ba rnams la sgo kun nas 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par 'bab pa dang / byang chub
132a8(phal chen): sems dpa' gzhon nur gyur pa rnams la kun nas brgyan pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' phyir mi ldog pa rnams la snying rje chen po'i
132b1(phal chen): tshogs shin tu brtan pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' lhag pa'i bsam pa dag pa rnams la chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin gyi bye brag
132b2(phal chen): shes bya'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi sbyor ba dang ldan pa rnams la 'gro ba yongs su sdud pas kun nas brgyan pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi
132b3(phal chen): char mngon par dbab pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' cher skyes pa rnams la dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i dkyil 'khor mngon sum du dmigs pa'i sprin ces bya ba'i chos kyi
132b4(phal chen): sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnal 'byor la spyod pa rnams la chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin dang gzhi rab tu sgrog pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par
132b5(phal chen): dbab pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' las dang po pa rnams la snying rje chen po'i tshul dang thabs kyi snying po'i sprin kun tu 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa dang / byang chub
132b6(phal chen): sems dpa' sems dang po bskyed pa rnams la dga' bar bgyi ba'i mdzod shin tu bstsags pa'i snying po zhes bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'
132b7(phal chen): yangs pa la mos pa rnams la rnam par thar pa mi zad pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i smon lam gyis dga' bar byed pa'i mdzod ces bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa dang /
132b8(phal chen): gzugs la spyod pa'i sems can rnams la gzhi kun tu mi zad pa'i mdzod ces bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa dang / tshangs pa'i ris kyi lha rnams la tshul rgya mtsho tshad myed
133a1(phal chen): pa'i 'brug sgra'i dbyangs shes bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa dang / dbang bsgyur ba'i lha rnams la stobs 'byung ba'i chos kyi yo byad mi zad pa'i mdzod ces bya ba'i
133a2(phal chen): chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa dang / bdud kyi ris kyi lha rnams la thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi tshogs rgyal mtshan sna tshogs can yang dag pa bsgrub pa'i dbyangs shes
133a3(phal chen): bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa dang / 'phrul dga'i lha rnams la ye shes rin po che sna tshogs la brtson pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi dbyings kyi sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa dang /
133a4(phal chen): dga' ldan gyi lha rnams la byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam rin po che sna tshogs kyi rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa dang / mtshe ma'i lha rnams la de bzhin
133a5(phal chen): gshegs pa thams cad rjes su dran pa'i mdzod ces bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa dang / lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyi gnas su de bzhin gshegs pa mthong bas dga' ba'i shugs
133a6(phal chen): 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa dang / gnod sbyin gyi dbang po'i gnas su chos kyi dbyings kyi nam mkha' la de bzhin gshegs pa'i gnas rnam par 'phrul pas rgyas par 'gengs
133a7(phal chen): pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa dang / dri za'i dbang po'i gnas su de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos yang dag par bgro ba zhes bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa dang /
133a8(phal chen): lha ma yin gyi gnas su ye shes kyi tshul rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor ces bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa dang / nam mkha' lding gi dbang po'i gnas su de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'byung ba'i
133b1(phal chen): thabs kyi sprin ces bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa dang / mi'am ci'i dbang po'i gnas su chos kyi sprin yang dag par 'gro ba thams cad kyi dbyangs shes bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par
133b2(phal chen): dbab pa dang / klu'i dbang po'i gnas su byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par 'phrul pa sgrog cing srid pa'i lam gyi rgyud las skyo ba bskyed pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa dang / lto 'phye chen po'i gnas
133b3(phal chen): su dga' ba rgya mtsho rnam par 'phel bar byed pa'i shugs shes bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa dang / myi'i gnas su 'gro ba thams cad las khyad par du 'phags pa'i ye shes rnam par 'byed
133b4(phal chen): pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa dang / sems can dmyal ba'i 'jig rten du 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal thams cad rab tu zhi ba'i dbyangs dang / 'phags pa'i lam gyi tshig gi rgyud
133b5(phal chen): kyis brgyan pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa dang / byol song gi skye gnas su las kyi lam kha na ma tho ba myed pa la nan tan du bya ba'i dbyangs dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rjes su dran pa'i
133b6(phal chen): sprin gyi dkyil 'khor gyi lhun ces bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgrags pa/ sems can thams cad
133b7(phal chen): kyi gtong ba'i sems 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa dang / sems can log par ltung ba rnams la sdug bsngal thams cad zhi ba rab tu 'thob pas dbugs 'byung ba'i
133b8(phal chen): dbyangs kyi nga ro zhes bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa mdzad cing chos kyi dbyings rgyas par 'gengs pa tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis mthong ngo / /ba spu'i bu ga thams cad las ba spu'i
134a1(phal chen): bu ga'i sgo re re nas kyang 'od zer gyi dra ba dang / dkyil 'khor gyi kha dog dang gzugs kyi klong dang rgyan grangs med pa can dgos pa sna tshogs grangs med pa la sta gon du gnas pa/ sangs rgyas kyi
134a2(phal chen): zhing grangs med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed byung nas/ phyogs bcu'i chos kyi dbyings rgyas par 'gengs pa mthong ste/ 'di ltar ba spu'i sgo'i 'od zer gyi dra ba dang / dkyil 'khor la la las ni sprin gyi
134a3(phal chen): bkye ba'i spyod pa skyon med pas/ bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtong ba rnam par 'phrul pa mthong ngo / /ba spu'i sgo'i dra ba dang / dkyil 'khor la la las ni dus gsum gyi byang chub sems dpa' thams cad
134a4(phal chen): kyi tshul khrims dang brtul zhugs dang / yi dam dang tshul khrims kyi dkyil 'khor du rnam par 'phrul pa mthong ngo / /ba spu'i sgo'i 'od zer gyi dra ba dang / dkyil 'khor la la las ni byang chub sems dpa' thams cad
134a5(phal chen): bzod pa'i spyod pa'i rnam pa dus gsum du byung ba'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams rkang lag dang / yan lag gi dam pa bcad kyang nyams su bzod pa byed pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa dang / khu tshur dang dbyig pas bsnun
134a6(phal chen): te/ mtshon gyis lus la btab kyang nyams su bzod par byed pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa dang / lus thams cad bshags pa dang / snying dang myig phyung yang nyams su bzod pa byed pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa mthong ngo / /
134a7(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa'i dus gsum du byung ba rnam par brtags pa'i lus dang ldan pa gzhan dag gi thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su btsal ba'i ched du lus dang / sems la gnod pa thams cad dang /
134a8(phal chen): yan lag dang nying lag bcad pa thams cad kyang snying rje chen pos dbang du byas pa'i phyir nyams su bzod par byas pa dang / bag la nyal zhi bar byas pa dang btang snyoms su bzhag pa'i byang chub sems
134b1(phal chen): dpa'i bzod pa'i spyod pa rnam par 'phrul pa'i gzugs brnyan gyi gzugs de lta bu dag mthong ngo / /ba spu'i bu ga'i sgo'i 'od zer gyi dra ba dang / dkyil 'khor la la las ni byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi
134b2(phal chen): brtson 'grus gyi spyod pa rnam pa tha dad pa rnam par phye ba'i gzugs dang / byang chub sems dpa' 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar byung ba'i brtson 'grus kyi rnam par 'phrul pa 'jig rten yongasu bskyod pa dang
134b3(phal chen): rgya mtsho yongs su bskyod pa dang / sems can yongasu skyo bar bya ba dang / mu stegs can thams cad yongs su tshar gcad pa dang / bdud thams cad spa bkong ba dang / chos kyi phyogs snang bar bya ba'i byang chub sems dpa'i
134b4(phal chen): mthu chen por rnam par 'phrul pa mthong ngo / /ba spu'i sgo'i 'od zer gyi dra ba dang / dkyil 'khor la la las ni byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi spyod pa rnam par rgyu ba'i rnam grangs ji snyed pa dang lus nye bar
134b5(phal chen): len pa ji snyed pa dang / rigasu skye ba yongs su gzung ba ci snyed pa dang / gzugs kyi lus yongs su grub pa ji snyed pa dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi man ngag la nan tan du bya ba'i gnas ji snyed pa dang /
134b6(phal chen): de bzhin gshegs pa'i bsam gtan gyi yan lag yongs su bsgrub pa dang / 'thun pa'i gtsug lag khang dang gnas dang / gzhal med khang dang yul dang ri'i sul ji snyed pa dang / bsam gtan gyi yan lag
134b7(phal chen): de dag sus yongs su bsgrub pa'i drang srong gi lus ji snyed pa dang / rgyal po'i thabs ji snyed pa dang 'byung ba la mngon par mos pa ji snyed pa dang / brtul zhugs dang yi dam dang / tshul dang spyod lam ji snyed pa de dag thams cad kyang tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyi
134b8(phal chen): mthong ngo / /ba spu'i sgo'i 'od zer gyi dra ba dang / dkyil 'khor la la las ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa la rnam par spyod cing / chos thams cad yongasu tshol ba dang ldan pa'i lus yongasu bzung ba mthong ngo / /
135a1(phal chen): lus gang gi chos kyi tshig gi don du yang ba dog pa thams cad yongs su btang ste/ sems can thams cad las yongs su btsal ba dang rim gro dang / bkur sti thams cad kyis dge ba'i bshes
135a2(phal chen): gnyen thams cad las yongasu btsal ba dang / dad pa dang sri zhus lus rab tu btud de/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams las yongs su btsal ba dang / chos kyi tshig gcig la ji lta ba de bzhin du shes rab kyi
135a3(phal chen): pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i chos kyi tshig thams cad la'ang de bzhin te/ 'gro ba thams cad du gzugs brnyan byung ba'i lus thams cad kyi yongasu btsal ba de dag thams cad kyang tshong dpon gyi bu nor
135a4(phal chen): bzangs kyi ba spu'i sgo gcig gi 'od zer gyi dra ba dang dkyil 'khor las mthong ngo / /ba spu'i sgo'i 'od zer gyi dra ba dang / dkyil 'khor la la las ni byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi sems can
135a5(phal chen): yongs su smin par bya ba'i thabs 'gro ba'i rgyud rgya mtsho thams cad du 'byam klas pa/ sems can thams cad yongasu bsdu ba'i sbyor bar mthong ngo / /sems can re re la yang lus dang spyod pa'i tshul
135a6(phal chen): gyi sgo sems can gyi lus nye bar blangs pa thabs mkhas pa'i spyod pa la brtson pa/ sems can thams cad kyi lus dang 'dra bas yongasu sdud pa yang ba spu'i sgo'i 'od zer gyi dkyil 'khor gcig
135a7(phal chen): las mthong ngo / /ba spu'i sgo'i 'od zer gyi dra ba'i dkyil 'khor la la las ni sngon bcom ldan 'das kyi bskal pa thams cad kyi smon lam mngon par bsgrub pa'i spyod pa dang / sems can thams cad
135a8(phal chen): yongasu smin par bya ba'i smon lam mngon par sgrub pa'i spyod pa dang / zhing thams cad yongasu dag par bya ba'i smon lam mngon par bsgrub pa mdzad pa ji snyed pa dang / smon lam thams cad
135b1(phal chen): mngon par bsgrub pa'i dkyil 'khor ji snyed cig de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi zhabs kyi drung du bor ba'i skyon thams cad las so so'i re re'i gnyen por mngon par bsgrub par mdzad pa/ de dag thams cad
135b2(phal chen): kyang tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyi ba spu'i sgo'i 'od zer dra ba'i dkyil 'khor gcig las mthong ngo / /ba spu'i sgo'i 'od zer gyi dra ba'i dkyil 'khor la la las ni stobs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa thams
135b3(phal chen): cad dang ldan pa'i sngon gyi sbyor ba rgya mtsho mthong ngo / /ba spu'i sgo'i 'od zer gyi dra ba'i dkyil 'khor la la las ni ye shes kyi spyod pa rnam par rgyu ba thams cad dang ldan pa myi shes pa'i gnyid kyi log pa'i
135b4(phal chen): sems can sad par byed pa'i rang bzhin dang ldan pa'i sngon gyi sbyor ba rgya mtsho mthong bar gyur to/ /de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs dge slong rgya mtsho'i rgyal mtshan de ltar mnyam par bzhag pa la sems shing
135b5(phal chen): rtogs pa dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi rnam par thar pa'i dkyil 'khor de rjes su dran par bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi khyu mchog gi mthu phyung ba de la rjes su rnam par bsam pa dang /
135b6(phal chen): sems can gyi don gyi tshul rgya mtsho de la 'jug par bya ba dang / mngon par 'du bya ba'i sgo rgyud kun la mngon du gnas pa'i rgyan de'i rjes su 'brang zhing khong du chud par bya ba dang / chos kyi dbyings kyi rgyan
135b7(phal chen): rnam par dag pa'i ye shes kyi sgo de la 'jug par bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis rlabs yang dag par gnon pa'i ye shes de la rab tu brtags pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i dbang po'i stobs
135b8(phal chen): de yongs su bskyed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam gyi stobs de bstan par bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i stobs de shin tu rgyas par bya ba byed cing / dge slong rgya mtsho'i rgyal mtshan
136a1(phal chen): gyi mdun du nyin zhag gcig kyang lon no/ /nyin zhag gnyis dang bdun yang lon no/ /zla ba phyed dang zla ba gcig dang / zla ba gnyis dang zla ba drug gi bar dang / nyin zhag kyang drug du dge slong rgya mtsho'i rgyal mtshan
136a2(phal chen): gyi mdun du lon te/ de ltar zla ba drug dang / nyin zhag drug 'das nas dge slong rgya mtsho'i rgyal mtshan ting nge 'dzin de las langs so/ /de nas nor bzangs kyi smras pa/ 'phags pa ting nge 'dzin 'di de ltar
136a3(phal chen): zab la/ de ltar rgya che zhing tshad ma mchis pa'i yul dang ldan pa dang / de ltar bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rgyan dang ldan pa de ltar snang ba mtshungs pa ma mchis pa rgyan dang ldan pa dang / de ltar mi 'phrogs pa'i
136a4(phal chen): spyod pa'i yul dang ldan pa dang / de ltar ma 'dres pa'i yul dang ldan pa dang / de ltar phyogs kun tu rnam par snang ba dang / ting nge 'dzin 'di de ltar sems can gyi don tshad ma mchis pa rab tu bsgrub
136a5(phal chen): par gyur pa ni ngo mtshar te/ de ni sems can thams cad kyi sdug bsngal gyi phung po tshad ma mchis pa rnam par zhi bar bgyi ba la sta gon du gnas pa ste/ 'di ltar dbul ba'i sdug bsngal zhi bar
136a6(phal chen): bgyi ba la sta gon du gnas so/ /sems can dmyal ba'i lam gyi rgyud rgyun bcad pa dang / byol song gi skye gnas kyi lam gyi rgyud las yongs su skyob pa dang / mi khom pa'i lam gyi rgyud kyi sgo thams
