136a7(phal chen): cad gcad pa dang / mtho ris kyi lam gyi rgyud du phyin par bgyi ba dang / lha dang mi'i dga' ba dang / bde ba 'byung bar bgyi ba dang / bsam gtan gyi yul gyis dga' ba nyams su myong bar bgyi ba dang /
136a8(phal chen): 'dus byas la spyod pa'i bde ba yongs su 'phel bar bgyi ba dang / khams gsum pa las 'byung ba'i sgo yongs su bstan pa la sta gon du gnas so/ /byang chub kyi sems yang dag par skye ba'i rgyu yongs su
136b1(phal chen): brjod pa la sta gon du gnas so/ /bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs yang dag par skye ba'i rgyu rnam par 'phel bar bgyi ba dang / snying rje chen po'i shugs rgya chen po rnam par 'phel bar bgyi ba dang /
136b2(phal chen): smon lam rgya chen po'i stobs yongs su bskyed par bgyi ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i lam snang ba rab tu thob par bgyi ba dang / pha rol tu phyin pa chen po'i theg pa rnam par dgod pa dang /
136b3(phal chen): theg pa chen po'i khyad par la 'jug pa mngon par bsgrub pa dang / kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa shes shing snang bar bgyi ba dang / byang chub sems dpas shes shing snang ba thob par bgyi ba dang /
136b4(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi smon lam dang spyod pa dang / 'byung ba dang / rgyan rnam par dag pa yongs su bsgrub pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i sa gnan pa la thogs pa med par mchis
136b5(phal chen): par bgyi ba la sta gon du gnas pa'o/ /'phags pa ting nge 'dzin de'i mying ci zhes bgyi smras pa/ rigs kyi bu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa kun nas lta ba'i btang snyoms yongs su thob pa zhes
136b6(phal chen): bya ba yod de/ ting nge 'dzin 'di ni de'i snang ba ste/ sgo kun nas rnam par dag pa'i rgyan ces bya'o/ /rigs kyi bu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa kun nas lta ba'i btang snyoms rab tu thob pa'i snang ba
136b7(phal chen): l as skyes pa'i ting nge 'dzin sgo kun nas rnam par dag pa'i rgyan ces bya ba 'di shin tu bsgoms na sgo kun nas rnam par dag pa'i rgyan la stsogs pa ting nge 'dzin brgya stong grangs myed pa phrag bcu tshang ba
136b8(phal chen): yongs su 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /smras pa 'phags pa ting nge 'dzin 'di'i yul der bsam so ma lags/ smras pa rigs kyi bu ting nge 'dzin 'di la snyoms par zhugs pa la ni 'jig rten gyi khams
137a1(phal chen): rnam par dag pa dmigs pa la thogs pa med do/ /'jig rten gyi khams su 'jug par bya ba la thogs pa med do/ /'jig rten gyi khams rnam par gnan pa la thogs pa med do/ /'jig
137a2(phal chen): rten gyi khams yongs su brgyan pa la thogs pa med do/ /'jig rten gyi khams yongs su sbyangs pa la thogs pa med do/ /'jig rten gyi khams yongs su dag par bya ba la thogs pa med do/ /
137a3(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyi blta zhing rnam par dmyigs par bya ba la thogs pa med do/ /sangs rgyas kyi bdag nyid che ba brtags pa la thogs pa med do/ /sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa yongs su shes
137a4(phal chen): par bya ba la thogs pa med do/ /sangs rgyas kyi stobs la 'jug cing khong du chud par bya ba la thogs pa med do/ /sangs rgyas kyi yon tan rgya mtshor 'jug pa la thogs pa med do/ /
137a5(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi sprin gyi char yongs su bzung ba la thogs pa med do/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi 'khor lo 'khor ma 'dres pa shes shing khong du chud par bya ba la thogs pa med do/ /sangs
137a6(phal chen): rgyas kyi zhing 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho la 'jug cing khong du chud par bya ba la thogs pa med do/ /phyogs bcur 'jug cing rjes su 'brang bar bya ba la thogs pa med do/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos
137a7(phal chen): bstan pa rjes su brtag par bya ba la thogs pa med do/ /sangs rgyas kyi phyogs rjes su brtag par bya ba la thogs pa med do/ /snying rje chen po'i phyogs rnam par mi spang ba la thogs pa med do/ /
137a8(phal chen): byams pas phyogs rgyas par dgangs ba la thogs pa med do/ /sangs rgyas blta ba'i phyogs la 'jug pas myi ngoms par bya ba la thogs pa med do/ /sems can rgya mtsho thams cad du
137b1(phal chen): 'jug cing khong du chud par bya ba la thogs pa med do/ /sems can gyi dbang po rgya mtsho thams cad shes shing khong du chud pa la thogs pa med do/ /sems can gyi dbang po tha dad pa thams cad shes par
137b2(phal chen): bya ba la thogs pa med do/ /rigs kyi bu kho bos ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rnam par spyod pa 'di shes su zad na/ byang chub sems dpa' shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rnam par spyod pa
137b3(phal chen): rgya mtsho la zhugs pa chos kyi dbyings kyi yul la blo gros rnam par dag pa/ chos thams cad la rigs pa rjes su 'brang ba'i ye shes can/ blo shin tu yangs pas tshad med pa'i yul rgyas par 'gengs
137b4(phal chen): pa gzungs chen po'i snang ba la dbang bsgyur ba/ ting nge 'dzin gyi dkyil 'khor snang ba thams cad shin tu dag pa mngon par shes pa rnam par 'phrul pa dang / khyu mchog gi mthu 'byin pa la shin tu
137b5(phal chen): byung ba so so yang dag par rigs pa mi zad pa'i rgya mtsho la zhugs pa/ ngag bsnyen pas sa'i snying po dang ldan par brjod pa 'gro ba thams cad kyi rten du gyur pa rnams kyi spyod pa shes pa 'am/
137b6(phal chen): yon tan brjod pa 'am/ spyod yul bstan pa 'am/ yul rab tu brjod pa 'am/ smon lam chen po'i stobs yang dag par bsngags pa 'am/ 'byung ba'i sgo yongs su snang bar bya ba 'am/ yang dag
137b7(phal chen): par bsgrub pa mngon par brjod pa dang / lam yongs su bstan pa 'am/ ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyun gyi rjes su 'brang bar bya ba 'am/ sems kyi yul shes par bya ba 'am/ ye shes mnyam pa nyid khong du
137b8(phal chen): chud par bya bar nus re skan/ /song rigs kyi bu lho phyogs kyi rgyud 'di nyid na phyogs kyi gnas rgya mtsho rnam par brlob pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na bza' shing gi ra bas kun nas rnam par brgyan pa
138a1(phal chen): zhes bya ba zhig grong khyer 'od chen po zhes bya ba'i shar phyogs logs na yod de/ de na shed las skyes pa'i rgyal po 'od bzangs kyi chung ma dge bsnyen ma yid bzhin zhes bya ba yod kyi/ de'i gan du song
138a2(phal chen): la ji ltar byang chub sems dpa'as byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bya ba dang / ji ltar nan tu bya ba dris shig /de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs dga' rangs te/ mgu zhing nyams bde la tshim
138a3(phal chen): zhing yid bde ba skyes nas/ dge slong rgya mtsho'i rgyal mtshan las snying po yongs su blangs te/ chos kyi nye bar 'tsho ba byas pa/ ting nge 'dzin gyi yul la zhugs pa/ snang ba thob pa ye shes kyi snang
138a4(phal chen): bar gyur pa/ ting nge 'dzin gyi snang ba rab tu thob pa/ mos pa rnam par dag pa khong du chud pa/ sems can chos kyi tshul gyis snang ba'i rjes su song ba/ rnam par dag pa'i sgos snang ba dang ldan par gyur pa/
138a5(phal chen): phyogs bcu ye shes kyi snang bas rab tu 'dul ba des/ dge slong rgya mtsho'i rgyal mtshan gyi rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas/ dge slong
138a6(phal chen): rgya mtsho'i rgyal mtshan la btud de phyag 'tshal nas/ yang dang yang lta zhing / yang dang yang mngon par blta ba dang / phyag bya ba dang / kun tu 'dud pa dang / gus par bya ba dang / rim gro bya ba dang / yid la bya
138a7(phal chen): ba dang / bsam pa dang / bsgom pa dang / yongs su bsgom pa dang / legs par brjod pa dang / ngo mtshar du bya ba dang / yon tan mngon du bya ba dang / rjes su bsngags pa dang / rjes su 'brang bar bya ba dang /
138a8(phal chen): rjes su dran par bya ba dang / brten par bya ba dang / mi btang ba dang / yid la bsam pa dang / rjes su 'brang bar bya ba dang / smon lam gyi rjes su 'jug par bya ba dang / mthong bar dga' ba dang /
138b1(phal chen): dbyangs kyi mtshan ma gzung ba dang / gzungs kyi rjes su bsam pa dang / ming yongs su gzung ba'i rjes su song ba'i sems dang ldan par bya ba dang / kha dog dang / dbyibs rjes su dran par bya ba dang / ye shes kyi yul
138b2(phal chen): rjes su bsam pa dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi yul la rjes su 'jug par bya ba dang / smon lam gyi yul la rjes su 'brang bar bya ba dang / spyod yul gyi yul rnam par sbyang bar bya ba dang / ye shes kyi snang ba
138b3(phal chen): yongs su gzung ba byed cing / dge slong rgya mtsho'i rgyal mtshan gyi drung nas song ngo // //sangs rgyas rmad ga cad ces bya ba shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo/ bam po bcu gcig pa/
138b4(phal chen): de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi yon tan gyis ni mgu/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis ni yang dag par bsngags te btang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen mthong ba'i byin gyis ni byin du
138b5(phal chen): brlabs/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi gdams ngag la ni nan tan du byed/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen yid du 'ong ba ni rjes su sems/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen la ni sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi 'byung gnas tsam du
138b6(phal chen): lta/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ston pa yin par yang dag par lta/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi chos la rjes su lta/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni sangs
138b7(phal chen): rgyas nam mkha' lta bu la mig tsam du zhib mthar gyis gnas rgya mtsho rnams par rlob pa'i bza' shing gi ra ba kun nas rnam par brgyan pa/ gang na ba der phyin nas de mthong nas/ bza' shing gi ra bas kun nas
138b8(phal chen): bskor ba/ rin po che'i shing gi phreng ba spel ba legs pas yongs su brgyan pa/ rin po che thams cad kyi shing gi phreng ba'i me tog srab bu yid du 'ong ba'i sprin rab tu 'brul bas gzhi rgyas pa/ rin po che thams cad kyi
139a1(phal chen): shing gis yang dag par brgyan pa/ shing thams cad kyi me tog shin tu rgyas pa sna tshogs kyi yongs su gang ba/ spos sna tshogs kyi shing gis phreng ba las phyogs kun tu spos kyi ngad zhim pa rin po che'i
139a2(phal chen): phreng ba'i shing sna tshogs kyi phreng ba 'phyang ba/ rab tu 'byung zhing char ltar mngon par bab pa/ rin po che thams cad kyi shing dang / nor bu rin po che sna tshogs kyis mdzes shing spa la/ rgya cher brgyan pa'i gzhi
139a3(phal chen): can yid bzhin gyis gos kyi shing thams cad las kha dog sna tshogs kyi gos 'byung bas gam yo khebs shing mdzes par brgyan pa/ sil snyan gyi shing thams cad las lha rdzas las kyang 'phags pa'i sil
139a4(phal chen): snyan rlung gis bskyod cing sgra 'byin pa'i dbyangs snyan 'byung ba/ sa'i gzhi mthon dman med par gnas pa rgyan gyi shing sna tshogs kyi gseb nas/ rgyan sna tshogs rnam pa tha dad pa rgyun tu 'byung zhing 'phyang bas/
139a5(phal chen): rab tu brgyan pa'i rgyan dang ldan pa mthong ste/ bza' shing gi ra ba chen po kun nas rnam par brgyan pa de'i nang na khang pa bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu kun kyang nor bu rin po che dam pa sna tshogs kyi ba gam gyis sna
139a6(phal chen): tshogs su brgyan pa dang / khang pa brtsegs pa brgya stong phrag bcu 'dzam bu chu klung gi gser las brtsegs pa'i bde dang ldan pa dang / gzhal med khang brgya stong phrag bcu sku gdung rin po che rnam pa
139a7(phal chen): sna tshogs las bres pa/ rdzing bu brgya stong phrag bcu'i rin po che thams cad las gzhi blangs te/ rin po che sna tshogs kyi pha gus mu khyud byas pa/ rin po che thams cad kyi them skas btags pa/
139a8(phal chen): rin po che sna tshogs kyi stegs bus bskor ba/ lha rdzas kyi tsan dan gyi dri dang ldan pa'i chus gang ba gser gyi bye mas kun tu bkram pa/ gzhi nor bu rin po che chu 'dang kun tu bkram pa/ phyogs bzhi
139b1(phal chen): nas them skas rnam par bres pa/ yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i chus gang ba dang / ngur dang / rma bya dang / khu yug dang / khrung khrung dang / ka la ping ka dang / kun la'i sgra skad dang / snyan pa'i dbyangs
139b2(phal chen): dang ldan pa/ rin po che ta la'i 'phreng bas kun nas brgyan pa/ gser gyi dril bu'i dra bas kun nas brgyan pa yog pa/ rlung gis bskyod pa'i sgras yid du 'ong ba 'byung ba/ steng nas rin po che'i bla re
139b3(phal chen): chen po bres pa/ rin po che sna tshogs kyi shing gi rabs brgyan pa/ gdugs dang rgyal mtshan legs par bsgreng ba/ lu ma brgya stong phrag bcu dus dang 'thun pa'i tsan dan gyi 'dam gyis mtha' 'khor ba rin
139b4(phal chen): po che sna tshogs kyi kha dogs du 'dug pa'i pad mos yongs su khyab pa/ rin po che'i pad mo'i 'od chen pos snang bar gyur pa'i chu dri ma med pa dang ldan pa yod pa ste/ bza' shing gi ra ba de'i dbus na gzhal
139b5(phal chen): med khang chen po rgyal mtshan sna tshogs zhes bya ba dang sa'i gzhi rin po che rgya mtsho'i snying po las blangs pa/ nor bu rin po che'i ka ba bkye ba 'dzam bu chu klung gi gser gyi lhun mngon par 'phags pa nor bu
139b6(phal chen): rin po che 'og bag rnam par snang ba'i spang leb bkye bas brgyan pa/ gzhi nor bu rin po che 'bar ba grangs med pa'i dra bas bres pa/ rin po che'i rgyal po'i mi pham pa'i spos kyi dris gam yo kun nas bdug pa/
139b7(phal chen): rin po che'i rgyal po sgra snyan pa 'byin pa 'di'i ngad kun tu ldang ba/ rin po che'i rgyal po dri rnam par gsal bar byed pas dbang po rno ba'i bag chags rnam par bsgrub pa dang ldan zhing gzhal med khang chen po rgyal mtshan sna
139b8(phal chen): tshogs der stan grangs med pa gding bar gyur pa 'di la pad mo'i snying po can dang / nor bu rin po che phyogs snang bar byed pa'i pad mo'i snying po can dang / nor bu rin po che rnam par snang ba'i pad mo'i snying po can dang / nor bu rin po
140a1(phal chen): che 'gro ba yid du 'ong ba'i pad mo'i snying po can dang / nor bu rin po che mdzod sna tshogs kyis pad mo'i snying po can dang / rin po che seng ge'i shing thams cad kyi pad mo'i snying po can dang / nor bu rin po che dri ma myed pa'i pad mo'i
140a2(phal chen): snying po can dang / nor bu rin po ches brgyan pa'i pad mo'i snying po dang / nor bu rin po che sgo kun nas brgyan pa'i pad mo'i snying po can dang / nor bu rin po che 'od kyis brgyan pa'i pad ma'i snying po can dang / nor bu rin po che rgya mtsho'i
140a3(phal chen): gnas rnam par dag pa'i rin po ches rnam par brgyan pa'i 'od zer kun tu 'byung ba'i pad mo'i snying po can dang / nor bu rin po che rdo rje'i seng ges gnon pa'i pad mo'i snying po can dag bshams shing bting ba ste/ gzhal med
140a4(phal chen): khang chen po rgyal mtshan sna tshogs de'i ba gam mang po yang / rin po che sna tshogs bsam gyis mi khyab pa las byas pa rin po che sna tshogs kyi rnam par brgyan pa/ kha dog bsam gyis mi khyab par
140a5(phal chen): mdzes shing gzugs yid du 'ong pa dag go/ /bza' shing gi ra ba kun nas brgyan pa/ de steng nas bla re chen po brgya stong phrag bcus kun nas khebs pa ste/ 'di ltar gos kyi bla re dang khri shing gi bla re dang /
140a6(phal chen): me tog gi bla re dang / phreng ba'i bla re dang / spos kyi bla re dang / nor bu rin po che'i bla re dang / gser gyi bla re dang / rgyan gyi bla re dang / rin po che rdo rje snang ba'i bla re dang / glang po'i shugs dang ldan pas
140a7(phal chen): sprul pa'i lha mo'i bla re dang / nor bu rin po che brgya byin mngon par dga' ba'i bla re dang / de dag la sogs pa bla re brgya stong phrag bcus kun nas kheb par byas pa'o/ /rin po che'i dra ba brgya stong phrag bcus kun
140a8(phal chen): nas yog pa ste/ 'di ltar rin po che dam pa'i dril bu'i dra ba dang / rin po che'i gdugs kyi dra ba dang / rin po che'i 'bru'i dra ba dang / mu tig rgya mtsho'i snying po'i dra ba dang / nor bu rin po che bai DUr+ya sngon po'i dra ba dang /
140b1(phal chen): seng ge'i khri shing gi dra ba dang / nor bu rin po che chu shel gyi dra ba dang / spos kyi gzugs kyi dra ba dang / rin po che'i cod pan dang / rin po che'i phreng ba dang / de dag la sogs pa rin po che'i dra ba brgya stong phrag bcus kun
140b2(phal chen): nas yog pa'o/ /snang ba chen po brgya stong phrag bcus kyang kun nas yog pa ste/ 'di ltar nor bu rin po che skar ma'i 'od zer gyi snang ba dang / nor bu rin po che nyi ma'i snying po'i snang ba dang / nor bu rin po che zla ba'i
140b3(phal chen): rgyal mtshan gyis snang ba dang / nor bu rin po che spos kyi dud pa 'od 'phro ba'i snang ba dang / nor bu rin po che dpal gyi snying po'i snang ba dang / nor bu rin po che pad mo'i snying po'i snang ba dang / nor bu rin po che skar ma'i rgyal
140b4(phal chen): mtshan gyi snang ba dang / nor bu rin po che sgron ma chen po'i snang ba dang / nor bu rin po che phyogs kun tu rnam par snang ba'i snang ba dang / nor bu rin po che spos kyi sprin chen po dang / klog gi 'phreng ba 'byung ba'i snang
140b5(phal chen): ba dang / de dag la sogs pa nor bu rin po che'i snang ba chen po brgya stong phrag bcus rtags tu snang bar byas so/ /bza' shing gi ra ba de ni rgyan chen po'i sprin brgya stong phrag bcu'i char 'bab pa'i rgyan dang ldan pa ste/
140b6(phal chen): dus dang 'thun pa'i tsan dan gyi sprin brgya stong phrag bcu'i 'brug sgra rab tu 'byung ba dang / lha rdzas las 'das pa'i phreng ba dang / lda ldi'i sprin chen po'i kun tu mched pas rab tu brgyan pa/ lha
140b7(phal chen): rdzas las 'das pa'i go mtshon sna tshogs dang ldan pa'i sprin brgya stong phrag bcu'i sprin mngon par 'bab pa/ lha rdzas las 'das pa'i rgyan gyi sprin brgya stong phrag bcus rnam par klub pa/ lha'i bu brgya stong phrag
140b8(phal chen): bcu mngon par dga' ste/ 'og tu lta zhing rab tu 'dud pa'i phyag char bzhin du 'bab pa/ lha mo'i sprin brgya stong phrag bcu sngon gyi spyod pa'i bskal pa mnyam pas rang rang gi lus 'bul ba'i char
141a1(phal chen): mngon par 'bab pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i sprin brgya stong phrag bcu chos mnyan pas/ skom zhing 'ong ba'i char mngon par 'bab ste/ de na dge bsnyen ma yid bzhin gser gyi snying po'i khri chen po
141a2(phal chen): la 'dug cing / mu tig rgya mtsho'i snying po'i dra bas brgyan pa'i cod pan thogs pa lag pa la lha rdzas las 'das pa'i gser gyi dpung rgyan dang / gdub bu thogs pa/ lag pa nor bu rin po che dpal gyi
141a3(phal chen): rang bzhin gyi 'od zer gyis rnam par mdzes par gyur pa/ rna cha rin po che mthon ting dri ma med pa rab tu 'phyang ba/ mgo nor bu rin po che'i dra bas mdzes par brgyan pa/ nor bu rin po che seng ge'i gdong gi
141a4(phal chen): rna ba'i gong rgyan thogs pa/ nor bu rin po che yid bzhin gyi rgyal po'i mgul kor thog pa/ lus rin po che thams cad kyi dra bas yog cing 'od rab tu 'bar ba/ srog chags bye ba khrag khrig gi lus
141a5(phal chen): rab tu btud de/ phyag bya ba zhig 'dug ste/ dge bsnyen ma yid bzhin de'i drung du shar phyogs nas tshangs pa chen po 'am/ tshangs lha nye phan dang / tshangs pa kun ris su gtogs pa 'am/ dbang byed
141a6(phal chen): dam/ gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi ris su gtogs pa 'am/ rab 'phrul dga' 'am/ 'phrul dga'i ris su gtogs pa 'am/ rab dga' ldan nam/ dga' ldan gyi ris su gtogs pa 'am/
141a7(phal chen): rab 'tshe ma 'am/ mtshe ma'i ris su gtogs pa 'am/ lha'i dbang po 'am/ sum bcu rtsa gsum gyi ris su gtogs pa 'am/ gnod sbyin gyi dbang po 'am/ gnod sbyin nam/ dri za'i
141a8(phal chen): dbang po 'am/ dri za 'am/ grul bum gyi dbang po 'am/ grul bum 'am/ klu'i dbang po 'am/ klu 'am/ lha ma yin gyi dbang po 'am/ lha ma yin nam/ nam mkha' lding gis dbang po
141b1(phal chen): 'am/ nam mkha' lding ngam/ mi 'am ci'i dbang po 'am/ mi 'am ci 'am/ lto 'phye chen po'i dbang po 'am/ lto 'phye chen po 'am/ gshin rje 'am/ gshin rje'i bu mo 'am/ yid dgas rdzu 'phrul
141b2(phal chen): chen po 'am/ yi dags sam/ mi'i dbang po 'am/ mi 'ang rung ste/ sems can tshad med grangs med pa dag 'ong ba dang / de bzhin du shar phyogs dang / nub phyogs dang / byang
141b3(phal chen): phyogs dang / byang shar gyi phyogs mtsham dang / shar lho'i phyogs 'tshams dang / lho nub kyi phyogs 'tshams dang / nub byang gi phyogs 'tshams dang / 'og dang steng gi phyogs nas kyang /
141b4(phal chen): tshangs pa chen po 'am/ tshangs lha nye phan nam/ tshangs pa'i ris su gtog pa 'am/ dbang byed kyi ris su gtogs pa nas/ mi'i dbang po 'am/ mi'i bar gyi sems can mang po 'ong ba/ de dag nad
141b5(phal chen): sna tshogs zhig gis btab pa 'am/ nyon mongs pa sna tshogs kyis kun nas 'khor tam/ lta ba'i rnam pa sna tshogs la mngon par zhen tam/ las kyi sgrib pas bsgribs pa zhig yod na 'ang /
141b6(phal chen): de dag gis dge bsnyen ma yid bzhin de mthong ma thag tu nad thams cad kyang rab tu zhi bar gyur/ sems can kyi nyon mongs pa'i dri ma dang yang bral bar gyur/ lta ba'i gsal shing yang phyin par gyur/
141b7(phal chen): sgrib pa'i ri thams cad kyang rnam par bshig par gyur/ rnam par dag pa'i dkyil 'khor sgrib pa med pa yang khong du chud par 'gyur te/ rnam par dag pa'i dkyil 'khor de yod pas ni dge ba'i rtsa ba
141b8(phal chen): thams cad kyang rab tu 'byung bar 'gyur/ dbang po'i myu gu thams cad kyang rnam par 'phel bar gyur/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi tshul rgya chen po la yang dag par gzhol bar 'gyur/ gzungs
142a1(phal chen): kyi sgo rgya mtsho thams cad du 'ang 'jug par 'gyur/ ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo dang tshul rgya mtsho thams cad kyang mngon sum du gyur/ smon lam gyi sgo thams cad kyang yang dag par skye bar 'gyur/ spyod pa'i
142a2(phal chen): spyod pa thams cad kyang rab tu 'byung bar 'gyur/ yon tan mngon par bsgrubs pa'i sgo thams cad yang dag par 'gyur/ sems rgya chen po yang mngon par shes pa thams cad dang ldan pa'i tshul du 'byung
142a3(phal chen): bar 'gyur ro/ lus thogs pa med pas kyang thams cad du rjes su 'gro bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas tshongs dpon gyi bu nor bzangs bza' shing gi ra bas kun nas rnam par brgyan pa'i nang du phyin te/ bltas
142a4(phal chen): nas dge bsnyen ma yid bzhin gang na ba der song ste/ phyin nas dge bsnyen ma yid bzhin gyi rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ dge bsnyen ma yid bzhin la lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor
142a5(phal chen): ba byas nas/ 'di skad ces smras so/ /'phags ma bdag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed nas/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i spyod par bslabs
142a6(phal chen): par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bya ba ma 'tshal te/ 'phags ma ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams la gdams ngag dang rjes su bstan pa mdzad do/ /zhes thos nas/ 'phags ma ji ltar byang chub
142a7(phal chen): sems dpa'as byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba bdag la bshad du gsol/ des smras pa rigs kyi bu kho mo ni byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa mya ngan
142a8(phal chen): med pa bde ba'i rgyal mtshan thob pa ste/ rigs kyi bu kho mo de'i mthus mthong na don yod pa'o/ /mnyan na don yod pa'o/ /rim gror byas na don yod pa'o/ /gnas gcig na 'grogs pa don yod pa'o/ /
142b1(phal chen): rjes su dran par byas pa don yod pa'o/ /rigs kyi bu kho mo ni sems can dge ba'i rtsa ba ma bskyed pa/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su ma zin pa/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi ma dgongs pa rnams
142b2(phal chen): kyis mthong zhing rnam par dmigs par mig lam du 'ong bar mi 'gyur te/ rigs kyi bu kho mo mthong ba tsam gyis ni sems can rnams kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par
142b3(phal chen): 'gyur ro/ /gzhan yang rigs kyi bu kho mo'i drung du shar phyogs nas de bzhin gshegs pa byon cing / gdan rin po che'i khri 'di la bzhugs pas chos ston to/ /shar phyogs nas ji lta ba de bzhin du phyogs bcu nas
142b4(phal chen): kyang de bzhin te/ rigs kyi bu de lta bas na/ kho mo ni de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba dang mi bral ba'o/ /chos mnyan pa dang mi 'bral ba'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' dang 'grogs pa dang mi 'bral ba'o/ /rigs kyi bu kho mo dang
142b5(phal chen): s pyod pa'i bskal pa mnyam pa'i srog chags bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag brgyad bcu rtsa bzhi po bza' shing gi ra ba kun nas rnam par brgyan pa 'di na gnas pa de dag thams cad kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
142b6(phal chen): chub las phyir mi ldog pa sha stag go/ /rigs kyi bu sems can gzhan gang 'di na gnas pa de dag kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa/ phyir mi ldog pa'i dge 'dun du gtogs pa sha stag
142b7(phal chen): ste/ kho mo dang spyod pa'i skal ba mnyam pa dag go/ /smras pa 'phags ma khyod kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yun ji srid cig nas thugs bskyed/ smras pa rigs kyi bu kho mo ni sngon gyi gnas
142b8(phal chen): rjes su dran no/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mar me mdzad ces bya ba byung ba de bzhin gshegs pa de'i drung du kho mos tshangs pa'i spyod pa spyad do/ /de bzhin gshegs
143a1(phal chen): pa de kho mos mchod do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa de las chos bstan pa kho mos yongs su bzung ngo / /de'i snga rol du de bzhin gshegs pa dri ma med pa zhes bya ba byung ste/ de'i bstan pa la 'ang kho mo
143a2(phal chen): rab tu byung ngo / /chos kyi 'khor lo kho mos bzung ngo / /de'i snga rol du de bzhin gshegs pa dpal zhes bya ba byung ste/ de yang kho mos bsnyen bkur to/ /de'i snga rol tu de bzhin gshegs pa ri rab dpal zhes bya ba
143a3(phal chen): byung ngo / /de'i snga rol tu de bzhin gshegs pa pad mo'i snying po zhes bya ba byung ngo / /de'i snga rol tu de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad ces bya ba 'byung ngo / /de'i snga rol tu de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu gzigs pa zhes
143a4(phal chen): bya ba byung ngo / /de'i snga rol tu de bzhin gshegs pa tshangs pa dag pa zhes bya ba byung ngo / /de'i snga rol tu de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje'i gtsugs ces bya ba byung ngo / /de'i kun snga rol tu de bzhin gshegs pa chu bo'i lha zhes bya ba
143a5(phal chen): byung ste/ rigs kyi bu gzhung de ltar tshe gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa dang / bskal pa gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa'i sangs rgyas gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshams 'dab
143a6(phal chen): chags su bsams te/ dran par byas nas/ gang kho mos rim gror byas te/ bsnyen bkur ba dang / mchod pa dang / sti stang du byas pa dang / gang gi spyan sngar kho mos chos thos par 'gyur pa dang / gang gi bstan
143a7(phal chen): pa la kho mos tshangs pa'i spyod pa spyad pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa gang ga'i klung sum bcu rtsa drug gi bye ma snyed rjes su dran te/ rigs kyi bu de phan chad du kho mos de bzhin gshegs pa ji snyed gcig bsnyen bkur ba ni/ de bzhin
143a8(phal chen): gshegs pa rnams kyis mkhyen to/ /rigs kyi bu sems dang po bskyed ma thag tu chos kyi dbyings rgyas par 'gengs pas byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni tshad med pa'o/ /rigs kyi bu snying rje chen po'i khongasu
143b1(phal chen): 'gro ba thams cad tshud pas/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni tshad med pa'o/ /rigs kyi bu smon lam chen pos phyogs bcu'i chos kyi dbyings kyi gzhi zad zad du 'gro bas byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni tshad
143b2(phal chen): med pa'o/ /rigs kyi bu byams pa chen pos 'gro ba thams cad rgyas par 'gengs pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni tshad med pa'o/ /rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pas zhing
143b3(phal chen): thams cad du bskal pa thams cad yongs su sdud pas/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni tshad med pa'o/ /rigs kyi bu ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs kyis byang chub sems dpa'i lam las phyir mi ldog
143b4(phal chen): pas byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni tshad med pa'o/ /rigs kyi bu gzungs kyi stobs kyis 'gro ba thams cad yongs su 'dzin pa'i gzungs kyi tshul khong du chud par byed pas byang chub sems dpa'
143b5(phal chen): rnams ni tshad med pa'o/ /rigs kyi bu ye shes snang ba'i stobs kyis dus gsum gyi ye shes kyi tshul/ khong du chud par byed cing / yang dag par 'dzin pas byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni
143b6(phal chen): tshad med pa'o/ /rigs kyi bu mngon par shes pa'i stobs kyis zhing thams cad du sems can rnams kyi bsam pa dang / mos pa ci lta ba bzhin du 'od kyi dra ba'i 'khor lo mngon par bsgrub pas byang chub
143b7(phal chen): sems dpa' rnams ni tshad med pa'o/ /rigs kyi bu so so yang dag par rig pa'i stobs kyis tshigs gcig brjod kyang 'gro ba thams cad shin tu tshim par byed pas/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni tshad
143b8(phal chen): myed pa'o/ /rigs kyi bu lus rnam par dag pas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad rang gi lus kyis rgyas par 'gengs pas/ byang chub sems
144a1(phal chen): dpa' rnams ni tshad med pa'o/ /nor bzangs kyis smras pa/ 'phags ma khyod ji srid gcig na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur/ smras pa rigs kyi bu
144a2(phal chen): 'di lta ste/ sems can gcig la dmigs shing gdul bar bya ba dang / smin par bya ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye ba ma yin te/ sems can brgya'i phyir ma yin/ sems can
144a3(phal chen): stong gi phyir ma yin te/ sems can bye ba khrag khrig brgya phrag stong gi phyir ma yin/ sems can bye ba'i phyir ma yin/ sems can bye ba brgya'i phyir ma yin/ sems can bye ba stong gi phyir ma yin/ sems
144a4(phal chen): can bye ba khrag khrig brgya phrag stong gi don du/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye ba ma yin no/ /sems can thams cad kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can khrag khrig gi phyir ma
144a5(phal chen): yin/ sems can gang ya'i phyir ma yin/ sems can ban bun gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can phyar phyur gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can byang bying gi phyir ma yin/ sems can nyer 'jal gyi phyir ma yin/
144a6(phal chen): sems can phyal phyol gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can yal yel gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can ljad ljid kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can phyod zim gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can phyad phyod kyi phyir ma yin/
144a7(phal chen): sems can ldam ldem gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can ya gangs kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can cho ma'i phyir ma yin/ sems can khram khrim gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can nab nub kyi phyir ma yin/
144a8(phal chen): sems can rgyud byas kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can btang yas kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can bkra yar kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can gsal yas kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can gzhal brtag
144b1(phal chen): gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can mtshungs med kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can lam yol gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can rab rib kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can thab thib kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can
144b2(phal chen): 'grags yul gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can then 'phyod kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can bsam phyo'i phyir ma yin/ sems can 'dra mnyam gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can breng breng gi phyir ma yin/
144b3(phal chen): sems can bgrang yas kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can rgyas 'dal gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can bsngos yag gi phyir ma yin/ sems can zang yag gi phyir ma yin/ sems can phro bkye'i phyir ma yin/
144b4(phal chen): sems can rtse 'phyo'i phyir ma yin/ sems can yong tang gi phyir ma yin/ sems can 'brug g.yos kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can sang yal gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can thing yug gi phyir
144b5(phal chen): ma yin/ sems can snang yal gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can nan pa'i phyir ma yin/ sems can yid 'phyo'i phyir ma yin/ sems can nab neb kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can khri thabs
144b6(phal chen): kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can yal yol gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can bgrang yas kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can thug yal gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can yad yud kyi phyir ma yin/
144b7(phal chen): sems can 'phyo ldog gi phyir ma yin/ sems can brda yas kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can lhub be'i phyir ma yin/ sems can thag thug gi phyir ma yin/ sems can khrig khrig gi phyir ma yin/
144b8(phal chen): sems can rigs yas kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can snyad med kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can mchog phreng gi phyir ma yin/ sems can nyag 'bru'i phyir ma yin/ sems can spu 'phyes kyi phyir
145a1(phal chen): ma yin/ sems can 'bru 'brel gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can brjod 'os kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can lhod yas kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can brjod phul gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can
145a2(phal chen): zhi snyed kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can gang thim gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can 'phyo 'gyur gyis phyir ma yin/ sems can nyar nyer gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can phyag phyig gi phyir ma yin/ sems can zal zul gyi phyir
145a3(phal chen): ma yin/ sems can sal sal gyis phyir ma yin/ sems can g.yo ldeg gis phyir ma yin/ sems can phan phun gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can brnang ya'i phyir ma yin/ sems can rim grol gyi phyir
145a4(phal chen): ma yin/ sems can rje ngad kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can rdzi rdul gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can phun yol gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can 'ol 'ol gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can ngad ngad kyi phyir ma yin/
145a5(phal chen): sems can bgrang rtsi'i phyir ma yin/ sems can zab bgrang gi phyir ma yin/ sems can dga' rkyang gi phyir ma yin/ sems can grangs mtha'i phyir ma yin/ sems can phyod yal gyi phyir ma
145a6(phal chen): yin/ sems can 'ol phyod kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can gdab yas kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can gcal yas kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can bgrang yas kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can byim 'phyo'i
145a7(phal chen): phyir ma yin/ sems can yam me'i phyir ma yin/ sems can bsnyal yas kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can ldab ldob kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can 'ban chad kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can phang phung gi phyir ma yin/
145a8(phal chen): sems can mtha' rdul gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can rgyu lding gi phyir ma yin/ sems can yun 'gyangs kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can mkha' yal gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can bun lob kyi phyir ma yin/ sems
145b1(phal chen): can lam lom gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can bsnyad yas kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can lang ling gi phyir ma yin/ sems can ldab ltib gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can mi brtsal gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can
145b2(phal chen): 'phyam yas kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can nga 'grang gi phyir ma yin/ sems can smos yal gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can bkra chal gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can lo brgyas kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can 'bum
145b3(phal chen): rdib kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can la lo'i phyir ma yin/ sems can phyam phyam gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can bgrang phyos kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can bgrangs phyos la bgres pa'i phyir ma yin/ sems can
145b4(phal chen): dpag yas kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can dpag yas la bsgres pa'i phyir ma yin/ sems can yal 'phyong gi phyir ma yin/ sems can yal phyong la bsgres pa'i phyir ma yin/ sems can mu yal gyi phyir ma yin/
145b5(phal chen): sems can mu yal la bsgres pa'i phyir ma yin/ sems can bgrang yal gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can bgrang yal la bsgres pa'i phyir ma yin/ sems can mi 'jal gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can mi 'jal
145b6(phal chen): la bsgres pa'i phyir ma yin/ sems can bsam phyod kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can bsam phyod la bsgres pa'i phyir ma yin/ sems can mtha' 'byam gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can mtha' 'byam la bsgres
145b7(phal chen): pa'i phyir ma yin/ sems can dpag thag gi phyir ma yin/ sems can dpag thag la bsgres pa'i phyir ma yin/ sems can brjod du myed pa'i phyir ma yin/ sems can brjod du med pa la bsgres pa'i phyir ma
145b8(phal chen): yin/ sems can brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du myed pa'i phyir ma yin/ sems can brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du myed pa la bsgres pa'i phyir ma yin/ sems can 'jig rten gyi khams
146a1(phal chen): gcig tu gtogs pa rnams kyi phyir ma yin pa nas/ brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams su gtogs pa'i sems can rnams kyi phyir ma yin/ gling bzhi pa'i 'jig
146a2(phal chen): rten gyi khams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams su gtogs pa'i sems can rnams kyi phyir ma yin/ stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams su gtogs
146a3(phal chen): pa'i sems can rnams kyi phyir ma yin/ stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams su gtogs pa'i sems can rnams kyi phyir ma yin/ stong gsum gyi
146a4(phal chen): stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams su gtogs pa'i sems can rnams kyi phyir ma yin pa nas/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams brjod
146a5(phal chen): du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams su gtogs pa'i sems can rnams kyi don du 'di lta ste yongs su smyin par bya ba dang / gdul ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'
146a6(phal chen): rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye ba ma yin gyi/ 'di lta ste 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa lhag ma med pa mtha' dag thams cad du gtogs pa'i sems can gyi don du yongs su smin par bya ba dang / gdul
146a7(phal chen): ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye'o/ /'di lta ste sangs rgyas gcig bsnyen bkur ba dang / mnyes par bya ba dang / mchod cing rim gror bya ba'i phyir byang chub sems
146a8(phal chen): dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye ba ma yin pa dang / sangs rgyas bcu bsnyen bkur zhing mnyes par bya ba dang / mchod cing rim gror bya ba'i phyir ma yin pa nas/ brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i
146b1(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi sangs rgyas bsnyen bkur zhing mnyes par bya ba dang / mchod cing rim gror bya ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye ba ma yin/ 'jig rten
146b2(phal chen): gyi khams gcig tu gtogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi rgyud bsnyen bkur zhing mnyes par bya ba dang / mchod cing rim gror bya ba'i phyir ma yin pa nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du myed pa'i rdul
146b3(phal chen): shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams su gtogs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i brgyud bsnyen bkur zhing mnyes par bya ba dang / mchod cing rim gror bya ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi
146b4(phal chen): sems byang chub tu skye ba ma yin no/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing gcig yongs su dag par bya ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye ba ma yin pa nas/ 'jig rten gyi khams brjod du myed
146b5(phal chen): pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye ba ma yin/ de bzhin gshegs pa gcig gi bstan
146b6(phal chen): pa yongs su gzung ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye ba ma yin pa nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs
146b7(phal chen): pa'i stan pa yongs su bzung ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye ba ma yin/ sangs rgyas gcig rab tu zhugs pa'i smon lam rnam par thar pa la 'jug pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'
146b8(phal chen): rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye ba ma yin pa nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi sangs rgyas rab tu zhugs pa'i smon lam rnam pa tha dad
147a1(phal chen): pa la 'jug pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye ba ma yin no/ /de bzhin gshegs pa gcig gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi brgyan la 'jug par bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems
147a2(phal chen): dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye ba ma yin pa nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du myed pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rgyan la 'jug par
147a3(phal chen): bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye ba ma yin/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gcig gi 'khor rnam par phye ba la 'jug par bya ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems
147a4(phal chen): byang chub tu skye ba ma yin pa nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor phye ba la 'jug par bya ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi
147a5(phal chen): sems byang chub tu skye ba ma yin/ de bzhin gshegs pa gcig gi chos kyi 'khor lo yongs su gzung ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye ba ma yin pa nas/ sangs rgyas kyi
147a6(phal chen): zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo yongs su gzung ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye ba ma yin/ sems rgya mtsho gcig khong du chud par bya ba'i phyir/
147a7(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye ba ma yin pa nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul
147a8(phal chen): shin tu phra ba snyed kyi sems rgya mtsho khong du chud par bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye ba ma yin/ sems can gcig gi dbang po'i 'khor lo
147b1(phal chen): yongs su shes par bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye ba ma yin pa nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi sems can gyi
147b2(phal chen): dbang po'i 'khor lo shes par bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye ba ma yin/ sems can gcig gi dbang po rgya mtsho khong du chud par bya ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'
147b3(phal chen): rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye ba ma yin/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du myed pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi sems can gyi dbang po rgya mtsho khong du chud par bya ba'i phyir byang chub sems
147b4(phal chen): dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye ba ma yin/ 'jig rten gyi khams gcig gi bskal pa gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa la 'jug par bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub
147b5(phal chen): tu skye ba ma yin pa nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi bskal pa gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa la 'jug par bya ba'i phyir/
147b6(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye ba ma yin/ 'jig rten gyi khams gcig tu rtogs pa'i sems can thams cad kyi spyod pa'i bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba la 'jug par
147b7(phal chen): bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye ba ma yin pa nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi
147b8(phal chen): khams su gtogs pa'i sems can thams cad kyi spyod pa'i bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba la 'jug par bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye ba
148a1(phal chen): ma yin/ 'jig rten gyi khams gcig tu gtogs pa'i sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa rgya mtsho thams cad la 'jug par bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye
148a2(phal chen): ba ma yin pa nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams su gtogs pa'i sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa rgya mtsho thams cad la 'jug
148a3(phal chen): par bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye ba ma yin/ 'jig rten gyi khams gcig tu gtogs pa'i sems can thams cad kyi las rgya mtsho thams cad la 'jug par bya ba'i
148a4(phal chen): phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye ba ma yin pa nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams su gtogs pa'i
148a5(phal chen): sems can thams cad kyi las rgya mtsho la 'jug par bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye ba ma yin/ 'jig rten gyi khams gcig tu gtogs pa'i sems can thams cad
148a6(phal chen): kyi spyod pa rgya mtsho thams cad khong du chud par bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye ba ma yin pa nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu
148a7(phal chen): phra ba snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams su gtogs pa'i sems can thams cad kyi spyod pa rgya mtsho thams cad khong du chud par bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye ba ma yin gyi/
148a8(phal chen): sems can gyi khams ma lus pa lhag ma myed pa mtha' dag thams cad yongs su smyin par bya ba dang / gdul ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye'o/ /sangs rgyas ma lus pa
148b1(phal chen): thams cad bsnyen bkur zhing mnyes par bya ba dang / mchod cing rim gror bya ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye'o/ /'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa thams cad du gtogs
148b2(phal chen): pa'i sangs rgyas kyi rgyud bsnyen bkur zhing mnyes par bya ba dang / mchod cing rim gror bya ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' rnams smon lam la mngon par mos pa yin/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing ma lus pa thams
148b3(phal chen): cad yongs su dag par bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsam pa brtan par 'gyur ba yin/ sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa ma lus pa thams cad yongs su bzung ba'i phyir byang chub sems
148b4(phal chen): dpa' rnams kyi sbyor ba 'byung ba yin/ de bzhin gshegs pa rab tu zhugs pa'i smon lam rnam pa tha dad pa ma lus pa thams cad kyi rjes su 'brang bar bya ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems kyi
148b5(phal chen): shugs drag po skye ba yin/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yon tan gyi rgyan ma lus pa thams cad la 'jug par bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi yi dam brtan pa skye ba
148b6(phal chen): yin/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho thams cad la 'jug par bya ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mngon par mos pa 'byung ba yin/ 'gro ba'i sems rgya mtsho
148b7(phal chen): ma lus pa thams cad la 'jug par bya ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi smon lam skye ba yin/ sems can gyi dbang po'i 'khor lo ma lus pa thams cad yongs su shes par bya ba'i phyir/
148b8(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mngon par 'dod pa skye ba yin/ sems can gyi dbang po rgya mtsho ma lus pa thams cad khong du chud par bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spro ba skye ba
149a1(phal chen): yin/ 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa thams cad kyi bskal pa gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa la 'jug par bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mos pa skye ba yin/ sems
149a2(phal chen): can ma lus pa thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa'i bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba yongs su gcod pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi brtson 'grus yongs su skye ba yin/ sems can ma lus pa
149a3(phal chen): thams cad kyi las dang nyon mongs pa'i rgya mtsho bskam pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ye shes chen po'i nyi ma 'char ba yin/ sems can ma lus pa thams cad kyi spyod pa yongs su shes
149a4(phal chen): par bya ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi shes rab kyi snang ba 'byung ba yin/ sems can ma lus pa thams cad kyi sdug bsngal gyi me'i phung po rab tu zhi bar bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa'
149a5(phal chen): rnams kyi snying rje'i sprin chen po kun nas 'du ba yin/ rigs kyi bu mdor na de dag la stsogs pa byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i tshul dang / sgo grangs myed pa brgya stong phrag bcu dag byang chub sems
149a6(phal chen): dpa' rnams kyis yongs su bsgrub par bya'o/ /rigs kyi bu gzhan yang 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa ni ye shes khong du chud par bya ba'i phyir/ chos thams cad la yang dag par
149a7(phal chen): gzhol ba'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa ni yongs su dag par bya ba'i phyir zhing thams cad la yang dag par gzhol ba'o/ /rigs kyi bu de lta bas na/ kho mos ni bdag gi smon lam
149a8(phal chen): nam mkha'i dbyings rnam par dag pa'i mtha' gang du thug pa de'i mthas klas par shog shig / bdag gi smon lam 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par dag pa'i mtha' gang du thug pa de'i mthas klas par shog
149b1(phal chen): shig / bdag gi smon lam sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa dang / bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba dang / bag la nyal ba'i mtha' gang du thug pa de'i mthas klas par shog shig /ces de ltar
149b2(phal chen): smon lam btab bo/ /smras pa 'phags ma rnam par thar pa 'di'i ming ci zhes bgyi/ smras pa rigs kyi bu rnam par thar pa 'di ni nyon mongs pa med pa bde ba'i rgyal mtshan ces bya ste/ rigs kyi bu
149b3(phal chen): kho mos kyang byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa de gcig pu shes par zad na byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yang dag par 'dzin pa'i phyir/ sems rgya mtsho dang ldan pa lhag pa'i bsam
149b4(phal chen): pa brtan pa'i phyir ri rab dang 'dra ba/ sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa'i nad rab tu sos par byed pa'i phyir sman gyi rgyal po mthong na legs pa lta bu/ sems can thams cad kyi ma rig pa'i mun
149b5(phal chen): pa sel ba'i phyir nyi mar gyur pa/ sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa'i gnas su gyur pa sa lta bu'i sems dang ldan pa/ 'gro ba thams cad kyi don byed pa'i phyir rlung du gyur pa/ sems can thams
149b6(phal chen): cad la ye shes kyi snang ba 'byin pa'i phyir mar myer gyur pa/ zhi ba'i sgras sangs rgyas kyi chos yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du 'bebs pa'i sprin du gyur pa bsod nams kyi 'od gzer gyi bde ba rab tu 'gyed pa'i
149b7(phal chen): phyir zla ba lta bu/ 'gro ba thams cad yongs su bsrung ba la zhugs pa'i phyir/ brgya byin lta bu de dag gi spyod pa shes pa'am/ yon tan brjod pa'am/ byang chub sems dpa'i bslab pa bsam
149b8(phal chen): gyis mi khyab pa smos pa'am/ byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam gyi rnam pa mtha' dang dbus med pa yongs su bstan par nus re skan/ /song rigs kyi bu lho phyogs kyi rgyud 'di nyid kyi
150a1(phal chen): rgya mtsho rnam par rlob pa 'di na yul chu bo gtsang ma zhes bya ba yod de/ de na drang srong 'jigs mchog dbyangs shes bya ba 'dug gi de'i gan du song la dris shig dang / des rigs kyi bu khyod
150a2(phal chen): la byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa ston par 'gyur ro/ /de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis dge bsnyen ma yid bzhin gyi rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ dge bsnyen ma yid bzhin la
150a3(phal chen): lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas/ yang dang yang bltas te phyag 'tshal nas/ ngo mchi mas gang bar ngus te/ byang chub mchog tu dkon pa rjes su sems shing dge ba'i
150a4(phal chen): bshes gnyen rim gror bya ba dkon pa rjes su bsam pa dang / skyes bu dam pa dang 'phrad pa dkon pa rjes su bsam pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i dbang po 'thob par bya ba rjes su bsam pa dang / byang chub sems
150a5(phal chen): dpa'i bsam pa yongs su dag pa dkon pa rjes su bsam pa dang / skal ba mnyam pa'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang phrad pa dkon pa rjes su bsam pa dang / byang chub tu yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du mngon par mos
150a6(phal chen): shing sems nges par gzhog pa dkon pa rjes su bsam pa dang / mi mnyam pa med pa'i chos kyi tshul rjes su bstan pa'i sbyor ba dkon pa rjes su bsam pa dang / sems dri ma myed cing mi 'phrogs pa'i
150a7(phal chen): sbyor ba yang dag par bsgrub par dkon pa rjes su bsam pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du shugs drag po rnam par bskyed pa'i chos kyi snang ba dkon pa rjes su bsam pa byed cing / dge bsnyen ma
150a8(phal chen): yid bzhin gyi drung nas song ngo / de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs byang chub sems dpa'i gdams ngag gi rjes su song ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yongs su dag par
150b1(phal chen): bya ba dang / rjes su song ba'i sems dang ldan pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i bsod nams kyi stobs rnam par 'phel bar bya ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ sangs rgyas blta ba'i shugs drag pos rab tu snang
150b2(phal chen): bar bya ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ chos kyi gter 'thob par bya ba la shugs drag po skyes pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ smon lam chen po mngon par bsgrub pa'i shugs drag po rab tu 'phel ba'i sems dang ldan pa
150b3(phal chen): chos thams cad kyi phyogs la mngon du lta ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ chos kyi rang bzhin gyi 'od kyis snang bar byas pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ sgrib pa thams cad rnam par 'thor ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ chos
150b4(phal chen): kyi dbyings la mun pa med par rnam par lta ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ rdo rje rin po che mthu bo ches myi choms pa lhar dri ma med pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ bdud thams cad kyi dpung gis brgal bar dka' zhing thub
150b5(phal chen): par dka' ba'i sems dang ldan pa de mthar kyis/ yul chu bo gtsang ma ga la ba der phyin nas/ drang srong 'jigs mchog dbyangs tshol tshol ba las/ de'i tshe drang srong 'jigs mchog dbyangs dge ba sbyang ba'i
150b6(phal chen): gnas shing dang / shing phran sna tshogs grangs myed pa'i nags tshal mdangs dga' ba/ lo mas rgyas pa'i shing gis kun nas 'khrigs pa/ rtag tu me tog rgyas pa dang ldan pa'i shing sna tshogs can/ rtag tu
150b7(phal chen): shing thog mang po dang ldan pa'i shing thog gi shing dang ldan pa/ nor bu rin po che sna tshogs kyi shing drung nor bu rin po che'i spang leb kyis rtag tu gshibs pa dang ldan pa/ tsan dan dam pa'i shing kun nas bres pa/
150b8(phal chen): a ga ru yid du 'ong ba'i shing las spos kyi dri rtag tu 'byung bas rab tu brgyan pa/ phyogs bzhi nas shing pa ta la rnam par mdzes par skyes pas yongs su brgyan pa/ n+ya gro da'i shing dbyib yid du 'ong ba dang
151a1(phal chen): ldan pa/ 'dzam bu'i shing las rtag tu shing thog smyin pa 'brul ba/ me tog gi tshal pad mo dang / ud pa la gsar du skyes pas rab tu brgyan pa zhig na 'dug 'dug ste/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor
151a2(phal chen): bzangs kyis drang srong 'jigs mchog dbyangs drang srong stong phrag bcus bskor cing / tsan dan gyi yal ga shin tu 'brel ba'i bya skyibs shig na/ thor tshugs kyi cod pan can/ pags pa dang / rtsa'i gos gyon
151a3(phal chen): pa/ shing shun gyi smad yogs can rtsa'i stan la 'dug pa mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang drang srong 'jigs mchog dbyangs ga la ba der song ste/ phyin nas yang dag pa'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang phrad pa'i bsam pas dge
151a4(phal chen): ba'i bshes gnyen ni yang dag pa'i lam ston pas/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid 'byung ba'i sgo yin par yang dag par blta/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i sa la gzhog pas/ thams cad mkhyen pa de ni dge ba'i
151a5(phal chen): bshes gnyen gyi gdams ngag la rag lus par yang dag par lta/ stobs bcu'i ye shes rin po che'i gling du skyel bas/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi mnyan pa la rag lus par
151a6(phal chen): yang dag par blta/ stobs bcu'i ye shes snang ba yang dag par bskyed pas thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi sgron mas snang bar bya ba yin par yang dag par blta/ nyam nyes myed par
151a7(phal chen): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi grong du phyin par byed pas/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi lam ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen yin par yang dag par blta/ mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa yongs su ston pas/
151a8(phal chen): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi mar me ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen yin par yang dag par blta/ g.yang sa'i 'jigs pa thams cad med par byed pas thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi stegs bu dge ba'i bshes
151b1(phal chen): gnyen yin par yang dag par blta/ byams pa chen po'i stobs kyis sim pa yongs su bskyed pa'i phyir thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi gdugs ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen yin par yang dag par blta/ snying rje
151b2(phal chen): c hen po yongs su bskyed pas thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi shugs drag po ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen yin par yang dag par blta zhing chos kyi rang bzhin gyi tshul rab tu snang bar byed pas thams cad mkhyen pa
151b3(phal chen): nyid gsal bar mthong ba ni/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen la rag las par mthong nas/ lus thams cad kyis phab ste/ phyag byas nas langs te/ drang srong 'jigs mchog dbyangs la lan
151b4(phal chen): brgya stong du mar bskor ba byas nas mdun du 'dug ste/ thal mo sbyar nas yid du 'ong ba'i tshul gyis yid du 'ong ba'i tshig brjod de/ 'di skad ces smras so/ /'phags pa bdag gis bla na med pa yang dag
151b5(phal chen): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed na/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba ma 'tshal te/ 'phags pa ni byang
151b6(phal chen): chub sems dpa' rnams la gdams ngag dang / rjes su bstan pa mdzad do zhes thos nas/ 'phags pa ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang / ji
151b7(phal chen): ltar nan tan du bgyi ba bdag la bshad du gsol/ de nas drang srong 'jigs mchog dbyangs kyis bram ze'i byis pa stong phrag bcu po de dag la bltas te/ 'di skad ces smras so/ /byis pa bdag
151b8(phal chen): rigs kyi bu 'dis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed de/ sems can thams cad 'jigs pa med pa la 'gron du gnyer to/ /rigs kyi bu 'di ni sems can thams cad la
152a1(phal chen): phan pa dang bde ba'i don du sta gon du gnas pa ste/ ye shes rgya mtsho la mngon du gyur pa'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi sprin gyi char btung bar 'dod pa'o/ /chos kyi
152a2(phal chen): tshul rgya mtsho thams cad la 'jug par 'dod pa'o/ /ye shes kyi snang ba chen po la gnas par 'dod pa'o/ /snying rje chen po'i sprin bsdu bar 'dod pa'o/ /chos kyi char chen po mngon par 'dod pa'o/ /
152a3(phal chen): ye shes chen po'i zla ba 'jig rten du shar bar byas te/ nyon mongs pa'i gdung ba thams cad rab tu gzhil bar 'dod pa'o/ /sems can thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam par spel bar 'dod pa'o/ /
152a4(phal chen): de nas bram ze'i byis pa stong phrag bcu po de dag gis me tog dri zhim la yid du 'ong zhing kha dog sna tshogs dang ldan pa mang pos tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs la gtor to/ /mngon par gtor to/ /rab tu
152a5(phal chen): gtor to/ /mngon par phyag 'tshal to/ /de ltar btud de phyag 'tshal nas/ g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas te/ tshig 'di skad du brjod do/ /'di ni sems can thams cad yongs su
152a6(phal chen): skyob par 'gyur ro/ /sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal thams cad rab tu zhi bar bgyid par 'gyur ro/ /byol song gi skye gnas kyi lam gyi rgyud thams cad rnam par gcod par 'gyur ro/ /
152a7(phal chen): gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi lam gyi rgyud thams cad rnam par bzlog par 'gyur ro/ /mi khom pa'i sgo thams cad gcod par 'gyur ro/ /sred pa'i rgya mtsho thams cad yongs su skems par 'gyur
152a8(phal chen): ro/ /srid pa'i bcing pa gcod par 'gyur ro/ /sdug bsngal gyi phung po rnam par bzlog par 'gyur ro/ /ma rig pa'i mun pa sel bar 'gyur ro/ /bsod nams kyi khor yug gis 'jig rten
152b1(phal chen): yongs su bskor bar 'gyur ro/ /ye shes rin po che'i 'byung gnas su yongs su ston par 'gyur ro/ /ye shes kyi nyi ma'i tshor bar bgyid par 'gyur ro/ /chos kyi mig rnam par sbyong bar 'gyur ro/ /'jig
152b2(phal chen): rten rnams la mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa yang dag par ston par 'gyur ro/ /de nas drang srong 'jigs mchog dbyangs kyis byis pa de dag la 'di skad ces smras so/ /byis pa dag gang gis bla na med pa yang dag par
152b3(phal chen): rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa de ni byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/ sems can thams cad kyi bde ba rab tu bskyed de/ rim gyis thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang thob par 'gyur ro/ /
152b4(phal chen): byis pa bdag rigs kyi bu 'dis ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa ste/ de bas na 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi yon tan thams cad kyis yongs su sbyong bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas drang
152b5(phal chen): srong 'jigs mchog dbyangs kyis/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs la 'di skad ces smras so/ /rigs kyi bu kho bo ni byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i rgyal mtshan
152b6(phal chen): thob pa'o/ /nor bzangs kyis smras pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa gzhan gyis mi thub pa 'di'i yul ji lta bu zhig mchis/ de nas drang srong 'jigs mchog dbyangs kyis lag pa g.yas
152b7(phal chen): pa brkyang ste/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyi mgo la byugs nas lag pas bzung ngo / /tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs la drang srong 'jigs mchog dbyangs kyis lag pa g.yas pas gzung ma thag tu
152b8(phal chen): de'i myod la tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis/ phyogs bcur sangs rgyas kyis zhing brgya stong phrag bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing mthong bar gyur te/ de dag gi de bzhin gshegs
153a1(phal chen): pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing brgya stong phrag bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi zhabs kyi drung na bdag nyid 'dug par shes par gyur to/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag kyang rnam pa grangs med par rnam par dag pa'i
153a2(phal chen): rgyan dang ldan par mthong ngo / /de dag na 'ang de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho kha dog sna tshogs can rgyan rnam pa tha dad pa dang ldan pa dag 'khod pa mthong ngo / /'khor gyi
153a3(phal chen): dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho de dag na 'ang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po 'bar bas brgyan pa dag bzhugs pa mthong ngo / /de dag las kyang tshig dang yi ge gcig las kyang phyir phyogs pa myed
153a4(phal chen): par chos bstan pa nyan to/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo de dag kyang phan tshun ma 'dres par yang dag par 'dzin to/ /chos kyi sprin gyi char sems can gyi bsam pa sna tshogs la 'bab
153a5(phal chen): pa de dag kyang yang dag par 'dzin to/ /de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi sngon gyi smon lam mos pa sna tshogs kyi stobs kyis rnam par sbyangs pa rgya mtsho la yang zhugs so/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing dag
153a6(phal chen): par bsdu ba smon lam sna tshogs rgya mtshos rnam par dag pa rgya mtsho de dag la yang zhugs so/ /sangs rgyas kyi sku mdog sems can gyi bsams pa ji lta ba bzhin du tshim par 'gyur bar rnam par dmyigs
153a7(phal chen): pa de dag kyang mthong ngo / /sangs rgyas kyi 'od gzer gyi dra ba 'dod chags dang bral ba sna tshogs kyis rnam par dag pa'i rgyan gyi 'khor de dag kyang mthong ngo / /sangs rgyas kyi stobs de dag la'ang ye
153a8(phal chen): shes snang ba sgrib pa myed pa dang ldan pas zhugs so/ /de ltar byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i rgyal mtshan gyi ye shes kyi 'od kyis snang bar gyur pa/
153b1(phal chen): ting nge 'dzin rnam par snang mdzad kyi snying po snang ba rab tu thob pa/ ting nge 'dzin ye shes myi zad pa'i rnam par thar pa dang ldan pa/ gzungs kyi sgo snang ba phyogs kun gyi dra ba rab tu thob pa/ gzungs kyi
153b2(phal chen): sgo rdo rje'i snying pos sems rab tu gsal bar byas pa/ ting nge 'dzin ye shes brtsegs pa rnam par 'phye ba'i yul la rnam par phye ba rab tu thob pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par spyod pa gzhi kun
153b3(phal chen): nas rnam par brgyan pa'i snying po yul du gyur pa/ ting nge 'dzin gyi snang ba sangs rgyas nam mkha'i snying po'i dkyil 'khor la rab tu zhugs pa/ ting nge 'dzin sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khor
153b4(phal chen): lo'i mu khyud kyis sems rab tu snang bar byas pa/ ting nge 'dzin gyi snang ba dus gsum gyi ye shes rin po che mi zad pa'i 'khor lo rab tu brtson pa des/ de bzhin gshegs pa la la'i zhabs kyi
153b5(phal chen): drung du ni nyin zhag gcig lon par shes so/ /la lar ni nyin zhag bdun lon pa snyam/ la lar ni zla ba phyed lon pa snyam/ la lar ni zla ba gcig lon pa snyam/ la lar ni lo gcig lon pa snyam/
153b6(phal chen): la lar ni lo brgyar lon pa snyam/ la lar ni lo stong lon pa snyam/ la lar ni lo brgya phrag stong lon pa snyam/ la lar ni lo bye ba lon pa snyam/ la lar ni lo bye ba brgya stong lon pa snyam/
153b7(phal chen): la lar ni lo bye ba stong lon pa snyam/ la lar ni lo bye ba brgya phrag stong lon pa snyam/ la lar ni lo bye ba khrag khrig lon pa snyam/ la lar ni bskal pa phyed lon pa snyam/ la lar ni bskal pa gcig lon
153b8(phal chen): pa snyam/ la lar ni bskal pa brgya lon pa snyam/ la lar ni bskal pa stong lon pa snyam/ la lar ni bskal pa brgya phrag stong lon pa snyam/ la lar ni bskal pa bye ba lon pa snyam/ la lar
154a1(phal chen): ni bskal pa bye ba phrag brgya lon pa snyam/ la lar ni bskal pa bye ba stong lon pa snyam/ la lar ni bskal pa bye ba brgya phrag stong lon pa snyam/ la lar ni bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya
154a2(phal chen): phrag stong lon pa snyam/ byed pa nas de bzhin gshegs pa la la'i zhabs kyi drung du ni bskal pa brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa snyed lon par gyur pa snyam byed de/ de bzhin gshegs pa la la'i
154a3(phal chen): zhabs kyi drung du ni bskal pa 'dzam bu'i gling gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed lon pa snyam byed pa nas/ bskal pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed lon pa snyam byed
154a4(phal chen): par gyur to/ /de nas drang srong 'jigs mchog dbyangs kyis/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs mthong ba dang / des yang bdag drang srong 'jigs mchog dbyangs kyi mdun du 'dug par shes par gyur
154a5(phal chen): to/ /de la drang srong 'jigs mchog dbyangs kyis smras pa rigs kyi bu dran mod/ smras pa 'phags pa dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi byin gyis rlabs kyis dran no/ /smras pa rigs kyi bu kho bos ni byang chub
154a6(phal chen): sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i rgyal mtshan 'di shes par zad na/ byang chub sems dpa' 'gro ba thams cad las khyad par du 'phags pa'i ye shes mngon par shes pa dang ldan
154a7(phal chen): pa'i ting nge 'dzin thob pa/ dus thams cad du 'khor lo bskor ba/ sangs rgyas kyi mtshan dang / ye shes mngon par bsgrub pa la mkhas pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa byung ba'i nyi ma la rnam
154a8(phal chen): par dmyigs pa'i rgyan rab tu thob pa/ dus gsum gyi yul skad cig gcig gis ye shes su yang dag par sdud pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du lus shin tu rnam par bkram pa chos kyi
154b1(phal chen): dbyings thams cad la ye shes snang ba'i rang bzhin dang ldan pa/ sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du mngon sum du mngon par langs pa/ sems can gyi bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du spyod pas/
154b2(phal chen): rnam par spyod pa dang 'thun pa'i tshul dang ldan pa 'dod pa bzhin du kun tu snang zhing dri ma med la 'od dang ldan pa'i ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor rnam par dag pa/ de dag gi spyod pa shes pa'am/ yon tan brjod
154b3(phal chen): pa'am/ smon lam gyi khyad par smos pa'am/ zhing gi mngon par 'du bya ba shes pa'am/ ye shes kyi yul la 'jug par bya ba'am/ ting nge 'dzin gyi spyod yul gyi rjes su 'brang bar bya ba'am/
154b4(phal chen): rdzu 'phrul dang rnam par 'phrul pa la 'jug par bya ba'am/ rnam par thar pa'i khyu mchog gi mthu phyung ba'am/ rnam par rtse ba'i rjes su 'brang bar bya ba'am/ lus rnam par phye ba'i mtshan ma gzung bar
154b5(phal chen): bya ba'am/ dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor rnam par dag pa brjod pa'am/ ye shes kyi snang ba rab tu stan par nus re skan/ /song rigs kyi bu lho phyogs kyi rgyud 'di nyid na yul yongs su tshol ba zhes
154b6(phal chen): bya ba yod de/ de na bram ze rgyal ba'i drod kyi skye mched ces bya ba 'dug gis/ de'i gan du song la ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du
154b7(phal chen): bgyi ba dris shig / de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs dga' rangs te/ mgu zhing nyams bde la tshim zhing yid bde ba skyes nas/ drang srong 'jigs mchog dbyangs kyi rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag
154b8(phal chen): 'tshal te/ drang srong 'jigs mchog dbyangs la lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas/ yang dang yang bltas te drang srong 'jigs mchog dbyangs kyi drung nas song ngo // //
155a1(phal chen): sangs rgyas rmad ga cad ces bya ba shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo/ bam po bcu gnyis pa/ de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs/ byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar
155a2(phal chen): pa gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i rgyal mtshan gyi ye shes kyis snang bar byas pa/ sangs rgyas kyi yul gyi rnam par 'phrul pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa la mngon sum du rnam par spyod pa/ byang chub sems
155a3(phal chen): dpa'i rnam par thar pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i mngon sum gyi ye shes kyis mngon par shes pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i ye shes kyis/ sems snang bar gyur pa dus
155a4(phal chen): thams cad du yang dag par 'jug pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi ye shes snang ba rab tu thob pa/ 'du shes kyi rnam pa thams cad la yang dag par 'jug pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi yul gyis snang bar gyur pa/ 'gro ba thams
155a5(phal chen): cad las khyad par du 'phags pa dang ldan pa'i ye shes snang ba thob pa/ thams cad kyi rjes su song ba'i spyod yul la rnam par spyod pa mngon tu gyur pa/ gnyis su rnam par rtog pa med pas mnyam
155a6(phal chen): pa nyid du bstan pa'i ye shes lhur len pa/ dmyigs pa thams cad la rab tu 'dal ba'i ye shes snang ba dang ldan pa/ mnyam pa thams cad la mngon du gyur pa'i bzod pa rnam par dag
155a7(phal chen): pa la mos pa'i mdzod la mkhas pa rang bzhin gyi chos la bzod pa khong du chud pa'i ye shes mngon par shes pa dang ldan pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i rang bzhin bsgom pa dang mi 'bral
155a8(phal chen): ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi shugs drag po las phyir mi ldog pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ stobs bcu'i ye shes snang ba'i 'od rab tu thob pa/ chos kyi
155b1(phal chen): dbyings brjod pa la mngon par mos pas/ ngoms pa med pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la rnam par spyod pa'i spyod yul la 'jug pas/ khong du chud pa'i sems dang ldan pa/
155b2(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i rgyan mtha' yas pa mngon par bsgrub pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam gyi dkyil 'khor mtha' yas pa/ rnam par sbyangs pa'i sems dang
155b3(phal chen): ldan pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams kyi dra ba mi bzad pa/ khong du chud pa'i ye shes mtha' dang dbus med pa mngon du gyur pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ sems can rgya mtsho mtha' yas pa yongs su smin par
155b4(phal chen): bya ba dang / gdul bar bya ba la zhum pa med pa'i sems dang ldan pa des/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i yul mtha' yas pa la yang dag par blta ba dang / 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud
155b5(phal chen): rnam pa tha dad pa mtha' yas pa la yang dag par lta ba dang / 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par phye ba sna tshogs mtha' yas pa la yang dag par blta ba dang / 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas pa dmyigs
155b6(phal chen): pa phra ba dang / yangs pa'i khongs su chud par bya ba la yang dag par blta ba dang / 'jig rten gyi khams kyi gzhi mtha' yas pa'i ming gi dra ba sna tshogs yang dag par blta ba dang / 'jig rten
155b7(phal chen): gyi khams su rnam par spyad pa/ rnam par gdags pa mtha' yas pa'i kun rdzob rnam pa tha dad pa la yang dag par blta ba dang / sems can gyi mos pa sna tshogs mtha' yas pa la yang dag par lta
155b8(phal chen): ba dang / sems can rnam par phye ba'i rnam pa tha dad pa/ mtha' yas pa la yang dag par blta ba dang / sems can mtha' yas pa yongs su smin par bya ba dang / gdul ba khong du chud par bya ba dang / yang dag
156a1(phal chen): par blta ba dang / sems can dang phyogs dang dus mtha' yas pa'i mying gi rnam pa sna tshogs la yang dag par blta ba dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen mngon du bya ba byed cing mthar gyis yul tshol
156a2(phal chen): ba dang ldan pa gang na ba dang / bram ze rgyal ba'i drod kyi skye mched ga la ba der phyin to/ /de'i tshe bram ze rgyal ba'i drod kyi skye mched thams cad bsgrub pa'i gzhir byas shing dka' thub drag po la spyod do/ /de'i
156a3(phal chen): phyogs bzhi nas me'i phung po ri rab tsam du che ba bus pa dang / ri shin tu mtho ba'i sa'i lam gyi rgyud spu gri'i sos gshibs pas 'khor bar snang ngo / /de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis/ bram ze
156a4(phal chen): rgyal ba'i drod kyi skye mched kyi rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ mdun du 'dug nas thal mo sbyar te/ 'di skad ces smras so/ /'phags pa bdag gis bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
156a5(phal chen): byang chub tu sems bskyed na/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab pa dang / ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba ma 'tshal te/ 'phags pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams la gdams
156a6(phal chen): ngag dang / rjes su bstan pa mdzad do zhes bdag gis thos na/ 'phags pa ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba bdag la bshad du
156a7(phal chen): gsol/ des smras pa rigs kyi bu song la spu gri'i so dar ba'i ri 'di la 'dzegs te/ me'i 'obs 'dir mchongs shig dang / des khyod kyi byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yongs su dag par 'gyur ro zhes
156a8(phal chen): nas/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs 'di snyam du sems par gyur te/ mi khom pa brgyad las rnam par ldog pa yang shin tu dkon/ myir gyur te khom pa phun sum tshogs shing /
156b1(phal chen): rnam par dag pa yang shin tu dkon/ sangs rgyas 'byung ba yang shin tu dkon/ dbang po nyams pa myed pa yang shin tu dkon/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thos pa yang shin tu dkon/ skyes bu dam pa dang phrad pa yang
156b2(phal chen): shin tu dkon/ yang dag pa'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen yang shin tu dkon/ yang dag pa'i tshul rjes su bstan pas legs par sdud pa yang shin tu dkon/ yang dag par 'tsho bar bya ba yang shin tu dkon/
156b3(phal chen): mi'i 'jig rten na chos dang gnyer ba'i chos la nan tan byed pa yang shin tu dkon na/ de skad zer zhing bdag gi dge ba'i bar chad la zhugs la de ltar bdag gi srog gcad par brtson pa 'di bdud dam gcig
156b4(phal chen): ma yin nam/ bdud kyis byin gyis brlabs pa 'am/ bdud kyi ris su gtogs pa'am/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen lhar rdzus pa 'am/ byang chub sems dpa' la myi chags pa byed pa zhig ma yin grang /
156b5(phal chen): bdag gi thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la bgegs byed par 'dod pa zhig ma yin grang / bdag lam gol ba ngan par zhugs par 'dod pa zhig ma yin grang / bdag gis sangs rgyas kyi chos khong du chud par
156b6(phal chen): bya ba'i chos kyi sgo la bgegs byed pa zhig ma yin grang / snyam nas/ de de ltar sems shing yid la byed pa'i tshe/ tshangs pa stong phrag bcu steng gi bar snang la gnas te/ 'di skad ces zer te/ rigs kyi
156b7(phal chen): bu de lta bu'i sems myi brtan par ma byed cig / rigs kyi bu 'phags pa 'di ni ting nge 'dzin rdo rje 'od 'phro ba'i snang ba rab tu thob pa ste/ brtson 'grus ldog pa myed pa'o/ /brtsams pa chen po
156b8(phal chen): mtha' dang dbus myed pa la zhugs pa'o/ /'gro ba thams cad kyi sred pa'i rlan bskam pa la mngon par brtson pa'o/ /lta ba'i rnam pa dang dra ba thams cad gtub pa la brtson pa'o/ /nyon mongs pa'i
157a1(phal chen): lcig lcig thams cad zad par bsreg pa la sta gon du gnas pa'o/ /mi khom mi shes pa'i bas mtha' dgon pa thams cad snang bar bya ba la brtson pa'o/ /sems can thams cad kyi rga shi'i
157a2(phal chen): g.yang sa dang / 'jigs pa rnam par bzlog pa la yi dam brtan pa'o/ /dus gsum gyi mun pa bsal ba la mngon par brtson pa'o/ /chos thams cad kyi 'od gzer dgye ba la zhugs pa'o/ /rigs
157a3(phal chen): kyi bu 'phags pa 'di dka' thub lngas yongs su gdung ba mdzad pa'i tshe/ tshangs pa ji snyed cig mkhan po dang dbang bsgyur ba dang / 'jig rten thams cad kyi gtso bor rang rang rlom zhing sems pa/ lta ba'i
157a4(phal chen): rnam pa sna tshogs la mngon par zhen pa/ de dag thams cad 'phags pa 'di'i dka' thub dang / brtul zhugs kyi thugs dam gyi mthus rang rang gi gnas na bag dga' ba med cing de dag bsam gtan gyi
157a5(phal chen): ro dga' ba myong ba med pas/ 'phags pa 'di'i drung du 'dong ngo / /de dag phyin pa dang / 'phags pa 'di'i rdzu 'phrul gyi sbyin pa dang / drag shul gyi dka' thub dang / brtul zhugs kyis zil gyis mnan
157a6(phal chen): te/ lta ba'i rnam pa thams cad rnam par bzlog pa dang / nga rgyal dang rlom sems thams cad rab tu spang ba'i phyir chos ston to/ /'gro ba thams cad la byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen pos bsam
157a7(phal chen): par bya ba dang / byang chub kyi bsam pa brtan par bya ba dang / byang chub tu sems bskyed pa shin tu yangs par bya ba dang / sangs rgyas thams cad yang dag par blta ba la mngon par brtson par bya ba dang /
157a8(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyi gsung gi dkyil 'khor thob par bya ba yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang / thams cad du grags pa'i sangs rgyas kyi dbyangs la thogs pa med cing sgrib pa med par bya ba'i phyir chos
157b1(phal chen): ston to/ /bdud stong phrag bcu yang steng gi bar snang la 'khod nas lha rdzas kyi nor bu rin po ches mngon par gtor te/ 'di skad ces 'dzer to/ /rigs kyi bu 'phags pa 'di dka' thub lngas kyang so so'i gdung
157b2(phal chen): ba mdzad pa'i tshe/ 'od 'phro ba'i phung po 'di las snang ba chen po byung zhing kho bo cag gi khyim dang / lus dang rgyan gyi longs spyod thams cad zil gyis gnon to/ /de'i phyir kho bo cag kyang so so'i
157b3(phal chen): gnas na dga' ba med pas 'khor dang bcas te 'phags pa 'di'i drung du 'dong ngo / /kho bo cag 'di'i drung du phyin nas kyang 'phags pa 'di ni kho bo cag ni ci nas rang rang gi sems so sor chud nas byang chub tu
157b4(phal chen): sems bskyed de/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ba de lta de ltar chos ston to/ /dbang bsgyur gyi lha'i rgyal po/ stong phrag bcus kyang lha rdzas kyi me tog gis
157b5(phal chen): mngon par gtor te/ 'di skad ces 'dzer to/ /rigs kyi bu 'phags pa 'di dka' thub lngas yongs su gdung ba byed pa'i tshe/ kho bo cag kyang rang rang gi gnas na dga' ba med de/ de ltar
157b6(phal chen): bdag cag kyang rang rang gi skye bo'i 'khor dang bcas te 'di'i drung du 'dong ngo / /bdag cag drung du phyin pa dang 'di ni bdag cag la rang rang gi sems la dbang bsgyur ba 'thob par bya ba'i phyir chos ston
157b7(phal chen): to/ /nyon mongs pa thams cad la dbang bsgyur ba thob par bya ba dang / bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du skye ba la dbang bsgyur ba thob par bya ba dang / las kyi sgrib pa thams cad rnam par
157b8(phal chen): dag pa'i dbang rab tu thob par bya ba dang / snyoms par 'jug pa thams cad la dbang bsgyur ba thob par bya ba dang / yo byad la dbang ba'i rgyan yongs su dag par bya ba dang / bsam pa ji lta ba
158a1(phal chen): bzhin du tshe la dbang bsgyur ba thob par bya ba'i phyir chos ston to/ /rab 'phrul dga' lha'i rgyal po stong phrag bcu yang steng gi bar snang la 'khod de/ lha rdzas kyi glu yang dag par sbyar ba'i nga ro snyan
158a2(phal chen): pa'i dbyangs bsgrags ste/ mchod pa byas nas 'di skad ces 'dzer to/ /rigs kyi bu 'phags pa 'di dka' thub lngas yongs su gdung ba mdzad pa'i tshe/ me'i phung po 'di las de dang 'dra ba'i 'od
158a3(phal chen): byung zhing des kho bo cag gi gzhal med khang 'di dag rnam par dag ste/ gsal ba dang 'od shin tu dang bar 'gyur to/ /rgyan 'di dag dang lha'i bu mo 'di dag kyang rnam par dag cing gsal la 'od shin tu
158a4(phal chen): dang bar 'gyur ro/ /de bas na bdag cag lha'i bu lha'i mo'i tshogs kyi 'khor dang bcas par 'dod pa la dga' bar tshor ba med do/ /'dod pa'i bde ba la mngon par dga' ba med pas lus dang sems
158a5(phal chen): tshim par gyur nas/ 'phags pa 'di'i drung du 'dong ba yin te/ 'phags pa 'di ni bdag cag de ltar phyin pa rnams la sems rnam par dag par bya ba'i phyir chos ston to/ /sems can
158a6(phal chen): gyi 'od 'dong bar bya ba dang / sems shin du dag par bya ba dang / sems las su rung bar bya ba dang / sems kyi dga' ba yongs su bskyed pa dang / stobs bcu'i ye shes thob pa rnam par dag par
158a7(phal chen): bya ba dang / chos kyi shugs chen po rnam par 'phel bar bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi sku tshad med pa mngon par bsgrub pa'i phyir lus rnam par dag par bya ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung thob
158a8(phal chen): par bya ba'i phyir rnam par dag par bya ba dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rab tu thob par bya ba'i sems rnam par dag par bya ba'i phyir chos ston to/ /rab dga' ldan gyi lha'i rgyal
158b1(phal chen): po stong phrag bcu lha'i bu dang / lha'i bu mo'i tshogs kyi 'khor dang bcas pa dag kyang steng gi bar snang la 'khod nas/ spos sna tshogs kyi phye ma'i sprin gyi char mngon par phab pas mchod pa byas te/ phyag
158b2(phal chen): 'tshal nas 'di skad ces 'dzer to/ /rigs kyi bu 'phags pa 'di dka' thub lngas yongs su gdung ba mdzad pa'i tshe/ bdag cag kyang rang rang gi gnas na dga' ba med de/ de ltar dga' ba med pas
158b3(phal chen): 'di'i drung du 'dong ste/ bdag cag phyin pa rnams la 'phags pa 'di ni yul thams cad la ltos pa med par bya ba'i phyir chos ston to/ /chog shes pa'i sems su bya ba dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba yang dag par
158b4(phal chen): bskyed pa dang / byang chub tu sems bskyed pa rab tu thob par bya ba nas/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir chos ston to/ /rab mtshe ma'i lha'i rgyal po stong phrag bcu lha'i
158b5(phal chen): bu dang / lha'i bu mo'i tshogs kyi 'khor dang bcas pa dag gis kyang lha rdzas kyi me tog man d+ha ra ba'i char mngon par phab ste/ 'di skad ces 'dzer to/ /rigs kyi bu 'phags pa 'di dka' thub lngas
158b6(phal chen): yongs su gdung ba mdzad pa'i tshe/ bdag cag kyang lha rdzas kyi glu snyan pa la dga' ba med de/ de ltar dga' ba med pas 'phags pa 'di'i drung du 'dong ste/ bdag cag phyin nas kyang 'phags pa 'di ni 'dod pa'i
158b7(phal chen): dga' ba thams cad rnam par bzlog par bya ba nas sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad rab tu thob par bya ba'i phyir chos ston to/ /lha'i dbang po brgya byin stong phrag bcu so so nas nye ba'i dbang po sum bcu
158b8(phal chen): rtsa gnyis dang / lha'i bu dang lha'i bu mo'i tshogs kyi 'khor dang bcas pas lha rdzas kyi gos dang / rin po che'i rgyan dang / me tog gi char mngon par phab ste/ 'di skad ces 'dzer to/ /
159a1(phal chen): rigs kyi bu 'phags pa 'di dka' thub lngas yongs su gdung ba mdzad pa'i tshe/ bdag cag kyang brgya byin gyi khang pa dang / bza' shing gi ra ba dang / rtse ba'i nags tshal dang / lha rdzas kyi rol
159a2(phal chen): mo brdung zhing dkrol ba dang / gam yo na glu len pa'i longs spyod la dga' ba med de/ de ltar bdag cag dga' ba med pas 'di'i drung du 'dong ngo / /bdag cag der phyin kyang 'phags pa 'di ni kho bo
159a3(phal chen): cag la 'dod pa'i dga' ba thams cad yongs su spang ba'i phyir chos ston to/ /'di dag thams cad ni rtag pa ma yin te/ mi brtan zhing 'jig par 'gyur ba'i chos can no zhes bya ba'i tshig brjod do/ /
159a4(phal chen): dregs pa dang bag med pa thams cad yongs su gcad pa dang / bla na med pa'i byang chub tu spro ba bskyed pa'i phyir chos ston to/ /rigs kyi bu gzhan yang 'dis bltas pa tsam gyis ri rab kyi rtse mo thams
159a5(phal chen): cad kyang g.yo bar 'gyur te/ des bdag cag gshig pas sems skyo bar gyur nas/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems brtan pas/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes su smon lam mngon
159a6(phal chen): par bsgrub bo/ /klu'i rgyal po shugs ldan dang / dga' bo dang nye dga' bo la stsogs pa/ klu brgya stong phrag bcu dag kyang steng gi bar snang la gnas shing dus dang 'thun pa'i lha rdzas kyi
159a7(phal chen): tsan dan gyi sprin dang / klu'i bu mos glu blangs pa'i nga ro snyan pa'i dbyangs dang / lha rdzas kyi spos chu'i rgyun rab tu 'bab pa'i char mngon par phab ste/ 'di skad ces 'dzer to/ /rigs kyi bu
159a8(phal chen): 'phags pa 'di dka' thub lngas yongs su gdung ba mdzad pa'i tshe/ me'i phung po chen po 'di las 'od chen po 'byung ste/ des klu'i gnas thams cad snang bar byas nas/ bye ma'i char dang /
