159b1(phal chen): nam mkha' lding gi 'jigs pa yongs su sel to/ /khro ba 'byung ba yang zhi bar byas te/ lus sim par byas nas yid shin tu mos par byed do/ /de ltar sems shin tu mos par gyur nas/ 'phags pa
159b2(phal chen): 'di ni bdag cag la chos ston te/ 'di ltar klu'i lam gyi rgyud ngan pa rnam par smad pa dang / sgrib pa'i las thams cad rab tu spang ba'i phyir nyes pa 'chags su btsud bla na med pa yang dag par
159b3(phal chen): rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed du btsud de thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la rab tu 'god do/ /gnod sbyin gyi dbang po stong phrag bcu yang nam mkha'i dbyings la 'khod do/ /mchod pa sna
159b4(phal chen): tshogs kyis bram ze rgyal ba'i drod kyi skye mched dang / tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs la mchod pa byas nas 'di skad ces 'dzer to/ /rigs kyi bu 'phags pa 'di dka' thub lngas yongs su gdung ba mdzad
159b5(phal chen): pa'i tshe/ kho bo cag gi 'khor kun kyang mi rnams la byams pa'i sems skye bar 'gyur te/ gnod sbyin dang srin po dang grul bum thams cad kyang byams pa'i sems dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /
159b6(phal chen): de dag byams pa'i sems dang ldan zhing 'tshe ba med pa la zhugs pa rnams kho bo cag gi drung du 'ong ngo / /kho bo cag kyang de ltar byams pa'i dbang gis zil kyis non pas/ rang rang gi gnas
159b7(phal chen): de dang de dag na dga' ba med de/ de ltar bdag cag kyang rang gi skye bo'i 'khor dang bcas te/ 'phags pa 'di'i drung du 'dong ngo / /'phags pa bdag cag de ltar 'ongs pa rnams la
159b8(phal chen): 'phags pa 'di'i sku las byung ba'i 'od kyis lus thams cad snang bar byas shing / bde bas khyab par mdzad de/ de ltar bdag cag lus dang sems bde bar gyur nas/ 'phags pa 'di
160a1(phal chen): ni ci nas kyang bdag cag la gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang grul bum dang / lus srul po mang po byang chub tu sems skye bar 'gyur ba de ltar chos ston to/ /dri za'i dbang po stong phrag bcu
160a2(phal chen): dag kyang steng gi bar snang la 'khod nas 'di skad ces 'dzer to/ /rigs kyi bu kho bo cag kyang rang rang gi gnas na 'khod pa'i tshe/ 'phags pa 'di dka' thub lngas yongs su gdung ba mdzad pa'i
160a3(phal chen): tshe/ me'i phung po 'di las 'od byung ste/ bdag cag gi gnas snang bar gyur to/ /de ltar bdag cag 'od des phog ste/ bde ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan par gyur pas/ 'phags
160a4(phal chen): pa 'di'i drung du 'dong ste/ bdag cag drung du phyin nas kyang 'phags pa 'di ni bdag cag ci nas kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ba de ltar chos ston
160a5(phal chen): to/ /lha ma yin gyi dbang po stong phrag bcu dag kyang rgya mtsho'i nang nas mngon par 'thon te/ nam mkha' la pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga btsugs te thal mo sbyar nas phyag 'tshal zhing 'di skad ces
160a6(phal chen): 'dzer to/ /rigs kyi bu 'phags pa 'di dka' thub lngas yongs su gdung ba mdzad pa'i tshe/ kho bo cag gi lha ma yin gyi 'jig rten rgya mtsho dang rir bcas pa'i sa chen po'i dkyil 'khor
160a7(phal chen): rab tu g.yo bar gyur te/ bdag cag kun gyi nga rgyal dang rlom sems dang / dregs pa thams cad brtul shugs dang / dka' thub kyi zil gyis non te/ 'phags pa 'di'i drung du 'dong ngo / /der phyin
160a8(phal chen): nas kyang 'phags pa 'di ni bdag cag la g.yo sgyu thams cad rab tu spang ba dang / chos zab mo'i bzod pa la gzud pa dang / mi g.yo ba'i chos nyid la rab tu dgod pa dang / stobs bcu'i ye shes
160b1(phal chen): yongs su grub par bya ba'i phyir chos ston to/ /nam mkha' lding gi dbang po shugs chen po 'dzin pa la stsogs pa nam mkha' lding gi dbang po stong phrag bcus kyang bram ze'i bu shin tu sdu gu'i
160b2(phal chen): gzugs su mngon par sprul te/ 'di skad ces 'dzer to/ /rigs kyi bu 'phags pa 'di dka' thub lngas yongs su gdung ba mdzad pa'i tshe/ me'i phung po 'di dag las 'od chen po byung ste/ bdag
160b3(phal chen): cag gi gnas snang bar byas nas/ yongs su g.yo bar byed do/ /des bdag cag kyang 'jigs shing skrag ste/ skyo ba'i yid dang ldan par gyur nas 'phags pa 'di'i drung du 'dong ngo / /'phags pa
160b4(phal chen): 'di yang bdag cag la chos ston cing / byams pa chen po la yang dag par sbyor ba mdzad do/ /snying rje chen po la yang dag par dgod pa mdzad do/ /'khor ba'i rgya mtshor 'jug pa la yang yang dag par
160b5(phal chen): sbyor ba mdzad do/ /'dod pa'i 'dam du bying ba'i sems can mngon par gdon par bya ba la'ang yongs su sbyor ba mdzad do/ /lhag pa'i bsam pa'i sgo rnam par dag par bya ba la'ang rab tu sbyor ba mdzad
160b6(phal chen): do/ /shes rab dang thabs shin tu gsal ba la 'ang yang dag par sbyor ba mdzad do/ /rnam pa ji lta bur yongs su smyin par bya ba can rnams gdul bar bya ba la'ang rab tu sbyor ba mdzad
160b7(phal chen): do/ /mi 'am ci'i dbang po stong phrag bcu yang steng gi bar snang la 'khod de 'di skad ces 'dzer to/ /rigs kyi bu 'phags pa 'di dka' thub lngas yongs su gdung ba mdzad pa'i tshe/
160b8(phal chen): kho bo cag gi gnas na 'khod pa'i tshe/ ta la'i phreng ba las dril bu'i dra ba rin po che'i srad bus lda ldir brgyus pa'i sil snyan dang / rol mo'i yo byad dang / rin po che'i rgyan dang / khyim gyi
161a1(phal chen): longs spyod thams cad las sangs rgyas kyi sgra 'byung ngo / /chos kyi sgra dang phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun gyi sgra dang / byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs pa'i smon
161a2(phal chen): lam gyi sgra 'byung ngo / /'jig rten gyi khams kyi grangs su bya ba che ge mo zhig na ni byang chub sems dpa' mying 'di dang 'di zhes bya ba zhig byang chub du smon lam 'debs so/ /'jig rten gyi khams
161a3(phal chen): kyi grangs su bya ba zhig na ni byang chub sems dpa'i mying 'di dang 'di zhes bya ba zhig dka' ba yongs su gtong ba byed do/ /'jig rten gyi khams kyi grangs su bya ba che ge mo zhig na ni byang chub sems dpa' mying
161a4(phal chen): 'di dang 'di zhes bya ba zhig thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor yongs su sbyong ba byed do/ /'jig rten gyi khams kyi grangs su bya ba che ge mo zhig na ni byang chub sems dpa' mying 'di dang 'di
161a5(phal chen): zhes bya ba zhig snying po byang chub tu 'gro'o/ /'jig rten gyi khams kyi grangs su bya ba che ge mo zhig na ni byang chub sems dpa' mying 'di dang 'di zhes bya ba zhig dpung dang bzhon par bcas pa'i
161a6(phal chen): bdud rab tu pham par byas te/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya'o/ /'jig rten gyi khams kyi grangs su bya ba che ge mo zhig na ni de bzhin gshegs pa mtshan
161a7(phal chen): 'di zhes bya ba zhig chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba mdzad do/ /'jig rten gyi khams kyi grangs su bya ba che ge mo zhig na ni de bzhin gshegs pa mtshan 'di zhes bya ba zhig sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las
161a8(phal chen): ma lus par mdzad nas/ phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa mdzad do/ /zhes bya ba'i sgra 'byin te rigs kyi bu 'dzam bu gling
161b1(phal chen): gi rtswa dang shing dang / yal ga dang lo ma dang 'dab ma thams cad rdul shin tu phra ba'i char blags pa'i mur thug par ni rung yang srid kyi de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi mtshan dang / byang chub sems dpa'
161b2(phal chen): rnams kyi smon lam dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la 'jug pa'i khyad par gang kho bo cag gi gnas na yod pa'i shing ta la'i phreng ba las rol mo'i yo byad dang / rin po che'i rgyan dang /
161b3(phal chen): khyim gyi longs spyod rlung gis bskyod pa'i sgra 'byung zhing / nga ro 'byin pa dang / rna lam du grags pa'i mtha' ni thug par mi rung ngo / /de ltar bdag cag kyang sangs rgyas dang chos dang dge 'dun dang / byang chub
161b4(phal chen): sems dpa' rab tu 'jug pa'i smon lam dang / spyod pa dang mtshan gyi chu klung gi sgras dga' ba chen po'i shugs drag pos nyams bde ba skyes te/ 'phags pa 'di'i drung du 'dong ngo / /de ltar
161b5(phal chen): bdag cag phyin par gyur nas kyang / 'phags pa 'di ni bdag cag la ci nas kyang / kho bo cag gi 'khor gyi sems can du ma zhig bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog
161b6(phal chen): par 'gyur ba de lta bur chos ston pa mdzad do/ /'dod pa la spyod pa'i lha'i bu stong phrag dpag tu med pa kha dog shin tu mdzes pa dag kyang nam mkha' la 'khod cing yid kyis sprul pa'i mchod
161b7(phal chen): pas mchod pa byas nas 'di skad ces 'dzer to/ /'phags pa 'di dka' thub lngas yongs su gdung ba mdzad pa'i tshe/ me'i phung po 'di dag las rnam pa 'di lta bu'i 'od 'byung ste/
161b8(phal chen): 'od des mnar med pa yan chad du sems can rnams snang bar byas nas/ sems can dmyal pa'i sems can kyi sdug bsngal rtse zil bar byas te/ 'od de nyid kyis 'phags pa 'di bdag
162a1(phal chen): cag gi myig lam du snang bar bstan pas de'i phyir kho bo cag kyang 'phags pa 'di la sems mos par gyur nas/ 'dod pa la spyod pa'i lha'i ris nyams su bde bar skyes so/ /de ltar
162a2(phal chen): bdag cag kyang 'phags pa 'dis mdzad pa la drin du gzo zhing mthong bas mi ngoms pas 'dod pa'i dga' ba thams cad yongs su spangs te/ 'phags pa 'di'i drung du 'dong ngo / /der bdag cag phyin nas
162a3(phal chen): kyang 'phags pa 'di ni ci nas kyang sems can tshad med pa rnams byang chub tu smon lam 'debs par 'gyur ba de ltar chos ston pa mdzad do/ /de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis chos kyi
162a4(phal chen): tshul gyi rnam pa 'di lta bu thos nas dga' rangs te/ mgu zhing nyams bde ba tshim zhing yid bde ba skyes te/ bram ze rgyal ba'i drod kyi skye mched la yang dag pa'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen du 'du shes
162a5(phal chen): bskyed de/ bram ze rgyal ba'i drod kyi skye mched gyi rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te 'di skad ces smras so/ /'phags pa de ltar bdag gis dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi bka' dang /
162a6(phal chen): 'gal bar bgyis pa'i nongs pa la nongs par bshags so/ /de nas bram ze rgyal ba'i drod kyi skye mched kyis/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ /byang chub
162a7(phal chen): sems dpa' gang zhig rjes su bstan dang 'thun byed cing / /dran pa nye bar gzhag ste bla ma'i ngag gcog mi byed na/ /de phyir de yi don rnams thams cad 'grub par 'gyur/ 'thun pa'i sangs
162a8(phal chen): rgyas ye shes byang chub drung du 'tshang yang rgya/ de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis ri'i g.yang sa'i lam spu gri'i so gshibs pa la 'dzegs te/ me'i phung po chen po der mchongs so/ /de ltar
162b1(phal chen): mchongs pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin shin tu brtan pa zhes bya ba thob par gyur to/ /mye des reg nas kyang byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin rab tu zhi ba'i bde ba mngon par shes pa
162b2(phal chen): zhes bya ba thob par gyur nas des 'di skad ces smras so/ /'phags pa me'i phung po la de ltar reg na bde ba dang ri'i lam spu gris gtams pa 'di yang de ltar reg na bde ba de ni ngo mtshar che'o/ /des
162b3(phal chen): smras pa/ rigs kyi bu kho bo ni byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa dkyil 'khor yongs su mi zad pa thob ste/ rigs kyi bu kho bos ni byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa'i dkyil
162b4(phal chen): 'khor yongs su mi zad pa 'di shes par zad na/ kho bos byang chub sems dpa' me'i phung po lta bu 'gro ba thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa dang / lta ba'i rnam pa thams cad yongs su zad par
162b5(phal chen): bya ba'i smon lam can ru mtshon phyir mi ldog pa dang ldan pa/ sems la thub pa med cing sems dma' ba med pa dang ldan pa/ yid zhum pa med pa can rdo rje'i snying po dang ldan pa'i mthu bo che lta
162b6(phal chen): bu brtsams pa chen po mthar phyin par bya ba la sgyid lug pa med pa sbyor ba lhod pa med pa/ rlung gi dkyil 'khor lta bur 'gro ba thams cad kyi don du brtson pa/ brtson 'grus phyir mi ldog
162b7(phal chen): pa dang ldan pa/ phyir mi zlogs pa'i go ca bgos pa/ de dag gi spyod pa shes pa'am/ yon tan brjod par nus re skan/ /song rigs kyi bu lho phyogs kyi rgyud 'di nyid na grong khyer seng ge rnam par
162b8(phal chen): bsgyings pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na rgyal po seng ge dpal gyi bu mo byams ma zhes bya ba bu mo lnga brgya'i 'khor dang bcas pa 'dug gis de'i gan du song la ji ltar byang chub sems dpas
163a1(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bya ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bya ba dris shig dang / de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis/ bram ze rgyal ba'i drod gyi skye mched
163a2(phal chen): kyi rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ bram ze rgyal ba'i drod kyi skye mched la lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas yang dang yang bltas te/ bram ze rgyal ba'i drod kyi
163a3(phal chen): skye mched kyi drung nas song ngo / /de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs dge ba'i bshes gnyen la rim gro bsam gyis myi khyab pa la zhugs pa mos pa rgya chen pos rnam par dag pa theg pa
163a4(phal chen): chen po la mngon du phyogs pa/ sangs rgyas kyi ye shes la mngon par mos pa/ sangs rgyas kyi chos la yang dag par zhugs pa/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi rjes su 'brang bar spro ba/ chos kyi rim
163a5(phal chen): gro la rnam par spyod pa/ chags pa med pa'i ye shes la mngon du gyur pa/ yang dag pa'i mtha' shin tu rtogs pa/ ye shes kyi mtha' la gnas pa'i yul dang ldan pa/ dus gsum skad cig
163a6(phal chen): gi cha shas la khong du chud par byed pa/ nam mkha'i mtha' gnyis su med pa mngon du gyur pa/ mi gnyis pa'i mtha' rnam par gdon mi za ba thob pa/ chos kyi dbyings kyi mtha' la rnam par
163a7(phal chen): mi rtog par gnas pa/ sgrib pa med pa'i mthas gdul ba khong du chud par bya ba la zhugs pa/ chos kyi mtha' dang mi 'gal bar bya ba la gzhol ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtha' la
163a8(phal chen): mtha' med par khong du chud pa/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mtha' la rnam par mi rtog par gnas pa/ sems can thams cad kyi 'du shes kyi dra ba rnam par gtor ba'i ye shes la gzhol ba/
163b1(phal chen): zhing la mngon par chags pa thams cad dang bral ba/ sangs rgyas kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad la chags pa med pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad yongs su dag par
163b2(phal chen): bya ba la gnas pa med par spyod pa/ sems can thams cad la bdag med pa dang / sems can med pa'i 'du shes dang ldan pa/ sgra thams cad tshig gi lam lta bur khong du chud pa/ gzugs
163b3(phal chen): thams cad gzugs kyi gzugs brnyan dang mnyam par rnam par rig par bya ba la gzhol ba de mthar kyis seng ge rnam par bsgyings pa'i grong khyer gang na ba der phyin te/ bu mo byams ma tshol
163b4(phal chen): zhing yongs su rmed rmed pa las/ rgyal po seng ge dpal gyi bu mo byams ma 'khor bu mo lnga brgya dang ldan pa de khang pa sna tshogs snang ba'i snying po zhes bya ba'i nang na khri tsan dan sbrul gyi snying po'i rkang pa
163b5(phal chen): can/ gser gyi lcag bod kyi dra bas legs par bres pa/ lha rdzas kyi bstan bting ba la 'dug cing chos ston to/ /zhes thos nas/ seng ge rnam par bsgyings pa'i grong khyer du song ste/
163b6(phal chen): rgyal po seng ge dpal gyi gnas gang na ba der phyin nas/ rgyal po'i phyi sgo'i sgo gang na bu mo byams ma mthong bar dga' ba'i phyir sdod cing 'dug 'dug pa dang / des der srog chags brgya phrag du ma dang /
163b7(phal chen): srog chags stong phrag du ma dang / srog chags brgya stong phrag du ma 'dong ba mthong nas/ khyed gang nas 'ongs/ da gang du 'dong zhes dris pa dang / de dag gis nged ni bu mo byams ma'i drung du chos
163b8(phal chen): mnyan pa'i phyir 'dong ngo zhes nas/ des bsam pa 'dir ni su 'gro yang 'gag pa med pa lta zhig snyam ste/ de yang nang du phyin to/ /de ltar phyin te bltas na khang pa rnam par snang
164a1(phal chen): ba'i snying po can de yang / gzhi shel du 'dug pa'i sa las blangs te/ bai DUr+ya'i ka ba bkye ba/ rtsig pa rdo rje las byas pa/ 'dzam bu chu klung gser gyi lhun dang ldan pa'i ba gam brgya phrag
164a2(phal chen): stong gis brgyan pa/ nor bu rin po che grangs med pas rnam par bres pa/ rin po che stong gi snying po'i me long gi dkyil 'khor gyis shin tu spang bar byas pa/ nor bu rin po che 'gro ba'i yid du
164a3(phal chen): 'ong bas rnam par brgyan pa/ rin po che'i shing thags grangs med pas yongs su bskor ba/ gser gyi dril bu brgya stong shin tu 'khrol ba'i sgra snyan pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rgyan dang ldan
164a4(phal chen): par mthong ngo / /bu mo byams ma de yang mig dkar nag 'byes pa/ skra 'thon ting du 'dug pa/ mdog gser gyi kha dog ltar 'dug pa mthong nas/ des rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/
164a5(phal chen): lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas/ thal mo sbyar te mdun du 'dug nas/ 'di skad ces smras so/ /'phags ma bdag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
164a6(phal chen): pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed na/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba ma 'tshal te/ 'phags ma ni byang chub
164a7(phal chen): sems dpa' rnams la gdams ngag dang rjes su bstan pa mdzad do zhes bdag gis thos na/ 'phags ma ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi
164a8(phal chen): ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba bdag la bshad du gsol/ smras pa rigs kyi bu kho mo'i gnas kyi rgyan la ltos shig /ces des kun tu byung te/ ltas pa dang / rtsig pa re re dang /
164b1(phal chen): ka ba re re dang / me long gi dkyil 'khor re re dang / rnam pa'i bye brag re re dang / dbyibs re re dang / nor bu rin po che re re dang / gser gyi dril bu re re dang / rin po che'i shing re re dang / ba spu'i bu ga
164b2(phal chen): re re dang / rin po che'i se mo do re re las kyang / chos kyi dbyings thams cad na bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thog ma thugs bskyed pa dang bcas pa/ spyod pa dang smon lam gyi yul
164b3(phal chen): dang bcas pa/ 'byung ba'i rgyan dang bcas pa/ mngon par 'tshang rgya ba'i rnam par 'phrul pa dang bcas pa/ chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang bcas pa/ yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba ston pa dang
164b4(phal chen): bcas par gzugs brnyan gyi tshul du mthong bar gyur to/ /dmyigs pa de dag re re las ji lta ba bzhin du dmyigs pa thams cad las kyang mthong bar gyur to/ /'di lta ste dper na chus yongs
164b5(phal chen): su gang ba'i mtsho dang zhing rnyog pa med la rnam par gsal ba la ni nam mkha'i nyi ma zla ba dang / skar ma'i tshogs kyis brgyan pa/ gzugs brnyan gyi tshul du yongs su snang ngo / /de bzhin du
164b6(phal chen): khang pa rnam par snang ba'i snying po'i dmyigs pa re re las kyang chos kyi dbyings de na bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad gzugs brnyan gyi tshul du yongs su snang bar gyur te/ de ni bu mo
164b7(phal chen): byams ma'i sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i rgyu'i phyir te/ des de ltar rnam par bltas nas/ sangs rgyas mthong ba'i rgyan gyi mtshan ma de yongs su bzung ste/ thal mo sbyar nas/ bu mo byams
164b8(phal chen): ma'i gdong du bltas pa dang / des smras pa/ rigs kyi bu kho mo ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo'i rgyud kun nas rnam par brgyan pa zhes bya ba thob ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i
165a1(phal chen): sgo'i rgyud 'di ni kho mos de bzhin gshegs pa chu klung gang ga'i klung sum bcu rtsa drug gi bye ma snyed las yongs su btsal ba ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis kyang shes rab kyi pha rol
165a2(phal chen): tu phyin pa'i sgo'i rgyud kun nas rnam par brgyan pa 'di sgo sna tshogs kyi khong du chud par bya bas rtogs par mdzad de/ gcig gis gang gsungs pa de 'ang gnyis kyis ma gsungs so/ /smras pa 'phags
165a3(phal chen): ma shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo'i rgyud kun nas rnam par brgyan pa 'di yul ji lta bu zhig mchis/ smras pa rigs kyi bu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo'i rgyud kun nas rnam par
165a4(phal chen): brgyan pa 'di la kho mos mngon du byed cing / sems pa dang rjes su 'brang bar bya ba dang / rnam par dpyod pa dang / rjes su sems dpa' dang / dran par bya ba dang / yongs su gzung ba dang /
165a5(phal chen): rnam par brtag pa dang / mngon par bsgrub pa dang / yang dag par brgyan par bya ba dang / rab tu rnam par dbye ba byed pa'i tshe/ gzungs kun nas sgo zhes bya ba yongs su skye ste/ gzungs kyi
165a6(phal chen): dkyil 'khor der ni chos kyi sgo brgya stong grangs med pa phrag bcu yongs su 'du'o/ /khong du chud do/ /mngon du 'gyur to/ /mngon par 'du'o/ /khongs na 'khod do/ /'di lta ste sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi
165a7(phal chen): sgo dang / sangs rgyas kyi sgo dang / chos kyi sgo dang / sems can gyi sgo dang / 'das pa'i sgo dang / ma 'ongs pa'i sgo dang / da ltar byung ba'i sgo dang / gnas pa'i mtha'i sgo dang / bsod nams kyi sgo
165a8(phal chen): dang / bsod nams kyi tshogs kyi sgo dang / ye shes kyi sgo dang / ye shes kyi tshogs kyi sgo dang / smon lam gyi rnam pa'i sgo dang / spyod pa'i sgo dang / spyod pa rnam par dag pa'i sgo dang /
165b1(phal chen): spyod pa yongs su 'byung ba'i sgo dang / spyod pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i sgo dang / las kyi sgo dang / las dang mi 'gal ba'i sgo dang / las kyi rgyan kyi sgo dang / las mngon par 'du bya ba'i sgo dang / mi
165b2(phal chen): mnyam pa'i las yongs su spang ba'i sgo dang / yang dag pa'i las la nan tan du bya ba'i sgo dang / las la dbang bsgyur ba'i sgo dang / legs par spyad pa'i sgo dang / legs par spyad pa yang dag par blang
165b3(phal chen): ba'i sgo dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo dang / ting nge 'dzin khong du chud par bya ba'i sgo dang / ting nge 'dzin la rnam par spyad pa'i sgo dang / ting nge 'dzin kyi spyod yul gyi sgo dang / ting nge 'dzin las ldang ba'i sgo
165b4(phal chen): dang / mngon par shes pa'i sgo dang / sems rgya mtsho'i sgo dang / sems can rnam grangs kyi sgo dang / sems kyi rgyud yongs su dag par bya ba'i sgo dang / sems kyi thibs po snang bar bya ba'i sgo dang / sems
165b5(phal chen): kyi mtsho dang bar bya ba'i sgo dang / sems 'byung ba'i sgo dang / sems rnam par rgyu ba'i sgo dang / sems can kun nas nyon mongs pa rgyu ba'i sgo dang / nyon mongs pa'i bag chags kyi sgo dang / nyon mongs
165b6(phal chen): pa'i sbyor ba'i sgo dang / mos pa'i sgo dang / sems can gyi spyod pa'i sgo dang / sems can gyi spyod pa rnam pa tha dad pa'i sgo dang / 'jig rten 'byung ba'i sgo dang / sems can gyi bsam pa'i sgo
165b7(phal chen): dang / sems can gyi 'du shes kyi rnam pa'i sgo dang / phyogs kyi sgo dang / chos kyi phyogs kyi sgo dang / snying rje chen po'i sgo dang / byams pa chen po'i sgo dang / zhi ba'i sgo dang / ngag gi lam gyi
165b8(phal chen): sgo dang / tshul gyi sgo dang / khong du chud par bya ba'i sgo dang / rnam par phye ba'i sgo dang / yang dag par 'du bya ba'i sgo dang / chags pa med pa'i mtha'i sgo dang / kun gyi sgo dang / sangs rgyas kyi
166a1(phal chen): chos kyi sgo dang / byang chub sems dpa'i chos kyi sgo dang / nyan thos kyi chos kyi sgo dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi sgo dang / 'jig rten gyi chos kyi sgo dang / 'jig rten 'byung ba'i
166a2(phal chen): chos kyi sgo dang / 'jig rten 'jig pa'i chos kyi sgo dang / 'jig rten kun nas gnas pa'i sgo dang / 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par dag pa'i sgo dang / 'jig rten gyi khams kun nas nyon mongs pa'i sgo
166a3(phal chen): dang / 'jig rten gyi khams kun nas nyon mongs pa la rnam par dag pa'i sgo dang / 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par dag pa la kun nas nyon mongs pa'i sgo dang / 'jig rten gyi khams gcig tu kun nas nyon
166a4(phal chen): mongs pa'i sgo dang / 'jig rten gyi khams gcig tu rnam par dag pa'i sgo dang / 'jig rten gyi khams gzhi mnyam pa nyid du khong du chud par bya ba'i sgo dang / 'jig rten gyi khams snrel bzhi'i sgo dang / 'jig
166a5(phal chen): rten gyi khams spyi'u tshugs su rgyu ba'i sgo dang / myig 'phrul du 'jug pa'i sgo dang / 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud kyi sgo dang / gnas kyi 'du shes kyi rnam par gyur pa'i sgo dang / phra ba rgya chen por khong du chud
166a6(phal chen): par bya ba'i sgo dang / rgya chen po phra bar khong du chud par bya ba'i sgo dang / sangs rgyas kyi mthong bar bya ba'i sgo dang / sangs rgyas kyi sku rnam pa tha dad pa'i sgo dang / sangs rgyas kyi 'od gzer gyi dra ba rnam
166a7(phal chen): pa tha dad pa'i sgo dang / sangs rgyas kyi gsung gi dkyil 'khor rnam par phye ba'i sgo dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi 'khor lo mngon par bsgrub pa'i sgo dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi 'khor lo tha myi dad pa'i
166a8(phal chen): sgo dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi 'khor lo nges pa'i tshig gi sgo dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi 'khor lo kun tu 'khor ba'i sgo dang / sangs rgyas kyi phrin las kyi sgo dang / sangs rgyas kyi
166b1(phal chen): 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor gyi sgo dang / sangs rgyas kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rnam par phye ba'i sgo dang / sangs rgyas kyi 'khor lo dkyil 'khor rgya mtshor 'jug pa'i sgo dang / sangs rgyas kyi stobs snang
166b2(phal chen): ba'i sgo dang / sangs rgyas kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo dang / sangs rgyas kyi ting nge 'dzin gyis rnam par 'phrul pa'i sgo dang / sangs rgyas kyi rnam par spyod pa'i sgo dang / sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyi sgo dang /
166b3(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyi sprul pa'i sgo dang / sangs rgyas kyi sems can pha rol gyi sems thugs su chud pa'i sgo dang / sangs rgyas kyi rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par 'phrul pa'i sgo dang / dga' ldan gyi pho brang na
166b4(phal chen): bzhugs pa'i sgo nas yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba bstan pa'i bar gyi sgo dang / sems can gyi don tshad myed pa mdzad pa'i sgo dang / chos zab mo'i tshul gyi sgo dang / chos sna tshogs kyi tshul gyi sgo dang /
166b5(phal chen): byang chub kyi sems kyi chos kyi rnam pa'i sgo dang / byang chub kyi sems 'byung ba'i rnam pa'i chos kyi sgo dang / byang chub kyi sems kyi tshogs kyi rnam pa'i sgo dang / smon lam gyi rnam pa'i sgo dang / spyod pa'i rnam
166b6(phal chen): pa'i sgo dang / mngon par shes pa'i rnam pa'i sgo dang / 'byung ba'i rnam pa'i sgo dang / gzungs rnam par dag pa'i rnam pa'i sgo dang / ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor rnam par dag pa'i rnam pa'i sgo dang / shes rab
166b7(phal chen): yongs su dag pa'i rnam pa'i sgo dang / byang chub tshad myed pa'i rnam pa'i sgo dang / dran pa rnam par dag pa'i rnam pa'i sgo dag ste/ rigs kyi bu de ltar kho mos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo'i
166b8(phal chen): rgyud dran pas kun nas rnam par brgyan pa 'di shes par zad na/ kho mos byang chub sems dpa' sems nam mkha'i dbyings dang mnyam pa/ blo gros chos kyi dbyings ltar yangs pa/ rgyud bsod
167a1(phal chen): nams kyi tshogs kyis brtan pa/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'i lam du zhugs pa/ 'jig rten gyi chos yongs su mi rgyu ba/ ye shes snang ba'i myig rab rib med pa rab tu thob pa/ chos kyi
167a2(phal chen): dbyings thams cad mun pa med par khong du chud pa/ blo nam mkha' ltar tshad med pa dang ldan pa/ dmyigs pa thams cad kyi rjes su song ba'i myig can/ chags pa med pa'i snang ba'i snying po dang ldan
167a3(phal chen): pa/ chos thams cad kyi don rab tu dbye ba la mkhas pa/ zil gyis gnon la/ 'jig rten kun gyi zil gyis gnon pa/ 'jig rten gyi spyod pa'i tshul la rnam par spyod pa/ 'jig rten gyi
167a4(phal chen): lam gyi rgyud thams cad na kha na ma tho ba med pa/ 'jig rten gyi don byed pa la brtson pa/ 'gro ba thams cad kyi rten du gyur pa/ 'gro ba thams cad kyi ngag gi tshul dang rnam pa la mkhas pa/ 'gro ba
167a5(phal chen): thams cad du gnas pa'i bsam pa dang ldan pa/ bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du rnam par dmyigs pa ston pa/ dus kyi 'khor lo thams cad la dbang bsgyur ba de dag gi spyod pa shes pa'am/
167a6(phal chen): yon tan brjod par nus re skan/ /drang srong rigs kyi bu lho phyogs kyi rgyud 'di nyid na yul myig gsum pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na dge slong blta na sdug pa zhes bya ba 'dug gis/ de'i gan du song
167a7(phal chen): la ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bya ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bya ba dris shig /de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis bu mo byams ma'i rkang pa
167a8(phal chen): gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ bu mo byams ma la lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas yang dang yang bltas te/ bu mo byams ma'i drung nas song ngo / /de nas tshong
167b1(phal chen): dpon gyi bu nor bzangs byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes kyi rnam par spyod pa zab mo rjes su bsam pa dang / chos kyi dbyings kyi gzhi zab mo khong du chud par bya ba rjes su bsam pa dang / sems
167b2(phal chen): can gyi ye shes shin tu phra zhing zab pa rjes su bsam pa dang / 'jig rten gyi 'du shes kyi rnam pa zab mo rjes su bsam pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i dbyings zab mo rjes su bsam
167b3(phal chen): pa dang / sems kyi rgyud kyi dbyings zab mo rjes su bsam pa dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i dbyings zab mo rjes su bsam pa dang / rang bzhin gyis dben pa'i dbyings zab mo
167b4(phal chen): rjes su bsam pa dang / 'gro ba thams cad kyi rnam par dpyod pa bden pa'i dbyings zab mo rjes su bsam pa dang / chos kyi dbyings brgyan pa'i dbyings zab mo rjes su bsam pa dang / lus
167b5(phal chen): kyi 'khrul 'khor shugs gyis 'khor ba'i dbyings zab mo rjes su bsam pa dang / las kyis sna tshogs su gyur pa'i dbyings zab mo rjes su bsam pa byed cing mthar gyis yul myig gsum
167b6(phal chen): pa gang na ba der phyin te/ yul gyi 'khor dang / grong khyer gyi 'khor dang / tshong dus kyi 'khor dang / grong rdal gyi 'khor dang / yul gru'i 'khor dang / lhas kyi 'khor dang / drang srong dge ba
167b7(phal chen): sbyong ba'i gnas kyi 'khor dang / yul dang phyogs kyi 'khor dang / chu'i rgyud kyi 'khor dang / ri'i sul gyi 'khor dang / nags tshal chen po'i 'khor dag du dge slong blta na sdug pa yongs su
167b8(phal chen): tshol tshol ba las des dge slong blta na sdug pa nags tshal sdug po zhig na/ gzhon zhing dar la bab pa/ gzugs mdzes shing sdug la blta na yid du 'ong ba/ skra 'thon ting g.yas
168a1(phal chen): phyogs su 'khyil ba dang ldan pa/ mgo gdugs ltar 'dug pa/ gtsug gtor gyi spyi bo can/ dpral ba yangs pa/ myig dkar nag 'byes shing ring la/ rdzi ma ba'i rdzi ma ltar 'dug pa/
168a2(phal chen): sna'i dbyibs legs shing bzang la/ ran par mdzes pa dang ldan pa/ mchu tshal ltar mdog bzang shing shin tu legs pa dang ldan pa/ so mnyam zhing thags bzang la/ shin tu dkar ba bzhi bcu
168a3(phal chen): tshang ba dang ldan pa/ 'gram pa'i lha nga seng ge ltar 'dug pa/ mkhur ba shas gang zhing rgyas pa/ smyin tshugs gzhu ltar 'dug cing ring la/ shin tu mdzes pa/ mdzod spu zla ba'i kha dog ltar
168a4(phal chen): 'dug pa'i thig le can/ rna shal ring zhing lhod par 'phyang ba/ zla ba nya ba ltar bzhin mdangs dang ldan zhing shin tu bzang ba/ mgul zlum zhing dung ltar mdzes pa/ snying ka dpal gyi be'us
168a5(phal chen): brgyan pa/ ro stod seng ge'i stod ltar 'dug pa/ thal gong shin tu rgyas pa/ dpung mgo'i lhun legs shing zlum pa/ lag pa ring ba/ dra bas 'brel pa'i sor mo can/ rka lag 'khor los
168a6(phal chen): brgyan pa/ rka lag 'jam zhing gzhon la sha rgyas pa/ bdun shin tu mtho ba/ rked pa rdo rje ltar 'dug pa/ lus che zhing drang ba/ brla zlum pa/ pho mtshan gsang ba'i sbubs su 'dug pa/
168a7(phal chen): byin pa ri dgas e na ya'i byin pa ltar 'dug pa/ sor mo ring ba/ rkang pa'i gting pa yangs pa/ 'od 'dom gang ba dang ldan pa/ mdog gser gyi kha dog ltar 'dug pa/ ba spu re re nas g.yas
168a8(phal chen): phyogs su gyen du 'khyil ba/ shing n+ya gro da'i rgyal po ltar chu zheng gab pa/ lus mtshan dang dpe byad bzang pos shin tu brgyan pa/ myig myi 'gebs shing mi rgod pa/ dran pa nye bar
168b1(phal chen): gnas pa/ ri'i rgyal po kha ba can ltar rtswa dang / nags tshal dang / sman dang shing phran sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa/ blo shin tu yangs pa/ ye shes kyi spyod yul dang / yul la thub pa med pa/ dbyings kyi
168b2(phal chen): dkyil 'khor gyi rgyan sprin gyi sgra lta bu dang ldan pa/ g.yo ba dang rlom sems dang / g.yeng ba dang spros pa thams cad dang bral ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ ye shes kyi spyod yul ma 'dres pa/ sangs rgyas kyi
168b3(phal chen): yul rgya chen po'i snang ba thob pa/ sems can thams cad yongs su smyin par bya ba dang / gdul ba'i bsam pa rgyun myi 'chad pa/ snying rje chen po'i dkyil 'khor shin tu yangs pa skyes pa/ de bzhin
168b4(phal chen): gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi tshul yongs su gzung ba dang / sems can thams cad kyi ye shes snang ba bskyed pa'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshul rjes su dran zhing 'gro ba thams cad kyi
168b5(phal chen): don du 'chag pa la zhugs te/ drag dal med cing pad ral myed la shin tu mdzes par 'chag pa/ gnas gtsang ma'i lha'i gos dang ldan pa/ lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang dri za dang / lha ma yin dang /
168b6(phal chen): nam mkha' lding dang / myi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / brgya byin dang tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten gyi mgon po dang / myi dang myi ma yin pas bskor cing 'dug pa mthong ngo / /dge slong blta na mdzes
168b7(phal chen): pa de 'chag pa'i tshe/ phyogs mngon du gyur pa'i phyogs kyi lha rnams phyogs kyi dkyil 'khor yongs su bsgrub pa byed do/ /rkang gis 'gro ba'i lha rnams rin po che'i pad mos gom pa 'dor ba'i tshe/
168b8(phal chen): yongs su blang ba byed do/ /mye'i lha snang ba'i dkyil 'khor zad myi shes pa rnams kyang / mun pa dang rab rib rnam par sel to/ /'dzam bu rgyal mtshan gyi nags tshal gyi lha rnams kyang me tog mang
169a1(phal chen): po'i char mngon par 'bebs so/ /sa'i lha mi g.yo ba'i snying po can rnams kyang rin po che'i 'byung gnas mang po ston to/ /nam mkha'i lha kun nas snang ba'i dpal dang ldan pa rnams
169a2(phal chen): kyang nam mkha'i dbyings yongs su brgyan pa byed do/ /mtsho'i lha dpal kun nas 'byung ba rnams kyang rin po che dam pa mang pos mngon par 'thor to/ /ri rab kyi lha dri ma med pa'i snying po can
169a3(phal chen): rnams kyang thal mo sbyar cing phyag 'tshal to/ /rlung gi lha thogs pa med pa'i stobs can rnams kyang / spos dang / bdug spos dang / me tog 'thor ba'i rlung rab tu 'gyed do/ /mtshan mo'i
169a4(phal chen): lha gnas par byed pa lus shin tu rgyan pa rnams kyang lus shin tu btud cing phyag 'tshal lo/ /nyin mo'i lha rtag tu bsad par byed pa'i dkyil 'khor can rnams kyang nor bu rin po che phyogs
169a5(phal chen): snang bar byed pa'i rgyal mtshan thogs shing / snang ba bskyed pa'i phyir nam mkha'i dbyings la 'khod do/ /de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs dge slong blta na sdug pa gang na ba der phyin nas/
169a6(phal chen): dge slong blta na sdug pa'i rkang pa'i bol gnyis la spyi bos btugs te phyag 'tshal nas/ dge slong blta na sdug pa'i rkang pa'i bol gnyis la bzhin sbyar te/ legs par phyis nas
169a7(phal chen): mdun du 'dug ste/ thal mo sbyar nas 'di skad ces smras so/ /'phags pa bdag ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs nas/ byang chub sems dpa'i
169a8(phal chen): spyod pa yongs su tshol ba zhig lags te/ 'phags pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams la gdams ngag dang / rjes su ston pa mdzad do zhes bdag gi thos na/ 'phags pa ji ltar
169b1(phal chen): byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba bdag la bshad du gsol/ des smras pa/ rigs kyi bu kho bo ni tshes btab na dar
169b2(phal chen): la bab pa/ rab tu byung bas btab na gsar du zhugs pa ste/ rigs kyi bu kho bos ni tshe de 'dra ba gcig gis de bzhin gshegs pa gang ga'i klung sum bcu rtsa brgyad kyi drung du tshangs par spyod pa
169b3(phal chen): spyad de/ bdag gi de bzhin gshegs pa la la'i zham ring du ni nyin zhag gcig du tshangs pa'i spyod pa spyad do/ /la lar ni nyin zhag bdun du/ la lar ni zla ba phyed du/ la lar ni zla ba gcig du/
169b4(phal chen): la lar ni lo gcig du/ la lar ni lo brgyar/ la lar ni lo stong du/ la lar ni lo brgya phrag stong du/ la lar ni lo bye bar/ la lar ni lo bye ba khrag khrig du/ la lar ni lo brjod du med pa'i
169b5(phal chen): yang brjod du med par/ la lar ni bskal pa bar ma/ la lar ni bskal pa phyed du/ la lar ni bskal par/ bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa la la'i zham ring du ni/ bskal pa brjod
169b6(phal chen): du med pa'i yang brjod du med par tshangs pa'i spyod pa spyad de/ bskal pa bgrang ba'i tshul 'di nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad las chos bstan pa thos te/ gdams ngag dang /
169b7(phal chen): rjes su bstan pa yang dag par blangs so/ /smon lam gyi rgyun yongs su sbyangs so/ /yang dag par bsgrub pa'i yul la zhugs so/ /spyod pa'i dkyil 'khor yongs su sbyangs so/ /pha rol tu
169b8(phal chen): phyin pa brgya mtshor yongs su rdzogs par byas so/ /mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'i rnam par 'phrul pa yongs su shes par byas so/ /de dag gis chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba
170a1(phal chen): phan tshun ma 'dres pa dag kyang yongs su bzung ngo / /de dag gi spobs pa mnyam pa nyid kyang khong du chud par byas so/ /de dag gis bstan pa yang dam pa'i chos zad pa'i mthar thug gi
170a2(phal chen): bar du yongs su bzung ngo / /kho bos de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad kyi sngon gyi smon lam rnams kyang smon lam gyi dkyil 'khor gyi ting nge 'dzin mngon par bsgrub pa'i stobs kyis rang
170a3(phal chen): gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba'i phyir mngon par bsgrubs so/ /kho bos de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad kyi sngon gyi byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rnams kyang spyod pa
170a4(phal chen): thams cad la 'jug pa'i ting nge 'dzin thob pa'i stobs kyis rang gi spyod pa yongs su dag par bya ba'i phyir mngon par bsgrubs so/ /kho bos de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad kyi pha rol
170a5(phal chen): tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa yang kun tu bzang po'i spyod pas 'byung ba'i stobs kyis mngon par bsgrubs so/ /gzhan yang rigs kyi bu kho bo 'chag sa 'di na 'chag pa'i tshe/ phyogs kyi rgyud kyi sgo thams
170a6(phal chen): cad kyang shin tu rnam par lta ba'i ye shes kyi sgos mngon du 'gyur ro/ /'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud sgo thams cad kyang smon lam chen po mngon par bsgrub pa'i stobs kyis sems bskyed pa gcig
170a7(phal chen): la 'jig rten gyi khams brjod du med pa'ang zhing yongs su dag par bya ba'i phyir rnam par 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /sems kyi skad cig gcig la sems can gyi spyod pa'i tshul gyi sgo brjod du
170a8(phal chen): med pa'i yang / brjod du med pa dag kyang byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa dang / smon lam mngon par bsgrub pa'i stobs kyis stobs bcu'i ye shes yongs su
170b1(phal chen): rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir mngon sum du 'gyur ro/ /sems bskyed pa gcig la sangs rgyas brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa mthong ba rnams kyang snga phyi'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la mchod
170b2(phal chen): pa'i smon lam mngon par bsgrub pa'i stobs kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed la mchod pa dang / bsnyen
170b3(phal chen): bkur ba dang / rim gro bya ba'i phyir mngon du 'gyur ro/ /sems bskyed pa gcig la de bzhin gshegs pa brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i chos kyi sprin gyi char rnams kyang chos
170b4(phal chen): kyi 'khor lo yongs su 'dzin pa'i gzungs dang / smon lam mngon par bsgrub pa'i stobs kyis/ chos kyi tshul grangs med pa rnam par 'tshang rgya zhing khong du chud par bya ba'i phyir bsam
170b5(phal chen): pa la mngon par 'bad do/ /sems bskyed pa gcig la byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rgya mtsho brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa dag kyang byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa myig 'phrul lta bur
170b6(phal chen): yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i smon lam mngon par bsgrub pa'i stobs kyis spyod pa'i dkyil 'khor thams cad yongs su dag par bya ba'i phyir mngon du 'gyur ro/ /sems bskyed pa gcig la ting
170b7(phal chen): n ge 'dzin brgya mtsho brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa dag kyang ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo gcig tu ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo thams cad yang dag par 'du bar bya ba'i smon lam bsgrub pa'i stobs kyis ting nge
170b8(phal chen): 'dzin gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad yongs su dag par bya ba'i phyir mngon du 'gyur ro/ /sems bskyed pa gcig la dbang po rgya mtsho brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa dag kyang dran pa'i mthar
171a1(phal chen): phyin pa'i dbang po thob par bya ba'i smon lam mngon par bsgrub pa'i stobs kyis dbang po'i 'khor lo dang / dus gyi 'khor lo thams cad kyi rjes su 'brang bar bya ba'i phyir mngon du 'gyur
171a2(phal chen): ro/ /sems bskyed pa gcig la dus kyi 'khor lo brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa dag kyang sems can zad mi shes pa zad par bya ba'i smon lam mngon par bsgrub pa'i stobs kyis
171a3(phal chen): dus thams cad du chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor ba'i phyir mngon du 'gyur ro/ /sems bskyed pa gcig la dus rgya mtsho brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa thams cad kyang dus gcig tu rnam par
171a4(phal chen): dgod pa'i tshul khong du chud par ye shes snang ba'i smon lam mngon par bsgrub pa'i stobs kyis/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi dus gsum rnam par dgod pa'i phyir mngon sum du gyur
171a5(phal chen): te/ rigs kyi bu kho bos ni byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa shin tu zhi bar mi 'gyur ba'i sgron ma zhes bya ba 'di shes par zad na/ kho bos byang chub sems dpa' bsam pa rdo rje lta bu
171a6(phal chen): dang ldan pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs su rigs dang ldan par 'byung ba/ srog gi dbang po la rgyun chad pa med pa/ ye shes kyi sgron ma zhi bar 'gyur ba med pa/ mi shigs
171a7(phal chen): pa mi phyed pa'i lus dang ldan pa/ sgyu ma'i rnam pa lta bu'i gzugs shin tu grub pa/ rgyu'i chos dang mnyam pa'i yan lag dang / nying lag du ldan pa'i lus can 'gro ba rnams kyis
171a8(phal chen): bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du rnam par dmyigs par byed pa'i lus dang ldan pa/ 'gro ba thams cad dang 'dra ba'i gzugs dang lus dang kha dog dang / dbyibs dang chu zheng
171b1(phal chen): yongs su ston pa/ me mdag dang me lce dang / dug dang mtshon gyis mi tshugs pa'i lus dang ldan pa rdo rje ltar sra zhing 'khor yug ltar thug pa med pa'i lus can/ bdud dang phas kyis rgol
171b2(phal chen): ba thams cad kyi stobs kyi stobs med par byed pa/ 'dzam bu chu klung gi gser gyi ri dang 'dra bar 'gro ba kun las mngon par 'phags pa'i lus dang ldan pa/ 'gro ba thams cad
171b3(phal chen): du rnam par dmyigs pa'i gzhi dang ldan pa/ sgo thams cad du rnam par dmyigs shing thos par 'gyur ba/ 'gro ba thams cad kyi ngor blta ba/ chos thams cad kyi sprin gyi 'byung gnas
171b4(phal chen): su gyur pa/ phyogs kun tu rnam par snang ba sgrib pa'i ri thams cad rnam par gtor bas blta na mdzes pa mi dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad shin tu 'joms pas shin tu dpa' bar snang
171b5(phal chen): ba dge ba'i rtsa ba rgya chen po'i rgyu 'thun pa las byung bas blta na dga' ba 'byung bar shin tu dka' zhing dkon pas me tog u dum ba ra lta bu de dag gi spyod pa shes pa 'am/ yon tan brjod
171b6(phal chen): par nus re skan/ /drang srong rigs kyi bu lho phyogs kyi rgyud 'di nyid na yul dge sbyong gi grong khyer zhes bya ba na grong khyer sgo bzang po zhes bya ba yod de/ de na khye'u dbang po'i dbang phyug ces
171b7(phal chen): bya ba 'dug gis/ de'i gan du song la ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bya ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bya ba dris shig /de nas tshong dpon
171b8(phal chen): gyi bu nor bzangs byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par gnon pa dang / nan tan rnam par dag par bya ba la brtson pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i stobs snang bas sems shin tu snang bar
172a1(phal chen): gyur pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i brtan pa gzhan gyis mi thub cing dpa' brgal thag chad pa'i snying dang ldan pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam gyi go cha bzang pos sems zhum pa
172a2(phal chen): med pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i bsam pa brtan pas kun tu gnas shing yongs su 'phel bar 'gyur ba la brtson pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i sprin gyi char yongs su 'dzin pa'i bsam
172a3(phal chen): pa dang ldan pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i chos kyi sprin gyi char gyis yongs su mi ngoms pa'i rgyun dang ldan pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i yon tan thams cad la 'jug pa'i smon lam la mngon
172a4(phal chen): par gyur pa/ 'gro ba thams cad kyi kha lo bsgyur bas yongs su sdud par bdag nyid yongs su gtong bar 'dod pa 'gro ba thams cad 'khor ba'i dgon pa chen po las bzla bar 'dod pa dang
172a5(phal chen): dge ba'i bshes gnyen blta ba dang / mnyan pa dang bsnyen bkur bas yongs su mi ngoms pa/ chos kyi rim gro tshad med pa bskyed pa dang ldan pa des/ dge slong blta na sdug pa'i
172a6(phal chen): rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ dge slong blta na sdug pa la lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas yang dang yang bltas te/ dge slong blta na sdug pa'i drung
172a7(phal chen): nas song ngo / / //sangs rgyas rmad ga gcad ces bya ba shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo/ bam po bcu gsum pa/ de nas tshong dpon gyi bu
172a8(phal chen): nor bzangs dge slong blta na sdug pa'i gdams ngag rjes su bzlos cing spel ba dang / bsdud pa dang rab tu dbye ba dang / bshad pa dang / so sor rnam par bsgom pa dang brjod pa dang /
172b1(phal chen): yang dag par bstan pa dang / rjes su bsam pa dang / mngon par 'jug par bya ba dang / bkur ba dang khong du chud par bya ba dang / yang dag par gzhol bar bya ba dang / yang dang yang bzlas
172b2(phal chen): pa dang / shin tu rtogs par bya ba dang / rab tu bstan pa dang / snang bar bya ba dang / rjes su rnam par lta ba dang / lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang / dri za'i 'khor dang bcas pa de mthar gyis
172b3(phal chen): yul dge sbyong gi dkyil 'khor gyi grong khyer sgo bzang po gang na ba der phyin te/ khye'u dbang po'i dbang phyug yongs su tshol tshol ba las de'i steng gi bar snang las lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang /
172b4(phal chen): dri za rnams kyis bos pa/ rigs kyi bu khye'u dbang po'i dbang phyug ni/ chu klung gi chu 'dus dang / nye ba zhig na byis pa stong phrag bcu tsam gyis bskor te/ bye ma la rtse bas rtse zhing 'dug go/ /
172b5(phal chen): de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs grong khyer sgo bzang po dang / nye ba'i chu klung gi chu 'dus gang na ba der song ste/ phyin pa dang der khye'u dbang po'i dbang phyug byis pa stong phrag bcu tsam gyis
172b6(phal chen): bskor cing bye ma la rtse bas rtse ba mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang khye'u dbang po'i dbang phyug gang na ba der song ste/ khye'u dbang po'i dbang phyug gi rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal nas/
172b7(phal chen): khye'u dbang po'i dbang phyug la lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas/ khye'u dbang po'i dbang phyug gi mdun du 'dug ste/ thal mo sbyar nas 'di skad ces smras so/ /'phags
172b8(phal chen): pa bdag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed na/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar
173a1(phal chen): nan tan du bgyi ba ma 'tshal te/ 'phags pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams la gdams ngag dang rjes su bstan pa mdzad do zhes bdag gis thos nas/ 'phags pa ji ltar byang chub sems
173a2(phal chen): dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba bdag la bshad du gsol/ smras pa rigs kyi bu kho bo ni 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas yi
173a3(phal chen): ge dang / grangs dang / brda dang / rtsis kyi tshul bslabs te/ bzo thams cad mngon par shes pa dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ye shes kyi sgor 'jug go/ /de ltar rigs kyi bu kho bo ni 'jig rten
173a4(phal chen): na yi ge dang / mying gi rnam pa dang / grangs dang / rtsis dang / brda dang / shod thabs shes par bya ba dang / gzo sna tshogs shes par bya ba dang / khams kyi cho ga dang / dug gso ba'i thabs dang /

173b3(phal chen): pa byed do/ /slob du 'dzud do/ /sbyor du 'dzud do/ /brtan par byed do/ /lhur lan par byed do/ /rdzogs par byed do/ /yongs su bsgrub par byed do/ /yongs su spyod par byed do/ /gsal

173b6(phal chen): bye ba na khod khod do/ /khod khod khod khod na tha dgu'o/ /tha dgu tha dgu na khrig khrig go/ /khrig khrig khrig khrig na thams thams mo/ /thams thams thams thams na myad myad do/ /myad myad

175b3(phal chen): thag la bsgres pa dpag thag la bsgres na brjod du myed pa'o/ /brjod du myed pa brjod du myed pa na brjod du myed pa la bsgres pa'o/ /brjod du med pa la bsgres pa brjod du myed pa la bsgres pa na/
175b4(phal chen): brjod du myed pa'i yang brjod du med pa la bsgres pa shin tu bstan pa'o/ /de'i mdun na bye ma'i phung po chen po dpag tshad du ma'i tshad dang ldan pa zhig 'dug 'dug pa las/ 'di la bye ma'i 'bru 'di
175b5(phal chen): snyed gcig yod do zhes bya ba nas/ bye ma'i 'bru brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa la bsgres pa 'di snyed gcig yod do zhes rab tu phye nas bsgrangs brtsis te grangs su bcad do/ /des bye ma'i phung
175b6(phal chen): po de brtsis kyi brdar bstan te/ shin tu bstan nas 'di skad ces smras so/ /rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bgrang ba'i tshul 'di ni 'jig rten gyi khams gcig nas gcig tu
175b7(phal chen): brgyud pa kun na 'ang yod ste/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni bgrang ba'i tshul 'dis shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas pa dag kyang bgrang zhing brtsi'o/ /de bzhin du lho
175b8(phal chen): phyogs dang / nub phyogs dang / byang phyogs dang / byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams dang / shar lho'i phyogs mtshams dang / lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams dang / nub byang gi phyogs mtshams dang /

176a2(phal chen): kyi bgrang ba'i tshul 'di ni/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi mying du bya ba gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa bstan du yod pa thams cad na 'ang yod do/ /byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni

176a8(phal chen): kyi bu kho bos ni byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes kyi snang ba chos thams cad shes par bya ba'i bzo mngon par shes pa dang ldan pa 'di shes par zad na/ kho bos byang chub sems dpa' 'gro ba thams cad
176b1(phal chen): kyi grangs la zhugs pa/ chos kyi tshul thams cad kyi grangs la zhugs pa/ dus gsum gyi grangs la zhugs pa/ sems can thams cad kyi grangs la zhugs pa/ chos kyi phung po thams cad gyi grangs
176b2(phal chen): la zhugs pa/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi grangs la zhugs pa/ chos thams cad kyi ming gi 'khor lo la dbang bsgyur ba de dag gi spyod pa shes pa'am/ yon tan brjod pa'am/
176b3(phal chen): spyod yul smos pa'am/ yul brjod pa'am/ stobs bsngags pa'am/ bsam pa brtan pa'am/ tshogs yongs su brjod pa'am/ smon lam bshad par bya ba'am/ spyod pa yongs su bstan pa'am/ pha rol tu phyin
176b4(phal chen): pa yongs su dag pa mngon par brjod pa'am/ yang dag par bsgrub pa yongs su dag pa'am/ yang dag par bstan pa'am/ ting nge 'dzin gyi khyad par smos pa'am/ ye shes snang ba khong du chud par nus re skan/
176b5(phal chen): drang srong rigs kyi bu lho phyogs kyi rgyud 'di nyid na grong khyer rgya mtsho bstan pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na dge bsnyen ma phul du byung ba zhes bya ba 'dug gis/ de'i gan du song la ji ltar byang chub sems
176b6(phal chen): dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bya ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bya ba dris shig /de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi tshig thos nas spu g.yos te/ dga' ba
176b7(phal chen): chen po'i shugs skyes nas/ rab tu dga' ba'i yid dang ldan par gyur pa ngo mtshar gyi bsam pa/ rin po che rab tu dkon pa thob pa/ 'gro ba mang po la phan pa'i sems dang bsam pas byung ba sangs rgyas
176b8(phal chen): skyes pa gcig nas gcig tu brgyud par 'gro ba la dbang bsgyur ba/ chos kyi dkyil 'khor rnam par dag pa'i blo gros la rten pa/ thams cad du rjes su song ba'i rig pa rnam par phye bas byung ba bstan pa la brtson
177a1(phal chen): pa dus gsum gyi dbyings su ma 'dres pa'i sangs rgyas kyi yul dang ldan pa/ bsod nams mi zad pa'i rgya mtsho las byung ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ ye shes kyi snang ba chen po la dbang bsgyur ba/ khams
177a2(phal chen): gsum gyi khyim du sdud pa'i sgo shin tu gcod pa des/ khye'u dbang po'i dbang phyug gi rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal nas/ khye'u dbang po'i dbang phyug la lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba
177a3(phal chen): byas nas/ yang dang yang bltas te/ khye'u dbang po'i dbang phyug gi drung nas song ngo / /de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi gdams ngag gi sprin gyi char yongs su 'dzin pa byed cing /
177a4(phal chen): gangs chen mtsho ltar sprin chen po'i char gyis ngoms myi shes pa dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi nyi ma'i ye shes kyi 'od gzer gyis dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su smin par byas pa'i sa gzhi las dbang po'i myu gu 'thon
177a5(phal chen): cing skyes pa/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi zla ba nya zhing rgyas pa'i gdams ngag gi 'od gzer gyi dra bas lus dang / sems shin tu tshim par byas pa/ dbyings kyi nyi ma'i 'od kyis gdungs pa'i ri dgas
177a6(phal chen): kyi tshogs gsal zhing bsil ba'i gangs chu la 'thung bar 'dod pa ltar/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi gdams ngag gi chu la 'thung bar 'dod pa/ bung ba mang po 'khor zhing lding bas rgyas par gyur pa'i pad mo dang
177a7(phal chen): ldan pa'i pad mo'i mtsho ltar dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi gdams ngag gis sems kyi me tog pun da ri ka kha phye ba/ rin po che sna tshogs kyis yongs su brgyan pa'i rin po che'i gling ltar dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi
177a8(phal chen): gdams ngag rin po che 'brel ba'i snang bas sems shin tu snang bar byas pa/ 'dzam bu'i shing chen po'i me tog dang / 'bras bu'i tshogs chen po dang ldan pa ltar dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi gdams ngag
177b1(phal chen): bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs su gyur pa/ phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan pa/ klu'i dbang po chen po rtsed mo dam pas rtse ba las byung ba'i nam mkha'i sprin chen po ltar dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi gdams ngag
177b2(phal chen): thos pa'i tshogs su gyur pa'i snang ba shin tu che ba/ sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i 'jig rten gyi brgyan pa sna tshogs kyi spo ltar dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi gdams ngag las byung ba'i chos dri ma myed pa sna tshogs brtsegs
177b3(phal chen): pa'i spor gyur pa/ sum bcu rtsa gsum gyi tshogs kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba'i brgya byin lha ma yin gyi dbang po'i tshogs rab tu 'joms pa ltar dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi gdams ngag las byung ba'i yon
177b4(phal chen): tan dri ma myed pa'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor cing zil gyis myi gnon la gzhan la zil gyis gnon pa de/ mthar gyis grong khyer rgya mtsho bstan pa gang na ba der phyin te/ dge bsnyen ma phul du byung ba
177b5(phal chen): yongs su tshol tshol ba las de la skye bo mang pos bsten te/ rigs kyi bu dge bsnyen ma phul du byung ba grong khyer gyi dbus kyi rang gi khyim na 'dug go zhes nas/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs dge bsnyen
177b6(phal chen): ma phul du byung ba'i gnas gang na ba der song ste/ thal mo sbyar nas sgo gang na sdod sdod pa dang / des dge bsnyen ma phul du byung ba'i khyim de shin tu rgya che la yangs shing rin po che'i ra bas yongs su bskor cing
177b7(phal chen): phyogs bzhi nas sgo shin tu mdzes pa rnam par phye ba/ rin po che tshad myed grangs myed pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa/ bsod nams kyi rnam par smin pas mngon par grub pa mthong nas/ de khyim der song ste/
177b8(phal chen): kun tu bltas nas dge bsnyen ma phul du byung ba phyugs chung shin tu gzhon pa thog ma dar la bab pa/ gzugs mngon zhing mdzes la blta na sdug pa kha dog dam pa/ pri ya ba shin tu rgyas pa dang ldan pa/
178a1(phal chen): skra phye mar bzhag pa/ lus la rgyan myed pa/ gos dang smad g.yogs dkar po bgos pa/ rin po che'i khri la 'dug pa mthong ste/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' ma gtogs par
178a2(phal chen): de'i lus sam/ sems kyi dbang ngam/ gzi brjid dang / kha dog gis zil gyis ma non pa'i sems can ni khyim de na gang yang myed de/ lha 'am mi 'ang rung ste/ sems can gang gis dge bsnyen ma phul
178a3(phal chen): du byung ba mthong bar gyur pa de dag thams cad kyis kyang / dge bsnyen ma phul du byung ba la ston pa'i 'du shes su bsam pa zhig /rin po che'i khri la 'dug pa mthong ngo / /gzhan yang khyim de na stan lha
178a4(phal chen): rdzas dang / myi'i rdzas las shin tu 'phags pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i las kyi rnam par smin pas yongs su grub pa bye ba stong phrag bcu bting ba/ mdun du phru ba gcig gcig bzhag pa las
178a5(phal chen): kha zas dang skom gyi bgam/ gos dang rgyan gyi longs spyod kyi bag gzhan ci yang myi snang ngo / /bud myed stong phrag bcu tsam zhig 'dun du 'dug par mthong na 'ong de dag thams cad kyang lha'i bu mo'i
178a6(phal chen): kha dog dang ldan pa/ lha'i bu mo'i gzugs dang ldan pa/ lha'i bu mo'i tshul dang ldan pa/ lha'i bu mo'i spyod pa dang ldan pa/ lha'i bu mo'i longs spyod dang ldan pa/ lha'i bu mo'i tshul dang shes pa dang ldan pa/
178a7(phal chen): lha rdzas kyi gos yid bzhin du gyon pa/ lha rdzas kyi lhab lhub kyis shin tu klubs pa/ lha'i bu mo'i skad lta bu'i dbyangs snyan pa dang / lha'i bu mo'i chu zheng mdzes pa dang ldan pa sha stag ste/ de'i 'khor
178a8(phal chen): gyi bud myed kyang des ci bsgo ba bzhin du byed cing mdun na 'khod do/ /rim gror byed do/ /bkur sti byed do/ /gdong du blta'o/ /ci bsgo ba nyan cing gnas so/ /rje sar 'khod do/ /yongs su blta'o/ /
178b1(phal chen): rnam par blta'o/ /'dod do/ /rab tu 'dod do/ /phyag 'tshal lo/ /de dag gi lus las spos kyi ngad ldang bas ni/ grong khyer de'i 'khor thams cad du dri zhim pos khyab par 'dug ste/ sems can gang
178b2(phal chen): gis dri de tshor bar gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang gnod sems myed pa'i sems dang / shar gnyer ba myed pa'i sems dang / 'tshe ba myed pa'i sems dang / phrag dog dang / 'jungs pa dang bral ba'i
178b3(phal chen): sems dang / sgyu dang g.yo myed pa'i sems dang / chags pa dang / khong khro ba myed pa'i sems dang / zhum pa dang / gzengs mtho ba myed pa'i sems dang / byams pa'i sems dang / phan pa'i sems dang /
178b4(phal chen): sdom pa la gnas pa'i sems dang / gzhan gyis yongs su bzung ba la re ba myed pa'i sems su gyur te/ gang gis de dag gi skad thos pa de dag thams cad kyang dga' ba dang / mos pa dang / dul ba'i
178b5(phal chen): sems dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /gang gis de dag mthong bar gyur pa de dag kyang / 'dod chags dang bral ba tsam du rang rang gis shes par 'gyur ro/ /de ltar mthong nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis
178b6(phal chen): dge bsnyen ma phul du byung ba'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ dge bsnyen ma phul du byung ba la lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogasu bskor ba byas nas mdun du 'dug ste/ thal mo sbyar
178b7(phal chen): nas 'di skad ces smras so/ /'phags ma bdag gis bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed na/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par
178b8(phal chen): bgyi ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba ma 'tshal te/ 'phags ma ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams la gdams ngag dang rjes su bstan pa mdzad do zhes bdag gis thos na/ 'phags ma ji ltar byang chub
179a1(phal chen): sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba bdag la bshad du gsol/ smras pa rigs kyi bu kho mo ni byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar
179a2(phal chen): pa/ bsod nams kyi mdzod myi zad pa'i rgyan ces bya ba thob ste/ rigs kyi bu kho mo ni phru ba gcig po 'di las mos pa sna tshogs can rnams kha zas ci la dga' ba bzhin du tshod ma sna tshogs dang /
179a3(phal chen): ro sna tshogs dang / kha zas sna tshogs dang / dri sna tshogs kyis tshim par byed de/ rigs kyi bu de ltar kho mo ni phru ba gcig po 'di las ci dga' ba'i kha zas kyis sems can brgya 'ang yongs su tshim
179a4(phal chen): par byed do/ /sems can stong dang sems can brgya stong dang / sems can bye ba dang / sems can bye ba phrag brgya dang / sems can bye ba phrag stong dang / sems can bye ba brgya phrag stong dang / sems
179a5(phal chen): can bye ba khrag khrig brgya phrag stong nas/ sems can brjod du myed pa'i yang brjod du myed pa mos pa sna tshogs can rnams kyang ci la dga' ba'i kha zas kyis yongs su tshim par byed do/ /yongs su stob
179a6(phal chen): par byed do/ /yongs su dga' bar byed do/ /yongs su mgu bar byed do/ /yongs su spro bar byed do/ /shin tu tshim par byed do/ /yid bde bar byed do/ /'on kyang phru ba 'di las 'gong bar 'gyur ba med
179a7(phal chen): do/ /'gri ba myed de dma' bar myi 'gyur ro/ /zad par myi 'gyur ro/ /'bri bar myi 'gyur ro/ /sa mtshams yod par myi 'gyur ro/ /mthar thug par myi 'gyur ro/ /mur thug par myi 'gyur ro/ /
179a8(phal chen): rigs kyi bu gzhung de dang 'dra bar sems can 'dzam bu'i gling gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang / de bzhin du gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang / stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi
179b1(phal chen): rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang / stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang / stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed nas sems can mos pa sna
179b2(phal chen): tshogs can sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du myed pa'i yang brjod du myed pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed cig 'ongs kyang / ci la dga' ba'i kha zas tshod ma sna tshogs dang / ro sna tshogs dang / kha dog sna tshogs dang /
179b3(phal chen): dri sna tshogs kyis yongs su tshim par byed do/ /yongs su dga' bar byed do/ /nyams bde bar byed do/ /shin tu tshim par byed do/ /yid shin tu bde bar byed do/ /'on kyang phru ba 'di las 'gong bar 'gyur
179b4(phal chen): ba myed do/ /'grib pa myed do/ /dma' bar myi 'gyur ro/ /zad par myi 'gyur ro/ /sa mtshams yod par myi 'gyur ro/ /mthar thug par myi 'gyur ro/ /mur thug par myi 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu gal te
179b5(phal chen): phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du gtogs pa'i sems can mos pa sna tshogs can dang / bsam pa sna tshogs can thams cad 'ongs par gyur na yang / de dag thams cad ci la
179b6(phal chen): dga' ba'i kha zas kyis yongs su tshim par byed pa nas/ yid bde bar bya ba'i bar du byed do/ /kha zas sna tshogs kyis ji lta ba de bzhin du btung ba rnam pa sna tshogs dang / ro rnam pa sna tshogs
179b7(phal chen): dang / stan sna tshogs dang / mal cha sna tshogs dang / bzhon pa sna tshogs dang / gos sna tshogs dang / phreng ba sna tshogs dang / spos sna tshogs dang / bdug spos sna tshogs dang / byug pa sna tshogs
179b8(phal chen): dang / phye ma sna tshogs dang / rin po che sna tshogs dang / rgyan sna tshogs dang / rin po che'i shing rta sna tshogs dang / gdugs sna tshogs dang / rgyal mtshan sna tshogs dang / lha'i ba dan sna tshogs dang /
180a1(phal chen): yo byad kyi yul rnam pa sna tshogs kyis yongs su tshim par byed pa nas/ yid dga' bar 'gyur ba'i bar du byed do/ /rigs kyi bu gzhan yang shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gcig na nyan
180a2(phal chen): thos dang / rang sangs rgyas sku'i tha ma 'dzin pa gang ji snyed gcig bzhugs pa de dag thams cad kyang kho mo'i kha zas las gsol cing nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub kyi 'bras bu brnyes
180a3(phal chen): par mdzad do/ /shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gcig na ji lta ba de bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams brgya dang / 'jig rten gyi khams stong dang / 'jig rten gyi khams brgya phrag stong dang /
180a4(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba dang / 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba phrag brgya dang / 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba phrag stong dang / 'jig rten gyi khams brgya phrag stong dang / 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba khrag
180a5(phal chen): khrig brgya phrag stong dang / 'jig rten gyi khams 'dzam bu'i gling gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang / gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang / stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul
180a6(phal chen): shin tu phra ba snyed dang / stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang / stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed nas/ de bzhin du shar phyogs
180a7(phal chen): kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du myed pa'i yang brjod du myed pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams na nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas sku'i tha ma 'dzin pa ji snyed cig bzhugs pa de dag
180a8(phal chen): thams cad kyang kho mo'i kha zas las gsol cing nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi 'bras bu bsnyes par mdzad do/ /shar phyogs na bzhugs pa ji lta ba de bzhin du lho phyogs dang / nub phyogs dang /
180b1(phal chen): byang phyogs dang / byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams dang / shar lho'i phyogs mtshams dang / lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams dang / nub byang gi phyogs mtshams dang / 'og dang steng gi phyogs na ji snyed cig bzhugs
180b2(phal chen): pa de dag thams cad kyang de bzhin no/ /rigs kyi bu shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gcig na sku tshe gcig gi thogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ji snyed cig bzhugs pa de dag thams cad kyang
180b3(phal chen): kho mo'i kha zas las gsol cing / snying po byang chub tu bzhugs nas bdud sde dang bcas pa pham par mdzad de/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang brgya'o/ /shar phyogs
180b4(phal chen): kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gcig na bzhugs pa ji lta ba de bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams brgya dang / 'jig rten gyi khams stong dang / 'jig rten gyi khams brgya phrag stong dang /
180b5(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba dang / 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba brgya dang / 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba stong dang / 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba brgya stong dang / 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba khrag khrig brgya
180b6(phal chen): phrag stong dang / 'jig rten gyi khams 'dzam bu'i gling gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang / gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang / stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba
180b7(phal chen): snyed dang / stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang / stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed nas/ shar phyogs kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing
180b8(phal chen): brjod du myed pa'i yang brjod du myed pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams na/ byang chub sems dpa' sku tshe gcig gis thogs pa ji snyed cig bzhugs pa de dag thams cad kyang kho
181a1(phal chen): mo'i kha zas las gsol zhing snying po byang chub la bzhugs pa dang / bdud sde dang bcas pa pham par mdzad do/ /bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya'o/ /
181a2(phal chen): shar phyogs na bzhugs pa ji lta ba de bzhin du lho phyogs dang / nub phyogs dang / byang phyogs dang / byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams dang / shar lho'i phyogs mtshams dang lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams dang /
181a3(phal chen): nub byang gi phyogs mtshams dang / 'og gi phyogs dang / steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gcig na/ byang chub sems dpa' sku tshe gcig gis thogs pa ji snyed cig bzhugs pa de
181a4(phal chen): dag thams cad kyang kho mo'i kha zas las gsol cing snying po byang chub tu bzhugs te/ bdud sde dang bcas pa rab tu pham par mdzad nas/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu
181a5(phal chen): mngon par 'tshang rgya'o/ /shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gcig na bzhugs pa ji lta ba de bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams brgya dang / 'jig rten gyi khams stong dang / 'jig rten gyi khams
181a6(phal chen): brgya phrag stong dang / 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba dang / 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba brgya dang / 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba stong dang / 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba brgya phrag stong dang / 'jig rten
181a7(phal chen): gyi khams bye ba khrag khrig brgya phrag stong dang / 'jig rten gyi khams 'dzam bu'i gling gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang / gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang /
181a8(phal chen): stong gcig gi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang / stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang / stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul
181b1(phal chen): shin tu phra ba snyed nas/ rigs kyi bu steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du myed pa'i yang brjod du myed pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed na/ byang chub sems dpa' sku tshe gcig
181b2(phal chen): gis thogs pa ji snyed cig bzhugs pa de dag thams cad kyang kho mo'i kha zas las gsol cing / snying po byang chub du bzhugs pas bdud sde dang bcas pa pham par mdzad de/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs
181b3(phal chen): pa'i byang chub du mngon par 'tshang rgya'o/ /rigs kyi bu khyod kyis kho mo'i 'khor bud myed stong phrag bcu po 'di dag mthong ngam/ smras pa 'phags ma bdag gis mthong ngo / /smras pa rigs kyi bu
181b4(phal chen): bud myed 'di dag la stsogs pa brgya stong grangs myed pa phrag bcu kho mo dang bskal pa mnyam par spyod pa/ smon lam gcig pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba gcig pa/ 'byung ba'i rgyan gcig pa/ mos pa'i lam
181b5(phal chen): rnam par dag pa gcig pa/ kho mo dang skal ba mnyam par dran pa rnam par dag pa/ skal ba mnyam par blo rnam par dag pa/ skal ba mnyam par blo tshad myed par gyur pa/ bskal pa mnyam par dbang po
181b6(phal chen): rab tu thob pa/ bskal pa mnyam par sems kyis rgyas par 'gengs pa/ bskal pa mnyam par spyod yul dang ldan pa/ bskal pa mnyam par chos kyi tshul la zhugs pa/ skal ba mnyam par don
181b7(phal chen): nges par rtogs pa/ bskal pa mnyam par chos kyi don ston pa/ bskal pa mnyam par gzugs rnam par dag pa/ bskal pa mnyam par stobs tshad med pa/ bskal pa mnyam par brtan pa
181b8(phal chen): gzhan gyis myi thub pa/ bskal pa mnyam par chos kyi sgra sgrog pa/ bskal pa mnyam par dbyangs rnam par dag pa/ tshad myed pa'i yon tan brjod du med pas rnam par spyod pa thams cad la bskal pa
182a1(phal chen): mnyam par yon tan rnam par dag pa/ las kyi rnam par smin pa la kha na ma tho ba myed cing rnam par dag pas/ skal ba mnyam par las kyi rnam par smin pa rnam par dag pa/ 'gro ba thams
182a2(phal chen): cad yongs su skyob pas/ bskal pa mnyam par byams pa chen pos rgyas par 'gengs pa/ 'gro ba thams cad yongs su smin par byed pas/ myi skyo ba'i phyir bskal pa mnyam par snying rje chen pos
182a3(phal chen): rgyas par 'gengs pa/ bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du sems can thams cad tshim par byed pa'i lus yongs su ston pas/ skal ba mnyam par lus kyi rnam par dag pa/ chos kyi dbyings kyi nges pa'i
182a4(phal chen): tshig gi tha snyad la bskal pa mnyam par ngag gi las rnam par dag pa/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du bskal pa mnyam par 'dod pa/ sangs rgyas thams cad la mchod cing rim
182a5(phal chen): gro bya ba'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du skal ba mnyam par rgyu ba/ chos thams cad kyi tshul khong du chud par bya ba la bskal pa mnyam par mngon gsum du gyur pa'i ye shes dang ldan pa/
182a6(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa'i sa thams cad thob par bya ba la bskal pa mnyam par spyod pa/ rnam par dag pa sha stag cig kyang yod de/ rigs kyi bu bud med stong phrag bcu po 'di dag kyang skad cig gcig
182a7(phal chen): du 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sku tshe gcig gis thogs pa rnams la zhal zas yongs su dbul ba'i phyir phyogs bcur rgyas par 'dong ngo / /phru ba 'di nyid nas kha zas blangs shing / srid pa
182a8(phal chen): tha ma dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa rnams la bsod snyoms dbul ba'i phyir phyogs bcu rgyas par 'dong ngo / /phru ba 'di nyid nas kha zas blangs shing phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang
182b1(phal chen): ste yi dags kyi tshogs thams cad kha zas kyis yongs su tshim par byed do/ /rigs kyi bu de ltar kho mos ni phru ba 'di nyid nas lha rnams ni lha'i kha zas kyis yongs su tshim par byed do/ /klu
182b2(phal chen): rnams ni klu'i kha zas kyis/ gnod sbyin rnams ni gnod sbyin gyi kha zas kyis/ dri za rnams ni dri za'i kha zas kyis/ lha ma yin rnams ni lha ma yin gyi kha zas kyis/ nam mkha' lding rnams
182b3(phal chen): ni nam mkha' lding gi kha zas kyis/ myi 'am ci rnams ni myi 'am ci'i kha zas kyis/ lto 'phye chen po rnams ni lto 'phye chen po'i kha zas kyis/ myi rnams ni myi'i kha zas kyis/ myi ma
182b4(phal chen): yin pa rnams ni myi ma yin pa'i kha zas kyis yongs su tshim par byed do/ /rigs kyi bu yud tsam zhig sdod dang de'u re mngon du 'gyur ro/ /dge bsnyen ma phul du byung ba des tshig de brjod ma
182b5(phal chen): thag tu de'i mod la 'di lta ste/ dge bsnyen ma phul du byung bas/ sngon gyi smon lam gyis bos pas sems can grangs myed pa zhig shar phyogs kyi sgo nas nang du 'ongs par gyur to/ /de bzhin du 'di lta ste/
182b6(phal chen): dge bsnyen ma phul du byung ba'i sngon gyi smon lam gyis bos pas/ sems can grangs myed pa zhig /lho phyogs dang nub phyogs dang / byang phyogs kyi sgo nas nang du 'ongs par gyur te/ de ltar 'ongs
182b7(phal chen): pa de dag dge bsnyen ma phul du byung bas/ stan de dag la bkod de/ so so nas ci dga' ba'i kha zas tshod ma sna tshogs dang / ro sna tshogs dang / kha dog sna tshogs dang / dri sna tshogs dang ldan par
182b8(phal chen): yongs su tshim par byas so/ /yongs su bstabs par byas so/ /yongs su dga' ba byas so/ /yongs su mgu bar byas so/ /yongs su spro bar byas so/ /shin tu tshim par byas so/ /yid bde
183a1(phal chen): bar byas so/ /kha zas sna tshogs kyis ji lta ba de bzhin du btung ba rnam pa sna tshogs dang / ro rnam pa sna tshogs dang / stan sna tshogs dang / mal cha sna tshogs dang / bzhon pa sna tshogs
183a2(phal chen): dang / gos sna tshogs dang / me tog sna tshogs dang / phreng ba sna tshogs dang / spos sna tshogs dang / bdug spos sna tshogs dang / byug pa sna tshogs dang / phye ma sna tshogs dang / rin po che sna tshogs dang /
183a3(phal chen): rgyan sna tshogs dang / rin po che'i shing rta sna tshogs dang / gdugs sna tshogs dang / rgyal mtshan sna tshogs dang / lha'i ba dan sna tshogs dang / yo byad kyi yul rnam pa sna tshogs kyis yongs su tshim par byas
183a4(phal chen): pa nas/ yid dga' bar 'gyur ba'i bar du byas so/ /lha rnams ni lha'i kha zas kyis yongs su tshim par byas so/ /klu dang gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / myi 'am ci dang /
183a5(phal chen): lto 'phye chen po dang / myi dang myi ma yin pa rnams kyang myi ma yin pa'i kha zas kyis yongs su tshim par byas pa nas/ yid bde bar 'gyur ba'i bar du byas so/ /'on kyang phru ba de las 'gong bar gyur pa myed/
183a6(phal chen): 'grib pa myed dma' pa myed/ zad par gyur pa myed/ sa mtshams su gyur pa myed/ mthar thug pa myed/ mur thug pa myed do/ /de nas dge bsnyen ma phul du byung ba des/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs la
183a7(phal chen): 'di skad ces smras so/ /rigs kyi bu kho mos ni byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa bsod nams kyi mdzod mi zad pa'i rgyan ces bya ba 'di shes par zad na/ byang chub sems dpa' bsod nams
183a8(phal chen): chen po'i rgya mtsho myi zad pa'i bsod nams dang ldan pa/ bsod nams kyi tshogs rgya chen po shin tu bstsags pa/ nam mkha' lta bur gyur pa/ 'gro ba thams cad kyi smon lam yongs su rdzogs
183b1(phal chen): par byed pas/ nor bu rin po che yid bzhin gyi rgyal po lta bu/ 'gro ba thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su bsrung bas/ bsod nams chen po'i 'khor yug dang ldan pa/ 'gro ba thams cad du
183b2(phal chen): rin po che snyim pa nas char ltar 'thong bas bsod nams chen po'i sprin du gyur pa/ chos kyi grong khyer gyi sgo 'byed pas/ bsod nams chen po'i mdzod la mngon sum lta ba/ 'gro ba thams cad kyi
183b3(phal chen): phongs pa'i mun pa sel bas bsod nams chen po'i sgron mar gyur pa/ chos kyi grong khyer shes pa 'am/ yon tan brjod par nus re skan/ drang srong rigs kyi bu lho phyogs kyi rgyud 'di nyid na grong
183b4(phal chen): khyer 'byung ba chen po zhes bya ba yod de/ de na khyim bdag mkhas pa zhes bya ba 'dug gis/ de'i gan du song la ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang /
183b5(phal chen): ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba dris shig /de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs dge bsnyen ma phul du byung ba'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ dge bsnyen ma phul du byung ba la lan brgya stong du mar
183b6(phal chen): g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas/ yang dang yang bltas te/ dge bsnyen ma phul du byung ba'i drung nas blta bas myi ngoms bzhin du song ngo / /de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs bsod nams kyi mdzod
183b7(phal chen): mi zad pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa'i rnam par thar pa'i snang ba rab tu thob pa de bsod nams rgya mtsho de la ni rjes su sems/ bsod nams nam mkha' de la ni kun tu blta/ bsod nams kyi phung po de ni
183b8(phal chen): yongs su 'dzin/ bsod nams kyi ri bo la ni mngon par 'dzeg /bsod nams kyi tshogs de ni yang dag par sdud/ bsod nams kyi chu bo de la ni 'bog /bsod nams kyi tshogs kyi mu stegs
184a1(phal chen): de las rab tu 'bab/ bsod nams kyi dkyil 'khor de ni yongs su skyong / bsod nams kyi gter de la ni yang dag par blta/ bsod nams kyi tshul de ni rjes su dran par byed/ bsod nams
184a2(phal chen): kyi tshogs de ni yongs su 'dzin/ bsod nams kyi rgyud de ni yongs su sbyong bar byed cing / mthar gyis grong khyer 'byung ba chen po gang na ba der phyin nas/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen 'dod cing dge ba'i bshes
184a3(phal chen): gnyen la blta bas skom pa'i sems kyi rgyud dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis byin gyi rlabs pa'i bsam pa can/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen la thogs pa med pa'i sbyor ba dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen la
184a4(phal chen): rim gror bya bas skyo ba med pa'i brtson 'grus dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen la rag lus pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis nges par gyur par bsod nams kyi tshogs
184a5(phal chen): thams cad dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis rnam par spel ba'i thabs mkhas pa'i spyod pa dang / gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog par dge ba'i bshes gnyen la rim gro bya ba la mkhas pa dang / rnam par
184a6(phal chen): 'phel ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad dang / rnam par dag par 'gyur ba'i byang chub sems dpa'i lhag pa'i bsam pa dang / yang dag par 'phel ba'i byang chub sems dpa'i dbang po dang / yongs
184a7(phal chen): su smin par 'gyur ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad dang / yang dag par 'phel ba'i smon lam chen po mngon par bsgrub pa dang / shin tu yangs par 'gyur ba'i snying rje chen pos bdag nyid
184a8(phal chen): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nye bar gyur par yang dag par mthong nas/ sangs rgyas thams cad las byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyod pas chos kyi snang ba yang dag par blang ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i
184b1(phal chen): stobs bcu snang ba rnam par 'phel bar byed cing khyim bdag mkhas pa yongs su tshol tshol ba las/ grong khyer gyi dbus lam gyi bzhi mdo zhig na rin po che sna bdun gyi stegs bu zhig la/ rin po che grangs med
184b2(phal chen): pa las byas pa'i khri nor bu rin po che'i rkang pa rdo rje dang / in dra ni la sna tshogs kyis spras pa bkye ba/ gser gyi lcag pod kyi dra bas legs par blas pa/ nor bu rin po che dri ma med pa'i snying po can rin po
184b3(phal chen): che lnga brgya tsam gyis gzugs legs par brgyan pa/ lha rdzas kyi stan sna tshogs bting ba/ bgam yo nas lha rdzas kyi gos kyi rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan mang po bsgreng ba/ rin po che du ma'i dra bas kun
184b4(phal chen): nas g.yogs pa rin po che'i bla re chen po bres pa/ bla nas gser dang rin po che'i me tog gi lda ldi mang po bkye ba zhig la 'dug cing / 'dzam bu chu klung gi gser gyi gdugs yu ba bai Dur+ya las byas
184b5(phal chen): pa ni drung na bsgreng zhing bzung / g.yab rnga dri ma med pa'i rdul yab ngang pa'i rgyal po lta bus ni legs par g.yob/ spos kyi rim gro'i yo byad sna tshogs kyis ni gdugs shing bsangs rol mo
184b6(phal chen): brdung ba dang / dkrol ba lha rdzas kyis dbyangs las 'das par sgra 'byin pa lnga brgya tsam gyis ni g.yas phyogs nas brdungs shing dkrol/ grong khyer 'byung ba chen po na 'khod pa'i sems can rnams
184b7(phal chen): shin tu dga' bar bya ba'i don du lha rdzas kyis me tog gi sprin gyi char ni kun nas 'bab par gyur pa/ g.yog srog chags stong phrag bcu tsam sngon dge ba'i rtsa ba bskal pa mnyam par spyod spyod pa/ ngag
184b8(phal chen): nyan cing dga' bar byed pa/ lha rdzas las 'das pa'i brgyan gyis shin tu brgyan pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i bsam pa yongs su grub pa/ lha dang mi'i gzugs las shin tu
185a1(phal chen): 'das pa sha stag gis kun nas bskor cing 'dug pa mthong nas/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs khyim bdag mkhas pa gang na ba der song ste/ phyin nas khyim bdag mkhas pa'i
185a2(phal chen): rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ khyim bdag mkhas pa la lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas mdun du 'dug ste/ thal mo sbyar nas 'di skad ces smras so/ /
185a3(phal chen): 'phags pa bdag ni 'di lta ste/ sems can thams cad kyi sdug bsngal zhi bar bgyi ba dang / sems can thams cad shin tu bde ba la 'god pa dang / sems can thams cad 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho
185a4(phal chen): nas mngon par gdon pa dang / sems can thams cad chos rin po che'i gling du yang dag par bskyal ba dang / sems can thams cad kyi sred pa'i brlan shin tu bskam pa dang / sems can thams
185a5(phal chen): cad kyi snying rje'i brlan yang dag par bskyed pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi 'dod pa'i dga' ba dang / sred pa rnam par zlog pa dang / sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi ye shes la mos
185a6(phal chen): shing bsgrub par bgyi ba dang / sems can thams cad 'khor ba'i bas mtha' dgon pa las yang dag par bzla ba dang / sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi yon tan dang chos la dga' zhing
185a7(phal chen): mos pa yang dag par bskyed pa dang / sems can thams cad khams gsum gyi grong rdal nas gdon pa dang / sems can thams cad thams cad mkhyen pa'i pho brang du gzud pa dang / sems can thams
185a8(phal chen): cad kyi don du bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu zhugs kyang / ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba
185b1(phal chen): ma 'tshal te/ 'phags pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams la gdams ngag dang / rjes su bstan pa mdzad do zhes bdag gis thos na/ 'phags pa ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i
185b2(phal chen): spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' rnams sems can thams cad kyi rten du 'gyur ba bdag la bshad du gsol/ de skad ces smras pa dang / khyim bdag mkhas pas tshong
185b3(phal chen): dpon gyi bu nor bzangs la 'di skad ces smras so/ /rigs kyi bu de ltar khyod kyis bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa legs so legs so/ /rigs kyi bu sems can gang
