185b4(phal chen): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed cing / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yongs su tshol ba dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen blta bas myi ngoms pa dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi
185b5(phal chen): drung du 'gro bas myi ngoms pa dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen la rim gro bya bas sgyid lug pa myed pa dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen btsal bas yid myi bde ba myi bskyed pa dang / dge ba'i bshes
185b6(phal chen): gnyen btsal ba las phyir myi ldog pa dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen la mos shing dang ba'i yid las rnam par myi ldog pa dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi ngor blta ba las phyir myi zlog pa dang / dge ba'i
185b7(phal chen): bshes gnyen gyi gdams ngag gi tshul la zhum pa myed pa dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen la rim gro dang bsnyen bkur bya bas myi skyo ba de lta bu ni shin tu dkon no/ /rigs kyi bu khyod kyis kho bo'i 'khor
185b8(phal chen): 'di dag mthong ngam/ smras pa 'phags pa mthong ngo / /smras pa rigs kyi bu 'di dag kun kyang kho bos bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
186a1(phal chen): tu sems bskyed pa dag ste/ 'di dag ni kho bos de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs su bskyed pa'o/ /'di dag ni kho bos pha rol tu phyin pas bsdus te gsos pa'o/ /'di dag ni kho bos chos
186a2(phal chen): dkar po thams cad kyis bskyed pa'o/ /'di dag ni kho bos de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la rnam par bskyed pa'o/ /'di dag ni kho bos 'jig rten gyi rigs las gyen du bskyod pa'o/ /'di dag ni kho
186a3(phal chen): bos de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs la bkod pa'o/ /'di dag ni kho bos 'jig rten gyi lam gyi 'khor lo las bzlog pa'o/ /'di dag ni kho bos chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba la btsud pa'o/ /'di dag ni
186a4(phal chen): kho bos ngan song gsum gyi rgyud du ltung ba las yongs su bzung ba'o/ /'di dag ni kho bos chos nyid khong du chud par bya ba la bskod pa ste/ rigs kyi bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rnams sems can thams
186a5(phal chen): cad kyi skyabs su gyur pa yin no/ /rigs kyi bu kho bos ni yid kyi mdzod nas byung ba'i bsod nams mang po thob pa ste/ de'i mthus kho bo ni zas 'dod pa rnams la zas kyi sbyin pa byed de/ btung ba 'dod pa
186a6(phal chen): rnams la btung ba dang / ro'i dam pa 'dod pa rnams la ro'i dam pa dang / bza' ba 'dod pa rnams la bza' ba dang / bca' ba 'dod pa rnams la bca' ba dang / bldag pa 'dod pa rnams la bldag pa dang /
186a7(phal chen): mur pa 'dod pa rnams la mur ba dang / gos 'dod pa rnams la gos dang / me tog 'dod pa rnams la me tog dang / phreng ba 'dod pa rnams la phreng ba dang / spos 'dod pa rnams la spos dang / bdug pa
186a8(phal chen): 'dod pa rnams la bdug pa dang / byug pa 'dod pa rnams la byug pa dang / phye ma 'dod pa rnams la phye ma dang / rgyan dang lhab lhub 'dod pa rnams la rgyan dang lhab lhub dang / rin po che 'dod pa rnams la rin
186b1(phal chen): po che dang / gser 'dod pa rnams la gser dang / dngul 'dod pa rnams la dngul dang / mu tig 'dod pa rnams la mu tig dang / rten 'dod pa rnams la rten dang / stan 'dod pa rnams la stan dang / mal cha 'dod
186b2(phal chen): pa rnams la mal cha dang / na ba'i gsos sman dang / yo byad 'dod pa rnams la na ba'i gsos sman dang yo byad dang / bzhon pa 'dod pa rnams la bzhon pa dang / dga' ba 'dod pa rnams la dga' ba
186b3(phal chen): dang / glang po dang rta dang / shing rta dang / ba lang dang / bong bu dang ma he dang / ra lug 'dod pa rnams la glang po dang / rta dang shing rta dang ba lang dang / bong bu dang ma he dang / ra lug dang / rgyal mtshan dang / gdugs dang /
186b4(phal chen): ba dan 'dod pa rnams la rgyal mtshan dang / gdugs dang ba dan dang / bran pho dang bran mo 'dod pa rnams la bran pho dang bran mo dang 'khor gyi byis pa 'dod pa rnams la 'khor gyi byis pa dang / bud med 'dod
186b5(phal chen): pa rnams la bud myed dang / bu mo gzhon nu 'dod pa rnams la bu mo gzhon nu dang / cod pan dang gtsug gi rin po che 'dod pa rnams la cod pan dang gtsug gi rin po che dang / thor dpag dang bcas pa'i
186b6(phal chen): gtsug gi rin po che 'dod pa rnams la thor dpag dang bcas pa'i gtsug gi rin po dang / skra mthon ting dri ma myed pa'i dkyil 'khor 'dod pa rnams la skra mthon ting dri ma myed pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi sbyin pa byed
186b7(phal chen): pa nas/ yo byad sna tshogs thams cad 'dod pa rnams la yang yo byad sna tshogs thams cad kyi sbyin pa byed do/ /rigs kyi bu yud tsam zhig sdod dang / de'u re mngon gsum du mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /
186b8(phal chen): de skad du khyim bdag mkhas pas/ tshig de brjod ma thag tu de'i mod la sems can grangs med pa zhig khyim bdag mkhas pa'i sngon gyi smon lam gyis bos pas/ phyogs tha
187a1(phal chen): dad pa dang / yul tha dad pa dang / gnas tha dad pa dang / grong dang / grong khyer tha dad pa dang / grong rdal tha dad pa dang / tshong 'dus tha dad pa dang / ljongs tha dad pa dang / 'or gyi grong tha dad pa dang / khyim
187a2(phal chen): tha dad pa dang / sems can gyi rgyud tha dad pa dang / sems can gyi ris tha dad pa dang / sems can rnam pa myi 'thun pa tha dad pa dang / lam gyi rgyud tha dad pa dang / gnas kyi rnam pa dang / mying du bya ba tha dad pa
187a3(phal chen): pa nas/ sems can skye mched rnam pa tha dad pa sna tshogs dang ldan pa/ kha zas sna tshogs don du gnyer ba kha zas sna tshogs 'dod pa/ bsam pa tha dad pa bza' ba dang btung ba dang / gtsang ma 'dod
187a4(phal chen): pa dang / sha 'dod pa dang / kha zas rnam pa tha dad pa sna tshogs don du gnyer ba/ lam gyi rgyud rnam pa sna tshogs kyi khyad par du skyes pa'i skye mched la gnas pa 'di lta ste/ mi'i nang nas 'bras can dang /
187a5(phal chen): sran chan dang / khur ba dang / skyo ma dang nya dang sha la stsogs pa kham gyis bza' ba'i zas sna tshogs don du gnyer ba dang / mi'i nang nas ji lta ba bzhin du 'gro ba'i rgyud thams cad na rnam par spyod pa dag
187a6(phal chen): las kyang / kha zas dang btung ba sna tshogs don du gnyer ba dag de ltar byang chub sems dpa'i mthu dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sbyin pa thogs pa myed par gtong ba'i rnga'i sgra dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sngon gyi
187a7(phal chen): smon lam gyis bos pas kun kyang 'ongs par gyur te/ 'ongs nas kyang khyim bdag mkhas pa la slongs mo 'debs so/ /gdong du blta'o/ /sdod do/ /gsol ba 'debs so/ /de nas khyim bdag mkhas
187a8(phal chen): pas slong ba de dag kun nas 'dus par shes pas/ yud tsam du bsams te nam mkha' la bltas pa dang / nam mkha'i dbyings nas/ kha zas dang btung ba rnam pa sna tshogs ro sna tshogs dang ldan pa/ kha dog
187b1(phal chen): sna tshogs dang ldan pa/ dri sna tshogs dang ldan pa mang po 'thon te/ lag mthil du 'ong bar gyur to/ /des de dag yongs su blangs shing de ltar kun nas 'dus pa'i slongs mo ba mos pa sna tshogs dang ldan pa/
187b2(phal chen): de dag ci 'dod pa'i zas dang / btung ba'i rnam pa dang / yo byad kyi khyad par thams cad kyis yongs su tshim par byas so/ /ci 'dod pa yongs su byin no/ /rab tu dga' bar byas so/ /shin tu tshim par byas
187b3(phal chen): so/ /dga' ba shin tu skye bar byas so/ /nyams shin tu bde bar byas so/ /yid rab tu dga' bar byas so/ /de ltar de dag shin tu tshim par byas de des kyang mchog ste/ de'i 'og tu chos bstan pa
187b4(phal chen): 'di lta ste/ ye shes kyi tshogs rgya chen po bstsags pa'i rgyu yongs su brjod de chos ston to/ /phongs pa thams cad 'byung ba mi srid pa'i rgyu yongs su brjod pa dang / skyid pa chen po yongs su 'grub par 'byung
187b5(phal chen): ba'i rgyu yongs su brjod pa dang / chos kyi ye shes kyi tshul thob pa 'byung ba'i rgyu yongs su brjod pa dang / bsod nams kyi tshogs rgya chen po bstsags pa'i rgyu yongs su brjod pa dang / dga' ba bza'i zas
187b6(phal chen): rab tu 'thob pa 'byung ba'i rgyu yongs su brjod pa dang / mtshan dang dpe byad bzang pos shin tu brgyan pa'i lus thob pa 'byung ba'i rgyu yongs su brjod pa dang / thub pa myed pa'i stobs rnam par dag pa thob pa
187b7(phal chen): 'byung ba'i rgyu yongs su brjod pa dang / bla na myed pa'i kha zas yongs su shes pa 'thob pa 'byung ba'i rgyu yongs su brjod pa dang / bdud kyi dpung thams cad rab tu 'joms pa'i bsod nams kyi stobs
187b8(phal chen): myi zad pa rab tu thob pa byung ba'i rgyu yongs su brjod pa byas te chos ston to/ /des kha zas don du gnyer cing 'ongs pa rnams la nam mkha'i dbyings nas kha zas rnam pa sna tshogs blangs shing tshim par byas te/
188a1(phal chen): de dag la tshe dang mdog dang / stobs bde ba dang / spobs pa phun sum tshogs pa thob par bya ba'i phyir chos ston to/ /des btung ba don du gnyer cing 'ongs pa rnams la btung ba mang po zhim pa
188a2(phal chen): kha na ma tho ba med pa/ yid shin tu dga' bar byed pa dag gis tshim par byas nas/ de dag la 'khor bas skom zhing 'khor ba la dga' ba las rnam par bzlog pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos la dga'
188a3(phal chen): zhing sangs rgyas kyi chos la mos pa yongs su bskyed pa'i phyir chos bstan to/ /des ro'i mchog don du gnyer cing 'ongs pa rnams la ro'i mchog sna tshogs dngar ba dang / skyur ba dang lan tsha dang tsha
188a4(phal chen): ba dang / kha ba dang bska ba dang / rnam pa tha dad pas yongs su tshim par byas te/ de'i 'og du skyes bu chen po'i mtshan ro bro ba'i mchog thob par bya ba'i phyir chos bstan to/ /des bzhon pa don du
188a5(phal chen): gnyer cing phyogs kyi rgyud sna tshogs nas 'ongs pa rnams la bzhon pa sna tshogs kyi sbyin pas yongs su bsdud de/ de dag theg pa chen po la gnas par bya ba'i phyir chos ston to/ /des gos don du
188a6(phal chen): gnyer cing phyogs sna tshogs nas 'ongs pa kun nas 'dus par shes nas/ yud tsam du bsams te/ nam mkha'i dbyings la bltas pa dang / nam mkha'i dbyings las gos sna tshogs sngon po dang ser
188a7(phal chen): po dang / dmar po dang dkar po dang / leb rgan dang / shel gyi kha dog du 'dug pa kha dog sna tshogs can kha dog du mar rnam par dag pa dag 'thon cing lag pa'i mthil du 'ongs pas/ des de dag gis slongs
188a8(phal chen): mo ba de dag la yongs su bsdud nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i ngo tsha shes pa dang / khrel yod pa bla na myed pa dang / mdog gser gyi kha dog lta bu thob par 'gyur ba rnam par dag par bya ba'i phyir chos bstan to/ /
188b1(phal chen): de bzhin du yo byad sna tshogs thams cad kyis ji ltar 'ongs pa'i slongs mo ba rnams la bsdud pa byas nas/ ci rigs su chos bstan to/ /de ltar khyim bdag mkhas pas byang chub sems dpa'i rnam
188b2(phal chen): par thar pa bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i yul bstan pa byas nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs la 'di skad ces smras so/ /rigs kyi bu kho bos ni yid kyi mdzod nas byung ba'i bsod nams kyi rnam par
188b3(phal chen): thar pa 'di shes par zad na/ kho bos byang chub sems dpa'i yo byad la dbang thob pa rin po che'i lag pa thob par gyur pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa thams cad lag pas yongs su khebs par
188b4(phal chen): byas shing / sangs rgyas kyi mchod pa sna tshogs bsgrub pa'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du rin po che kha dog sna tshogs kyi sprin gyi char rab tu 'bebs pa de bzhin du rgyan
188b5(phal chen): kha dog sna tshogs kyi sprin dang / cod pan kha dog sna tshogs kyi sprin dang / khang pa brtsegs pa kha dog sna tshogs kyi sprin dang / na bza' kha dog sna tshogs kyi sprin dang / lha rdzas las rol mo brdung ba dang
188b6(phal chen): dkrol ba dang / glu yid du 'ong ba'i dbyangs snyan pa sna tshogs kyi sprin dang / me tog kha dog sna tshogs kyi sprin dang / spos kha dog sna tshogs kyi sprin dang / bdug spos dang phreng ba dang byug pa dang / phye ma dang chos
188b7(phal chen): gos dang / gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan kha dog sna tshogs dang / rnam pa thams cad du sangs rgyas thams cad mchod pa'i sprin dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams
188b8(phal chen): cad dang / sems can thams cad kyi gnas su sangs rgyas thams cad mchod cing bsnyen bkur ba dang / sems can thams cad yongs su smyin par bya ba dang / gdul bar bya ba'i phyir yo byad thams
189a1(phal chen): cad kyi char 'bebs pa de dag gi spyod pa shes pa 'am/ yon tan brjod pa 'am/ rnam par 'phrul pa bstan pa nus re skan/ song rigs kyi bu lho phyogs kyi rgyud 'di nyid na grong khyer
189a2(phal chen): seng ge'i gzugs shes bya ba yod de/ de na chos kyi tshong dpon rin chen gtsug phud ces bya ba 'dug gis/ de'i gan du song la ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab
189a3(phal chen): par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bya ba dris shig /de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs dga' rangs te/ mgu zhing nyams bde la tshim zhing yid bde ba skyes nas khyim bdag mkhas pa la chos kyi rim
189a4(phal chen): gros slob ma'i tshul bstan te/ de'i byin gyi rlabs kyis sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad thob par 'gyur bar yongs su blta zhing / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang de la rag lus par blta ba dang /
189a5(phal chen): dge ba'i bshes gnyen dben par sems pa rgyun myi 'chad par bstan pa dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi bka' shin tu nyan pa'i sems dang ldan par bstan pa dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi
189a6(phal chen): dbang du 'gyur ba'i rjes su 'brang bar bya ba dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi gdams ngag dang / tshig mnyan par bya ba dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen las byung ba'i dad pa'i dbang po la bsam pa
189a7(phal chen): byed cing / dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis gtams te btang bas/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen bsnyen cing bkur ba dang / rjes su 'brang bar bya ba'i sems kyis/ khyim bdag mkhas pa'i rkang pa
189a8(phal chen): gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ khyim bdag mkhas pa la lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas/ yang dang yang bltas te/ khyim bdag mkhas pa'i drung nas
189b1(phal chen): song ngo / /de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyi bsod nams kyi chu bo de la ni yid ches par sems/ bsod nams kyi zhing de la ni yang dag par blta/ bsod nams kyi ri bo de ni yongs su sbyong /
189b2(phal chen): bsod nams kyi mu stegs de la ni yang dag par 'dzeg /bsod nams kyi mdzod de ni rnam par 'byed/ bsod nams kyi gter de la ni shin tu lta/ bsod nams kyi dkyil 'khor de ni yongs su
189b3(phal chen): spyod/ bsod nams kyi phung po de ni yang dag par len/ bsod nams kyi stobs de ni yongs su bskyed/ bsod nams kyi shugs de ni rnam par 'phel bar byed cing / mthar gyis grong khyer seng
189b4(phal chen): ge'i gzugs gang na ba der phyin te/ chos kyi tshong dpon rin chen gtsug phud yongs su tshol tshol ba las/ tshong 'dus kyi srang zhig na 'dug pa mthong nas/ des de'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos
189b5(phal chen): phyag 'tshal te/ g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas/ mdun du 'dug ste thal mo sbyar nas 'di skad ces smras so/ /'phags pa bdag gis bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems
189b6(phal chen): bskyed na/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba ma 'tshal na/ 'phags pa lam gang gis bdag thams cad
189b7(phal chen): mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i byang chub sems dpa'i lam gyi man ngag legs par myi bstsal tam/ de nas chos kyi tshong dpon rin chen gtsug phud kyis tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs
189b8(phal chen): kyi lag pa nas bzung ste/ rang gi khyim gang na ba der khrid de khyim de bstan nas 'di skad ces smras so/ /rigs kyi bu kho bo'i khyim la ltos shig ces nas/ des bltas na
190a1(phal chen): khyim de dag cing 'od gsal la 'dzam bu chu klung gi gser las byas pa ste/ yangs shing mtho la dngul gyi ra bas bskor ba/ shel gyi rtsig pas shin tu legs par brtsigs
190a2(phal chen): te/ mdzes par byas pa bai DUr+ya'i phung po brgya phrag stong gis rab tu brgyan pa/ mu sa ra gal pa'i ka ba bkye ba/ mu tig dmar po las byas pa'i seng ge'i khri shin tu bshams pa/
190a3(phal chen): nor bu rin po che rang bzhin snang ba'i seng ge'i rgyal mtshan sgreng ba/ nor bu rin po che rnam par snang ba'i bla re bres pa/ gser gyi dra ba yid bzhin gyi nor bus brgyan pas kun nas g.yog pa/
190a4(phal chen): nor bu rin po che sna tshogs grangs myed pas rab tu brgyan pa/ a smar gar ba las brtsigs pa'i rdzing bu chu bsil bas gang ba dang ldan pa/ rin po che thams cad kyi shing gis bskor ba/
190a5(phal chen): rgya che zhing yangs pa rim pa bcur brtsegs pa/ shin tu mtho ba/ sgo brgyad dang ldan par 'dug pa mthong nas/ des khyim de'i nang du phyin te/ kun tu bltas na rim khang tha ma'i nang na
190a6(phal chen): bza' ba dang btung ba'i rnam pa yongasu gtong ba mthong ngo / /rim khang gnyis pa'i nang na gos kyi rnam pa thams cad yongs su gtong ba mthong ngo / /rim khang gsum pa'i nang na rin po che thams cad
190a7(phal chen): kyi rgyan dang / lhab lhub yongs su gtong ba mthong ngo / /rim khang bzhi pa'i nang na btsun mo'i 'khor dga' ba'i yo byad du bya ba bud med rin po che sa chen po'i steng na bzung du bya ba yongs su
190a8(phal chen): gtong ba mthong ngo / /rim khang lnga pa'i nang nas sa lnga pa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' chos yang dag par 'gro ba'i dga' ba la mos pa/ 'jig rten la phan pa dang /
190b1(phal chen): bde ba'i sems kyi spyod pa dang ldan pa/ gtsug lag thams cad mngon par bsgrub pa gzungs kyi tshul dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi phyag rgya dang / ting nge 'dzin la rnam par ldang ba dang / ting nge 'dzin la
190b2(phal chen): rnam par spyod pa dang / ye shes kyi snang ba mngon par bsgrub pa 'dus shing 'khod par mthong ngo / /rim khang drug pa'i nang na byang chub sems dpa' shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rnam par spyod pa
190b3(phal chen): rab tu thob pa shes rab shin tu zab pa/ rab tu zhi ba'i chos thams cad mngon par shes pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi sgo dang / snying po mang pos sgo kun nas byung ba/ bsgrib pa myed pa'i
190b4(phal chen): spyod yul can myi gnyis pa la yang dag par spyod pa/ chos yang dag par 'gro ba la rnam par 'phrul ba/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rgyud kyi rjes su 'brang zhing rnam par dbye ba dang /
190b5(phal chen): rab tu gsal bar byed pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo mang po yang dag par 'gro bar byed pa rnams kun nas 'dus shing 'khod pa mthong ste/ 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i
190b6(phal chen): sgo zhi ba'i snying po zhes bya ba dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo 'gro ba thams cad du ye shes rnam par phye ba zhes bya ba dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo myi g.yo
190b7(phal chen): ba'i glong zhes bya ba dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo rdul dang bral ba'i 'od ces bya ba dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo thub par dka' ba zhes bya ba dang / shes rab
190b8(phal chen): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo 'gro ba thams cad mos par byed cing rjes su 'brang ba'i dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo phyi bzhin 'brang ba'i dkyil 'khor zhes
191a1(phal chen): bya ba dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo rgya mtsho snying po zhes bya ba dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo kun nas lta ba'i btang snyom thob pa zhes pa dang / shes rab
191a2(phal chen): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo mi zad pa'i mdzod dang ldan pa zhes bya ba dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo chos thams cad kyi tshul rgya mtsho zhes bya ba dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
191a3(phal chen): pa'i sgo 'gro ba thams cad kyi rgya mtsho rjes su song ba zhes bya ba dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo thogs pa myed pa'i spobs pa zhes bya ba dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i
191a4(phal chen): sgo chos kyi sprin la dmyigs pas rim pas myi dmyigs pa'i gnas shes bya ba dang / de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo de dag la stsogs pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ba'i sgo
191a5(phal chen): grangs myed pa brgya stong phrag bcu tshang bar yang dag par 'gro ba byed cing / rgyan brjod du myed pa shin tu rnam par phye ba'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor na 'khod pa mthong bar gyur to/ /rim khang
191a6(phal chen): bdun pa'i nang na byang chub sems dpa' sgra brnyan lta bu'i bzod pa rab tu thob pa thabs dang ye shes rnam par gdon mi za ba la shin tu byung ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos
191a7(phal chen): kyi sprin yang dag par 'dzin pa sha stag 'dus shing 'khod pa mthong ngo / /rim khang brgyad pa'i nang na byang chub sems dpa' mnyam par 'gro ba'i mngon par shes pa rab tu thob pa/ 'jig rten
191a8(phal chen): gyi khams thams cad du rnam par rgyu ba/ 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad du gzug brnyan rab tu 'byung ba/ chos kyi dbyings thams cad du lus shin tu rnam par phye ba/ de bzhin gshegs
191b1(phal chen): pa thams cad kyi zhabs kyi drung nas gud du mi 'phags pa'i yul dang ldan pa/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sa la yang dag par gzhol ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor
191b2(phal chen): du sngon du brjod pa'i gtam gyi skyes bur gyur pa sha stag kun nas 'dus shing 'khod pa mthong ngo / /rim khang dgu pa'i nang na byang chub sems dpa' tshe gcig gis thogs pa sha stag 'dus
191b3(phal chen): shing 'khod pa mthong ngo / /rim khang bcu pa'i nang na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad thog ma byang chub tu thugs bskyed pa dang / spyod pa dang / 'byung ba dang / smon lam rgya mtsho dang / sangs rgyas kyi
191b4(phal chen): rnam par 'phrul pa'i yul dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing dang / 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad du bcas pa dang / chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu sgrog pa dang bcas pa dang / sems can 'dul bar
191b5(phal chen): mdzad pa'i byin kyis rlabs dang bcas par mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang chos kyi tshong dpon rin chen gtsug phud la 'di skad ces smras so/ /'phags pa khyod la 'di lta bu'i phun sum tshogs
191b6(phal chen): pa mnga' na/ phun sum tshogs pa'i rnam pa de ji lta ba zhig du sbyang ba/ mdzod dge ba'i rtsa ba ni su zhig la yongs su bskyed bskyed/ des smras pa/ rigs kyi bu kho bos dran te/ 'das pa'i
191b7(phal chen): dus kyi bskal pa sang+yas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa'i yang pha rol gcig na/ 'jig rten gyi khams 'khor lo sna tshogs shes bya bar/ de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi dbyings
191b8(phal chen): 'od gzer mtha' yas pas yongs su brgyan pa'i chos kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba mkhyen pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ bla na myed pa/
192a1(phal chen): skyes bu 'dul ba/ kha lo sgyur ba/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten du byung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa de ye shes rnam par snang ba la
192a2(phal chen): stsogs pa nyan thos bye ba phrag brgya dang / ye shes nyi ma'i gzi brjid la stsogs pa/ byang chub sems dpa' bye ba brgya phrag stong dang / thabs gcig du rgyal po chos kyi dbang phyug rgyal
192a3(phal chen): pos spyan drangs nas/ bza' shing gi ra ba chen po rin po rin chen rgyal mtshan rgyan kyis mdzes pa zhes bya bar gshegs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa de grong khyer du gshegs nas/ tshong 'dus
192a4(phal chen): kyi srang nas tshur bzhud pa'i tshe/ kho bos de bzhin gshegs pa de dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir/ sil snyan dang
192a5(phal chen): rol mo'i sgra zhig kyang phyung / spos kyi ri lu zhig kyang bsregs te/ bdug spos kyis bsangs so/ /spos kyi ri lu gcig po de/ de ltar bsregs pas zhag bdun du 'dzam bu'i gling
192a6(phal chen): thams cad kyang spos kyi na bun gyi sprin kha dog sna tshogs dang ldan pa/ sems can thams cad kyi lus dang 'dra bas yongs su khebs par gyur te/ spos kyi na bun gyi sprin de dag
192a7(phal chen): las kyang sgra 'di skad du brjod de/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni bsam gyis myi khyab ste/ dus gsum du dri ma myed pa'i ye shes kyi phung po dang ldan pa'o/ /thams cad mkhyen pa ste/
192a8(phal chen): sgrib pa thams cad myi mnga' ba'o/ /nyon mongs pa'i bag chags thams cad yongs su byang ba ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa la yon phul ba thams cad mkhyen pa'i
192b1(phal chen): don chen po tshad myed pa bsgrub par 'gyur ro/ /thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yang dag par gzhol bar 'gyur ro zhes/ de skad du kho bo'i dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su smin par bya ba dang /
192b2(phal chen): sems can thams cad dge ba'i rtsa ba las shugs yang dag par bskyed pa'i phyir/ spos kyi na bun gyi sprin de las/ sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis rlabs kyis sgra'i rnam pa de lta bu byung ngo / /
192b3(phal chen): rigs kyi bu de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyis rlabs kyis/ bstan pa'i cho 'phrul gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang kho bos gnas gsum du yongs su bsngos te/ gsum gang zhe na/
192b4(phal chen): 'di ltar phongs pa thams cad shin tu rgyun gcad pa dang / dam pa'i chos mnyan pa dang myi 'bral ba dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad mthong ba/
192b5(phal chen): yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur bar bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o/ /rigs kyi bu kho bos ni byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa smon lam gyi dkyil 'khor thogs pa myed pa'i rgyan ces
192b6(phal chen): bya ba 'di shes par zad na/ kho bos byang chub sems dpa' yon tan rin po che tshad myed pa'i 'byung gnas su gyur pa/ sangs rgyas kyi sku rgya mtsho dang / tha myi dad pa la zhugs pa/ tha myi dad pa'i chos
192b7(phal chen): kyi sprin gyi char yang dag par 'dzin pa/ tha myi dad pa'i yon tan rgya mtsho la zhugs pa/ kun tu bzangs po'i spyod pa'i dra ba rnam par rgyas par gyur pa/ ting nge 'dzin tha myi dad pa'i yul la zhugs pa
192b8(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' thams cad tha myi dad pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba'i rgyun gcig tu gyur pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang tha myi dad cing rnam par myi rtog par spyod pa/ dus gsum tha myi dad pas
193a1(phal chen): mnyam pa nyid la zhugs pa/ bskal pa thams cad tha myi dad par yongs su gnas par myi skyo ba/ kun tu lta ba tha myi dad pa'i yul gyi sa la gnas pa de dag gi spyod pa shes pa 'am/
193a2(phal chen): yon tan brjod par nus re skan/ /song rigs kyi bu lho phyogs kyi rgyud 'di nyid na yul spa'i rtsa ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de'i grong khyer kun nas sgo zhes bya ba na/ tshong dpon spos 'tshong kun tu
193a3(phal chen): lta ba zhes bya ba 'dug gis/ de'i gan du song la ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bya ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bya ba dris shig /de nas tshong dpon gyi bu
193a4(phal chen): nor bzangs kyis chos kyi tshong dpon rin chen gtsug phud kyi rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ chos kyi tshong dpon rin chen gtsug phud la lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor
193a5(phal chen): ba byas nas yang dang yang bltas te/ chos kyi tshong dpon rin chen gtsug phud kyi drung nas song ngo // //sangs rgyas rmad ga cad ces bya ba shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo/ bam po bcu bzhi pa/
193a6(phal chen): de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs sangs rgyas mtha' yas pa mthong ba la zhugs pa/ byang chub sems dpa' mtha' yas pa dang 'grogs pa rab tu thob pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i lam mtha'
193a7(phal chen): yas pa'i tshul gyis snang bar gyur pa/ chos kyi tshul mtha' yas pas mngon par brlan pas shin tu rtogs pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i mos pa mtha' yas pa'i lam
193a8(phal chen): gyis rnam par dag pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i dbang po'i mtha' yas pa'i snang ba rab tu thob pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i bsam pa mtha' yas pa'i stobs la gnas pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i
193b1(phal chen): spyod pa mtha' yas pa'i rjes su song ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam mtha' yas pa'i stobs yongs su skyes pa/ byang chub sems dpa' gzhan gyis thub pa myed
193b2(phal chen): pa'i mtha' yas pa'i rgyal mtshan can/ byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes snang ba mtha' yas pa'i rgyud dang ldan pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i chos mtha' yas pa'i snang ba rab tu thob pa de mthar
193b3(phal chen): gyis yul spa'i rtsa ba gang na ba der phyin nas/ grong khyer kun nas sgo yongs su tshol zhing phyogs dang / phyogs mtshams dang / yul phyogs nyen kor kun dang / sgang dang gshong dang / mnyam pa dang myi
193b4(phal chen): mnyam pa thams cad du yongs su skyo ba myed pa'i bsam pa dang / 'jigs pa myed pa'i sems dang / ldog pa myed pa'i brtson 'grus dang / thub pa myed pa'i sems kyis/ dge ba'i
193b5(phal chen): bshes gnyen gyi gdams ngag ma brjed pa dang / rtag tu dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi spyod pa ma nor bas sems rab tu bsgos pa dang / sgo kun nas rnam par dmyig pa'i dbang po dang ldan pa dang /
193b6(phal chen): bag myed pa thams cad dang bral ba dang / myig dang rna ba g.yeng ba med par kun tu tshol tshol nas yul spa'i rtsa ba'i dbus shig na/ grong khyer kun nas sgo tshong 'dus kyi grong rdal stong phrag bcu'i gnas
193b7(phal chen): su gyur pa/ de shin tu bzang por grub pa/ ra ba brtan pas bskor ba/ shin tu mtho ba bzhi mdo brgyad kyis brgyan pa 'dug par mthong ste/ de'i nang na spos 'tshong kun tu lta ba yang spos 'tshong gi
193b8(phal chen): 'khyams shig na 'dug pa mthong nas/ spos 'tshong kun tu lta ba gang na ba der phyin te/ spos 'tshong kun tu lta ba'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal nas/ mdun du 'dug ste/ thal mo sbyar
194a1(phal chen): nas 'di skad ces smras so/ /'phags pa bdag gis bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed na/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa' spyod
194a2(phal chen): pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba ma mtshal to/ /smras pa rigs kyi bu de ltar khyod kyis bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa legs so/ /
194a3(phal chen): rigs kyi bu kho bos ni sems can thams cad kyi nad shes te/ rlung las gyur pa dang / mkhris pa las gyur pa dang / bad kan las gyur pa dang / cha mnyam par 'khrugs pa dang / gzhan gyis
194a4(phal chen): gnod par byas pa dang / mi ma yin pa las gyur pa dang / dug 'thungs pa dang / sngags dang / mtshon dang / ro langs pa'i sbyor ba sna tshogs dang / me las gyur pa dang / chus bskyod pa las gyur pa dang /
194a5(phal chen): bsngangs pa dang 'jigs pa sna tshogs las gyur pa thams cad kyang shes so/ /nad de dag thams cad shes par bya ba yang shes te/ 'di ltar bsnun par bya ba yang rab tu shes so/ /skyug par
194a6(phal chen): bya ba dang / bkru ba dang gtar ba dang / sna'i mchog dang nya ra dang gdugs dang / lums dang / byug pa dang / dug gso ba dang / 'byung po'i gdon myed par bya ba dang / bcud dang khrus dang / gzhag pa
194a7(phal chen): dang / bskyed pa dang / kha dog sbyang ba dang / nyam bsdod pa 'ang rab tu shes te/ rigs kyi bu phyogs bcu nas sems can gang ji snyed cig kho bo'i drung du 'ong ba de dag thams cad kyi nad thams cad kyang
194a8(phal chen): rab tu zhi bar byed de/ nad sos nas kyang legs par bkru ba dang lus la byug pas byug pa byas nas/ ci'i tshul gyi rgyan gyis yan lag shin tu brgyan te/ ci rigs pa'i gos lus la bskon nas/
194b1(phal chen): kha zas bro ba'i mchog dang ldan pa sna tshogs kyis yongs su tshim par byas te/ nor dpag tu med pas kyang phun sum tshogs par byed do/ /de'i 'og tu yang de dag la mi gtsang ba bstan cing / 'dod
194b2(phal chen): chags spang ba'i phyir chos ston to/ /byams pa chen po yongs su bsngags shing zhe sdang spang ba'i phyir chos ston to/ /chos rnam par dbye ba'i bye brag bstan cing gti mug spang ba'i phyir chos ston to/ /
194b3(phal chen): khyad par khong du chud pa'i tshul gyi sgo yang dag par bstan cing cha mnyam pa'i spyod pa dang / nyon mongs pa spang ba'i phyir chos ston to/ /sangs rgyas kyi yon tan gyi chos dang ldan pa'i gtam thams cad
194b4(phal chen): yongs su brjod cing byang chub kyi sems 'byung ba'i rgyu yongs su ston to/ /'khor ba'i bsdug bsngal tshad gzung du myed pa yongs su ston to/ /snying rje chen po'i 'byung ba'i rgyu yongs su ston to/ /
194b5(phal chen): bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs rgya chen po bstsags pa yang dag par bsngags shing yon tan tshad med pa 'thob pa dang / 'byung ba'i rgyu yongs su ston to/ /sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba
194b6(phal chen): dang / gdul bar bya ba yongs su bstan cing theg pa chen po'i smon lam 'byung ba'i rgyu yongs su ston to/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad dang / bskal pa thams cad du gnas par bya ba'i spyod pa'i dra ba shin
194b7(phal chen): tu rgyas par bshad cing byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa 'thob pa dang / 'byung ba'i rgyu yongs su ston to/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su bsngags shing mtshan dang dpe byad bzang pos
194b8(phal chen): brgyan pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sku 'thob pa dang 'byung ba'i rgyu yongs su ston to/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su brjod cing de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku yongs su dag pa thams cad du 'gro ba 'thob pa dang
195a1(phal chen): 'byung ba'i rgyu yongs su ston to/ /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su brjod cing de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs dang / sku mdog rnam par dag pa bsam gyis ma khyab pa'i rgyu yongs su ston
195a2(phal chen): to/ /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su brjod cing de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku thob par dka' ba yongs su ston to/ /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su brjod cing de bzhin gshegs pa'i
195a3(phal chen): sku zil gyis mi non la/ zil gyis gnon pa rnam par dag pa yongs su ston to/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su brjod cing chos kyi sku yongs su dag pa yongs su ston to/ /thabs mkhas pa'i
195a4(phal chen): pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su brjod cing 'gro ba thams cad la mngon du gyur pa'i sku gtsang zhing rnam par dag pa yongs su ston to/ /smon lam gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su brjod cing bskal pa thams cad
195a5(phal chen): kyi dus su 'gro ba thams cad kyi sems dang 'grogs pa'i sku rnam par dag pa yongs su ston to/ /stobs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su brjod cing sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du mngon par 'byung ba'i sku rnam
195a6(phal chen): par dag pa yongs su ston to/ /ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su brjod cing 'gro ba thams cad bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du tshim par mdzad pa'i sku rnam par dag pa yongs su ston to/ /myi dge ba'i chos
195a7(phal chen): thams cad las rnam par ldog pa yongs su brjod cing blta na phul du bzang ba'i sku rnam par dag pa yongs su ston to/ /de ltar de dag chos gyi sbyin pas yongs su bsdus te/ nor dang rin po che mtha' yas
195a8(phal chen): pa'i tshogs kyis nye bar brten pa byas shing so sor 'gyed do/ /yang rigs kyi bu kho bos ni spos dang / bdug spos dang / bsgo ba dang / bsku ba sbyor shes te/ 'di ltar spos kyi rgyal po gzhal du med pa la stsogs pa
195b1(phal chen): dang / spos kyi rgyal po sin 'du ra la stsogs pa dang / spos kyi rgyal po mi 'phags pa la stsogs pa dang / spos kyi rgyal po rnam par gsal byed la stsogs pa dang / spos kyi rgyal po nyi ma yod pa la stsogs pa
195b2(phal chen): dang / spos kyi rgyal po dus dang 'thun pa la stsogs pa dang / spos kyi rgyal po sbrul gyi snying po'i tsan dan la stsogs pa dang / spos kyi rgyal po sprin gyi a ga ru la stsogs pa dang / spos kyi rgyal po dbang po mi
195b3(phal chen): 'khrug pa la stsogs pa/ spos sbyar ba thams cad kyang rab tu shes so/ /yang rigs kyi bu kho bo ni sems can thams cad yongs su tshim par byed pa dang / sgo thams cad nas sangs rgyas blta zhing
195b4(phal chen): mchod pa dang / bsnyen bkur ba'i spos kyi gzugs shes te/ rigs kyi bu kho bo ni sems can thams cad yongs su tshim par byed pa dang / sgo thams cad nas sangs rgyas blta zhing mchod pa dang / bsnyen
195b5(phal chen): bkur ba'i spos kyi gzugs 'dis kho bo'i bsam pa thams cad kyang yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur te/ de'i mthus kho bos sems can thams cad yongs su skyob pa'i rgyan gyi sprin byin gyi rlob pa byed
195b6(phal chen): de 'di ltar spos kyi khang pa brtsegs pa'i sprin gyi rgyan nas rnam pa thams cad du de bzhin gshegs pa mchod cing rim gror bya ba'i rgyan gyi sprin gyi bar du byin gyis rlob pa byed do/ /rigs kyi bu kho bo ni nam
195b7(phal chen): de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa bya bar 'dod pa de'i tshe/ kho bos sems can thams cad yongs su tshim par byed pa dang / sgo thams cad nas sangs rgyas blta zhing mchod pa dang / bsnyen bkur ba'i spos
195b8(phal chen): kyi gzugs 'di las spos kyi mdzod kyi khang pa brtsegs pa'i sprin tshad gzung du myed pa brton cing / phyogs bcu'i chos kyi dbyings thams cad na bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi dkyil 'khor
196a1(phal chen): chos kyi dbyings thams cad du spos thams cad kyi mdzod kyi khang pa brtsegs pa'i sprin gyi rgyan byin gyis rlob pa byed do/ /chos kyi dbyings thams cad du sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad yongs su
196a2(phal chen): sbyong ba'i sprin gyi rgyan dang / spos kyi khang pa'i sprin gyi char dang / spos kyi ra ba'i sprin gyi rgyan dang / spos kyi ba gam gyi sprin gyi rgyan dang / spos kyi rta babs kyi sprin gyi rgyan dang / spos kyi skar khung gi
196a3(phal chen): sprin gyi rgyan dang / spos kyi pu shu'i sprin gyi rgyan dang / spos kyi zla bag gyi sprin gyi rgyan dang / spos gyi gdugs gyi sprin gyi rgyan dang / spos kyi rgyal mtshan sgreng ba'i sprin gyi rgyan dang / spos kyi lha'i ba dan
196a4(phal chen): gyi rgyan dang / spos kyi bla bre'i sprin gyi rgyan dang / spos kyi gzugs kyi dra ba'i sprin gyi rgyan dang / spos kyi 'od kyi sprin gyi rgyan dang / spos kyi snang ba dri ma myed pa'i sprin gyi rgyan dang / spos thams cad
196a5(phal chen): kyi sprin gyi char rab tu 'bab pa'i rgyan byin gyis rlob te/ rigs kyi bu kho bos ni sems can thams cad yongs su tshim par byed pa dang / sgo thams cad nas sangs rgyas blta zhing mchod pa dang /
196a6(phal chen): bsnyen bkur ba'i spos kyi gzugs kyi chos kyi sgo 'di shes par zad na/ kho bos byang chub sems dpa' sman gyi rgyal po lta bur gyur pa/ blta na don yod pa/ 'grogs na don yod pa/
196a7(phal chen): rjes su dran na don yod pa/ brtul zhugs rjes su byas na don yod pa/ mying thos na don yod pa/ mthong ba tsam gyis sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa zhi bar 'gyur ba/ mthong ba tsam gyis
196a8(phal chen): sems can rnams ngan song gi rgyud las ldog par 'gyur ba/ mthong ba tsam gyis sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi chos la skabs phye ba thob par gyur pa/ mthong ba tsam gyis sems
196b1(phal chen): can rnams kyi sdug bsngal gyi phung po thams cad zhi bar 'gyur ba mthong ba tsam gyis sems can rnams 'jigs pa dang / 'khor ba'i lam gyi rgyud thams cad kyi 'jigs pa dang bral bar 'gyur ba
196b2(phal chen): mthong ba tsam gyis sems can rnams thams cad mkhyen pa'i phyogs la rten par 'gyur ba'i phyir myi 'jigs pa thob par 'gyur ba/ mthong ba tsam gyis sems can rnams rga shi'i grog po dang g.yang
196b3(phal chen): sar mi ltung ba/ mthong ba tsam gyis sems can rnams chos kyi dbyings mnyam pa nyid la gnas pas mya ngan las 'das pa'i bde ba 'thob par 'gyur ba de dag gi spyod pa shes pa 'am yon tan
196b4(phal chen): brjod par nus re skan/ song rigs kyi bu lho phyogs kyi rgyud 'di nyid na grong khyer ta la'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba yod de/ de na rgyal po me zhes bya ba 'dug gis/ de'i gan du song la ji ltar byang
196b5(phal chen): chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bya ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bya ba dris shig /de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs/ tshong dpon spos 'tshong kun tu blta ba'i rkang
196b6(phal chen): pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ tshong dpon spos 'tshong kun tu blta ba la lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas yang dang yang bltas te/ tshong dpon spos 'tshong kun tu blta
196b7(phal chen): ba'i drung nas song ngo / /de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs dge ba'i bshes gnyen gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa de dag rjes su dran par byed cing / dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi gdams ngag gi sgo
196b8(phal chen): de dag rjes su dran par bya ba dang / bdag ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su bzung ngo / /zhes bya ba'i sems yongs su tshim par bya ba dang / bdag ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su
197a1(phal chen): bsrungs pas/ da ni bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir ldog par yang myi 'gyur ro/ /snyam du rnam par sems shing / sems dga' ba ni rab tu thob/ sems
197a2(phal chen): dang ba dang sems rab tu dga' ba dang / sems rangs pa dang / sems mgu ba dang / sems mos pa dang / sems kyi shugs dang / sems rnam par zhi ba dang / sems rgya chen po dang / sems kyi rgyan dang /
197a3(phal chen): sems la thogs pa myed pa dang sems la sgrib pa myed pa dang / sems rnam par phye ba dang / sems yang dag par gzhol ba dang / sems kyi dbang dang / sems kyi dbang sgyur ba dang / sems kyi
197a4(phal chen): chos khong du chud pa dang / sems kyi zhing rgyas par dgang ba dang / sems sangs rgyas mthong bas rgyan pa dang / sems stobs bcu'i yid la bya ba dang mi 'bral ba 'ang thob nas/ de mthar kyi ljongs nas
197a5(phal chen): ljongs dang / grong nas grong dang yul nas yul du tshal zhing grong khyer ta la'i rgyal mtshan gang na ba der phyin te/ rgyal po me gang na bzhugs pa dris na/ de 'gro ba gzhan dag gis 'di skad ces bstan te/ rigs kyi bu
197a6(phal chen): 'dir rgyal po me ni rgyal po'i don bsgrub pa'i phyir seng ge'i gdan la bzhugs shing / rgyal po'i phrin las mdzad do/ /khams rab tu skyong ngo / /chad pas gcad par 'os pa ni chad pas gcad do/ /
197a7(phal chen): bya dgas sdud par 'os pa ni bya dgas sdud do/ /g.yon yod pa rnams la gyong myed do/ /rtsod pa rnams kyi zhal ce ni yongs su gcod do/ /dma' ba rnams ni dbugs 'byin to/ /dregs pa
197a8(phal chen): rnams ni 'dul ba mdzad do/ /srog gcod pa las ni rnam par zlog go/ /ma byin par len pa dang ni rnam par dbyen pa mdzad do/ /gzhan gyis yongs su bzung ba la mngon par zhen pa ni rnam par
197b1(phal chen): zhi bar mdzad do/ /rdzun du smra ba las phyir zlog pa mdzad do/ /phra ma'i tshig dang ni rnam par 'bral bar mdzad do/ /zhe gcod pa'i ngag ni rgyun gcod pa mdzad do/ /tshig khyal ba las ni yongasu glon no/ /
197b2(phal chen): chags sems dang ni myi 'dre ba mdzad do/ /gnod sems dang ni rgyang ring ngo / /log par lta ba dang ni 'dre ba myed par mdzad do/ /de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs rgyal po me gang na ba der phyin te/
197b3(phal chen): des mthong ba rgyal po mye de ni rin po che'i seng ge'i khri chen po rdo rje mthu bo che'i nor bu sna tshogs kyis spras pa/ rin po che 'od gsal ba rnam pa sna tshogs grangs myed pa las byas pa'i rkang pa bkye ba/
197b4(phal chen): rin po che gcig ma yin pas legs par spras shing brgyan pas yid du 'ong ba'i lhun dang ldan pa/ gser gyi lcag pod kyi dra bas legs par blangs shing chub par brtags pa/ nor bu rin po che du ma'i
197b5(phal chen): sgron mas shin tu snang bar byas pa/ nor bu rin po che dbang gi rgyal po las byas pa'i pad mo'i snying po can/ lha rdzas kyi rin po che'i stan rim pa du mar bting ba/ gam yo nas lha rdzas kyi spos sna tshogs kyis bdug
197b6(phal chen): spos kyis shin tu bdugs pa/ rin po che'i rgyal mtshan sgreng ba/ brgya phrag stong gis mdzes par byas pa/ rin po che'i ba dan brgya phrag stong rnam par bres pas brgyan pa/ rin po che'i me tog gi chun po
197b7(phal chen): sna tshogs kyi lda ldi rab tu bkye bas shin tu mdzes par byas pa/ steng nas lha rdzas kyi rin po che'i bla re sna tshogs bres pa zhig la 'dug cing / de ni gzhon zhing dar la bab pa/ gzugs mdzes shing blta na
197b8(phal chen): yid du 'ong ba/ skra mthon ting g.yas phyogs su 'khyil ba dang ldan pa/ mgo gdugs ltar 'dug pa gtsug tor spyi bo can/ 'phral ba yangs pa/ myig dkar nag 'byes shing ring la/ rdzi ma ba'i rdzi
198a1(phal chen): ma ltar 'dug pa/ sna'i dbyibs legs shing bzang la rim par mdzes pa dang ldan pa/ mchu mtshal ltar mdog bzang zhing shin tu legs pa dang ldan pa/ so mnyam zhing thags bzang la shin tu
198a2(phal chen): dkar ba bzhi bcu tshang ba dang ldan pa/ 'gram pa'i lha nga seng ge'i 'gram pa ltar 'dug pa khur ba shes rgyas pa/ smin tsugs gzhu ltar 'dug cing ring la shin tu mdzes pa/ mdzod spu zla ba'i kha dog
198a3(phal chen): ltar 'dug pa'i thig le can/ rna ba'i shal ring zhing lhod par 'phyang ba/ zla ba nya ba ltar bzhin mdangs dang ldan zhing shin tu bzang ba/ mgul zlum zhing dung ltar mdzes pa/ snying ka dpal gyis be
198a4(phal chen): 'us brgyan pa/ ro stod seng ge'i ro stod ltar 'dug pa/ thal gong shin tu rgyas la/ dpung mgo'i lhun legs shing zlum pa/ lag pa ring ba dra bar 'brel ba'i sor mo can/ rkang lag 'khor los brgyan
198a5(phal chen): pa/ rkang lag 'jam zhing gzhon la sha rgyas pa/ bdun shin tu mtho ba/ rked pa rdo rje ltar 'dug pa/ lus che zhing drang ba/ brla zlum pa/ pho mtshan gsang ba'i sbubs na 'dug pa/ byin pa ri dgas
198a6(phal chen): e na ya'i byin pa ltar 'dug pa/ sor mo ring ba/ rkang pa'i rting ba yangs pa/ 'od 'dom gang ba dang ldan pa mdog gser gyi kha dog ltar 'dug pa/ ba spu re re nas g.yas phyogs su gyen du 'khyil
198a7(phal chen): ba/ shing n+ya gro da'i rgyal po ltar chu zheng gab pa/ lus mtshan dang dpe byad bzang pos shin tu brgyan pa/ mgo la nor bu rin po che yid bzhin gyi cod pan thogs pa/ 'dzam bu chu klung gi gser
198a8(phal chen): las byas pa'i dpral ba'i dbyen bla gam gyis mdzes par brgyan pa/ rna ba las rin po che in dra nI la'i rna cha dri ma med pa 'phyang ba/ nor bu rin po che rin thang myed pa'i se mo do'i 'od kyis snang
198b1(phal chen): bar byas pa/ dri ma myed pa'i ro stod rgyas pa dang ldan pa/ lha rdzas kyi nor bu dam pa'i rin po che'i dpung rgyan dang / gdu bus lag pa mdzes par brgyan pa zhig ste/ rin po che'i gdugs chen
198b2(phal chen): po rin po che bai DUr+ya dri ma myed pa'i yu ba can/ rin po che'i shar bu brgya phrag bcus rnam par phye ba/ 'dzam bu chu klung gi gser gyi bla gab can nor bu rin po che sgra snang ba rnam par dag pa'i snying po
198b3(phal chen): can/ rin po che'i dril bu'i phreng ba las sgra snyan cing / yid du 'ong ba 'byung ba/ nor bu rin po che'i 'od phyogs kun tu 'phro ba can drung nas bzung zhing bsgreng ba/ rgyal po'i gzi brjid dang dbang chen
198b4(phal chen): po la gnas pa/ srid la gzhan gyi 'khor gyis gtse ba med pa/ dgra'i 'jigs pa dang bral ba'i dbang phyug dang ldan par 'dug pa mthong ngo / /de'i 'khor kun nas kyang blon po stong phrag bcu tshogs shing rgyal
198b5(phal chen): po'i dgos pa bsgrub pa la brtson pa mthong ngo / /de'i mdun na chad pas bcod pa'i myi sems can dmyal ba'i srungs ma lta bu/ gshen rje'i g.yog 'khor lta bu 'jigs ltar go gyon pa/ gtum zhing
198b6(phal chen): myi bzad la 'jigs pa chen po bskyed pa myig dmar ba so gtsigs pa/ gdong gi gnyer ma gsum khro gnyer du bsdus pa/ ral gri dang sta re dang / lcags kyi chang mdung dang / mda' dang be rga dang / mdung la stsogs
198b7(phal chen): pa'i mtshon cha dang / lag cha thogs pa'i lus dang / bzhin gyi dbyibs myi sdug cing 'jigs su rung ba/ sprin nag po ltar 'dug pa/ myi snyan cing brlang la sdang ba'i sgra drag po 'byin pa/ gzi lta bar
198b8(phal chen): dka' ba/ 'jigs pa chen po bskyed pa/ srog chags brgya phrag stong gi snying 'gems par byed pa/ de lta bu dag chad pas gcad par 'os pa'i sems can chad pas gcod pa la brtson pa mthong ngo / /
199a1(phal chen): de na srog chags rku ba gzhan gyi nor la 'phrog pa/ sems can gyi longs spyod chud stsod pa/ lam sgugs shing 'phrog pa/ grong dang grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang / lhas la myes gtor ba/
199a2(phal chen): grong du chom po byed pa/ khyim phugs 'debs pa/ sdig sdig ltar byed pa/ dug ldud pa/ dkrugs ma byed pa/ thong mi byed pa/ byi bo byed pa/ log par zhugs pa/ gnod par sems pa/ 'dod chen mtshe
199a3(phal chen): ba/ sdig pa sna tshogs kyi las myi bzad pa byed pa/ brgya stong mang po bcing ba dam po lngas bcings shing rgyal po mye'i drung du khrid pa dag kyang mthong ngo / /de dag la 'ang rgyal po myes ci rigs par chad
199a4(phal chen): pas gcad par gyur pa mthong ngo / /des na rgyal po mes sgo zhing la la ni rkang lag bcad/ la la ni rna ba dang sna bcad/ la la ni myig phyung / la la ni yan lag dang nying lag dang / mgo gcod/ la la ni lus thams cad mes
199a5(phal chen): btang / la la ni ba rtswa'i chu khol bas lus la gtor cing pags pa bsnyil ba la stsogs pa/ de lta bu'i chad pa sna tshogs du ma mi bzad pa drag po rlang ba yid du mi 'ong ba srog 'phrog pa dag kyang byed
199a6(phal chen): par mthong ngo / /gsad pa'i sa de na 'ang bsad pa'i rkang lag dang / rna myig dang sna dang / mgo dang yan lag dang nying lag gi phung po ri rab tsam du spungs pa mthong ngo / /khrag gi mtsho dpag tshad
199a7(phal chen): gsum tsam du zab la chu zhing du dpag tshad du ma yod pa yang mthong ngo / /de na shi ba'i rkeng rus yan lag dang nying lag dang / mgo dang bral ba brgya stong du ma la/ spyang ki dang wa dang /
199a8(phal chen): khyi dang bya rog dang / bya rgod dang / khra dang bya ku ra ra mang pos gang ste/ 'drad cing 'thog pa mthong ngo / /de la 'ang la la ni kha dog du gyur te/ sngon por gyur pa tsam/ la la ni rnags
199b1(phal chen): pa tsam/ la la ni bam pa tsam/ la la ni 'bu zhugs pa tsam du gyur te/ shin tu skyi g.ya' zhing 'jigs 'jigs ltar 'dug pa mthong ngo / /gsod pa de dag gis bsad pa'i tshe/
199b2(phal chen): myi sdug pa cho dgur byas pas na 'jigs 'jigs skad dang / snying rje rje skad du sgra 'byin cing cho nges 'debs pa'i sgra chen po thos na/ skyi g.ya' zhing mi dga' ba chen po bskyed pa/
199b3(phal chen): sems can dmyal ba chen po ris gzhom pa'i sgra lta bu 'ang thos so/ /des de ltar kha btags te brdungs pa dang / shin tu 'jigs pa'i drag shul mthong nas/ 'di snyam du gyur te
199b4(phal chen): bdag ni sems can thams cad la phan pa dang / bde ba'i phyir bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon du zhugs te/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yongs su tshol zhing
199b5(phal chen): 'bad de/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams la dge ba ni ci zhig bgyi/ mi dge ba ni gang zhig spang zhes 'dri na/ rgyal po me 'di la ni dge ba'i chos kyang myed de/ kha na ma tho ba chen po'i las la
199b6(phal chen): spyod pa yid kyi yongs su rtogs pa shin tu gtum pa dang ldan pa/ sems can pha rol gyi srog gcod pa la zhugs pa/ sems can pha rol shin tu mnar ba la brtson pa/
199b7(phal chen): tshe phyi ma la lta ba myed pa/ ngan song gi g.yang sa'i gad ka na 'dug pa/ zhig na 'di las ji zhig byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa 'ang thos par 'gyur ram snyam ste/ de de ltar sems
199b8(phal chen): shing yid la byed de/ sems can thams cad yongs su bskyab pa dang / mngon par brtson pa/ snying rje chen po skyes pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ de la steng gi nam mkha'i dbyings las lha
200a1(phal chen): mang pos mos pa/ rigs kyi bu drang srong rgyal ba drod kyi skye mched kyi dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi gdams ngag du bya ba mi dran nam/ des gyen du nam mkha'i dbyings la bltas nas/ dran no zhes brjod
200a2(phal chen): do/ /lha rnams kyis smras pa/ rigs kyi bu khyod dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi gdams ngag la de ltar the tsom ma bskyed cig /rigs kyi bu dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams ni yang dag pa ma nor bar ston gyi log
200a3(phal chen): pa ma yin no/ /rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi thabs mkhas pas spyod pa'i ye shes ni bsam gyis mi khyab po/ /sems can yongs su sdud pa'i ye shes ni bsam gyis mi khyab
200a4(phal chen): po/ /sems can la phan 'dogs pa'i ye shes bsam gyis mi khyab po/ /sems can tshar gcod pa'i ye shes bsam gyis myi khyab po/ /sems can gzengs bstod pa'i ye shes bsam gyis mi khyab
200a5(phal chen): po/ /sems can yongs su sbyong ba'i ye shes bsam gyis mi khyab po/ /sems can yongs su skyong ba'i ye shes bsam gyis mi khyab po/ /sems can 'dzud pa'i ye shes bsam gyis mi khyab po/ /
200a6(phal chen): sems can yongs su smin par byed pa'i ye shes bsam gyis mi khyab po/ /sems can 'dul ba'i ye shes bsam gyis mi khyab po/ /drang srong rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpa'i spyod
200a7(phal chen): pa dris shig ces nas/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis lha'i ngag mnyan te/ rgyal po me gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ rgyal po me'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag
200a8(phal chen): 'tshal te/ rgyal po me la lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas mdun du 'dug ste/ thal mo sbyar nas 'di skad ces smras so/ /'phags pa bdag gis
200b1(phal chen): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed na/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bgyi
200b2(phal chen): ba ma 'tshal te/ 'phags pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams la gdams ngag dang rjes su bstan pa mdzad do zhes bdag gis thos na/ 'phags pa ji ltar byang chub sems dpa'as
200b3(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa'i spyod par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba bdag la bka' stsal du gsol/ de nas rgyal po myes rgyal po'i bya ba byas te/ seng ge'i khri las langs nas
200b4(phal chen): tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyi lag pa g.yas pa nas bzung ste/ rgyal po'i pho brang ta la'i rgyal mtshan du khrid do/ /de mthar kyis rang gi gnas su phyin nas/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor
200b5(phal chen): bzangs btsun mo'i 'khor gyi nang du khrid de khri la bzhag nas 'di skad ces smras so/ /rigs kyi bu nga'i khyim dang longs spyod la ltos shes nas/ des bltas na khyim de rgya che zhing yangs
200b6(phal chen): la rin po che bdun gyi ra bas yongs su bskor ba/ nor bu rin po che sna tshogs kyi khang pas shin tu mdzes par byas pa/ rin po che'i khang pa brtsegs pa brgya stong du mas rab tu brgyan
200b7(phal chen): pa/ nor bu rin po che bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i 'od shin tu 'bar bas gzi brjid rab tu 'bar bar byas pa/ nor bu rin po che sna tshogs kyis rnam pa tha dad pa rnam par phye zhing bres pas rnam par
200b8(phal chen): mdzes par byas pa/ mu tig dmar po'i ka ba bkye ba/ nang du seng ge'i khri mu sa ra gal ba las byas pa/ nor bu rin po che brgya stong du mas rnam pa sna tshogs su brgyan pa/
201a1(phal chen): shin tu bshams pa/ nor bu rin po che'i skar ma snang ba'i seng ge'i rgyal mtshan shin tu bsgreng ba/ steng nas nor bu rin po che rnam par snang ba'i bla re bres pa/ yid bzhin gyi nor
201a2(phal chen): bu rin po che sna tshogs kyi dra bas kun nas g.yogs pa/ nor bu rin po che sna tshogs grangs myed pas rab tu brgyan pa/ ba gam gyi rgyan dang ldan pa/ a sma gar ba las byas pa'i rdzing bu
201a3(phal chen): bsil bas gang ba dang ldan pa/ rin po che sna tshogs kyi shing gis 'khor bar 'dug pa mthong ngo / /de'i 'khor bud myed bzang zhing mdzes la lta na sdug pa/ kha dog rgyas pa/ bzang ba'i
201a4(phal chen): phul du bya ba dang ldan pa/ sgyu rtsal thams cad kyi tshul la mkhas pa sngon du ldang ba/ phyi nas nyal ba byams pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ ci bsgo ba bzhin du byed cing / ngag nyan pa
201a5(phal chen): bye ba phrag bcu yang 'khod par mthong ngo / /de nas rgyal po myes tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs la 'di skad ces smras so/ /rigs kyi bu ji snyam du sems/ ci sdig pa byed pa
201a6(phal chen): rnams la las kyi rnam par smin pa mngon par grub pa 'di lta bu yod dam/ lus phun sum tshogs pa 'di lta bu yod dam/ 'khor phun sum tshogs pa 'di lta bu yod dam/ bskyed pa chen
201a7(phal chen): po phun sum tshogs pa 'di lta bu yod dam/ dbang phyug dang dbang chen po thob pa phun sum tshogs pa 'di lta bu yod dam/ smras pa 'phags pa de lta bu ni ma mchis so/ /des
201a8(phal chen): smras pa/ rigs kyi bu nga ni byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa/ sgyu ma'i rnam pa thob pa ste/ rigs kyi bu nga'i yul na gnas pa'i sems can 'di dag kyang phal cher
201b1(phal chen): srog gcod pa byed pa/ ma byin par len pa/ 'dod pas log par g.yem pa/ rdzun du smra ba/ phra ma can tshig brlang por smra ba/ byung rgyal du brjod pa/ chags sems dang ldan pa/
201b2(phal chen): gnod sems can/ log par blta ba/ sdig pa'i las byed pa/ khro zhing gtum pa/ bab rgyal can/ mi dge ba'i las kyi bya ba sna tshogs dang ldan pa dag ste/ de dag ni rnam pa
201b3(phal chen): gzhan gyis sdig pa'i spyod pa las bzlog pa dang / dgag pa dang / bstan par mi nus te/ de ltar rigs kyi bu nga ni sems can 'di dag gdul ba dang / yongs su smin par bya ba dang /
201b4(phal chen): shin tu dul bar bya ba dang / phan pa la dgod par bya ba'i phyir/ snying rje chen po mngon du byas te/ gsod pa'i gshed ma sprul pa rnams gsad pa'i myir sprul pa rnams la 'ang / gsod du
201b5(phal chen): gzud pa dang / chad pas gcod pa'i mi sprul pa rnams mi dge ba'i las kyi lam la spyod par sprul pa'i myi rnams la chad pa sna tshogs kyis gcod du gzud pa dang / rkang lag dang sna dang
201b6(phal chen): rna ba dang / yan lag dang nying lag dang / mgo bcad pa las byung ba'i sdug bsngal mi bzad pa nyams su tshor bar gyur pa lta bu dag kyang yongs su ston pa byed de/ de mthong nas nga'i
201b7(phal chen): khams na gnas pa'i sems can de dag nyes pa gtong zhing skyo ba'i shugs thob par 'gyur ro/ /'jigs pa skye zhing bag tsha ba skye bar 'gyur ro/ /de dag sdig pa'i las byed pa rnams
201b8(phal chen): gtong zhing bag byed par 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu de ltar nga ni sems can 'di dag thabs des nyes pa stong zhing 'jigs pa'i sems dang ldan pa dang / skyo ba'i yid dang ldan par shes
202a1(phal chen): nas/ mi dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam las bzlog ste/ dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dang ldan par byas nas dga' zhing bde ba'i mthar phyin pa/ sdug bsngal thams cad rgyun chad pa'i
202a2(phal chen): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bde ba la dgod pa byed kyi/ rigs kyi bu nga ni lus dang ngag gam/ yid kyis kyang sems can su la 'ang co mi 'dri/ tho mi 'tsham mo rigs kyi bu nga ni phyi ma'i
202a3(phal chen): mtha'i mnar myed pa'i sdug bsngal gyis bgrang shes pa ste/ byol song gi skye gnas glen pa'i khams su gtogs pa'i las kyang chung ngu na/ rtswa'i rtse mos blta ba'i srog chags phre'u
202a4(phal chen): 'ga' la yang sems bskyed pa gcig tsam du yang sdug bsngal bar bya bar myi dga' na/ zhing du gyur cing dge ba'i las kyi lam bskyed par nus pa'i mi lta zhig ci smos/ rigs kyi bu
202a5(phal chen): nga ni rmi lam na yang mi dge ba'i chos yongs su rgyu ba myi bskyed na/ ched du bsams te lta smos re skan/ rigs kyi bu de ltar ngas ni byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa sgyu ma'i rnam
202a6(phal chen): pa 'di shes par zad na/ ngas ni byang chub sems dpa' mi skye ba'i chos kyi bzod pa thob pa/ srid pa dang lam gyi rgyud thams cad sgyu ma'i rnam pa khong du chud pa sprul pa lta bu'i byang chub
202a7(phal chen): sems dpa'i spyod pas 'byung ba/ gzugs brnyan lta bu'i 'jig rten thams cad rnam par rig pa/ rmi lam lta bu'i chos nyid khong du chud pa/ thogs pa med pa'i sgo'i chos kyi
202a8(phal chen): dbyings kyi tshul la rjes su zhugs pa/ myig 'phrul lta bu'i spyod pa'i dra ba rtogs par gyur pa/ ye shes bsgrib pa med pa'i spyod yul gyi yul dang ldan pa/ kun tu yang dag par gzhol
202b1(phal chen): ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyis lam gyis byung ba/ glong kun tu 'khyil pa'i rgyud kyi gzugs la dbang bsgyur ba/ sangs rgyas kyi spyod yul gyi yul khong du chud pa rnams kyi spyod yul shes pa 'am/
202b2(phal chen): yon tan brjod par nus re skan/ /song rigs kyi bu lho phyogs kyi rgyud 'di nyid na/ grong khyer 'od bzang po zhes bya ba yod de/ de na rgyal po 'od chen po zhes bya ba 'dug gis/ de'i gan du song la ji ltar byang chub sems
202b3(phal chen): dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bya ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bya ba dris shig /de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis rgyal po mye'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos
202b4(phal chen): phyag 'tshal te / rgyal po me la lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas te/ yang dang yang bltas nas rgyal po me'i drung nas song ngo / /de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs ye
202b5(phal chen): shes sgyu ma de rjes su dran par byed cing / byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa/ sgyu ma'i rnam pa de la bsam pa dang / chos nyid sgyu ma'i rnam pa de la rab tu brtag pa dang / las kyi
202b6(phal chen): sgyu ma mnyam pa de khong du chud par bya ba dang / chos kyi sgyu ma mnyam pa de la rjes su bsam pa dang / chos kyis yongs su smin par bya ba'i sprul pa mnyam pa de khong du chud par bya ba
202b7(phal chen): dang / ye shes las byung ba'i snang ba bsam gyis myi khyab pa de'i rjes su 'brang bar bya ba dang / smon lam gyi sgyu ma'i rnam pa mtha' yas pa mngon par bsgrub pa de/ mngon par bsgrub
202b8(phal chen): par bya ba dang / spyod pa sprul pa'i chos nyid chags pa myed pa de rnam par sbyang bar bya ba dang / dus gsum gyi sgyu ma'i rnam pa'i mtshan nyid de yang rnam par dbye ba byed cing / mthar gyi
203a1(phal chen): yul nas yul du dri ba dang / kun tu btsal ba dang / rjes su rnam par blta bar byed cing / phyogs dang phyogs mtshams dang lam dang / sman ljongs dang / thang dang thag
203a2(phal chen): thug dang / khal khol dang / ri dang sa sul dang / grong dang grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang / ljongs dang khams dang / rgyal po'i gnas thams cad du yongs su skyo ba myed pa'i sems dang
203a3(phal chen): lus la dub pa med par tshol tshol te/ grong khyer chen po 'od bzangs po'i nyen kor zhig du phyin pas rgyal po 'od chen po gang na bzhugs shes dris na/ de la 'gro ba mang pos bstan
203a4(phal chen): pa/ rigs kyi bu de re 'di ni grong khyer 'od bzang po zhes bya ba yin te/ 'di na rgyal po 'od chen po bzhugs so zhes nas/ de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs grong khyer chen po 'od bzang po
203a5(phal chen): gang na ba der phyin nas/ grong khyer chen po 'od bzang po mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang dga' rangs te/ mgu zhing nyams bde la tshim zhing yid bde ba skyes nas/ 'di snyam du bsams
203a6(phal chen): so/ /'di na bdag gi dge ba'i bshes gnyen bzhugs pa lta ste/ de ring ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen de yang mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /de las byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yang thob par 'gyur
203a7(phal chen): ro/ /byang chub sems dpa'i 'byung ba'i sgo dang / byang chub sems dpa'i chos nyid bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i yon tan bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang /
203a8(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa'i spyod yul bsam gyis mi khyab dang / byang chub sems dpa'i khyu mchog gi mthu phyung ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin la
203b1(phal chen): rnam par spyod pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pas rnam par rol pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i brtsams pa chen po mthar dbyung
203b2(phal chen): ba rnam par dag pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa 'ang thos par 'gyur ro zhes de ltar bsam pa yid la byed cing grong khyer chen po 'od bzang po gang na ba der song ste/ phyin nas grong khyer chen po 'od bzang
203b3(phal chen): po de la bltas na/ gser dang dngul dang bai DUr+ya dang / shel dang mu tig dmar po dang / asma gar ba dang / mu sa ra gal pa dang / rin po che bdun kyi shin tu bzang zhing blta na mdzes pa/
203b4(phal chen): rin po che'i 'obs zabs su zab pa/ chus gang ba gzhi gser gyi gram pas gang ba/ lha rdzas kyi ud pa la dang pad mo dang / ku mu da dang / pun da ri gas kun nas g.yogs pa/
203b5(phal chen): dus dang 'thun pa'i tsan dan gyi 'dam dang / lu mas 'khor ba bdun gyis kun nas yongs su bskor cing / rin po che sna tshogs kyi ta la'i phreng ba rim pa bdun gyis kun nas yongs su bskor ba/
203b6(phal chen): rdo rje rin po che'i ra ba bdun gyis kun nas yongs su bskor ba/ 'di lta ste/ seng ge yid du 'ong ba'i rdo rje'i ra ba dang / rdo rje gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i ra ba dang / 'bug pa'i ngang tshul gyi
203b7(phal chen): rdo rje'i ra ba dang / thub par dga' ba'i ngang tshul gyi rdo rje'i ra ba dang / rdo rje brtan pa chags pa myed pa'i ra ba dang / rdo rje'i 'od gzer dra ba'i snying po'i ra ba dang / rdul dang bral ba'i kha dog gi
203b8(phal chen): rgyan gyi rdo rje'i ra bas bskor ba ste/ rdo rje rin po che'i ra ba de dag thams cad kyang / nor bu rin po che grangs myed pas yongs su spras pa/ 'dzam bu'i chu klung gi gser kyi lan kan dang /
204a1(phal chen): ba so mdzes par bkye ba dngul gyi rin po che'i ba so'i phreng ba mdzes pas brgyan pa/ rin po che'i bai DUr+ya'i ba so'i phreng ba mdzes pas brgyan pa/ rin po che shel gyi ba so'i phreng
204a2(phal chen): ba mdzes pas brgyan pa rin po che byi ru'i ba so'i phreng ba mdzes pas brgyan pa/ mu tig dmar po'i ba so'i phreng ba mdzes pas brgyan pa/ mu tig rin po che rgya mtsho'i snying po'i ba so'i
204a3(phal chen): phreng ba mdzes pas brgyan pa ste/ grong khyer chen po'i sgo chen po brgyad kyi bar bar na dpag tshad bcu bcu yod do/ /sgo de dag kyang rin po che sna bdun las sna tshogs mdzes par byas pa ste/
204a4(phal chen): blta na yid du 'ong ba'o/ /grong khyer chen po de ni de ltar rgya che zhing yangs la yan lag rnam pa brgyad du rnam par phye ba/ bai DUr+ya sngon po'i sa la gnas pa ste/ grong khyer chen po de'i nang na
204a5(phal chen): yang srang chen po bye ba phrag bcu bcu yod de/ srang re re'i glo gnyis nas kyang khyim chen po brgya phrag stong stong mkhos legs par 'grigs pa ste/ kun kyang rin po che sna tshogs las byas
204a6(phal chen): pa dag go/ /rin po che'i rgyan sna tshogs kyis rab tu brgyan pa dag go/ /rin po che'i gdugs dang rgyal mtshan bsgreng ba dang / ba dan che ba dang ldan pa dag go/ /yo byad thams cad
204a7(phal chen): phun sum tshogs pa dag go/ /sems can khrag khrig du ma gnas pa dag go/ /grong khyer chen po de yang nor bu rin po che'i kha dog grangs myed pa'i khang pas mdzes par byas pa ste/
204a8(phal chen): 'dzam bu chu klung gi gser gyi khang pa brtsegs pa la rin po che bai DUr+ya'i dra bas kun nas khebs pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rin po che'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa/ grangs myed pa dang ldan
204b1(phal chen): pa'o/ /dngul gyi khang pa brtsegs pa la mu tig dmar po'i dra bas khebs pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rin po che'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa/ grangs myed pa dang ldan pa'o/ /bai DUr+ya'i khang
204b2(phal chen): pa brtsegs pa la rin po che'i mdzod sna tshogs kyi dra bas kun nas khebs pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rin po che'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa grangs med pa dang ldan pa'o/ /shel gyi khang pa brtsegs
204b3(phal chen): pa la rin po che'i rgyal po snying po yangs pa'i dra bas kun nas khebs pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rin po che'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa grangs med pa dang ldan pa'o/ /nor bu rin po che 'gro ba'i yid du
204b4(phal chen): 'ong ba'i khang pa brtsegs pa la rin po che nyi ma'i snying po'i dra bas kun nas khebs pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rin po che'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa grangs myed pa dang ldan pa'o/ /rin po che in dra nI
204b5(phal chen): la'i khang pa brtsegs pa la rin po che dpal gyi 'od zer gyi dra bas kun nas khebs pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rin po che'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa grangs med pa dang ldan pa'o/ /rin po che'i rgyal
204b6(phal chen): po 'gro ba rgya mtsho'i khang pa brtsegs pa la rin po che'i rgyal po skar ma'i 'od gzer gyi dra bas kun nas khebs pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rin po che'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa grangs myed pa dang ldan pa'o/ /
204b7(phal chen): rin po che rdo rje'i khang pa brtsegs pa la rin po che'i rgyal po gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i dra bas kun nas khebs pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rin po che'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa grangs myed pa dang ldan pa'o/ /
204b8(phal chen): dus dang 'thun pa'i tsan dan gyi khang pa la lha rdzas kyi me tog sna tshogs kyi dra bas kun nas khebs pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa rin po che'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa grangs med pa dang ldan pa'o/ /
205a1(phal chen): spos kyi rgyal po mtshungs pa med pa'i khang pa brtsegs pa la lha rdzas kyi me tog sna tshogs kyi dra bas kun nas khebs pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rin po che'i rgyan rin po che'i rgyan
205a2(phal chen): gyis brgyan pa grangs med pa dang ldan pa'o/ /rin po che'i khang pa brtsegs pa de dag re re zhing yang rin po che'i lan kan du mas brgyan pa/ rin po che'i stegs bu rim pa bdun gyis
205a3(phal chen): bskor ba/ rin po che'i ta la'i phreng ba rim pa bdun gyi 'khor bar dgrigs pa'o/ /rin po che'i lan kan de dag dang / rin po che'i ta la de dag thams cad du 'ang phan tshun rin po che'i
205a4(phal chen): srad bus 'brel pa'o/ /rin po che'i srad bu de dag thams cad kyang gser gyi dril gyi phreng bas brgyan pa'o/ /gser gyi dril gyi phreng ba de dag thams cad kyang rin po che'i chun po'i lda ldi
205a5(phal chen): sna tshogs kyis rnam par bres shing sbrel ba'o/ /rin po che'i chun po'i lda ldi de dag thams cad las kyang / rin po che'i dril bu g.yer ka'i dra ba mngon par spyangs pa dag ste/ de ltar
205a6(phal chen): grong khyer chen po de dag thams cad ni nor bu rin po che'i dra ba grangs med pas kun nas khebs pa'o/ /rin po che'i dril bu g.yer ka'i dra ba grangs myed pas kun nas khebs pa'o/ /
205a7(phal chen): lha rdzas kyi spos kyi dra ba grangs med pas kun nas khebs pa'o/ /lha rdzas kyi me tog sna tshogs kyi dra ba grangs med pas kun nas khebs pa'o/ /rin po che'i 'bru'i dra ba grangs
205a8(phal chen): med pas kun nas khebs pa'o/ /rdo rje'i bla re grangs med pas kun nas khebs pa'o/ /rin po che'i bla re grangs med pas kun nas khebs pa'o/ /rin po che'i gdugs
205b1(phal chen): kyi bla re grangs med pas kun nas khebs pa'o/ /rin po che'i khang pa brtsegs pa'i bla re grangs med pas kun nas khebs pa'o/ /gos rin po che'i bla re grangs med pas kun nas khebs pa'o/ /
205b2(phal chen): me tog gi phreng ba'i bla re grangs med pas kun nas khebs pa'o/ /rin po che'i gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan sna tshogs gtsugs shing bsgreng ba ste/ grong khyer chen po 'od bzang po de'i dbus
205b3(phal chen): su rgyal po chen po 'od chen po bzhugs pa'i pho brang brtsegs pa 'khor kun tu dpag tshad bzhi yod pa ste/ rin po che sna bdun las byas pa'o/ /rin po che sna tshogs kyi stegs bu rim bdun
205b4(phal chen): gyis yongs su bskor ba'o/ /rin po che'i dril bu yid du 'ong ba'i sgra bsnyan par 'khrol ba'i dra ba rim bdun gyi sgra kun nas 'byung ba'o/ /rin po che sna bdun gyi ta la'i 'phreng ba rim pa bdun gyis
205b5(phal chen): kun nas bskor ba'o/ /rin po che sna tshogs kyi khang pa brtsegs pa'i rgyan brgya stong bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan pa'o/ /rdzing rin po che sna tshogs du ma las byas pa/ gser gyi dram bu kun tu
205b6(phal chen): bkram pa yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i chus yongs su gang ba/ lha rdzas kyi ud pa la dang / pad mo dang ku mu da dang me tog pun da ri kas chu'i steng kun tu g.yogs pa/ rin po che'i me tog
205b7(phal chen): dang 'bras bu'i shing sna tshogs kyis rab tu brgyan pa/ phyogs bzhi nas rin po che'i pha gus brtsigs pa'i them skas rnam par bkye ba can gyis shin tu mdzes par byas pa dang ldan pa/ lha rdzas kyi sgra snyan cing yid
205b8(phal chen): du 'ong ba 'byin pa'i bya bran sna tshogs kyi sgra shin tu 'byung ba yod pa/ lha'i dbang po'i pho brang dang 'gran pa ste/ de'i dbus na rin po che 'gro ba la snang ba'i khang pa brtsegs pa/ shin tu bzang la
206a1(phal chen): mdzes shing yid du 'ong ba/ rin po che grangs med pa'i rgyan bsam gyis mi khyab pa gya nom par brgyan pa yod de/ de'i nang na rgyal po 'od chen po dam pa'i chos gces pa'i dbyig du bya ba bzhugs so/ /
206a2(phal chen): de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs rin po che'i 'obs de dag la ni chags pa'i sems myed/ rin po che'i ra ba de dag la ni ngo mtshar du 'dzin pa'i sems myed/ rin po che'i ta la'i 'phreng ba de dag la ni 'dod cing chags
206a3(phal chen): pa myed/ rin po che'i dril gyi dra ba'i sgra la ni ro myong bar byed pa myed/ lha rdzas kyi rol mo'i sgra dang glu snyan pa'i dbyangs la ni chags pa'i sems myed/ rin po che rnam pa tha dad pa'i gzhal myed khang dang / khang pa
206a4(phal chen): brtsegs pa sna tshogs kyi longs spyod ni yid la bya ba med par shin tu dga' bar gyur pa'i/ skyes pa dang bud myed kyi tshogs kyi chos kyi dga' ba'i mos pas shin tu dga' zhing / gzugs dang sgra dang dri dang
206a5(phal chen): ro dang reg la dga' bas dben pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ chos nges par brtags pa la shin tu mos pas sems can gang dang phrad kyang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen rtag tu 'dri zhing mthar gyis grong khyer gyi lam gyi
206a6(phal chen): sum mdo'i drung zhig du phyin nas kun tu bltas na/ grong khyer gyi lam gyi sum mdo'i dbus kyi mchod rten gyi khang pa nas ha cang yang mi ring ba zhig na/ rgyan chen po dang ldan pa'i khri chen po bai DUR+Ya sngon po'i rkang pa
206a7(phal chen): bkye ba/ bai DUR+Ya dkar po'i seng ge'i sa blangs pa/ 'dzam bu chu klung gi gser gyi lcag pod kyi dra bas legs par btags pa/ lha rdzas las kyang 'das pa'i rin po che'i stan sna tshogs bting ba/ rin po che'i 'bru
206a8(phal chen): grangs med pas rnam par brgyan pa/ nor bu rin po che'i rgyan bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dra bas kun nas khebs pa/ 'dzam bu chu klung gi gser gyi snam bu las/ lha rdzas rin po che sna tshogs kyi gur shin tu spra bar
206b1(phal chen): bkye ba'i gnam yol bres pa/ nor bu rin po che yid bzhin gyi rgyal po'i pad mo'i snying po dang ldan pa/ de lta bu'i chos kyi khri chen po la rgyal po 'od chen po myi chen po'i mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis kyis lus shin tu brgyan
206b2(phal chen): pa dpe byad bzang po sna tshogs brgyad bcu thams cad kyis lus shin tu mdzes pa gser gyi ri bo ltar rin po che sna tshogs rnam par mdzes pa nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor ltar gzi brjid rab tu 'bar ba/ zla ba nya
206b3(phal chen): zhing rgyas pa'i dkyil 'khor lta na bzang ba/ tshangs pa ltar tshangs pa'i 'khor gyi nang na rnam par mdzes pa/ rgya mtsho ltar zab mo'i chos dang yon tan mtha' yas pa'i rin po che'i tshogs dang ldan pa/ sprin chen po
206b4(phal chen): ltar chos kyi rang bzhin gyi 'brug sgra sgrog pa/ nam mkha' ltar chos kyi tshul gyi skar ma'i tshogs kyis brgyan pa/ ri rab ltar kha dog bzhi po'i sems can rgya mtsho'i sems la/ gzugs brnyan rab tu
206b5(phal chen): snang ba rin po che'i gling ltar gzhi ye shes sna tshogs rin po ches yongs su gang ba de skyil mo dkrung du 'dug pa mthong ngo / /de'i mdun na yang gser dang nor bu dang mu tig dang / bai DUR+Ya dang / dung dang man shel
206b6(phal chen): dang / byi ru dang / sa le sbram dang dngul rin po che'i phung po dang / lha rdzas kyi gos kha dog sna tshogs kyi phung po dang / lha rdzas kyi rin po che'i rgyan sna tshogs kyi phung po dang / kha zas dang spyan gzigs sna tshogs kyi
206b7(phal chen): phung po dang / zhim pa'i mchog khyad par du 'phags pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyi phung po dgod pa dang / dngar ba'i thabs sna tshogs kyi yul du bkod pa mthong ngo / /lha rdzas kyi shing rta rin po che bye ba brgya stong du ma dang /
206b8(phal chen): lha rdzas kyi sil snyan bye ba brgya stong du ma dang / lha rdzas kyi spos kyi rnam pa bye ba brgya stong du ma dang / nad kyi rkyen kyi sman dang / yo byad kyi phung po du ma dang / yo byad kyi khyad par thams cad kyi phung po spyad du rung zhing kha na ma tho ba
207a1(phal chen): med pa mang pos sems can rnams ci dga' bar spyod du gzud pa'i phyir bshams te/ bkod pa dang / ba bzhon gser gyi ru myig can stong phrag du ma/ 'o ma bres 'jal ba mang po yang sems can 'phongs pa rnams
207a2(phal chen): yongs su bsdu ba'i phyir bkod pa mthong ngo / /bu mo rin po che bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong bzhin bzang ba/ shin tu mdzes pa blta na sdug pa/ rgyan thams cad kyis rnam par klubs pa/ lha rdzas kyi gos rin po che
207a3(phal chen): gyon pa/ lha rdzas kyi tsan dan sbrul gyi snying pos lus byugs pa/ sgyu rtsal drug bcu rtsa bzhi'i tshul shes pa/ 'dod pa'i spyod pa dang / cho ga thams cad la mkhas pa dag kyang bstsags shing bkod pa mthong ngo / /de'i
207a4(phal chen): mdun na ji lta ba de bzhin du sems can rnams yongs su bsdu ba dang / sems can rnams yongs su gzung ba dang / sems can rnams dga' ba bskyed pa dang / sems can rnams spro ba bskyed pa dang / sems can
207a5(phal chen): rnams kyi yid dang bar bya ba dang / sems can rnams kyi sems shin tu bde bar bya ba dang / sems can rnams kyi nyon mongs pa rnam par zhi bar bya ba dang / sems can rnams chos kyi rang bzhin gyi don la
207a6(phal chen): dgod pa dang / sems can rnams thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du don mnyam par bya ba dang / sems can rnams gzhan la 'khu ba rnam par bzlog par bya ba dang / lus dang ngag gi spyod pa thams cad rnam par
207a7(phal chen): bzlog pa dang / sems can rnams kyi lta ba'i zug rngu yang dag par 'byung ba dang / sems can rnams kyi lam yongs su sbyang ba'i phyir/ srang dang lam gyi bzhi mdo dang / lam gyi sum mdo dang / sgo dang khyams
207a8(phal chen): dag na 'ang de bzhin te/ srang re re'i ngos g.yas g.yon nas kyang stegs bu bye ba nyi shu nyi shu tsam la yo byad thams cad yongs su spungs te bkod pa mthong ngo / /de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis rgyal po 'od chen
207b1(phal chen): po la lus thams cad kyi phab nas phyag byas te/ rgyal po 'od chen po la lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas mdun du 'dug ste/ thal mo sbyar nas 'di skad ces smras so/ /'phags pa
207b2(phal chen): bdag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed na/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba ma 'tshal te/ 'phags
207b3(phal chen): pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams la gdams ngag dang rjes su bstan pa mdzad do zhes bdag gis thos na/ 'phags pa ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba
207b4(phal chen): dang / ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba bdag la bka' stsal du gsol/ smras pa rigs kyi bu nga ni byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa byams pa chen po'i spyod pa byams pa chen po'i rgyal mtshan yongs su dag pa dang /
207b5(phal chen): yongs su rdzogs par byed pa ste/ rigs kyi bu ngas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa byams pa chen po'i rgyal mtshan 'di yang sangs rgyas brgya phrag du ma dang / sangs rgyas stong phrag du ma dang / sangs rgyas brgya stong
207b6(phal chen): phrag du ma dang / sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma nas brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i bar gyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la yongs su dris so/ /yongs su zhus so/ /rnam par sbyangs so/ /
207b7(phal chen): yongs su sbyangs so/ /rnam par bkod do/ /rnam par bltas so/ /rnam par dpyad do/ /rjes su btsal to/ /yongs su brtags so/ /rnam par bris so/ /rgya cher byas so/ /rigs kyi bu de ltar nga ni
207b8(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa byams pa chen po'i rgyal mtshan 'di la gnas shing chos dang 'thun par khams skyong zhing ston to/ /chos dang 'thun par 'jig rten la phan par byed pa
208a1(phal chen): dang chos dang 'thun par 'jig rten na rjes su spyod pa/ /chos dang 'thun par 'jig rten na bcas pa byed do/ /chos dang 'thun par sems can rnams la nan tan byed do/ /chos kyi dkyil 'khor la sems can rnams
208a2(phal chen): yongs su 'dzud do/ /chos kyi tshul sems can rnams la nye bar bsgrub bo/ /chos dang 'thun par sems can rnams la yongs su bsgo ba byed do/ /chos kyi nan tan la sems can rnams yongs su sbyar ro/ /chos
208a3(phal chen): kyi rang bzhin nges par rtogs pa la sems can rnams rab tu 'god do/ /byams pa chen po'i dbang dang / byams pa chen po'i stobs dang / phan pa'i sems dang / bde ba'i sems dang / snying rje'i sems dang /
208a4(phal chen): phan 'dog pa'i sems dang / yongasu bsrung ba'i sems dang / sems can yongs su 'dzin pa mi gtong ba'i sems dang / sdug bsngal thams cad rnam par bzlog pa'i smon lam rgyun mi gcod pa'i
208a5(phal chen): sems dang / bde ba'i mthar phyin pa la rab tu 'god par yang dag par spyod pa rgyun mi gcod pa la sems can rnams rab tu dgod do/ /bag yangs kyi bde ba yang dag par bskyed pas sems can de dag
208a6(phal chen): gi lus kyang shin tu bde bar byed do/ /de dag gi 'khor ba'i bde ba la zhen pa'i sems kyi rgyud kyang rnam par bzlog pa byed do/ /de dag gi sems kyi rgyun kyang chos kyi dga' ba dad mos pa la yongs su
208a7(phal chen): gzhol bar byed do/ /nyon mongs pa'i dri ma thams cad las rnam par sbyong ba byed do/ /mi dge ba'i chos thams cad las yongs su sbyong ba byed do/ /'khor ba'i rgyun las rnam par bzlog pa
208a8(phal chen): byed do/ /chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul rgya mtsho la yongs su bzung pa byed do/ /de dag srid pa'i lam gyi rgyud du skye ba thams cad rgyun gcod pa'i phyir/ sems kyi ma rig pa yongs
208b1(phal chen): su bsgrag pa byed do/ /thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi 'bras bu thob par bya ba'i phyir de dag gi sems kyi myu gu bskyed do/ /mi 'phrogs pa'i dad pa'i stobs yang dag par bskyed pa'i phyir de dag gi sems kyi rgya mtsho yang
208b2(phal chen): rab tu dang bar byed do/ /rigs kyi bu de ltar nga ni byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa byams pa chen po'i rgyal mtshan la gnas te/ chos dang 'thun par 'jig rten skyong zhing ston to/ /rigs kyi bu nga'i khams na gnas
208b3(phal chen): pa'i sems can rnams ni ngas 'jigs shing sngang ba 'am/ bag tsha zhing skyi g.ya' ba med de/ rigs kyi bu sems can gang 'phongs shing yo byad sna tshogs kyis brel pa bza' ba 'dod pa 'am/ btung ba 'dod pa 'am/
208b4(phal chen): gos 'dod pa nas yo byad sna tshogs thams cad gang 'dod kyang rung ste/ de dag thams cad nga'i drung du 'ong ngo / /de dag la'ang 'das snga nas bsham bsham pa'i mdzod sgo phye zhing ci 'dod pa khyer cig ces bstabs te/ gang gi don du khyed
208b5(phal chen): sdig pa'i las la spyod par gyur cing / ma byin par len pa 'am/ 'dod pas log par g.yem pa 'am/ brdzun du smra ba 'am/ phra ma 'am/ ngag rtsub po dang / tshigs khyal pa 'am/ chags sems dang / gnod sems
208b6(phal chen): sam/ log par lta ba 'am/ de ma yin pa'i rnam pa sna tshogs la mngon par zhen par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang / grong khyer chen po 'od bzang po 'di'i sgo dang srang dang / khyams dang / lam gyi sum mdo dang / bzhi mdo
208b7(phal chen): kun tu spungs te/ snga nas byin pa yin gyis su ci 'dod pa kun kyang khyer cig ces bstabs shing byin no/ /rigs kyi bu grong khyer 'od bzang po 'di na sems can ji snyed cig gnas pa de dag thams cad ni byang chub
208b8(phal chen): sems dpa' ste theg pa chen po la zhugs pa'o/ /de bas na grong khyer chen po 'od bzang po 'di yang de dag la bsam pa rnam pa ji lta bur dag pa'i tshul bzhin du snang ste/ la la la ni dog par snang ngo / /
209a1(phal chen): la la la ni yangs par snang ngo / /la la la ni gzhi sa la gnas par snang ngo / /la la la ni gzhi rin po che bai DUr+ya las byas par snang ngo / /la la la ni sa'i ra bas bskor bar snang ngo / /la la la ni rin po che rdo rje gzhan
209a2(phal chen): gyis mi thub pa'i rgyal mtshan gyi ra bas bskor bar snang ngo / /la la la ni gseg ma dang gyo mos gang zhing thag thug dang grog po dang / g.yang sa mang po can du snang ngo / /la la la ni nor bu rin po che dam pa grangs med pas/
