209a3(phal chen): gzhi brgyan cing yongs su bkram pa dang / lag mthil bzhin du gzhi mnyam par snang ngo / /la la la ni sa las byas par snang ngo / /la la la ni rin po che grangs med pa'i khang pa dang / gzhal med khang dang / khang
209a4(phal chen): bzang dang / khang pa brtsegs pa dang / khang steng dang / ba gam dang / skar khung dag gi shar bu dang / zla gam rin po che seng ge'i dra bas brgyan par snang ngo / /grong khyer gyi phyi rol na gnas pa'i sems can sngon
209a5(phal chen): nas byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/ bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhis yongs su bsdus pa/ bsam pa dag pa dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa/ sangs rgyas mang po bsnyen bkur ba thams cad mkhyen pa
209a6(phal chen): nyid la mngon par mos pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du rab tu gzhol ba de dag la yang rin po che las byas par snang ngo / /de ma yin pa gzhan dag la ni sa las byas par snang ste/ rigs kyi bu nga'i khams
209a7(phal chen): na gnas pa'i sems can yul dang phyogs dang / grong khyer dang grong rdal dang / ljongs dang khams dang / rgyal po'i pho brang dag na rnyog pa lnga dang ldan pa'i 'jig rten gyi dus kyi rang bzhin gyis dkrugs te/
209a8(phal chen): mi dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam zhig byed par 'dod par gyur na yang / de'i tshe nga de dag la phan par bya ba'i sems kyis/ byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin 'jig rten gyi dbang po'i glong zhes bya ba byams pa
209b1(phal chen): chen po'i sngon du 'gro ba la snyoms par 'jug ste/ rigs kyi bu de ltar nga ting nge 'dzin de la snyoms par zhugs pa dang / de nyid kyi mod la sems can de dag gi 'jigs pa de dag dang mi bde ba de dag dang / shar gnyer ba de dag
209b2(phal chen): dang thab mo dang rtsod pa de dag dang / sems kyi 'khrug pa de dag dang / 'tshe ba'i sems de dag kyang byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin 'jig rten gyi dbang po'i glong byams pa chen po sngon du 'gro ba de'i chos nyid thob
209b3(phal chen): pas rab tu zhi bar 'gyur to/ /nye bar zhi bar 'gyur to/ /rnam par ldog par 'gyur ro/ /'gag par 'gyur to/ /rigs kyi bu yud tsam zhig sdod dang de re mngon sum du 'gyur ro/ /de nas rgyal po 'od chen
209b4(phal chen): pos de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin byams pa chen po'i sngon du 'gro ba 'jig rten gyi dbang po'i glong la mnyam par gzhog go/ /de ltar rgyal po 'od chen pos byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin
209b5(phal chen): byams pa chen po sngon du 'gro ba 'jig rten gyi dbang po'i glong la mnyam par bzhag ma thag du de'i mod la grong khyer chen po 'od bzang po'i yul dang / phyogs su bcas pa/ grong khyer dang grong rdal dang / ljongs dang
209b6(phal chen): khams dang / rgyal po'i pho brang gi 'khor dang bcas pa rnam pa drug du g.yos so/ /de g.yos pa'i tshe rin po che'i ra ba de dag dang rin po che'i khang pa dang / rin po che'i snying po dang / rin po che'i khyim dang / rin po che'i
209b7(phal chen): gnas dang / rin po che'i gzhal med khang dang / rin po che'i khang pa brtsegs pa dang / rin po che'i ba gam dang / rin po che'i pu shu dang / rin po che'i skar khung dang / rin po che'i stegs bu dang / rin po che'i
209b8(phal chen): rta babs dang / rin po che'i zla gam dang / rin po che'i seng ge'i dra ba dang / rin po che'i lan kan dang / rin po che'i 'bru dang / rin po che'i bla re dang / rin po che'i srad bus brgyus pa'i gser gyi dril
210a1(phal chen): bu g.yer ka'i dra ba dang / rin po che'i dril bu dang / rin po che'i rgyal mtshan dang / rin po che'i ba dan dang / rin po che'i ta la de dag kyang rab tu g.yos te/ sgra 'byin to/ /rab tu 'khrol lo/ /de dag de ltar sgra
210a2(phal chen): 'byin cing yid du 'ong ba la snyan pa dang / mnyan na dga' ba'i dbyangs rjod cing / rgyal po 'od chen po gang na ba der btud te phyag 'tshal lo/ /grong khyer chen po 'od bzang po'i nang na/ sems can ji snyed
210a3(phal chen): cig gnas pa de dag thams cad kyang / dga' ba dang rangs pa'i sems kyis yongs su rgyas nas/ rgyal po 'od chen po gang na ba der logs su mngon tu bltas te/ lus thams cad kyis phab cing phyag 'tshal
210a4(phal chen): lo/ /de'i khams kyi grong dang grong khyer dang / ljongs dang yul dang khams dang / rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor na gnas pa de dag thams cad kyang lus dang sems bde bar gyur te/ dga' zhing rangs pa skyes nas/ rgyal
210a5(phal chen): po 'od chen po gang na ba de logs su phyag 'tshal lo/ /byol song gi skye gnas su gtogs pa'i sems can de dag thams cad kyang gcig la gcig byams pa'i sems dang / phan pa'i sems su ldan par gyur nas/
210a6(phal chen): rgyal po 'od chen po gang na ba der logs su blta zhing mngon par 'dud do/ /ri dang rgang mthon po'i sa'i phyogs thams cad kyang rgyal po 'od chen po gang na ba der mngon par 'dud do/ /me tog gi shing dang / 'bras bu'i shing dang /
210a7(phal chen): lo ma'i shing dang / sa bon gyi tshogs dang / 'byung ba'i tshogs dang / lo tog dang / ldum bu dang / rtsa dang gel pa dang / sman dang nags tshal thams cad kyang rgyal po 'od chen po gang na ba de logs su mngon du
210a8(phal chen): gyur to/ /de'i khams na mtsho dang / mtshe'u dang / lu ma dang / ldeng ka dang / 'bab chu dang / chu klung dang rdzing dang / khron pa ji snyed pa de dag thams cad kyang rgyal po 'od chen po gang na ba de logs su mngon par gzhol
210b1(phal chen): zhing brlabs kyi sgra 'byin par gyur to/ /klu'i rgyal po stong phrag bcu yang / a ga ru nag po'i bdug spos kyi dud pa na bun du dkrigs pa'i spos kyi sprin las glog sna tshogs 'byung ba'i 'od kyis snang bar byed cing /
210b2(phal chen): 'brug sgra sgrog pa dang / spos chu'i char gyi rgyun shin tu phra ba mngon par 'bebs par gyur to/ /brgya byin dang rab mtshe ma dang dga' ldan dang / rab 'phrul dga' dang / dbang bsgyur gyi lha'i rgyal po la stsogs pa lha'i
210b3(phal chen): b u stong phrag bcus kyang steng gi bar snang la 'khod de nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad lha rdzas kyi rol mo sil snyan gyi sprin bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gi sgra phyung bas dbyangs snyan pa cher bsgrags pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan
210b4(phal chen): pa dang / lha'i bu mo grangs med pa lha'i glu snyan pa len pa'i sprin gyi sgra bsgrags pa'i dbyangs snyan cing yid du 'ong ba'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa dang / lha rdzas kyi rin po che'i me tog sna tshogs kyi sprin grangs med pa dang
210b5(phal chen): rab tu 'bab pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa dang / lha rdzas kyi spos kyi sprin kha dog sna tshogs kyi sprin grangs med pa'i char rab tu 'bab pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa dang / lha rdzas kyi rin po che'i phreng ba sna tshogs grangs med
210b6(phal chen): pa'i char rab tu 'bab pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa dang / lha rdzas kyi phye ma kha dog sna tshogs kyi sprin grangs med pa'i char rab tu 'bab pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa dang / lha rdzas kyi rin po che'i lhab lhub sna tshogs
210b7(phal chen): kyi sprin grangs med pa'i char rab tu 'bab pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa dang / lha rdzas kyi gos sna tshogs dri ma med cing 'jam pa kha dog rnam pa tha dad pa'i sprin grangs med pa'i char rab tu 'bab pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa dang /
210b8(phal chen): lha rdzas kyi rin po che'i gdugs rnam par bye ba sna tshogs kyi sprin grangs med pa'i char rab tu 'bab pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa dang / lha rdzas kyi rin po che'i seng ge yid du 'ong ba'i rgyal mtshan gyi sprin grangs med
211a1(phal chen): pa'i char rab tu 'bab pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa dang / lha rdzas kyi rin po che 'bar ba'i lce shin tu 'phro ba'i rin po che'i ba dan gyi sprin grangs med pa'i char rab tu 'bab pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan par rgyal po 'od chen po la
211a2(phal chen): mchod pa bya ba'i phyir byin gyi brlabs so/ /glang po'-i rgyal po chen po shugs 'dzin gyis kyang glang po'i dbang po'i khyu mchog gi mthu phyung ba dang / rnam par 'phrul pa'i mthus nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad
211a3(phal chen): lha rdzas kyi rin po che sna tshogs kyi pad mo'i sprin grangs med pas kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs so/ /lha rdzas kyi nor bu rin po che'i se mo do grangs med pa rab tu 'phyang ba dang / lha rdzas kyi rin po che'i
211a4(phal chen): snam bu'i lda ldi dang / chun po grangs med pa rab tu 'phyang ba dang / lha rdzas kyi rin po che sna tshogs kyi phreng ba'i rgyud grangs med pa mngon par 'phyang ba'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa dang / lha rdzas kyi rin po che sna tshogs
211a5(phal chen): kyi lhab lhub dang / phreng ba grangs med pa mngon par 'phyang ba'i rgyan bgyi rgyan pa dang / lha rdzas kyi rin po che sna tshogs kyi me tog gi lda ldi grangs med pa mngon par bres pa'i rgyan gyis rgyan pa dang / lha rdzas kyi
211a6(phal chen): spos kyi rgyal po'i kha dog sna tshogs phyogs thams cad du dri zhim pos rgyas par 'gengs pa'i sprin grangs med pas kun nas khebs pa'i rgyan kyis brgyan pa dang / lha rdzas kyi rin po che'i gos kha dog
211a7(phal chen): sna tshogs kyi sprin grangs med pa'i char rab tu 'bab pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa dang / lha rdzas kyi bdug spos kyi dud pa na bun du 'khrigs pa'i sprin grangs med pa'i char rab tu 'bab pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa dang /
211a8(phal chen): lha rdzas kyi phye ma kha dog sna tshogs kyi sprin grangs med pa'i char phra mo rab tu 'bab pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa dang / lha'i bu mo'i tshogs lha rdzas kyi rol mo byed pa dang / glu snyan pa'i dbyangs yid du
211b1(phal chen): 'ong bar len cing bstod pa'i sprin gyis yog pa'i char mngon par 'bab pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan par nam mkha'i dbyings byin gyis brlabs so/ /srin po'i dbang po brgya stong grangs med pa rgya mtsho la gnas pa dang /
211b2(phal chen): gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams brten gyi gzhi la gnas pa/ kha zas su sha dang khrag 'thung zhing za ba dang / chu la spyod pa dang / ri dgas dang / phyugs dang bya dang ba lang dang rta dang / glang po dang bong bu dang / skyes
211b3(phal chen): pa dang / bud med kyi tshogs kyi mdangs 'phrogs pa/ zhe sdang ba'i yid kyi rnam par rtog pa dang ldan pa/ rtag tu 'gro ba la 'tshe zhing 'tho btsam pa la zhugs pa rnams kyang byams pa dang / phan pa'i sems dam pa
211b4(phal chen): dang ldan zhing bzhin gyi mdog shin tu dang ba dang / 'gro ba thams cad la mi 'tshe zhing tho 'tsham pa med pa la zhugs te/ 'jig rten pha rol la blta bar gyur nas/ thal mo sbyar cing shin tu dga' ba'i sems kyis
211b5(phal chen): rgyal po 'od chen po gang na ba de logs su btud cing phyag 'tshal bar gyur to/ /lus dang sems kyi bde ba rgya chen po mtshungs pa med pa yang myong bar gyur to/ /gnod sbyin dang grul bum dang / sha za dang 'byung po'i
211b6(phal chen): dbang po brgya stong du ma yang byams pa dang / phan pa'i sems dam pa dang ldan zhing bzhin gyi mdog shin tu dang ba dang / 'gro ba thams cad la mi 'tshe zhing tho 'tsham med pa la zhugs te/ 'jig rten pha rol la blta bar
211b7(phal chen): gyur nas/ thal mo sbyar cing shin tu dga' ba'i sems kyis rgyal po 'od chen po gang na ba der btud cing phyag 'tshal bar gyur te/ lus dang sems kyi bde ba rgya chen po mtshungs pa med pa yang myong bar gyur to/ /
211b8(phal chen): de ltar gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi sems can kun 'jigs pa dang / gnod pa dang / mi bde ba dang / shar gnyer ba dang / thab mo dang / brtsod pa dang / sems kyi 'khrug pa dang / 'tshe ba'i
212a1(phal chen): sems thams cad rab tu zhi bar gyur to/ /rnam par zhi bar gyur to/ /rnam par log par gyur to/ /'gags par gyur to/ /phyir log par gyur to/ /gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir ji lta ba
212a2(phal chen): de bzhin du stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad nas/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag bcu'i bar gyi sems can kun gyi 'jigs pa dang / gnod pa dang /
212a3(phal chen): mi bde ba dang / shar gnyer ba dang / thab mo dang brtsod pa dang / sems kyi 'khrug pa dang / 'tshe ba'i sems thams cad kyang byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin byams pa chen po sngon du 'gro ba/ 'jig rten
212a4(phal chen): kyi dbang po'i klong gi chos nyid thob pa'i phyir/ rab tu zhi bar gyur to/ /rnam par zhi bar gyur to/ /rnam par log par gyur to/ /'gags par gyur to/ /phyir log par gyur to/ /de nas rgyal po 'od chen
212a5(phal chen): po ting nge 'dzin de las langs te/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs la 'di skad ces smras so/ /rigs kyi bu ngas byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes snang ba'i sgo byams pa chen po'i rgyal mtshan 'di shes par
212a6(phal chen): zad na/ ngas byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad bde ba'i bsam pas rgyas par 'gengs pas byams pa chen po'i gdugs tshad med pa dang ldan pa/ 'khor mi phyed pa dang ldan pas/
212a7(phal chen): 'gro ba thams cad 'khor du gyur pa/ rab 'bring dang tha ma'i sbyor bas 'gro ba thams cad yongs su skyob pa la zhugs pa/ 'gro ba thams cad yongs su bzung ba la zhugs pas/ byams pa'i sems sa lta bu
212a8(phal chen): dang ldan pa/ bsod nams dang ye shes kyi 'od zer 'gro ba thams cad du 'byung bas/ zla ba nya zhing rgyas pa lta bur gyur pa/ shes bya thams cad ye shes kyi 'od kyis snang bar byed pa'i phyir nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor lta bur
212b1(phal chen): gyur pa/ sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi mun pa thibs po rab tu sel bas/ sgron ma chen po lta bur gyur pa/ sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi mtsho'i g.yo sgyu'i rnyog pa dang bar byed pas/ nor bu rin
212b2(phal chen): po che chu 'dang ba dang 'dra ba/ 'gro ba thams cad kyi bsam pa dang / smon lam yongs su rdzogs par byed pas/ nor bu rin po che yid bzhin gyi rgyal po dang 'dra ba/ 'gro ba thams cad ting nge 'dzin dang /
212b3(phal chen): snyoms par 'jug pa'i khang pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi pho brang che por gzhog pas rlung dmar chen po 'dra ba/ de dag gi spyod pa shes pa 'am/ yon tan brjod pa 'am/ bsod nams kyi tshogs
212b4(phal chen): gzhal ba 'am/ yon tan gyi skar ma'i tshogs kyis brgyan pa'i nam mkha' la blta ba dang / smon lam chen po'i rlung gi dkyil 'khor las mtshams bcad pa 'am/ chos mnyam pa nyid kyi stobs la tshad gzung
212b5(phal chen): ba 'am/ theg pa chen po'i rgyan gyi bsngags pa yongs su brjod pa 'am/ kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa'i tshul gyi khyad par brjod pa 'am/ byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin chen po sgom pa'i sgo dbye ba 'am/
212b6(phal chen): snying rje chen po'i sprin yongs su spro bar nus re skan/ song rigs gyi bu lho phyogs kyi rgyud 'di nyid na rgyal po'i pho brang brtan par zhes bya ba yod de/ de na dge bsnyen ma mi g.yo ba zhes bya ba 'dug gis/
212b7(phal chen): de'i gan du song la ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bya ba dris shig /de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyi rgyal po 'od
212b8(phal chen): chen po'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal nas/ rgyal po 'od chen po la lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas te/ yang dang yang bltas te/ rgyal po 'od chen po'i drung nas song ngo // //
213a1(phal chen): sangs rgyas rmad ga cad ces bya ba shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo/ bam po bcu lnga pa/ de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang grong khyer chen po 'od bzang po nas byung ste yud tsam du
213a2(phal chen): lam gyi mgo btsal nas/ rgyal po 'od chen po'i gdam ngag de la rjes su bsam pa byed cing / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i tshul byams pa chen po'i rgyal mtshan de rjes su dran par bya ba dang / ting nge
213a3(phal chen): 'dzin gyi sgo 'jig rten gyi dbang po'i glong snang ba chen po de yongs su bsam pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' lus rnam par dag pa/ bsam gyis mi khyab pas brgyan pa'i seng ge'i khri'i rgyan rnam par phye ba/
213a4(phal chen): rnam pa sna tshogs de dag mngon par bsgrub pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam dang / bsod nams kyi dbang dang / stobs bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / rjes su spel ba dang / byang chub sems
213a5(phal chen): dpa'i sems can yongs su smyin par bya ba'i ye shes kyi tshul bsam gyis mi khyab pa de shin tu bstan par bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i longs spyod kyi bdag nyid che ba thun mong du gyur pa/ bsam
213a6(phal chen): gyis mi khyab pa de la rjes su bsam pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i gnas rnam pa tha dad pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa de dag kyang mtshan mar bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems can
213a7(phal chen): yongs su smin par bya ba rnam par dag pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa de/ rjes su dran par bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor phun sum tshogs shing yongs su dag pa de la brtag pa dang / byang chub
213a8(phal chen): sems dpa'i sems can gyi don bsam pa snang ba'i tshul bsam gyis mi khyab pa de la yid ches par byed pas/ sems dga' zhing mos pa'i shugs dang / sems kyi nyams bde ba dang / sems
213b1(phal chen): shin tu tshim pa dang / sems khong nas dga' ba dang / sems rnyog pa med pa dang / sems 'od dang ba dang / sems brtan pa dang / sems rgya che ba dang / sems mi bzad pa thob pa ste/ de de ltar dge ba'i
213b2(phal chen): bshes gnyen rjes su dran zhing yid la byed pa la brtson pas/ gdong mchi mas gang bar rjes su sems dpa' kyi hud kye dge ba'i bshes gnyen mthong ba 'di ni yon tan rin po che thams cad kyi 'byung gnas su
213b3(phal chen): gyur pa'o/ /byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad yongs su dag pa dang / yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba'i rgyur gyur pa'o/ /byang chub sems dpa'i dran pa thams cad rnam par dag par byed pa'o/ /
213b4(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa'i gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad yongs su sbyong ba'o/ /byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi snang ba thams cad yongs su bskyed pa'o/ /sangs rgyas thams cad mthong bar
213b5(phal chen): 'gyur ba yongs su bsgrub pa'o/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyi sprin gyi char rab tu 'bebs pa'o/ /byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam gyi tshul thams cad rab tu brjod pa'o/ /shes rab dang ye shes
213b6(phal chen): kyi snang ba bsam gyis mi khyab par yang dag par bskyed pa'o/ /byang chub sems dpa'i dbang po brten pa'i mig gu bskyed par byed pa'o/ /dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams ni bdag ngan song gi g.yang sa
213b7(phal chen): thams cad nas skyob pa'o/ /dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams ni bdag chos mnyam pa nyid kyi tshul khong du chud par bya ba la gzhol ba'o/ /dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams ni bdag la lam bde ba dang /
213b8(phal chen): mi bde ba ston pa'o/ /dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams ni bdag la theg pa chen po yongs su ston pa'o/ /dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams ni bdag la byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa'i gdams
214a1(phal chen): ngag gis 'dom pa'o/ /dge ba'i gshes gnyen rnams ni bdag la thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi grong khyer gyi lam ston pa'o/ /dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams ni bdag thams cad mkhyen pa'i gnas su phyin par bskyed pa'o/ /dge
214a2(phal chen): ba'i bshes gnyen rnams ni bdag chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul rgya mtsho la 'jug par byed pa'o/ /dge ba'i gshes gnyen rnams ni bdag la dus gsum gyi shes bya rgya mtsho'i tshul rab tu ston pa'o/ /dge ba'i bshes gnyen
214a3(phal chen): rnams ni bdag la 'phags pa'i tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad rab tu ston pa'o/ /dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams ni bdag gi dkar po'i chos thams cad rnam par 'phel bar byed pa'o zhes de de ltar ngu zhing
214a4(phal chen): smre sngags 'don pa'i tshe/ nam mkha'i dbyings la 'khod pa'i lha'i tshogs dang / rtag tu phyi bzhin 'brang zhing yang dag par bsgrub pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi pho nya ltar gyur pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams 'di skad ces
214a5(phal chen): 'dzer to/ /rigs kyi bu dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi gdams ngag la zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyang thugs shin tu dgyes par 'gyur ba yin/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi tshig dang / mi 'gal
214a6(phal chen): bar gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpas ni thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'ang shin tu bsnyen pa yin/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi tshig la the tsom mi za ba'i byang chub sems dpa' la ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen
214a7(phal chen): rnams kyang nye bar bsnyen pa yin/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen yid la bya ba dang mi 'bral ba'i byang chub sems dpa' la ni don thams cad kyang mngon du gyur ba yin gyis/ rigs kyi bu rgyal po'i pho brang brtan
214a8(phal chen): par dge bsnyen ma mi g.yo ba gang na ba der song shig dang / de las byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thos par 'gyur ro/ /de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs ting nge 'dzin gyi ye shes snang ba las 'das nas/
214b1(phal chen): mthar gyis rgyal po'i pho brang brtan par dge bsnyen ma mi g.yo ba gang na ba der song nas/ dge bsnyen ma mi g.yo ba yongs su tshol zhing rmed rmed pa las/ de la 'gro ba mang pos bsten pa/ rigs kyi bu dge
214b2(phal chen): bsnyen ma mi g.yo ba de ni rang gi khyim na pha ma dang / 'grogs shing gzhon nur gyur pa ste/ rang gi gnyen bshes kyi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor cing / skye bo'i tshogs chen po la chos ston to/ /de nas
214b3(phal chen): tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs dga' ba chen po dang / mos shing spro ba/ yongs su rgyas pa'i sems dang ldan pa de dge bsnyen ma mi g.yo ba'i khyim gang na der song ste phyin nas/ dge bsnyen ma mi
214b4(phal chen): g.yo ba'i khyim gyi sgo na sdod pa'i tshe/ des khyim de thams cad 'od lus dang / sems shin tu bde bar byed pa/ gser gyi kha dog du 'dug pa zhig gis khyab cing gsal bar gyur nas/ 'od des
214b5(phal chen): tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs la phog par gyur ma thag tu tshor ba thams cad la dbang bsgyur ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo mang po dang / zhi ba'i gnas kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo mang po dang / 'phro ba thams cad dang bral
214b6(phal chen): ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo mang po dang / kun tu lta ba'i btang snyoms dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo mang po dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i mdzod kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo mang po la stsogs pa/ ting nge 'dzin
214b7(phal chen): gyi sgo lnga brgya tsam la zhugs par gyur te/ yongs su skyes so/ /de dag kyang shin tu phra zhing gzhon pa ste/ 'di ltar dper na thog ma mngal du zhugs pa'i rnam par shes pa lta bu ste/ ting nge 'dzin de dag kyang
214b8(phal chen): shin tu phra zhing gzhon par skyes par gyur to/ /des dri zhim po zhig tshor na 'ong de ni lha la 'ang med lha'i bu mo la yang med/ klu la yang med klu'i bu mo la yang med/ gnod sbyin la yang med / gnod sbyin gyi bu mo
215a1(phal chen): yang med/ dri za la yang med/ dri za'i bu mo la yang med/ lha ma yin la yang med/ lha ma yin gyi bu mo la yang med/ nam mkha' lding la yang med/ nam mkha' lding gi
215a2(phal chen): bu mo la yang med/ mi 'am ci la yang med/ mi 'am ci'i bu mo la yang med/ lto 'phye chen po la yang med/ lto 'phye chen po'i bu mo la yang med/ mi la yang med/ mi'i bu mo la yang med cing mi srid pa de lta bu
215a3(phal chen): 'i dri zhim po tshor bar gyur to/ /bud med de'i gzugs dang mnyam pa yang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten na med na lhag pa lta ga las 'ong / kha dog dang mdog de lta bu yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mdog dang kha dog dang /
215a4(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' dbang bskur ba'i kha dog dang mdog ma gtogs par de'i kha dog dang / mdog tu mnyam pa phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten na med pa lhag pa lta ga las 'ong / lus kyi chu zheng dang dbyibs de lta bu
215a5(phal chen): yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i khru chu zheng dang / dbyibs dang / byang chub sems dpa' dbang bskur ba thob pa'i lus kyi chung zheng dang / dbyibs ma gtogs par de'i lus kyi chung zheng dang dbyibs su mnyam
215a6(phal chen): pa/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten na med na lhag pa lta ga las 'ong / 'od kyi rgyan de lta bu 'ang de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od kyi rgyan dang / byang chub sems dpa' dbang bskur ba thob pa'i 'od kyi rgyan ma gtogs par de'i 'od kyi rgyan dang /
215a7(phal chen): mnyam pa phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten na lhag pa lta ga las 'ong / de'i kha'i dri zhim po dang mnyam pa'i dri de lta bu yang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi lha'i gnas sam/ klu dang gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang lha ma
215a8(phal chen): yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa'i gnas na med na lhag pa lta ga las 'ong / khyim gyi rgyan dang / longs spyod de lta bu 'ang de bzhin gshegs pa'i longs
215b1(phal chen): spyod dang / byang chub sems dpa' dbang bskur ba thob pa'i longs spyod ma gtogs par de'i khyim gyi rgyan dang / longs spyod du mnyam pa yang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten na med na lhag pa lta ga las 'ong / g.yog
215b2(phal chen): 'khor phun sum tshogs pa/ de lta bu'ang de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor phun sum tshogs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor phun sum tshogs pa ma gtogs par de'i g.yog 'khor phun sum
215b3(phal chen): tshogs pa dang / mnyam pa yang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten na med na lhag pa lta ga las 'ong ste/ dge bsnyen ma mi g.yo ba de la 'dod chags dang ldan pa'i sems kyis blta bar nus pa'i sems can de lta bu 'ang
215b4(phal chen): phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi sems can gyi ris na med do/ /dge bsnyen ma mi g.yo ba de mthong ma thag du nyon mongs pa zhi bar mi 'gyur ba de lta bu'i sems can yang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi sems
215b5(phal chen): can gyi ris na med de/ 'di lta ste dper na/ tshangs pa chen po stong phrag bcu la dbang sgyur ba la ni 'dod pa la spyod pa'i nyon mongs pa rnams mi rgyu'o/ /de bzhin du dge bsnyen ma mi g.yo ba 'ang mthong ma
215b6(phal chen): thag tu sems can rnams kyi nyon mongs pa mi rgyu'o/ /dge bsnyen ma mi g.yo ba de la blta bas ngoms par 'gyur ba'i sems can de lta bu 'ang shes rab kyis ngoms pa ma gtogs par phyogs bcu'i
215b7(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can gyi ris na med do/ /de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyi dge bsnyen ma mi g.yo ba'i lus kyi byin bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / gzugs dang kha dog dang dbyibs dang /
215b8(phal chen): chu zheng bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / sa'i gzhi dang / grong khyer dang rin po che thams cad la thogs pa med pa'i 'od zer gyi dra ba'i rgyan bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / sems can gyi don bsam gyis mi
216a1(phal chen): pa bsgrub pa mthong ste/ ba spu'i bu ga thams cad nas byung ba'i dri zhim po tshor nas/ 'khor rgya mtsho phun sum tshogs pa mtha' yas pa mthong ste/ khyim dang gzhal med khang gi rgyan phun sum tshogs pa
216a2(phal chen): mi 'phrogs pa mthong nas yon tan rgya mtsho tshad med pa khong du chud de/ dge bsnyen ma mi g.yo ba la tshigasu bcad pa 'dis bstod do/ /khyod kyis rtag tu tshul khrims dri med yongs bsrungs te/ /bzod pa shin tu yangs 'di yongasu bsgom mdzad cing / /
216a3(phal chen): brtson 'grus brtan pa rdo rje lta bu bsgrubs pas na/ /ri bo'i rgyal po lta bur 'gro bar 'phags shing 'bar/ /de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis/ dge bsnyen ma mi g.yo ba la tshigs su bcad pa des mngon par bstod te 'di skad ces
216a4(phal chen): smraso/ /'phags ma bdag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed na/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba ma 'tshal te/ 'phags
216a5(phal chen): ma ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams la gdams ngag dang rjesu bstan pa mdzad do/ /zhes bdag gis thos nas 'phags ma ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du
216a6(phal chen): bgyi ba bdag la bshad du gsol/ de nas dge bsnyen ma mi g.yo bas/ byang chub sems dpa'i ngag 'jam zhing yid du 'ong ba/ nyams su bde bas/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs la dga' bar 'gyur ba'i tshig tu brjod nas 'di skad ces smras so/ /
216a7(phal chen): rigs kyi bu de ltar khyod kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa legaso legaso/ /rigs kyi bu kho mo ni byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa thob par dka' ba'i ye shes kyi snying po thob pa ste/
216a8(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i sgo yi dam brtan pa la slob pa/ chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi sa'i gzungs kyi sgo thob pa'o/ /kho mo ni spobs pa'i ye shes
216b1(phal chen): snang ba/ chos kyi gzhi thams cad snang bar brjod pa thob pa'o/ /kho mo ni chos thams cad yongs su btsal bas mi skyo ba'i rgyan gyi ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo thob pa'o/ /smras pa 'phags ma byang chub
216b2(phal chen): sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa thub par dka' ba'i ye shes kyi snying po de'i yul ni ji lta bu zhig mchis/ yi dam la brtan pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i sgo dang / chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi sa'i
216b3(phal chen): gzungs kyi sgo dang / chos kyi gzhi thams cad snang bar brjod pa'i spobs pa snang ba'i sgo dang / chos yongs su btsal bas mi skyo ba'i rgyan gyi ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo'i yul ni ji lta bu zhig mchis/ smras pa/
216b4(phal chen): rigs kyi bu gnas 'di ni yid ches par dka'o/ /smras pa 'phags ma bstan du gsol/ sangs rgyas kyi byin dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su bzung na yid ches par mchi grang /
216b5(phal chen): rtogs pa dang btsal ba dang / rnam par rtogs pa dang / rjes su rtogs pa dang rig pa dang / dmigs bu phebs pa dang / goms pa dang / mi 'gal ba dang / rnam par mi rtog pa dang / sgro 'dogs pa
216b6(phal chen): ma mchis pa dang / mnyam par bgyid pa na yang mchi grang / de nas dge bsnyen ma mi g.yo bas/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs la 'di skad ces smras so/ /rigs kyi bu sngon 'das pa'i dus shig
216b7(phal chen): na dri ma med pa'i 'od kyi bskal pa la/ de bzhin gshegs pa phyag rab tu brkyang ba zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ kho mo yang de'i tshe rgyal po glog gis byin pa'i bu cig ma zhig du gyur nas/ de'i tshe
216b8(phal chen): nub mo mi nyal tsam zhig na rgyal po'i sgo yang bcad/ pha dang ma yang nyal/ skyes pa dang bud med dag kyang gnyid kyis logs/ /rol mo brdung ba dang dkrol ba'i sgra yang zhi/ lhan cig spyod pa'i
217a1(phal chen): bud med lnga brgya tsam dag kyang nyal bar gyur pa zhig na/ kho mo mal gyi steng na 'dug cing / nam mkha'i dbyings la rgyu ba'i skar ma'i tshogs kyi phreng ba rnam par bkod pa la lta lta ba las/ steng gi bar snang
217a2(phal chen): la bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas phyag rab tu brkyang ba/ ri'i rgyal po ri rab ltar lha dang klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang /
217a3(phal chen): nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po'i 'khor mang pos bskor ba/ byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs grangs med pas yongs su bskor ba/ phyogs thams cad du 'od zer gyi dra ba
217a4(phal chen): thogs pa med pas rgyas par khyab pa'i sku bzhugs pa mthong ngo / /de bzhin gshegs pa de'i sku'i ba spu'i bu ga thams cad nas kyang dri zhim po rnam pa 'di lta bu byung ste/ des kho mo'i lus dang sems shin
217a5(phal chen): tu bde bar gyur/ yid shin tu dga' bar gyur te/ mal gyi steng nas langs nas sor mo bcu'i thal mo sbyar te sa la babs nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa phyag rab tu brkyang ba de la phyag
217a6(phal chen): 'tshal te/ de'i spyi gtsug la bltas na 'ang / mthar thug par ma rung / g.yas g.yon gyi tshad kyang zin par ma rung / mtshan dang dpe byad phun sum tshogs pa la bsams na 'ang ngoms par ma rung
217a7(phal chen): ste/ de'i tshe kho mos 'di snyam du sems so/ /las ji lta bu zhig byas na lus phun sum tshogs pa 'di lta bu ni 'thob par 'gyur/ mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po phun sum tshogs pa ni skye bar 'gyur/ 'od kyi rgyan phun sum tshogs pa ni 'byung bar 'gyur/
217a8(phal chen): 'khor phun sum tshogs pa ni 'grub par 'gyur/ yid kyi rang bzhin gyi gnas dang / longs spyod phun sum tshogs pa ni 'byung bar 'gyur/ bsod nams phun sum tshogs pa ni skye bar 'gyur/
217b1(phal chen): ye shes phun sum tshogs pa ni rnam par dag par 'gyur/ ting nge 'dzin gyi rnam par 'phrul pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa phun sum tshogs pa ni yang dag par 'grub par 'gyur/ gzungs phun sum tshogs pa ni yongs
217b2(phal chen): su rdzogs par 'gyur/ spobs pa phun sum tshogs pa ni dbang du 'gyur snyam pa dang / rigs kyi bu de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa phyag rab tu brkyang ba des kho mo'i bsam pa thugs
217b3(phal chen): su chud nas des 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /bu mo khyod kyis nyon mongs pa thams cad gzhom pa'i phyir thub pa med pa'i sems bskyed cig /mngon par zhen pa thams cad bsal ba'i phyir pham
217b4(phal chen): pa med pa'i sems bskyed cig / chos zab mo'i tshul khong du chud par bya ba'i phyir zhum pa med pa'i sems bskyed cig /sems can bsam pa mi zad pa dang ldan pa'i rgya mtsho'i glong du ltung bas mi
217b5(phal chen): sgul ba'i sems bskyed cig / srid pa'i lam gyi rgyud thams cad du skye ba'i skye mched du mgo rmongs pa med pa'i sems bskyed cig /sangs rgyas thams cad blta bar mos pa rgyun mi gcod pa'i phyir
217b6(phal chen): ngoms mi shes pa'i sems bskyed cig / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos kyi sprin yongs su gzung ba'i phyir chog mi shes pa'i sems bskyed cig /sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos kyi tshul snang ba rtogs par
217b7(phal chen): bya ba'i phyir nges par rtogs pa'i sems bskyed gcig / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khor lo gzung ba'i phyir yang dag par gzung ba'i sems skyed cig /de bzhin gshegs pa'i
217b8(phal chen): zhal nas byung ba shes par bya ba lta la ci smos kyi chung ngu na brdar byed pa tsam la yang 'khrul pa med pa'i sems bskyed cig / bu mo khyod kyis sems can rnams kyi bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du chos rin po
218a1(phal chen): che rnam par dbye ba'i phyir/ rnam par dbye ba'i sems bskyed cig ces byung ste/ de ltar rigs kyi bu kho mos bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
218a2(phal chen): rgyas phyag rab tu brkyang ba las/ chos kyi tshul gdams ngag gi sgo rnam pa de lta bu dag thos nas thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la ni mngon par mos par gyur/ stobs bcu'i rang bzhin la ni mngon
218a3(phal chen): par smon par gyur/ sangs rgyas kyi gsung la mngon par dad par gyur/ sangs rgyas kyi rgyun ni yongs su sbyang bar dka'/ sangs rgyas kyi sku phun sum tshogs pa ni yongs su bsgrub par
218a4(phal chen): dka'/ sangs rgyas kyi mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po rnam par dag pa la ni mngon par mos par 'gyur/ sangs rgyas kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor phun sum tshogs pa la ni mngon par smon par gyur/
218a5(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnam par dag pa la ni mngon par dad par gyur/ sangs rgyas kyi spyod lam phun sum tshogs pa la ni mngon par mos par gyur/ sangs rgyas kyi sku tshe'i tshad phun sum tshogs pa la ni
218a6(phal chen): mngon par dga' nas/ rdo rje ltar ri dang mtshon cha thams cad kyi mthus thub par dka' ba'i sems nyon mongs pa thams cad dang nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis mi phyed mi
218a7(phal chen): tshugs pa bskyed de/ rigs kyi bu de nas nye bar bzung ba tshun chad du sems bskyed pa de'i mthus bskal pa 'dzam bu'i gling gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed gcig du yid kyi dgu las kyang 'dod pa la
218a8(phal chen): spyad par yang mi dran na/ gnyis kyis gnyis 'du ba lta ci smos/ rigs kyi bu de nas nye bar bzung ba tshun chad du rang gi gnyen bshes la 'ang khong khro ba'i sems gcig ma bskyed na/
218b1(phal chen): de ma yin pa'i sems can ma nyes pa'i gzhin lta ci smos/ de nas nye bar zung ba tshun chad du bdag du lta ba dang / ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa gcig tsam yang bskyed par mi dran na/ de ma yin pa'i
218b2(phal chen): yo byad gzhan la bdag gir byas te/ mngon par chags pa lta ci smos/ shi 'pho ba dang mngal na gnas pa'i tshe 'ang sems rmongs pa 'am/ 'du shes sna tshogs sam/ lung du ma bstan pa'i
218b3(phal chen): sems kyang byung du mi dran na/ legs par bsams shing lta ci smos/ bskal pa de snyed cig du sangs rgyas cig /kyang chung ngu na rmi lam du mthong ba'i rnam par dmigs par yang brjod du mi
218b4(phal chen): dran na/ byang chub sems dpa'i mig bcus mthong bar gyur pa lta ci smos/ de nas nye bar bzung ba tshun chad du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi sprin yang dag par 'dzin kyang chung
218b5(phal chen): ngu na mying du bya ba'i rnam pa tsam kyi chos kyi tshig dang / yi ge gcig kyang brjod par mi dran na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhal gyi mdzod nas byung ba lta ci smos/ de nas nye bar bzung ba tshun chad
218b6(phal chen): du chos kyi rgya mtsho de snyed cig 'thung 'thung yang / chung ngu na 'jig rten pa'i chos rnams la/ tshig 'ga' ma bsams ma brtag par dran no/ /de nas nye bar bzung ba tshun chad du de snyed gcig gi
218b7(phal chen): chos kyi tshul rgya mtsho las kyang / chung ngu na 'jig rten pa'i bzo'i rgyus dang / tshul yang rung ste/ chos kyi tshul kyi sgo gang la yang kho mos ting nge 'dzin mngon par ma bsgrubs pa de lta bu
218b8(phal chen): med do/ /de nas nye bar bzung ba tshun chad du de bzhin gshegs pa de snyed kyi chos kyi 'khor lo bzung yang ji ltar yongs su bzung ba las sems can 'dul ba'i dbang du bya ba ma gtogs
219a1(phal chen): par chung ngu na rjes su brgyud pa'i rgyus tsam gyi tshig dang / yi ge 'ga' yang brjod par mi dran no/ /de nas nye bar bzung ba tshan chad du sangs rgyas rgya mtsho de snyed cig mthong yang chung ngu na sprul
219a2(phal chen): pa'i sangs rgyas kyi smon lam gyi rgyud kyang rung ste/ smon lam 'ga' yang kho mos sems can rgya mtsho thams cad rnam par dag par bya ba'i phyir/ mngon par ma bsgrubs pa med do/ /de nas nye bar
219a3(phal chen): bzung ba tshun chad du sangs rgyas rgya mtsho de snyed cig gi sngon gyi byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rgya mtsho las/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa 'ga' tsam yang kho mos bdag gi spyod pa yongs su dag
219a4(phal chen): par bya ba'i phyir mngon par ma bsgrubs pa de lta bu mi dran no/ /de nas nye bar bzung ba tshun chad du sems can gang kho mos bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu ma bskul ba de lta bu
219a5(phal chen): gcig kyang mig lam du 'ongs par mi dran no/ /de nas nye bar bzung ba tshun chad du nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas yid la bya ba dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa gcig kyang mngon par bsgrubs su mi
219a6(phal chen): dran no/ /rigs kyi bu de nas nye bar bzung ba tshan chad du bskal pa 'dzam bu'i gling gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed cig lon yang tshig dang / yi ge 'ga' la yang the tsom bskyed pa 'am/ gnyis kyis
219a7(phal chen): 'du shes sam/ rnam par rtog pa'i 'du shes sam/ sna tshogs kyi 'du shes sam/ rab kyi 'du shes sam/ bzang ngan gyi 'du shes sam/ sdug mi sdug gi 'du shes bskyed du mi dran no/ /rigs
219a8(phal chen): kyi bu kho mo ni de phyin cad du sangs rgyas byung ba dang ma bral lo/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnam dang ma bral lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang ma bral lo/ /yang dag pa'i dge ba'i bshes
219b1(phal chen): gnyen rnams dang ma bral lo/ /sangs rgyas kyi smon lam thos pa dang ma bral lo/ /byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thos pa dang ma bral lo/ /byang chub sems dpa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul thos pa dang ma bral
219b2(phal chen): lo/ /byang chub sems dpa'i sa'i ye shes snang ba'i tshul thos pa dang ma bral lo/ /byang chub sems dpa'i gzungs dang ting nge 'dzin mi zad pa'i mdzod dang / gter thob pa thob pa dang ma bral lo mtha' dang
219b3(phal chen): dbus med pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi dra ba la 'jug cing khong du chud par bya ba'i tshul thos pa dang ma bral lo/ /mtha' dang dbus med pa'i sems can gyi khams 'byung ba'i rgyu thos pa thob pa dang ma bral
219b4(phal chen): lo/ /'gro ba thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa'i dra ba'i dkyil 'khor yongs su zad par bya ba'i ye shes snang ba dang ma bral lo/ /sems can thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba 'byung ba'i rgyu'i ye shes thob pa
219b5(phal chen): dang ma bral lo/ /sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du lus yongs su ston pa dang ma bral lo/ /sems can thams cad kyi shes par byed pa'i dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor rnam par
219b6(phal chen): dag pa dang ma bral lo/ /rigs kyi bu kho mo byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa'i sgo thub par dka' ba'i ye shes kyi snying po 'di dang / chos thams cad yongs su btsal bas mi skyo ba'i rgyan
219b7(phal chen): gyi ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo 'di la snyoms par zhugs te/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i sgo yi dam la brtan pa 'di rnam par bye ba dang / gzungs kyi sgo chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyis 'di dang /
219b8(phal chen): spobs pa'i ye shes snang ba'i sgo chos kyi gzhi thams cad snang bar brjod pa 'di rnam par phye ba dang / cho 'phrul bsam kyis mi khyab pa yod na rigs kyi bu khyod mngon sum du blta bar 'dong ngam/
220a1(phal chen): smras pa 'phags ma 'tshal lo/ /de nas dge bsnyen ma mi g.yo bas de na de ltar 'dug bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa'i sgo thub pa med pa'i ye shes kyi snying po la stsogs pa
220a2(phal chen): dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo thams cad yongs su btsal bas mi skyo ba'i rgyan la stsogs pa dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo don yod pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi rgyan la stsogs pa dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo stobs
220a3(phal chen): bcu'i ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor mngon du 'gyur ba la stsogs pa dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo sangs rgyas kyi rigs mi zad pa'i mdzod la stsogs pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo brgya stong phrag bcu la rnam
220a4(phal chen): par blta ba dang / rnam par dpyad pa dang / rjes su rtogs pa dang / nges par rtogs par byas so/ /de ltar dge bsnyen ma mi g.yo ba snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs gyis
220a5(phal chen): phyogs bcur 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa phrag bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed rnam pa drug du g.yos pa dang / bai DUr+ya yongs su dag pa'i rgyu las gyur par gnas par mthong
220a6(phal chen): ngo / /'jig rten gyi khams re re'i gling bzhi pa bye ba phrag brgya brgya na/ de bzhin gshegs pa bye ba phrag brgya brgya bzhugs par mthong ste/ la la ni dga' ldan gyi gnas na bzhugs pa nas/
220a7(phal chen): la la ni yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba mdzad pa'i bar du 'ang mthong ngo / /de yang 'jig rten gyi khams bai DUr+ya'i rang bzhin de dag yongs su dag cing bsgrib pa med pa'i phyir te/ de bzhin gshegs
220a8(phal chen): pa de dag so so nas 'od zer dang / 'od kyi dkyil 'khor chos kyi dbyings thams cad du rgyas par khyab pa mnga' ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa de dag so so'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor
220b1(phal chen): shin tu rnam par phye ba rgya mtsho yang mthong bar gyur to/ /de bzhin gshegs pa de dag re re'i gsung gi dkyil 'khor chos kyi 'khor lo thams cad brjod pa sems can thams cad kyi rna lam du
220b2(phal chen): rnam par grags pa 'ang thos par gyur to/ /de nas dge bsnyen ma mi g.yo ba ting nge 'dzin de las langs nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs la 'di skad ces smras so rigs kyi bu khyod kyis mthong
220b3(phal chen): ngam/ thos sam shes sam/ smras pa 'phags ma mthong ngo / /thos so rig go/ /rigs kyi bu kho mo de ltar byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yi dam brtan pa la slob cing / chos thams cad
220b4(phal chen): yongs su btsal bas mi skyo ba'i rgyan kyi ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par bzhag ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa'i sgo thub par dka' ba'i ye shes kyi snying po la gnas nas/ chos
220b5(phal chen): thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi sa'i gzungs khong du chud pa dang / spobs pa'i ye shes snang ba chos kyi gzhi thams cad snang ba brjod pa la mkhas pa'i legs par bshad pas sems can thams
220b6(phal chen): c ad yongs su tshim par byed par zad na kho mos byang chub sems dpa' yon tan tshad med bsam gyi mi khyab pa dang ldan pa nam mkha'i dbyings la 'dab chags khyu mchog 'khod pa ltar gnas
220b7(phal chen): pa med par spyod pa/ nam mkha' lding gi dbang po chen po ltar yongs su smin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' snang ba'i phyir/ sems can thams cad kyi rgya mtsho la 'jug pa 'chang ba ltar stobs bcu'i ye shes
220b8(phal chen): rin po che mngon par 'dod cing / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi rin po che'i gling du rgyu ba'i mthu dang ldan pa'i nya ba ltar/ yid du 'ong ba'i chos kyi dkyil 'khor gyi rgya dang ldan pa'i lag pas
221a1(phal chen): sred pa'i chu las byung ba'i sems can yongs su smin par mngon par gdon pa'i phyir/ chos kyi rgya mtsho la rnam par rgyu ba/ lha'i dbang po ltar nyon mongs pa'i lha ma yin gyi g.yul
221a2(phal chen): chen po rdul du bzlog pa'i phyir/ khams gsum gyi gnas yongs su bkang zhing rnam par rgyu ba nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor ltar sems can gyi sred pa'i chu dang / nyon mongs pa'i 'dam shin tu bskam pa'i
221a3(phal chen): phyir/ chos kyi dbyings nam mkha'i dbyings la yang dag par 'phags pa zla ba nya zhing rgyas pa ltar 'dul ba'i yid kyi me tog ku mu ta rnam par kha dbye ba'i phyir/ ye shes kyi nam mkha'
221a4(phal chen): la mngon par shar ba/ sa'i gzhi ltar 'gro ba thams cad kyi dge ba'i dbang po'i myu gu bskyed cing / rnam par spel ba'i phyir byams mi byams dang / mthon dman med par 'jig rten
221a5(phal chen): na mnyam par gnas pa rlung mar ltar sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa dang / lta ba'i shing dang shing phran gyi nags tshal dang / kun dga' ba rtsa ba nas gdon pa'i phyir chags pa med
221a6(phal chen): par phyogs thams cad tu rnam par rgyu ba/ 'khor los bsgyur ba ltar bsdu ba'i dngos po'i yo byad dang / rkyen gyis 'gro ba thams cad yongs su bsdu ba'i phyir/ 'jig rten gyi rnam par
221a7(phal chen): spyod pa de dag gi spyod pa shes pa 'am/ yon tan brjod par nus re skan/ song rigs kyi bu lho phyogs kyi rgyud 'di nyid kyi yul dga' 'dzin tshad med pa na/ grong khyer dga' ba 'dzin pa
221b1(phal chen): zhes bya ba yod de/ de na kun tu rgyu thams cad du 'gro ba zhes bya ba 'dug gis/ de'i gan du song la ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar nan
221b2(phal chen): tan du bya ba dris shig / de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis dge bsnyen ma mi g.yo ba'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal to/ /dge bsnyen ma mi g.yo ba la lan brgya stong du mar g.yas
221b3(phal chen): phyogs su bskor ba byas nas yang dang yang bltas te/ dge bsnyen mi g.yo ba'i drung nas song ngo / /de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs dge bsnyen ma mi g.yo ba mngon du byas te/ dge bsnyen ma mi
221b4(phal chen): g.yo ba'i gdams ngag rjes su dran par byed cing / dge bsnyen ma mi g.yo bas bstan pa dang / yang dag par bstan pa dang / bsgrags pa dang / bshad pa dang / brjod pa dang / yang dag par brjod pa dang /
221b5(phal chen): gzhag pa dang / rnam par phye ba dang / smos pa dang / rgya cher bstan pa de dag thams cad la gdon mi za bar yid ches shing rjes su 'brang bar bya ba dang / rjes su bsam pa dang / khong du chud par bya ba dang /
221b6(phal chen): sgom pa dang / yongs su sgom pa dang / gzhan du mi 'gyur ba dang / rtogs par bya ba dang / snang bar bya ba dang / mnyam par bya ba byed cing / mthar gyis gnas nas gnas dang yul nas
221b7(phal chen): yul du rgyu ste/ rgyu zhing song song nas yul dga' 'dzin tshad med pa gang na ba der phyin nas/ grong khyer dga' ba 'dzin pa tshol tshol te/ nyi ma nub du cha ba zhig /grong khyer dga' ba 'dzin
221b8(phal chen): par phyin nas/ grong khyer dga' ba 'dzin pa'i gnas du song ste/ grong khyer gyi lam gyi bzhi mdo'i dbus shig du phyin nas srang gi sgo nas/ srang gi sgo dang lam gyi bzhi mdo nas
222a1(phal chen): lam gyi bzhi mdo dang / grong phrag nas grong phrag du kun tu rgyu/ thams cad du 'gro 'gro tshol tshol rmed rmed pa dang / mtshan mo mi nyal tsam zhig na grong khyer dga' ba 'dzin pa'i byang phyogs
222a2(phal chen): logs na/ ri shin tu pad mo zhes bya ba zhig yod pa de'i rtse mo rtswa dang gel pa dang / sman sna tshogs dga' dga' ltar skyes pas brgyan pa 'od chen po dang ldan pa la nyi ma shar ba lta bur gnas pa
222a3(phal chen): mthong ngo / /des snang ba de mthong nas dga' ba'i shugs chen po skyes te 'di snyam du sems so/ /bdag gi dge ba'i gshes gnyen ri'i rtse mo 'di la gdon mi za bar mthong bar 'gyur ba lta zhig
222a4(phal chen): snyam nas/ grong khyer de nas byung ste/ ri shin du pad+mo gang na ba der phyin pa dang / ri shin tu mod pa de la 'dzegs nas/ ri'i rtse mo snang ba chen po can gang na ba der phyin pa dang / rgyang ring po zhig nas kun tu rgyu thams cad du 'gro ba tshangs
222a5(phal chen): pa chen po bas kyang lhag pa'i kha dog dang ldan pa dpal gyis shin tu 'bar ba zhig tshangs pa stong phrag bcus kun nas bskor te/ 'chags nas 'chag cing 'dug pa mthong nas/ de'i drung
222a6(phal chen): du phyin te/ rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal nas/ de la lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas te/ mdun du 'dug nas thal mo sbyar te/ 'di skad ces smras so/ /
222a7(phal chen): 'phags pa bdag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed na/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang /
222a8(phal chen): ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba ma 'tshal te/ 'phags pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams la gdams ngag dang rjes su bstan pa mdzad do zhes bdag gis thos na/ 'phags pa ji ltar byang chub sems
222b1(phal chen): dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba bdag la bshad du gsol/ smras pa rigs kyi bu de ltar khyod/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
222b2(phal chen): byang chub tu zhugs pa legs so/ /legs so rigs kyi bu kho bo ni thams cad du 'gro ba ste/ thams cad kyi rjes su song ba'i byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la gnas pa'o/ /sgo thams
222b3(phal chen): cad du rnam par spyod pas snang ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo dang / dngos po med pa la gnas pas/ mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i rdzu 'phrul dang / chos kyi dbyings kun gyi gzhir thug par
222b4(phal chen): thal ba/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ye shes snang ba'i sgo dang ldan par rigs kyi de ltar kho bo ni sems can gyi snod kyi 'jig rten gyi rgyud thams cad dang / sems can gyi lam gyi rgyud
222b5(phal chen): thams cad dang / sems can gyi shi 'pho ba'i sgo thams cad dang / sems can kyi skye ba'i sgo thams cad dang / srid pa'i lam gyi rgyud tha dad pa thams cad dang / skye ba'i skye mched sna
222b6(phal chen): tshogs kyi 'jig rten gyi gnas rnam pa tha dad pa dag gi sems can kha dog dang / dbyibs dang / chung zheng rnam pa sna tshogs dang ldan pa/ skye ba kun tu 'brel pa/ rnam pa
222b7(phal chen): sna tshogs dang ldan pa/ sbyor ba sna tshogs dang ldan pa/ mos pa sna tshogs can 'di lta ste lha'i lam gyi rgyud du ma gtogs pa dang / klu'i lam gyi rgyud du ma gtogs pa dang / gnod sbyin gyi
222b8(phal chen): lam gyi rgyud du ma gtogs pa dang / dri za'i lam gyi rgyud du gtogs pa dang / lha ma yin gyi lam gyi rgyud du gtogs pa dang / nam mkha' lding gi lam gyi rgyud du gtogs pa dang /
223a1(phal chen): mi 'am ci'i lam gyi rgyud du gtogs pa dang / lto 'phye chen po'i lam gyi rgyud du gtogs pa dang / sems can dmyal ba'i lam gyi rgyud du gtogs pa dang / byol song gi skye
223a2(phal chen): gnas kyi lam gyi rgyud du gtogs pa dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi lam gyi rgyud du gtogs pa dang / mi'i lam gyi rgyud du gtogs pa dang / mi ma yin pa'i
223a3(phal chen): lam gyi rgyud du gtogs pa dang / lta ba'i rnam pa sna tshogs la gnas pa nyan thos kyi theg pa la mos pa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la mos pa dang / theg pa chen po la mos pa'i sems
223a4(phal chen): can gyi don thabs sna tshogs dang / ye shes kyi tshul dang sbyor ba sna tshogs kyis byed de/ 'di ltar sems can la la la ni bzo'i rgyus tha dad pa thams cad dang ldan pa'i gzugs snang bas
223a5(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi bzo sna tshogs bslabs shing don byed do/ /sems can la la la ni 'di lta ste/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes bston pa'i phyir/ bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhis yongs su bsdu
223a6(phal chen): ba'i thabs kyis don byed do/ /sems can la la la ni 'di lta ste/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'gyur ba'i ye shes kyi sgo snang ba yongs su bskyed pas pha rol tu phyin pa yang dag par
223a7(phal chen): brjod cing don byed do/ /sems can la la la ni 'di lta ste/ byang chub kyi sa bon chud mi za bar brten cing yongs su bskyed pas/ byang chub sems dpa'i sems yongs su brjod cing don byed do/ /
223a8(phal chen): sems can la la la ni 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad yongs su dag par bya ba dang / sems can thams cad yongs su smyin par bya ba'i smon lam yongs su bskyed pa'i
223b1(phal chen): phyir/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rnam pa thams cad du yang dag par brjod pas don byed do/ /sems can la la la ni 'di lta ste/ ngan du spyod pa'i rnam par smin pa dang / mthun pa'i rgyus sems can
223b2(phal chen): dmyal ba'i lam gyi rgyud kyi sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba myong bar 'gyur ba yongs su bstan pas/ skyo ba yongs su bskyed cing don byed do/ /sems can la la la ni 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs
223b3(phal chen): pa la bskyed pa'i yon tan thams cad ni gdon mi za bar thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi 'bras bu'i mthar thug par 'gyur bar brjod pas/ dga' ba chen po bskyed cing don byed do/ /sems
223b4(phal chen): can la la la ni 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas kyi yon tan dang sku la mngon par mos pas thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du smon lam 'debs par bya ba'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams
223b5(phal chen): cad kyi yon tan dang / sngags pa yang dag par brjod pas don byed do/ /sems can la la la ni 'di lta ste/ mi bzlogs shing lhun gyis grub pa dang / rgyun chad pa med par sangs rgyas
223b6(phal chen): kyi phrin las nan tan du mdzad pa'i mthu dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sku thob par mos pa bskyed pa'i phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi bdag nyid che ba brjod pas don byed do/ /sems can
223b7(phal chen): la la la ni 'di lta ste/ tshur zil gyis gnon la phar zil gyis mi gnon pa sangs rgyas kyi sku phun sum tshogs pa 'thob par mos pa bskyed pa'i phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi mnga'
223b8(phal chen): chen po yongs su brjod cing don byed do/ /rigs kyi bu gzhan yang kho bo ni grong khyer dga' ba 'dzin pa 'di'i bzhi mdo 'di phrang thams cad dang / srang thams cad dang / lam gyi sum
224a1(phal chen): mdo thams cad dang / grong mtshams thams cad dang / mthun par 'dus pa'i grong rdal thams cad dang grong thams cad dang / grong gi rgyud thams cad du rnam pa ji ltar tshogs shing
224a2(phal chen): 'dus pa'i bud med dang / skyes pa dang khye'u dang bu mo rnams kyi bsam pa ji lta ba dang / sbyor ba ji lta ba dang / mthu ji lta ba dang / rnam par spyod pa ji lta ba bzhin du de dag dang / mthun pa'i
224a3(phal chen): lus kyi chu zheng dang dbyibs mngon par bsgrubs shing / chos ston kyang / sems can de dag gi lus bstan pa dang / de ga las 'ongs pa mi shes te/ gzhan du na thos nas ma nor bar nan du
224a4(phal chen): byed pa ni med pa'ang ma yin no/ /gzhan yang rigs kyi bu 'dzam bu'i gling 'di na/ zhags pa 'thub pa lta ba rnam pa sna tshogs la mngon par zhen pa/ dgu bcu rtsa drug 'khod pa de dag
224a5(phal chen): thams cad kyi nang du yang sems can lta ba'i rnam pa sna tshogs pa rnams yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir thams cad dang mthun par gnas te/ rigs kyi bu de ltar kho bo grong khyer
224a6(phal chen): dga' ba 'dzin pa 'di na sems can gyi don byed cing 'dug pa de bzhin du 'dzam bu'i gling gi grong khyer dang / ljongs dang / yul dang khams dang / rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor thams cad
224a7(phal chen): na yang sems can gyi don byed do/ /'dzam bu'i gling na ji lta ba de bzhin du gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad dang / de bzhin du stong dang stong gnyis pa dang / stong gsum gyi stong
224a8(phal chen): chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams dang / de bzhin du phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can gyi rten du bya ba thams cad dang / sems can gyi gnas su bya ba thams cad dang / sems can gyi gzhir bya ba thams cad dang /
224b1(phal chen): sems can gyi khams su bya ba'i ming du gtogs pa thams cad dang / sems can yongs su rgyu ba thams cad dang / sems can yongs su 'du ba thams cad dang / sems rgya mtsho
224b2(phal chen): la gnas pa thams cad dang / sems can gyi rgyud la gnas pa thams cad dang / sems can gyi phyogs su bya ba thams cad dang / sems can gyi phyogs mtshams su bya ba thams cad
224b3(phal chen): dang / sems can spyod pa'i gnas thams cad du 'am/ thabs sna tshogs dang / tshul sna tshogs dang / sgo sna tshogs dang / rigs pa sna tshogs dang / 'phrad pa sna tshogs dang / thabs
224b4(phal chen): kyi tshul sna tshogs dang / bya ba sna tshogs kyis sems can rnams kyi don byed do/ /gzugs dang kha dog sna tshogs yongs su bstan cing mos par bya ba dang / tshig gi lam sna tshogs brjod pas
224b5(phal chen): kyang sems can rnams kyi don byed do/ /rigs kyi bu kho bos ni byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad du 'gro ba thams cad kyi rjes su bya ba 'di shes par zad na/ kho bos byang chub
224b6(phal chen): sems dpa' 'gro ba thams cad dang / mnyam pa'i lus dang ldan pa bdag dang / sems can gyi lus su tha mi dad pa'i ting nge 'dzin thob pa/ 'phrul pa'i 'khor lo rgya chen pos srid pa'i
224b7(phal chen): lam gyi rgyud thams cad du khyab pa/ 'jig rten gyi skye ba thams cad rang gi lus la rjes su spyod pa/ 'gro ba thams cad kyis lta na dga' zhing yid du 'ong ba'i sprul pa'i 'khor lo
224b8(phal chen): la brtson pa/ 'gro ba thams cad kyi rigs dang rgyud dang cher skye ba rab tu ston pa/ bskal pa thams cad du gnas pa la thog pa med pa'i smon lam gyi 'khor lo dang ldan pa/ mi 'phrul
225a1(phal chen): lta bu'i spyod pa rnam par phye ba'i snang ba rab tu thob pa/ 'gro ba thams cad kyi don byed kyang / gos pa med par gnas pa la brtson pa/ dus gsum gyi 'gro ba'i dbyings mnyam pa nyid khong du
225a2(phal chen): chud pa/ ye shes kyi dbyings bdag med pa dang ldan pas/ snang bar byas pa'i snying rje chen po mtha' yas pa'i snying po dang ldan pa/ 'gro ba thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su bskyed pa la mngon
225a3(phal chen): par brtson pa/ de dag gi spyod pa shes pa 'am/ yon tan brjod par nus re skan/ song rigs kyi bu lho phyogs kyi rgyud 'di nyid na yul khams chen po zhes bya ba yod de/ de na spos 'tshong gi
225a4(phal chen): tshong dpon longs spyod ud pa la zhes bya ba 'dug gis/ de'i gan du song la ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bya ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bya
225a5(phal chen): ba dris shig / de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis kun tu rgyu thams cad du 'gro ba'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ kun tu rgyu thams cad du 'gro ba la lan brgya stong
225a6(phal chen): du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas/ yang dang yang bltas te/ kun tu rgyu thams cad du 'gro ba'i drung nas song ngo / /de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs lus dang srog la ni mi
225a7(phal chen): lta/ srid pa'i longs spyod dang yongs su zin pa dang / nye bar blangs pa la mngon par chags pa'i gnas thams cad la ni mi lta/ sems can gyi yul gyi dga' ba la ni mi lta/ gzugs
225a8(phal chen): dang / sgra dang dri dang ro dang / reg bya thams cad la ni mi lta/ g.yog 'khor dang longs spyod dang / nye bar spyod pa thams cad la ni mi lta ste/ rgyal srid dang dbang phyug gi dbang gi bde ba
225b1(phal chen): thams cad la ni mi lta sangs rgyas kyi zhing bla na med par yongs su dag pa mngon par bsgrubs pas sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba dang / gdul ba dang yongs su dag par bya ba
225b2(phal chen): la lta ba/ mchod pa dang bsnyen bkur ba dang / rim gro bya bas mi ngoms pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la lta ba dang / rang bzhin med pa yongs su shes pa'i ye shes khong du chud par bya ba'i
225b3(phal chen): phyir chos thams cad la blta ba yon tan rgya mtsho thams cad kyi don tu nan tan bya ba las nyam pa med par bya ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'i yon tan thams cad la blta ba dang / bskal pa
225b4(phal chen): thams cad du byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la yang dag par gnas par bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi smon lam chen po la lta ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor
225b5(phal chen): gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho thams cad la 'jug par bya ba la lta ba/ ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo re rer byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin grangs med pa thams cad gzung ba la rnam par 'phrul
225b6(phal chen): par bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo thams cad la lta ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khor lo yang dag par bzung bas mi ngoms par
225b7(phal chen): bya ba'i phyir/ chos kyi ye shes snang ba'i 'khor lo thams cad la lta ba/ de sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i yon tan 'di dag dang / gzhan dag kyang dge ba'i bshes gnyen las
225b8(phal chen): 'byung ba ste/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni de dag thams cad kyi 'byung gnas su gyur pa yin par yang dag par lta zhing mthar gyis yul khams chen po gang na ba der phyin nas/ spos
226a1(phal chen): 'tshong gi tshong dpon longs spyod ud pa la yongs su rmed cing tshol tshol ba las mthong nas/ spos 'tshong gi tshong dpon longs spyod ud pa la gang na ba der phyin te/ de'i drung du song nas/ spos 'tshong
226a2(phal chen): gi tshong dpon longs spyod ud pa la'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ spos 'tshong gi tshong dpon long spyod ud pa la la lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas/ spos
226a3(phal chen): 'tshong gi tshong dpon longs spyod ud pa la'i mdun du 'dug te/ thal mo sbyar nas 'di skad ces smras so/ /'phags pa bdag sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam pa'i ye shes 'tshal te/
226a4(phal chen): sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sngon gyi smon lam gyi dkyil 'khor yongs su rdzogs par bgyi bar yang dga'/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos kyi sku yongs su grub par bgyi bar yang dga'/ sangs rgyas
226a5(phal chen): thams cad kyi ye shes kyi sku yongs su 'tshal bar bgyi bar yang dga'/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i dkyil 'khor thams cad yongasu dag par bgyi bar yang dga'/ byang chub sems dpa' ting
226a6(phal chen): nge 'dzin gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad snang bar bgyid par yang dga'/ byang chub sems dpa'i gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad yongs su brtan par yang dga'/ sgrib pa'i dkyil 'khor thams cad
226a7(phal chen): rnam par gtor bar yang dga' zhing gi dkyil 'khor thams cad du rnam par rgyu bar 'tshal nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs na/ ji ltar byang chub
226a8(phal chen): sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab pa dang / ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba na
226b1(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur bar ma 'tshal to/ /smras pa rigs kyi bu de ltar khyod kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa legs so
226b2(phal chen): legs so/ /rigs kyi bu kho bo ni spos thams cad shes te/ spos sbyar ba thams cad dang / bdug spos thams cad dang / bdug spos sbyar ba thams cad dang / byug pa thams cad dang / byug pa
226b3(phal chen): sbyar ba thams cad dang / phye ma thams cad dang / phye ma sbyar ba thams cad dang / spos byug pa dang / phye ma'i rnam pa thams cad kyang shes te/ lha'i spos kyang shes so/ /klu dang gnod sbyin
226b4(phal chen): dang dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa'i spos kyang shes so/ /nad sel ba'i spos dang / yid mi bde ba bstsal ba'i
226b5(phal chen): spos dang / 'jig rten gyi dga' ba yongs su bskyed pa'i spos dang / nyon mongs pa 'bor bar bya ba'i spos dang / nyon mongs pa zhi bar bya ba'i spos dang / 'dus byas kyi dga' ba dang / bde
226b6(phal chen): ba sna tshogs yongs su bskyed pa'i spos dang / 'dus byas thams cad las skyo ba yongs su bskyed pa'i spos dang / bag bya ba'i gnas thams cad sel ba'i spos dang / sangs rgyas yid
226b7(phal chen): la bya ba'i rgyud yang dag par 'byung ba'i spos dang / chos kyi tshul khong du chud par bya ba'i spos dang / 'phags pas spyad pa'i spos dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spos rnam pa tha dad pa dang /
226b8(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa'i sa thams cad rnam par dgod pa'i spos yang shes te/ spos kho bos de dag thams cad rnam pa ji lta bu 'ang rab tu shes so/ /'byung ba dang skye ba dang / 'grub pa dang /
227a1(phal chen): yongs su rdzogs pa dang / yongs su dag pa dang / yongs su spang ba dang / rab tu sbyar ba dang / yongs su spyad pa dang / yul dang mthu dang las dang rgyu yang rab tu shes so/ /rigs gyi bu mi'i
227a2(phal chen): 'jig rten na spos glang po'i snying po zhes bya ba/ klu yongs su 'khrug par byed pa yod de/ de'i ri lu til gyi 'bru tsam kyis kyang yul khams chen po thams cad spos kyi sprin gyi dra ba shin tu stug
227a3(phal chen): pas kun nas khebs par gyur te/ zhag bdun du spos chu'i rgyun shin tu phra ba'i char mngon par 'bab bo/ /de'i tshe sems can su'i lus las gos la spos chu'i rgyun de dag gis bab par gyur
227a4(phal chen): pa de dag thams cad kyang me tog gser gyi kha dog du 'dug pas rnam par brgyan pa'i gos dang lus su 'gyur ro/ /khang pa dang gzhal med khang dang / khang pa brtsegs pa gang du bab par gyur
227a5(phal chen): pa de dag thams cad kyang me tog gser gyi kha dog lta bus rnam par brgyan par gnas so/ /sems can khyim gyi nang na gnas pa gang gis spos kyi sprin gyi dra ba de la rlung gi ldang ba'i dri tshor
227a6(phal chen): bar gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang zhag bdun du dga' ba dang / mos pa chen pos yongs su rgyas par 'gyur te/ lus dang sems la/ bde ba dang dga' ba sna tshogs kyang rab tu myong bar 'gyur
227a7(phal chen): ro/ /de dag gi lus la yang khams 'khrug pa las gyur pa 'am/ gzhan gyis gnod par byas pa las byung ba'i nad kyang 'byung bar 'gyur ba med do/ /sems kyi sdug bsngal ba dang yid mi bde
227a8(phal chen): ba yang mi 'byung ngo 'jigs pa 'am/ sngang ba 'am bag tsha ba 'am/ yid 'khrug pa 'am/ gnod sems kyang mi rgyu ste/ de dag thams cad zhag bdun du dga' ba dang bde ba skyes te/
227b1(phal chen): gcig la gcig byams pa'i sems su 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu kho bo ni de dag de ltar dga' ba dang / nyams bde ba skyes pa rnams la bsam pa dag par bya ba'i phyir ci nas kyang bla na med pa yang
227b2(phal chen): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par 'gyur ba de ltar chos bstan to/ /gzhan yang rigs kyi bu ri ma la ya las 'byung ba'i tsan dan sa stegs dam pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de lus la bskus na me'i
227b3(phal chen): 'obs su 'chongs kyang tshig pa med do/ /rigs kyi bu rgya mtsho'i mtha' nas 'byung ba'i spos gzhan gyis thub pa med pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de rnga 'am dung la bskus na de'i sgras gzhan gyi
227b4(phal chen): 'khor thams cad pham par 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu mtsho ma dros pa'i ngogs nas 'byung ba'i a ga ru nag po pad mo'i snying po zhes bya ba yod de/ de'i ri lu til gyi 'bru tsam gcig gi dris kyang
227b5(phal chen): 'dzam bu'i gling thams cad rgyas par gang bar 'gyur te/ sems can gang gis spos kyi dri de tshor ba de dag thams cad kyang sdig pa la smod cing sdom pa'i sems rab tu thob par 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi
227b6(phal chen): bu ri'i rgyal po kha ba can las 'byung ba'i spos kyi rnam pa 'od dang ldan pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de'i dri tshor na sems can de dag 'dod chags dang bral ba'i sems su 'gyur te/ kho bo ni de dag la ci nas
227b7(phal chen): kyang rdul dang bral ba'i dkyil 'khor ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob par 'gyur ba de ltar chos ston to/ /rigs kyi bu srin po'i 'jig rten nas 'byung ba'i spos kyi rnam pa rgya mtsho'i snying po zhes
227b8(phal chen): bya ba yod de/ de ni 'khor los bsgyur ba'i longs spyod kyi don du 'byung ste/ des bdug ma thag tu 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po'i dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa yang nam mkha'i
228a1(phal chen): dbyings la gnas so/ /rigs kyi bu lha'i 'khor chos bzang po nas 'byung ba'i spos kyi rnam pa rnam par 'byed pa zhes bya ba yod de/ des bdug ma thag tu lha rnams sangs rgyas kyi
228a2(phal chen): dri zhim po dran par 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu lha'i rgyal po rab mtshe ma'i gnas na spos kyi rnam pa rnam par dag pa zhes bya ba yod de/ des bdug ma thag tu mtshe ma'i lha'i bu thams cad
228a3(phal chen): lha'i rgyal po rab mtshe ma'i drung du 'dong ngo / /de dag der phyin nas kyang lha'i rgyal po rab mtshe ma'i chos kyi gtam byed do/ /rigs kyi bu dga' ldan gyi gnas na/ spos kyi rnam pa sa'i 'du ba ra
228a4(phal chen): zhes bya ba yod de/ de'i spos kyi dud pa byang chub sems dpa' tshe gcig gi thogs pa chos kyi stan la 'dug pa'i mdun du phyung na/ chos kyi sprin chen pos chos kyi dbyings thams cad rgyas
228a5(phal chen): par gang zhing / de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad du rgyan rnam pa sna tshogs dang ldan pa'i chos kyi sprin chen po'i char rab tu 'bab po/ /rigs kyi bu lha'i rgyal po
228a6(phal chen): rab 'phrul dga'i gnas na/ spos kyi rnam pa yid 'phrog pa zhes bya ba yod de/ des lha'i rgyal po rab 'phrul dga'i gnas su 'dug na/ zhag bdun du chos kyi sprin gyi char bsam gyis mi
228a7(phal chen): khyab pa 'bab par 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu kho bos ni spos sbyar ba de shes su zad na/ kho bos byang chub sems dpa' skyon gyi dri ma med pa 'dod pa'i 'jig rten thams cad nas gyen
228a8(phal chen): du 'phags pa/ nyon mongs pa'i bdud kyi zhags pa dang bral ba/ srid pa'i lam gyi rgyud thams cad las shin tu 'das pa/ ye shes sgyu ma'i rnam pa dang / gzugs kyi rnam par spyod pa/
228b1(phal chen): 'jig rten thams cad kyis gos pa med pa/ chags pa med pa'i ngang tshul can/ sgrib pa med par ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor rnam par dag pa/ thogs pa med pa'i ye shes kyi spyod yul dang /
228b2(phal chen): yul du ldan pa/ kun gyi gzhi'i gnas thams cad la mi gnas par/ srid pa'i kun gzhi dang gnas thams cad du rgyu ba rnams kyi spyod pa shes pa 'am/ yon tan brjod pa 'am/ tshul khrims
228b3(phal chen): kyi spyod pa rnam par dag pa'i sgo yongs su smos pa 'am/ kha na ma tho ba med pa'i spyod pa brjod pa 'am/ gnod par spyod pa med pa'i lus dang ngag dang yid kyi rgyud bstan par nus re skan/ /
228b4(phal chen): song rigs kyi bu lho phyogs kyi rgyud 'di nyid na/ grong khyer khang pa brtsegs pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na mnyan pa dpa' bo zhes bya ba 'dug gis de'i drung du song la ji ltar byang chub sems dpas
228b5(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bya ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bya ba dris shig /de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis/ spos 'tshong gi tshong dpon longs spyod u pa la'i
228b6(phal chen): rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal nas/ spos 'tshong gi tshong dpon longs spyod ud pa la la lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas/ yang dang yang bltas te/
228b7(phal chen): spos 'tshong gi tshong dpon longs spyod ud pa la'i drung nas song ngo / /de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs grong khyer khang pa brtsegs par 'gro ba'i lam du 'jug pa'i tshe/ lam gyi gyen
228b8(phal chen): thur dang / lam mnyam pa dang / lam gyi thag thug dang / lam rdul yod pa dang / lam rdul med pa dang / lam bde ba dang / lam mi bde ba dang / lam dog pa dang / lam bgegs
229a1(phal chen): med pa dang / lam 'khyog pa dang / lam 'khyog pa med pa la rnam par dpyad de ltas nas 'di snyam du bsams so/ /'di ltar bdag dge ba'i bshes gnyen de'i drung du 'gro ba 'di ni/
229a2(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa'i lam gyi nan tan gyi rgyur 'gyur ro/ /pha rol tu phyin pa'i lam gyi nan tan gyi rgyur 'gyur ro/ /sems can la phan 'dogs pa'i lam gyi rgyur 'gyur ro/ /sems
229a3(phal chen): thams cad byams sdang dang / mthon dman du 'gyur pa'i g.yang sa las rnam par bzlog pa dang / sems can thams cad mi mnyam pa'i nan tan las bsgyur ba dang / sems can gyi
229a4(phal chen): nyon mongs pa'i rdul rab tu zhi bar bya ba dang / sems can thams cad gyi mi dge ba'i lta ba sna tshogs kyi sdom dum dang / tsher ma dang / gyo mo dang gseg ma brtsal ba dang / chos kyi dbyings sgrib pa
229a5(phal chen): med pa la gzhol bar bya ba dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i pho brang du thogs pa med par bskyel ba'i rgyur 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni dge ba'i chos thams
229a6(phal chen): cad kyi 'byung gnas so/ /dge ba'i bshes gnyen la ni thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rag lus so zhes de ltar sems shing yid la byed pas spyod pa thub par dka' ba de mthar gyis grong khyer
229a7(phal chen): khang pa brtsegs pa der phyin nas mnyan pa dpa' bo yongs su rmed cing tshol tshol ba las grong khyer chen po zhig gi sgo rgya mtsho chen po'i ngogs na/ mnyan pa dpa' bo de tshong pa brgya phrag stong
229a8(phal chen): tsam dang / srog chags brgya stong du ma gtam sna tshogs mnyan par 'dod pa sha stag gcig gis kun nas bskor cing / rgya mtsho'i gtam yongs su brjod pas/ sangs rgyas kyi yon
229b1(phal chen): tan rgya mtsho sems can rnams la ston cing 'dug pa mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang mnyan pa dpa' bo gang na ba der song ste/ phyin nas mnyan pa dpa' bo'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag
229b2(phal chen): 'tshal te/ mnyan pa dpa' bo la lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas/ mnyan pa dpa' bo'i mdun du 'dug ste/ thal mo sbyar nas 'di skad ces smras so/ /
229b3(phal chen): 'phags pa bdag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed na/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang /
229b4(phal chen): ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba ma 'tshal te/ 'phags pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams la gdams ngag dang / rjes su bstan pa mdzad do zhes bdag gis thos na/ 'phags pa ji
229b5(phal chen): ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba bdag la bka' bstsal du gsol/ smras pa rigs kyi bu khyod
229b6(phal chen): kyi de ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed de/ ye shes chen po thob pa 'byung ba'i rgyu 'dri ba dang / 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal sna tshogs kyi
229b7(phal chen): rgyud 'byung ba'i rgyu dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi gling gi gnas su 'gro ba 'byung ba'i rgyu dang / dbyer med pa'i theg pa chen po 'byung ba'i rgyu dang / nyan thos dang rang
229b8(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyi sar ltung bas 'jigs pa dang 'bral bar 'gyur ba'i lam gyi nan tan 'byung ba'i rgyu dang / zhi ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo dang / rgyud sna tshogs khong du
230a1(phal chen): chud par bya ba'i ye shes kyi lam 'byung ba'i rgyud dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad du 'gro bas rnam par spyod pa'i smon lam gyis shing rta'i 'khor lo thogs
230a2(phal chen): pa med pa'i lam 'byung ba dang / rnam par dag par 'gyur ba'i rgyu dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa gzi brjid kyi dba' rlabs kyis rnam par rgyan pa thams cad kyi rang
230a3(phal chen): bzhin dang / tshul gyi lam 'byung ba dang / rnam par dag par 'gyur ba'i rgyu dang / chos kyi phyogs dang / sgo thams cad kyi phyi ma'i mtha'i lam 'byung ba dang / rnam par dag par
230a4(phal chen): 'gyur ba'i rgyu dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i rgya mtshor 'jug pa'i lam 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang / rnam par dag par 'gyur ba'i rgyu 'dri ba 'di legs so legs so/ /rigs
230a5(phal chen): kyi bu kho bo ni rgya mtsho'i ngogs kyi grong khyer khang pa brtsegs pa 'di na/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa snying rje chen po'i rgyal mtshan yongs su sbyong zhing gnas te/ rigs kyi
230a6(phal chen): bu kho bo ni 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can phongs pa rnams mthong nas/ de dag gi don du dka' ba spyod de/ de dag gi bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/ /'jig rten gyi
230a7(phal chen): zang zing gis yongs su bsdu bar bya'o/ /chos kyi longs spyod kyis de dag yongs su tshim par bya'o/ /de dag la bsod nams kyi tshogs kyi lam man ngag du bstan par bya'o/ /
230a8(phal chen): ye shes kyi tshogs rnam par spel bar bya'o/ /dge ba'i rtsa ba'i stobs yongs su spel bar bya'o/ /byang chub kyi sems bskyed par bya'o/ /byang chub kyi bsam pa rnam par dag
230b1(phal chen): par bya'o/ /snying rje chen po'i stobs nye bar bstan par bya'o/ /'khor ba'i sdug bsngal rnam par zhi bar bya'o/ /'khor ba'i spyod pas yongs su mi skyo ba'i stobs shin tu bstan par bya'o/ /
230b2(phal chen): sems can rgya mtsho bsdu ba la 'di dag sbyar bar bya'o/ /yon tan rgya mtsho'i nan tan gyi sgo la dgod par bya'o/ /'di dag la chos rgya mtsho'i ye shes snang ba nye bar bsgrub par bya'o/ /
230b3(phal chen): sangs rgyas rgya mtsho thams cad kyang 'di dag gis mngon par mthong bar bya'o/ /thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi rgya mtsho la yang 'di dag gzud par bya'o zhes de lta bu'i bsam pa
230b4(phal chen): dang / yid la bya ba la brtson par kho bos rgya mtsho'i ngogs kyi grong khyer khang pa brtsegs pa 'di na gnas so/ /rigs kyi bu kho bo ni de ltar 'gro ba la phan pa dang / bde ba'i
230b5(phal chen): brtson pa rgya mtsho chen po'i rin po che'i gling thams cad kyang shes so/ /rin po che'i 'byung gnas thams cad dang / rin po che'i rigs thams cad dang / rin po che'i gter
230b6(phal chen): thams cad kyang rab tu shes so/ /klu'i gnas thams cad dang / klu'i 'khrug pa thams cad dang / gnod sbyin gyi gnas thams cad dang / gnod sbyin 'khrug pa thams cad
230b7(phal chen): dang / srin po'i gnas thams cad dang / srin po'i 'jigs pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar bya ba dang / 'byung po'i gnas thams cad dang / 'byung po'i bar chad thams cad
230b8(phal chen): rnam par zhi bar bya ba yang rab tu shes ste/ glong yod pa thams cad dang / glong thams cad bkol ba dang dba' rlabs chen po yongs su spang ba dang / chu'i kha dog
231a1(phal chen): rnam pa tha dad pa 'di rab tu shes so/ /nyi zla dang gza' skar kyi tshogs yongs su 'khor ba dang / nyin zhag dang skad cig dang / yud tsam dang thang gcig kyang rab tu shes so/ /phan tshun du 'gro
231a2(phal chen): ba'i shol 'dums dang / bde mi bde dang / gru'i 'khrul 'khor brtan par bya ba dang / gru bzur ba dang / gru phul ba dang / rlung rdo ba dang / rlung bskyed pa dang / gru bsgyur zhing bzlog pa dang / gru bstod pa dang / gru
231a3(phal chen): btang ba yang rab tu shes so/ /rigs kyi bu de ltar kho bo ni shes pa de lta bu dang ldan pas rtag tu sems can gyi don dang dgos pa byed de/ tshong pa'i tshogs gru brtan pos lam bde zhing nye zhor mi 'gyur la mi
231a4(phal chen): 'jigs pa nas/ chos kyi gtams kyis dga' ba dang / spro ba bskyed cing bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du rin po che'i gling du phyin par byas nas/ de dag rin po che thams cad kyis mchog ste/ phun sum
231a5(phal chen): tshogs par gyur pa dang / phyir yang 'dzam bu'i gling du 'gyed 'gyed kyang rigs kyi bu kho bo yang bub pa'am/ nye zhor 'gyur ma myong ba ste/ sems can gang gis kho bo mthong bar gyur pa dang /
231a6(phal chen): sems can gang gis kho bo'i chos bstan pa thos pa de dag kyang 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho thams cad du nye zhor 'gyur ba'i 'jigs pa dang bral bar 'gyur ro/ /thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi rgya
231a7(phal chen): mtshor 'jug pa'i ye shes kyang mngon sum du 'gyur ro/ /srid pa'i rgya mtsho bskam pa'i don du 'ang rab tu 'jug par 'gyur te/ dus gsum rgya mtsho'i ye shes snang ba rab tu thob po/ /sems can
231a8(phal chen): thams cad sdug bsngal rgya mtsho zad par bya ba'i phyir mngon par mos par 'gyur ro/ /sems can thams cad kyi sems rgya mtsho'i rnyog pa dang bar bya ba'i phyir yang rab tu brtson par 'gyur ro/ /
231b1(phal chen): zhing rgya mtsho thams cad rnam par dag par bya ba'i phyir yang brtson 'grus rtsom par 'gyur ro/ /phyogs rgya mtsho thams cad rgyas par gang ba las kyang phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ro/ /'gro ba thams cad kyi
231b2(phal chen): dbang po rgya mtsho tha dad pa'ang khong du chud par 'gyur ro/ /sems can thams cad kyi spyod pa rgya mtsho'i rjes su 'ang 'brang bar 'gyur ro/ /'gro ba'i bsam pa rgya mtsho ji lta ba bzhin du yang gzug rnyan
231b3(phal chen): 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu kho bo ni byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa mthong ba dang / thos pa dang 'grogs pa dang / rjes su dran pa'i chu klung gi dbyangs shes bya ba thob par zad na kho bos
231b4(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho thams cad du rnam par spyod pa nyon mongs pa'i rgya mtsho thams cad kyis gos pa med pa/ lta ba'i rnam pa'i rgya mtsho thams cad kyi chags pa'i chu srin gyi
231b5(phal chen): 'jigs pa dang bral ba/ chos rgya mtsho thams cad kyi rang bzhin dang / gzhi las rnam par rgyu ba/ 'gro ba rgya mtsho thams cad bsdu ba'i dngos pos yongs su bsdud par rgya mtsho dang ldan pa/ thams cad
231b6(phal chen): mkhyen pa nyid kyi rgya mtsho dang 'grogs pa/ sems can gyi mngon par chags pa'i rgya mtsho thams cad rab tu bsrung ba/ dus rgya mtsho thams cad dang / tha mi dad par rnam par spyod pa/ 'gro ba rgya mtsho thams cad
231b7(phal chen): yongs su smin par bya ba'i dmigs pa shes pa/ 'gro ba rgya mtsho thams cad kyi 'dul ba'i bres las mi 'da' bar de dag gi spyod pa shes pa 'am/ yon tan brjod par nus re skan/ song rigs kyi bu lho
231b8(phal chen): phyogs kyi rgyud 'di nyid na grong khyer dga' ba'i phreng ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de na tshong dpon rgyal ba dam pa zhes bya ba 'dug gi/ de'i drung du song la ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab
232a1(phal chen): par bya ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bya ba dris shig /de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis mnyan pa dpa' bo'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal nas/ mnyan pa dpa' bo la lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su
232a2(phal chen): bskor ba byas te/ yang dang yang bltas nas gdong mchi mas bkang ste/ ngu zhing dge ba'i bshes gnyen blta bas ma ngoms bzhin du mnyan pa dpa' bo'i drung nas song ngo // //sangs rgyas rmad ga cad ces bya ba
232a3(phal chen): shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo/ bam po bcu drug pa/ de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs byams pa chen pos sems can gyi khams tshad med pa rgyas par dgang ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ snying rje chen po'i
232a4(phal chen): rlan gyi rgyun mi chad pa/ bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs rgya chen po/ shin tu bstsags pa nyon mongs pa'i rdul dang mun pa dang dri ma dang 'dam thams cad dang bral ba/ chos mnyam pa nyid khong du
232a5(phal chen): chud pas/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi lam gyen thur med pa la zhugs pa/ dge ba'i chos tshad med pa la 'jug pa'i sgor zhugs pa/ mi dge ba thams cad kyis mi shigs pa'i brtson 'grus
232a6(phal chen): brtan pa'i mthu sngon du 'dor ba dang ldan pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin bsam gyis mi khyab pa rab tu byang ba/ rgya chen po'i bde ba rab tu thob pa/ shes rab kyi nyi ma'i 'od zer snang bas ma
232a7(phal chen): rig pa'i mun pa ma lus pa bsal ba/ thabs kyi ser bu bde zhing bsil bas blags pa'i ye shes kyi me tog gis rgyas pa/ smon lam chen po'i rgya mtshor 'byung ba'i ye shes kyi tshul dang mthun pa/
232a8(phal chen): chos kyi dbyings thams cad du thogs pa med par rgyas par 'gengs pa'i ye shes dang ldan pa/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi pho brang du thogs pa med par 'gro ba la mngon du gyur pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i lam la mngon
