232b1(phal chen): par mos pa de/ grong khyer dga' ba'i phre ba can gang na ba der phyin te/ tshong dpon rgyal ba dam pa yongs su rmed cing tshol tshol ba las/ grong khyer dga' ba'i phreng ba'i shar phyogs logs kyi 'dab cig na/ shing a sho ka'i nags tshal
232b2(phal chen): rgyal mtshan sna tshogs zhes bya ba 'dug pa de'i nang na khyim bdag stong phrag du ma zhig gis bskor te/ grong khyer gyi bya ba sna tshogs yongs su 'gro zhing de las brten te/ bdag tu bya ba thams cad yang dag par gzhom pa dang / yongs su
232b3(phal chen): 'dzin pa thams cad gtang ba dang / dngos por 'dzin pa thams cad rab tu spang ba dang / mngon par zhen pa thams cad kyi zhags pa dang / srid pa'i bcing ba thams cad gcad par bya ba dang / lta ba'i rnam pa thams cad kyi
232b4(phal chen): sgo glegs gcad pa dang / the tsom dang yid gnyis dang / nem nur gyi rab rib thams cad rnam par bsal ba dang / g.yo sgyu'i rnyog pa shin tu dang ba dang / phrag dog dang ser sna'i dri ma yongs su sbyang ba dang / sems kyi
232b5(phal chen): mtsho shin tu gsal bar bya ba dang / sems rnyog pa med pa la sems can rab tu dgod pa dang / dad pa rnyog pa med pa'i stobs bskyed de/ sangs rgyas blta bar mos pa bskyed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i stobs
232b6(phal chen): bsngags shing / sangs rgyas kyi chos yang dag par blang ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa smos te/ byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs yongs su bskyed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i shes
232b7(phal chen): rab kyi stobs yang dag par ston cing / byang chub sems dpa'i dran pa'i stobs rnam par dag pa'i mthar phyin par bya ba'i phyir/ chos kyi gtam byed cing 'di lta ste/ byang chub tu sems bskyed pa la mngon
232b8(phal chen): par mos par bya ba'i phyir chos ston cing 'dug pa mthong ngo / /de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis gtam de'i rjesu chad chad du bsdad nas tshong dpon rgyal ba dam pa'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ ring mo zhig
233a1(phal chen): du btud nas chos la shin tu gus pa'i bsam pas tshig 'di skad du brjod do/ /'phags pa bdag ni nor bzangs shes bgyi ba ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la slob par 'gyur ba dang / bslabs nas kyang ji nas sems can
233a2(phal chen): thams cad yongs su smyin par bgyi ba dang / gdul ba'i don la mngon du mos par 'gyur ba dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi zhal blta ba las mi 'phangs pa dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos thos par 'gyur ba dang /
233a3(phal chen): sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sprin gyi char yongs su bzung ba dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos kyi tshul la nan tan du bgyi ba dang / 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa dang / bskal pa
233a4(phal chen): thams cad du gnas kyang byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pas yongs su mi skyo ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rnam par 'phrul pa yongs su btsal bar 'gyur ba dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi byin gyi rlabs
233a5(phal chen): yang dag par gnon pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi stobs rnams la snang ba thob par 'gyur ba de ltar 'phags pas bdag la bshad du gsol/ de nas tshong dpon rgyal ba dam pas/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor
233a6(phal chen): bzangs la 'di skad ces smras so/ /rigs kyi bu de ltar khyod kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa legs so legs so/ /rigs kyi bu kho bo ni 'di lta ste/ dngos po med pa la gnas pas
233a7(phal chen): mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i rdzu 'phrul thob pa'i mthus/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i sgo thams cad du 'gro ba yongs su sbyong ste/ de ltar kho bo byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa'i sgo thams cad du
233a8(phal chen): 'gro ba 'di la gnas shing / stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi sum bcu rtsa gsum gyi lha'i 'jig rten thams cad dang / mtshe ma'i lha'i gnas thams cad dang / dga' ldan gyi lha'i 'jig rten
233b1(phal chen): thams cad dang / 'phrul dga'i lha'i 'jig rten thams cad dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha'i 'jig rten thams cad dang / bdud kyi gnas thams cad dang / 'dod pa'i khams kyi lha'i ris su gtogs pa thams cad dang / lha'i
233b2(phal chen): gnas thams cad dang / klu'i 'jig rten thams cad dang / klu'i gnas thams cad dang / gnod sbyin gyi 'jig rten thams cad dang / gnod sbyin gyi gnas thams cad dang / srin po'i 'jig rten thams cad dang / srin po'i gnas thams cad
233b3(phal chen): dang / grul bum gyi 'jig rten thams cad dang / grul bum gyi gnas thams cad dang / yi dags kyi 'jig rten thams cad dang / yi dags kyi gnas thams cad dang / dri za'i 'jig rten thams cad dang / dri za'i gnas thams cad dang / lha ma
233b4(phal chen): yin gyi 'jig rten thams cad dang / lha ma yin gyi gnas thams cad dang / nam mkha' lding gi 'jig rten thams cad dang / nam mkha' lding gi gnas thams cad dang / mi 'am ci'i 'jig rten thams cad dang / mi 'am ci'i gnas thams cad dang / lto 'phye
233b5(phal chen): chen po'i 'jig rten thams cad dang / lto 'phye chen po'i gnas thams cad dang / mi'i 'jig rten thams cad dang / mi'i gnas thams cad dang / grong dang grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang / ljongs dang khams dang / rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor dang 'dod
233b6(phal chen): pa'i khamasu gtogs pa'i sems can gyi rgyud thams cad du chos ni ston to/ /chos ma yin pa ni bzlog go/ /rtsod pa ni zhi bar byed do/ /'thab pa ni rnam par bzlog go/ /'khrug pa ni nye bar zhi bar byed do/ /g.yul du lhags pa ni rnam par bzlog
233b7(phal chen): go/ /shags 'gyed pa ni zhi bar byed do/ /mdud pa 'dzin pa ni rab tu sel te/ bcings pa thams cad ni yongasu gcod do/ /btson ra thams cad ni mngon par 'dral lo/ /'jigs pa ni rnam par bzlog go/ /mi dge ba'i las kyi 'du byed ni rgyun gcod do/ /srog
233b8(phal chen): gcod pa las ni sems can rnam par zlog go/ /ma byin par len pa dang 'dod pas log par g.yem pa dang / rdzun du smra ba dang phra ma dang zhe gcod pa dang / tshig khyal pa dang chag sems dang / gnod sems dang / log par
234a1(phal chen): lta ba las ni sems can rnam par zlog go/ /mi bya ba thams cad ni byed du mi 'jug go/ /dge ba'i chos thams cad ni byed du 'jug go/ /sems can thams cad ni bzo thams cad la slob tu mdzud do/ /'jig rten thams cad rab tu dga'
234a2(phal chen): bar bya ba dang sems can yongasu smin par bya ba dang / zhags pa thub pa thams cad la gong ma'i ye shes khyad par du 'phags pa brjod pa'i phyir rjes su 'brang bar bya ba dang / lta ba'i rnam pa thams cad rnam par bzlog pa dang / sangs rgyas
234a3(phal chen): kyi chos thams cad brjod cing bstan pa'i phyir 'jig rten la phan par 'gyur ba'i gtsug lag thams cad kyang ston to/ /rnam par 'god do/ /rab tu gsal bar byed do/ /brtod do/ /de bzhin du tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi bar du gzugs kyi khams
234a4(phal chen): kyi lha thams cad zil gyis mnan te/ chos ston to/ /stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir ji lta ba de bzhin du phyogs bcur yang 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong
234a5(phal chen): brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dag du chos ston to/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ston to/ /byang chub sems dpa'i chos dang nyan thos kyi chos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi
234a6(phal chen): chos kyang ston to/ /sems can dmyal ba yang ston to/ /sems can dmyal bar 'gro ba'i lam dang / sems can dmyal ba'i sems can gyi mi bde ba 'ang ston to/ /byol song gi skye gnas kyang ston to/ /byol song
234a7(phal chen): gis skye gnas kyi lam gyi rgyud thams cad dang / byol song gi skye gnas kyi lam du 'gro ba'i lam dang / byol song gi skye gnas su skyes pa'i sdug bsngal yang ston to/ /gshin rje'i 'jig rten yang ston to/ /
234a8(phal chen): gshin rje'i 'jig rten du 'gro ba'i lam dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi sdug bsngal yang ston to/ /mtho ris kyi 'jig rten yang ston to/ /mtho ris kyi 'jig rten du 'gro ba'i lam dang / mtho ris kyi 'jig rten dga' bar
234b1(phal chen): spyod pa dang / longs spyod kyang ston to/ /mi'i 'jig rten yang ston to/ /mi'i 'jig rten gyi rgyud du 'gro ba'i lam dang / mi'i 'jig rten gyi bde ba dang / sdug bsngal nyams su myong ba sna tshogs kyang ston to/ /
234b2(phal chen): de ltar rigs kyi bu kho bo ni 'jig rten gyi chos kyang ston to/ /'jig rten kun 'byung ba dang / 'jig rten nub par 'gyur ba dang / 'jig rten gyi kha na ma tho ba dang / 'jig rten gyi 'byung ba yang ston te/ de yang ji ltar byang chub sems
234b3(phal chen): dpa'i lam yang dag par bstan pa dang / 'khor ba'i skyon rnam par bzlog pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi yon tan yang dag par brjod pa dang / srid pa'i lam gyi rgyud du mgo 'khor ba dang / sdug bsngal du gyur pa yang dag par
234b4(phal chen): ston pa dang / sgrib pa med pa'i chos nyid brjod pa dang / 'jig rten rgyu'i bya ba yongasu bstan pa dang / 'jig rten 'byung ba dang / lhag pa'i bde ba dang / sdug bsngal thams cad smos pa dang / 'gro ba thams cad kyi gnas kyi ming du bya ba rnam par sgom
234b5(phal chen): pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos gnas pa med pa mngon par bstan pa dang / las dang nyon mongs pa'i 'khor lo thams cad rnam par bzlog pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo 'khor ba shin tu brjod pa'i phyir chos ston to/ /rigs kyi bu
234b6(phal chen): k ho bo ni byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rnam par dag pa'i sgo thams cad du 'gro ba dngos po med pa la gnas pas mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi mthus brgyan pa 'di shes par zad na kho bos byang chub sems dpa' thams cad mngon par shes pa zhing gi dbyings
234b7(phal chen): thams cad du sgyu ma lta bu'i ye shes kyi lus kyi rgyas par 'gengs pa kun tu lta ba'i ye shes kyi rab tu thob pa tshig gi lam dang / sgra thams cad rnam par dmyigs pa la shin tu gzhol ba'i rna ba dang ldan pa/ dus gsum rgyas par 'gengs pa'i chos kyi sgo snong ba la dbang rab tu
234b8(phal chen): thob pa/ chos thams cad la yang dag par gzhol ba'i ye shes la dbang gis dbang sgyur ba'i skyes bu dpa'o/ /sems can tshad med bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du rnam par dmyigs par bya ba la ma 'dres pa'i dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor dang ldan pa'i
235a1(phal chen): lce yangs shing srab la yid du 'ong ba dang ldan pa/ bsam pa tha dad pa'i sems can rgya mtsho'i yid du 'ong ba'i kha dog dang / dbyangs su ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang mnyam pa'i lus sgyu
235a2(phal chen): ma lta bu dang ldan pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang mi gnyis pa'i spyod pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i lus la gzhol ba/ dus gsum thams cad du rjes su 'brang ba'i ye shes kyi lus dang ldan pa nam mkha'i dbyings ltar tshad
235a3(phal chen): med pa'i spyod yul dpag tu med pa'i yul dang ldan pa/ de dag gi spyod pa shes pa'am/ yon tan brjod par nus re skan/ song rigs kyi bu lho phyogs kyi rgyud 'di nyid kyi yul shu ma phyi ma'i mtha' na/ grong khyer ka ling ga'i nags tshal
235a4(phal chen): zhes bya ba yod te/ de na dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pa zhes bya ba 'dug gis/ de'i gan du song la ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar nan tan tu bgyi ba dris shig /
235a5(phal chen): de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis tshong dpon rgyal ba dam pa'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ tshong dpon rgyal ba dam pa la lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas/ yang dang yang ltas te/
235a6(phal chen): tshong dpon rgyal ba dam pa'i drung nas song ngo / /de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs mthar gyi yul shu ma phyi ma'i mtha'i grong khyer ka ling ga'i nags gang na ba der song nas/ dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pa yongs su tshol zhing
235a7(phal chen): sems can kun la rmed pa'i tshe/ gang nas gang du song ba de dang der grogs po brgya phrag du ma dang / bu mo brgya phrag du ma zhig srang dang lam gyi gzhi mdo dang / lam gyi sum mdo dag na tshogs te/ rjes su 'brang ngo / /skyes pa brgya phrag du
235a8(phal chen): ma dang / bud med brgya phrag du ma zhig gis kyang rigs kyi bu der dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pa ni/ grong khyer ka ling ga'i nags tshal 'di nyid kyi bza' shing gi ra ba chen po rgyal ba'i 'od kyis byin pa nyi ma'i mdog na sems can tshad
235b1(phal chen): med pa'i don du chos ston cing 'dug go zhes ston to/ /de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs bza' shing gi ra ba nyi ma'i mdog der phyin nas kun tu btsal te/ ltas na bza' shing gi ra ba de na/ shing zla ba shar ba zhes bya ba khang pa brtsegs
235b2(phal chen): pa'i dbyibs ltar 'dug pa/ 'od sna tshogs kyi kha dog can 'od kyi mdog dang ldan pa/ 'khor kun tu dpag tshad kyi khyon tsam du 'od kyis rgyas par 'gengs pa mang po dang / lo ma'i shing yongs su 'gengs pa zhes bya ba gdugs gyi rnam pa dang dbyibasu
235b3(phal chen): 'dug pa'i 'dab mas kun nas khebs pa/ bai DUr+ya sngon po'i kha dog ltar 'dug pa'i sprin gyi mdog dang ldan pa mang po dang me tog gi shing me tog mdzod ces bya ba/ ri'i rgyal po kha ba can ltar mdangs dga' ba'i dbyibs sna tshogs dang
235b4(phal chen): ldan pa kha dog sna tshogs kyi me tog mi zad pa'i char 'bebs pa/ sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha'i pho brang gi rgyan gyi kun nas 'du ba dang / sus kyang mi shigs pa lta bu mang po dang / shing tog gi shing rtag tu smin pa'i ro dpe med pa'i 'bras
235b5(phal chen): bu'i tshogs shes bya ba gser gyi ri bo'i lhun ltar 'dug pa/ rtag tu shing tog phun sum tshogs par gnas pa mang po rin po che'i rgyal po'i shing rnam par snang ba'i mdzod ces bya ba rin po che'i rgyal po dpe med pa'i dbyibs
235b6(phal chen): ltar 'dug pa/ lha rdzas kyi rin po che'i phreng ba dang / se mo do dang / rgyan rin po che yid bzhin gyi rgyal po'i mdzod nas byung ba ltar phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan pa/ rin po che'i kha dog grangs med pa'i 'byung gnas su gyur pa mang
235b7(phal chen): po dang / gos gyi shing dga' bar byed pa zhes bya ba lha rdzas kyi gos rin po che'i kha dog sna tshogs kyi tshogs rab tu 'gyed cing 'phyang bas shin tu brgyan pa mang po dang / rol mo'i shing dga' ba bskyed pa zhes bya ba lha rdzas las
235b8(phal chen): kyang lhag pa'i rol mo yid du 'ong ba sgra snyan pa 'byin pa mang po dang / spos kyi shing kun tu zhim pas brgyan pa zhes bya ba phyogs thams cad du thogs pa med par rnam pa thams cad du yid du 'ong ba'i spos kyi ngad 'byung ba
236a1(phal chen): mang po dag kyang yod par mthong / mtshe'u dang lu ma dang / lteng ka dang / rdzing bu rin po che bdun gyi pha gus mtha' brtsigs pa/ phyogs bzhi nas rin po che'i them skas btsugs pa/ rin po che sna tshogs kyi khri 'phang dus dang
236a2(phal chen): 'thun pa'i tsan dan gyi dri zhim pos bskus pa/ kun nas bskor ba/ gzhi rin po che'i rgyal po bai DUR+Ya sngon po las legs par blangs pa/ 'dzam bu chu klung gi gser gyi bye ma bdal ba yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i chu lha
236a3(phal chen): rdzas kyi dri yid du 'ong ba can gyis yongs su gang ba/ rin po che'i pad mo dang / ut+pa la dang / ku mu ta dang / me tog pun+da dang / ri ka kha dog sna tshogs lha rdzas kyi bsung dang ldan pas/ chu kun nas yog pa/ bya bran sna tshogs kyi khyu
236a4(phal chen): mchog lha rdzas las kyang 'das pa'i gzugs yid du 'ong ba dang ldan pa/ sgra snyan pa 'byin cing brjod pas gang ba/ lha rdzas kyi rin po che sna tshogs kyi shing gi phreng ba legs par bkye bas/ yongasu brgyan pa dang ldan pa shing sna tshogs
236a5(phal chen): de dag gi drung thams cad du'ang rin po che'i seng ge'i khri sna tshogs yid du 'ong ba'i gzugs dang ldan pa/ rin po che sna tshogs kyi rgyan bsam gyis mi khyab pa du mas brgyan pa/ lha rdzas kyi stan rin po che sna tshogs
236a6(phal chen): 'brel bar bting ba/ lha rdzas kyi spos dang / bdug spos kyi rnam pa thams cad kyis bdug pa/ lha rdzas las kyang 'das pa'i dar rin po che mngon par spyangs pa/ rin po che sna tshogs kyi bla re bgyi ba/ rin po che sna tshogs
236a7(phal chen): dang 'dzam bu chu klung gi gser gyi dra ba sna tshogs kun nas bres pa/ rin po che'i dril bu dra ba yid du 'ong zhing snyan pa'i sgra 'byin pa/ mang pos brgyan pa/ 'khor du lha rdzas kyi rin po che'i stan brgya stong phrag du ma bting zhing
236a8(phal chen): bshams pa mthong ngo / /rin po che'i shing drung la lar ni seng+ge'i khri rin po che'i pad+mo'i snying po can bshams pa mthong ngo / /la lar ni seng ge'i khri nor bu rin po che'i spos kyi rgyal po'i pad mo'i snying po byas pa
236b1(phal chen): bshams pa mthong ngo / /la lar ni seng+ge'i khri rin po che'i rgyal po klu'i rgyan gyi pad mos snying po byas pa bshams pa mthong ngo / /la lar ni seng+ge'i khri nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po seng ge'i bya ba'i pad mos snying po byas pa bshams
236b2(phal chen): pa mthong ngo / /la lar ni seng+ge'i khri rin po che'i rgyal po rnam par snang ba'i pad mos snying po byas pa bshams pa mthong ngo / /la lar ni seng+ge'i khri rin po che'i rgyal po phyogs rnam par snang ba'i pad mos snying po byas pa bshams pa
236b3(phal chen): mthong ngo / /la lar ni seng+ge'i khri rin po che'i rgyal po dbang po'i rdo rje'i pad mos snying po byas pa bshams pa mthong ngo / /la lar ni seng ge'i khri rin po che'i rgyal po yid du 'ong ba'i pad mos snying po byas pa bshams pa mthong ngo / /rin po
236b4(phal chen): che'i shing drung la lar ni seng ge'i khri rin po che'i rgyal po mdog dkar po'i pad mos byas pa bshams pa mthong ngo / /bza' shing gi ra ba de'i gzhi thams cad kyang rin po che sna tshogs kyis yongasu gang zhing rgya mtsho chen po ltar rin po che'i
236b5(phal chen): gling gis yongasu gang ba mthong ngo / /bai DUR+Ya sngon po'i dam pas spras te/ rin po che thams cad kyis brgyan pa'i sa phyogs ka tsa lin da ltar reg na bde zhing 'jam pa yang ba gom pa bor zhing bteg pa'i tshe mtho dman med pa/ rdo rje rin po
236b6(phal chen): che mchog gi pad+mo dri yid du 'ong bar zhim zhing reg na bde ba'i sil ma kun tu bkram pa/ ngang ngur dang / rma bya dang / khrung khrung dang / ku na la dang / ka la ping ka dang / ko ki la dang / dzi pan dzi ba ka sgra snyan cing yid du 'ong ba'i nga
236b7(phal chen): ro 'byin pa mang pos gang ba/ lha rdzas kyi rin po che'i tsan dan gyi shing mang po nags tshal shin tu legs par 'grigs pas brgyan pa/ rin po che sna tshogs kyi pad+mo'i sprin gyi char dang / rin po che'i me tog sna tshogs mi zad pa'i
236b8(phal chen): char rgyun tu 'bab pa/ 'dres pa'i nags tshal las kyang khyad par du 'phags pa/ rin po che sna tshogs kyi khang bu brtsegs pa brgyan par bkod pa'i nang nas/ spos kyi rgyal po'i bdug spos rin thang med pa rtag tu 'thul zhing dri zhim pa
237a1(phal chen): lha'i mdun sa chos bzang po'i rgyan las kyang lhag par brgyan pa/ lha rdzas las kyang 'das pa'i rin po che'i dra ba sna tshogs kyis kun tu bres pa/ mu tig rin po che'i me tog gi phreng ba dang /
237a2(phal chen): lda ldi kun nas 'brel bas rab tu brgyan pa/ rin po che'i dril bu rnam pa sna tshogs su rnam par bkye ba'i gser gyi dra ba 'bar bas/ kun nas dkrigs pa/ rol mo'i shing dang / rin po che'i ta la las dril bu'i
237a3(phal chen): dra ba rlung gis legs par bskyod pas yid du 'ong ba'i sgra snyan pa'i dbyangs 'byung ba dang ldan pa/ dbang bsgyur gyi lha'i rgyal po'i lha mo dpe tshul shin tu bzang ba rnams kyis glu snyan pa'i sgra rab tu yid du 'ong ba blang pa/
237a4(phal chen): lha rdzas kyi yid bzhin gyi gos kha dog sna tshogs kyi sprin gyi char rab tu 'bab pas rnam par mdzes pa/ rgya mtsho chen po ltar kha dog dang / mdog sna tshogs su ldan pas blta na gtang myi bra ba/ khang pa brtsegs pa rin
237a5(phal chen): po che'i rgyan dang ldan pa brgya stong grangs myed pas rab tu brgyan pa/ sum bcu rtsa gsum gyi lha'i pho brang ltar blta na bzang ba/ rin po che sna tshogs rnam par phye bas rnam pa thams cad du brgyan pa'i gdugs
237a6(phal chen): shin tu legs pa/ rnam par bsgreng zhing bkram pas kun nas blta na mdzes pa dang / dbang po chen po'i 'jig rten ltar shin tu mdzes pa'i pha gu sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa/ yid du 'ong ba'i 'od snang ba chen po
237a7(phal chen): rtag par 'byung ba/ tshangs pa chen po'i gzhal myed khang ltar nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po 'gro ba yid du 'ong ba'i 'od kyis 'bar ba ste/ bza' shing gi ra ba chen po nyi ma'i mchog ces bya ba de/ dge slong
237a8(phal chen): ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi mthu stobs dang / byin gyi brlabs che zhing bsam gyis mi khyab pas/ 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa'i gnas su gyur pa'i nam mkha'i dbyings ltar yangs
237b1(phal chen): shing tshad med de/ rgya chen po dang ldan pa mthong ngo / /de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang kyis de ltar yon tan tshad myed pa/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa tshogs pa'i bza' shing gi ra ba'i rgyan byang chub sems
237b2(phal chen): dpa'i las kyi rnam par smin pas yongs su grub pa/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba rgya chen po las skyes pa/ sangs rgyas la mchod cing rim gror byas pa'i rgyu 'thun pa bsam gyis myi khyab pa las
237b3(phal chen): byung ba/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad na yod pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba ma lus pas myi 'phrogs pa/ chos kyi rang bzhin sgyu ma'i rnam pa lta bus grub pa/ dge ba'i bsod nams dri ma myed pa rgya chen pos grub cing
237b4(phal chen): byung ba/ dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pa'i sngon gyi spyod pa bzang po legs par byas pa dang / rgyu 'thun pa'i stobs dang / shugs kyis byung ba nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang / thun mong ma
237b5(phal chen): yin pa/ mu stegs can dang / phas kyi rgol ba thams cad kyis mi 'phrogs pa/ bdud kyi lam yongs su rgyu ba thams cad kyis myi tshugs pa/ byis pa so so'i skye bo thams cad kyis bltar med pa mthong ste/
237b6(phal chen): shing sna tshogs de dag gi drung gi seng ge'i khri chen po de dag la 'ang dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pa/ lus shin tu mdzes pa/ spyod lam zhi ba/ dbang po zhi ba/ yid zhi ba/ shin tu dben pa/ dbang po dul ba/
237b7(phal chen): glang po ltar shin tu dul ba/ mtsho ltar dang zhing rnyog pa med pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ rin po che'i rgyal po yid bzhin gyi nor bu ltar 'dod pa thams cad bsgrub pa/ pad mo la chus mi chags pa ltar 'jig rten gyi chos kyis
237b8(phal chen): ma gos pa/ seng ge ltar 'jigs pa dang / skyi g.ya' ba myed pa/ mi 'jigs pa rnam par dag pas/ ri'i dbang po chen po ltar myi sgul ba/ tshul khrims rnam par dag pas yid du 'ong ba'i spos kyi rgyal po
238a1(phal chen): ltar 'gro ba'i sems tshim par byed pa/ kha ba'i tsan dan ltar nyon mongs pa'i gdung ba rab tu zhi bar byed pa/ sman gyi rgyal po blta na bzang ba ltar 'gro ba thams cad kyi sdug bsngal rnam par byang ba/ chu'i
238a2(phal chen): lha'i zhags pa ltar blta na don yod pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'di ltar lus dang sems kyi bag yangs bde ba bskyed pa/ tshangs pa chen po ltar 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug gi kun nas ldang ba dang
238a3(phal chen): bral ba/ rin po che'i rgyal po nor bu chu 'dang ltar nyon mongs pas rnyog pa can du gyur pa'i sems can gyi sems rab tu dang bar bya ba/ zhing gshin pa ltar dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam par 'phel bar byed pa 'dug
238a4(phal chen): par mthong ngo / /'khor gyi stan de dag la'ang 'khor sna tshogs 'khod par mthong ste/ 'khor gyi stan la la la ni lha'i bu dbang po chen po la stsogs pa/ gtsang ma'i gnas kyi rigs su gtogs pa'i
238a5(phal chen): lha'i bu rnams 'khod cing dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pas/ chos kyi sgo rnam par thar pa myi zad pa yang dag par 'byed pa zhes bya ba yang dag par bstan pa mthong ngo / /'khor gyi stan la la la ni tshangs pa
238a6(phal chen): yid du 'ong ba la stsogs pa/ tshangs pa'i ris su gtogs pa'i lha'i bu rnams 'khod cing dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pas/ dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor rnam par dag pa/ gzhi kun nas 'byung ba
238a7(phal chen): zhes bya ba yang dag par bstan pa mthong ngo / /'khor gyi stan la la la ni lha'i rgyal po dbang sgyur ba la stsogs pa gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha'i bu dang lha'i bu mo'i 'khor dang bcas pa dag 'khod cing / dge slong ma seng ge
238a8(phal chen): rnam par bsgyings pas/ chos kyi sgo byang chub sems dpa'i bsam pa rnam par dag pa'i dbang gis rnam par brgyan pa zhes bya ba yang dag par bstan pa mthong ngo / /'khor gyi stan la la la ni lha'i rgyal po
238b1(phal chen): rab 'phrul dga' la stsogs pa/ 'phrul dga'i lha'i bu mo'i 'khor dang bcas pa rnams 'khod cing / dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pas/ chos kyi sgo thams cad dge bas rnam par brgyan pa zhes
238b2(phal chen): bya ba yang dag par bstan pa mthong ngo / /'khor gyi stan la la la ni lha'i rgyal po rab dga' ldan la stsogs pa rab dga' ldan gyi ris su gtogs pa'i lha'i bu lha'i bu mo'i 'khor dang bcas pa rnams 'khod cing / dge slong
238b3(phal chen): ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pas chos kyi sgo rang gi sems kyi mdzod kyi glong zhes bya ba yang dag par bstan pa mthong ngo / /'khor gyi stan la la la ni lha'i rgyal po rab mtshe ma la stsogs pa lha'i bu mo 'khor dang bcas pa
238b4(phal chen): rnams 'khod cing / dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pas/ chos kyi sgo rgyan mtha' yas pa/ bya ba yang dag par bstan pa zhes bya ba mthong ngo / /'khor gyi stan la la la ni lha'i rgyal po brgya byin la stsogs
238b5(phal chen): pa sum bcu rtsa gsum gyi ris su gtogs pa'i lha'i bu lha'i bu mo'i 'khor dang bcas pa rnams 'khod cing / dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pas/ chos kyi sgo skye ba'i sgo zhes bya ba yang dag par bstan pa
238b6(phal chen): mthong ngo / /'khor gyi stan la la la ni klu'i rgyal po gangs chen mtsho la stsogs pa klu'i rgyal po 'od brgya pa dang / dga' bo dang nye dga' bo dang / yid du 'ong ba dang / shugs ldan dang / ma dros pa la stsogs pa klu'i
238b7(phal chen): bu mo'i 'khor dang bcas pa klu'i byis pa'i 'khor dang bcas pa rnams 'khod cing / dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pas/ chos kyi sgo sangs rgyas kyi rdzu 'phrul dang / yul gyi 'od kyi brgyan ces bya ba yang dag par
238b8(phal chen): bstan pa mthong ngo / /'khor gyi stan la la la ni rgyal po chen po ngal bsos la stsogs pa gnod sbyin gyi dbang po gnod sbyin gyi bu mo dang / gnod sbyin gyi byis pa'i 'khor dang bcas pa rnams 'khod cing / dge
239a1(phal chen): slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pas/ chos kyi sgo 'gro ba thams cad yongs su skyob pa'i mdzod ces bya ba yang dag par bstan pa mthong ngo / /'khor gyi stan la la la ni dri za'i rgyal po gnas srun po la stsogs
239a2(phal chen): pa dri za mang po dri za'i bu mo dang / dri za'i byis pa'i 'khor dang bcas pa rnams 'khod cing / dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pas/ chos kyi sgo dga' ba mi zad pa char rab tu 'beb pa zhes bya ba yang dag
239a3(phal chen): par bstan pa mthong ngo / /'khor gyi stan la la la ni lha ma yin gyi dbang po sgra gcan la stsogs pa lha ma yin rnams lha ma yin gyi bu mo dang / lha ma yin gyi byis pa'i 'khor dang bcas pa rnams 'khod cing /
239a4(phal chen): dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pas/ chos kyi sgo chos kyi dbyings shes pa'i tshul gyi shugs kyis brgyan pa zhes bya ba yang dag par bstan pa mthong ngo / /'khor gyi stan la la la ni nam mkha' lding gi dbang po
239a5(phal chen): shugs 'dzin chen po la stsogs pa nam mkha' lding gi dbang po nam mkha' lding gi bu mo dang / nam mkha' lding gi byis pa'i 'khor dang bcas pa rnams 'khod cing / dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pas/
239a6(phal chen): chos kyi sgo srid pa'i rgya mtshos 'jigs pa'i yul zhes bya ba yang dag par bstan pa mthong ngo / /'khor gyi stan la la la ni mi'am ci'i rgyal po sdong po la stsogs pa/ mi'am ci'i dbang po mi 'am ci'i bu mo dang /
239a7(phal chen): mi'am ci'i byis pa'i 'khor dang bcas pa rnams 'khod cing / dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pas/ chos kyi sgo sangs rgyas kyi spyod pa snang ba zhes bya ba yang dag par bstan pa mthong ngo / /'khor
239a8(phal chen): gyi stan la la la ni lto 'phye chen po'i dbang po khro gnyer gdong la stsogs pa/ lto 'phye chen po'i bu mo dang / lto 'phye chen po'i byis pa'i 'khor dang bcas pa rnams 'khod cing / dge slong ma seng ge rnam par
239b1(phal chen): bsgyings pas/ chos kyi sgo sangs rgyas la dga' ba skye ba zhes bya ba yang dag par bstan pa mthong ngo / /'khor gyi stan la la la ni skyes pa dang / bud med dang / khye'u dang bu mo brgya stong mang po 'khod cing / dge slong ma
239b2(phal chen): seng ge rnam par bsgyings pas/ chos kyi sgo khyad par du 'gro ba zhes bya ba yang dag par bstan pa mthong ngo / /'khor gyi stan la la la ni srin po'i dbang po rtag tu mdangs 'phrog pa sdong ba'i rgyal po la stsogs pa srin po'i
239b3(phal chen): bu mo dang / srin po'i byis pa'i 'khor dang bcas pa rnams 'khod cing / dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pas/ chos kyi sgo snying po 'byung ba zhes bya ba yang dag par bstan pa mthong ngo / /'khor gyi stan la
239b4(phal chen): la la ni sems can nyan thos kyi theg pa la mos pa rnams 'khod cing / dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pas/ chos kyi sgo ye shes khyad par du 'phags pa'i mthu zhes bya ba yang dag par bstan pa mthong ngo / /'khor
239b5(phal chen): gyi stan la la la ni sems can rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la mos pa rnams 'khod cing / dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pas/ chos kyi sgo sangs rgyas kyi yon tan rgya chen po'i 'od ces bya ba yang dag par bstan pa
239b6(phal chen): mthong ngo / /'khor gyi stan la la la ni sems can theg pa chen po la mos pa rnams 'khod cing / dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pas/ ting nge 'dzin gyi ye shes snang ba'i sgo kun tu sgo zhes bya ba yang dag
239b7(phal chen): par bstan pa mthong ngo / /'khor gyi stan la la la ni byang chub sems dpa' thog mar sems bskyed pa rnams 'khod cing / dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pas/ ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo sangs rgyas thams
239b8(phal chen): cad kyi smon lam gyi phung po zhes bya ba yang dag par bstan pa mthong ngo / /'khor gyi stan la la la ni byang chub sems dpa'i sa gnyis pa la gnas pa rnams 'khod cing / dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pas/
240a1(phal chen): ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo rdul dang bral ba'i dkyil 'khor ces bya ba yang dag par bstan pa mthong ngo / /'khor gyi stan la la la ni byang chub sems dpa' sa gsum pa la gnas pa rnams 'khod cing / dge slong ma seng ge rnam par
240a2(phal chen): bsgyings pas/ ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo rab tu zhi ba'i rgyan ces bya ba yang dag par bstan pa mthong ngo / /'khor gyi stan la la la ni byang chub sems dpa' sa bzhi pa la gnas pa rnams 'khod cing / dge slong ma seng ge rnam par
240a3(phal chen): bsgyings pas/ ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo thams cad mkhyen pa'i shugs kyi yul 'byung ba zhes bya ba yang dag par bstan pa mthong ngo / /'khor gyi stan la la la ni byang chub sems dpa' sa lnga pa la gnas pa rnams 'khod
240a4(phal chen): cing / dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pas/ ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo sems kyi rgyud me tog gi snying po zhes bya ba yang dag par bstan pa mthong ngo / /'khor gyi stan la la la ni byang chub sems dpa' sa drug pa la
240a5(phal chen): gnas pa rnams 'khod cing / dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pas/ ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo rnam par snang ba'i snying po zhes bya ba yang dag par bstan pa mthong ngo / /'khor gyi stan la la la ni byang chub sems dpa'
240a6(phal chen): sa bdun pa la gnas pa rnams 'khod cing / dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pas/ ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo sa kun nas brgyan pa zhes bya ba yang dag par bstan pa mthong ngo / /'khor gyi stan la la la ni byang chub
240a7(phal chen): sems dpa' sa brgyad pa la gnas pa rnams 'khod cing / dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pas/ ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo chos kyi dbyings su lus shin tu rnam par phye ba'i yul zhes bya ba yang dag par bsten pa
240a8(phal chen): mthong ngo / /'khor gyi stan la la la ni byang chub sems dpa' sa dgu pa la gnas pa rnams 'khod cing / dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pas/ chos kyi sgo myi dmyigs pa'i stobs kyi gnas kyis brgyan pa zhes
240b1(phal chen): bya ba yang dag par bstan pa mthong ngo / /'khor gyi stan la la la ni byang chub sems dpa' sa bcu pa la gnas pa rnams 'khod cing / dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pas/ ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo sgrib pa med pa'i dkyil
240b2(phal chen): 'khor ces bya ba yang dag par bstan pa mthong ngo / /'khor gyi stan la la la ni lag na rdo rje'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor 'khod cing / dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pas/ chos kyi sgo ye shes rdo rje mthu bo che'i rgyan ces bya ba
240b3(phal chen): yang dag par bstan pa mthong ngo / /de ltar skye ba'i skye mched rnam pa tha dad pa thams cad kyi sems can du gdags pa dang / sems can gyi lam gyi rgyud ji snyed pa de dag gi sems can yongs su smin pa rnam par 'dul ba/
240b4(phal chen): snod du gyur pa ji snyed cig bza' shing gi ra ba der 'ongs shing / 'khor gyi stan la so sor 'khod pa/ bsam pa tha dad pa mos pa mi mtshungs pa/ bsam pa shin tu gzhol bar gyur pa/ dad pa'i ro rngams chen po dang ldan pa
240b5(phal chen): rnams la/ dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pas/ ci nas kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par 'gyur ba/ de lta de ltar chos bstan pa mthong ngo / /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni
240b6(phal chen): dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pa des kun tu lta ba'i btang snyoms dang ldan pa la stsogs pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad shin tu bstan pa la stsogs pa dang / chos kyi dbyings kyi gzhi
240b7(phal chen): tha dad pa la stsogs pa dang / sgrib pa'i dkyil 'khor thams cad rnam par 'thor ba la stsogs pa dang / 'gro ba thams cad kyi dge ba'i sems yang dag par 'byung ba la stsogs pa dang / khyad par yod pa'i rgyan la
240b8(phal chen): stsogs pa dang / chags pa med pa'i tshul gyi snying po la stsogs pa dang / chos kyi dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor la stsogs pa dang / sems kyi mdzod la stsogs pa dang / kun tu mos pa mngon par bsgrub pa'i
241a1(phal chen): snying po la stsogs pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo brgya stong grangs med pa gnon pa'i phyir te/ bza' shing gi ra ba nyi ma'i mdog der byang chub sems dpa' 'am/ sems can gzhan ji snyed cig dge slong
241a2(phal chen): ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pa la lta ba dang / chos mnyan pa'i phyir 'ong ba de dag thams cad kyang sngon/ dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pas/ dge ba'i chos yang dag par blang ba la shin tu bkod nas/ bla na
241a3(phal chen): med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa'i bar du byas pa sha stag go/ /de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis/ dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pa'i bza' shing gi ra ba phun sum tshogs pa dang /
241a4(phal chen): nags tshal phun sum tshogs pa dang / gtsug lag khang phun sum tshogs pa dang / 'chag sa phun sum tshogs pa dang / longs spyod phun sum tshogs pa dang / mal cha phun sum tshogs pa dang / 'khor gyi
241a5(phal chen): dkyil 'khor phun sum tshogs pa dang / dbang chen po phun sum tshogs pa dang / rdzu 'phrul dang rnam par 'phrul pa phun sum tshogs pa dang / dbyangs kyi rgyan phun sum tshogs pa rnam pa de lta bu mthong ste/ chos kyi
241a6(phal chen): tshul bsam gyis mi khyab pa 'di thos nas/ chos kyi sprin gyi char chen pos sems mngon par brlan pa de'i yid la byed pa dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pas/ bsam pa rnam par dag pa phun sum tshogs
241a7(phal chen): par byas kyis da ni g.yas phyogs su bskor ba lan brgya stong du ma zhig bya'o snyam pa dang / de'i mod la dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pas/ bza' shing gi ra ba dang / 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du bcas pa
241a8(phal chen): de dag thams cad kyang snang ba chen pos khyab par byas so/ /de ltar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba bya'o/ /snyam du bsams nas bskor ba byed pa'i tshe/ 'khor thams cad na'ang dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pa
241b1(phal chen): 'dug pa mthong nas mdun du 'dug ste/ thal mo sbyar nas 'di skad ces smras so/ /'phags ma bdag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed na/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpas
241b2(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba ma 'tshal te/ 'phags ma ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams la gdams ngag dang rjes su bstan pa mdzad do/ /zhes bdag
241b3(phal chen): gis thos na/ 'phags ma ji ltar na byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba bdag la bshad du gsol/ des smras pa/ rigs kyi
241b4(phal chen): bu kho mo ni byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa rlom sems thams cad yongs su bcom pa zhes bya ba thob pa'o/ /smras pa/ 'phags ma byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa rlom sems thams cad
241b5(phal chen): yongs su bcom pa de'i yul ji lta bu zhig mchis/ smras pa rigs kyi bu de ni ye shes snang ba ste/ dus gsum du byung ba'i rgyan sems skad cig gi cha shas la rnam par dmigs pa'i rang bzhin no/ /
241b6(phal chen): smras pa/ 'phags ma ye shes snang ba de'i yul yang ji lta bu zhig mchis/ smras pa/ rigs kyi bu kho mo ni ye shes snang ba 'di la sgrub pa dang yongs su bsgrub pa'i tshe chos thams cad rab tu 'thad pa zhes bya ba'i ting
241b7(phal chen): nge 'dzin skyes te/ ting nge 'dzin de thob ma thag du yid kyi rang bzhin gyi lus kyis phyogs bcu thams cad kyi 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du/ byang chub sems dpa' sku tshe gcig gis thogs pa
241b8(phal chen): dga' ldan gyi pho brang na bzhugs pa/ thams cad re re la yang lus sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis mchod pa rnam pa tha dad pa/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul
242a1(phal chen): shin tu phra ba snyed kyi mchod pa sbyar ba'i phyir 'gro ste/ 'di ltar lha'i lus dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang lha ma yin dang nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang /
242a2(phal chen): mi dang mi ma yin pa'i dbang po'i lus me tog gi sprin yongs su 'dzin pa dang / spos kyi sprin yongs su 'dzin pa dang / bdug spos kyi sprin yongs su 'dzin pa dang / phreng ba'i sprin yongs su 'dzin pa dang / byug
242a3(phal chen): pa'i sprin yongs su 'dzin pa dang / phye ma'i sprin yongs su 'dzin pa dang / na bza'i sprin yongs su 'dzin pa dang / gdugs kyi sprin yongs su 'dzin pa dang / rgyal mtshan gyi sprin yongs su 'dzin
242a4(phal chen): pa dang / ba dan gyi sprin yongs su 'dzin pa dang / rin po che'i lhab lhub kyi sprin yongs su 'dzin pa dang / rin po che'i dra ba'i rgyan gyi sprin yongasu 'dzin pa dang / rin po che'i gnam yol gyi rgyan gyi sprin
242a5(phal chen): yongs su 'dzin pa dang / rin po che'i rgyan rnam par phye ba'i sprin yongs su 'dzin pa dang / rin po che'i sgron ma'i rgyan kyi sprin yongs su 'dzin pa dang / rin po che'i gdan gyi sprin yongs su 'dzin pa mang
242a6(phal chen): pos mchod pa sbyar ba'i phyir 'gro'o/ /dga' ldan kyi gnas na bzhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sku tshe gcig gis thogs pa rnams la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir/ ji ltar 'gro ba de bzhin du yum gyi
242a7(phal chen): skur gshegs pa dang / bltam pa dang / btsun mo'i 'khor gyi nang na bzhugs pa dang / mngon par 'byung ba dang / snying po byang chub tu gshegs pa dang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
242a8(phal chen): byang chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas shing snying po byang chub la bzhugs pa dang / chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor ba de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / de bzhin du lha'i gnas na bzhugs pa dang /
242b1(phal chen): klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa'i gnas na bzhugs pa dang / 'gro ba thams cad
242b2(phal chen): kyi sems dang bsam pa yongs su tshim par mdzad nas/ yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i bar de dag thams cad la'ang yid kyi rang bzhin gyi lus rnam pa de lta bu dag gis rnam pa de lta bu'i mchod pa byed cing /
242b3(phal chen): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi drung du 'gro'o/ /sems can gang gis kho mo sangs rgyas mchod pa dang / rim gro byed pa'i las 'di shes par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang bla na med pa yang dag par
242b4(phal chen): rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par 'gyur ro/ /sems can gang kho mo'i drung du 'ong ba de dag thams cad la'ang kho mo ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gdams ngag dang / rjes su bstan pa 'di nyid ston ste/
242b5(phal chen): rigs kyi bu kho mo ye shes kyi mig gis sems can thams cad la lta yang / sems can gyi 'du shes kyang mi bskyed la/ rlom sems kyang mi byed do/ /'gro ba thams cad kyi skad rgya mtsho yang
242b6(phal chen): mnyan te/ tshig gi lam thams cad la mngon par zhen pa med pas/ rlom sems su byed pa med do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyang mthong ste/ chos kyi lus yongs su shes
242b7(phal chen): pas rlom sems su byed pa'ang med do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khor lo yongs su 'dzin kyang / chos kyi rang bzhin khong du chud pas rlom sems su byed pa med do/ /sems
242b8(phal chen): kyi skad cig re re la chos kyi dbyings thams cad rgyas par 'gengs kyang / chos nyid sgyu ma'i rang bzhin khong du chud pas rlom sems su byed pa myed do/ /rigs kyi bu kho mos ni byang chub sems dpa'i
243a1(phal chen): rnam par thar pa rlom sems thams cad yongs su bcom pa 'di shes par zad na/ kho mos byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi dbyings mtha' dang dbus med pa la zhugs pa/ chos thams cad la rlom sems med
243a2(phal chen): par gnas kyang skyil mo dkrung gcig gis chos kyi dbyings thams cad rgyas par 'gengs pa/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad rang gi lus su 'dus par ston kyang / skad cig gcig gis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi drung
243a3(phal chen): du 'dong ba/ lus la sangs rgyas kyi rdzu 'phrul thams cad 'byung zhing rgyu ba/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa ba spu'i nyag ma gcig gis sbams shing mngon par 'phen pa/ rang gi ba spu'i bu gar
243a4(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi khams brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa 'du ba dang / 'jig pa'i bskal pa yongs su ston pa/ skad cig gcig la bskal pa brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med par gnas pa/ mnyam pa nyid
243a5(phal chen): kyis yang dag par 'dzud pa/ skad cig gcig gis brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i bskal par 'khor ba de dag gi spyod pa shes pa 'am/ yon tan brjod par nus re skan/ song rigs kyi bu lho phyogs kyi
243a6(phal chen): rgyud 'di nyid kyi yul bgrod dka' ba na/ grong khyer rin po che'i rgyan ces bya ba yod de/ de na bcom pa ma lha'i bshes gnyen ma zhes bya ba 'dug gis de'i gan du song la ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems
243a7(phal chen): dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bya ba dris shig /de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pa'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ dge slong
243a8(phal chen): ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pa la lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas yang dang yang bltas te/ dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pa'i drung nas song ngo / /de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs
243b1(phal chen): shes rab kyi snang ba chen po des sems snang bar gyur pa de thams cad mkhyen pa nyid shes rab kyi snang ba de la ni sems/ chos nyid kyi rang bzhin gyi stobs snang ba de la ni yang dag par rjes su blta/ sems can
243b2(phal chen): thams cad kyi skad rnam par dmyigs pa'i mdzod kyi gzungs kyi tshul de ni brtan par byed/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khor lo yang dag par 'dzin pa'i gzungs kyi tshul de ni shin tu rgya cher
243b3(phal chen): byed/ snying rje chen po 'gro ba thams cad kyi skyabs su gyur pa'i stobs de ni nye bar ston/ chos thams cad kyi tshul snang ba'i sgo nas yang dag par 'byung ba'i thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi shugs de la ni rab
243b4(phal chen): tu rtog / chos kyi dbyings rgya chen po'i dkyil 'khor rgyas par 'gengs pa'i smon lam yongs su dag pa de'i rjes su ni 'brang / chos thams cad kyi phyogs snang bar byed pa'i ye shes kyi 'od de ni shin tu
243b5(phal chen): gsal bar byed/ chos thams cad kyis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par phye ba rgyas par 'gengs pa'i mngon par shes pa'i stobs de ni mngon par bsgrub/ byang chub sems dpa'i lam dang /
243b6(phal chen): dran pa thams cad nye bar blangs pas brtsams pa mthar dbyung ba'i smon lam de ni yongs su rdzogs par byed cing / mthar gyis yul bgrod dka' ba'i grong khyer rin po che'i rgyan gang na ba der phyin te/ bcom pa
243b7(phal chen): ma lha'i bshes gnyen ma yongs su tshol tshol ba dang / de la bcom pa ma lha'i bshes gnyen gyi yon tan mngon par mi shes la ye shes kyi spyod yul gyi tshul la mi mkhas pa'i mi ji snyed pa de dag 'di
243b8(phal chen): snyam du sems te/ mi 'di de ltar zhi zhing dul ba'i dbang po dang ldan la de ltar shes bzhin dang ldan te/ de ltar 'khrul pa med cing de ltar yid 'khrug pa med la de ltar gnya' shing gang tsam du lta ste/
244a1(phal chen): de ltar gnod pas mi tshugs shing de ltar mtshan mar mi 'dzin la/ gzugs kyi rnam pa thams cad la g.yeng ba med pa'i mig dang ldan te/ yid la brel ba med cing / bsam pa zab la mngon par mdzes te/ rgya mtsho
244a2(phal chen): ltar 'dug cing sems mi nyams mi 'khrug pa de la bcom pa ma lha'i bshes gnyen mas ko ci zhig bya/ 'di lta bu dag ni 'dod chags la dga' ba med de/ sems phyin ci log dang ldan yang mi srid do/ /'di lta bu dag ni sdug
244a3(phal chen): cing gtsang ba'i 'du shes yongs su rgyu ba med de/ 'di lta bu dag ni 'dod pas 'khol kyang mi srid do/ /'di lta bu dag ni bud med kyi dbang du 'gyur ba med de/ 'di lta bu dag ni bdud kyi spyod yul la spyod kyang mi srid do/ /'di lta
244a4(phal chen): bu dag ni bdud kyi spyod yul la chags pa med de/ 'di lta bu dag ni 'dod pa'i 'dam du bying ba yang mi srid do/ /'di lta bu dag ni bdud kyi zhags pas bcings par 'gyur ba med do/ /dogs pa byed kyang mi srid do snyam mo/ /gang
244a5(phal chen): yang bcom pa ma lha'i bshes gnyen ma'i yon tan gyi khyad par mngon par shes shing / ye shes kyi spyod yul mngon du gyur pa de dag ni 'di skad ces 'dzer te/ rigs kyi bu de ltar khyod bcom pa ma lha'i bshes gnyen ma la yongs
244a6(phal chen): su dri bar sems pa ni khyod kyang 'thob par bya ba legs par thob pa ste/ legs so legs so/ /khyod ni nges par sangs rgyas su smon pa'o/ /khyod ni bdag nges par sems can thams cad kyi gnas su 'gyur bar 'dod pa'o/ /
244a7(phal chen): khyod ni nges par sems can thams cad kyi 'dod chags kyi zug rngu dbyung bar 'dod pa'o/ /khyod ni nges par sdug cing gtsang ba'i 'du shes rnam par gtor bar 'dod pa'o/ /rigs kyi bu 'di re bcom pa ma lha'i bshes gnyen ma ni
244a8(phal chen): grong khyer gyi lam gyi sum mdo'i byang phyogs logs shig na rang gi khyim na 'dug go/ /de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis tshig de thos nas dga' rangs te/ mgu zhing nyams bde la tshim zhing yid bde ba skyes nas/ bcom pa ma lha'i
244b1(phal chen): bshes gnyen ma'i khyim gang na ba der phyin nas/ de'i khyim che zhing yangs la rin po che'i ra ba rim pa bcus bskor ba/ rin po che ta la'i phreng ba rim pa bcus kun nas bskor ba/ 'obs spos chus gang ba/ lha rdzas kyi
244b2(phal chen): rin po che'i pad mo dang / ud pa la dang / ku mu ta dang / me tog pun da ri kas chu yongs su khebs pa yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i chus yongs su gang ba de'i gzhi gser gyi bye ma bdal ba/ spos yid du 'ong ba dang /
244b3(phal chen): 'dres pa'i dri zhim pas gang ba/ rin po che sil ma mang pos shin tu brgyan pa/ rim pa bcus kun nas bskor ba/ rin po che thams cad las byas pa'i khang pa dang / gzhal med khang dang / khang pa brtsegs pas rnam par
244b4(phal chen): dkrigs shing ba gam dang rta babs dang / skar khung gi shar bu dang / zla gam seng ge'i shing tog dang / snang ba'i rgyal mtshan la stsogs pa/ rin po che sna tshogs kyi 'od kyis 'bar ba rin po che rnam pa sna tshogs grangs med pa'i 'byung
244b5(phal chen): gnas kyis brgyan pa/ rin po che'i dag ra bai DUr+yas spras pa'i gzhi dang ldan pa/ lha rdzas kyi spos zhim po thams cad kyis 'khor thams cad nas bdugs shing bsangs pa/ a ka ru nag po mchog gi bdug spos kyis dri zhim par bdug pa/
244b6(phal chen): spos kyi byug pas 'khor kun nas byugs pa/ rin po che sna tshogs kyi lan kun kyis rtsig ngos kun tu bres pa/ steng 'dzam bu chu klung gi gser gyi dra ba rin po che sna tshogs kyis rab tu brgyan pas kun nas bkab pa/
244b7(phal chen): gser gyi dril bu dra ba brgya stong rlung gis bskyod cing 'khrol ba'i sgra yid du 'ong zhing snyan pa 'byung ba/ rin po che thams cad kyi me tog gi sprin sil ma kun tu bkram pas/ rin po che'i me tog gi rgyan dang ldan pa/ rin po
244b8(phal chen): che sna tshogs thams cad kyi rgyal mtshan bsgreng bas sgo shin tu brgyan pa/ nor bu rin po che sna tshogs kyi 'od kyi dra ba snang ba/ mu med par brjod du yod pa/ rin po che bai DUr+ya'i sdong po dang / rdo rje man shel la stsogs
245a1(phal chen): pa'i gter brgya stong kun shes pa/ phun sum tshogs pas mdzod mi zad pa dang ldan pa/ bza' shing gi ra ba chen po bcus brgyan pa mthong ste/ de na bcom pa ma lha'i bshes gnyen ma gzugs mdzes shing
245a2(phal chen): bzang la blta na sdug pa/ gya nom pa'i kha dog dam pas rgyas pa dang ldan pa/ gser gyi kha dog ltar 'dug pa'i mdog can skra mthon ting du 'dug pa/ lus kyi yan lag dang nying lag tshul dang 'dra bar rnam par grub
245a3(phal chen): pa/ 'dod pa'i khams kyi lha dang mi thams cad las 'phags pa'i kha dog dang gzugs dang dbyibs mdzes pa dang ldan pa/ tshangs pa las kyang 'das pa'i dbyangs kyi yan lag dang ldan pa/ sems can thams cad
245a4(phal chen): kyi sgra skad kyi tshul la mkhas pa brgyan thams cad dang ldan zhing yid du 'ong ba'i dbyangs can rnam par thar pa yi ge 'khor lo rgyan la mkhas pa dang ldan pa/ bzo dang gtsug lag thams cad la mkhas par byang ba/ chos kyi
245a5(phal chen): ye shes sgyu ma la mkhas par bslabs pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i thabs dang / tshul rnam pa thams cad thob pa/ rin po che'i lhab lhub sna tshogs kyis rnam par brgyan pa'i lus yid du 'ong ba dang ldan pa/ rin po
245a6(phal chen): che thams cad las byas pa'i dra ba 'od shin tu gsal bas lus rab tu brgyan pa/ lha rdzas kyi nor bu rin po che'i rgyan dang / lhab lhub grangs med pas rab tu brgyan pa/ lus shin tu 'bar ba/ nor bu rin po
245a7(phal chen): che dam pa yid bzhin gyi rgyal po'i cod pan thogs pa/ rin po che bai DUr+ya'i phreng ba mdo zungs rdo rje rin po che sna tshogs dang / nor bu rin po che seng ges mdzes pa sna tshogs bkye ba mgul na thogs pa/ dge ba'i
245a8(phal chen): rtsa ba spyad pa la bskal pa 'thun pa dang / smon lam gcig pa'i 'khor mang po gzhan gyis mi phyed cing yid du 'ong ba dang ldan pa/ bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs chen po'i gter mi zad pa'i mdzod dang ldan pa
245b1(phal chen): 'dug pa mthong ste/ de khyim de dag thams cad dang / rin po che'i gnas dang / gzhal med khang gi rgyan de dag thams cad kyang rang gi lus las byung ba'i 'od dga' bar byed pa/ lus bde ba dang sim pa bskyed
245b2(phal chen): pa/ sems khong nas dga' bar byed pas gsal bar snang bar byas pa mthong ngo / /de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis bcom pa ma lha'i bshes gnyen ma'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ mdun du
245b3(phal chen): 'dug nas thal mo sbyar te 'di skad ces smras so/ /'phags ma bdag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed na/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la
245b4(phal chen): bslab par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba ma 'tshal te/ 'phags ma ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams la gdams ngag dang rjes su bstan pa mdzad do zhes bdag gis thos na/ ji ltar byang chub
245b5(phal chen): sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba 'phags mas bdag la bshad du gsol/ des smras pa rigs kyi bu kho mos ni byang chub sems dpa'i rnam
245b6(phal chen): par thar pa 'dod chags dang bral ba'i mthar phyin pa zhes bya ba thob ste/ rigs kyi bu de ltar kho mo ni lha rnams la lha mo'i gzugs dang kha dog dang / dbyibs dang chu zheng las kyang lhag par kha dog gsal ba dang /
245b7(phal chen): rnam par dag pas ci la mos pa bzhin du snang bar byed do/ /de bzhin du klu dang gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang mi ma
245b8(phal chen): yin pa rnams la yang bud med gyi gzugs dang / kha dog dang dbyibs dang / chu zheng lhag par 'od gsal zhing rnam par dag pas ci la mos pa bzhin du snang bar byed do/ /sems can gang 'dod chags
246a1(phal chen): gyis kun nas 'khor ba'i sems dang ldan pa dag / kho mo'i drung du 'ong na'ang de dag thams cad la kho mo ni 'dod chags dang 'bral bar 'gyur ba'i phyir chos bstan te/ de dag gis chos de thos nas kyang 'dod
246a2(phal chen): chags dang bral ba thob par 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin 'jig rten la chags pa med pa zhes bya ba yang rab tu 'thob po/ /la la ni kho mo mthong ma thag tu 'dod chags dang bral bar gyur te/
246a3(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin dga' ba dang ldan pa zhes bya ba rab tu 'thob po/ /la la ni gtam byas pa tsam gyis 'dod chags dang bral ba thob par 'gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin chags pa
246a4(phal chen): med pa'i dbyangs shes bya ba yang rab tu 'thob po/ /la la ni lag nas bzung ba tsam gyis 'dod chags dang bral ba thob par 'gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du rjes su
246a5(phal chen): 'gro zhing gnas pa zhes bya ba rab tu 'thob po/ /la la ni gcig tu 'grogs pa tsam gyis 'dod chags dang bral ba thob par 'gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin bral bas snang ba zhes bya ba yang rab tu 'thob
246a6(phal chen): bo/ /la la ni bltas pa tsam gyis 'dod chags dang bral ba thob par 'gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin rab tu zhi ba'i rnam par brgyan ces bya ba yang rab tu thob po/ /la la ni glal ba tsam gyis 'dod
246a7(phal chen): chags dang bral ba thob par 'gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin phas kyi rgol ba rnam par 'thor ba zhes bya ba yang rab tu 'thob po/ /la la ni mig btsums pa tsam gyis 'dod chags dang bral ba thob
246a8(phal chen): par 'gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin sangs rgyas kyi yul snang ba zhes bya ba yang rab tu 'thob bo/ /la la ni pang du 'khyud pa tsam gyis 'dod chags dang bral ba 'thob par 'gyur te/ byang chub
246b1(phal chen): sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin 'gro ba thams cad yongs su sdud cing myi gtong ba'i snying po zhes bya ba yang rab tu 'thob po/ /la la ni 'o byas pa tsam gyis 'dod chags dang bral ba 'thob par 'gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa'i ting
246b2(phal chen): nge 'dzin 'gro ba thams cad bsod nams kyi mdzod la reg par byed pa zhes bya ba yang rab tu 'thob po/ /de ltar kho mo ni sems can gang ji snyed gcig kho mo'i drung du 'ong ba de dag thams cad kyang byang chub sems dpa'i rnam
246b3(phal chen): par thar pa 'dod chags dang bral ba'i mthar phyin pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i chags pa med pa la mngon du gyur pa 'di nyid la rab tu 'god do/ /smras pa/ 'phags ma khyod de lta bu'i phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan pa de khyod kyis
246b4(phal chen): dge ba'i rtsa ba ni gang du bskyed/ 'phrin las ni ji lta bu zhig bstsags/ smras pa/ rigs kyi bu kho mos dran na 'das pa'i dus shig na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mkhyen
246b5(phal chen): pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ bla na med pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba kha lo bsgyur ba/ lha dang mi'i ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das shin tu mtho bar gshegs pa
246b6(phal chen): zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa shin tu mtho bar gshegs pa de sems can rnams la thugs brtse ba'i don tu rgyal po'i gnas sgo bzang po zhes bya bar gshegs nas sgo'i them pa la
246b7(phal chen): zhabs kyis gnon pa'i tshe/ grong khyer de thams cad kyang / rab tu g.yos nas yangs shing rgya che la rin po che du ma las byas par yongs su gyur te/ steng gi bar snang yang rin po che mang po'i 'od kyis rnam par
246b8(phal chen): brgyan pa dang / rin po che'i me tog sna tshogs kyis yongs su gang ba dang / lha rdzas kyi rol mo sna tshogs kyi sgra rab tu 'byung ba dang / lha'i lus kyi sprin tshad med pa rgya che bas khebs par gyur to/ /
247a1(phal chen): rigs kyi bu kho mo yang de'i tshe tshong dpon gyi chung ma zhig du gyur te/ blo gros bzang mo zhes bya'o/ /de nas kho mo cho 'phrul gyis yang dag par bskul nas khyim thab dang lhan cig tu 'dong dong ste/ de bzhin
247a2(phal chen): gshegs pa grong bar gyi srang du gshegs pa la dad pa rgya chen po skyes te/ kho mos ni rin po che'i dril bu gcig gcig 'phul lo/ /de'i tshe 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shin tu
247a3(phal chen): mtho bar gshegs pa'i zham 'bring na 'dug ste/ des kho mo bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do/ /rigs kyi bu kho mos byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa 'dod chags dang bral ba'i mthar
247a4(phal chen): phyin pa 'di shes par zad na/ kho mos byang chub sems dpa'i thabs dang ye shes mtha' yas pa la gnas pa/ bsod nams rgya che zhing yangs pa'i mdzod dang ldan pa/ ye shes kyi yul la thub pa med pa de dag
247a5(phal chen): gi spyod pa shes pa 'am/ yon tan brjod par nus re skan/ song rigs kyi bu lho phyogs kyi rgyud 'di nyid na grong khyer dge ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na khyim bdag nan khugs shes bya ba de bzhin
247a6(phal chen): gshegs pa'i mchod rten tsan dan gyi khri 'phang can la mchod pa byed pa zhig 'dug gis/ de'i gan du song la ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bya ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bya ba
247a7(phal chen): dris shig / de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis bcom pa ma lha'i bshes gnyen ma'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom pa ma lha'i bshes gnyen ma la lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su
247a8(phal chen): bskor ba byas nas/ yang dang yang bltas te/ bcom pa ma lha'i bshes gnyen ma'i drung nas song ngo / /de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis grong khyer dge ba'i pha rol tu phyin par khyim bdag nan khugs kyi khyim
247b1(phal chen): ga la ba der phyin nas/ khyim bdag nan khugs kyi rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ mdun du 'dug nas thal mo sbyar te/ 'di skad ces smras so/ /'phags pa bdag gis bla na med pa yang dag
247b2(phal chen): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed na/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba ma 'tshal te/ 'phags pa ni
247b3(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' rnams la gdams ngag dang rjes su bstan pa mdzad do/ /zhes bdag gis thos nas/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar
247b4(phal chen): nan tan du bgyi ba 'phags pas bdag la bshad du gsol/ des smras pa rigs kyi bu kho bo ni byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa yongs su mi zad pa thob pa ste/ rigs kyi bu kho bo'i sems kyi rgyud
247b5(phal chen): las ni/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad nas kyang / sems can 'dul ba'i dbang du mdzad pa ma gtogs par 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad nas kyang shin tu mya ngan las 'da' ba'i tshul du de bzhin
247b6(phal chen): gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa med do/ /yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba med do/ /yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ba med do/ /rigs kyi bu de ltar kho bo ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i
247b7(phal chen): mchod rten tsan dan gyi khri 'phang gyi sgo 'byed pa ste/ kho bo mchod rten gyi sgo 'byed pas byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin sangs rgyas kyi rigs mi zad pa'i rgyan ces bya ba thob bo/ /rigs kyi bu
247b8(phal chen): kho bo ni ting nge 'dzin 'di la sems kyi skad cig skad cig du mnyam par gzhag ste/ sems kyi skad cig thams cad la'ang khyad par gyi rnam pa du ma rab tu thob bo/ /smras pa/ 'phags pa ting nge 'dzin de'i
248a1(phal chen): yul ji lta bu zhig mchis/ smras pa rigs kyi bu kho bo ni ting nge 'dzin 'di la snyoms par zhugs pa'i tshe/ 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud 'di sangs rgyas gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa bsod bskyabs
248a2(phal chen): la stsogs pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / gser thub dang log par dad sel dang / thams cad mnga' ba dang / gtsug tor dang rnam par gzigs dang rgyal ba dang / rdzogs mdzad dang / grags
248a3(phal chen): mchog dang / pad mo'i blo la stsogs pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyang sangs rgyas mthong ba'i mtshams 'brel bas/ sangs rgyas gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa rgyun mi 'chad pa'i tshul gyis mngon
248a4(phal chen): sum du mthong ste/ sems kyi skad cig gcig la sangs rgyas brgya yang mthong ngo / /de'i 'og ma'i sems kyis sangs rgyas stong yang mthong ngo / /de'i 'og ma'i sems kyis sangs rgyas brgya phrag stong yang
248a5(phal chen): mthong ngo / /de bzhin du sangs rgyas bye ba dang / sangs rgyas bye ba phrag brgya dang / sangs rgyas bye ba phrag stong dang / sangs rgyas bye ba brgya phrag stong dang / sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig dang / sangs rgyas
248a6(phal chen): bye ba dung phyur dang / sangs rgyas bye ba thams cad dang / sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig dang / de'i 'og ma'i sems kyis sangs rgyas 'byung ba gcig nas gcig tu rgyud pa brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa
248a7(phal chen): dag kyang mthong ngo / /de'i 'og ma'i sems kyis de bzhin gshegs pa 'dzam bu'i gling gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyang mthong ngo / /de'i 'og ma'i sems kyis de bzhin gshegs pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du
248a8(phal chen): med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i bar kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyang mthong ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis thugs dang po bskyed pa'i tshogs gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa la'ang 'jug go/ /thugs dang po bskyed
248b1(phal chen): pas 'thob pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa la'ang 'jug go/ /smon lam rnam pa tha dad pa mngon par bsgrub pa rnam par dag pa la'ang 'jug go/ /spyod pa rnam par dag pa la'ang 'jug go/ /pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs
248b2(phal chen): par mdzad pa la'ang 'jug go/ /byang chub sems dpa'i sa thams cad yongs su bsgrub pa la'ang 'jug go/ /bzod pa brnyes pa rnam par dag pa la'ang 'jug go/ /bdud kyi dkrugs ma rnam par 'thor ba'i khyu
248b3(phal chen): mchog gi mthu phyung ba la 'jug go/ /mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'i rnam par 'phrul pa'i rgyan la 'jug go/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnam par dag par mdzad pa rnam pa tha dad pa la'ang 'jug go/ /sems can
248b4(phal chen): yongs su smyin par mdzad pa rnam pa tha dad pa la'ang 'jug go/ /'khor kun nas 'dus pa rnam pa tha dad pa la 'jug go/ /'od kyi dkyil 'khor rnam pa tha dad pa la 'jug go/ /chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i khyu
248b5(phal chen): mchog gi mthu phyung ba la 'jug go/ /sangs rgyas kyi rdzu 'phrul dang / rnam par 'phrul pa dang / cho 'phrul la'ang 'jug go/ /de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis chos bstan pa la 'ang shin tu rnam par gsal
248b6(phal chen): ba dang / ma 'dres par dran te/ yang dag par 'dzin to/ /dran pas yongs su bcangs so/ /rig pas rab tu shes par byed do/ /blo gros kyis shin tu rnam par 'byed do/ /blos rtogs par byed do/ /shes rab kyis
248b7(phal chen): snang bar byed do/ /ma byon pa'i sangs rgyas gcig nas gcig tu rgyud pa byams pa la stsogs pa dag kyang mthong zhing shes te/ sems kyi skad cig gcig la sangs rgyas brgya yang mthong ngo / /de'i 'og ma'i sems
248b8(phal chen): kyis sangs rgyas stong yang mthong ba nas/ de'i 'og ma'i sems kyis de bzhin gshegs pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dag kyang mthong ste/ de bzhin gshegs
249a1(phal chen): pa de dag gis thugs dang po bskyed pa'i tshogs gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa la'ang 'jug go/ /de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis chos bstan pa yang shin tu gsal ba dang / ma 'dres par rjes su dran
249a2(phal chen): te yang dag par 'dzin to/ /dran pas yongs su bcangs so/ /rigs pas rab tu shes par byed do/ /blo gros rnam par 'byed do/ /blo gros kyis rtogs par byed do/ /shes rab kyis snang bar byed do/ /
249a3(phal chen): ji ltar 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud 'di sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mthar gtogs pa'i sangs rgyas gcig nas gcig tu rgyud pa mthong zhing shes pa de bzhin du phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud 'das pa
249a4(phal chen): dang / ma 'ongs pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa gcig nas gcig tu rgyud pa thams cad kyang shes shing mthong ngo / /de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis thugs
249a5(phal chen): dang po bskyed pa'i tshogs gcig nas gcig tu rgyud pa la'ang 'jug go/ /sangs rgyas gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa de la'ang rgyun mi 'chad pa dang / mi zad pa dang / dad pas shes par bya ba dang / byang chub
249a6(phal chen): sems dpa'i brtson 'grus dang / zhe non pas khong du chud par bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i brtson 'grus kyi shugs rnam par 'phel bar byed pa dang / 'jig rten thams cad dang / nyan thos dang /
249a7(phal chen): rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang / de'i yul la zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis mi 'phrogs pa shes shing khong du chud par byed do/ /rnam par snang mdzad la stsogs pa da ltar byung ba'i
249a8(phal chen): de bzhin gshegs pa phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams na bzhugs pa gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa thams cad kyang mthong zhing shes te/ sems kyi skad cig gcig la sangs rgyas brgya yang mthong zhing
249b1(phal chen): shes so/ /de'i 'og ma'i sems kyis sangs rgyas stong yang mthong ba nas/ de'i 'og ma'i sems kyis de bzhin gshegs pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed
249b2(phal chen): kyi bar yang mthong ste/ nam de bzhin gshegs pa gang gi zhal blta bar dga' ba de'i tshe 'ang de bzhin du mthong ste/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis bstan pa dang / bstan pa mdzad pa
249b3(phal chen): dang / bstan par 'gyur ba de dag kyang thos so/ /thos nas kyang 'dzin to/ /dran pas yongs su bcangs so/ /rig pas rab tu shes par byed do/ /blo gros kyis rnam par byed do/ /blo gros kyis rnam par byed do/ /shes rab kyis
249b4(phal chen): snang bar byed do/ /rigs kyi bu kho bos ni byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i mthar phyin pa 'di shes par zad na/ kho bos byang chub sems dpa' dus gsum skad cig
249b5(phal chen): gcig tu shes pa rab tu thob pa/ skad cig gcig gi cha shas la ting nge 'dzin rnam par phye ba la spyod pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyi ma 'byung ba rtog pa dang / rnam par rtog pa thams cad mnyam pa
249b6(phal chen): nyid du khong du chud pa/ sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam pa'i ting nge 'dzin rjes su rtogs pa/ bdag dang sems can dang / sangs rgyas mi gnyis par spyod pa/ rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'i
249b7(phal chen): chos kyi rgyan kyi dkyil 'khor dang ldan pa/ ye shes kyi 'khrul 'khor kyis 'jig rten gyi dra ba 'gengs pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa rgya mtsho thams cad dang / mi 'gal bar rnam par spyod pa/
249b8(phal chen): chos kyi dbyings thams cad du rtogs par byed pa'i ye shes kyi yul dang ldan pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos bstan pa rnam par rig par byed pa'i ye shes kyi yul can de dag gi spyod pa
250a1(phal chen): shes pa'am/ yon tan brjod par nus re skan/ song rigs kyi bu lho phyogs kyi rgyud 'di nyid na ri gru 'dzin ces bya ba yod de/ de na byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po zhes
250a2(phal chen): bya ba 'dug gis/ de'i gan du song la ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba dris shig ces nas de'i tshe/ tshigs su bcad
250a3(phal chen): pa 'di gnyis smras so/ /song shig nor bzangs dpal gyi chu rgyal dbung zhig na/ /mkhas pa rnams kyis ri rgyal gru 'dzin mdzes pa yod/ /rin chen rgyus byas shing dang nags tshal me tog mang / /
250a4(phal chen): bza' shing ra ba rdzing dang chu bran 'bab par bstan/ /ri mchog de la brtan par spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang / /'gro ba rnams la phan pa'i don du rnam par spyod/ /de'i gan song dang nor bzangs khyod
250a5(phal chen): la mgon po yis/ /yon tan rgya chen tshul la 'jug pa ston par byed/ /de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis khyim bdag nan khugs kyi rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal nas/ khyim bdag
250a6(phal chen): nan khugs la lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas te/ yang dang yang bltas nas khyim bdag nan khugs kyi drung nas song ngo // //
250a7(phal chen): sangs rgyas rmad ga cad ces bya ba shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo/ bam po bcu bdun pa/ de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs khyim bdag nan khugs kyi gdams ngag rjes
250a8(phal chen): su sems shing / byang chub sems dpa'i mos pa'i mdzod de ni shes par byed/ byang chub sems dpa'i rjes su dran pa'i stobs de ni rjes su dran par byed/ sangs rgyas kyi tshul gcig nas
250b1(phal chen): gcig tu brgyud pa'i stobs ni yang dag par 'dzin to/ /sangs rgyas gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa'i mtshams ni khong du chud par byed/ rnas thos pa'i sangs rgyas kyi mtshan de dag gi rjes su 'brang /
250b2(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyi chos bstan pa'i tshul de dang ni 'thun par byed/ sangs rgyas kyis yang dag par bsgrub pa'i rgyan de ni khong du chud par byed/ sangs rgyas mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'i khyu mchog gi mthu
250b3(phal chen): phyung ba de la ni yid ches par byed/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'phrin las bsam gyis mi khyab pa de ni mngon du byed cing / mthar gyis ri gru 'dzin gang na ba der 'ongs nas/ ri gru 'dzin gyi steng du phyin te/
250b4(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po yongs su rmed cing tshol tshol ba las/ nub phyogs logs kyi ri sman ljongs mtsho dang / 'tshe'u dang 'bab chus mdzes par gyur pa/ bai DUr+ya sngon po'i
250b5(phal chen): dkyil 'khor ltar sngo zhing 'jam la/ gzhon pa'i spang nags tshal chen po'i mthongs na 'dug pa zhig na/ rin po che'i rdo rje'i rdo stegs shig la skyil mo dkrung bcas te 'dug cing / rin po che sna tshogs
250b6(phal chen): kyi rdo stegs la 'khod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs dpag tu med pas/ kun nas bskor cing chos ston te/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'gro ba thams cad yongs su sdud pa'i yul byams pa chen po dang /
250b7(phal chen): snying rje chen po'i sgo gsal bar ston pa zhes bya ba yang dag par ston cing 'dug pa mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang dga' rangs te mgu zhing nyams bde la tshim zhing yid bde ba skyes nas dga' bas rgyas zhing mi 'dzum
250b8(phal chen): pa'i mig gis thal mo sbyar nas/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen la dad pa'i shugs dang ldan pas sems mi 'khrug pa/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen mthong nas/ sangs rgyas thams cad mthong bar 'dzin pa/
251a1(phal chen): dge ba'i bshes gnyen las byung ba'i chos kyi sprin thams cad yang dag par gzung ba'i 'du shes dang ldan pa/ yon tan dang nan tan thams cad dge ba'i bshes gnyen la rag lus pa'i 'du shes
251a2(phal chen): can/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang phrad pa shin tu dka' bar sems pa/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen las stobs bcu'i ye shes rin po che 'byung zhing thob par 'gyur ba'i 'du shes dang ldan pa/ dge ba'i
251a3(phal chen): bshes gnyen las snang ba mi zad pa 'byung ba'i 'du shes can/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi rten gyi bsod nams kyi rgyud rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur ba'i 'du shes dang ldan pa/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni
251a4(phal chen): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sgo yang dag par ston pa'i 'du shes dang ldan pa/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni ye shes kyi rgya mtsho chen po la 'jug pa'i yongs su ston par 'du shes pa/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni
251a5(phal chen): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi tshogs yang dag par 'dus pa/ yongs su bskyed pa'i 'du shes dang ldan pa/ byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po gang na ba der phyin to/ /de nas byang chub
251a6(phal chen): sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang pos tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs ring zhig nas tshur 'ong ba mthong nas/ smras pa/ tshur shog dpe med pa'i theg pa chen po yangs shing bsam gyis mi khyab pa la
251a7(phal chen): zhugs pa/ skye ba las byung ba'i sdug bsngal sna tshogs kyis gtses shing skyabs med par gyur pa'i 'gro ba thams cad yongs su skyob pa'i bsam pa dang ldan pa/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad mngon
251a8(phal chen): sum du gyur pa/ 'jig rten thams cad las 'das te dpe med tshad med pa la mngon par mos pa/ snying rje chen pos byin gyis brlabs pas/ 'gro ba thams cad yongs su skyob pa'i blo gros can/
251b1(phal chen): blta na kun tu bzang po'i spyod lam mngon du bltas pa/ smon lam chen po'i dkyil 'khor yongs su sbyong ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos kyi sprin yongs su gzung bar mos pa/ dge
251b2(phal chen): ba'i rtsa ba bstsags pas ngoms mi shes pa'i bsam pa dang ldan pa/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi gdam ngag la yang dag par zhugs pa/ 'jam dpal gyi ye shes rgya mtsho las byung ba'i yon tan gyi 'byung gnas
251b3(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyi byin kyis brlabs thob par bya ba la mngon du bltas pa/ ting nge 'dzin kyi snang ba dang shugs rab tu thob pa/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos kyi sprin kyi char yang dag par gzung ba la mngon par mos
251b4(phal chen): pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ sangs rgyas rgya mtsho mthong bas dga' ba dang / mos pa'i shugs kyis yid rab tu bde bar gyur pa/ legs par spyod pa tshad med cing bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i shugs kyis mngon
251b5(phal chen): par brlan pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ yon tan la nan tan du bya ba'i shugs kyis rnam par dag pa'i bsod nams dang ye shes kyi mdzod bdag la mngon du gyur pa/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes mthong ba'i lam gyi
251b6(phal chen): shugs gzhan la yongs su bstan pa'i bsam pa can/ snying rje chen po'i shugs ma nyams pa'i rtsa ba dang ldan pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes snang ba'i shugs yang dag par gzung ba'i blo gros can khyod 'ongs
251b7(phal chen): pa legs so/ /de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po gang na ba der song nas/ byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag
251b8(phal chen): 'tshal te/ byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po la lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas mdun du 'dug ste/ thal mo sbyar nas 'di skad ces smras so 'phags pa bdag gis
252a1(phal chen): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed nas/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar nan tan bgyi bar ma 'tshal te/ 'phags
252a2(phal chen): pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams la gdams ngag dang rjes su bstan pa mdzad do zhes bdag gis thos na/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar
252a3(phal chen): nan tan du bgyi ba 'phags pas bdag la bshad du gsol/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po mdog 'dzam bu chu klung gi gser gyi kha dog tu 'dug pa/ 'od kyi dra ba rnam pa sna tshogs
252a4(phal chen): tshad med pa 'phro ba'i rgyan kyi sprin rab tu 'gyed pa'i lag pa g.yas pa brkyang ste/ mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po las byung ba'i 'od gzer sna tshogs dri ma med pa/ lus dang sems kyi bde ba tshad med pa
252a5(phal chen): rab tu bskyed pa'i tshogs kyis shin tu rgyas pa'i lag pa/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyi spyi bo la bzhag ste/ 'di skad ces smras so/ /rigs kyi bu de ltar khyod kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
252a6(phal chen): byang chub tu sems bskyed pa legs so legs so/ /rigs kyi bu nga ni byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i sgo snying rje chen po'i sgo thogs pa med pa zhes bya ba shes te/ rigs kyi bu nga'i byang chub sems dpa'i
252a7(phal chen): spyod pa'i sgo snying rje chen po'i sgo thogs pa med pa de ni 'gro ba thams cad la dbye ba med par sems can yongs su smyin par bya ba dang / gdul ba la zhugs pa sgo kun nas thogs shing rnam par rig par 'gyur bas/
252a8(phal chen): sems can yongs su bsdu ba dang / gdul ba la nye bar gnas pa ste/ rigs kyi bu de ltar nga byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i sgo snying rje chen po'i sgo thogs pa med pa la gnas pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa
252b1(phal chen): thams cad kyi zhabs kyi drung nas kyang mi g.yo la/ sems can thams cad kyi dgos pa la'ang sta gon du gnas te/ sbyin pas kyang sems can yongs su bsdud do/ /ngag snyan pa dang don bya ba dang / don 'thun pas kyang sems can
252b2(phal chen): yongs su bsdud do/ /gzugs kyi lus rnam par bstan pas kyang / sems can yongs su smyin par byed do/ /kha dog dang dbyibs dang gzugs bsam gyis mi khyab pa bstan te/ rnam par dmigs par bya ba dang / 'od gzer kyi
252b3(phal chen): dra ba dgye bas kyang sems can rab tu tshim par byed cing yongs su smyin par byed do/ /bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du dbyangs brjod pa dang / ci la dga' ba'i spyod lam yongs su bstan pa dang / mos pa sna tshogs dang / tshul
252b4(phal chen): 'thun par chos bstan pa dang / rdzu 'phrul dang rnam par 'phrul pa sna tshogs dang / dge ba'i chos bstsags par bag myi byed pa'i sems can gyi sems yongs su bskul ba dang / bsam pa dang 'thun par sprul pa sna tshogs
252b5(phal chen): tshad med pa yongs su bstan pa dang / rigs sna tshogs su skyes pa'i sems can rnams bskal pa 'thun pa'i gzugs yongs su bstan pa dang / gnas gcig tu 'grogs pas kyang sems can yongs su sdus shing yongs
252b6(phal chen): su smyin par byed do/ /rigs kyi bu de ltar ngas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i sgo snying rje chen po'i sgo thogs pa med pa 'di yongs su sbyangs pas/ 'gro ba thams cad rab tu rten pa'i smon lam bskyed de/ 'di ltar sems can
252b7(phal chen): thams cad kyi g.yang sa'i 'jigs pa dang / sems can thams cad rgyud kyi 'jigs pa zhi bar bya ba dang / sems can thams cad mgo rmongs pa'i 'jigs pa rnam par bzlog pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi bcings
252b8(phal chen): pa'i 'jigs pa yongs su gcad pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi srog la bab par mi bde ba'i 'jigs pa rnam par bzlog pa dang / sems can thams cad yo byad kyis phongs pa'i 'jigs pa bsal ba dang / sems can
253a1(phal chen): thams cad kyi 'tsho ba med pa'i 'jigs pa zhi bar bya ba dang / sems can thams cad kyi grags pa med pa'i 'jigs pa las yongs su bzla ba dang / sems can thams cad kyi 'khor ba'i 'jigs pa rab tu zhi bar bya ba dang /
253a2(phal chen): sems can thams cad kyi 'khor du bag tsha ba'i 'jigs pa med par bya ba dang / sems can thams cad 'chi ba'i 'jigs pa las rnam par bzla ba dang / sems can thams cad kyi ngan song gi 'jigs pa rnam par bzlog pa dang /
253a3(phal chen): sems can thams cad kyi lam mun pas nyam nga ba phyir mi ldog pa'i snang bas gsal bar bya ba dang / sems can thams cad kyi bskal pa mi mnyam pa dang 'grogs pa'i 'jigs pa shin tu bsal ba dang / sems can
253a4(phal chen): thams cad sdug pa dang bral ba'i 'jigs pa dag dang sems can thams cad kyi mi sdug pa dang / 'grogs pa'i 'jigs pa med par bya ba dang / sems can thams cad lus la mi bde ba'i 'jigs pa dang bral bar bya ba
253a5(phal chen): dang / sems can thams cad sems la mi bde ba'i 'jigs pa las dgrol ba dang / sems can thams cad sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang 'khrugs pa las yongs su bzla ba'i phyir 'gro ba thams cad
253a6(phal chen): rab tu rten pa'i smon lam mngon par bsgrubs pa 'di byas so/ /sems can thams cad kyi 'jigs pa rnam par thar bar bya ba'i phyir yang 'jig rten du rjes su dran pa'i sgo byin kyis brlabs so/ /sems can thams cad
253a7(phal chen): 'jigs pa dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir/ rang gi mying 'khor lo yang 'jig rten du rnam par dmigs par byas so/ /dus ji lta ba bzhin du 'gro bas rnam par dmyigs par bya ba'i phyir 'gro ba thams cad kyi rnam pa'i bye ba mtha'
253a8(phal chen): yas pa dang / mnyam par nga'i lus kyang byin kyis brlabs so/ /rigs kyi bu de ltar nga ni thabs 'dis sems can thams cad 'jigs pa las yongs su dkrol zhing sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad thob par bya ba'i
253b1(phal chen): phyir/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa'i phyir mi ldog par byed do/ /rigs kyi bu ngas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i sgo snying rje chen po'i sgo thogs pa med pa 'di thob par zad na/ ngas byang
253b2(phal chen): chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po rnams sangs rgyas thams cad kyi smon lam kyi dkyil 'khor la rnam par dag pa/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa khong du chud par rtogs pa/ dge ba'i chos mngon
253b3(phal chen): par 'du bya ba rgyun mi gcod pa'i rgyun dang ldan pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi rgyud la rtag tu mnyam par gzhag pa/ bskal pa thams cad du gnas shing spyod pa las phyir mi ldog pa'i rgyud dang
253b4(phal chen): ldan pa/ dus gsum thams cad kyi tshul rjes su rtogs pa'i rgyud dang ldan pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi klong yongs su 'khyil pa'i rgyud la mkhas pa/ sems can thams cad kyi mi dge ba'i sems
253b5(phal chen): rnam par zhi bar byed pa'i rgyud dang ldan pa/ sems can thams cad kyi dge ba'i sems yongs su 'phel ba'i rgyud dang ldan pa/ sems can thams cad kyi 'khor ba'i rgyud las phyir mi ldog par byed pa'i rgyud dang ldan pa/
253b6(phal chen): de dag gi spyod pa shes pa 'am/ yon tan brjod par nus re skan/ de la 'di skad ces bya'o/ /g.yas phyogs bskor ba byas te gus par bkur bstod nas/ /nor bzangs shin tu dul ba'i lho phyogs rgyud du song / /spyan
253b7(phal chen): ras gzigs dbang drang srong snying rje rnams spyod pa/ /rin chen ri'i sul na gnas par des kyang mthong / /rin chen sna tshogs rdo rje ri yi sman ljongs na/ /pad ma'i snying po'i seng ge'i khri la brtan par 'dug /lha dang lha min
253b8(phal chen): klu dang srin po mi 'am ci/ /rgyal ba'i sras kyis bskor cing de la chos kyang ston/ /mthong nas nor bzangs dga' ba tshad med skyes par gyur/ /bsnyen te yon tan rgya mtsho'i rkang la phyag 'tshal nas/ /
254a1(phal chen): ci nas bzang po'i spyod pa bdag gis thos 'gyur bas/ /'phags pas thugs rje bskyed de gdams shing brlab du gsol/ /bsod nams brgya yis brgyan pa'i dri med lag brkyang ste/ /'od sprin dra ba rgya
254a2(phal chen): chen bzang po rab bton nas/ /nor bzangs spyi bor bzhag ste sems can rnam dag pa/ /spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po mkhas pas tshig 'di smras/ /sangs rgyas sras po nga ni rnam thar gcig sgo shes/ /ye shes
254a3(phal chen): snying po rgyal ba kun kyi thugs rjes bsdus/ /'gro ba thams cad bskyab cing yongs su bsdu phyir byung / /kun tu bdag nyid rang la byams pa bzhin du rgyu/ /'gro ba mang po thams cad sdug bsngal kun las skyob/ /gang
