254a4(phal chen): rnams dam du bcings shing dgra lag phyin pa dang / /lus la gzer cing de bzhin btson rar bcug pa yang / /nga'i ming thos bcings las bzung ba thar bar 'gyur/ /rgyal po dag la nyes pa'i skyon byas gsad spangs pa/ /
254a5(phal chen): de tshe de dag nga yi ming yang dran gyur na/ /mda' 'phangs de yi lus la phog par mi 'gyur te/ /mtshon rnon btab kyang de dag mi 'dzug brgal bar 'gyur/ /dbang po'i 'khor du phyin kyang gang rnams brtsod gyur pa/ /dgra rnams
254a6(phal chen): kun las rgyal 'gyur grags pa thob par 'gyur/ /grags dang grogs dang rigs dang nor rnams 'phel bar 'gyur/ /nga yi ming dran de dag thub pa med par 'gyur/ /gang gis nga yi ming ni rjes su dran byas pa/ /de dag
254a7(phal chen): rkun pos 'jigs dogs dgras 'jigs nags phyin te/ /seng ge dom gzig gcan zan g.yag rgod sbrul gang yang / /dgra rnams kun las rgyal zhing 'jigs pa med par 'gyur/ /gang rnams la las nga yi ming zhig
254a8(phal chen): dran byas na/ /sdang ba'i sems kyis rin chen ltongs su bor gyur tam/ /sol mdog me lce rab tu 'bar bar bor gyur kyang / /me rnams pad mos gang ba'i chu yi gter du 'gyur/ /nga yi ming ni skad 'ga' yud tsam rjes dran na/ /
254b1(phal chen): rgya mtsho'i chur bor de yi nang du 'chi mi 'gyur/ /chu bos mi 'khyer me yi dbus su tshig mi 'gyur/ /don med kun tu mi 'gyur don rnams 'grub par 'gyur/ /shing sgrogs dbyig chings lcag sgrog de bzhin ltung rnams dang / /
254b2(phal chen): brnyas shing khyad bsad de bzhin bslus pa dang / /spyos shing brdegs te gshe dang sma phab rnam pa las/ /nga yi ming tsam dran par byas nas thar pa thob/ /gang rnams shar gnyer sna tshogs glags blta ji snyed dang / /gang
254b3(phal chen): rnams rtag tu zhe sdang mi snyan brjod pa rnams/ /nga yi ming thos dran byas snyan par 'gyur/ /mthong ba tsam gyis mod la byams pa'i sems kyang skye/ /nga yi ming tsam la las gang gis dran byas nas/ /gnod pa'i don du ro
254b4(phal chen): langs sngags dang byad byed pa'i/ /dgra rnams rtag tu de yi zil gyis non par 'gyur/ /ma lus dug gis de yi lus la mi tshugs so/ /la la gang gis nga yi ming tsam dran byas na/ /klu dbang srin tshogs mkha' lding
254b5(phal chen): sha za thams cad dang / /grul bum srul po 'tshe byed gtum po'i sems dang ldan/ /mdangs 'phrog 'jigs byed rmi lam 'ong ba'ang zhi bar 'gyur/ /nga yi ming ni skad cig yud tsam dran byas kyang / /pha dang ma dang bshes
254b6(phal chen): gnyen mdza' ba kun dang yang / /'bral bar mi 'gyur sdang dang 'grogs par de bzhin min/ /nor zad mi 'gyur phongs pa'i dngos su mi 'gyur ro/ /nga yi ming ni rjes su la la dran byed na/ /'di nas shi 'phos mnar
254b7(phal chen): med sems dmyal mi 'gro ste/ /byol song skye gnas yi dags mi khom gnas su min/ /sems can dag la lha dang mi yi gnas su skye/ /nga yi ming ni la la gang gis dran byas na/ /dmus long zhar ba
254b8(phal chen): 'on pa zha bor mi 'gyur te/ /mtheng po long bar mi 'gyur gsal smra blta sdug 'gyur/ /bskal pa bye ba mang por dbang por kun ldan 'gyur/ /la la gang gis nga yi mying ni
255a1(phal chen): rjes dran na/ /sems can dag pa 'di nas shi 'phos phyogs bcu yi/ /'jig rten khams su sangs rgyas mngon sum skye bar 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas mthong 'gyur de dag chos kyang thos par 'gyur/ /'di dang de bzhin gzhan
255a2(phal chen): dag thabs mang ji snyed kyis/ /'gro bar sems can nga 'dul gzhal dang zad mi nus/ /sangs rgyas sras po ngas ni rnam thar gcig bsgoms ste/ /yon tan can gyi yon tan thams cad ngas mi shes/ /de'i tshe byang chub sems
255a3(phal chen): dpa' gzhan du mi 'gro ba zhes bya ba shar phyogs nas nam mkha'i dbyings las 'ongs te/ mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi 'khor yug gi rtse mor 'dug go/ /byang chub sems dpa' gzhan du mi 'gro bas/ mi mjed kyi
255a4(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi khams kyi 'khor yug gi rtse mo la rkang pa gnyis bor ma thag du/ mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rnam pa drug tu g.yos te/ rin po che du ma'i rang bzhin du kun nas gnas par gyur to/ /byang chub
255a5(phal chen): sems dpa' gzhan du myi 'gro ba des/ nyi ma dang zla ba'i 'od thams cad zil gyis non pa dang / lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang mi 'am ci dang lto 'phye chen po dang / brgya byin dang
255a6(phal chen): tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten kyi mgon po dang / me dang rin po che dang / glog dang / skar ma'i 'od kyang zil gyis non pa de lta bu'i 'od lus las bkye ste/ sems can dmyal ba chen po dag kyang snang bar byas/ byol song gi skye gnas dang /
255a7(phal chen): gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi lam gyi rgyud thibs po thams cad kyang snang bar byas te/ ngan song gi sdug bsngal thams cad kyang de ma thag du zhi'o/ /sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa yang nyams su mi non par gyur te/ /mya ngan gyi
255a8(phal chen): zug rngu dang sdug bsngal sna tshogs kyang rtse zhil bar gyur to/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di thams cad du'ang rin po che'i sprin kyi char phab ste/ me tog dang spos dang / bdug pa dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs
255b1(phal chen): dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan gyi rgyan thams cad dang ldan pa'i mchod pa sna tshogs kyi sprin gyi char yang mngon par phab ste/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ngo / /de'i lus de'i gzugs brnyan ni sems can thams cad gnas su snang
255b2(phal chen): ba ste bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du tshim par byed pa la mngon par gzhol bas/ ri gru 'dzin de la byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po'i drung du yang phyin par snang ngo / /de nas byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang pos
255b3(phal chen): tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs la 'di skad ces smras so/ /rigs kyi bu khyod kyis byang chub sems dpa' gzhan du mi 'gro ba 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor 'dir phyin pa mthong ngam/ smras pa 'phags pa mthong ngo / /smras pa rigs kyi bu byang
255b4(phal chen): chub sems dpa' gzhan du mi 'gro ba'i gan du song la ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar nan tan tu bya ba dris shig /de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis byang
255b5(phal chen): chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po la/ lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas/ yang dang
255b6(phal chen): yang bltas te/ byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po'i drung nas song ngo / /de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po'i ye shes kyi gting ma rnyed pa'i sems kyis
255b7(phal chen): spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po blta bas kyang ma ngoms bzhin du bsgo ba dang / mi 'gal bar byang chub sems dpa' gzhan du mi 'gro ba gang na ba der song ste/ byang chub sems dpa' gzhan du mi 'gro ba'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi
255b8(phal chen): bos phyag 'tshal nas mdun du 'dug ste/ thal mo sbyar nas 'di skad ces smras so/ /'phags pa bdag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed na/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i
256a1(phal chen): spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba ma 'tshal te/ 'phags pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams la gdams pa dang rjes su bstan pa mdzad do zhes bdag gis thos na/ ji ltar byang chub sems
256a2(phal chen): dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba 'phags pas bdag la bshad du gsol/ des smras pa rigs kyi bu nga ni byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa sgo kun tu 'gro ba
256a3(phal chen): thob po smras pa/ 'phags pa khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa gang gi zhabs kyi drung nas byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa'i sgo kun tu 'gro ba zhes bya ba 'di brnyes/ 'jig rten gyi khams de ni 'di nas ji srid gcig
256a4(phal chen): na mchis/ 'jig rten gyi khams de nas bzhud nas ni ji srid gcig lags/ smras pa rigs kyi bu gnas 'di ni lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten dang / dge sbyong dang bram zer bcas pa'i skye dgus kyang
256a5(phal chen): shes par dka' ste/ de ni byang chub sems dpa'i mthu dang / byang chub sems dpa'i brtson 'grus mi ldog pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa mi 'phrogs pa'i yul te/ de ni rigs kyi bu dge ba'i bshes gnyen
256a6(phal chen): gyis yongs su ma zin pa/ sangs rgyas kyis ma dgongs pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba ma bstsags pa/ bsam pa yongs su ma dag pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i dbang po ma thob pa/ shes rab kyi mig dang mi ldan pa rnams
256a7(phal chen): kyis thos pa 'am/ yongs su gzung ba 'am/ yid ches pa 'am/ khong du chud par bya bar mi nus so/ /smras pa/ sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi gzungs kyi dad pa dang / mos par bgyi nas
256a8(phal chen): 'phags pas bdag la bka' mi bstsal tam/ des smras pa rigs kyi bu nga ni shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten kyi khams dpal gyi snying po dang ldan pa na de bzhin gshegs pa dpal kun nas yang dag par 'byung ba'i sangs rgyas
256b1(phal chen): kyi zhing nas 'ongs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dpal kun nas yang dag par 'byung ba'i zhabs kyi drung nas ngas byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa sgo kun tu 'gro ba 'di thob po/ /rigs kyi bu 'jig rten gyi khams dpal
256b2(phal chen): gyi snying po dang ldan pa de nas nga song nas ni bskal pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed gcig 'das te/ sems bskyed pa re re zhing yang gom pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med
256b3(phal chen): pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed gcig bor ro/ /gom pa re res kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag thams cad kyang de bzhin gshegs pa dang ldan par shes te/ sangs rgyas
256b4(phal chen): b com ldan 'das de dag la'ang de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod pa bla na med pa yid kyis rang bzhin chos nyid mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i rgyas btab pa de bzhin gshegs pas gnang bas byang chub sems dpa'i dga' ba yongasu
256b5(phal chen): bskyed pas mchod pa byas so/ /'jig rten gyi khams de dag na sems can gyi khams rgya mtsho ji snyed pa de dag thams cad kyang mthong ste/ de dag thams cad kyi sems rgya mtsho yang khong du chud do/ /de dag thams cad kyi
256b6(phal chen): dbang po'i 'khor lo yang yongs su shes shing bsam pa dang / mos pa ji lta ba bzhin du gzugs kyi lus yongs su ston to/ /chos kyi dbyangs rab tu bsgrags so/ /'od kyi dkyil 'khor yongs su bkye'o/ /yo byad sna
256b7(phal chen): tshogs bas kyang nye bar btung ngo / /rang gi lus kyang de dag la byin gyis brlabs te/ de ni yongs su smin par bya ba dang / gdul ba'i sbyor ba rgyun mi gcod pa'i phyir ro/ /shar phyogs nas ji ltar 'ongs pa de bzhin du lho phyogs
256b8(phal chen): dang nub phyogs dang / byang phyogs dang / byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams dang / shar lho'i phyogs mtshams dang / lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams dang / nub byang gi phyogs mtshams dang / 'og dang steng gi phyogs nas kyang de bzhin te/ rigs kyi bu ngas ni byang chub
257a1(phal chen): sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa'i sgo kun nas 'gro ba zhes bya ba 'di shes par zad na/ ngas byang chub sems dpa' phyogs kun tu mngon par gzhol ba/ tha mi dad pa'i ye shes kyi yul dang ldan pa chos kyi dbyings
257a2(phal chen): thams cad du lus rnam par bkod pa/ sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa dang / mos pa ji lta ba bzhin du mthun par spyod pa/ zhing thams cad lus kyis rgyas par 'gengs pa/ chos thams cad kyi rgyud kyi rjes su song ngo / /
257a3(phal chen): dus gsum gyi rgyud mnyam pa nyid du gyur pa/ chos kyi phyogs kyi rgyud dang mnyam pa nyid du gyur pa'i lus dang ldan pa/ 'gro ba'i rgyud thams cad du rnam par ldang ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rgyud thams cad la rnam par rtog
257a4(phal chen): pa med pa/ chags pa med pa'i rgyud thams cad khong du chud pa/ gnas med pa'i rgyud la rab tu gnas pa de dag gi spyod pa shes pa 'am/ yon tan brjod par nus re skan/ song rigs kyi bu lho phyogs kyi rgyud 'di nyid na grong khyer
257a5(phal chen): sgo dang ldan pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na lha lha chen po zhes bya ba 'dug gis de'i gan du song la/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bya ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bya ba dris shig /
257a6(phal chen): de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis byang chub sems dpa' gzhan du mi 'gro ba'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ byang chub sems dpa' gzhan du mi 'gro ba la lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su
257a7(phal chen): bskor ba byas nas yang dang yang bltas te/ byang chub sems dpa' gzhan du mi 'gro ba'i drung nas song ngo / /de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rgya chen po'i rjes su song ba'i bsam
257a8(phal chen): pa dang ldan pa/ byang chub sems dpa' gzhan du mi 'gro ba'i ye shes kyi spyod yul 'dod pa'i ngang tshul can mngon par shes pa chen po mngon par bsgrub pa'i yul la yon tan gyi khyad par du blta ba/ brtson 'grus brtan pa'i
257b1(phal chen): go cha rab tu dga' ba'i khyad par thob po/ /bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rnam par thar pas rnam par brtse ba'i rjes su song ba'i bsam pa dang ldan pa/ de byang chub sems dpa'i yon tan kyi sa la ni nan tan byed/ ting nge 'dzin
257b2(phal chen): gyi sa la ni rnam par dpyod/ gzungs kyi sa la ni rab tu gnas par byed/ smon lam gyi sa la ni 'jug par byed/ so so yang dag par rig pa'i sa la ni rjes su slob/ stobs kyi sa la ni yongs su bsgrub cing mthar gyis
257b3(phal chen): grong khyer sgo dang ldan pa gang na ba der song ste/ lha lha chen po kun du dris pa dang / de la 'gro ba mang pos bstan pas/ rigs kyi bu 'di re/ lha lha chen po grong khyer gyi lam kyi mdo na bdag nyid shin tu che bas/ sems can
257b4(phal chen): rnams la chos ston cing 'dug go/ /de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs lha lha chen po gang na ba der song ste/ lha lha chen po'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal nas/ mdun du 'dug ste thal mo sbyar nas
257b5(phal chen): 'di skad ces smras so/ /'phags pa bdag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed na/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang /
257b6(phal chen): ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba ma 'tshal te/ 'phags pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams la gdams ngag dang rjes su bstan pa mdzad do zhes bdag gis thos na/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems
257b7(phal chen): dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba 'phags pas bdag la bshad du gsol/ de nas lha lha chen pos lag pa bzhi phyogs bzhir brkyang ste/ rgya mtsho chen po bzhi las shin
257b8(phal chen): tu myur ba'i shugs kyis chu blangs te/ bdag gis gdong bkrus nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs la gser gyi me tog gis gtor te/ 'di skad ces smras so/ /rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni
258a1(phal chen): mthong bar shin tu dka' ste/ thos par yang rab tu dka'o/ /skyes bu mchog gi me tog pun da ri ka ni 'jig rten gyis phul du bya ba yin pas/ ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba yin te/ 'jig rten gyi gnas su gyur
258a2(phal chen): pa'o/ /'gro ba'i rten du gyur pa'o/ /sems can rnams la snang ba chen po 'byin pa'o/ /lam la rmongs pa la lam bde bar ston pa'o/ /chos kyi tshul du gzung ba la mgon du gyur pa'o/ /thams cad mkhyen pa'i
258a3(phal chen): grong khyer du phyin par bya ba la ded dpon chen por gyur pa ste/ de la kho bo 'di snyam du sems so/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi ming ni sems dri ma med pa rnams la rang gi lus kyi gzugs ston cing
258a4(phal chen): lus rnam par dag pa rnams la mngon par snang ba dang / ngag gi nyes pa spangs pa rnams la dbyangs kyi snang ba yongs su gnon par byed pa dang / bsam pa dag pa rnams la dus thams cad du mngon sum du gyur par
258a5(phal chen): gnas pas/ lta ba ngan pa 'joms pa yin par bsam mo/ /rigs kyi bu kho bo ni byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa sprin gyi dra ba thob bo/ /smras pa 'phags pa byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa'i sprin
258a6(phal chen): gyi dra ba de'i yul ji lta bu zhig mchis/ de nas lha lha chen pos tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyi mdun du ri chen po tsam gyi gser gyi phung po dang / dngul gyi phung po dang / bai DUr+ya'i phung po dang / shel gyi phung po dang /
258a7(phal chen): mu sa ra gal pa'i phung po dang / a sma gar ba'i phung po dang / nor bu rin po che ngang gis snang ba'i phung po dang / nor bu rin po che dri ma med pa'i snying po'i phung po dang / nor bu rin po che rnam par snang ba'i phung po dang /
258a8(phal chen): nor bu rin po che phyogs kun tu mngon pa'i phung po dang / gtsug gi nor bu rin po che dang / cod pan gyi phung po dang / nor bu rin po che sna tshogs kyi se mo do'i phung po dang / dpung brgyan gyi phung po dang / gdu bu'i phung po dang /
258b1(phal chen): ske rags kyi phung po dang / rkang gdub kyi phung po dang / mu tig dmar po'i dra ba'i phung po dang / nor bu rin po che sna tshogs kyi phung po dang / yan lag dang nying lag thams cad kyi rgyan kyi phung po dang / nor bu rin po che
258b2(phal chen): yid bzhin gyi rgyal po'i phung po dang / me tog thams cad dang / spos thams cad dang / bdug pa thams cad dang / phreng ba thams cad dang / byug pa thams cad dang / phye ma thams cad dang / gos thams cad dang /
258b3(phal chen): gdugs thams cad dang / rgyal mtshan thams cad dang / lha'i ba dan thams cad dang / rol mo brdung ba thams cad dang / rol mo dkrol ba thams cad dang / 'dod pa'i yul thams cad dang / bu mo bye ba thams
258b4(phal chen): cad dang / bu mo bye ba brgya stong grangs med pa dag kyang nye bar bstan nas/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs la 'di skad ces smras so/ /rigs kyi bu 'di dag las khyer la/ sbyin pa mang po ni byin gcig /bsod nams
258b5(phal chen): mang po ni gyis shig / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la mchod cig /sems can mang po ni sbyin pas bsdu ba'i dngos pos yongs su bsdus te/ gtong ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa la khod cig /'jig rten ni
258b6(phal chen): sbyin pa la slobs shig / gtang bar dga' ba yongs su gtong ba ni ston cig /rigs kyi bu khyod la kho bos ji ltar yo byad kyi rnam pas bstan pa 'di bzhin du sbyin pa'i bstan pa dang / ma bral ba'i sems can
258b7(phal chen): tshad med pa dag gi bsam pa'i rgyud kyang gtong bas yongs su bsgo ba byed do/ /sangs rgyas dang chos dang dge 'dun dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams la'ang dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed
258b8(phal chen): cing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par bskul ba byed do/ /rigs kyi bu gzhan yang kho bo ni sems can 'dod pa'i dga' bas myos pa/ yul gyi longs spyod la yongasu
259a1(phal chen): chags pa rnams la yul de dag mi sdug par byin gyis brlabs so/ /khro bas non pa dang nga rgyal can dang rgyags shing dregs pa dang / rlom pa tshar gcad pas/ 'dul ba rnams la ni gtum zhing srin po
259a2(phal chen): ltar mi sdug la 'jigs pa'i lus sha za zhing khrag 'thung ba'i tshul dang ldan par bstan te/ rlom pa dang snyems pas 'khrug pa de dag thams cad zhi bar byed do/ /le lo can brtson 'grus bor ba'i sems can rnams
259a3(phal chen): la ni me dang chu dang / rgyal po dang rkun po dang / gnod pa'i 'jigs pa yongs su bstan cing skyo bar byas te/ brtson 'grus rtsom pa la dgod par byed de/ de ltar thabs de dang de dag pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad kyi
259a4(phal chen): phyogs dang mi mthun pa rab tu gzhom pa dang / pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad kyi tshogs bstsag pa dang / sgrib pa'i ri g.yang sa'i lam thams cad las yang dag par bzla ba dang / sgrib pa med pa'i chos la gzud pa'i phyir
259a5(phal chen): mi dge ba thams cad las rnam par bzlog ste/ dge ba thams cad phun sum tshogs pa la yang dag par dgod pa byed do/ /rigs kyi bu kho bos ni byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa sprin gyi dra ba 'di shes par zad
259a6(phal chen): na/ kho bos byang chub sems dpa'i dbang po ltar nyon mongs pa'i lta ba ma yin rab tu 'joms pa/ chu ltar 'gro ba thams cad kyi sdug bsngal kyi me'i phung po zhi bar byed pa/ me'i phung po ltar 'gro ba thams cad kyi
259a7(phal chen): sred pa'i chu skems pa/ rlung ltar 'dzin pa'i mngon par chags pa thams cad kyi ri rnam par 'thor ba/ rdo rje ltar bdag gi 'du shes sra ba'i brag rab tu rnyil ba/ de dag gi spyod pa shes pa 'am yon tan brjod par nus
259a8(phal chen): re skan/ song rigs kyi bu 'dzam bu'i gling 'di nyid kyi yul ma ga d+ha'i snying po byang chub nas sa'i lha mo brtan ma zhes bya ba 'dug gis de'i gan du song la ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la
259b1(phal chen): bslab par bya ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bya ba dris shig /de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis lha lha chen po'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ lha lha chen po la lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su
259b2(phal chen): bskor ba byas te/ yang dang yang bltas te/ lha lha chen po'i drung nas song ngo / /de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs mthar kyis yul ma ga d+ha'i snying po byang chub tu sa'i lha mo brtan ma gang na ba der song ba dang de 'gro ba'i tshe
259b3(phal chen): sa'i lha mo brgya stong phrag bcu gcig la gcig 'di skad ces 'dzer to/ /sems can thams cad kyi rten du 'gyur ba zhig ni 'di nas tshur 'ong ngo / /de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po can thams cad kyi ma rig pa'i
259b4(phal chen): sgo nga'i sbubs 'dral bar 'gyur ba zhig ni 'di nas tshur 'ong ngo / /chos kyi rgyal po'i rigs su byung ba chags pa med cing dri ma med pa'i chos kyi rgyal po'i go 'phang dam pa 'thob par 'gyur ba zhig ni 'di nas tshur 'ong
259b5(phal chen): ngo / /ye shes kyi mthu bo che rdo rje'i mtshon cha can dpa' bo phas kyi rgol ba'i 'khor thams cad rab tu 'dul ba zhig ni 'di nas tshur 'ong ngo zhes nas/ de'i mod la lha mo brtan ma la stsogs pa/ sa'i lha mo brgya stong
259b6(phal chen): phrag bcus sa chen po rab tu bskyod de/ 'brug sgra zab mo lta bu'i sgra chen po grag par byas nas/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'od chen pos snang bar byas te/ lus rin po che'i rgyan dang / lhab
259b7(phal chen): lhub thams cad kyis shin tu brgyan pa/ glog gi phreng ba'i tshogs nam mkha'i dbyings las 'gyu zhing snang ba lta bu sha stag du byas te/ shing thams cad kyi myu gu ni skye bar byed/ me tog gi shing thams cad ni kha 'bu bar
259b8(phal chen): byed/ chu klung gi rgyun thams cad ni 'bab par byed/ mtsho dang 'tshe'u dang lu ma thams cad ni rgyas par byed/ spos chu'i char ni rab tu 'bab par byed/ me tog gi sprin rab tu 'thor ba'i rlung chen po ni ldang bar byed/
260a1(phal chen): sil snyan bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong ni rab tu sgra sgrog par byed/ lha rdzas kyi gzhal med khang dang rgyan kyi tshogs mang po ni rab tu 'khrol bar byed/ ba lang dang khyu mchog dang / glang po dang / stag dang / ri dgas kyi
260a2(phal chen): dbang po ni rab tu sgra 'byin par byed/ lha dang lha ma yin dang / klu dang 'byung po'i dbang po rnams ni 'brug sgra 'byin par byed/ ri'i dbang po chen po rnams ni phan tshun thug par byed/ gter gyi tshogs bye ba brgya stong
260a3(phal chen): ni mngon du byung bar byed cing sa'i 'og nas 'thon to/ /de nas sa'i lha mo brtan mas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs la 'di skad ces smras so/ /rigs kyi bu khyod 'dir 'ongs pa legs so/ /sa'i phyogs 'di ni sngon
260a4(phal chen): khyod kyi gnas su gyur te/ kho mo'i mngon sum du dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa yin na/ de'i rnam par smyin pa'i phyogs 'ga' tsam blta bar 'dod dam/ de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis sa'i lha mo brtan ma'i rkang
260a5(phal chen): pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ sa'i lha mo brtan ma la lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas/ sa'i lha mo brtan ma'i mdun du 'dug ste thal mo sbyar nas 'di skad ces smras so/ /
260a6(phal chen): 'phags ma 'tshal lo/ /de nas sa'i lha mo brtan mas rkang pa'i mthil kyis sa chen po la brdabs te/ rin po che'i gter bye ba brgya stong grangs med pa rab tu brgyan pa bstan nas 'di skad ces smras so/ /rigs kyi bu
260a7(phal chen): rin po che'i gter bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong 'di dag kyang khyod kyi rjes su 'brang ngo / /khyod kyi sngon du 'gro ba'o/ /khyod kyis ci dga' bar spyod par bya'o/ /khyod kyi bsod nams kyi rnam par smyin pa las byung ba'o/ /
260a8(phal chen): khyod kyi bsod nams kyi stobs kyis bsrung ba'o/ /'di las long ste/ khyod kyis ci dgos pa de dag gyis shig /rigs kyi bu gzhan yang kho mo ni byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa ye shes thob
260b1(phal chen): par dka' ba'i snying po can thob pa ste/ de ltar kho mo ni byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa 'di dang ldan pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa mar me mdzad tshun chad du byang chub sems dpa'i rjes su 'brang zhing / rtag tu bsrung
260b2(phal chen): ba la zhugs pa ste/ de tshun chad du rigs kyi bu kho mo byang chub sems dpa'i sems kyi spyod pa la rnam par spyod do/ /ye shes kyi yul la 'jug go/ /smon lam gyi dkyil 'khor khong du chud par byed do/ /byang chub sems
260b3(phal chen): dpa'i spyod pa rnam par dag pa rjes su rtogs par byed do/ /ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi tshul gyi rjes su 'gengs so/ /byang chub sems dpa'i mngon par shes pa thams cad dang / sems rgya chen pos rgyas par 'gengs so/ /
260b4(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi stobs kyis dbang bsgyur ba dang / zhing gi dran pa thams cad rgyas par dgang ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis lung bstan pa yang dag par mnod pa dang /
260b5(phal chen): dus thams cad du mngon par 'tshang rgya ba yang dag par bstan pa dang / chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i tshul thams cad dang / mdo sde yang dag par brjod pa'i chos kyi sprin gyi tshul thams cad dang / chos snang
260b6(phal chen): ba chen pos snang bar bya ba'i tshul dang / sems can thams cad yongs su smyin par bya ba'i tshul dang / sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa thams cad yang dag par bstan pa'i tshul yang rjes su rtogs par byed
260b7(phal chen): do/ /yang dag par 'dzin to/ /yang dag par nod do/ /rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa ye shes thub par dka' ba'i snying po can 'di yang bskal pa ri rab kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi
260b8(phal chen): pha rol de'i yang pha rol tu 'jig rten gyi khams zla ba'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya bar bskal par snang bas rnam par brgyan pa la de bzhin gshegs pa spyan bzangs po las thob ste/ rigs kyi bu de ltar
261a1(phal chen): kho mo byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa ye shes thub par dka' ba'i snying po can 'di la ni yongs su dpyod dpyod/ rnam par dpyod dpyod/ shin tu dpyod dpyod/ yang dag par 'phel bar byed byed/ shin tu
261a2(phal chen): rgyas par byed byed pas/ bskal pa bzang po la thug gi bar du de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba dang ma bral lo/ /de srid kyi bar kyis kho mos de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzog pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med
261a3(phal chen): pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed cig bsnyen bkur to/ /de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad snying po byang chub tu gshegs pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa yang mthong ste/ kho mo ni de bzhin gshegs pa de dag
261a4(phal chen): thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba mngon sum du mthong ba'o/ /rigs kyi bu kho mos byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa ye shes thub par dka' ba'i snying po can 'di shes par zad na/ kho mos byang chub sems dpa' de
261a5(phal chen): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi zham ring du 'brang ba/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gsung gi rjes su 'brang ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes 'jug par dka' ba la rab tu zhugs pa/ sems kyi skad cig gcig
261a6(phal chen): gis chos kyi dbyings thams cad rgyas par 'gengs pa'i shugs dang ldan pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa dang mnyam pa nyid du gyur pa'i lus dang ldan pa/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dgongs pa dri ma med pa'i snying por
261a7(phal chen): gyur pa/ sangs rgyas 'byung ba thams cad rtag tu mngon par bsgrubs pa/ sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las tha mi dad pa'i pho nyar gyur pa/ de dag gi spyod pa shes pa'am/ yon tan brjod par nus re skan/ song rigs kyi bu 'dzam bu'i
261a8(phal chen): gling 'di nyid kyi yul ma ga d+ha zhes bya ba na grong khyer ser skya'i gnas zhes bya ba yod de/ de na mtshan mo'i lha mo dpyid dang ldan pa zhes bya ba 'dug gis de'i gan du song la/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod
261b1(phal chen): pa la bslab par bya ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bya ba dris shig /de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis sa'i lha mo brtan ma'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ sa'i lha mo brtan ma la lan brgya stong du mar
261b2(phal chen): g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas yang dang yang bltas te/ sa'i lha mo brtan ma'i drung nas song ngo / /de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs sa'i lha mo brtan ma'i gdams ngag rjes su dran par byed cing / byang chub sems
261b3(phal chen): dpa'i rnam par thar pa ye shes thub par dka' ba'i snying po can de rjes su dran par bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin bsgom pa de rab tu goms par bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa'i ye shes
261b4(phal chen): shin tu phra ba de la rnam par blta ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa'i ye shes rgya mtsho de la 'jug par bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa'i ye shes tha dad pa la yid ches bya ba dang / byang chub
261b5(phal chen): sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa'i ye shes shin tu sbyang ba de rjes su rtogs par bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa'i ye shes rgya mtsho de la 'bab par bya ba byed cing / grong khyer chen po ser skya'i gnas gang na
261b6(phal chen): ba der phyin te/ grong khyer chen po ser skya'i gnas la g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas/ shar phyogs logs kyi grong khyer gyi sgo nas song ste/ nyi ma nub nas ring po ma lon pa zhig du grong khyer gyi lam gyi sum mdo'i
261b7(phal chen): dbus shig na/ byang chub sems dpa'i gdams ngag 'thun par len pa de mtshan mo'i lha mo dpyid dang ldan pa mthong bar 'dod cing / dge ba'i bshes gnyen yod na sangs rgyas kyi ye shes thob par 'gyur bar rings pa'i
261b8(phal chen): blo gros dang ldan pa/ ye shes kyi mig kun tu lta ba'i yul gyi rang bzhin byin gyis rlabs dang ldan pa/ phyogs thams cad du mngon par gzhol zhing / dge ba'i bshes gnyen blta ba'i sems kyis mos pa dang /
262a1(phal chen): ye shes chen po'i snying por gyur pa'i 'du shes kyi sems dang ldan pa/ dmigs pa thams cad la rab tu zhugs pa'i ye shes kyi mig dang ldan pa/ chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul thams cad du ye shes rgya mtsho 'byam
262a2(phal chen): klas pas rgyas par 'gengs pa dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin kyi mig gis phyogs thams cad du shes bya'i rgya mtsho la rnam par blta ba/ ye shes chen po'i mig 'thob par bya ba la rab tu gzhol zhing bsam pa rtse gcig
262a3(phal chen): du bzhag nas 'dug 'dug pa dang / mtshan mo'i lha mo dpyid dang ldan pa der grong khyer chen po ser skya'i gnas kyi steng gi nam mkha'i dbyings las nor bu rin po che sna tshogs dpe med pa'i khang pa brtsegs pa zhig na/ rin po
262a4(phal chen): che'i seng ge'i khri chen po spos zhim po thams cad kyi pad mo'i snying po can zhig la lus kyi mdog gser gyi kha dog du 'dug pa/ skra 'jam zhing mang la mthon thing du 'dug pa/ mig dkar nag 'byes pa/ gzugs bzangs
262a5(phal chen): shin tu mdzes pa/ blta na sdug pa/ lus rgyan dang lhab lhub thams cad kyis klubs shing brgyan pa/ kha dog bsgyur ba'i gos bgos pa tshangs pa'i gtsug tor gyi cod pan zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyis brgyan pa thogs pa
262a6(phal chen): lus la rgyu skar dang / gza' dang skar chen dang / skar ma'i tshogs thams cad kyi gzugs brnyan snang bar gyur pa 'dug pa mthong ngo / /des sems can gyi khams yangs par mi khom pa dang / ngan song dang / ngan 'gro dang /
262a7(phal chen): log par ltung ba nas sems can ji snyed cig yongs su dgrol ba de dag kyang de'i ba spu'i sbubs su chud par mthong ngo / /ji snyed gcig mtho ris kyi 'jig rten du bkod pa dang / ji snyed gcig nyan thos dang / rang sangs
262a8(phal chen): rgyas kyi byang chub dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su smyin par byas pa/ de dag thams cad kyang de'i ba spu'i sbubs su chud par mthong ngo / /gzugs mngon par bsgrub pa dang /
262b1(phal chen): kha dog mngon par bsgrub pa'i thabs sna tshogs kyis ji snyed gcig yongs su smyin par byas pa de dag kyang de'i ba spu'i sbubs su chud par mthong ngo / /nga ro mngon par bsgrub pa dang / dbyangs kyi yan lag mngon par bsgrub pa dang /
262b2(phal chen): skad kyi tshul sna tshogs yongs su sbyar ba ji snyed gcig gis yongs su smyin par byas pa de dag kyang de'i ba spu'i sgo nas rjes su brjod pa thos so/ /dus mngon par bsgrub pa dang / bsam pa dang mos pa ji lta ba bzhin du sems gyi rjes
262b3(phal chen): su 'brang bar bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par gnon pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rnam par 'phrul pa'i sgo dang / byang chub sems dpa'i khyu mchog
262b4(phal chen): gi mthu phyung ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par spyod pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i yongs su lta ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par blta ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par 'phrul pa dang / byang chub
262b5(phal chen): sems dpa'i skyes bu seng ge chen po'i rnam par bsgyings pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pas/ rnam par brtse ba ji snyed gcig gis des sems can yongs su smyin par byas pa de dag kyang de'i ba spu'i sbubs
262b6(phal chen): su chud par mthong ngo / /des thabs sna tshogs dang ldan pa'i chos kyi tshul rgya mtsho de dag mthong zhing thos nas dga' rangs te mgu zhing nyams bde la tshim zhing yid bde ba skyes nas mtshan mo'i lha mo dpyid dang ldan pa de la lus
262b7(phal chen): thams cad kyis phab nas phyag 'tshal te/ langs nas mtshan mo'i lha mo dpyid dang ldan pa la lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas mtshan mo'i lha mo dpyid dang ldan pa'i mdun du 'dug ste thal mo sbyar
262b8(phal chen): nas 'di skad ces smras so/ /lha mo bdag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed de/ de ltar bdag gis dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis byin gyis rlabs kyis
263a1(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyi yon tan thams cad 'byung bar yang dag par mthong bas/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi phyag du bdag nyid bor ba lags na/ lha mo shul gang la brten na/ byang chub sems dpa'i stobs bcu'i sar
263a2(phal chen): 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i thams cad mkhyen pa'i shul bdag la bshad du gsol/ de skad ces smras pa dang / mtshan mo'i lha mo dpyid dang ldan pas/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs la 'di skad ces smras so/ /rigs
263a3(phal chen): kyi bu de ltar khyod dge ba'i bshes gnyen kyi byin gyis rlab nod te/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen kyi tshig mnyan par 'dod pa dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi gdams ngag la nan tan du byed pa legs so legs so/ /rigs
263a4(phal chen): kyi bu khyod ni de ltar dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi gdams ngag la nan tan du byas pa/ gdon mi za bar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nye bar 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu kho mo ni byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par
263a5(phal chen): thar pa sems can thams cad kyi mun pa rnam par sel ba'i chos kyi snang ba 'gro ba rnam par 'dul ba'i sgo thob pa ste/ bsam pa mi mnyam pa dang ldan pa'i sems can rnams la byams pa'i sems dang ldan pa'o/ /mi dge
263a6(phal chen): ba'i las kyi lam la zhugs pa rnams la snying rje'i sems dang ldan pa'o/ /dge ba'i las kyi lam la zhugs pa rnams la dga' ba'i sems dang ldan pa'o/ /sems mnyam pa dang mi mnyam par ldan pa'o/ /sems
263a7(phal chen): can rnams la mi gnyis pa'i sems dang ldan pa'o/ /kun nas nyon mongs pa rnams la rnam par byang ba'i sems dang ldan pa'o/ /nyam nga bar gyur pa rnams la yang dag par zhugs pa'i sems dang ldan pa'o/ /dma' ba la mos
263a8(phal chen): pa rnams la yangs pa la mos pa yongs su bskyed pa'i sems dang ldan pa'o/ /dbang po zhum pa rnams la brtson 'grus chen po'i shugs rnam par spel ba'i sems dang ldan pa'o/ /'khor ba la mngon par mos pa rnams la
263b1(phal chen): 'khor ba'i rgyud kyi 'khor lo las rnam par bzlog pa'i sems dang ldan pa'o/ /nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la mngon par mos pa'i sems can rnams la thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi lam la dgod pa'i sems dang ldan pa'o/ /
263b2(phal chen): rigs kyi bu de ltar kho mo de lta bu'i sems yid la bya bar ldan pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa sems can thams cad kyi mun pa rnam par sel ba'i chos kyi snang bas 'gro ba rnam par 'dul ba'i sgo 'di dang yang ldan pas
263b3(phal chen): sems can gang ji snyed gcig mun nag smag du gyur pa'i nam la mi ni nyal bar gyur/ 'byung po'i tshogs ni rgyu bar gyur/ rkun chom mang pos rgyas par gyur/ sems can mi bsrun pa'i tshul can ni phyogs su rgyu
263b4(phal chen): bar gyur/ sprin stug po nag pos ni kun nas khebs par gyur/ dud pa dang rdul gyi tshogs kyis ni 'grogs par gyur/ rdzi char mi bzad pas ni rab tu gtags par gyur/ zla skar kyi tshogs ni mi snang bar gyur/ mig
263b5(phal chen): gis bya ba'i mthu ni med par gyur pa'i mun pa la sems can gang ji snyed gcig rgya mtsho la spyod dam/ thang la spyod dam/ ri la spyod dam/ nags tshal gzhan na spyod dam/ yul gzhan na spyod dam/ grong gzhan na spyod dam/
263b6(phal chen): phyogs gzhan na spyod dam/ phyogs mtshams gzhan na spyod dam/ lam gzhan na spyod kyang rung ste/ rgya mtsho la spyod spyod pa las gru bub par gyur pa 'am/ thang la spyod spyod pa las nyam nyes pa 'am/ ri la spyod spyod
263b7(phal chen): pa las g.yang sa chen por ltung bar gyur pa 'am/ 'brog dgon pa la spyod spyod pa las kha zas kyis 'phongs par gyur pa 'am/ nags tshal thibs por sba'i zang zing la thogs sam/ tshul ma yin pa'i nyam
263b8(phal chen): nyes shig tu gyur tam/ yul gzhan na spyod spyod pa las chom pos bcom pa 'am/ grong gzhan na spyod spyod pa las mi srun pa'i tshul can gyis gtses pa 'am/ phyogs gzhan na spyod spyod pa las 'brog rmis pa 'am/
264a1(phal chen): phyogs mtshams gzhan na spyod spyod pa las mgo rmongs pa 'am/ lam gzhan na spyod spyod pa las nye zhor gyur kyang rung ste/ rigs kyi bu kho mo ni sems can de dag la thabs sna tshogs kyi sgo nas skyabs su gyur par byed pa
264a2(phal chen): ste/ 'di ltar rgya mtsho chen po la spyod pa rnams kyi rlung sprin nag po gtor ba dang / chu'i rnyog pa dang ba dang / rlung mi zad pa'i dkyil 'khor bzlog pa dang / rlabs kyi shugs chen po zhi bar bya ba dang / grong gi 'jigs
264a3(phal chen): pa las thar bar bya ba dang / phyogs bstan pa dang / chu'i lam legs par dmigs pa dang / 'gram bstan pa dang / rin po che'i gling du phyin par bya ba'i phyir lam yongs su bstan te/ yongs su sdud pa'i
264a4(phal chen): gzugs dang / ded dpon gyi gzugs dang / rta'i rgyal po rngog chen gyi gzugs dang / glang po'i rgyal po'i gzugs dang / ru sbal kyi rgyal po'i gzugs dang / lha ma yin gyi rgyal po'i gzugs dang / nam mkha'
264a5(phal chen): lding gi rgyal po'i gzugs dang / mi 'am ci'i rgyal po'i gzugs dang / lto 'phye chen po'i gzugs dang / rgya mtsho'i lha'i gzugs dang / mnyan pa'i gzugs kyis skyabs su 'gyur bar byed do/ /dge ba'i rtsa ba de
264a6(phal chen): yang 'di ltar sems can thams cad sdug bsngal gyi phung po thams cad las yongs su bzlog pa'i phyir skyabs su gyur par shog shig ces yongs su bsngo'o/ /thang la spyod pa'i sems can shin tu gnag pa'i nam la/
264a7(phal chen): sa gzhi 'od ma dang / tsher ma dang / gseg ma dang / gyo mos gang ba/ sbrul sdug pa gtum po shin tu mang ba/ thag thug dang / mi bde ba'i lam can rdul dang phyag dar shin tu 'thul ba/ rdzi char drag pos
264a8(phal chen): gtags pa/ tsha ba dang / grang ba'i sdug bsngal yod pa/ sbrul dang gcan zan kyis bag tsha ba yod pa/ mthong mi dang / chom po rgyu bar gyur pa zhig na/ mgo 'khor bar gyur pa'i sems can rnams la/ nyi ma'i gzugs dang /
264b1(phal chen): zla ba'i gzugs dang / skya rings 'char ba'i gzugs dang / skar mda' chen po'i gzugs dang / glog gi phreng ba 'byung ba'i gzugs dang / rin po che'i 'od kyi gzugs dang / gza'i 'khor gyi gzugs dang / rgyu skar
264b2(phal chen): dang skar ma'i tshogs kyi gzhal med khang gi 'od kyi gzugs dang / lha'i gzugs dang byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs kyis skyabs su 'gyur bar byed do/ /sems kyang dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis nyon mongs pa'i mun
264b3(phal chen): pa thams cad rnam par bsal ba'i phyir/ sems can thams cad kyi skyabs su shog shig par bskyed do/ /ri'i g.yang sa la spyod cing 'chi bas 'jigs skrag pa rnams kyi sro gang bya ba dang / grags pa 'dod pa'i
264b4(phal chen): dbang du gyur pa dang / snyan pa dang / sgra'i rgyal mtshan 'dod pa dang / longs spyod tshol ba dang / 'dod pa'i zil gyis non pa dang / yo byad yongs su btsal ba la brtson pa dang / 'jig rten gyi phun sum tshogs pa 'dod cing
264b5(phal chen): brtson pa dang / bu dang chung ma gtong mi phod pas thogs par gyur pa dang / lta ba'i thibs por 'khyams pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / 'jigs pa sna tshogs kyis gtses pa rnams la yang thabs sna tshogs kyi
264b6(phal chen): sgo nas skyabs su gyur par byed de/ 'di ltar ri phug dang / bya skyibs mngon par bsgrub pa dang / shing thog dang / rtsa ba bzar rung ba mngon par bsgrub pa dang / chu'i lam dang / chu mig mngon par bsgrub pa
264b7(phal chen): dang / tsha ba dang / grang ba'i gnyen po mngon par bsgrub pa dang / lam bstan pa dang / ka la ping ka'i sgra skad bsgrags pa dang / rma bya'i rgyal po'i skad 'byin pa'i dbyangs dang / sman 'bar bas snang ba'i
264b8(phal chen): gzugs dang / ri'i lha'i 'od kyi gzugs dang / ri'i phug dang sul dang / ltongs su rlag ste/ sdug bsngal sna tshogs kyis gtses pa'i sems can rnams kyi mun pa'i rab rib rnams par sal ba dang / sa'i
265a1(phal chen): gzhi mnyam par mngon par bsgrub pas skyabs su gyur par byed de/ sems kyang ji ltar bdag gis sems can ri la spyod pa 'di dag yongs su skyob pa de bzhin du 'khor ba'i ri'i lam rgyud g.yang sa la
265a2(phal chen): gnas shing rga shi'i gdon kyis zin pa de dag gi skyabs su'ang bdag 'gyur bar shog shig par bskyed do/ /nags tshal thibs po'i dra bas thogs pa'i sems can mtshan mo mun pa mun nag gis chod de/ shing dang shing
265a3(phal chen): 'phran 'dzings pa'i gseb shin tu nyam nga ba/ chu dang rtsa dang / sdong po dang 'khri shing gis lam chod de/ shing dang shing phran sna tshogs kyi nags tshal thibs pa'i nang du phyin te/ stag gi sgra thos pas skrag pa'i snying
265a4(phal chen): can don ma grub pas/ sems 'khrugs par gyur pa dang / 'jigs pa dang 'tshe ba dang / mi dga' ba sna tshogs kyis nyams mi dga' ba nags tshal stug po nas 'byung ba'i phyogs mi shes pa rnams la/ kho mo ni
265a5(phal chen): bde bar 'gro ba'i lam yongs su ston pa byed de/ sems kyang 'di ltar dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis sems can lta ba'i thibs po sna tshogs la gnas pa/ sred pa'i dra bas 'khris par gyur pa/ 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal
265a6(phal chen): sna tshogs kyis gtses pa rnams sdug bsngal thams cad las yongs su 'bral bar shog shig par bskyed de/ 'brog dgon pa la spyod pa'i sems can mun pa'i nang na/ 'thoms pa rnams kyang thabs kyi sgra
265a7(phal chen): sna tshogs kyis bde ba yongs su bskyed cing lam bstan te/ de dag 'jigs pa med pa dang / bde ba la rab tu bkod nas/ sems kyang dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis sems can 'khor ba'i 'brog dgon pa na 'thoms pa ngan
265a8(phal chen): song thams cad kyi lam du zhugs pa rnams sdug bsngal thams cad las yongs su dkrol te shin tu phun sum tshogs pas/ bde ba thams cad mkhyen pa'i lam la rab tu bkod par bya bar shog shig par bskyed de/
265b1(phal chen): rigs kyi bu yul dang ljongs la chags pa'i sems can mngon par chags pa'i rgyu las byung ba'i sdug bsngal nyams su myong bar gyur pa rnams la'ang kho mo ni skyo bar bya ba'i thabs sna tshogs kyis yul la mngon par chags
265b2(phal chen): pa de las gyen du bskyod par byed de sems kyang 'di ltar dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis sems can thams cad phung po la mngon par chags pa las gyen du bskyod de/ gnas med pa'i thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la dgod
265b3(phal chen): par bya bar shog shig par bskyed do/ /rigs kyi bu kho mo ni grong na spyod pa'i sems can khyim dang gnas kyis bcings pas glags pa rnams mtshan mo mun pa shin tu gnag pas chod pa'i nang na khyim gyi don sna tshogs
265b4(phal chen): nyams su gnod pas/ sdug bsngal bar gyur pa rnams kyang skyo bar 'gyur ba'i sgo sna tshogs kyis skyo bar byas te/ chags pa med pa'i sems yongs su bskyed nas/ chos kyi sbyin pas yongs su
265b5(phal chen): gzung ste/ tshim par byas nas brtan pa med pa'i chos la bkod do/ /sems kyang 'di ltar dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis sems can skye mched drug gi grong la gnas pa rnams 'khor ba'i lam gyi rgyud kyis
265b6(phal chen): spyod yul las gyen du bskyod de/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi spyod yul la dgod par bya bar shog shig par bskyed do/ /rigs kyi bu gang yang mtshan mo mun pa shin tu gnag pa'i nang na/
265b7(phal chen): shar phyogs la stsogs pa'i phyogs dang / phyogs mtshams re rer phyogs bslad par gyur pa/ sa'i phyogs mnyam pa la mi mnyam pa'i g.yang sar 'du shes pa dang / sgang bu
265b8(phal chen): la gshong du 'du shes par gyur te/ phyogs kyi lam dang sa tshod la mgo 'khor bar gyur pa de dag la'ang kho mo ni thabs sna tshogs kyis snang bar byas te/ phyir 'byung ba rnams la ni sgo
266a1(phal chen): ston to/ /rgol bar 'dod pa rnams la ni mu stegs yongs su ston to/ /rgol bar 'dod pa nams la ni gru yongs su ston to/ /khyim du 'gro bar 'dod pa rnams la ni khyim yongs su
266a2(phal chen): ston to/ /rnam par blta bar 'dod pa rnams la ni phyogs yongs su ston to/ /sa gzhi mtho ba dang / dma' ba yang yongs su ston to/ /sa'i phyogs mnyam pa dang / mi mnyam pa dang / gzugs kyi rnam
266a3(phal chen): pa sna tshogs kyang yongs su ston to/ /lam gyis dub pa rnams la grong dang grong khyer dang ljongs dang khams dang / rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor kyang yongs su ston to/ /tsha ba dang skom pas mnar ba rnams la yang mtsho dang
266a4(phal chen): mtshe'u dang / lu ma dang rdzing dang rdzing bu dang chu klung dang / nags tshal dang bza' shing gi ra ba dang / kun dga'i ra ba yid du 'ong ba yongs su ston to/ /sdug pa dang bral zhing phrad par rnams la pha dang ma dang bu dang chung ma dang /
266a5(phal chen): mdza' bo dang / blon po dang / gnyen bshes dang yid du 'ong ba'i gzugs kyang rnam pa sna tshogs yongs su ston to/ /sems kyang ji ltar bdag gis sems can mtshan mo mun pa mun nag gis chod pa/ mig rab rib kyis
266a6(phal chen): nyams pa phyogs bslad pa/ lam 'khor ba rnams la gzugs kyi rnam pa sna tshogs rnam par dmigs par bya ba'i phyir snang ba bskyed de/ 'od byas pa de bzhin du bdag gis yun ring po nas 'khor ba'i mun pa na gnas pa'i
266a7(phal chen): sems can yang dag pa nyid kyi phyogs la bslad pa ma rig pa'i mun par 'thoms pa ye shes kyi mig mi shes pa'i ling tog gis chod pa/ 'du shes dang sems dang lta bas phyin ci log tu gyur pa/ mi rtag pa la rtag par
266a8(phal chen): 'du shes pa dang / sdug bsngal ba la bde bar 'du shes pa/ bdag med pa la bdag du 'du shes pa/ mi sdug pa la sdug par 'du shes pa/ bdag dang sems can dang / srog dang / gso ba dang / gang zag du
266b1(phal chen): 'dzin pa dam po la gnas pa/ phung po dang khams dang skye mched la gnas pa/ rgyu dang 'bras bu la mgo 'khor ba/ mi dge ba'i las kyi lam kyi phyogs su zhugs pa/ srog gcod pa/ ma byin par len pa dang /
266b2(phal chen): 'dod pas log par g.yem pa/ rdzun du smra ba dang / phra ma zer ba dang / ngag rtsub po 'byin pa/ tshig khyal pa smra ba dang / chags sems dang ldan pa/ gnod sems dang ldan pa/ log par lta ba can/ phar mi shes pa/
266b3(phal chen): mar mi shes pa/ dge sbyong dang / bram zer mi shes pa/ dbang po mi shes pa/ skyes bu dam pa mi shes pa/ chos ma yin pa la chags shing zhen pa/ mi tshul ba'i 'dod pas zil kyis gnon pa/ log pa'i chos kyis
266b4(phal chen): yongs su 'khris pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa la skur ba 'debs pa/ chos kyi 'khor lo nub par bya ba la zhugs pa/ bdud kyi rgyal mtshan 'dzin pa/ byang chub sems dpa' la gnod par byed pa/ theg pa chen po la
266b5(phal chen): zhe sdang ba/ byang chub kyi sems la mos pa spyod par byed pa/ byang chub sems dpa' la mi snyan du brjod pa/ snod ma skams par snying ring ba/ gnod pa ma byas par dgrar len pa/ 'phags pa la skur ba
266b6(phal chen): 'debs pa/ skyes bu dam pa ma yin pas/ spyod pa'i chos kyi spyod yul can/ mchod rten dang / dge 'dun gyi dngos po la 'khu ba/ pha ma la log par sems pa/ mtshams med pa'i las byed pa/ g.yang sa chen po la
266b7(phal chen): mngon par ltas pa'i sems can rnams kyi ma rig pa'i mun pa shes rab kyi snang ba chen pos bsal te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par bskul nas/ theg pa chen po kun tu bzang
266b8(phal chen): pos stobs bcu'i ye shes kyi lam yongs su ston par gyur cig / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi tshul rgya mtsho dang /
267a1(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyi ye shes kyi spyod yul dang / sangs rgyas kyi yul dang / stobs bcu yongs su grub pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi gzungs kyi stobs dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sku gcig tu gyur pa/ yongs su
267a2(phal chen): ston par shog shig / yongs su bstan pas kyang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid kyi gnas la rab tu dgod par shog gcig par bskyed do/ /rigs kyi bu kho mo ni sems can yun ring po nas na zhing nad kyis
267a3(phal chen): yongs su skyo bas/ lus nyam chung ba dang / rgas pa dang / rga bas zil gyis non pa dang / mgon med pa dang / phongs shing dbul ba dang / log par ltung ba dang / yul gzhan du phyin pa dang / phyogs logasu zhugs pa dang /
267a4(phal chen): btson ra na 'dug pa dang / chad pas bcad pa dang / nyes pa byung ste/ rgyal pos gsad par bkri ba rnams kyang srog dang bral gyi 'jigs pa las yongs su bskyob pa'i phyir gnas so/ /rigs kyi bu de ltar kho mo
267a5(phal chen): ni sems can nad pa rnams kyi nad thams cad ni thabs thams cad kyis gso bar nan tan du byed do/ /rgas pa dang rga bas zil gyis non pa rnams la ni bsnyen bkur ba dang / rim gro dang yo byad kyi mi 'phongs
267a6(phal chen): par yongs su bsdud pa byed do/ /mgon med pa'i sems can rnams la mgon byed do/ /'phongs shing dbul ba rnams la ni nor dang / gser gyi phung pos yongs su bsdud do/ /log par ltung ba rnams
267a7(phal chen): ni don 'thun pas yongs su bsdud do/ /yul gzhan du phyin pa rnams ni rang gi yul du phyin par byed do/ /phyogs log par zhugs pa rnams ni phyogs ma nor bar 'dzud do/ /brtson ra na 'dug pa rnams ni
267a8(phal chen): brtson ra nas thar par byed do/ /chad pas gcad pa ni chad pa'i sdug bsngal las grol bar byed do/ /nyes pa byung ste/ rgyal pos gsad par bkris pa rnams ni srog gi dbugs phyin pa thob par byed do/ /sems kyang
267b1(phal chen): bdag ji ltar sems can 'di dag 'jigs pa dang / gnod pa sna tshogs las yongs su skyob cing / mgon byed pa de bzhin du bdag gis 'di rnams bla na med pa'i chos kyi yongs su bsdu bas yongs su bsdus te/ nyon mongs
267b2(phal chen): pa thams cad yongs su dkrol bar byed do/ /skye ba dang rga ba dang na ba dang / 'chi ba dang / mya ngan dang smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa las yang dag par bzla bar bya'o/ /ngan song dang log
267b3(phal chen): par ltung ba'i 'jigs pa thams cad las yongs su dkrol bar bya'o/ /dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi gzungs la rab tu dgod par bya'o/ /chos rin po che sbyin pa yongs su bsdu bas yongs su bsdu bar bya'o/ /kha na ma tho ba
267b4(phal chen): med pa'i las la rab tu dgod par bya'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku rnam par dag par bskul bar bya'o/ /rga shi yongs su med pa'i dbyings shin tu rtogs pa la rab tu dgod par bya bar bskyed do/ /rigs kyi bu kho mo ni sems
267b5(phal chen): can log pa'i lam la zhugs pa'i rnam pa thibs po sna tshogs la mngon par zhen pa/ log par lta ba'i spyod yul can lus dang / ngag dang yid kyi las nyams nga bar 'gyur ba la yongs su spyod pa/ brtul zhugs dang
267b6(phal chen): dka' thub sna tshogs la gnas pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ma yin pa la/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su 'du shes pa lus gdung ba dang / yongs su gdung ba la rab tu brtson pa/ mtsho dang 'tshe'u dang /
267b7(phal chen): lu ma dang rdzing bu dang chu klung dang / ri'i gzar dang / phyogs dang phyogs 'tshams la 'dud cing phyag 'tshal ba mos pa/ sdig pa'i grogs po'i dbang du gyur pa rnams la yang thabs sna tshogs kyis mgon du gyur par byed do/ /
267b8(phal chen): de dag sdig pa'i lta ba'i rnam pa dang / ngan song thams cad kyi g.yang sar ltung ba'i lam las rnam par bzlog go/ /'jig rten pa'i yang dag pa'i lta ba la rab tu bkod cing / lha dang mi'i phun sum tshogs pa la yongs su
268a1(phal chen): 'god de/ de bas kyang ji ltar bdag gis sems can 'di dag nyam nga ba'i nan tan dang / sdug bsngal las yongs su bkrol ba de bzhin du bdag gis sems can thams cad kyang / 'phags pa 'jig rten las 'das
268a2(phal chen): pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i lam la bkod de/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid las phyir mi ldog par byas la kun tu bzang po'i smon lam chen pos thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la dgod par bya'o/ /sems can gyi khams thams cad
268a3(phal chen): ma dul gyi bar du byang chub sems dpa'i sa las kyang mi g.yo bar bya bar bskyed do/ /de nas mtshan mo'i lha mo dpyid dang ldan pas de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa'i phyogs sems can thams cad kyi mun pa
268a4(phal chen): rnam par sel ba'i chos kyi snang bas 'gro ba rnam par 'dul ba'i sgo 'di mnan te/ bstan par bya ba'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs la tshigs su bcad
268a5(phal chen): pa 'di dag smras so/ /gti mug ma rig mun nag bstsal don du/ /sems can phan phyir kho mos chos bstan te/ /dus la bsdad cing 'gro ba bde bar byas/ /'di ni rnam thar tshul mchog zhi ba yin/ /kho mos byams
268a6(phal chen): yangs shin tu spyad pa byas/ /bskal pa mtha' yas sngon cad shin tu bsgoms/ /des ni 'jig rten rgyas bkang snang bar byas/ /nor bzangs bstan pas tshul 'di shes par gyis/ /kho mo'i snying rje rgya mtsho tshad med do/ /
268a7(phal chen): 'di las dus gsum rgyal ba 'jig rten 'byung / /des ni 'gro ba'i sdug bsngal zhi bar byed/ /nor bzangs bstan pa'i tshul 'di shes par gyis/ /'jig rten bde ba mngon par bsgrub pa dang / /ma byas 'phags pa'i bde ba
268a8(phal chen): mngon bsgrub cing / /des ni kho mo dga' mgu rangs par byed/ /rgyal sras khyod kyis tshul 'di shes par gyis/ /sangs rgyas stobs rnams yongs su sbyong byed cing / /nyan thos ye shes rnam thar 'bras bu dang / /'dus
268b1(phal chen): byas skyon las rtag tu phyir phyogs kyis/ /rgyal sras khyod kyis tshul 'di shes par gyis/ /kho mo'i mig ni rgya che yongs su dag /des ni phyogs bcu'i zhing rnams mang po mthong / /zhing dbyings de dag kun gyi rang
268b2(phal chen): byung rnams/ /byang chub shing dbang drung na bzhugs pa mthong / /sangs rgyas sku ni mtshan gyis yongs brgyan cing / /'od bzang rnam pa sna tshogs kun 'gyed de/ /ba spu kun nas 'od gzer mang 'gyed pa/ /sangs rgyas 'khor
268b3(phal chen): dang bcas pa kho mos mthong / /zhing dbyings de dag kun gyis sems can rnams/ /shi 'pho skye ba'i sgor yang kun mthong ste/ /byis pas de dag 'gro rgyud rgya mtsho na/ /'khor zhing rang rang las kyang myong bar byed/ /kho mo'i rna ba
268b4(phal chen): rgya mtsho rnam dag ste/ /der ni sgra rnams ma lus yongs su 'du/ /'gro ba kun gyi sgra skad rgya mtsho dag /kun kyang thos nas dran pas yongs su 'dzin/ /dbyangs kyi yan lag sgra skad thams cad kyis/ /dpe zla med pa'i
268b5(phal chen): gsung ni rab brgyan te/ /des ni rgyal ba 'khor lo rab tu bskor/ /de dag kho mos thos shing dran pas 'dzin/ /kho mo'i sna yi mthu yang rnam dag ste/ /chos tshul rgya mtsho dag la thogs pa med/ /rnam thar gnas rnams
268b6(phal chen): kun tu rab 'jug pa'i/ /tshul 'di rgyal sras khyod kyis shes par gyis/ /kho mo'i lce ni rgya che rab tu yangs/ /srab cing mdog dmar rin chen 'od du dag /sems can bsam pa ji bzhin de shes byed/ /rgyal sras
268b7(phal chen): khyod kyis tshul 'di shes par gyis/ /kho mo'i chos lugs shin tu rnam dag ste/ /dus gsum kun tu 'od gsal rab tu gnas/ /gzugs lus sems can bsam pa ji bzhin te/ /de dag kun gyi dad pa'i dbang pos mthong / /
268b8(phal chen): kho mo'i sems ni chags med zag pa med/ /sgra dbyangs sprin gyi nga ro ji bzhin te/ /de yi khongasu mi mchog kun chud kyang / /de la kho mo rnam dag rtog pa med/ /zhing gi dbyings kyi sems can bsam mi khyab/ /de dag sems
269a1(phal chen): kyi rgya mtsho kho mos shes/ /de dag dbang po bsam pa rab shes kyang / /de la kho mo rnam par rtog pa med/ /kho mo'i rdzu 'phrul rab yangs shin tu grub/ /des ni bsam yas zhing yang rab tu bskyod/ /lus kyi
269a2(phal chen): 'od dang mthu yang de bzhin te/ /des ni sems can gdul dka' shin tu 'dul/ /kho mo'i bsod nams rnam yangs yongs su dag /kun tu rgyan byed zad pa med pa'i mdzod/ /des ni rgyal ba rnams la mchod pa
269a3(phal chen): byed/ /'gro ba thams cad nye bar 'tsho ba 'ang yin/ /kho mo'i shes rab rnam yangs shin tu dag /des ni chos mang rgya mtsho rab tu shes/ /'gro ba kun gyi the tsom yongs su gcod/ /rgyal sras khyod kyis tshul 'di shes
269a4(phal chen): par gyis/ /dus gsum kun la kho mos zhugs gyur pas/ /sangs rgyas rgya mtsho kun kyang mthong zhing shes/ /de dag smon lam la yang rab tu zhugs/ /tshul 'di dpag yas rab tu rdzogs pa yin/ /rdul mang kun
269a5(phal chen): la zhing rnams rgya mtsho mthong / /de dag dus gsum 'jug pa de bzhin te/ /de dag kun gyi sangs rgyas rgya mtsho mthong / /'di ni kun tu gnas pa'i tshul gyis ni/ /rnam par snang mdzad byang chub sangs rgyas te/ /
269a6(phal chen): phyogs bcu rnams kyi zhing rnams yongs bkang zhing / /rdul sbubs kun gyi byang chub shing drung na/ /zhi ba'i chos rnams gsung du sgrogs pa ltos/ /de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang gyis mtshan mo'i lha mo dpyid
269a7(phal chen): dang ldan pa la 'di skad ces smras so/ /lha mo khyod bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu zhugs nas/ ji srid cig lags/ de ltar khyod tshul 'di lta bus sems can gyi don bgyi ba la sta gon tu zhugs
269a8(phal chen): pa'i rnam par thar pa de ni khyod kyis brnyes nas ji srid lags/ de skad ces smras pa dang / mtshan mo'i lha mo dpyid dang ldan pas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang la 'di skad ces smras so/ /rigs kyi bu sngon 'das pa'i
269b1(phal chen): dus ri rab kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi bskal pa'i yang / pha rol gcig tu bskal pa rab tu zhi ba'i 'od ces bya ba la/ sangs rgyas bye ba phrag lnga brgya skyes pa byung ste/ de'i 'jig rten gyi khams ni rin po che
269b2(phal chen): dpal 'byung zhes bya bar gyur to/ /'jig rten gyi khams de'i gling bzhi po 'bring po rin chen zla ba sgron ma'i 'od ces bya ba de na/ rgyal po'i gnas pad mo'i 'od ces bya ba yod de/ rgyal po'i gnas der rgyal po
269b3(phal chen): chos rab mu stegs zhes bya ba chos dang mthun pa'i rgyal po 'khor los bsgyur ba'i gling bzhi la dbang ba rin po che bdun dang ldan pa byung ste/ des sa chen po de yang ri dang rgya mtshor bcas pa'i mthas gtugs par chos
269b4(phal chen): kyis rgyas par byas nas/ bde bar gnas par byas so/ /rgyal po chos rab mu stegs de'i btsun mo chos kyi blo gros zla ba zhes bya ba byung ste/ de srod la 'dod pas mos shing dga' bar rtse rtse snyam du bsam nas nam gyi
269b5(phal chen): gung la btsun mo'i 'khor gyi gnas su phyin te nyal lo/ /de nas rgyal po'i gnas pad mo'i 'od de'i shar phyogs kyi nags tshal chen po zhi ba'i dpal 'byung ba zhes bya bar rin po che'i rgyal po rgyan thams cad kyi 'od dang ldan pa'i
269b6(phal chen): lhun can/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rnam par 'phrul pas byung ba'i byang chub kyi shing chen po'i drung du/ de bzhin gshegs pa chos thams cad rab tu sgrogs pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
269b7(phal chen): pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas nas/ de'i mthus 'jig rten gyi khams rin chen dpal 'byung ba thams cad 'od chen po de dag du ma can gyis rgyas shing gang bar gyur to/ /rgyal po'i gnas pad mo'i 'od ces
269b8(phal chen): bya ba de na mtshan mo'i lha mo zla ba shin tu rnam par dag pa'i 'od ces bya ba 'dug 'dug ste/ des rgyal po'i btsun mo chos kyi blo gros zla ba'i gan du song nas/ rgyan bkrol ba'i sgras sad par byas ste/
270a1(phal chen): 'di skad ces smras so/ /'di ltar rgyal po'i btsun mo shes par gyis shig /nags tshal chen po zhi ba'i dpal 'byung bar de bzhin gshegs pa chos thams cad rab tu sgrogs pa'i rgyal po
270a2(phal chen): zhes bya ba bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/ /de nas des rgyal po'i btsun mo de'i mdun du sangs rgyas kyi yon tan bsngags pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi
270a3(phal chen): rnam par 'phrul pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa dang / smon lam rgya cher bshad do/ /rigs kyi bu rgyal po'i btsun mo de'ang de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od kyis snang bar gyur te/
270a4(phal chen): bsam pa thag pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs nas/ des de bzhin gshegs pa de dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / nyan thos kyi dge 'dun du bcas pa la mchod
270a5(phal chen): pa dang / rim gro cher byas so/ /rigs kyi bu de ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus kyi rgyal po'i btsun mo chos kyi blo gros zla ba zhes bya ba de gzhan zhig yin pa tsam du sems na ni de ltar myi blta ste/ kho mo
270a6(phal chen): ni de'i tshe de'i dus na/ rgyal po'i btsun mo chos kyi blo gros zla ba zhes bya bar gyur to/ /rigs kyi bu kho mo ni mos pa'i sems bskyed pa de dang / de bzhin gshegs pa la bskyed pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba des/
270a7(phal chen): bskal pa ri rab kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed tshun chad du nam yang ngan song log par ltung bar ma skyes te/ sems can dmyal bar ma yin no/ /byol song gi skye gnas su ma yin/ yi dags su ma yin no/ /
270a8(phal chen): nam yang rigs dma' bar ma skyes so/ /nam yang dbang po dang mi ldan par ma gyur to/ /nam yang sdug bsngal bar ma gyur te/ de ltar kho mos rtag par lha'i nang du lha'i bdag nyid che ba nyid thob/ mi'i nang
270b1(phal chen): du ni/ mi'i bdag nyid che ba nyid thob ste/ 'di ltar sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang yang ma bral lo/ /dus ngan par yang ma skyes so/ /rigs kyi bu de ltar kho mos sangs rgyas
270b2(phal chen): g cig nas gcig tu dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed de bskal pa ri rab kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed cig tu lam bde zhing mnyam pa nas nye zho med par phyin kyang de tsam gyis kho mo'i byang chub sems dpa'i dbang po yongs su dub
270b3(phal chen): par ma gyur te/ ri rab kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi bskal pa de dag ni 'das/ bskal pa bzang po 'di'i snga rol gyi ni bskal pa chen po stong phrag bcu'i thog ma la bab pa de'i tshe/ 'jig rten gyi khams gzi
270b4(phal chen): brjid rdul gyi dri ma med pa zhes bya bar bskal pa mya ngan med cing / rdul dang bral ba zhes bya ba byung ste/ rigs kyi bu 'jig rten gyi khams gzi brjid rdul gyi dri ma med pa'i dpal de ni kun nas nyon mongs la rnam par dag par
270b5(phal chen): gyur te/ der sangs rgyas lnga brgya byung ngo / /sangs rgyas lnga brgya po de dag gi thog ma la de bzhin gshegs pa mkhyen pa dang / zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ bla na med pa/ skyes bu
270b6(phal chen): 'dul ba'i kha lo bsgyur ba/ lha dang mi'i ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ri rab rgyal mtshan spyan yangs shing zhi ba'i dpal zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ de'i tshe kho mo yang tshong dpon snyen pa rnam par grags pa'i
270b7(phal chen): bu mo shes rab snang ba'i dpal zhes bya ba gzugs mdzes shing bzang la blta na sdug pa/ kha dog shin tu mdzes shing rgyas pa dang ldan pa zhig du gyur te/ mtshan mo'i lha mo zla ba shin tu rnam par dag pa'i 'od ces bya ba de
270b8(phal chen): yang smon lam gyi dbang gis gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams rdul dang bral ba'i rgyal po'i gnas rgyal mtshan sna tshogs su mtshan mo'i lha mo mig rnam par dag pa zhes bya bar gyur te/ des kho mo mtshan mo mi nyal tsam
271a1(phal chen): zhig na/ pha ma nyal bar gyur pa dang / khyim de yang yongs su bskyod de 'od chen pos snang bar byas nas rang gi gzugs bstan te/ sangs rgyas kyi yon tan bsngags pa brjod nas/ de bzhin gshegs
271a2(phal chen): pa thog ma mngon par sangs rgyas nas zhag bdun lon te/ snying po byang chub la zhugs pa de bstan to/ /de nas kho mo pha ma gnyen bshes kyi tshogs chen po dang 'grogs te/ mtshan mo'i lha mo shin tu rnam par dag
271a3(phal chen): pa'i zla ba'i 'od sngon du bdar nas de bzhin gshegs pa de'i spyan sngar phyin to/ /de nas kho mo de bzhin gshegs pa de la mchod pa rgya chen po byas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa de'i zhal mthong ma thag tu ting nge 'dzin 'gro ba 'dul
271a4(phal chen): zhing sangs rgyas mthong bar byed pa zhes bya ba dang / ting nge 'dzin dus gsum gyi dbyings ye shes kyis snang ba'i dkyil 'khor ces bya ba yang thob par gyur to/ /de thob pas kyang kho mos bskal pa ri rab kyi rdul shin tu phra ba
271a5(phal chen): snyed po de dag kyang rjes su dran par gyur to/ /kho mo'i byang chub kyi sems de yang mngon du gyur te/ de ltar kho mos de bzhin gshegs pa de las chos bstan pa thos te/ byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa
271a6(phal chen): sems can thams cad kyi mun pa rnam par sel ba'i chos kyi snang bas 'gro ba rnam par 'dul ba'i sgo 'di yang thob par gyur to/ /de thob pas kyang 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu
271a7(phal chen): phra ba snyed lus kyi rgyas par 'gengs te/ 'jig rten gyi khams de dag de bzhin gshegs pa ji snyed cig bzhugs pa de dag thams cad kyang kho mo'i mig lam du snang zhing bdag nyid kyang de dag thams cad kyi zhabs kyi drung na 'dug
271a8(phal chen): par shes so/ /'jig rten gyi khams de dag thams cad kyang kho mo'i mig lam du snang ste/ de dag gi sgra skad rnam pa tha dad pa'i brda yang rab tu shes so/ /sems dang bsam pa dang / dbang po dang mos pa
271b1(phal chen): yang rab tu shes so/ /sngon gyi mtha'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams kyi drung du yongs su smyin par gyur pa'ang rab tu shes so/ /de dag la bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du tshim par gyur pa'i lus kyang
271b2(phal chen): yongs su ston to/ /kho mo'i rnam par thar pa de yang sems kyi skad cig re re la rnam par 'phel te/ rnam par thar pa'i sems de'i 'og ma'i sems kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams brgya'i rdul shin
271b3(phal chen): tu phra ba snyed lus kyis rgyas par 'gengs so/ /de'i 'og ma'i sems kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams stong gis rdul shin tu phra ba snyed lus kyis rgyas par 'gengs so/ /de'i 'og ma'i sems kyis
271b4(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams brgya phrag stong gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed lus kyis rgyas par 'gengs so/ /de bzhin du sems kyi skad cig re re zhing sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams brjod du med pa'i yang
271b5(phal chen): brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi bar dag lus kyis rgyas par 'gengs so/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag na de bzhin gshegs pa ji snyed cig bzhugs pa de dag thams cad kyang kho mo'i mig lam du snang ste/
271b6(phal chen): bdag nyid kyang de dag gi zhabs kyi drung na 'dug par shes so/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis chos bstan pa de dag thams cad kyang len to/ /'dzin to/ /yongs su 'dzin to/ /nye bar 'dzin to/ /de bzhin
271b7(phal chen): gshegs pa de dag gi sngon gyi tshul rgya mtsho dang / smon lam rgya mtsho la yang 'jug go/ /de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa de dag thams cad kyang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par
271b8(phal chen): bya ba'i phyir/ mngon par bsgrub bo/ /sems can ji snyed cig 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho de dag du skyes par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang / kho mo'i myig lam du snang ste/ sems can de dag gi bsam pa dang dbang po dang
272a1(phal chen): mos pa'i bye brag ji snyed pa de snyed kyi bye brag du de dag yongs su smyin par bya ba dang / gdul ba'i phyir lus byin gyis brlob ste/ de ltar kho mo'i rnam par thar pa de ni sems kyi skad cig re re la yang chos kyi
272a2(phal chen): dbyings 'byam klas pa rgyas par 'gengs pa'i tshul gyis rnam par 'phel lo/ /rigs kyi bu kho mos byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa sems can thams cad kyi mun pa rnam par sel ba'i chos kyi snang bas 'gro ba
272a3(phal chen): rnam par 'dul ba'i sgo 'di shes par zad na/ kho mos byang chub sems dpa' mtha' dang dbus med pa'i byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa dang / smon lam gyis byung ba dang / chos kyi dbyings rgya mtsho'i tshul
272a4(phal chen): 'byam klas par bdal ba la 'jug par dbang bsgyur ba/ byang chub sems dpa'i yang dag par bsgrub pa'i ting nge 'dzin ye shes rdo rje'i dpal gyis rnam par rtse ba/ 'jig rten gyis khams thams cad du/
272a5(phal chen): de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs thams cad yang dag par bzung ba la smon lam chen pos byung ba/ 'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas pa thams cad sems kyi skad gcig cig gis yongs su dag par bya ba'i bsod nams
272a6(phal chen): kyi rgya mtsho chen po yongs su grub pa/ sems kyi skad cig re re la sems can gyi khams thams cad yongs su smyin par bya ba dang / gdul ba'i ye shes la dbang bsgyur ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du sems can
272a7(phal chen): thams cad kyi sgrib pa'i mun pa thams cad rnam par sel ba'i ye shes kyi nyi ma'i mig dang ldan pa/ sems can gyi khams thams cad la theg pa chen po tha dad par dmyigs par bya ba'i mthu dang ldan pa/ 'gro ba thams
272a8(phal chen): cad kyi the tsom dang / nem nur dang / yid gnyis kyi rab rib rnam par sel ba'i blo gros kyi zla ba dang ldan pa/ srid pa'i rgya mtsho thams cad la mngon par chags pa las gyen du bskyod pa'i sgra dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor
272b1(phal chen): rnam par dag pa/ chos kyi dbyings thams cad kyis rdul gyi cha shas la rnam par 'phrul pa/ yongs su ston pa la dbang bsgyur ba/ dus gsum gyi dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor la ye shes dbyer med pa/ de dag gi spyod pa
272b2(phal chen): shes pa 'am/ yon tan brjod pa 'am/ spyod yul la 'jug pa 'am/ rnam par thar pas rnam par rtse ba yongs su bstan par nus re skan/ song rigs kyi bu yul ma ga d+ha 'di nyid kyi snying po byang chub la kho mo bla
272b3(phal chen): ma med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyed bskyed pa/ yang dang yang bskul bskul ba'i mtshan mo'i lha mo kun tu zab pa'i dpal dri ma med pa'i 'od ces bya ba 'dug gis de'i gan du song la/
272b4(phal chen): ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bya ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bya ba dris shig dang / de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang gis/ mtshan mo'i lha mo dpyid dang ldan pa la tshigs su
272b5(phal chen): bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod do/ /khyod sku shin tu rnam par dag pa mthong / /mtshan gyis rnam brgyan ri bo ji bzhin du/ /'jig rten kun las mngon 'phags 'jig rten du/ /phun sum tshogs sku
272b6(phal chen): 'jam dpal bzhin du mdzes/ /khyod kyi chos sku shin tu rnam dag ste/ /dus gsum kun tu mnyam zhing rnam mi rtog /der ni 'jig rten ma lus kun 'dus ste/ /'byung zhing rnam par 'jig kyang chags myi mnga'/ /
272b7(phal chen): lam rgyud 'byam klas thams cad kun tu yang / /khyod kyi sku ni gzugs brnyan rnam par phye/ /skar chen gza' skar tshogs pa ji bzhin du/ /spu rtse kun la 'ang khyod ni bdag gis mthong / /khyod kyi thugs yangs
272b8(phal chen): shin tu rnam dag ste/ /phyogs rnams kun tu nam mkha'i dbyings su rgyas/ /der ni mi mchog kun kyang yongs su 'du/ /khyod la ye shes myi rtog dam pa mnga'/ /zhing gi rdul snyed rnam pa sna tshogs sprin/ /khyod kyi
273a1(phal chen): spu rtse kun nas mngon mthon cing / /rgyan mangs sna tshogs char pa mngon 'bebs shing / /phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas zhabs drung rgyas par 'gengs/ /'gro ba kun snyed lus rnams mtha' yas pas/ /
273a2(phal chen): khyod kyi spu rtse kun nas mngon mthon cing / /phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten rgyas par yongs bkang nas/ /sna tshogs thabs kyi sems can rnam par spyod/ /spu rtse kun la bsam yas zhing gi rnams/ /sna tshogs rgyan ldan
273a3(phal chen): rnam pa tha dad mthong / /lam rgyud sems can khyod kyis rnam sbyangs pa/ /ji snyed de dag de bzhin kun kyang 'byung / /gang zhig khyod kyi mtshan thos dga' gyur pa/ /de dag thob bya legs thob legs par 'tsho/ /
273a4(phal chen): sems can gang gis khyod kyi sku mthong ba/ /byang chub lam la mngon du bltas par gyur/ /de ltar thos na rab tu sems dga' la/ /mthong ba tsam gyis nyon mongs zhi mdzad pas/ /bskal pa bsam yas ngan song
273a5(phal chen): gnas nas kyang / /khyod kyi zhal lta'i don du mos par bgyi/ /zhing rnams stong gi rdul snyed lus byas te/ /de snyed bskal pa rgya mtsho khyod 'dra ba'i/ /spu rtse gcig gi yon tan legs brjod kyang / /legs pa'i mthar
273a6(phal chen): phyin nam du 'ang mi 'gyur ro/ /de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang gis/ mtshan mo'i lha mo dpyid dang ldan pa la tshigs su bcad pa de dag gis mngon par bstod nas/ /mtshan mo'i lha mo dpyid dang ldan pa'i rkang pa gnyis
273a7(phal chen): la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ mtshan mo'i lha mo dpyid dang ldan pa la lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas/ /yang dang yang bltas te/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen la bsnyen bkur bya bas/
273a8(phal chen): ma ngoms bzhin du mtshan mo'i lha mo dpyid dang ldan pa'i drung nas song ngo // //sangs rgyas rmad ga cad ces bya ba shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo/ bam po bcwo brgyad pa/ de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs
273b1(phal chen): mtshan mo'i lha mo dpyid dang ldan pa thog ma byang chub tu zhugs pa'i byang chub kyi sems kyi dkyil 'khor yongs su dag pa ni khong du chud par byed/ byang chub sems dpa'i snying po yang dag par 'byung ba la ni rjes su
273b2(phal chen): dpyod/ byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam rgya mtsho la ni yongs su 'jug /byang chub sems dpa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i lam ni yongs su sbyong / byang chub sems dpa'i sa'i dkyil 'khor ni yongs su gnon/
273b3(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i dkyil 'khor ni rgya cher byed/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'byung ba rgya mtsho ni rjes su 'brang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i snang ba chen po rgya mtsho la ni rnam par blta/ 'gro ba thams cad yongs
273b4(phal chen): su bskyob pa la gzhol ba'i byang chub sems dpa'i snying rje chen po'i sprin ni rgya cher byed/ mtshan mo'i lha mo dpyid dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa dang / smon lam gyi dkyil 'khor ni zhing thams
273b5(phal chen): cad du phyi ma'i mthar byin gyis brlabs pas mngon par bsgrub cing / mtshan mo'i lha mo kun tu zab pa dri ma med pa'i 'od gang na ba der song ste/ mtshan mo'i lha mo kun tu zab pa'i dpal dri ma med pa'i 'od kyi rkang pa gnyis la
273b6(phal chen): spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ mtshan mo'i lha mo kun tu zab pa'i dpal dri ma med pa'i 'od la lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas/ mtshan mo'i lha mo kun tu zab pa'i dpal dri ma med pa'i 'od kyi
273b7(phal chen): mdun du 'dug ste/ thal mo sbyar nas 'di skad ces smras so/ /'phags ma bdag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed na/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i sa la
273b8(phal chen): spyod pa dang / ji ltar 'byung ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba ma 'tshal to/ /smras pa rigs kyi bu khyod bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed cing / byang chub sems dpa'i sa la spyad
274a1(phal chen): pa dang / 'byung ba yongs su grub pa 'dri ba legs so/ /legs so/ /rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la yongs su grub pa
274a2(phal chen): yin te/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mngon du gyur par mthong ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob pa rnam par dag pa dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sku mtshan sna tshogs dang ldan
274a3(phal chen): pa rnam par blta ba'i mig rnam par dag pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i kha dog rgya mtsho mtha' dang dbus med pa rnam par dmyigs par bya ba la 'jug pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos snang ba'i dkyil 'khor
274a4(phal chen): rgya mtsho tshad med pa la chos kyi dbyings thams cad kyi tshad kyis 'jug pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ba spu'i sgo nas 'od zer rgya mtsho sems can thams cad dang mnyam pa/ sems can sna
274a5(phal chen): tshogs kyi don du bkye ba la 'jug pa dang / ba spu'i bu ga re re nas 'od 'phro ba rin po che thams cad kyi kha dog du 'dug pa rgya mtsho ston pa dang / sems kyi skad cig re re la sangs rgyas kyi sprul pa rgya mtsho chos kyi
274a6(phal chen): dbyings thams cad rgyas par bkang zhing sems can 'dul ba'i byin gyi brlabs pa la 'jug pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung sems can thams cad kyi dbyangs kyi yan lag dang ldan pas/ dus gsum
274a7(phal chen): du byung ba'i chos kyi 'khor lo'i sgra sgrogs pas/ mdo sde thams cad kyi sprin gyi 'brug sgra 'byin pa'i dkyil 'khor la 'jug pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi mtshan rgya mtsho mtha' dang dbus med pa la 'jug pa dang /
274a8(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa yongs su bstan pas sems can 'dul ba la 'jug pa ste/ rigs kyi bu chos bcu po 'di dag dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams byang chub sems dpa'i
274b1(phal chen): spyod pa la yongs su grub pa yin no/ /rigs kyi bu kho mo ni byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa/ bsam gtan bzhi pa'i bde bas kun tu rnam par gnon pa thob ste/ rigs kyi bu kho mos ni de'i
274b2(phal chen): mthus dus gsum du gshegs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mthong ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa la'ang 'jug go/ /'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho dang /
274b3(phal chen): ting nge 'dzin mtha' dang dbus med pa'i rnam par 'phrul ba'i rgya mtsho dang / sngon gyi tshul rgya mtsho dang / mtshan rgya mtsho la 'ang 'jug go/ /de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor ba rnam
274b4(phal chen): pa tha dad pa la 'ang 'jug go/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku tshe'i tshad sna tshogs dang / dbyangs kyi yan lag rnam pa tha dad pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis chos kyi dbyings mtha' dang dbus med pa'i sku la
274b5(phal chen): 'jug ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag la dngos por mngon par zhen pa 'ang med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du bzhud pa 'gog pa'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa de dag ni bzhud pa med
274b6(phal chen): do/ /rang bzhin gyis 'byung ba med pas na/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag ni byon pa med do/ /mi skye ba'i chos nyid dang / mnyam pa'i sku mnga' phyir de bzhin gshegs pa de dag ni ma skyes so/ /mi skye ba'i mtshan
274b7(phal chen): nyid dang ldan pa'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa de dag ni ma 'gags pa'o/ /sgyu ma'i rnam pa lta bur mthong zhing rnam par dmyigs pa'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag ni bden pa ma yin pa'o/ /'gro ba thams cad
274b8(phal chen): kyi don du 'byung ba'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag ni brdzun pa ma yin pa'o/ /shi 'pho dang / skye ba las rnam par 'das pa'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag ni 'pho ba med do/ /chos kyi rang bzhin gyis
275a1(phal chen): 'jig pa med pa'i chos nyid yin pa'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa de dag ni 'jig pa med pa'o/ /ngag gi lam thams cad las yongs su 'das pa'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad ni mtshan
275a2(phal chen): nyid gcig pa'o/ /chos kyi mtshan nyid kyi rang bzhin gyi mthar thug pas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag ni mtshan nyid mi mnga' ba'o/ /rigs kyi bu kho mo ni de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad khong du chud par byed
275a3(phal chen): cing / byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa bsam gtan bzhi pa'i bde bas kun nas rnam par gnon pa 'di de bzhin gshegs pa'i bsam gtan gyi dkyil 'khor snang bas shin tu rgya cher byed do/ /shin tu yangs par
275a4(phal chen): byed do/ /khong du chud par byed do/ /rtogs par byed do/ /mnyam par byed do/ /mngon par bsgrub bo/ /gzhi snyoms par byed do/ /rab tu 'jug go/ /rnam par 'phel bar byed do/ /nges par sems so/ /nye bar rtog
275a5(phal chen): go/ /dran par byed do/ /spyod yul du byed do/ /brtan par byed do/ /snang bar byed do/ /rab tu brjod do/ /rnam par spyod do/ /rnam par 'byed do/ /tshogs su byed do/ /yid ches par byed do/ /yongs su rtog pa thams cad
275a6(phal chen): rgyu ba med pa'i snying rje chen po de la gnas te/ sems can thams cad yongs su skyob pa yang dag par gnas par spyad par sems rtse gcig tu bya ba'i phyir bsam gtan dang po bsgom mo/ /yid kyi las thams cad nye bar
275a7(phal chen): zhi bar bya ba dang / ye shes kyi stobs dang / mthus sems can thams cad yongs su bsdu ba la dga' ba'i bde ba la sems rtse gcig tu bya ba'i phyir/ bsam gtan gnyis pa la bsgom mo/ /'khor bar log par
275a8(phal chen): zhugs pa la btang snyoms su byas te/ sems can thams cad kyi rang bzhin nges par rtogs par bya ba'i phyir/ bsam gtan gsum pa la bsgom mo/ /sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa dang /
275b1(phal chen): sdug bsngal rab tu zhi bar bya ba'i phyir bsam gtan bzhi pa la sgom mo/ /thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi smon lam gyi dkyil 'khor shin tu 'dris par byas pa des/ ting nge 'dzin rgya mtsho thams cad mngon
275b2(phal chen): par bsgrub pa la mkhas par bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa rgya mtsho thams cad kyi tshul la 'jug par bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par brtse ba'i ye shes thams cad mngon par shes par
275b3(phal chen): bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pas rnam par 'phrul pa thams cad mngon par bsgrub par bya ba'i phyir/ sgo kun nas chos kyi dbyings la 'jug pa'i ye shes kyi tshul yongs su sbyong zhing / byang chub sems dpa'i
275b4(phal chen): rnam par thar pa bsam gtan zhi ba'i bde bas kun tu rnam par gnon pa 'di sgom mo/ /rigs kyi bu de ltar kho mo rnam par thar pa 'di sgom zhing thabs sna tshogs kyis sems can yongs su smyin par byed de/ 'di ltar nub
275b5(phal chen): mo zhi bar gyur pa'i dga' ba la mos pa'i sems can rnams kyis mi sdug pa'i 'du shes bskyed de/ mi dga' ba'i 'du shes dang / yongs su skyob pa'i 'du shes dang / bgegs su 'gyur ba'i 'du shes dang / 'chi ba'i
275b6(phal chen): 'du shes dang / srin mo'i 'du shes dang / mi rtag pa'i 'du shes dang / sdug bsngal ba'i 'du shes dang / bdag med pa'i 'du shes dang / snying rje med pa'i 'du shes dang / gzhan la rag las pa'i 'du shes dang /
