275b7(phal chen): rga shi'i 'du shes dang / 'dod pa'i yul dang longs spyod thams cad la dga' ba med pa'i 'du shes bskyed de/ sems can de dag kyang sems de la yongs su sgom pas/ 'dod pa'i dga' ba thams cad la/ mngon par
275b8(phal chen): dga' ba myed pas chos la mos pa'i dga' ba la 'jug cing khyim nas khyim med par rab tu 'byung ngo / /de dag dgon pa la gnas pa'i tshe 'ang chos dang mthun pa'i dad pa yongs su bskyed de/ sgra chen po 'jigs
276a1(phal chen): pa mi snyan pa'i sgra skad thams cad kyang zhi bar byed do/ /mtshan mo zhi bar gyur pa la sangs rgyas kyi chos zab mo yang dag par ston to/ /spang ba dang 'thun pa'i rkyen yang nye bar ston to/ /khyim gyi sgo
276a2(phal chen): yang rnam par 'byed do/ /lam yang yongs su ston to/ /snang bas kyang mngon par 'byed do/ /mun pas chod pa yang rnam par sel to/ /'jigs pa'ang med par byed do/ /rab tu byung ba la yang yang dag par
276a3(phal chen): bsngags par byed do/ /sangs rgyas kyi legs pa 'ang brjod do/ /chos kyi legs pa dang / dge 'dun gyi legs pa dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi legs pa yang brjod do/ /dge ba'i bshes gnyen
276a4(phal chen): gyi drung du 'gro ba la 'ang bsngags pa byed do/ /rigs kyi bu kho mo rnam par thar pa 'di la bsgom zhing sems can rnams kyi chos ma yin pa'i 'dod chags kyis zhen pa rnams kyi chos ma yin pa'i 'dod chags kyi
276a5(phal chen): yongs su rtog pa rnams kyang med par byed do/ /tshul ma yin pa'i 'dod pas gnon pa rnams/ log par yongs su rtog pa'i spyod yul can rnams kyi yongs su rtog pa de dag dang yid la bya ba de dag kyang med par
276a6(phal chen): byed do/ /sdig to mi dge ba'i chos ma skyes pa rnams mi skye ba dang / sdig to'i yongs su rtog pa skyes par gyur pa rnams kyang med par 'gyur ba'i rkyen nye bar bsgrub bo/ /dge ba'i yongs su rtogs pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang
276a7(phal chen): ldan pa/ spyod pa dang ldan pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes su gyur pa'i smon lam mngon par bsgrub pa dang ldan pa dang / byams pa'i tshul dang ldan pa dang / sems can rnams la snying rje chen pos rgyas
276a8(phal chen): par 'gengs pa dang ldan pa dang / lha dang mi'i bde ba rnam pa sna tshogs yongs su bskyed pa dang / ldan pa'i yongs su rtogs pa bskyed pa dang / skyes nas kyang tshul sna tshogs kyi rkyen nye bar bsgrub par byed pa nas
276b1(phal chen): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang mthun pa'i rkyen kyang nye bar bsgrub pa byed de/ rigs kyi bu kho mos ni byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa bsam gtan zhi ba'i bde bas kun tu rnam par gnon pa 'di shes
276b2(phal chen): par zad na/ kho mos byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa dang / smon lam gyis byung ba'i byang chub sems dpa' rnam pa mtha' yas pa'i chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes rab tu thob pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba thams
276b3(phal chen): cad kyis rnam par spel ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi mthus sems kyi snang ba rab tu thob pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yul la gnas pa'i sems dang ldan
276b4(phal chen): pa/ gnas thams cad du sgrib pa med pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi smon lam yongs su rdzogs pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ zhing rgya mtsho thams cad du zhugs pa'i sems dang ldan pa/
276b5(phal chen): sangs rgyas rgya mtsho thams cad mthong bar bya ba la zhugs pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi sprin gyi char yang dag par gtong ba'i sems dang ldan pa sems can thams cad ma rig pa'i
276b6(phal chen): mun pa rnam par sel ba/ 'khor ba'i bde ba la dga' zhing sred pa zad cing mthar phyin par gyur pa'i lam gyis/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du snang ba bskyed pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ de dag gi spyod pa shes pa 'am/ yon tan brjod
276b7(phal chen): par nus re skan/ song rigs kyi bu 'di nyid na de dang yang rgyang mi ring ste/ rnam par snang mdzad kyi snying po byang chub kyi g.yas rol gcig na/ mtshan mo'i lha mo rab tu dga' ba'i mig 'gro ba rnam par snang ba zhes
276b8(phal chen): bya ba 'dug gis de'i gan du song la/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i lam la brtson par bya ba dris shig dang / de nas mtshan mo'i lha mo kun tu zab pa'i dpal dri ma med pa'i 'od kyis de'i tshe/
277a1(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa bsam gtan bzhi ba'i bde bas kun tu rnam par gnon pa 'di nyid mnan te/ bstan par bya ba'i phyir/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs la tshigs
277a2(phal chen): su bcad de smras pa/ dus rnams kun tu 'byung ba'i bde gshegs rnams/ /mngon du bya bar mos pa'i sems dang ldan/ /de dag mig yangs rnam par dag par 'gyur/ /des ni sangs rgyas rgya mtsho mthong
277a3(phal chen): bar 'ong / /rgyal ba'i sku gsal dri ma med la ltos/ /mtshan gyis yongs su rgyan pas shin tu mdzes/ /rgyal ba'i rnam par 'phrul pa chos dbyings rnams/ /skad cig re re rgyas 'gengs de la 'ang ltos/ /byang chub
277a4(phal chen): shing drung sangs rgyas gdan rab la/ /bde gshegs rnam par snang mdzad mngon sangs rgyas/ /chos dbyings sangs rgyas par ni khyab mdzad cing / /'gro ba'i bsam pa ji bzhin 'khor lo bskor/ /rgyal bas chos nyid
277a5(phal chen): lus med rab zhi ba/ /gnyis med rang bzhin med pa thugs chud nas/ /sku gzugs bzang po mtshan gyis brgyan pa yis/ /'gro ba ma lus bkang zhing ston pa mdzad/ /sangs rgyas sku ni rgya che bsam mi khyab/ /chos
277a6(phal chen): kyi dbyings kun yongs su rgyas bkang zhing / /de ni kun tu mnyam par snang ba ste/ /rgyal ba thams cad kun tu ston pa mdzad/ /zhing rnams kun gyi rdul rab phra ba snyed/ /'od kyi dkyil 'khor mnga' ba'i sangs rgyas sku/ /
277a7(phal chen): kha dog bzang po gzhan dang gzhan snang bas/ /chos dbyings rgyas par skad cig re rer 'gengs/ /rgyal ba'i ba spu'i sgo nas 'od zer sprin/ /rgya che bsam yas mi zad mngon 'byung ba/ /de dag 'gro ba ma lus 'gengs
277a8(phal chen): byed cing / /srog chags rnams kyi nyon mongs gdung ba sel/ /sangs rgyas sprul pa rgya mtsho mi zad pa/ /rgyal ba'i spu yi 'khor nas yongs ston cing / /chos dbyings yangs pa rgyas par kun bkang ste/ /srog chags
277b1(phal chen): rnams kyi sdug bsngal ngan song sel/ /sangs rgyas gsung snyan rab tu sgrog mdzad pa/ /dbyangs kyi yan lag rgya mtsho'i sgra 'od can/ /chos char chen po rab tu 'bebs pa mdzad/ /srog chags byang chub
277b2(phal chen): bsam pa yongs su bskyed/ /bskal pa rgya mtsho spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/ /'di ni sngon chad yongs su bzung ba mdzad/ /de dag kun gyi rgyal ba rnam snang mdzad/ /zhing rnams kun tu gzugs brnyan mtshan nyid mthong / /
277b3(phal chen): de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten kun tu 'byung / /sems can re re kun la 'ang mngon par bzhugs/ /mos pa'i tshul bzhin spyod yul gzhan dang gzhan/ /de dag kho mos kun tu shes mi nus/ /rgyal sras
277b4(phal chen): dam pa thams cad ma lus par/ /bde bar gshegs pa spu gcig rtse las byung / /rnam thar de la gang rnams bsam yas pa/ /de dag thams cad kho mos shes mi nus/ /kho mo'i mdab na gnas pa'i lha mo 'di/ /
277b5(phal chen): 'jig rten mgon la mngon gyur rab tu dga'/ /ming du snang ba 'od 'phro mig ces bya/ /de la byang chub spyod pa ci 'dra dris/ /de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis mtshan mo'i lha mo kun tu zab pa'i
277b6(phal chen): dpal dri ma med pa'i 'od kyi rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ mtshan mo'i lha mo kun tu zab pa'i dpal dri ma med pa'i 'od la lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas yang dang
277b7(phal chen): yang bltas ste/ mtshan mo'i lha mo kun tu zab pa'i dpal dri ma med pa'i 'od kyi drung nas song ngo / /de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis gdams ngag gis byin gyis brlabs pa/
277b8(phal chen): dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis tshig la nan tan du bya ba'i sems yang dag par skyes pa/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi gdams ngag la sman pa la nad pa lta bu'i 'du shes kyis yongs su sbyar ba'i sems dang ldan pa/
278a1(phal chen): dge ba'i bshes gnyen mthong ba yid la byed pa ma 'khrugs pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen blta ba la sgrib pa'i ri thams cad rnam par 'thor ba'i glags rnyed pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ dge ba'i
278a2(phal chen): bshes gnyen mthong ba la sems can thams cad yongasu skyob pa'i snying rje chen po'i tshul rgya mtsho la 'jug pa thob pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen mthong ba la chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul rgya mtsho'i ye shes
278a3(phal chen): snang ba rab tu thob pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ mtshan mo'i lha mo rab tu dga' ba'i mig 'gro bar rnam par snang ba gang na ba der song ngo / /de nas mtshan mo'i lha mo rab tu dga' ba'i mig 'gro bar rnam par snang bas/ tshong dpon gyi
278a4(phal chen): bu nor bzangs de bas kyang dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi drung du 'gro ba/ dge ba'i rtsa ba'i tshogs las byung bas yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi drung du 'gro ba tshogs chen po las byung bar byin gyis brlabs so/ /
278a5(phal chen): dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi drung du 'gro ba rnam par gnon pa chen por byin gyis brlabs so/ /dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis drung du 'gro ba brtson 'grus kyi las su 'jug par dga' bar byin gyis brlabaso/ /dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi drung
278a6(phal chen): du 'gro ba bstan cing shin tu legs par byin gyis brlabs so/ /dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi drung du 'gro ba phyogs mtha' dang dbus med pa la 'jug par byin gyis brlabaso/ /dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi drung du 'gro ba yun ring por gnas pas
278a7(phal chen): byung bar byin gyis brlabs so/ /dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi drung du 'gro ba don mtha' yas pa yongs su rdzogs pa'i rnam par dmyigs par byung bar byin gyis brlabs so/ /dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi drung du 'gro ba lam gyi rgyan mtha' dang dbus
278a8(phal chen): med pa'i tshogs kyis yongs su gnon par byin gyis brlabs so/ /dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi drung du 'gro ba sgo kun nas rnam par gnon pas byung bar byin gyis brlabs so/ /dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis drung du 'gro
278b1(phal chen): ba g.yo med par 'ong bas rnam par gnon par byin gyis brlabs so/ /de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs thams cad mkhyen pa'i tshogs kyis brtson 'grus la rab tu brtson pas/ dge ba'i bshes
278b2(phal chen): gnyen gyi drung du 'gro ba dang smon lam chen po rgya mtsho mngon par bsgrub pa'i rnam par gnon pas dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi drung du 'gro ba dang / sems can gcig gi don du phyi ma'i mtha'i bskal pa'i mur thug par
278b3(phal chen): sdug bsngal nyams su blang ba'i zhe non pas/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi drung du 'gro ba dang / rdul shin tu phra ba gcig la chos kyi dbyings thams cad du sgra sgrogs cing yun ring por gnas pa'i rnam par
278b4(phal chen): gnon pa dang / brtson 'grus chen po'i go bgos pas dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi drung du 'gro ba dang / phyogs rgya mtsho 'byam klas pa thams cad du shugs kyis 'gro bas dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi drung du 'gro
278b5(phal chen): ba dang / ba spu'i sbubs gcig tu phyi ma'i mtha'i bskal par byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la gnas pas/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi drung du 'gro ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la gnas nas kyang
278b6(phal chen): sems kyi skad cig re re la thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes bgrang ba la gnas par bya bas/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi drung du 'gro ba dang / dus gsum du gshegs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par 'phrul
278b7(phal chen): pa'i rgyan dang / lam yongs su gnon par zhe non pas/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi drung du 'gro ba dang / chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul gyis rgyun tu zhugs pa'i lam yongs su gnan pas/ dge ba'i bshes gyi drung
278b8(phal chen): du 'gro ba dang / chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul thams cad la dmyigs pa las ma g.yos pa/ chos kyi dbyings kun tu rgyas par 'gengs pas dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi drung du 'gro bas mtshan mo'i lha mo rab tu dga'
279a1(phal chen): ba'i mig 'gro bar rnam par snang ba gang na ba der phyin pa dang / des mtshan mo'i lha mo rab tu dga' ba'i mig 'gro bar rnam par snang ba/ bcom ldan 'das kyi dkyil 'khor na seng
279a2(phal chen): ge'i khri me tog gi snying po bkod pa can la 'dug cing byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin kun tu bzang po'i dga' ba yangs shing dri ma med pa'i shugs kyi rgyal mtshan la mnyam par bzhag pa mthong ngo / /
279a3(phal chen): de'i ba spu'i bu ga thams cad nas sbyin pa la stsogs pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa mngon par ston pa'i sprin sems can thams cad mngon par dga' bas/ sems can thams cad kyi yid du 'ong ba/ sems can
279a4(phal chen): thams cad kyis blta na nyams su bde ba/ sems can thams cad kyis blta na sdug pa rnam pa sna tshogs 'byung ba yang mthong ste/ 'di ltar sems can thams cad la phan gdags shing brtsod pa med par
279a5(phal chen): bya ba dang / dngos po thams cad la 'phangs par brtsi ba myed par bya ba dang / sems can thams cad la sbyor ba mtshungs pas yongs su btang bar bya ba dang / sems can thams cad la mnyam pa'i sems
279a6(phal chen): su bya ba dang / sems can thams cad la brnyas pa med par yongs su btang ba dang / nang dang phyi'i dngos po thams cad yongs su gtang ba dang / dga' ba chen po yongs su btang bar bstan pa dang / 'jig rten
279a7(phal chen): t hams cad du sems can gyi bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin gyi sbyin pa'i spyod pa yongs su bstan par bya ba'i phyir sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du rnam par dmyigs pa dang mthun pa'i sgras byin pa'i
279a8(phal chen): spyod pa yongs su ston pa'i sprin dang / dus gsum du byung ba'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams gtong bar dka' ba yongs su gtong ba'i sprul pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i sprin 'thon nas/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig
279b1(phal chen): rten gyi khams 'byam klas par gtogs pa'i sems can thams cad kyis rnam par dmyigs par 'gyur ba mthong ngo / /'di lta ste byang chub sems dpa'i khyu mchog gi mthu phyung ba dang / rnam par 'phrul
279b2(phal chen): pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa thob pas/ ba spu'i bu ga thams cad nas sems can thams cad dang mnyam pa'i skye ba sna tshogs su sprul pa'i lus kyi sprin mngon par thon ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams
279b3(phal chen): cad du gtogs pa'i sems can thams cad la rgyas par khyab par byas nas/ mngon sum du brtul shugs thams cad kyi yid dam las mi g.yo bar yongs su bstan pa dang / sems can gyi khams dang
279b4(phal chen): mnyam pa'i dka' thub dang / brtul shugs kyi dkyil 'khor sna tshogs rab tu ston pa dang / 'jig rten thams cad du gnas pa med pa dang / yul thams cad la ltos pa med pa dang / 'khor ba thams cad
279b5(phal chen): du gnas pa las phyir phyogs pa dang / lha dang mi'i phun sum tshogs pa rgud pa'i sgor gzhol ba yongs su ston pa dang / mi sdug pa'i dkyil 'khor rab tu ston pa dang / 'jig rten gyi sdug bsngal ba'i 'du shes kyis
279b6(phal chen): phyin ci log rnam par bzlog pa dang / mi rtag pa dang / g.yo ba dang / 'jig pa dang / 'gyur ba'i chos nyid yongs su ston pa dang / 'du byed thams cad kyi chos nyid sdug bsngal zhing bdag med pa yongs su ston pa dang /
279b7(phal chen): de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul la gnas pa dang / mi 'bral bar mos par byed pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshul khrims shin tu dag par bya ba'i phyir/ sems can rnams la yang dag par bskul ba dang /
279b8(phal chen): sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin gyi sgras tshul khrims kyi spyod pa yongs su ston pa dang / sems can thams cad yongs su tshim par byed pa'i tshul khrims kyi dri zhim po yongs su ston par byed cing /
280a1(phal chen): sems can thams cad yongs su smin par byed pa mthong ngo / /ba spu'i sgo thams cad nas sems can thams cad dang / mnyam pa'i lus kha dog sna tshogs su sprul pa'i sprin mthon ste/ yan
280a2(phal chen): lag dang nying lag thams cad kyang nyams su bzod pa sems can thams cad la yongs su ston pa dang / sems can thams cad gyis lus la gnod par tho brtsams kyang nyams su bzod par byed pa dang sems can
280a3(phal chen): thams cad kyi tshul dang mi 'dra ba'i tshigs gyis spyod pa dang / brgyad pa dang / smad pa dang / bskyang ba dang / brdeg pa dang / brdegs pa nyams su bzod par byed pa dang / sems can thams cad kyis mi bsgul ba
280a4(phal chen): yongs su ston pa dang / rim gror bya ba dang / rim gror ma byas pa thams cad kyis mtho ba dang dma' bar mi 'gyur ba yongs su ston pa dang / sems can thams cad la nga rgyal med pa yongs su ston pa dang /
280a5(phal chen): chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin la bzod pa mi zad pas ye shes mi zad pa yongs su ston pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa thams cad yongs su spang ba'i phyir bzod pa'i spyod pa yongs su ston pa dang / sems
280a6(phal chen): can thams cad kyis lus dbyibs mi sdug cing / kha dog mi mdzes pa'i gzugs rnam par bzlog pa byed pa dang / sems can thams cad la de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mdog rnam par dag pa bla na med pa yongs
280a7(phal chen): su ston cing sems can yongs su smin par bya ba mthong ngo / /ba spu'i sgo thams cad nas sems can thams cad dang mnyam pa'i skye ba sna tshogs kyi lus kha dog dang dbyibs dang / chu shing sna tshogs su sprul pa'i
280a8(phal chen): sprin mthon ste/ sems can rnams kyi bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du rgyas par khyab par byas nas/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi tshogs chen po la brtson 'grus kyi sngon du 'dor ba/ yang dag par ston
280b1(phal chen): pa dang / bdud kyi dkrugs ma thams cad rnam par 'thor ba'i brtson 'grus dang / byang chub du brtsams pa mi 'khrugs mi zlogs pa'i brtson 'grus dang / sems can thams cad 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho las rab
280b2(phal chen): tu bsgral ba'i brtson 'grus dang mi khom pa dang ngan song dang / ngan 'gro dang log par ltung ba'i lam thams cad rnam par bzlog pa'i brtson 'grus dang / mi shes pa'i ri rnam par gtor ba'i brtson 'grus dang / de bzhin
280b3(phal chen): gshegs pa thams cad mchod cing bsnyen bkur bas yongs su mi skyo ba'i brtson 'grus dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khor lo yang dag par blang ba dang / yongs su bzung ba'i brtson 'grus dang /
280b4(phal chen): sgrib pa thams cad kyi ri rab tu gzhom zhing rnam par gtor ba'i brtson 'grus dang / sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba dang / gdul bas mi skyo ba'i brtson 'grus dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing
280b5(phal chen): thams cad yongs su dag par bya ba'i brtson 'grus dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i brtson 'grus rnam par dag pa bla na med pa yongs su ston cing / sems can yongs su smin par byed pa mthong ngo / /ba spu'i
280b6(phal chen): sgo thams cad nas lus sna tshogs kha dog dbyibs rnam pa tha dad par sprul pa'i sprin 'thon ste/ thabs sna tshogs kyis sems can rnams kyi dga' ba yongs su bskyed pa dang / yid bde ba rnam par bzlog
280b7(phal chen): pa dang / 'dod pa'i dga' ba thams cad rnam par smod pa dang / ngo tsha shes pa'i chos nyid 'jig rten du sgrog pa dang / dbang po bsdam pa la sems can rnams rab tu dgod pa dang / tshangs pa'i spyod pa bla
280b8(phal chen): na med pa yang dag par bsngags pa byed pa dang / 'dod pa'i 'jig rten gyi bdud kyi yul 'jig pa dang bcas par yongs su ston pa dang / 'dod pa'i dga' ba dang bral ba rnams la 'jig rten
281a1(phal chen): gyi 'dod pa dang / dga' ba'i yul thams cad yongs su ston pa dang / chos la mos shing dga' ba la sems can rab tu dgod pa dang / mthar gyis bsam gtan dang / ting nge 'dzin dang snyoms
281a2(phal chen): par 'jug pa'i sgo mngon par bsgrub pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa thams cad rnam par gsal ba la nges par rtogs pa'i sems yongs su brjod pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin
281a3(phal chen): rgya mtsho'i rnam par 'phrul ba thams cad yongs su ston pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i mngon par shes pa dang / rnam par 'phrul pa dang / khyu mchog gi mthu phyung ba yongs su ston pa byed cing / sems can rnams
281a4(phal chen): kyi dga' ba yongs su bskyed pa dang / spro ba 'phel bar bya ba dang / nyams bde ba yongs su bskyed pa dang / yid mi bde ba bzlog pa dang / sems skyon med pa yongs su bsgrub pa dang / sems las su rung bar bya
281a5(phal chen): ba dang / bsam pa rnam par sbyang ba dang / dbang po gsal bar bya ba dang / lus kyi bde ba yongs su bskyed pa dang / chos la dga' ba'i shugs rnam par 'phel bar bya ba byed cing / sems can yongs su smin par byed pa mthong
281a6(phal chen): ngo / /ba spu'i sgo thams cad nas/ skye ba thams cad dang 'dra ba'i lus kyi sprin sna tshogs 'thon te/ zhing thams cad kyi khongs su chud pa'i sems can thams cad kyi yid bzhin du bstan pa'i phyir dge ba'i bshes
281a7(phal chen): gnyen gyi gan du 'gro bas skyon med pa yongs su ston pa dang / slob dpon dang / bla ma dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen la rim gror bya ba dang / bsnyen bkur bas/ skyo ba med pa yongs su ston pa dang / de bzhin gshegs
281a8(phal chen): pa thams cad kyi 'khor lo 'khor bar yang dag par blang zhing yongs su bzung bas skyo ba med pa'i brtson 'grus yongs su ston pa dang / sangs rgyas rgya mtsho thams cad khong du chud par bya ba'i tshul yang dag par brjod pa dang /
281b1(phal chen): chos kyi sgo rgya mtsho thams cad rnam par 'byed pa dang / chos thams cad kyi mtshan nyid dang rang bzhin dang tshul mngon par brjod pa dang / chos thams cad ting nge 'dzin gyi sgor yongs su ston pa dang / sems can
281b2(phal chen): thams cad kyi dri ma dang the tsom rgya mtsho rnam par sel bas shes rab kyi yul yongs su ston pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi lta ba'i ri shin tu 'joms pa'i shes rab rdo rje yongs su ston pa dang / sems kyi skad cig
281b3(phal chen): gcig dang ldan pas/ sems can thams cad kyi ma rig pa'i mun pa rnam par sel ba'i shes rab kyi nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor 'char ba yongs su ston pa byed cing / sems can thams cad kyi dga' ba yongs su
281b4(phal chen): skye bar bya bas sems can yongs su smin par byed pa mthong ngo / /ba spu'i sgo thams cad nas kha dog dang dbyibs bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i lus mang po 'gro ba thams cad dang mnyam pa'i sprul pa'i sprin 'thon te
281b5(phal chen): bsam pa dang / mos pa ji lta ba bzhin du sems can thams cad la mngon du gnas shing / sgra skad sna tshogs kyis yongs su sbyang ba bstan pas 'jig rten gyi bsod nams dang / bsod nams ma yin pa mngon par
281b6(phal chen): ston pa dang / 'jig rten pa'i bya ba thams cad rab tu rgyu ba dang / khams gsum pa 'byung ba thams cad yongs su bstan pa dang / khams gsum pa thams cad las 'byung ba'i phyogs yang dag par brjod pa
281b7(phal chen): dang / lta ba'i mya ngan myi bzad pa thams cad las 'byung ba'i phyogs yang dag par bstan pas/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi lam gyi khyad par yongs su brjod pa dang / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi
281b8(phal chen): sa'i lam las yongs su bzla ba yang dag par ston pa dang / rim gror byas pa dang / rim gror ma byas pa la byams sdang gis gos pa med par yongs su ston pa dang / 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa'i sgo
282a1(phal chen): la mi gnas pa yang dag par ston pa dang / dga' ldan gyi gnas la stsogs pa gcig nas gcig tu rgyu ba rgyun mi 'chad pa yongs su ston pa dang / snying po byang chub tu song zhing mngon par rdzogs
282a2(phal chen): par 'tshang rgya ba rgyun mi 'chad pa yongs su ston pa byed cing thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sems can yongs su smin par byed pa mthong ngo / /ba spu'i sgo thams cad kyi ba spu'i sgo re re nas kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing
282a3(phal chen): thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi lus sprul pa'i sprin 'thon te/ sems can gyi 'jig rten thams cad la mngon sum du byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa dang / smon lam yongs su brjod pa
282a4(phal chen): dang / chos kyi dbyings thams cad rnam par dag pa'i mthar thug gtugs pa'i smon lam gyi khyad par yongs su brjod pa dang / sems kyi skad cig re re la 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho thams cad yongs su dag
282a5(phal chen): par bya ba yongs su brjod pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod cing rim gror bya ba rgyun mi 'chad pa yongs su brjod pa dang / sems kyi skad cig re re la chos kyi tshul rgya mtsho thams cad la
282a6(phal chen): 'jug pa'i rgyun mi 'chad pa yongs su ston pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul rgya mtsho la 'jug pa rgyun mi 'chad pa yongs su ston pa
282a7(phal chen): dang / zhing thams cad du phyi ma'i mtha'i skal pa'i mur thug par gnas shing / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi lam rnam par dag par bya ba yongs su brjod pa rgyun mi 'chad pa yang dag par ston pa dang / sems kyi
282a8(phal chen): skad cig re re la de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la 'jug pa rgyun mi 'chad pa yang dag par brjod pa dang / dus gsum gyi tshul rgya mtsho thams cad la 'jug pa rgyun mi 'chad pa yongs su ston pa dang / zhing thams
282b1(phal chen): cad du rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam par 'phrul pa yongs su bstan pa rgyun mi 'chad pa yang dag par ston par byed cing / byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam dang / spyod pa yongs su bstan pas sems can thams
282b2(phal chen): cad thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la rab tu 'god pa mthong ngo / /ba spu'i sgo thams cad kyi ba spu'i sgo re re nas kyang 'gro ba thams cad kyi sems dang mnyam pa'i lus kyi sprul pa'i sprin mang po 'thon ste/ sems can thams
282b3(phal chen): cad la mngon par gnas shing / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi tshogs kyi stobs mu med pa yongs su ston pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems kyi stobs mi zad pa dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / chud mi
282b4(phal chen): za ba'i chos can yongs su ston pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad yongs su bsgrub pa'i stobs phyir mi bzlog pa la thub pa med pa dang / bla na med pa yongs su ston pa dang / byang chub sems
282b5(phal chen): dpa' rnams kyi stobs 'khor ba'i nyes pa thams cad kyis mi gos pa yongs su ston pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi stobs bdud kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad rnam par 'thor ba dang / byang chub
282b6(phal chen): sems dpa' rnams kyi stobs nyon mongs pa thams cad kyi dri mas nye bar nyon mongs pa med pa yongs su ston pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi stobs las kyi sgrib pa thams cad kyi ri rnam par 'thor ba yongs
282b7(phal chen): su ston pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi snying rje chen po'i stobs bskal pa thams cad du gnas kyang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pas skyo ba med pa yongs su ston pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'
282b8(phal chen): rnams kyi stobs sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad yongs su skyob cing bskul bas/ sems can thams cad rab tu dga' bar byed pa yongs su ston pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi stobs bdud dang /
283a1(phal chen): phas kyi rgol ba'i tshogs thams cad rab tu 'joms pa yongs su ston pa dang / chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i ye shes kyi stobs chen po 'jig rten du rab tu brjod pa byed cing sems can thams
283a2(phal chen): cad thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su smin par byed pa mthong ngo / /ba spu'i sgo re re nas kyang lus kyi sprul pa rgya mtsho kha dog mtha' yas pa/ 'gro ba thams cad kyi sems dang mnyam pa'i sprin phyogs
283a3(phal chen): bcu mtha' yas pa'i sems can gyi khams su rgyas par 'gengs pa 'thon te/ sems can rnams kyi bsam pa dang / mos pa ji lta ba bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa dang / ye shes kyi rnam
283a4(phal chen): par gnon pa yongs su ston pa dang / sems can gyi khams rgya mtsho thams cad la 'jug pa'i ye shes yongs su ston pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi dbang po rgya mtsho yongs su shes pa'i ye shes yongasu ston pa
283a5(phal chen): dang / sems can thams cad kyi spyod pa rgya mtsho la 'jug pa'i ye shes yongs su ston pa dang / sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba dang / 'dul ba'i dus las mi 'da' ba'i ye shes
283a6(phal chen): yongs su ston pa dang / chos kyi dbyings thams cad du grags par sgrog pa'i ye shes yongs su ston pa dang / sems kyi skad cig re re la chos kyi dbyings thams cad du ye shes kyi tshul rgya mtshos rgyas par
283a7(phal chen): 'gengs pa'i ye shes yongs su ston pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho thams cad 'du ba dang / 'jig pa'i ye shes yongs su ston pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi gzhi dang dbyibs dang /
283a8(phal chen): rgyan rnam par dgod pa'i ye shes yongs su ston pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchod pa rnam par sprul ste/ spyan sngar phyin nas/ mchod cing rim gror byed pa dang / chos kyi 'khor lo'i sprin yang
283b1(phal chen): dag par 'dzin pa'i ye shes yongs su ston pa byed cing / de ltar ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pas sems can rnams kyi dga' ba bskyed pa dang / sems dang bar byed pa dang / rab tu dga' ba bskyed
283b2(phal chen): pa dang / mos pa 'phel bar byed pa dang / yid mi bde ba rnam par bzlog pa dang / sems rnam par spyod pa dang / sems skyon med par skye bar byed pa dang / dbang po gsal bar byed pa dang / mos pa'i stobs
283b3(phal chen): yongs su bskyed pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid las phyir mi ldog par byed pa mthong ngo / /pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa yongs su bstan pas 'jig rten du ci ltar sems can yongs su smin par gyur pa mngon par de
283b4(phal chen): bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i chos thams cad rab tu sgrogs pa'i tshul gyis mtshan mo'i lha mo rab tu dga' ba'i mig 'gro bar rnam par snang ba'i thog ma sems bskyed pa'i tshogs dang / dge ba'i bshes
283b5(phal chen): gnyen snyen bkur ba'i thabs dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs kyi drung du phyin cing mchod pa dang / rim gro byas pa'i tshul dang / dge ba'i chos rnams spyad pa'i thabs ji snyed pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha
283b6(phal chen): rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pas gtang bar dka' ba yongs su gtong ba dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su sbyang ba'i thabs dang / rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug chen po dang / 'khor mang po dang / longs spyod
283b7(phal chen): kyi dbang po chen po yongs su btang ste/ mngon par 'byung ba'i thabs ji snyed pa dang / 'jig rten gyi dka' ba'i spyod pa rdul shugs dang dka' thub chen po'i dkyil 'khor la bzung ba mngon par bsgrub pa ji snyed
283b8(phal chen): cig yod pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i brtul shugs yang dag par blang ba'i sbyor ba la mi g.yo bar bya ba ji snyed cig yod pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i yid dam brtan pa'i chos rgya mtsho sems can gyi khams
284a1(phal chen): thams cad kyi nyes byas dang / ngan du smra ba dang / nyes par spyod pa thams cad bag la zha bar byed pa'i sbyor ba dang / lus dang sems kyi gnod pa nyams su bzod par byed pa'i sbyor ba ji snyed cig yod pa dang /
284a2(phal chen): chos thams cad 'jig pa med pa'i chos nyid la bzod pa dang / chos thams cad la yid ches pa'i bzod pa dang / chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin nges par rtogs pa'i bzod pa ji snyed gcig yod pa dang / thams
284a3(phal chen): cad mkhyen pa nyid du rtsom zhing sbyor ba'i brtson 'grus ji snyed cig yod pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su bsgrub pa'i brtson 'grus ji snyed cig yod pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i
284a4(phal chen): spyod pa ji snyed pa thams cad dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshogs dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson par byed pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bsgrub pa rnam par dag pa'i spyod pa ji
284a5(phal chen): snyed cig yod pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin rab tu thob pas/ rnam par 'phrul pa ji snyed cig yod pa dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo rgya mtsho la 'jug pa ji snyed cig yod pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu
284a6(phal chen): phyin pa'i spyod pa ji snyed pa thams cad dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshogs ji snyed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab chen po'i nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor rnam par sbyang ba'i tshul ji snyed gcig yod pa dang /
284a7(phal chen): shes rab chen po'i sprin yongs su 'du ba'i tshul ji snyed cig yod pa dang / shes rab kyi gter chen po'i tshogs ji snyed cig yod pa dang / shes rab kyi rgya mtsho chen po la rnam par dpyad pa'i tshul dang /
284a8(phal chen): sbyor ba ji snyed pa thams cad dang / thabs chen po la mkhas pa'i tshul gyi sbyor ba ji snyed gcig yod pa dang / thabs chen po la mkhas pa yongs su dag par bya ba dang ldan pa'i sngon gyi sbyor ba ji
284b1(phal chen): snyed pa thams cad dang / byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i lus ji snyed gcig yod pa dang / smon lam chen po'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su grub pa ji snyed gcig yod pa dang / smon lam
284b2(phal chen): chen po'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa ji snyed gcig yod pa dang / smon lam chen po'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i sngon gyi sbyor ba ji snyed pa thams cad dang / stobs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa thob par bya ba'i tshogs
284b3(phal chen): chen po ji snyed gcig yod pa dang / stobs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rkyen du gyur pa ji snyed gcig yod pa dang / stobs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul chen po ji snyed gcig yod pa dang / stobs kyi pha rol tu phyin
284b4(phal chen): pa shin tu bstan pa ji snyed gcig yod pa dang / stobs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i sngon gyi sbyor ba ji snyed pa thams cad dang / ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sbyor ba ji snyed gcig yod pa dang / ye shes kyi pha
284b5(phal chen): rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa'i tshul ji snyed gcig yod pa dang / ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i phyogs ji snyed gcig yod pa dang / ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rjes su 'brang bar bya ba ji snyed gcig yod pa
284b6(phal chen): dang / ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'byam klas pa ji snyed gcig yod pa dang / ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul la yang dag par gzhol bar bya ba ji snyed gcig yod pa dang / ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul
284b7(phal chen): rnam par dmyigs par bya ba ji snyed gcig yod pa dang / ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'byam klas pa'i rjes su 'brang bar bya ba ji snyed gcig yod pa dang / ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pas rgyas par 'gengs pa ji snyed
284b8(phal chen): gcig yod pa dang / ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rgya chen po ji snyed gcig yod pa dang / ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i lhun ji snyed gcig yod pa dang / ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongasu 'grub par bya ba dang
285a1(phal chen): ldan pa'i sngon gyi sbyor ba ji snyed pa thams cad dang / ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa'i rnam pa rab tu phye ba la 'jug pa 'byung ba yongs su bsgrub pa ji snyed gcig yod pa dang / ye shes kyi
285a2(phal chen): pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par gzhol bar bya ba'i tshul dang ldan pa'i chos rnams dang / chos yongs su bsdu ba dang / chos kyi ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ba dang / las kyi ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ba dang / zhing gi
285a3(phal chen): ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ba dang / bskal pa'i ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ba dang / dus kyi ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ba dang / sangs rgyas 'byung ba'i ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi ye shes kyi
285a4(phal chen): rjes su 'brang ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sems yongs su 'byung ba'i ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par dgod pa'i
285a5(phal chen): ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i 'byung ba'i ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i rab tu 'jug pa'i ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam
285a6(phal chen): gyi rjes su 'brang ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i chos kyi 'khor lo'i ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i chos rnam par 'byed pa'i ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i
285a7(phal chen): chos kyi rgya mtsho'i tshul gyi ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i chos gangs chen mtsho'i ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i chos kyi rgyud kyi ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang
285a8(phal chen): ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i chos kyi gter gyi ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i chos kyi lugs kyi ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ba ji snyed gcig yod pa dang / mtshan mo'i
285b1(phal chen): lha mo rab tu dga' ba'i mig 'gro bar rnam par snang ba'i ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i spyod pa mtha' dang dbus med pa'i dmyigs pa can de dag thams cad de'i ba spu'i sgo re re nas mngon par 'thon te/ sems can gyi lus kyi sprin kha dog sna tshogs can du mngon par mchod cing sems can yongs su smin par byed pa mthong ngo /
285b2(phal chen): /'di lta ste 'og min dang shin tu mthong ba dang / gya nom snang ba dang / ma dros pa
285b3(phal chen): dang / mi che ba'i gtsang ma'i gnas kyi lha lta bu'i lus kyi sprin du mngon par mthon cing / sems can yongs su smin par byed pa mthong ngo / /de bzhin du 'bras bu che ba dang / bsod nams 'phel ba dang / sprin
285b4(phal chen): med pa'i lha lta bu'i lus kyi sprin du mngon par 'thon cing sems can yongs su smin par byed pa mthong ngo / /dge rgyas dang tshad med dge ba dang / dge ba chung ba'i lha lta bu'i lus kyi sprin du mngon par mthon cing
285b5(phal chen): sems can yongs su smin par byed pa mthong ngo / /kun snang dang ba dang / tshad med snang ba dang / chung snang gi lha lta bu'i lus kyi sprin du mngon par 'thon cing / sems can yongs su smin par byed pa mthong ngo / /
285b6(phal chen): tshangs chen dang / tshangs lha nye phan dang / tshangs pa kun ris kyi lha lta bu'i lus kyi sprin du mngon par 'thon cing / sems can yongs su smin par byed pa mthong ngo / /dbang bsgyur gyi lha'i rgyal po rab lha mo'i tshogs dang lha'i
285b7(phal chen): bu dang bcas pa'i lha'i bu'i lus kyi sprin du mngon par 'thon cing sems can yongs su smin par byed pa mthong ngo / /lha'i rgyal po rab 'phrul dga' lha mo'i tshogs dang / lha'i bu dang bcas pa lta bu'i lus kyi
285b8(phal chen): sprin du mngon par 'thon cing sems can yongs su smin par byed pa mthong ngo / /rab dga' ldan gyi lha'i rgyal po lha mo'i tshogs dang lha'i bu dang bcas pa lha'i bu'i lus kyi sprin du mngon par mthon cing / sems can
286a1(phal chen): yongs su smin par byed pa mthong ngo / /rab mtshe ma'i lha'i rgyal po lha mo'i tshogs dang lha'i bu dang bcas pa lha'i bu lus kyi sprin du mngon par 'thon cing sems can yongs su smin par byed pa
286a2(phal chen): mthong ngo / /lha'i rgyal po brgya byin lha mo'i tshogs dang / lha'i bu dang bcas pa lta bu'i lus kyi sprin du mngon par 'thon cing sems can yongs su smyin par byed pa mthong ngo / /dri za'i rgyal po gnas srung po
286a3(phal chen): dang / dri za'i bu dang / dri za'i bu mo lta bu'i lus kyi sprin du mngon par 'thon cing sems can yongs su smin par byed pa mthong ngo / /grul bum gyi rgyal po 'phags skyes po dang / grul bum gyi bu dang grul bum gyi
286a4(phal chen): bu mo lta bu'i lus kyi sprin du mngon par 'thon cing sems can yongs su smin par byed pa mthong ngo / /klu'i rgyal po mig myi bzang dang / klu'i bu dang / klu'i bu mo lta bu'i lus kyi sprin du mngon par 'thon cing sems can
286a5(phal chen): yongs su smin par byed pa mthong ngo / /gnod sbyin gyi rgyal po chen po lus ngan po dang / gnod sbyin gyi bu dang / gnod sbyin gyi bu mo lta bu'i lus kyi sprin du mngon par 'thon cing sems can yongs su smin par byed pa mthong
286a6(phal chen): ngo / /mi 'am ci'i rgyal po sdong po dang / myi 'am ci'i bu dang / mi 'am ci'i bu mo lta bu'i lus kyi sprin du mngon par 'thon cing / sems can yongs su smin par byed pa mthong ngo / /lto 'phye chen po'i dbang po blo gros
286a7(phal chen): bzang po dang / lto 'phye chen po'i bu dang / lto 'phye chen po'i bu mo lta bu'i lus kyi sprin du mngon par 'thon cing / sems can yongs su smin par byed pa mthong ngo / /nam mkha' lding gi dbang po shugs drag
286a8(phal chen): stobs chen dang / nam mkha' lding gi bu dang nam mkha' lding gi bu mo lta bu'i lus kyi sprin du mngon par 'thon cing / sems can yongs su smin par byed pa mthong ngo / /lha ma yin gyi dbang po sgra gcan
286b1(phal chen): dang / lha ma yin gyi bu dang / lha ma yin gyi bu mo lta bu'i lus kyi sprin du mngon par mthon cing sems can yongs su smin par byed pa mthong ngo / /chos kyi rgyal po gshin rje dang / gshin rje'i bu dang / gshin rje'i
286b2(phal chen): bu mo lta bu'i lus kyi sprin du mngon par 'thon cing sems can yongs su smin par byed pa mthong ngo / /mi'i dbang po dang skyes pa dang bud med dang khye'u dang / bu mo thams cad lta bu'i lus kyi sprin du mngon par 'thon
286b3(phal chen): cing / sems can yongs su smyin par byed pa mthong ngo / /de bzhin du 'gro ba'i rgyud thams cad du gtogs pa'i sems can thams cad lta bu'i lus kyi sprin du mngon par 'thon cing sems can yongasu smin par byed
286b4(phal chen): pa mthong ngo / /nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang drang srong thams cad lta bu'i lus kyi sprin du mngon par 'thon cing sems can yongs su smin par byed pa mthong ngo / /rlung dang chu dang me'i phung po lha lta bu'i lus kyi sprin du mngon par
286b5(phal chen): 'thon cing sems can yongasu smin par byed pa mthong ngo / /rgya mtsho dang chu klung dang / ri dang nags tshal dang / lo thog dang / sman dang shing dang sa'i lha lta bu'i lus kyi sprin du mngon par 'thon cing sems can yongasu smin par
286b6(phal chen): byed pa mthong ngo / /bza' shing gi ra ba dang / grong khyer dang snying po byang chub dang nyin par dang mtshan mo dang nam mkha' dang / phyogs dang rkang gis 'gro ba dang / lus kyi ris su gtogs pa dang / lha lta bu'i lus kyi
286b7(phal chen): sprin du mngon par mthon cing / sems can yongasu smin par byed pa mthong ba nas/ de bzhin du lag na rdo rje lta bu'i lus kyi sprin du mngon par 'thon cing / phyogs bcur rgyas par bkang ste/ chos kyi
286b8(phal chen): dbyings kyi tshul 'byam klas pa thams cad sems can thams cad la mngon par gnas shing / sems can yongasu smin par byed pa'i bar du mthong ste/ mtshan mo'i lha mo rab tu dga' ba'i mig 'gro bar rnam
287a1(phal chen): par snang ba'i sems thog ma bskyed pa'i tshogs la stsogs pa'i sngon gyis tshe rabs la yongs su bsgrub pa'i dge ba'i sems gcig nas gcig tu brgyud de/ rgyun ma chad pa'i tshul ji snyed pa dang / byang chub tu
287a2(phal chen): sems bskyed pa'i bsngags pa gcig nas gcig tu brgyud cing 'dab chags pa dang / shi 'pho dang skye ba yongs su bzung ba gcig nas gcig tu brgyud cing 'dab chags pa dang / lus yongs su bzung ba gcig nas gcig
287a3(phal chen): tu brgyud cing 'dab chags pa dang / ming gi 'khor lo gcig nas gcig tu brgyud cing 'dab chags pa dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi gan du 'gro ba gcig nas gcig tu brgyud cing 'dab chags pa dang / sangs
287a4(phal chen): rgyas byung ste bsnyen bkur ba gcig nas gcig tu brgyud cing 'dab chags pa dang / chos kyi tshigs dang / yi ge blangs pa gcig nas gcig tu brgyud cing 'dab chags pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i lam gyi nan
287a5(phal chen): tan gyi sems gcig nas gcig tu rgyud cing 'dab chags pa dang / ting nge 'dzin rab tu thob pa gcig nas gcig tu brgyud cing mdab chags pa dang / ting nge 'dzin thob pas sangs rgyas mthong ba gcig nas gcig tu brgyud cing
287a6(phal chen): 'dab chags pa dang / zhing mthong ba'i mig gi rgyas par bkang pa gcig nas gcig tu brgyud cing 'dab chags pa dang / bskal pa gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa'i ye shes kyi 'khor lo 'dab chags pa dang / chos kyi
287a7(phal chen): dbyings khong du chud pa'i ye shes gcig nas gcig tu brgyud cing mdab chags pa dang / sems can gyi khams la rnam par blta ba gcig nas gcig tu brgyud cing mdab chags pa dang / chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul rgya mtshor
287a8(phal chen): gtogs pa'i sems can pha rol gyi shi 'pho ba dang / skye ba shes pa gcig nas gcig tu brgyud cing mdab chags pa dang / lha'i rna bas yongasu dag pa rtogs par byed pa'i shes pa gcig nas gcig tu brgyud
287b1(phal chen): cing 'dab chags pa dang / sems can gyi khams thams cad kyi sems la rnam par blta zhing dbyings la 'jug pa'i sgo gcig nas gcig tu brgyud cing 'dab chags pa dang / thog ma lha'i mig la zhugs pa'i
287b2(phal chen): sgo gcig nas gcig tu brgyud cing 'dab chags pa dang / thog ma lha'i rna ba rnam par dmyigs pa gcig nas gcig tu brgyud cing mang bas chags pa dang / thog ma sems can pha rol gyi sems shes pa gcig
287b3(phal chen): nas gcig tu brgyud cing mdab chags pa dang / thog ma bdag dang sems can pha rol gyi sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa shes pa gcig nas gcig tu brgyud cing 'dab chags pa dang / thog ma dngos po med pa la rab
287b4(phal chen): tu gnas te/ mngon par 'du byed pa'i rdzu 'phrul thob pa'i rkyen gcig tu brgyud cing 'dab chags pa dang / rdzu 'phrul chen po rnam par gnon pas/ phyogs rgyas pa 'gengs pa gcig nas gcig tu brgyud cing 'dab
287b5(phal chen): chags pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa thogs pa gcig nas gcig tu brgyud cing 'dab chags pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa rgya mtsho bsam gyis mi khyab pa la 'jug pa gcig
287b6(phal chen): nas gcig tu brgyud cing 'dab chags pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting 'dzin gyi rnam par 'phrul pa gcig nas gcig tu brgyud cing 'dab chags pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par
287b7(phal chen): gnon pa gcig nas gcig tu rgyud cing 'dab chags pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i yongs su gnon pa gcig nas gcig tu brgyud cing 'dab chags pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ming du bya ba gcig nas
287b8(phal chen): gcig tu rgyud cing 'dab chags pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i lam la 'jug pa gcig nas gcig tu rgyud cing 'dab chags pa nas/ mtshan mo'i lha mo rab tu dga' ba'i mig 'gro ba'i rnam par snang ba'i
288a1(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes shin tu phra ba gcig nas gcig tu brgyud cing mdab chags pa ji snyed pa de dag thams cad de'i ba spu'i sgo thams cad las sprul pa'i lus kyi sprin du mngon par 'thon to/ /
288a2(phal chen): sems can rnams la chos 'chad pa dang / yang dag par ston pa dang / gsal bar byed pa dang / yongs su ston pa dang / rjes su brjod pa dang / rab tu 'byed pa dang / shin tu rgya cher byed pa dang / 'gro ba dang /
288a3(phal chen): nges par ston pa dang / rnam par rig par byed pa dang / nye bar bsgrub pa mthong ste/ la la la ni rlung gi dkyil 'khor shin tu 'khrugs pa'i sgra skad kyis chos ston pa mthong ngo / /la la la ni chu'i phung po rab tu rlob
288a4(phal chen): pa'i sgra skad kyis/ la la la ni me'i me lce shin tu rlob pa'i sgra skad kyis/ la la la ni rgya mtsho'i 'brug gi sgra skad kyis/ la la la ni sa yongs su g.yos pa'i sgra skad kyis/ la la la ni ri chen
288a5(phal chen): po phan tshun thug cing 'thab pa'i sgra skad kyis la la la ni lha'i grong khyer g.yos pa'i nga ro snyan pa'i sgra skad kyis/ la la la ni lha'i gzhal med khang thub cing 'khor ba'i sgra skad kyis chos ston pa mthong ngo / /
288a6(phal chen): la la la ni lha'i dbang po'i skad kyis/ la la la ni gnod sbyin gyi dbang po'i skad kyis/ la la la ni dri za'i dbang po'i skad kyis/ la la la ni lha ma yin gyi dbang po'i skad kyis/ la la la ni nam mkha'
288a7(phal chen): lding gi dbang po'i skad kyis/ la la la ni lto 'phye chen po'i skad kyis/ la la la ni mi'i dbang po'i skad kyis/ la la la ni tshangs pa'i dbang po'i skad kyis/ la la la ni lha mo'i klu'i dbyangs kyis/
288a8(phal chen): la la la ni lha rdzas kyi rol mo legs par blangs pa'i dbyangs kyis/ la la la ni nor bu rin po che'i sgra dbyangs kyis/ la la la ni sems can gyi ris thams cad kyis mtshan mo'i lha mo rab tu dga'
288b1(phal chen): ba'i mig 'gro bar rnam par snang ba'i rnam par thar pa'i yul sems can rnams la rab tu brjod pa mthong ngo / /de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i lus kyi sprin gyis byang chub sems dpa' lha mo rab dga'i sgra
288b2(phal chen): skad sna tshogs dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa'i sku'i sprin gyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung rnam pa tha dad pa'i dbyangs kyi yan lag gi tshul gyis mtshan mo'i lha mo rab tu dga' ba'i mig 'gro bar
288b3(phal chen): rnam par snang ba'i rnam par thar pa'i yul thog ma sems bskyed pa dang bcas pa yongs su grub ste/ grub cing yang dag par 'dus pa dang bcas rnam par thar pa'i rnam par brtse ba dang bcas pa/
288b4(phal chen): sems can thams cad la rnam par dmyigs par byed pa mthong ngo / /de'i sprul pa'i gzugs kyi sprin re res kyang sems kyi skad cig re re la phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams gyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod
288b5(phal chen): du med pa'i rnam par sbyong ba mthong ngo / /sems can rgya mtsho mtha' yas pa dag kyang ngan song gi sdug bsngal thams cad las rnam par dgrol pa mthong ngo / /sems can gyi khams mtha' dang / dbus
288b6(phal chen): med pa dag kyang mi'i phun sum tshogs pa la rab tu 'god pa mthong ngo / /sems can rgya mtsho mtha' dang dbus med pa dag kyang 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho las gyen du bskyod pa mthong ngo / /sems can rgya mtsho mtha' dang
288b7(phal chen): dbus med pa dag kyang nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa la rab tu 'god pa mthong ngo / /sems kyi skad cig re re la sems can rgya mtsho mtha' dang dbus med pa dag kyang stobs bcu'i ye shes kyi sar
288b8(phal chen): 'jug pa/ tshong dpon gyis bu nor bzangs kyis mthong ngo / /thos so/ /rnam par dpyad do/ /zhugs so/ /khong du chud do/ /nges par rtogs so rjes su shes so rjes su 'brangs so/ /rjes su zhugs so/ /
289a1(phal chen): mnyam pa nyid du byin gyis brlabs te/ de ni mtshan mo'i lha mo rab tu dga' ba'i mig 'gro bar rnam par snang ba'i byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa kun nas bzang po'i dga' ba shin tu yangs
289a2(phal chen): pa'i rgya mtsho bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa dang / khyu mchog gi mthu phyung ba'i byin dang / sngon bskal pa mnyam par spyad pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi brlabs kyis byin tu brlabs
289a3(phal chen): pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam par smin pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa kun tu bzang po'i snod du gyur pa'i phyir ro/ /de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs byang chub sems dpa'i
289a4(phal chen): dga' ba'i shugs drag po gangs chen mtsho snang ba chen po rab tu thob pa/ phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa des/ mtshan mo'i lha mo rab tu dga' ba'i mig
289a5(phal chen): 'gro bar rnam par snang ba'i mdun du 'dug ste/ thal mo sbyar nas mtshan mo'i lha mo rab tu dga' ba'i mig 'gro bar rnam par snang ba la tshul dang 'dra ba'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par
289a6(phal chen): bstod de/ /rgyal ba'i chos rnams shin tu zab/ /de la khyod kyis bskal pa tshad med bslabs/ /bsam pa ji bzhin gzugs rnams kyi/ /'gro ba kun bkang 'jig rten rim pas bstan/ /
289a7(phal chen): bdag med mgon med log pa yi/ /'du shes rtag tu 'khrul pa mkhyen gyur nas/ /rdzu 'phrul rnam pa du ma yis/ /lus dang dbang phyug ston mdzad 'gro ba 'dul/ /shin tu rims bral rab
289a8(phal chen): tu zhi/ /chos sku gnyis med rnam par dag pa mnga'/ /'gro ba ma lus gnyis gnas pa/ /sprul pa'i sprin sgra 'brug gis rnam par 'dul/ /phung po khams dang skye mched la/ /khyod ni nam yang mi
289b1(phal chen): gnas mi brtan te/ /yan lag kun rgyas gzugs mchog dang / /dbang phyug yongs su bsgrags pas 'gro ba 'dul/ /phyi dang nang las rnam par grol/ /gnyis las byung ba'i mtsho las
289b2(phal chen): 'phags gyur kyang / /'khor ba'i rgya mtsho mtha' yas pa'i/ /gzugs brnyan 'gro ba'i rgyud du rab tu ston/ /khyod la g.yo ba myi mnga' ste/ /nam yang rlom sems g.yo ba'i spros mi mnga'/ /'jig rten
289b3(phal chen): spros mos byis pa rnams/ /chos kyi rang bzhin ston cing 'dul ba mdzod/ /ting 'dzin rgya mtsho kun spyod pas/ /bskal pa mang por rtse gcig thub bzhugs kyang / /phyogs bcu'i bde gshegs mchod
289b4(phal chen): don du/ /spu rnams rtse las sprul pa'i sprin kyang 'gyed/ /sangs rgyas stobs la 'jugs pa'i tshul/ /skad cig re rer mtha' yas thugs su chud/ /sems can bsdu ba'i sbyor ba rnams/ /so so'i
289b5(phal chen): rgyan bzhin go bar bgyis pas bstan/ /khyod kyis srid pa'i rgya mtsho dag /las kyi rnams bris sna tshogs gzugs gzigs shing / /chos kyi sgrib pa med pa'i lam bstan te/ /sems can kun kyang rnam par
289b6(phal chen): sbyong ba mdzod/ /khyod sku mtshan bris pa rnam dag kyang / /kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa dam pa yis/ /sems can bsam pa'i dbang tshul du/ /khyod ni lha mo'i sku gzugs ston/ /de nas tshong dpon
289b7(phal chen): gyi bu nor bzangs gyis/ mtshan mo'i lha mo rab tu dga' ba'i mig 'gro bar rnam par snang ba la tshul dang 'dra ba'i tshigs su bcad pa de dag gis mngon par bstod de/ 'di skad ces smras so/ /
289b8(phal chen): lha mo khyod bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu zhugs nas ji srid gcig lags/ lha mo khyod kyis byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa kun tu bzang po'i dga' ba shin tu yangs shing
290a1(phal chen): dri ma med pa'i shugs kyi rgyal mtshan 'di thob nas ji snyed cig lags/ de nas mtshan mo'i lha mo rab tu dga' ba'i mig 'gro bar rnam par snang bas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs la
290a2(phal chen): tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ dran pas bskal pa mang 'das pa/ /zhing gi rdul snyed de yi snga rol na/ /zhing ni rin chen mchog bde 'byung / /de yi bskal pa zhi ba'i dbyangs shes bya/ /gling bzhi
290a3(phal chen): bye ba khrag khrig ste/ /brgya stong phrag bcu rnams kyis yongs su gang / /tshad med rin chen ri bo 'dra/ /gling bzhi bar ma bzang po rnam par bkram/ /rgyal po'i pho brang bye ba brgya/ /stong phrag bcu rnams
290a4(phal chen): yongs su tshang ba ste/ /rgyal po'i pho brang mdangs dga' ba/ /dbus na gnas pa spos kyi rgyal mtshan no/ /der ni phyogs kyi dbang po yis/ /'khor los bsgyur ba mngon par gzugs bzang 'byung / /
290a5(phal chen): mtshan bzang sum bcu gnyis dang ldan/ /de yi lus kyang dpe byad bzang pos brgyan/ /pad mo'i sbubs nas rdzus te byung / /gser gyi mdog bzang 'od 'byung lus dang ldan/ /'dzam bu'i rgyal
290a6(phal chen): mtshan thams cad du/ /mkha' las 'gro zhing 'od kyis de 'gengs so/ /de yi bu ni stong tshang ste/ /kun kyang yan lag dam pa'i gzugs dang ldan/ /blon po mkhas shing gsal ba dang / /'dzangs
290a7(phal chen): shing bde gzhungs bye ba shin tu mang / /btsun mo bye ba phrag bcu tshang / /lha mo ji bzhin dga' ba'i tshul la mkhas/ /de dag phan sems bde sems kyis/ /rgyal po de la nye ba'i yid du gnas/ /
290a8(phal chen): rgyal po de ni sa chen de/ /ri dang khor yug kun gyi mthas klas pa'i/ /gling bzhi'i phun sum tshogs pa dag /kun kyang chos kyi stobs kyi gnas par byed/ /kho mo 'khor los bsgyur ba yi/ /btsun
290b1(phal chen): mo tshangs pa'i sgra skad rin chen lus/ /gser gyi mdog mtshungs dri med 'od/ /dpag tshad stong du 'od kyis rgyas par 'gengs/ /nyi ma nub par gyur nas kyang / rgyal po sras dang 'khor bcas gzims
290b2(phal chen): gyur nas/ /rol mo'i dbyangs kyang zhi gyur te/ /kho mo mal na bde bar nyal nyal nas/ /nam gyi phyed tsam gung zhig la/ /sangs rgyas dpal gyi rgya mtsho byung bar gyur/ /de tshe rgyal bas rnam
290b3(phal chen): 'phrul ba/ /phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste bstan pa mdzad/ /rgyal ba'i 'od zer rgya mtsho des/ /zhing gi rdul snyed 'jig rten khyab par gyur/ /rnam 'phrul sku rnams sna tshogs kyis/ /
290b4(phal chen): phyogs bcu thams cad ma lus rgyas par bkang / /sa rnams ri dang bcas par g.yos/ /rgyal ba byung zhes sgra yang yongs su brjod/ /lha dang lha min mi dang klu/ /kun kyang rgyal ba byung bas
290b5(phal chen): rab tu dga'/ /sangs rgyas ba spu'i sgo kun nas/ /sprul pa'i rgya mtsho mang po mngon par byung / /des ni phyogs bcu rgyas bkang nas/ /'jig rten bsam pa bzhin du chos kyang bstan/ /rnam
290b6(phal chen): 'phrul mtha' yas de dag kyang / /rgyal bas thams cad bdag gis rmi lam bstan/ /zab mo'i 'brug sgra thos gyur nas/ /khong du chud pas kho mo dga' yid gyur/ /mtshan mo'i lha mo stong snyed kyang / /
290b7(phal chen): kho mo'i steng gi bar snang mkhar gnas shing / /rgyal ba'i legs pa brjod byas nas/ /kho mo sad par smra zhing brjod/ /lha yi blo gros btsun mo longs/ /khyod kyi rgyal po'i khabs su skyes/ /
290b8(phal chen): bskal pa rgya mtsho brgya dag du/ /de 'dra'i phun sum tshogs pa rnam dag kun/ /kho mo dgar gyur sad par gyur/ /'od gsal dri med rnam dag mthong / /'od bzang de ni ga las blta blta na/ /byang chub
291a1(phal chen): shing rgyal drung gi rgyal ba mthong / /mtshan ni sum bcu rtsa gnyis brgyan/ /ba spu kun nas 'od zer rgya mtsho bkye/ /ri rab ji bzhin mngon par 'phags/ /rgyal ba g.yas g.yos kun tu de bzhin
291a2(phal chen): no/ /mthong nas kho mo rab dga' ste/ /de 'drar 'gyur bar sems kyang yongs su bskyed/ /sangs rgyas rnam 'phrul yongs mthong nas/ /kho mos smon lam shin tu rgya chen btab/ /kho mos rgyal po
291a3(phal chen): bzhengs su gsol/ /de yi 'khor dang bud med tshogs kyang bslang / /sangs rgyas 'od yongs mthong gyur nas/ /kun kyang bde ba'i lus su gyur/ /rgyal po de dang lhan cig tu/ /bzhon nu bye ba srog chags
291a4(phal chen): khrag khrig gis/ /yongs su bskor te dpung bcas pa/ /rgyal ba'i spyan sngar kun kyang 'dong / /lo grangs stong phrag nyi shur yang / /kho mos rgyal ba de la mchod bkur byas/ /rin chen bdun yang yon du
291a5(phal chen): phul/ /rgya mtsho yongs su bcas pa'i sa yang gsol/ /mdo sde rgya mtsho yon tan sprin/ /smon lam mtsho las yongs su byung ba'i rgyan/ /kun kyang de bzhin gshegs las byung / /bsam pa
291a6(phal chen): ji bzhin 'gro bar de bzhin bstan/ /mtshan mo'i lha mo ji snyed gcig /de tshe snying brtser kho mo phan gdags pa/ /de 'drar gyur to mos rtsal zhes/ /kho mos yongs su skyes par gyur/ /kho mo'i smon
291a7(phal chen): lam de 'dra'i sems/ /thog ma byang chub mchog tu bskyed par gyur/ /'khor ba'i rgya mtshor gnas pa'i tshe/ /srid pa'i rgya mtsho de ni zhig ma gyur/ /sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig rnams/ /kho mo'i dad pa
291a8(phal chen): bskyed de mchod pa byas/ /'khor ba'i lha dang mi dbus su/ /yul gyi dga' dang bde la mngon par smon/ /rgyal ba'i dang po dpal gyi mtsho/ /de yi 'og ma yon tan sgron ma ste/ /rgyal ba gsum pa rin chen
291b1(phal chen): dpal/ /sangs rgyas bzhi pa nam mkha'i ye shes dang / /rgyal ba lnga pa me tog mchog /rgyal ba drug pa chags med zla ba'i bla/ /rgyal ba bdun la 'od rgyal chos kyi zla/ /brgyad pa ye shes dkyil
291b2(phal chen): 'khor snang ba'o/ /rin chen 'od 'phro ri sgron ste/ /rgyal ba dgu pa de tshe byung bar gyur/ /bcu pa dus gsum 'od dbyangs te/ /de dag kho mos dad pas mchod/ /bcu po de las sogs pa dag /mi yi
291b3(phal chen): dbang po dam pa kun mchod de/ /tshul gyi rgya mtsho 'dir zhugs pa'i/ /mig ni de srid yun gyis thob ma gyur/ /de 'og zhing gi 'tshams sbyor ba/ /rin chen thams cad 'od ces bya ba byung / /bskal pa lha yi
291b4(phal chen): dpal zhes bya/ /sangs rgyas lnga brgya de la byung bar gyur/ /thog ma zla ba'i dkyil 'khor byung / /gnyis pa nyi ma'i sgron ma mngon par bskyed/ /snang ba'i rgyal mtshan sangs rgyas gsum/ /de yi 'og
291b5(phal chen): tu rin chen ri bo'o/ /me tog 'od 'phro rgya mtsho sgron/ /me yi dpal dang lha yi dpal gyi mchog /snang ba'i rgyal po 'od kyi dpal/ /bcu pa ye shes kun snang rgyal po 'o/ /bcu po de la stsogs pa dag /
291b6(phal chen): mi yi dbang po de dag kho mo yis/ /phung po'i gnas la dad dga' zhing / /gnas med chos la gnas kyi blo yis mchod/ /de 'og de yi mtshams sbyor ba/ /'jig rten khams bzang byung bar gyur
291b7(phal chen): pa ni/ /pad ma'i sgron ma sprin gyi dpal/ /de tshe bskal pa tshangs pa'i 'od ces bya/ /de la rgyal ba tshad med de/ /de dag 'khor dang bcas pa kho mos mchod/ /rgyal ba de dag thams cad las/ /
291b8(phal chen): rim gro chen pos chos kyang thos/ /rgyal ba'i dbang po rin chen ri/ /de yi 'og ma yon tan rgya mtsho ste/ /rgyal ba chos dbyings rgya mtsho dpal/ /chos rab rgya mtsho bsgrags pa bzhi pa'o/ /
292a1(phal chen): chos kyi rgyal mtshan gzungs kyi 'od/ /chos stobs 'od dang nam mkha'i blo gros te/ /chos 'od ri bo'i spo mthon dang / /de dag tha ma'i mtshan ni sprin dpal lo/ /bcu po de dag la stsogs
292a2(phal chen): pa/ /mi yi dam pa de dag kun mchod do/ /rgyal ba'i rgya mtsho 'dir zhugs pa'i/ /chos nyid de ni dag par ma gyur to/ /de yi 'og tu de bzhin gshegs/ /nyi ma'i sgron ma dpal gyi dpal zhes
292a3(phal chen): bya/ /zhing ni sangs rgyas yod pa ste/ /de la bskal pa zla ba'i dpal byung ngo / /de la stobs bcu byung ba ni/ /bye ba brgyad bcu yongs su tshang ba ste/ /de dag kun la'ang mchod pa'i sgo/ /rgya che mtha' yas
292a4(phal chen): yid 'ong du ma byas/ /thog mar byung ba dri za'i rgyal/ /de yi 'og tu sangs rgyas shing rgyal ste/ /rgyal ba gsum pa yon tan ri/ /de yi 'og tu rin chen spyan gshegs so/ /rnam par snang
292a5(phal chen): mdzad 'od kyi brgyan/ /chos kyi rgya mtsho sangs rgyas gzi brjid dpal/ /'jig rten dbang po 'od bzang dpal/ /kun gyi tha ma chos 'od rgyal po'o/ /bcu po de dag stsogs pa dag /bde gshegs de
292a6(phal chen): dag thams cad mchod byas kyang / /chos kyi rgya mtshor 'jug pa yi/ /ye shes kho mos thob par ma gyur to/ /de yi 'og tu zhing dag pa/ /rdo rje'i rang bzhin mi 'chang gzi brjid brten/ /kun tu
292a7(phal chen): 'od sprin ming ldan byung / /rgyan gcig kun nas mdzes par gnas pa'o/ /de la sems can dag pa mang / /nyon mongs dri mas nyon mongs shin tu nyung / /bskal pa rab zhi blo gros 'od/ /
292a8(phal chen): sangs rgyas stong rnams byung bas rnam par brgyan/ /rgyal ba'i dang po rdo rje'i gtsug /gnyis pa chags med stobs mnga'i mtshan ldan pa/ /rgyal ba chos nyid gzugs brnyan dang / /phyogs rnams
292b1(phal chen): kun tu sgron ma gsal ba'i bdag / rgyal ba lnga pa thugs rje'i 'od/ /rgyal ba drug pa brtul shugs rgya mtsho'o/ /bde gshegs bzod 'khor sgron ma dang / /brgyad pa chos kyi dkyil 'khor snang ba ste/ /
292b2(phal chen): snang ba rgya mtshos brgyan pa dang / /de dag tha ma zhi ba'i rgyal po'o/ /bcu po de la stsogs pa dag /mi yi dam pa de kun kho mos mchod/ /chos nyid nam mkha' mnyam pa 'di/ /rang bzhin yongs su
292b3(phal chen): kun nas dag pa ste/ /de la gnas shing zhing gi rnams/ /'byam klas kun tu spyod spyad ma dag go/ /de yi 'og tu mdangs dga' ba'i/ /zhing gi spos sgron sprin gyis dpal zhes bya/ /kun nas nyon
292b4(phal chen): mongs yongs su dag / de yi bskal pa legs par 'byung zhes bya/ /rgyal ba bye ba de tshe byung / /de dag kun gyi de tshe'i bskal pa brgyan/ /mgon po de dag chos gsung ba/ /kho mos dran pa'i stobs kyis yongs
292b5(phal chen): su bzung / /rgyal ba'i dang po grags yangs te/ /chos kyi rgya mtsho shugs drag dpal gyi rgyal/ /chos dbang rgyal po yon tan sprin/ /chos kyi dpal dang lha yi cod pan no/ /ye shes 'od 'phro gzi brjid dpal/ /
292b6(phal chen): rkang gnyis dam pa bdun pa de yin no/ /rgyal ba brgyan pa nam mkha'i dbyings/ /dgu pa kun tu 'byung ba'i sgron ma ste/ /de dag tha ma'i sangs rgyas ni/ /mdzod spu'i dpal gyi 'od kyi blo gros te/ /rgyal
292b7(phal chen): ba mi mchog de dag la/ /mchod pa byas nas chags med de ma sbyangs/ /de yi 'og ma rgyan rab can/ /rin chen sna tshogs kun tu gnas pa ste/ /'jig rten rnam par phye ba'i mtha'/ /rin chen rgyal mtshan
292b8(phal chen): blo gros mchog / de yi tshe yi bskal pa snying po'i tshogs/ /de la sangs rgyas brgya phrag lnga byung ste/ /rnam thar chags med 'di 'dod cing / /rang 'byung de dag thams cad kho mos mchod/ /thog ma'i
293a1(phal chen): mtshan ni yon tan 'khor/ /zhi ba'i dbyangs dang rgya mtsho phun sum tshogs/ /nyi ma'i gzi brjid dpal gyi bdag /mtshan gyi sprin sgra dbyangs shes bya ba dang / /chos dbyangs rgyal po yon
293a2(phal chen): tan bdag / bsod nams ri rab zhi ba'i 'od kyi rgyal/ /bcu po de la stsogs pa dag /rgyal ba de dag kun kyang kho mos mchod/ /rgyal ba'i lam ni der sbyangs te/ /de la rgyal ba kun kyang yang dag
293a3(phal chen): gzhol/ /'on kyang da dung rgyal ba yis/ /tshul 'dir 'jug pa'i bzod pa ma thob pa'o/ /de 'og yid 'ong 'od ldan pa/ /yongs su dag pa'i 'jig rten khams su byung / /zhing dbyangs phreng ba'i
293a4(phal chen): blo gros can/ /sems can nyon mongs nyung ba'i gnas yin no/ /bskal pa bde zhing mngon dga' ste/ /de la sangs rgyas bye ba brgyad bcu byung / /mi mchog de kun kho mos mchod/ /rgyal ba mchog
293a5(phal chen): gis lam yang rnam par sbyangs/ /rgyal ba'i dang po me tog brtsegs/ /rgya mtsho'i snying po yang dag 'byung ba'i mchog /lha dbang gtsug phud rin chen gtso/ /gser gyi ri bo rin chen brtsegs
293a6(phal chen): pa dang / /chos kyi rgyal mtshan nor gyi dpal/ /de dag kun gyi tha ma ye shes blo/ /bcu po de dag la stsogs pa/ /lha dang mi yi gtso bo de dag kho mos mchod/ /de 'og mtshams sbyor zhing byung ba/ /sprul pa
293a7(phal chen): bzang po'i rgyal mtshan sgron ma ste/ /bskal ba stong gi dpal zhes bya/ /de la sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig drug /zhi ba'i rgyal mtshan zhi gnas dpal/ /zhi ba'i sgron ma sprin gyi rgyal po yi dpal/ /
293a8(phal chen): snang ba'i 'od kyi rgyal po dang / /rnam par sprin mched nyi ma'i gzi brjid dang / /chos kyi sgron ma dpal gyi ri/ /'od 'phro'i dpal dang lha yi snying po'i dpal/ /de dag tha mar byung ba ni/ /seng ge'i sgra
293b1(phal chen): sgrogs mkhas pa sgron ma'o/ /bcu po de la stsogs pa dang / /bde gshegs zla ba de dag kho mos mchod/ /'on kyang tshul mtsho 'dir 'jug pa'i/ /bzod pa kho mos thob par ma gyur to/ /de 'og 'tshams
293b2(phal chen): sbyor zhing byung ba/ /kun tu snang ba'i dpal zhes bya ba ste/ /bskal pa gnas med rnam par brgyan/ /de la sangs rgyas bye ba sum bcu drug /dang po yon tan kun tu sprin/ /de yi 'og ma
293b3(phal chen): sangs rgyas nam mkha'i thugs/ /sangs rgyas legs byung rnam par brgyan pa dang / /rgya mtsho chos kyi sprin sgra sgrogs pa'i dbyangs/ /rgyal ba chos dbyings gsung dbyangs dang / /sprul pa'i sprin
293b4(phal chen): sgra snyen pa'i dpal mnga' dang / /sangs rgyas phyogs kun gzi brjid dang / /chos kyi rgya mtsho yongs gyur sgra dbyangs dang / /yon tan rgya mtsho dpal gyi sgron/ /rgyal ba'i nyi ma dgu pa byung bar gyur/ /de dag kun gyi
293b5(phal chen): tha ma ste/ /rin chen dpal sgron yon tan dpal mchod do/ /rin chen dpal sgron yon tan dpal/ /rkang gnyis dam pa byung bar gyur pa'i tshe/ /kho mo lha mo zla bzhin te/ /mi yi dam pa byung tshe mchod
293b6(phal chen): pa byas/ /rgyal ba des ni kho mo la/ /mdo sde smon lam rgya mtsho 'byung ba'i rgyan/ /gnas med rgyan kyang rab tu bshad/ /thos nas kho mos dran pa'i stobs gyis bzung / /kho mos mig yangs der thob
293b7(phal chen): ste/ /ting 'dzin zhi dang stobs kyi gzugs kyang thob/ /skad gcig gcig gis re re zhing brgyud pa'i/ /rgyal ba rgya mtsho mang po 'ang kho mos mthong / /byams tshul kun tu snang ba'i sprin/ /byang chub
293b8(phal chen): sems rab mkha' dang mnyam pa ste/ /snying rje'i snying pos brgyan pa yang / /sangs rgyas stobs kyi tshul du yangs par skyes/ /'gro ba phyin ci log gyur te/ /rtag dang bde dang gtsang dang bdag zhen
294a1(phal chen): pa/ /gti mug mdongs gyur ma rig bsgribs/ /nyon mongs 'khrugs shing log par 'du shes pa/ /lta ba'i rnam par stug la spyod/ /lam gyis 'gro rgyud der ni sred dbang gyur/ /
294a2(phal chen): rnam pa sna tshogs bye brag du/ /las kyi rnam par bris pas kun byung ba/ /'gro rgyud kun gyis shi 'pho sgor/ /skye bar 'gyur bas kun tu skyes gyur cing / /skye dang rga shi gnod pa rnams/ /
294a3(phal chen): lus dang sems kyi nyams su myong gyur pa/ /mthong nas de dag phan bde'i phyir/ /zhing rnams 'byam klas thams cad kyi/ /stobs bcu gang las byung ba yi/ /bla na med
294a4(phal chen): pa'i sems kyang kho mos bskyed/ /de las smon lam sprin byung ba/ /'gro ba kun la bde bar gzhol ba'i mchog /tshogs rnams 'byung ba mtha' yas dang / /lam tshul
294a5(phal chen): rgya mtsho rtogs pa'ang de nas byung / /'jug pa'i sprin yangs thob gyur pa/ /lam kun stsogs la shugs ldan te/ /pha rol phyin kyi sprin yangs pa 'ang / /chos dbyings 'byam klas kun
294a6(phal chen): tu rnam par 'byed/ /sa gnon shugs drag yangs ldan dang / /dus gsum rgya mtsho tshul gyi sa rnams la/ /chags pa med par spyod par gyur/ /skad cig gcig gis rgyal ba
294a7(phal chen): kun drung 'gro/ /gzhan yang rgyal sras kho mos ni/ /spyod pa kun tu bzang po yongs su non/ /chos dbyings bye brag bcu rnams kyi/ /rgya mtsho'i tshul la 'ang kho mo rtogs par 'jug /
294a8(phal chen): rigs kyi bu de la ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus na/ rgyal po 'khor los bsgyur ba/ sangs rgyas kyi rigs kyi rgyun myi gcod pa la zhugs pa/ mi'i bdag po
294b1(phal chen): zhes bya ba byung ba/ de gzhan zhig yin pa snyam du sems na ni/ rigs kyi bu de ltar mi lta ste/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa ni/ de'i tshe de'i dus na
294b2(phal chen): rgyal po mi'i bdag po zhes bya ba 'khor los bsgyur ba/ sangs rgyas kyi rigs rgyun mi gcod pa la zhugs pa'o/ /kho mo sad par byed pa'i mtshan mo'i lha mo de ni byang
294b3(phal chen): chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos sprul pa'o/ /rigs kyi bu de la ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus na 'khor los bsgyur ba'i btsun mo bud med rin po che bzang po'i blo
294b4(phal chen): gros ma zhes bya ba gzhan zhig yin pa snyam du sems na ni de ltar mi lta ste/ kho mo ni de'i tshe de'i dus na/ 'khor los bsgyur ba'i btsun mo bud med rin po che bzang po'i blo gros ma zhes bya bar
294b5(phal chen): gyur te/ kho mo mtshan mo'i lha mo des sad par byas nas/ sangs rgyas blta ba la yang dag par bskul to/ /rigs kyi bu kho mos ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems
294b6(phal chen): de srid gcig nas bskyed de/ de ltar kho mos sems bskyed pa de'i mthus/ bskal pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed du nam yang ngan song log par ltung bar ma skyes te/ rtag tu rgyun
294b7(phal chen): mi 'chad par lha dang mi'i 'gro ba'i rgyud la brten cing / thams cad du'ang de bzhin gshegs pa lta blta ba dang ldan par gyur to/ /tha mar kho mos bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
294b8(phal chen): g shegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen dpal gyi sgrol ma yon tan rgyal mtshan mthong ba tsam gyis byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa kun tu bzang po'i dga'
295a1(phal chen): ba shin tu yangs shing dri ma med pa'i shugs kyi rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba 'di thob ste/ de thob pas kho mo sems can yongs su smin par bya ba dang / gdul ba'i don
295a2(phal chen): du rnam pa 'di lta bus sta gon du gnas pa yin no/ /rigs kyi bu kho mos byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa kun tu bzang po'i dga' ba rgya chen po'i shugs kyi rgyal mtshan 'di
295a3(phal chen): shes par zad na/ kho mos byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi zhabs kyi drung na 'khod cing / sems kyi skad cig re re la thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
295a4(phal chen): du 'jug pa'i shugs drag po rgya mtsho chen po rab tu thob pa/ 'jug pa'i sgo thams cad la sems kyi skad cig re re zhing smon lam chen po rgya mtshos 'jug pa/ rab tu thob
295a5(phal chen): pa/ sems kyi skad cig re re zhing smon lam rgya mtsho thams cad kyi tshul la phyi ma'i mtha'i bskal par spyad pa'i dkyil 'khor mngon par bsgrub pa la mkhas pa/ spyod pa re re
295a6(phal chen): la'ang lus sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed mngon par bsgrub pa la mkhas pa/ lus re res kyang chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul rgya mtsho thams cad rgyas par 'gengs pa la
295a7(phal chen): mkhas pa/ chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul rgya mtsho re re la 'ang sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du/ sems can rnams kyi bsam pa ji lta bzhin du lus rnam par dmyigs pa'i spyod pa
295a8(phal chen): yongs su ston pa la mkhas pa/ zhing thams cad du'ang zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba thams cad la de bzhin gshegs pa rgya mtsho mtha' dang dbus med pa la 'jug par mkhas pa/
295b1(phal chen): de bzhin gshegs pa re re zhing yang chos kyi dbyings kyis klas par rgyas par 'gengs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa la 'jug par mkhas pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa re re'i
295b2(phal chen): sngon gyi mtha'i bskal pa la/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i tshogs yongs su bsgrub pa yang dag par bsdus pa la 'jug par mkhas pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa re re'i
295b3(phal chen): chos kyi 'khor lo shin tu yang dag par blang ba dang / yongs su gzung ba la mkhas pa/ dus gsum thams cad kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa'i tshul rgya mtsho la
295b4(phal chen): 'jug par mkhas pa/ de dag gi spyod pa shes pa 'am/ yon tan brjod par nus re skan/ /song rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor
295b5(phal chen): 'di nyid na kho mo dang / rgyang mi ring ba zhig na/ mtshan mo'i lha mo sems can kun tu skyong ba'i gzi brjid dpal zhes bya ba 'dug gis/ de'i gan du song
295b6(phal chen): la ji ltar byang chub sems dpas/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i dkyil 'khor la 'jug par bya ba dang / ji ltar yongs su sbyang bar bya ba dris shig /
295b7(phal chen): de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis/ mtshan mo'i lha mo rab tu dga' ba'i mig 'gro bar rnam par snang ba'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/
295b8(phal chen): mtshan mo'i lha mo 'gro bar rnam par snang ba la/ lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas/ yang dang yang bltas te/ mtshan mo'i lha mo rab tu dga' ba'i mig 'gro
296a1(phal chen): bar rnam par snang ba'i drung nas song ngo / /bkra shis so// //rgya gar gye mkhan po dzin mi tra dang / su re n+d+ra bo d+hi dang / zhus chen gyi
296a2(phal chen): lo ts+tsha ba ban+de ye shes sde la stsogs pas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o/ /zhus te dag go/ //
296a3(phal chen): ye d+har+m+mA he tu pra b+ha bA he tun+te ShAn+ta thA ga to h+ya ba data/ te ShAny+tsa yo ni ro d+ha e ba~M bA dI ma hA shra ma NaH// //
